en: The diagram shows a cross section of the building's foundation.
cn: 该图显示了建筑物基础的横截面。

en: A cross section of the tree reveals its age rings.
cn: 树的横截面显示了它的年轮。

en: For the time being, we'll stay in this hotel.
cn: 目前，我们将住在这家酒店。

en: The project is on hold for the time being.
cn: 这个项目暂时搁置了。

en: The final exam will cover all chapters of the textbook.
cn: 期末考试将涵盖教科书的所有章节。

en: He studied hard for the final exam and got an A.
cn: 他为期末考试努力学习，得了A。

en: She was fascinated by the ancient artifacts in the museum.
cn: 她被博物馆里的古代文物迷住了。

en: He is fascinated by the mysteries of the universe.
cn: 他对宇宙的奥秘着迷。

en: She took the responsibility on herself to organize the event.
cn: 她主动承担了组织活动的责任。

en: He took the task on himself without being asked.
cn: 他未经要求就主动承担了这项任务。

en: We met by coincidence at the airport.
cn: 我们在机场偶然相遇。

en: By coincidence, they both chose the same restaurant.
cn: 碰巧的是，他们都选择了同一家餐厅。

en: Many students do part-time work to support their studies.
cn: 许多学生做兼职工作来支持学业。

en: She decided to do part-time work while raising her children.
cn: 她决定在抚养孩子的同时做兼职工作。

en: She runs an online business selling handmade crafts.
cn: 她经营一家销售手工制品的在线业务。

en: Running an online business requires good marketing skills.
cn: 经营在线业务需要良好的营销技巧。

en: She picked out a dress for the party.
cn: 她为聚会挑选了一件连衣裙。

en: Can you pick out the best candidate from the list?
cn: 你能从列表中选出最佳候选人吗？

en: After the election results came in, he had to eat his words about the candidate's chances.
cn: 选举结果出来后，他不得不收回关于候选人胜算的言论。

en: She predicted the project would fail, but when it succeeded, she had to eat her words.
cn: 她预测项目会失败，但当它成功时，她不得不承认自己说错了。

en: The team had a disagreement on the best approach to solve the problem.
cn: 团队在解决问题的最佳方法上有分歧。

en: They often have disagreements on political issues during family dinners.
cn: 他们在家庭晚餐时经常在政治问题上产生分歧。

en: Now that he's the boss, he has the shoe on the other foot and understands the pressures his employees faced.
cn: 现在他是老板了，情况反转，他理解了员工们曾面临的压力。

en: After years of criticizing others, she had the shoe on the other foot when her own work was reviewed harshly.
cn: 多年来批评别人后，当她的作品受到严厉评价时，她体验到了角色互换。

en: After 40 years of service, the old machine was finally put out to pasture.
cn: 服务了40年后，那台旧机器终于被退役了。

en: The company decided to put the veteran employee out to pasture with a generous retirement package.
cn: 公司决定让那位资深员工退休，并提供丰厚的退休金。

en: He had to rush through his homework to make it to the party on time.
cn: 他不得不匆忙完成作业以准时参加派对。

en: The bill was rushed through parliament without proper debate.
cn: 该法案在没有适当辩论的情况下被快速通过议会。

en: The remote village is isolated from the rest of the country by mountains.
cn: 这个偏远村庄因山脉而与国家的其他部分隔离。

en: During the pandemic, many people felt isolated from their friends and family.
cn: 疫情期间，许多人感到与朋友和家人隔离。

en: I decided to switch to a healthier diet to improve my energy levels.
cn: 我决定切换到更健康的饮食以提高精力水平。

en: The company plans to switch to renewable energy sources next year.
cn: 公司计划明年转换到可再生能源。

en: He invited the stray dog to come in out of the rain and gave it some food.
cn: 他邀请那只流浪狗进来避雨，并给了它一些食物。

en: After losing his job, he was grateful to come in out of the rain with a new opportunity.
cn: 失业后，他很感激能有一个新机会来改善处境。

en: The sudden change in weather brought on a headache for many people.
cn: 天气的突然变化引起了许多人的头痛。

en: Stress at work can bring on health problems if not managed properly.
cn: 如果处理不当，工作压力可能导致健康问题。

en: She lays by a portion of her salary every month for emergencies.
cn: 她每月存一部分工资以备不时之需。

en: Farmers often lay by grain during harvest season for winter.
cn: 农民常在收获季节储存谷物以备过冬。

en: The company was confronted with a sudden financial crisis.
cn: 公司突然面临财务危机。

en: She was confronted with a difficult decision about her career.
cn: 她面临着一个关于职业生涯的艰难决定。

en: As soon as he entered the party, he made a beeline for the food table.
cn: 他一进入派对，就径直走向食物桌。

en: She made a beeline for the exit when the meeting ended.
cn: 会议结束时，她直奔出口。

en: Please put down the book when you're finished reading.
cn: 请读完书后把它放下。

en: He put down his keys on the kitchen counter.
cn: 他把钥匙搁置在厨房台面上。

en: The argument escalated and they started to get physical.
cn: 争论升级，他们开始动手了。

en: In sports, players sometimes get physical during intense moments.
cn: 在体育中，球员有时在紧张时刻会变得身体接触。

en: They sold the house at a profit after renovating it.
cn: 他们翻新后以盈利的方式卖掉了房子。

en: The investment yielded returns at a profit within a year.
cn: 这项投资在一年内以盈利的方式产生了回报。

en: After hearing the bad news, she went to pieces and couldn't stop crying.
cn: 听到坏消息后，她情绪崩溃，无法停止哭泣。

en: He went to pieces during the stressful exam, forgetting everything he studied.
cn: 在压力大的考试中，他崩溃了，忘记了所有学过的内容。

en: Fresh fruits are in ample supply at the market during summer.
cn: 夏季市场上新鲜水果供应充足。

en: The company has resources in ample supply to handle the new project.
cn: 公司有充足的资源来处理新项目。

en: This ancient artifact has been in existence for over a thousand years.
cn: 这件古代文物已经存在了一千多年。

en: The company has been in existence since 1995, serving customers worldwide.
cn: 这家公司自1995年成立以来，一直为全球客户服务。

en: Many people prefer steady jobs with benefits over freelance work.
cn: 许多人更喜欢有福利的稳定工作，而不是自由职业。

en: He found steady jobs in the government sector after graduation.
cn: 毕业后，他在政府部门找到了稳定的工作。

en: She pulled off a stunning performance in the competition.
cn: 她在比赛中成功完成了一场惊艳的表演。

en: They pulled off the deal despite many obstacles.
cn: 尽管有许多障碍，他们还是成功完成了这笔交易。

en: Children love to play with toys in the park.
cn: 孩子们喜欢在公园里玩玩具。

en: He often plays with his phone during meetings.
cn: 他经常在会议期间摆弄手机。

en: During the lockdown, she confined herself to doing home workouts.
cn: 封锁期间，她限制自己只做家庭锻炼。

en: He confines himself to doing research and avoids administrative tasks.
cn: 他限制自己只做研究，避免行政任务。

en: He put his point across clearly during the debate.
cn: 他在辩论中清晰地表达了自己的观点。

en: It's important to put across the message effectively in advertising.
cn: 在广告中有效地传达信息很重要。

en: She keeps her emotions in check during stressful situations.
cn: 在压力大的情况下，她控制自己的情绪。

en: The government tries to keep inflation in check with policies.
cn: 政府试图通过政策控制通货膨胀。

en: Many families face economic hardships during recessions.
cn: 许多家庭在经济衰退期间面临经济困难。

en: The pandemic caused widespread economic hardships globally.
cn: 疫情在全球范围内造成了广泛的经济困难。

en: We need to allow for extra time in case of traffic delays.
cn: 我们需要考虑到额外时间，以防交通延误。

en: The budget should allow for unexpected expenses.
cn: 预算应该为意外开支留出余地。

en: Regular social interaction is important for mental health.
cn: 定期的社交互动对心理健康很重要。

en: Online platforms facilitate social interaction across distances.
cn: 在线平台促进了跨距离的社交互动。

en: He's angling for a promotion by taking on extra projects.
cn: 他通过承担额外项目来谋取晋升。

en: She angled for compliments by showing off her new dress.
cn: 她通过炫耀新裙子来试图获取赞美。

en: Schools should teach life skills like budgeting and cooking.
cn: 学校应该教授预算和烹饪等生活技能。

en: Developing life skills helps individuals become more independent.
cn: 培养生活技能有助于个人变得更加独立。

en: The software saves files by default in the Documents folder.
cn: 软件默认将文件保存在文档文件夹中。

en: He became the team leader by default when no one else volunteered.
cn: 当没有其他人自愿时，他默认成为了团队领导。

en: The animals were locked in cages at the zoo for safety.
cn: 动物园里的动物被锁在笼子里以确保安全。

en: She felt like she was locked in cages by societal expectations.
cn: 她感觉自己被社会期望禁锢住了。

en: I messed up the presentation by forgetting my notes.
cn: 我忘了带笔记，搞砸了演示。

en: Don't mess up the room; we just cleaned it.
cn: 别把房间弄乱；我们刚打扫过。

en: I have an acquaintance with him from work, but we're not close friends.
cn: 我通过工作认识他，但我们不是亲密朋友。

en: She has an acquaintance with the author through a mutual friend.
cn: 她通过共同的朋友认识了这位作者。

en: She got credit for organizing the successful event.
cn: 她因组织这次成功的活动而获得赞扬。

en: He got credit for his innovative solution to the problem.
cn: 他因创新解决问题而获得认可。

en: In ancient times, people used barter systems for trade.
cn: 在古代，人们使用物物交换系统进行贸易。

en: Many myths originated in ancient times.
cn: 许多神话起源于古代。

en: I am satisfied with the quality of the product.
cn: 我对产品的质量感到满意。

en: She was satisfied with her performance in the exam.
cn: 她对自己在考试中的表现感到满意。

en: We need to fix a date for the meeting next week.
cn: 我们需要为下周的会议确定一个日期。

en: They fixed a date for their wedding in June.
cn: 他们为婚礼确定了六月的日期。

en: He worked up the courage to ask for a promotion.
cn: 他鼓起勇气要求升职。

en: She worked up a sweat during her workout.
cn: 她在锻炼中出了一身汗。

en: She has the wherewithal to start her own business.
cn: 她拥有创办自己企业的必要资源。

en: Do you have the wherewithal to complete this project on time?
cn: 你有按时完成这个项目的能力吗？

en: We are running short of time to finish the report.
cn: 我们完成报告的时间不多了。

en: The store ran short of supplies during the sale.
cn: 商店在促销期间供应短缺。

en: This model differs from the old one in its design.
cn: 这个型号在设计上与旧型号不同。

en: She differs from her sister in personality.
cn: 她在个性上与她的姐姐不同。

en: We saw herds of elephants on the safari.
cn: 我们在野生动物园看到了成群的象。

en: Herds of cattle grazed in the field.
cn: 成群的牛在田野里吃草。

en: Let's get straight down to business without any delays.
cn: 让我们立即开始谈正事，不要拖延。

en: She got straight down to studying after dinner.
cn: 她晚饭后立即开始学习。

en: Don't throw away that old book; it might be valuable.
cn: 不要扔掉那本旧书；它可能很有价值。

en: He threw away the broken toy.
cn: 他扔掉了那个坏掉的玩具。

en: Their cabin is in the middle of nowhere, far from any town.
cn: 他们的小屋在偏僻的地方，远离任何城镇。

en: We got lost and ended up in the middle of nowhere.
cn: 我们迷路了，最终到了一个荒无人烟的地方。

en: We must protect the environment at all costs.
cn: 我们必须不惜一切代价保护环境。

en: He was determined to win the competition at all costs.
cn: 他决心不惜一切代价赢得比赛。

en: She decided to take a gap year to travel around Asia.
cn: 她决定休学一年去亚洲旅行。

en: Many students take a gap year before starting university.
cn: 许多学生在开始大学前休学一年。

en: We are all in the same boat when it comes to dealing with this crisis.
cn: 在处理这场危机时，我们都处境相同。

en: Since we're in the same boat, let's work together to find a solution.
cn: 既然我们同舟共济，就一起努力找到解决方案吧。

en: She drew out a long thread from the spool.
cn: 她从线轴上抽出一根长线。

en: The dentist drew out the infected tooth carefully.
cn: 牙医小心地拔出了那颗感染的牙齿。

en: He had to hold his tongue during the argument to avoid making it worse.
cn: 在争论中，他不得不保持沉默以避免情况恶化。

en: She held her tongue even though she disagreed with the decision.
cn: 尽管她不同意这个决定，但她忍住了没说。

en: The government recognized the new state as an independent nation.
cn: 政府承认这个新国家为独立国家。

en: She was recognized as the leading expert in her field.
cn: 她被公认为该领域的顶尖专家。

en: He gets a charge out of watching comedy shows.
cn: 他从观看喜剧节目中获得乐趣。

en: She gets a charge out of solving difficult puzzles.
cn: 她从解决难题中获得兴奋感。

en: Many people die from heart disease each year.
cn: 每年许多人死于心脏病。

en: He died from injuries sustained in the car crash.
cn: 他死于车祸中受的伤。

en: The new technology opens up prospects for renewable energy.
cn: 这项新技术为可再生能源开辟了前景。

en: Studying abroad can open up prospects for international careers.
cn: 出国留学能为国际职业开辟前景。

en: The training put the recruits through rigorous exercises.
cn: 训练让新兵经历了严格的练习。

en: She put her car through a thorough inspection.
cn: 她让她的车经历了一次彻底检查。

en: He ground out a report late into the night.
cn: 他熬夜费力地完成了一份报告。

en: The factory grinds out thousands of units daily.
cn: 工厂每天费力生产数千个单位。

en: You can substitute honey for sugar in this recipe.
cn: 在这个食谱中，你可以用蜂蜜代替糖。

en: She substituted for the absent teacher yesterday.
cn: 她昨天替代了缺席的老师。

en: It took me a while to take in all the details of the plan.
cn: 我花了一段时间才理解计划的所有细节。

en: She quickly took in the instructions and started working.
cn: 她快速吸收了指示并开始工作。

en: Be cautious of strangers offering deals that seem too good to be true.
cn: 对提供好得不像真的交易的陌生人要谨慎。

en: Investors should be cautious of volatile markets.
cn: 投资者应对波动市场保持谨慎。

en: Poverty drove him to work multiple jobs.
cn: 贫困驱使他做多份工作。

en: Her passion for art drove her to study abroad.
cn: 她对艺术的热爱驱使她出国留学。

en: Success often goes hand in hand with hard work.
cn: 成功通常与努力工作密切相关。

en: Economic growth goes hand in hand with increased employment.
cn: 经济增长与就业增加密切相关。

en: Beware of pickpockets in crowded areas.
cn: 在拥挤区域要当心扒手。

en: You should beware of scams when shopping online.
cn: 网上购物时，你应该警惕诈骗。

en: The company fell into disrepute after the scandal.
cn: 公司在丑闻后声名狼藉。

en: The practice has fallen into disrepute among professionals.
cn: 这种做法在专业人士中已声名狼藉。

en: To stay healthy, avoid excessive sugar in your diet.
cn: 为了保持健康，避免饮食中过多的糖。

en: He avoided the topic to prevent an argument.
cn: 他避开这个话题以防止争论。

en: For the gala, they really put on the dog with fancy decorations.
cn: 为了晚会，他们真的摆阔气，用了华丽的装饰。

en: He put on the dog to impress his new colleagues.
cn: 他摆阔气以给新同事留下印象。

en: Suffice it to say, the project was a huge success.
cn: 只需说，这个项目是一个巨大的成功。

en: Suffice it to say that we learned a lot from the experience.
cn: 只需说我们从这次经历中学到了很多。

en: Can you speak up? I can't hear you in the back.
cn: 你能大声点说吗？我在后面听不见。

en: He spoke up to ensure everyone heard the announcement.
cn: 他大声说以确保每个人都听到通知。

en: The team pushed ahead with the project despite setbacks.
cn: 尽管有挫折，团队积极推进项目。

en: She pushed ahead with her plans to start a business.
cn: 她积极推进她创业的计划。

en: In my opinion, this is the best solution to the problem.
cn: 依我之见，这是解决问题的最佳方案。

en: In her opinion, the movie was not worth watching.
cn: 依她之见，这部电影不值得看。

en: The 2008 financial crisis affected economies worldwide.
cn: 2008年的金融危机影响了全球经济。

en: Governments often intervene during a financial crisis to stabilize markets.
cn: 政府常在金融危机期间干预以稳定市场。

en: She had to work overtime to meet the project deadline.
cn: 她不得不加班以赶上项目截止日期。

en: Employees are compensated for working overtime on weekends.
cn: 员工在周末加班会得到补偿。

en: I'm on the way to the airport to pick up my friend.
cn: 我正在去机场接朋友的路上。

en: She stopped for coffee on the way to work.
cn: 她在上班的路上停下来喝了杯咖啡。

en: Drivers must give way to pedestrians at crosswalks.
cn: 司机必须在人行横道处给行人让路。

en: He refused to give way in the negotiation.
cn: 他在谈判中拒绝让步。

en: She took pity on the stray cat and brought it home.
cn: 她同情那只流浪猫，把它带回了家。

en: The judge took pity on the defendant due to his difficult circumstances.
cn: 法官因被告的困境而怜悯他。

en: The sudden fame went to his head, and he became arrogant.
cn: 突然的名声冲昏了他的头脑，他变得傲慢起来。

en: Don't let success go to your head; stay humble.
cn: 不要让成功冲昏了头脑，保持谦逊。

en: She works full time as a software engineer.
cn: 她是一名全职软件工程师。

en: The position requires a full-time commitment.
cn: 这个职位需要全职投入。

en: He is an expert on ancient Roman history.
cn: 他是古罗马历史方面的专家。

en: She consulted an expert on climate change for her research.
cn: 她为研究咨询了一位气候变化专家。

en: The project is more or less complete, with just a few details left.
cn: 这个项目或多或少完成了，只剩下一些细节。

en: It will take more or less an hour to get there by car.
cn: 开车到那里大约需要一小时。

en: Please take off your shoes before entering the house.
cn: 请进屋前脱掉鞋子。

en: He took off his jacket because it was too warm.
cn: 因为太热，他脱下了夹克。

en: Hold fast to the railing to avoid slipping on the stairs.
cn: 紧紧抓住栏杆，以免在楼梯上滑倒。

en: She holds fast to her beliefs despite criticism.
cn: 尽管受到批评，她仍坚持自己的信念。

en: The accountant was fired for having his hand in the till.
cn: 那名会计师因监守自盗被解雇了。

en: She suspected her partner of having his hand in the till when funds went missing.
cn: 当资金失踪时，她怀疑她的合伙人挪用了公款。

en: Please remove the old files from the computer to free up space.
cn: 请从电脑中移除旧文件以释放空间。

en: The doctor removed the splinter from her finger.
cn: 医生从她的手指中取出了碎片。

en: The diet restricts sugar intake to 20 grams per day.
cn: 这种饮食将糖的摄入量限制在每天20克。

en: Access to the building is restricted to authorized personnel only.
cn: 进入这栋大楼仅限于授权人员。

en: As a librarian, she keeps all the reference books at her fingertips.
cn: 作为图书管理员，她将所有参考书都放在手边。

en: He keeps the latest data at his fingertips for quick decisions.
cn: 他将最新数据放在手边以便快速决策。

en: Make sure all the tools are in place before starting the repair.
cn: 在开始修理前，确保所有工具都已就位。

en: The new policy is now in place to improve safety.
cn: 新政策现已就位以改善安全。

en: Please hand on this message to the manager when you see him.
cn: 当你见到经理时，请把这个消息转交给他。

en: The tradition is handed on from generation to generation.
cn: 这个传统代代相传。

en: We should give credit where credit is due and acknowledge her hard work.
cn: 我们应该给予应有的认可，承认她的辛勤工作。

en: The manager always gives credit where credit is due to motivate the team.
cn: 经理总是将功劳归于应得之人以激励团队。

en: The team went all out to win the championship.
cn: 团队全力以赴以赢得冠军。

en: She went all out in preparing for the exam, studying day and night.
cn: 她为准备考试竭尽全力，日夜学习。

en: I'll put you down as a guest for the event.
cn: 我会把你登记为活动的客人。

en: She put him down as a reliable friend after he helped her in need.
cn: 在他需要时帮助她后，她认为他是一个可靠的朋友。

en: The manager got a free hand with the project, allowing her to implement her own strategies.
cn: 经理获得了对该项目的完全控制权，使她能够实施自己的策略。

en: After the promotion, he got a free hand with the budget, making decisions without needing approval.
cn: 晋升后，他获得了对预算的自由处理权，无需批准即可做出决定。

en: She offered her help in return for his promise to keep it confidential.
cn: 她提供帮助，作为他承诺保密的回报。

en: He gave her a gift in return for her hospitality during his visit.
cn: 他送她一份礼物，以回报她在他访问期间的款待。

en: During the crisis, it's important not to lose your head and stay focused on the solution.
cn: 在危机期间，重要的是不要失去冷静，保持专注于解决方案。

en: She lost her head when she saw the accident and started screaming uncontrollably.
cn: 她看到事故时失去了理智，开始无法控制地尖叫。

en: The horizontal movement of the pendulum was measured to analyze its oscillation patterns.
cn: 测量了摆锤的水平移动，以分析其振荡模式。

en: In dance, horizontal movement across the stage requires precise coordination and balance.
cn: 在舞蹈中，舞台上的水平移动需要精确的协调和平衡。

en: After working 80 hours a week, he started to go round the bend and needed a break.
cn: 每周工作80小时后，他开始变得疯狂，需要休息一下。

en: The constant noise from the construction made her go round the bend with frustration.
cn: 建筑工地的持续噪音让她沮丧得快要发疯。

en: When planning the trip, make allowance for possible delays due to traffic.
cn: 计划旅行时，要考虑到交通可能造成的延误。

en: The teacher made allowance for the student's illness by extending the deadline for the assignment.
cn: 老师考虑到学生生病，延长了作业的截止日期。

en: His indifference to the suffering of others made him seem cold and unfeeling.
cn: 他对他人苦难的漠不关心让他显得冷漠无情。

en: The company's indifference to customer complaints led to a decline in its reputation.
cn: 公司对客户投诉的漠不关心导致其声誉下降。

en: The comedian's jokes had the entire audience in stitches throughout the show.
cn: 喜剧演员的笑话让整个观众在演出期间笑得前仰后合。

en: Her funny story about the mishap had her friends in stitches at the party.
cn: 她关于那场事故的搞笑故事让她的朋友在聚会上笑得前仰后合。

en: The loud noise interrupted my train of thought, and I lost track of what I was saying.
cn: 巨大的噪音打断了我的思路，我忘记了自己在说什么。

en: She followed a logical train of thought to solve the complex problem step by step.
cn: 她遵循一个逻辑思路，逐步解决了这个复杂问题。

en: The new art collection is on show at the museum until the end of the month.
cn: 新的艺术收藏在博物馆展出，直到月底。

en: His latest invention will be on show at the technology conference next week.
cn: 他的最新发明将在下周的技术会议上公开展示。

en: The defendant decided to appeal against the court's verdict, seeking a reduced sentence.
cn: 被告决定对法院的判决提出上诉，寻求减刑。

en: They plan to appeal against the decision to deny their application for a permit.
cn: 他们计划对拒绝他们许可证申请的决定提出上诉。

en: The new law will go into effect on January 1st, changing the regulations for businesses.
cn: 新法律将于1月1日生效，改变对企业的规定。

en: The policy changes are scheduled to go into effect after the board meeting next month.
cn: 政策变更计划在下个月的董事会会议后生效。

en: The charity event was held in aid of the local homeless shelter.
cn: 慈善活动是为了帮助当地的无家可归者收容所而举办的。

en: They organized a fundraiser in aid of the disaster relief efforts.
cn: 他们组织了一次筹款活动，以支持救灾工作。

en: Parents need to be patient with young children as they learn new skills.
cn: 父母需要对年幼的孩子有耐心，因为他们正在学习新技能。

en: The teacher was patient with the struggling student, offering extra help after class.
cn: 老师对学习困难的学生有耐心，课后提供额外帮助。

en: On the positive side, the new job offers more opportunities for career growth.
cn: 从积极的一面看，新工作提供了更多职业发展的机会。

en: Despite the challenges, there is a positive side to the situation that we should focus on.
cn: 尽管有挑战，但这种情况有积极的一面，我们应该关注。

en: A great opportunity came his way when he least expected it, changing his career path.
cn: 一个绝佳的机会在他最意想不到的时候降临，改变了他的职业道路。

en: Good luck seems to come her way often, as she wins prizes in many contests.
cn: 好运似乎经常降临到她身上，因为她在许多比赛中获奖。

en: The outcome of the negotiation hangs in the balance, with both sides reluctant to compromise.
cn: 谈判的结果悬而未决，双方都不愿妥协。

en: His future at the company hangs in the balance after the recent performance review.
cn: 在最近的绩效评估后，他在公司的未来悬而未决。

en: She took an interest in photography after visiting a stunning art exhibition.
cn: 在参观了一个令人惊叹的艺术展览后，她对摄影产生了兴趣。

en: He took an interest in learning a new language to better communicate with international clients.
cn: 他对学习一门新语言产生了兴趣，以便更好地与国际客户沟通。

en: The company's success is largely due to internal factors like employee motivation.
cn: 公司的成功很大程度上归功于员工积极性等内部因素。

en: We need to analyze both internal factors and external market conditions.
cn: 我们需要同时分析内部因素和外部市场条件。

en: We'll set off for the mountains at dawn tomorrow.
cn: 我们明天黎明时分出发去山区。

en: The explorers set off on their journey with high hopes.
cn: 探险者们满怀希望地启程了。

en: Meditation helps me reduce stress after a long day.
cn: 冥想帮助我在漫长的一天后减轻压力。

en: Regular exercise is an effective way to reduce stress.
cn: 定期锻炼是减轻压力的有效方法。

en: The boxer knocked down his opponent in the third round.
cn: 拳击手在第三回合击倒了对手。

en: The cyclist was knocked down by a speeding car.
cn: 骑自行车的人被一辆超速汽车撞倒了。

en: This antique vase is worth at least $5,000.
cn: 这个古董花瓶至少值5000美元。

en: How much do you think my car is worth now?
cn: 你觉得我的车现在值多少钱？

en: Pedestrians have the right-of-way at this crosswalk.
cn: 在这个人行横道上，行人拥有优先通行权。

en: The vehicle already in the roundabout has the right-of-way.
cn: 已经在环岛内的车辆拥有优先通行权。

en: We can conclude from the data that sales are increasing.
cn: 我们可以从数据中得出结论：销售额正在增长。

en: What did you conclude from his ambiguous statement?
cn: 你从他模棱两可的陈述中得出了什么结论？

en: The team has a winning streak of ten games.
cn: 这支球队取得了一连串十场比赛的胜利。

en: She has a streak of bad luck recently.
cn: 她最近有一连串的坏运气。

en: The kids ran me ragged all day at the amusement park.
cn: 孩子们在游乐园让我一整天筋疲力尽。

en: Her demanding job runs her ragged by the end of each week.
cn: 她要求苛刻的工作让她每周结束时都筋疲力尽。

en: There is a shortage of skilled workers in this industry.
cn: 这个行业缺乏熟练工人。

en: The drought caused a severe shortage of water.
cn: 干旱导致严重的水资源短缺。

en: I have a lot in common with my new roommate.
cn: 我和新室友有很多共同点。

en: These two theories have little in common with each other.
cn: 这两种理论彼此之间几乎没有共同点。

en: I prefer to read news online rather than buy newspapers.
cn: 我更喜欢在线阅读新闻而不是买报纸。

en: Many people now read news online during their commute.
cn: 现在很多人在通勤时在线阅读新闻。

en: The doctor on duty will see you now.
cn: 值班医生现在可以为您看诊。

en: Security guards must remain alert while on duty.
cn: 保安人员在值班时必须保持警惕。

en: The children made a mess of the living room with their toys.
cn: 孩子们用玩具把客厅弄得一团糟。

en: I made a mess of the presentation by forgetting my notes.
cn: 我忘了带笔记，把演示搞得一团糟。

en: Paper is primarily made from wood fiber.
cn: 纸主要由木纤维制成。

en: Wood fiber insulation is an eco-friendly building material.
cn: 木纤维绝缘材料是一种环保建筑材料。

en: The book describes a sequence of historical events.
cn: 这本书描述了一系列历史事件。

en: Follow this sequence of steps to complete the installation.
cn: 按照这一系列步骤完成安装。

en: The team is working at full stretch to meet the deadline.
cn: 团队正全力以赴以赶上截止日期。

en: She ran at full stretch to catch the bus.
cn: 她竭尽全力跑去赶公交车。

en: After their argument, they made up with each other the next day.
cn: 争吵后，他们第二天就和好了。

en: It's time to make up with your brother and end this feud.
cn: 是时候和你哥哥和解，结束这场争执了。

en: They cast lots to decide who would go first.
cn: 他们抽签决定谁先走。

en: In ancient times, people often cast lots to make important decisions.
cn: 在古代，人们经常通过抽签来做重要决定。

en: The car ran over a pedestrian at the crosswalk.
cn: 汽车在人行横道上撞倒了一名行人。

en: Be careful not to run over any small animals on the road.
cn: 小心别在路上碾到小动物。

en: The store offers a wide range of products from electronics to clothing.
cn: 这家商店提供从电子产品到服装的多种商品。

en: We discussed a range of topics during the meeting, including budget and marketing.
cn: 我们在会议上讨论了一系列话题，包括预算和营销。

en: A great many people attended the concert last night.
cn: 昨晚有很多人参加了音乐会。

en: She has read a great many books on history over the years.
cn: 多年来，她阅读了大量历史书籍。

en: As a business owner, she is responsible for all financial decisions.
cn: 作为企业主，她负责所有财务决策。

en: Many business owners struggle with balancing work and personal life.
cn: 许多企业主在平衡工作和个人生活方面感到困难。

en: The situation is now under our control after the emergency response.
cn: 经过应急响应，局势现在在我们的控制之下。

en: Keep your emotions under your control during the negotiation.
cn: 在谈判期间，控制好你的情绪。

en: The deadline for the project is creeping up on us, so we need to work faster.
cn: 项目截止日期正悄悄逼近，我们需要加快工作速度。

en: Winter crept up on the town, with the first snow falling unexpectedly.
cn: 冬天不知不觉地降临到这个小镇，第一场雪意外地落下。

en: The community works hard to preserve traditions passed down from their ancestors.
cn: 这个社区努力保护从祖先传承下来的传统。

en: It's important to preserve traditions while also embracing modern changes.
cn: 在拥抱现代变化的同时，保护传统很重要。

en: She has a fever and should stay in bed to rest.
cn: 她发烧了，应该卧床休息。

en: If you have a fever, it's a sign that your body is fighting an infection.
cn: 如果你发烧了，那是你身体在抵抗感染的迹象。

en: It's essential to communicate with your team regularly to avoid misunderstandings.
cn: 定期与你的团队沟通以避免误解至关重要。

en: He uses sign language to communicate with his deaf friends.
cn: 他用手语与他的聋人朋友交流。

en: The president will make a speech at the conference tomorrow.
cn: 总统明天将在会议上发表演讲。

en: She was nervous about making a speech in front of hundreds of people.
cn: 她对于在数百人面前发表演讲感到紧张。

en: On her birthday, she made a wish and blew out the candles on the cake.
cn: 在她生日那天，她许了个愿，然后吹灭了蛋糕上的蜡烛。

en: The children took turns blowing out candles during the party games.
cn: 在派对游戏中，孩子们轮流吹灭蜡烛。

en: He took up with a new group of friends after moving to the city.
cn: 搬到城市后，他开始与一群新朋友交往。

en: She advised her son not to take up with people who have bad habits.
cn: 她建议儿子不要与有坏习惯的人结交。

en: After his recovery, he decided to turn over a new leaf and live a healthier lifestyle.
cn: 康复后，他决定改过自新，过上更健康的生活方式。

en: She turned over a new leaf by quitting her job and pursuing her passion for art.
cn: 她通过辞职并追求对艺术的热爱来重新开始。

en: As a translator, her job is to interpret messages accurately between different languages.
cn: 作为翻译，她的工作是在不同语言之间准确解释信息。

en: It can be challenging to interpret messages in a noisy environment.
cn: 在嘈杂的环境中解读消息可能具有挑战性。

en: Students should meet with their academic advisor regularly to plan their course schedule.
cn: 学生应定期与学术顾问会面以规划课程安排。

en: The academic advisor provided guidance on choosing a major and career path.
cn: 学术顾问在选择专业和职业道路方面提供了指导。

en: His dedication to work is akin to that of a professional athlete training for the Olympics.
cn: 他对工作的投入类似于职业运动员为奥运会训练。

en: The new policy is akin to the previous one, with only minor adjustments.
cn: 新政策与之前的类似，只有微小的调整。

en: To maintain good health, it's important to exercise regularly, such as going for a run three times a week.
cn: 为了保持健康，定期锻炼很重要，比如每周跑步三次。

en: She exercises regularly by attending yoga classes every morning.
cn: 她通过每天早上去上瑜伽课来定期锻炼。

en: Freedom of speech is considered one of the basic rights in a democracy.
cn: 言论自由被认为是民主国家的基本权利之一。

en: The constitution guarantees basic rights such as equality and privacy to all citizens.
cn: 宪法保障所有公民的基本权利，如平等和隐私。

en: He went ape over the new video game release.
cn: 他对新发布的电子游戏兴奋不已。

en: She went ape over the mess in the kitchen.
cn: 她对厨房的混乱大发雷霆。

en: The project's success relied on collaborative teamwork among all departments.
cn: 项目的成功依赖于所有部门之间的协作团队合作。

en: We encourage collaborative teamwork to solve complex problems efficiently.
cn: 我们鼓励协作团队合作以高效解决复杂问题。

en: After winning the game, they gave each other some skin.
cn: 赢得比赛后，他们互相击掌庆祝。

en: Give me some skin to show we're on the same page.
cn: 和我击个掌，表示我们意见一致。

en: After college, he learned to stand on his own two feet financially.
cn: 大学毕业后，他学会了在经济上自立。

en: It's important for young adults to stand on their own two feet.
cn: 年轻人学会独立自主很重要。

en: The teachers gathered in the staff room during their break.
cn: 老师们在休息时间聚集在员工休息室里。

en: She left her coffee mug in the staff room.
cn: 她把咖啡杯忘在了员工休息室。

en: The new law strengthens consumer rights regarding product returns.
cn: 新法律加强了消费者在退货方面的权益。

en: It's important to be aware of your consumer rights when making purchases.
cn: 购物时了解自己的消费者权益很重要。

en: The company launched massive campaigns to promote its new product.
cn: 该公司发起了大规模活动来推广其新产品。

en: The government launched massive campaigns against illegal logging.
cn: 政府发起了大规模打击非法伐木的活动。

en: She built up a network of contacts in the industry over many years.
cn: 多年来，她在行业内建立了一个人脉网络。

en: Building up a network of contacts is essential for career advancement.
cn: 建立人脉网络对职业发展至关重要。

en: She looks as if butter wouldn't melt in her mouth, but she's actually quite mischievous.
cn: 她看起来天真无邪，但实际上相当调皮。

en: He acted as if butter wouldn't melt in his mouth during the interview.
cn: 面试时他表现得一副无辜的样子。

en: People crowded in to see the celebrity at the event.
cn: 人们涌入活动现场去看那位名人。

en: Memories of the past crowded in as she visited her old school.
cn: 当她参观母校时，过去的记忆涌上心头。

en: They plan to build safety features into the new car design.
cn: 他们计划将安全功能融入新车型设计中。

en: Flexibility was built into the software from the start.
cn: 灵活性从一开始就被整合到了软件中。

en: He finally got his teeth into the challenging research project.
cn: 他终于认真着手处理那个具有挑战性的研究项目。

en: She loves to get her teeth into a good book.
cn: 她喜欢深入阅读一本好书。

en: He hardly ever goes to the movies.
cn: 他几乎从不看电影。

en: She hardly ever complains about her workload.
cn: 她几乎从不抱怨工作量。

en: I'm uncertain about the details of the plan.
cn: 我对计划的细节不确定。

en: They were uncertain about which direction to take.
cn: 他们对该走哪个方向不确定。

en: The project failed for lack of funding.
cn: 该项目因缺乏资金而失败。

en: For lack of evidence, the case was dismissed.
cn: 由于缺乏证据，该案被驳回。

en: The lawyer had to withdraw due to a conflict of interests.
cn: 由于利益冲突，该律师不得不退出。

en: Companies must disclose any potential conflict of interests.
cn: 公司必须披露任何潜在的利益冲突。

en: She started the business on her own account.
cn: 她独立创办了这家企业。

en: He traveled to Europe on his own account after graduation.
cn: 毕业后，他独自前往欧洲旅行。

en: The two dogs went at each other in the yard.
cn: 两只狗在院子里互相攻击。

en: He went at the problem with full energy.
cn: 他全力以赴地处理这个问题。

en: A good sense of humor can help in stressful situations.
cn: 良好的幽默感有助于应对压力情境。

en: She has a great sense of humor that makes her fun to be around.
cn: 她有很强的幽默感，让人乐于与她相处。

en: He is on medication for high blood pressure.
cn: 他因高血压而服药治疗。

en: She has been on medication for anxiety for several months.
cn: 她因焦虑症服药治疗已经几个月了。

en: The university offers free counselling service to students experiencing stress.
cn: 大学为经历压力的学生提供免费咨询服务。

en: She sought a counselling service to help with her career decisions.
cn: 她寻求咨询服务以帮助她的职业决策。

en: The band's devoted fans waited in line for hours to get concert tickets.
cn: 乐队的忠实粉丝排队数小时以获取音乐会门票。

en: Devoted fans of the author eagerly await each new book release.
cn: 作者的忠实粉丝热切期待每一本新书的发布。

en: If you're feeling nervous about the presentation, you're in good company—many others are too.
cn: 如果你对演示感到紧张，你并不孤单——很多人也一样。

en: As a new employee, she found herself in good company with experienced mentors.
cn: 作为新员工，她发现自己与经验丰富的导师为伍。

en: It's rude to laugh at someone when they make a mistake.
cn: 嘲笑别人犯错是不礼貌的。

en: The children laughed at the clown's funny antics.
cn: 孩子们被小丑滑稽的动作逗笑了。

en: Businesses must keep up with the times to remain competitive.
cn: 企业必须与时俱进以保持竞争力。

en: He reads tech blogs daily to keep up with the times.
cn: 他每天阅读科技博客以跟上时代。

en: I need to set the record straight about what happened yesterday.
cn: 我需要澄清昨天发生的事情。

en: She set him straight on the company's policies.
cn: 她纠正了他对公司政策的误解。

en: They decided to make a go of it and start their own restaurant.
cn: 他们决定努力尝试，开一家自己的餐厅。

en: Despite the challenges, she's determined to make a go of her new career.
cn: 尽管有挑战，她决心在新职业上取得成功。

en: Can you point out the errors in this report?
cn: 你能指出这份报告中的错误吗？

en: She pointed out that we were running late for the meeting.
cn: 她指出我们开会要迟到了。

en: Business leaders from around the world attended the conference.
cn: 来自世界各地的商业领袖参加了会议。

en: Effective business leaders inspire their teams to achieve goals.
cn: 有效的商业领袖激励团队实现目标。

en: The road is parallel to the river for several miles.
cn: 这条路与河流平行数英里。

en: His career path is parallel to that of his mentor.
cn: 他的职业道路与他的导师相似。

en: The old building went up in flames during the fire.
cn: 旧建筑在火灾中化为灰烬。

en: Their business plan went up in flames after the market crash.
cn: 他们的商业计划在市场崩溃后彻底失败。

en: Every citizen has the right to vote in democratic countries.
cn: 在民主国家，每个公民都有权投票。

en: Employees have the right to a safe working environment.
cn: 员工有权拥有安全的工作环境。

en: The team is gearing up for the big game next week.
cn: 团队正在为下周的大赛做准备。

en: We need to gear up production to meet the increased demand.
cn: 我们需要加速生产以满足增长的需求。

en: Extensive reading is key to improving vocabulary in a foreign language.
cn: 广泛阅读是提高外语词汇量的关键。

en: She credits her success to years of extensive reading on various topics.
cn: 她将自己的成功归功于多年来对各种主题的广泛阅读。

en: It took time for the new software to integrate into the existing system.
cn: 新软件需要时间融入现有系统。

en: Immigrants often work hard to integrate into the local community.
cn: 移民通常努力融入当地社区。

en: Data entry can be a tedious job that requires a lot of patience.
cn: 数据录入可能是一项需要很多耐心的乏味工作。

en: He found the repetitive tasks of the assembly line to be a tedious job.
cn: 他发现装配线的重复任务很乏味。

en: Famous sportspeople often serve as role models for young athletes.
cn: 著名运动员通常作为年轻运动员的榜样。

en: The event attracted many famous sportspeople from around the globe.
cn: 这次活动吸引了来自全球的许多著名运动员。

en: It makes no sense to drive when you can walk there in five minutes.
cn: 当你可以步行五分钟到达时，开车没有意义。

en: It makes no sense to invest in a failing business.
cn: 投资一家失败的企业没有意义。

en: The local dialect in that village has unique words not found in standard English.
cn: 那个村庄的当地方言有标准英语中没有的独特词汇。

en: She learned the local dialect to better communicate with the residents.
cn: 她学习了当地方言以便更好地与居民交流。

en: The hike was difficult due to the steep terrain, to say nothing of the bad weather.
cn: 由于陡峭的地形，这次徒步很困难，更不用说糟糕的天气了。

en: He lost his job, to say nothing of the financial stress it caused.
cn: 他失去了工作，更不用说由此造成的财务压力了。

en: If he studied hard, it stands to reason that he would pass the exam.
cn: 如果他努力学习，通过考试是合乎逻辑的。

en: Given the evidence, it stands to reason that she is the best candidate.
cn: 根据证据，她显然是最佳候选人。

en: She decided to take on part-time employment while studying at university.
cn: 她决定在大学学习期间从事兼职工作。

en: Many students take on part-time employment to gain work experience.
cn: 许多学生从事兼职工作以获得工作经验。

en: They aim to live a sustainable life by reducing waste and using renewable energy.
cn: 他们旨在通过减少浪费和使用可再生能源来过可持续的生活。

en: Living a sustainable life involves making eco-friendly choices daily.
cn: 过可持续的生活包括每天做出环保选择。

en: The rain is expected to persist for several hours.
cn: 预计雨将持续几个小时。

en: His symptoms may persist for a few days after the treatment.
cn: 治疗后他的症状可能会持续几天。

en: The old equipment was relegated to storage after the upgrade.
cn: 升级后，旧设备被降级到仓库存放。

en: He was relegated to a minor role in the project due to poor performance.
cn: 由于表现不佳，他被贬低到项目中的次要角色。

en: I share the view on the importance of environmental protection.
cn: 我对环境保护的重要性持有相同观点。

en: Many experts share the view on the need for economic reform.
cn: 许多专家对经济改革的必要性持有相同观点。

en: She only picked at her food because she wasn't hungry.
cn: 她只是挑剔地吃了一点食物，因为她不饿。

en: The child picked at his vegetables, leaving most on the plate.
cn: 孩子挑剔地吃蔬菜，大部分留在盘子里。

en: The company plans to phase in the new software over the next six months.
cn: 公司计划在未来六个月内逐步引入新软件。

en: They will phase in the policy changes to minimize disruption.
cn: 他们将逐步实施政策变更以最小化干扰。

en: The senator resigned his seat after the scandal.
cn: 丑闻后，参议员辞去了他的席位。

en: She resigned her seat on the board to pursue other opportunities.
cn: 她辞去了董事会席位以追求其他机会。

en: Some schools are criticized as exam factories for focusing solely on test scores.
cn: 一些学校因只关注考试成绩而被批评为考试工厂。

en: The education system should avoid becoming an exam factory that neglects creativity.
cn: 教育系统应避免成为忽视创造力的考试工厂。

en: By comparison with last year, sales have increased significantly.
cn: 与去年相比，销售额显著增加。

en: This model is more efficient by comparison with the older version.
cn: 与旧版本相比，这个型号更高效。

en: The assumption is implicit in the contract terms.
cn: 这个假设隐含在合同条款中。

en: Her support was implicit in her actions, though not stated outright.
cn: 她的支持隐含在她的行动中，尽管没有明确说明。

en: She is eager to start her new job next week.
cn: 她渴望下周开始新工作。

en: The children were eager to open their presents on Christmas morning.
cn: 孩子们渴望在圣诞节早上打开礼物。

en: You had better finish your homework before going out.
cn: 你最好在出门前完成作业。

en: We had better leave early to avoid traffic.
cn: 我们最好早点出发以避免交通拥堵。

en: Even if they lose, they will go down fighting with dignity.
cn: 即使输了，他们也会尊严地战斗到底。

en: He vowed to go down fighting for his principles.
cn: 他发誓要为他的原则战斗到底。

en: She is on a diet to lose weight before the wedding.
cn: 她在婚礼前节食以减肥。

en: He has been on a diet for months to improve his health.
cn: 他为了改善健康已经节食几个月了。

en: He took apart the old clock to see how it worked.
cn: 他拆开了旧钟表，想看看它是如何工作的。

en: The mechanic will take apart the engine to diagnose the problem.
cn: 机械师将拆卸发动机来诊断问题。

en: The two companies teamed up to develop a new product.
cn: 两家公司合作开发了一款新产品。

en: Let's team up to finish this project faster.
cn: 让我们组队以更快完成这个项目。

en: Students at that school receive a well-rounded education that includes arts and sciences.
cn: 那所学校的学生接受包括艺术和科学在内的全面教育。

en: She believes it's important for children to receive a well-rounded education to develop various skills.
cn: 她认为孩子们接受全面教育以发展多种技能很重要。

en: The heavy rain washed away the dirt from the streets.
cn: 大雨冲走了街道上的污垢。

en: Use soap to wash away the grease from your hands.
cn: 用肥皂洗掉手上的油脂。

en: Please throw the empty bottle in the trash can.
cn: 请把空瓶子扔进垃圾桶。

en: The trash can in the kitchen needs to be emptied.
cn: 厨房的垃圾桶需要清空。

en: She is good with children and works as a teacher.
cn: 她擅长与孩子相处，是一名教师。

en: He is good with numbers, so he excels in accounting.
cn: 他擅长数字，因此在会计方面很出色。

en: Solar and wind power are examples of renewable resources.
cn: 太阳能和风能是可再生资源的例子。

en: We should invest more in renewable resources to reduce pollution.
cn: 我们应该更多地投资于可再生资源以减少污染。

en: He is set on becoming a doctor and studies hard every day.
cn: 他决心成为一名医生，每天努力学习。

en: She was set on finishing the marathon despite the rain.
cn: 尽管下雨，她仍专注于完成马拉松。

en: She put her ideas across clearly during the presentation.
cn: 她在演示中清晰地表达了她的想法。

en: He struggled to put his feelings across to his friend.
cn: 他很难向朋友传达他的感受。

en: Let's put aside our differences and work together.
cn: 让我们搁置分歧，一起工作。

en: She puts aside some money each month for emergencies.
cn: 她每月留出一些钱以备紧急情况。

en: After missing the deadline, he is on thin ice with his boss.
cn: 错过截止日期后，他与老板的关系如履薄冰。

en: You're on thin ice if you keep breaking the rules.
cn: 如果你继续违反规则，你的处境会很危险。

en: They danced like crazy at the party last night.
cn: 昨晚他们在派对上疯狂地跳舞。

en: I've been working like crazy to meet the project deadline.
cn: 我一直在疯狂工作以赶上项目截止日期。

en: I am ready to start the meeting whenever you are.
cn: 无论你何时准备好，我都准备好开始会议了。

en: She was ready to help her friend in need.
cn: 她准备好帮助有需要的朋友。

en: The yolk can be separated from the egg white easily.
cn: 蛋黄可以很容易地从蛋白中分离出来。

en: He decided to separate from his business partner due to disagreements.
cn: 由于分歧，他决定与商业伙伴分开。

en: Each worker is an important link in the chain of production.
cn: 每个工人都是生产链条中的重要一环。

en: This step is crucial in the chain of events leading to the discovery.
cn: 这一步在导致发现的事件链条中至关重要。

en: She built up her savings over several years.
cn: 她几年来积累了储蓄。

en: Exercise helps to build up muscle strength.
cn: 锻炼有助于增强肌肉力量。

en: She was annoyed with her brother for being late.
cn: 她对弟弟迟到感到恼火。

en: He is often annoyed with coworkers who don't meet deadlines.
cn: 他经常对不按时完成工作的同事感到恼火。

en: We had to turn back because of the heavy snow.
cn: 由于大雪，我们不得不返回。

en: He turned back to get his forgotten keys.
cn: 他折回去拿他忘记的钥匙。

en: The engine seized up due to lack of oil.
cn: 发动机因缺油而卡住了。

en: My muscles seized up after the intense workout.
cn: 剧烈锻炼后，我的肌肉停止了运转。

en: She is an outstanding student who always gets top grades.
cn: 她是一名总是取得最高分的优秀学生。

en: The school awarded scholarships to outstanding students this year.
cn: 学校今年向优秀学生颁发了奖学金。

en: He got a red face when he realized his mistake in front of everyone.
cn: 当他在大家面前意识到自己的错误时，他脸红了。

en: She got a red face after being praised unexpectedly.
cn: 意外受到表扬后，她脸红了。

en: The weather delay was beyond our control, so we had to reschedule.
cn: 天气延误超出了我们的控制范围，所以我们不得不重新安排。

en: Some factors in the project are beyond my control, but I'll do my best.
cn: 项目中的一些因素超出了我的控制范围，但我会尽力而为。

en: At the amusement park, the children had the time of their lives on the roller coasters.
cn: 在游乐园里，孩子们在过山车上玩得非常开心。

en: She had the time of her life traveling through Europe last summer.
cn: 去年夏天她在欧洲旅行时度过了最快乐的时光。

en: It took her a few weeks to adjust to the new time zone after moving abroad.
cn: 搬到国外后，她花了几个星期才适应新的时区。

en: He quickly adjusted to the fast pace of city life.
cn: 他很快适应了城市生活的快节奏。

en: Scientists carry out experiments to test their hypotheses.
cn: 科学家进行实验以测试他们的假设。

en: The students will carry out experiments in the chemistry lab next week.
cn: 学生们下周将在化学实验室进行实验。

en: The employee got a tongue-lashing from the boss for missing the deadline.
cn: 这名员工因错过截止日期而受到老板的严厉斥责。

en: He got a tongue-lashing from his parents after failing his exams.
cn: 考试不及格后，他受到了父母的严厉责骂。

en: He took a bath on the stock market crash, losing most of his savings.
cn: 他在股市崩盘中遭受重大损失，失去了大部分积蓄。

en: The company took a bath on the failed product launch.
cn: 该公司在产品发布失败中遭受了重大损失。

en: He got it in the neck from his coach for missing practice.
cn: 他因缺席训练而受到教练的严厉批评。

en: The team got it in the neck after losing the important match.
cn: 输掉重要比赛后，球队受到了严厉的惩罚。

en: His old-fashioned ideas are out of step with modern society.
cn: 他过时的想法与现代社会的步调不一致。

en: The dancer was out of step with the music during the performance.
cn: 表演时，这位舞者与音乐的节奏不合拍。

en: Good team spirit is essential for winning the championship.
cn: 良好的团队精神对于赢得冠军至关重要。

en: The manager encouraged team spirit by organizing group activities.
cn: 经理通过组织团体活动来鼓励团队精神。

en: The new factory will provide job opportunities for hundreds of local residents.
cn: 新工厂将为数百名当地居民提供就业机会。

en: Government programs aim to provide job opportunities for the unemployed.
cn: 政府计划旨在为失业者提供就业机会。

en: She pored over the legal documents to find any loopholes.
cn: 她仔细阅读法律文件以寻找任何漏洞。

en: Students often pore over their textbooks before exams.
cn: 学生们经常在考试前仔细研读课本。

en: The teacher addressed the student's poor behaviour in class.
cn: 老师处理了这名学生在课堂上的不良行为。

en: Poor behaviour at work can lead to disciplinary action.
cn: 工作中的不当举止可能导致纪律处分。

en: The solution to the problem was staring us in the face, but we didn't see it.
cn: 问题的解决方案明摆着，但我们没有看到。

en: The evidence of his guilt was staring the jury in the face.
cn: 他有罪的证据对陪审团来说是显而易见的。

en: After the concert, the musicians took a bow to acknowledge the applause.
cn: 音乐会后，音乐家们鞠躬致意以感谢掌声。

en: She took a bow for her outstanding contribution to the project.
cn: 她因对项目的杰出贡献而接受赞扬。

en: The old castle bristled with hidden dangers and secret passages.
cn: 这座古老的城堡充满了隐藏的危险和秘密通道。

en: The report bristled with errors and inaccuracies.
cn: 这份报告充满了错误和不准确之处。

en: He enjoys keeping company with artists and musicians.
cn: 他喜欢与艺术家和音乐家交往。

en: She kept company with her grandmother during the holidays.
cn: 假期期间她陪伴着她的祖母。

en: The athlete made a record by running the fastest mile in history.
cn: 这位运动员创造了历史上跑得最快的一英里纪录。

en: The band plans to make a record of their new songs next month.
cn: 乐队计划下个月录制他们的新歌。

en: She had to put up with noisy neighbors for years.
cn: 她不得不忍受吵闹的邻居多年。

en: I can't put up with his constant complaining anymore.
cn: 我再也无法忍受他不断的抱怨了。

en: The company uses advanced technology to improve its manufacturing processes.
cn: 该公司使用先进技术来改进其制造流程。

en: Advanced technology has revolutionized the healthcare industry.
cn: 先进技术已经彻底改变了医疗保健行业。

en: The city is famous for its beautiful tree-lined avenues.
cn: 这座城市以其美丽的林荫大道而闻名。

en: They took a stroll down the tree-lined avenues of the historic district.
cn: 他们在历史街区的林荫大道上散步。

en: Many unique species thrive in a tropical environment.
cn: 许多独特物种在热带环境中茁壮成长。

en: The island's tropical environment attracts tourists year-round.
cn: 该岛的热带环境全年吸引游客。

en: She bought fruits like apples, bananas, oranges, and so on.
cn: 她买了苹果、香蕉、橘子等水果。

en: The store sells electronics, clothing, toys, and so on.
cn: 这家商店销售电子产品、服装、玩具等等。

en: Reducing greenhouse gas emission is crucial for combating climate change.
cn: 减少温室气体排放对于应对气候变化至关重要。

en: The report shows a significant increase in greenhouse gas emission from industrial activities.
cn: 报告显示工业活动导致的温室气体排放显著增加。

en: Vaccines help protect children against diseases.
cn: 疫苗帮助保护儿童免受疾病侵害。

en: This software is designed to protect your computer against viruses.
cn: 这款软件旨在保护你的电脑免受病毒侵害。

en: He is usually punctual, but that may not always be the case.
cn: 他通常很准时，但可能并非总是如此。

en: Success in business does not always be the case for everyone.
cn: 商业上的成功并非对每个人都是如此。

en: Despite rumors to the contrary, the company is not going bankrupt.
cn: 尽管有相反的谣言，公司并没有破产。

en: He insisted on his innocence, and no evidence to the contrary was presented.
cn: 他坚称自己无罪，也没有提出相反的证据。

en: I am not in the least interested in that topic.
cn: 我对那个话题一点也不感兴趣。

en: The noise did not bother me in the least.
cn: 噪音一点也没有打扰到我。

en: I was impressed by her dedication to the project.
cn: 我被她对项目的奉献精神打动了。

en: The audience was impressed by the performer's skills.
cn: 观众被表演者的技巧打动了。

en: The company discharged him for repeated misconduct.
cn: 公司因他屡次行为不端而解雇了他。

en: She was discharged for violating company policies.
cn: 她因违反公司政策被解雇。

en: Let's have a coffee and discuss the project.
cn: 我们喝杯咖啡讨论一下这个项目吧。

en: I usually have a coffee in the morning to start my day.
cn: 我通常早上喝杯咖啡开始一天。

en: Managers answer to the board of directors.
cn: 经理们对董事会负责。

en: You will have to answer to your actions in court.
cn: 你必须在法庭上对你的行为负责。

en: The city plans to redevelop run-down urban areas to attract new businesses.
cn: 该市计划重新开发破败的城区以吸引新企业。

en: Efforts to redevelop run-down urban areas have improved living conditions.
cn: 重新开发破败城区的努力改善了居住条件。

en: How about we go to the movies tonight?
cn: 我们今晚去看电影怎么样？

en: How about trying the new restaurant for lunch?
cn: 午餐去试试那家新餐厅怎么样？

en: He eventually came around to our point of view.
cn: 他最终改变了主意，接受了我们的观点。

en: She didn't like the idea at first, but she came around after discussing it.
cn: 她起初不喜欢这个想法，但讨论后改变了主意。

en: She bought a dozen eggs from the market.
cn: 她从市场买了一打鸡蛋。

en: We need a dozen pens for the meeting.
cn: 我们需要一打笔用于会议。

en: Linear algebra is a fundamental subject in engineering courses.
cn: 线性代数是工程课程中的基础学科。

en: Students often find linear algebra challenging but rewarding.
cn: 学生常觉得线性代数有挑战性但有益。

en: After the marathon, I need to get time to catch my breath.
cn: 马拉松后，我需要时间喘口气。

en: In this busy schedule, it's hard to get time to catch one's breath.
cn: 在这个繁忙的日程中，很难有时间喘口气。

en: A growing population puts pressure on urban infrastructure.
cn: 增长的人口给城市基础设施带来压力。

en: The city is adapting to a growing population by building more schools.
cn: 该市通过建设更多学校来适应增长的人口。

en: We arrived in time for the movie's start.
cn: 我们及时赶上了电影的开场。

en: Submit your report in time to meet the deadline.
cn: 及时提交报告以赶上截止日期。

en: I have time off next week to go on vacation.
cn: 我下周休假去度假。

en: Employees are encouraged to have time off to recharge.
cn: 鼓励员工休假以恢复精力。

en: We must take into consideration all factors before making a decision.
cn: 在做出决定前，我们必须考虑所有因素。

en: The committee will take your suggestions into consideration.
cn: 委员会会考虑你的建议。

en: I need to check up on the project's progress.
cn: 我需要检查项目的进展。

en: The doctor advised her to check up regularly for health issues.
cn: 医生建议她定期检查健康问题。

en: He will have to answer for his mistakes in the report.
cn: 他将不得不为报告中的错误负责。

en: The company must answer for the environmental damage.
cn: 公司必须为环境破坏承担责任。

en: I am used to waking up early for work.
cn: 我习惯于早起上班。

en: She is used to the cold weather after living in Canada.
cn: 在加拿大生活后，她习惯了寒冷的天气。

en: The news website provides up-to-the-minute updates on the election.
cn: 这个新闻网站提供选举的最新更新。

en: We have up-to-the-minute data on stock prices.
cn: 我们有股价的最新数据。

en: Many people are against the new policy.
cn: 许多人反对新政策。

en: She is against eating meat for ethical reasons.
cn: 出于道德原因，她反对吃肉。

en: So far as I am concerned, the plan is acceptable.
cn: 就我而言，这个计划是可以接受的。

en: So far as the budget is concerned, we need to cut costs.
cn: 关于预算，我们需要削减成本。

en: When planning the budget, take into account unexpected expenses.
cn: 规划预算时，要考虑意外开支。

en: The judge took into account the defendant's clean record.
cn: 法官考虑了被告的清白记录。

en: He presented himself at the interview with confidence.
cn: 他自信地出现在面试中。

en: You must present yourself at the office by 9 AM.
cn: 你必须在上午9点前到办公室报到。

en: The tourist sector is a major contributor to the country's economy.
cn: 旅游业是该国经济的主要贡献者。

en: Investments in the tourist sector have increased recently.
cn: 最近对旅游业的投资增加了。

en: He always takes digs at his colleagues during meetings.
cn: 他总是在会议上挖苦同事。

en: She took a dig at her friend's fashion sense.
cn: 她讽刺了朋友的时尚感。

en: He bought traveller's checks for his trip to Europe.
cn: 他为去欧洲旅行购买了旅行支票。

en: Traveller's checks are a secure way to carry money abroad.
cn: 旅行支票是携带资金出国的安全方式。

en: He sank his teeth into the new project with enthusiasm.
cn: 他热情地投入了新项目。

en: Once she sinks her teeth into a book, she can't put it down.
cn: 一旦她深入研究一本书，她就放不下了。

en: Parents should set a good example for their children.
cn: 父母应该为孩子树立好榜样。

en: Leaders need to set a good example in the workplace.
cn: 领导者需要在工作场所树立好榜样。

en: Petty crimes like shoplifting are common in urban areas.
cn: 像商店行窃这样的轻微犯罪在城市地区很常见。

en: The police focus on reducing petty crimes in the neighborhood.
cn: 警方专注于减少社区的轻微犯罪。

en: English is her mother tongue, but she also speaks French.
cn: 英语是她的母语，但她也会说法语。

en: Learning in one's mother tongue can improve understanding.
cn: 用母语学习可以提高理解力。

en: Face-to-face communication is often more effective than emails.
cn: 面对面交流通常比电子邮件更有效。

en: We prefer face-to-face communication for important discussions.
cn: 对于重要讨论，我们更喜欢面对面交流。

en: The shipbuilding industry in South Korea is one of the most advanced in the world.
cn: 韩国的造船业是世界上最先进的之一。

en: Investments in the shipbuilding industry have boosted the local economy significantly.
cn: 对造船业的投资显著提振了当地经济。

en: The origins of this tradition can be traced back to ancient times.
cn: 这个传统的起源可以追溯到古代。

en: His family lineage can be traced back to a noble ancestor.
cn: 他的家族血统可以追溯到一位贵族祖先。

en: The crowd went wild when the band started playing.
cn: 乐队开始演奏时，人群变得疯狂。

en: After hearing the news, she went wild with excitement.
cn: 听到消息后，她兴奋得失控了。

en: Let's run through the agenda before the meeting starts.
cn: 让我们在会议开始前快速浏览一下议程。

en: She ran through her notes one last time before the exam.
cn: 她在考试前最后一次快速检查了她的笔记。

en: The report provides data in relation to climate change impacts.
cn: 这份报告提供了关于气候变化影响的数据。

en: She made several points in relation to the new policy.
cn: 她就新政策提出了几点意见。

en: The government decided to bail out the failing bank to prevent economic collapse.
cn: 政府决定救助这家濒临倒闭的银行以防止经济崩溃。

en: They had to bail out the company with a large injection of funds.
cn: 他们不得不通过大量注资来救助这家公司。

en: The detective poked around the crime scene for clues.
cn: 侦探在犯罪现场四处翻找线索。

en: I like to poke around in antique shops on weekends.
cn: 我喜欢在周末去古董店四处翻找。

en: After working for three hours, she decided to take a break.
cn: 工作了三个小时后，她决定休息一下。

en: Let's take a break and have some coffee.
cn: 让我们休息一下，喝点咖啡。

en: Children wear out their shoes quickly because they play so much.
cn: 孩子们因为玩得多，鞋子很快就穿破了。

en: The old machine has worn out after years of use.
cn: 这台旧机器在使用多年后已经用坏了。

en: A cup of tea can take the edge off your stress.
cn: 一杯茶可以缓解你的压力。

en: The painkiller took the edge off his headache.
cn: 止痛药缓解了他的头痛。

en: He loves to tell a joke to lighten the mood.
cn: 他喜欢讲笑话来活跃气氛。

en: Can you tell a joke that everyone will find funny?
cn: 你能讲一个大家都会觉得好笑的笑话吗？

en: The company is on the threshold of a major breakthrough.
cn: 这家公司即将迎来重大突破。

en: She stood on the threshold of a new career.
cn: 她站在新职业生涯的开端。

en: After failing the test, he got wise and started studying regularly.
cn: 考试失败后，他明白过来并开始定期学习。

en: She got wise to their tricks and avoided being scammed.
cn: 她识破了他们的诡计，避免了被骗。

en: You should have studied harder for the exam.
cn: 你本应该为考试更努力学习的。

en: He should have apologized for his mistake.
cn: 他本应该为他的错误道歉的。

en: He got behind with his rent payments and faced eviction.
cn: 他拖欠了房租，面临被驱逐。

en: Students who get behind with their assignments often struggle to catch up.
cn: 作业落后的学生常常难以赶上。

en: Stop messing about and get to work!
cn: 别胡闹了，开始工作吧！

en: The kids were messing about in the garden instead of doing their homework.
cn: 孩子们在花园里胡闹，而不是做作业。

en: No kidding, I saw a celebrity at the mall yesterday.
cn: 说真的，我昨天在商场看到了一位名人。

en: He won the lottery? No kidding!
cn: 他中了彩票？不开玩笑！

en: The problem can be traced to a software bug.
cn: 这个问题可以追溯到一个软件漏洞。

en: Her success traces to years of hard work and dedication.
cn: 她的成功归因于多年的努力和奉献。

en: I'm stuck with this boring task because no one else wants to do it.
cn: 我不得不处理这个无聊的任务，因为没人愿意做。

en: They were stuck with a huge bill after the party.
cn: 派对后他们不得不处理一大笔账单。

en: The politicians debated over the new tax policy for hours.
cn: 政客们就新税收政策辩论了好几个小时。

en: We often debate over which movie to watch on Friday nights.
cn: 我们经常在周五晚上争论看哪部电影。

en: I left my umbrella on the train, so I checked the lost-and-found office.
cn: 我把雨伞忘在火车上了，所以去失物招领处查了一下。

en: The lost-and-found office at the airport helped me retrieve my passport.
cn: 机场的失物招领处帮我找回了护照。

en: The manager gave the new employee the once-over during the interview.
cn: 经理在面试时快速打量了新员工。

en: She gave the car the once-over before deciding to buy it.
cn: 她在决定购买前对汽车进行了粗略检查。

en: The village relies on an artesian well for its water supply.
cn: 这个村庄依靠一口自流井供水。

en: Artesian wells are common in areas with high water pressure underground.
cn: 在地下水位高的地区，自流井很常见。

en: Fifth Avenue in New York is one of the most famous shopping streets.
cn: 纽约的第五大道是最著名的购物街之一。

en: We spent the afternoon exploring the shopping streets of Tokyo.
cn: 我们花了一下午探索东京的购物街。

en: After the hike, I had a big appetite and ate two pizzas.
cn: 徒步后我胃口大开，吃了两个披萨。

en: My brother always has a big appetite at dinner.
cn: 我弟弟晚餐时总是胃口很大。

en: I love chocolate as much as she does.
cn: 我和她一样喜欢巧克力。

en: He earns as much as $100,000 a year.
cn: 他一年能赚多达10万美元。

en: I'm keen to learn how to play the guitar this summer.
cn: 今年夏天我渴望学习弹吉他。

en: She is keen to start her new job next week.
cn: 她非常想下周开始新工作。

en: It finally dawned on me that I had forgotten my keys at home.
cn: 我终于意识到我把钥匙忘在家里了。

en: The importance of the meeting dawned on him too late.
cn: 他太晚才明白这次会议的重要性。

en: Electric cars are starting to take the place of gasoline vehicles.
cn: 电动汽车开始取代汽油车。

en: She took the place of her colleague who was on sick leave.
cn: 她代替了请病假的同事。

en: Don't forget to include your return address on the envelope.
cn: 别忘了在信封上写上你的回信地址。

en: The package was undeliverable because it lacked a return address.
cn: 这个包裹无法投递，因为没有回信地址。

en: If you don't study, you're in for a tough exam.
cn: 如果你不学习，你将会面临一场艰难的考试。

en: We're in for a storm tonight, so stay indoors.
cn: 今晚我们将迎来一场风暴，所以待在室内。

en: Employees should have a say in company policies.
cn: 员工应该对公司政策有发言权。

en: As a shareholder, I have a say in the board's decisions.
cn: 作为股东，我对董事会的决定有发言权。

en: He loves to drive prestigious cars like Ferraris and Lamborghinis.
cn: 他喜欢驾驶法拉利和兰博基尼这样的豪华汽车。

en: Many celebrities drive prestigious cars to show their status.
cn: 许多名人驾驶豪华汽车来显示他们的地位。

en: We need to send out the invitations for the party by tomorrow.
cn: 我们需要在明天前发出派对的邀请函。

en: The company sends out newsletters to its customers every month.
cn: 公司每月向客户发送新闻通讯。

en: Everyone needs to do their part to keep the environment clean.
cn: 每个人都需要尽自己的一份力来保持环境清洁。

en: She did her part by volunteering at the local shelter.
cn: 她通过在本地收容所做志愿者尽了自己的责任。

en: The long hours at work are taking their toll on his health.
cn: 长时间工作对他的健康造成了损害。

en: The drought has taken its toll on the farmers' crops.
cn: 干旱对农民的庄稼造成了负面影响。

en: By and large, the project was a success despite some minor issues.
cn: 总的来说，尽管有一些小问题，这个项目是成功的。

en: By and large, people in this city are friendly and welcoming.
cn: 大体上，这个城市的人们友好且热情。

en: The singer made a comeback after a decade away from the music industry.
cn: 这位歌手在离开音乐界十年后复出了。

en: Vinyl records have made a comeback in recent years.
cn: 黑胶唱片近年来重新流行起来。

en: The new regulations will make it hot for businesses that don't comply.
cn: 新规定将使不遵守的企业处境困难。

en: He made it hot for his rival by exposing their secrets.
cn: 他通过揭露对手的秘密给他们制造了麻烦。

en: After the manager left, the company started to go to pot.
cn: 经理离开后，公司开始衰败。

en: If you don't maintain your car, it will go to pot quickly.
cn: 如果你不保养你的车，它会很快变糟。

en: We cut across the park to save time.
cn: 我们横穿公园以节省时间。

en: The new highway cuts across several neighborhoods.
cn: 新高速公路横穿几个社区。

en: This book is the same as the one I read last year.
cn: 这本书和我去年读的那本相同。

en: Her opinion is the same as mine on this matter.
cn: 在这个问题上，她的意见和我的一样。

en: The lawyer went on a fishing expedition to find evidence against the defendant.
cn: 律师进行了一次试探性调查，以寻找对被告不利的证据。

en: Don't go on a fishing expedition; ask specific questions to get clear answers.
cn: 不要进行无目标的搜寻；问具体的问题以获得明确的答案。

en: She called the error to my attention so I could fix it.
cn: 她引起我对错误的注意，以便我能修正它。

en: The report calls several issues to the public's attention.
cn: 这份报告引起了公众对几个问题的注意。

en: I'm keeping my fingers crossed for your job interview tomorrow.
cn: 我为你明天的求职面试祈求好运。

en: Keep your fingers crossed that the weather stays clear for the picnic.
cn: 祈求天气晴朗，以便野餐顺利进行。

en: The thief managed to get away before the police arrived.
cn: 小偷在警察到达前成功逃脱了。

en: We need to get away from the city for a relaxing weekend.
cn: 我们需要离开城市去度一个轻松的周末。

en: The two departments are at odds over the budget allocation.
cn: 这两个部门在预算分配上有分歧。

en: His actions are at odds with his words.
cn: 他的行动与他的言论不一致。

en: All at once, the lights went out in the building.
cn: 突然，大楼里的灯全灭了。

en: The children started talking all at once, creating chaos.
cn: 孩子们一下子都开始说话，造成了混乱。

en: Engineers do calculations to ensure the bridge is safe.
cn: 工程师进行计算以确保桥梁安全。

en: Students must do calculations accurately in math exams.
cn: 学生在数学考试中必须准确进行计算。

en: The protesters arrived in a body at the city hall.
cn: 抗议者们集体到达市政厅。

en: The team arrived in a body for the important meeting.
cn: 团队集体到达参加重要会议。

en: He always has his head in the clouds during meetings.
cn: 开会时他总是心不在焉。

en: Stop having your head in the clouds and focus on the task.
cn: 别做白日梦了，专注于任务吧。

en: Pollution can disrupt the balance of nature in an ecosystem.
cn: 污染会破坏生态系统的自然平衡。

en: Conservation efforts aim to maintain a balance of nature.
cn: 保护工作旨在维持自然平衡。

en: After finishing the project, she felt a sense of accomplishment.
cn: 完成项目后，她感到一种成就感。

en: Volunteers often feel a sense of accomplishment from helping others.
cn: 志愿者常因帮助他人而感到成就感。

en: Can you remind me of the meeting time tomorrow?
cn: 你能提醒我明天的会议时间吗？

en: This song reminds me of my childhood.
cn: 这首歌使我想起我的童年。

en: The new product was a commercial success, selling millions of units.
cn: 新产品取得了商业成功，售出了数百万件。

en: Achieving commercial success often requires good marketing.
cn: 取得商业成功通常需要良好的营销。

en: Learning cursive script can improve writing speed.
cn: 学习草书可以提高书写速度。

en: Her signature is in a beautiful cursive script.
cn: 她的签名是漂亮的草书字体。

en: We should make the most of this opportunity to learn.
cn: 我们应该充分利用这个机会来学习。

en: He makes the most of his time by planning each day carefully.
cn: 他通过仔细规划每一天来充分利用时间。

en: The company had to give him the ax due to budget cuts.
cn: 由于预算削减，公司不得不解雇他。

en: If you keep making mistakes, they might give you the ax.
cn: 如果你继续犯错，他们可能会解雇你。

en: The witness gave an account of the accident to the police.
cn: 目击者向警察描述了事故经过。

en: He gave a detailed account of his travels in Asia.
cn: 他详细叙述了他在亚洲的旅行。

en: The store is back in business after the renovation.
cn: 装修后，这家商店重新营业了。

en: She has been in business for over 20 years as an entrepreneur.
cn: 作为企业家，她已经在商业领域工作了20多年。

en: The kitchen smells of freshly baked bread.
cn: 厨房里有新鲜烤面包的气味。

en: His clothes smelled of smoke after the campfire.
cn: 篝火后，他的衣服有烟味。

en: I need to buy a new pair of shoes for the party.
cn: 我需要为派对买一双新鞋。

en: She gave me a pair of gloves to keep my hands warm.
cn: 她给了我一双手套来保暖。

en: We often go out for a meal on weekends to try new restaurants.
cn: 我们经常在周末外出就餐，尝试新餐厅。

en: Let's go out for a meal to celebrate your promotion.
cn: 让我们外出就餐庆祝你的晋升。

en: She won the competition hands down with her outstanding performance.
cn: 她以出色的表现轻而易举地赢得了比赛。

en: This is hands down the best pizza I've ever had.
cn: 这毫无疑问是我吃过的最好的披萨。

en: I like to hang out with friends at the park on sunny days.
cn: 我喜欢在阳光明媚的日子和朋友在公园闲逛。

en: We often hang out with friends after school to relax.
cn: 放学后，我们经常和朋友一起消磨时间放松。

en: She has a way with children, always calming them down easily.
cn: 她善于与孩子相处，总能轻易让他们平静下来。

en: He has a way with words, making his speeches very persuasive.
cn: 他善于言辞，使他的演讲非常有说服力。

en: He left in haste without saying goodbye.
cn: 他匆忙离开，没有道别。

en: Decisions made in haste often lead to regrets.
cn: 仓促做出的决定常常导致后悔。

en: Many small businesses go under during economic recessions.
cn: 许多小企业在经济衰退期间破产。

en: The company went under after losing its major client.
cn: 在失去主要客户后，这家公司失败了。

en: Her unique talent helps her stand out from the crowd in auditions.
cn: 她独特的才华帮助她在试镜中脱颖而出。

en: To succeed, you need to stand out from the crowd with innovative ideas.
cn: 要成功，你需要用创新的想法与众不同。

en: The government implemented a family planning policy to control population growth.
cn: 政府实施了计划生育政策来控制人口增长。

en: Many countries have revised their family planning policies over the years.
cn: 多年来，许多国家修订了他们的计划生育政策。

en: Scientists study asteroid explosions to understand cosmic events.
cn: 科学家研究小行星爆炸以理解宇宙事件。

en: An asteroid explosion in space can release immense energy.
cn: 太空中的小行星爆炸可以释放巨大的能量。

en: He amused the children by doing funny magic tricks.
cn: 他通过表演有趣的魔术逗乐了孩子们。

en: She amused her friends by telling hilarious stories.
cn: 她通过讲搞笑的故事逗乐了她的朋友们。

en: She is content with her simple life in the countryside.
cn: 她对乡村的简单生活感到满意。

en: He is content with the progress he has made so far.
cn: 他对迄今为止取得的进展感到满意。

en: She works as a teacher but also tutors students on the side.
cn: 她是一名教师，但也在业余时间辅导学生。

en: He runs a small business on the side to supplement his income.
cn: 他兼职经营一家小生意来增加收入。

en: He worked off his debt by taking extra shifts.
cn: 他通过加班来偿还债务。

en: I need to work off these calories with some exercise.
cn: 我需要通过运动来消耗这些卡路里。

en: Rome is an ancient city with a rich history.
cn: 罗马是一座历史悠久的古城。

en: Archaeologists are excavating the ruins of an ancient city in Egypt.
cn: 考古学家正在埃及挖掘一座古城的遗址。

en: At the end of the year, the company takes stock of its financial performance.
cn: 年底时，公司会评估其财务表现。

en: She took stock of her life and decided to make some changes.
cn: 她审视了自己的生活，决定做出一些改变。

en: The two recipes are much the same, with only minor differences.
cn: 这两个食谱几乎相同，只有细微差别。

en: His opinion on the matter is much the same as mine.
cn: 他对此事的看法和我几乎一样。

en: She enrolled in a Spanish course at the local college.
cn: 她在当地大学报名参加了一门西班牙语课程。

en: He plans to enroll in the university next fall.
cn: 他计划明年秋天注册入学这所大学。

en: She is an expert in computer programming.
cn: 她是计算机编程领域的专家。

en: He is considered an expert in ancient Greek history.
cn: 他被认为是古希腊历史方面的专家。

en: The thief disappeared in a flash when the police arrived.
cn: 警察到达时，小偷瞬间消失了。

en: She finished her homework in a flash and went out to play.
cn: 她立刻完成了作业，然后出去玩。

en: Travelers should avoid coming in contact with sick people.
cn: 旅行者应避免接触生病的人。

en: He came in contact with many interesting ideas during his studies.
cn: 他在学习期间接触到了许多有趣的想法。

en: The government tried to damp down public protests by imposing curfews.
cn: 政府试图通过实施宵禁来抑制公众抗议。

en: She damped down her excitement to appear calm.
cn: 她抑制住兴奋，显得很平静。

en: You can buy train tickets at the ticket office in the station.
cn: 你可以在车站的售票处购买火车票。

en: The ticket office for the concert opens at 9 AM.
cn: 音乐会的售票处上午9点开门。

en: This song reminds me of my childhood.
cn: 这首歌让我想起了我的童年。

en: The smell of fresh bread reminds him of his grandmother's kitchen.
cn: 新鲜面包的味道让他想起了祖母的厨房。

en: After years of hesitation, he finally put his hand to the plow and started his own business.
cn: 经过多年的犹豫，他终于开始认真工作，创办了自己的企业。

en: She put her hand to the plow and dedicated herself to the project.
cn: 她开始承担责任，全身心投入这个项目。

en: While hiking, they stumbled across an old abandoned cabin.
cn: 徒步时，他们偶然发现了一座废弃的小屋。

en: I stumbled across this interesting article while browsing the internet.
cn: 我在浏览互联网时偶然发现了这篇有趣的文章。

en: The project got off to a bad start due to poor planning.
cn: 由于规划不善，这个项目开局不利。

en: Their relationship got off to a bad start with a big argument.
cn: 他们的关系以一场大争吵开局不利。

en: The nurse showed compassion to the patients in the hospital.
cn: 护士对医院里的病人表现出同情。

en: He showed compassion by helping the homeless man find shelter.
cn: 他通过帮助无家可归者找到住所来表现怜悯。

en: The police accused him of stealing the car.
cn: 警察指控他偷了那辆车。

en: She accused her colleague of spreading rumors about her.
cn: 她指责她的同事散布关于她的谣言。

en: The school curriculum includes mathematics, science, and literature.
cn: 学校课程包括数学、科学和文学。

en: Parents reviewed the school curriculum to understand what their children would learn.
cn: 家长们审查了学校课程，以了解孩子们将学习什么。

en: His formal attire was appropriate to the wedding ceremony.
cn: 他的正式着装适合婚礼仪式。

en: The teacher's feedback was appropriate to the student's level of understanding.
cn: 老师的反馈适合学生的理解水平。

en: Native plants are well-adapted to the local climate and soil.
cn: 本地植物很好地适应了当地的气候和土壤。

en: The garden features only native plants to support local wildlife.
cn: 这个花园只种植本地植物，以支持当地野生动物。

en: When he heard the news, he ran like a shot to tell his friends.
cn: 当他听到这个消息时，他飞快地跑去告诉他的朋友们。

en: She accepted the job offer like a shot without hesitation.
cn: 她毫不犹豫地立即接受了这份工作邀请。

en: Many companies are getting on the bandwagon of using renewable energy.
cn: 许多公司正在跟风使用可再生能源。

en: After the movie became popular, everyone got on the bandwagon and watched it.
cn: 电影流行后，每个人都跟风去看了。

en: I am unfamiliar with the new software, so I need some training.
cn: 我对新软件不熟悉，所以需要一些培训。

en: She was unfamiliar with the city's public transportation system.
cn: 她不熟悉这座城市的公共交通系统。

en: He decided to stay out of the argument to avoid conflict.
cn: 他决定避开这场争论，以避免冲突。

en: You should stay out of trouble if you want to keep your job.
cn: 如果你想保住工作，就应该避开麻烦。

en: After the company lost its biggest client, employees saw the handwriting on the wall and started looking for new jobs.
cn: 在公司失去最大客户后，员工们看到了不祥之兆，开始寻找新工作。

en: He saw the handwriting on the wall when his investments began to fail.
cn: 当他的投资开始失败时，他预见到了灾难。

en: It's easy to make friends with people who share your interests.
cn: 与有共同兴趣的人交朋友很容易。

en: He made friends with his new neighbors soon after moving in.
cn: 他搬进来后不久就和邻居们交上了朋友。

en: The teacher made an exception for the student due to his illness.
cn: 老师因为这位学生生病而为他破例。

en: We don't usually allow pets, but we'll make an exception for your service dog.
cn: 我们通常不允许宠物，但会为你的服务犬破例。

en: She commutes to the office by train every day.
cn: 她每天乘火车通勤上班。

en: Commuting to the office during rush hour can be stressful.
cn: 在高峰时段通勤上班可能会很有压力。

en: Her novel is finally in print and available in bookstores.
cn: 她的小说终于出版了，可以在书店买到。

en: The article appeared in print in yesterday's newspaper.
cn: 这篇文章刊登在昨天的报纸上。

en: Please get to the point; we don't have much time.
cn: 请切入正题，我们时间不多。

en: After a long introduction, she finally got to the point of her presentation.
cn: 经过漫长的介绍后，她终于切入演讲的重点。

en: The false accusations did damage to his reputation.
cn: 虚假指控损害了他的声誉。

en: Her harsh words did damage to their friendship.
cn: 她尖刻的话语损害了他们的友谊。

en: The museum will exhibit artefacts from ancient Egypt next month.
cn: 博物馆下个月将展览古埃及的文物。

en: They exhibited artefacts found at the archaeological site to the public.
cn: 他们向公众展示了在考古遗址发现的文物。

en: Hundreds of thousands of people attended the concert.
cn: 数十万人参加了这场音乐会。

en: The charity raised hundreds of thousands of dollars for the cause.
cn: 该慈善机构为这项事业筹集了数十万美元。

en: A bad harvest in agriculture can lead to food shortages.
cn: 农业歉收可能导致食物短缺。

en: Farmers suffered from a bad harvest in agriculture due to drought.
cn: 由于干旱，农民们遭受了农业歉收。

en: He was beaten up by a group of bullies after school.
cn: 放学后，他被一群欺凌者殴打了。

en: The victim reported being beaten up in the alley.
cn: 受害者报告说在小巷里被殴打了。

en: He learned to drive cars when he was sixteen.
cn: 他十六岁时学会了驾驶汽车。

en: She drives cars for a living as a delivery driver.
cn: 她以驾驶汽车为生，是一名送货司机。

en: She went to bat for her colleague during the meeting to defend his proposal.
cn: 她在会议上为同事辩护，支持他的提议。

en: He always goes to bat for his friends when they're in trouble.
cn: 当朋友们遇到麻烦时，他总是支持他们。

en: Her original viewpoint on climate change sparked a lively debate.
cn: 她对气候变化的原创观点引发了一场热烈的辩论。

en: The author's original viewpoint challenged traditional theories in the field.
cn: 作者的原创观点挑战了该领域的传统理论。

en: The storm began to bear down on the coastal town.
cn: 风暴开始逼近沿海小镇。

en: The manager bore down on the team to meet the deadline.
cn: 经理向团队施加压力以赶上截止日期。

en: Students who break school rules may face detention or suspension.
cn: 违反校规的学生可能会面临留校察看或停学处分。

en: He decided to break school rules by sneaking out after curfew.
cn: 他决定违反校规，在宵禁后偷偷溜出去。

en: The witness gave the police an account of the accident.
cn: 目击者向警方描述了事故的情况。

en: She gave her boss an account of the project's progress.
cn: 她向老板报告了项目的进展。

en: He managed to catch hold of the rope before falling.
cn: 他在摔倒前设法抓住了绳子。

en: The child caught hold of her mother's hand in the crowded market.
cn: 孩子在拥挤的市场里抓住了妈妈的手。

en: I often mistake my twin brother for me in old photos.
cn: 我经常在旧照片中把我的双胞胎兄弟误认为是我。

en: She mistook the new employee for a customer and greeted him warmly.
cn: 她把新员工误认为是顾客，并热情地打招呼。

en: Students often revise for exams by reviewing their notes and textbooks.
cn: 学生通常通过复习笔记和课本来为考试做准备。

en: He spent the weekend revising for his upcoming math exam.
cn: 他花了整个周末为他即将到来的数学考试复习。

en: She is enthusiastic about learning new languages.
cn: 她对学习新语言充满热情。

en: The team is enthusiastic about the upcoming project.
cn: 团队对即将到来的项目充满热情。

en: After his near-death experience, he got religion and started attending church regularly.
cn: 在经历了一次濒死体验后，他变得虔诚，并开始定期去教堂。

en: She got religion later in life and found comfort in her faith.
cn: 她在晚年变得信教，并在信仰中找到了安慰。

en: I need to speak to my manager about the schedule change.
cn: 我需要和我的经理谈谈日程变更的事。

en: She spoke to the audience about her experiences.
cn: 她向听众讲述了她的经历。

en: The protest was a reaction against the government's new policies.
cn: 这次抗议是对政府新政策的反抗。

en: Her art is a reaction against traditional styles.
cn: 她的艺术是对传统风格的反抗。

en: I'll look in at the store on my way home to buy some milk.
cn: 我会在回家的路上顺便去商店买些牛奶。

en: He looked in at the meeting to see how things were going.
cn: 他短暂查看了会议，看看情况如何。

en: It's important to stay active as you age to maintain good health.
cn: 随着年龄增长，保持活跃对维持健康很重要。

en: She stays active by jogging every morning.
cn: 她通过每天早上去慢跑来保持活跃。

en: The city is known for its rich cultural diversity.
cn: 这座城市以其丰富的文化多样性而闻名。

en: Promoting cultural diversity in the workplace is important for innovation.
cn: 在工作场所促进文化多样性对创新很重要。

en: The manager is responsible to the board of directors.
cn: 经理对董事会负责。

en: Employees are responsible to their supervisors for completing tasks.
cn: 员工对完成任务向他们的主管负责。

en: The tradition is rooted in ancient customs.
cn: 这个传统起源于古老的习俗。

en: Her fear of heights is rooted in a childhood accident.
cn: 她对高度的恐惧源于童年的一次事故。

en: We'll need to review the project at some stage next week.
cn: 我们下周需要在某个阶段审查这个项目。

en: At some stage, everyone faces challenges in their career.
cn: 在某个时候，每个人都会在职业生涯中面临挑战。

en: In the wake of the storm, many homes were damaged.
cn: 风暴过后，许多房屋受损。

en: New policies were introduced in the wake of the economic crisis.
cn: 经济危机之后，出台了新政策。

en: At present, the company is focusing on expanding its market share.
cn: 目前，公司正专注于扩大市场份额。

en: The situation is stable at present, but we must remain cautious.
cn: 目前情况稳定，但我们必须保持谨慎。

en: I usually go to bed at 10 PM to get enough rest.
cn: 我通常晚上10点上床睡觉，以确保有足够的休息。

en: Children should go to bed early to support their growth.
cn: 孩子们应该早睡以促进生长发育。

en: He told his enemy to go to hell during the argument.
cn: 在争论中，他告诉他的敌人下地狱去。

en: She muttered 'go to hell' under her breath after the insult.
cn: 在被侮辱后，她低声嘟囔着'下地狱去'。

en: The noise was so loud as to wake up the entire neighborhood.
cn: 噪音如此之大，以至于吵醒了整个社区。

en: She worked so hard as to complete the project ahead of schedule.
cn: 她工作如此努力，以至于提前完成了项目。

en: Car exhaust fumes contribute significantly to air pollution in cities.
cn: 汽车尾气是城市空气污染的主要来源之一。

en: The smell of car exhaust fumes is strong near busy highways.
cn: 在繁忙的高速公路附近，汽车尾气的味道很浓。

en: The advertisement plays up the benefits of the new product.
cn: 这则广告夸大了新产品的优点。

en: He tends to play up his achievements in job interviews.
cn: 在求职面试中，他倾向于强调自己的成就。

en: The company decided to split off its technology division into a separate entity.
cn: 公司决定将其技术部门分离出来，成立一个独立的实体。

en: A group of members split off from the main party to form a new one.
cn: 一群成员从主要政党中分裂出来，组建了一个新政党。

en: Regular exercise goes a long way toward improving overall health.
cn: 定期锻炼对改善整体健康有很大帮助。

en: This donation will go a long way toward funding the research project.
cn: 这笔捐款将大大促进研究项目的资金筹集。

en: After the breakup, it took her time to move on and start dating again.
cn: 分手后，她花了一段时间才继续前进并开始新的约会。

en: We need to move on from this issue and focus on the next project.
cn: 我们需要放下这个问题，专注于下一个项目。

en: She got a lump in her throat when she heard the touching story.
cn: 听到这个感人的故事时，她哽咽了。

en: Watching the graduation ceremony, many parents got a lump in their throat.
cn: 观看毕业典礼时，许多父母因情绪激动而喉咙发紧。

en: Can you put in a good word for me with the hiring manager?
cn: 你能在招聘经理面前为我说句好话吗？

en: She put in a good word for her colleague, helping him get the promotion.
cn: 她为同事说好话，帮助他获得了晋升。

en: The police are determined to hunt down the escaped criminal.
cn: 警方决心追捕逃犯。

en: I had to hunt down that rare book in several libraries.
cn: 我不得不在几个图书馆里搜寻那本稀有书籍。

en: The school puts emphasis on developing students' critical thinking skills.
cn: 学校重视培养学生的批判性思维能力。

en: In his speech, the CEO put emphasis on innovation and teamwork.
cn: 在演讲中，CEO强调了创新和团队合作。

en: After getting the new job, she is much better off financially.
cn: 得到新工作后，她的经济状况好多了。

en: We'd be better off investing in stocks rather than keeping cash.
cn: 投资股票比持有现金会使我们的境况更好。

en: The teacher called down the student for being late again.
cn: 老师严厉批评了再次迟到的学生。

en: He was called down by his boss for missing the deadline.
cn: 他因错过截止日期而被老板斥责。

en: It's important to keep track of your expenses to manage your budget.
cn: 跟踪你的支出对管理预算很重要。

en: The software helps you keep track of all your appointments.
cn: 这个软件帮助你记录所有的约会。

en: Strict financial regulation is necessary to prevent economic crises.
cn: 严格的金融监管对于防止经济危机是必要的。

en: The government introduced new financial regulations to protect consumers.
cn: 政府出台了新的金融监管规定以保护消费者。

en: It's essential to get along well with others in a team environment.
cn: 在团队环境中，与他人相处融洽至关重要。

en: She gets along well with others because she is friendly and respectful.
cn: 她与他人相处融洽，因为她友好且尊重他人。

en: She is a lawyer by profession, but she also writes novels in her spare time.
cn: 她职业上是律师，但业余时间也写小说。

en: By profession, he is an engineer, but his passion lies in music.
cn: 以职业而论，他是工程师，但他的热情在于音乐。

en: Without proper management, the project will go to hell in a handbasket.
cn: 没有适当的管理，这个项目会迅速恶化。

en: After the scandal, his reputation went to hell in a handbasket.
cn: 丑闻之后，他的声誉一败涂地。

en: Education helps children develop qualities like patience and resilience.
cn: 教育帮助孩子培养耐心和韧性等品质。

en: He worked hard to develop qualities of leadership in his team.
cn: 他努力在团队中培养领导力品质。

en: They worked together to develop a strong relationship based on trust.
cn: 他们共同努力，建立了基于信任的牢固关系。

en: It takes time to develop a strong relationship with new colleagues.
cn: 与新同事建立牢固的关系需要时间。

en: They currently reside in a small town in the countryside.
cn: 他们目前居住在一个乡村小镇。

en: Many artists reside in this vibrant neighborhood.
cn: 许多艺术家居住在这个充满活力的社区。

en: He received a prison sentence of five years for the crime.
cn: 他因犯罪被判处五年监禁。

en: The judge imposed a harsh prison sentence on the offender.
cn: 法官对罪犯判处了严厉的刑期。

en: Please make a note of the meeting time in your calendar.
cn: 请在日历中记录会议时间。

en: I'll make a note of your suggestions for future reference.
cn: 我会记录你的建议以供将来参考。

en: In contrast with last year, sales have increased significantly.
cn: 与去年相比，销售额显著增长。

en: Her optimistic attitude is in stark contrast with his pessimism.
cn: 她乐观的态度与他的悲观形成鲜明对比。

en: As if on cue, the rain started just as we left the house.
cn: 恰好在此时，我们一离开房子就开始下雨了。

en: He arrived on cue for the meeting, not a minute late.
cn: 他准时到达会议，一分钟都没迟到。

en: Please summarize the report in bullet points for the presentation.
cn: 请用要点总结报告以供演示。

en: Each bullet point in the list highlights a key feature of the product.
cn: 列表中的每个项目符号都突出了产品的一个关键特性。

en: After the long hike, we were ready to put on the feedbag.
cn: 长途徒步后，我们准备大吃一顿。

en: It's time to put on the feedbag and enjoy this delicious meal.
cn: 是时候开始吃饭，享受这顿美餐了。

en: The tutor works with students on a one-to-one basis to address their specific needs.
cn: 导师一对一地与学生合作，解决他们的特定需求。

en: Managers often provide feedback on a one-to-one basis during performance reviews.
cn: 经理通常在绩效评估中一对一地提供反馈。

en: The city has a population of over two million people.
cn: 这个城市拥有超过两百万人口。

en: This small island has a population of only a few hundred.
cn: 这个小岛只有几百人口。

en: Her dedication to work is second to none in the company.
cn: 她对工作的奉献精神在公司里是首屈一指的。

en: The quality of their customer service is second to none.
cn: 他们的客户服务质量是无与伦比的。

en: My grandmother swears by this herbal remedy for colds.
cn: 我祖母极其信赖这种治疗感冒的草药疗法。

en: He swears by this brand of tools for all his DIY projects.
cn: 他发誓这个品牌的工具对他所有的DIY项目都有效。

en: She burst out laughing at the funny joke.
cn: 听到这个有趣的笑话，她突然大笑起来。

en: He burst out crying when he heard the sad news.
cn: 听到这个悲伤的消息，他突然哭了起来。

en: Shakespeare often compares life to a stage in his plays.
cn: 莎士比亚经常在他的戏剧中将人生比作舞台。

en: She compared his smile to a ray of sunshine.
cn: 她将他的微笑比作一缕阳光。

en: His lawyer managed to get him off the hook with a clever defense.
cn: 他的律师通过巧妙的辩护使他摆脱了困境。

en: She offered to take the blame to get her friend off the hook.
cn: 她主动承担责备，以使她的朋友摆脱责任。

en: No matter which book you choose, I'm sure you'll enjoy it.
cn: 无论你选哪本书，我相信你都会喜欢的。

en: No matter which path we take, we'll reach the destination.
cn: 无论我们走哪条路，都会到达目的地。

en: New cafes seem to spring up every week in this neighborhood.
cn: 这个街区每周似乎都有新咖啡馆涌现。

en: Wildflowers spring up in the meadow after the rain.
cn: 雨后，野花在草地上突然出现。

en: She summoned up the courage to speak in front of the crowd.
cn: 她鼓起勇气在人群面前发言。

en: He had to summon up all his energy to finish the marathon.
cn: 他必须鼓起所有力气来完成马拉松。

en: Math and science are considered core subjects in many schools.
cn: 在许多学校，数学和科学被视为核心科目。

en: Students must pass all core subjects to graduate.
cn: 学生必须通过所有核心科目才能毕业。

en: He's frugal; in other words, he doesn't spend much money.
cn: 他很节俭；换句话说，他不怎么花钱。

en: The project is delayed, in other words, we need more time.
cn: 项目延期了，也就是说，我们需要更多时间。

en: The club had to turn away many people because it was full.
cn: 俱乐部不得不拒绝许多人进入，因为已经满了。

en: They turned away latecomers at the door of the theater.
cn: 他们在剧院门口拒绝了迟到者进入。

en: He cried out in pain when he stubbed his toe.
cn: 他踢到脚趾时痛得大声喊叫。

en: The child cried out for help when lost in the mall.
cn: 孩子在商场迷路时大声呼救。
