en: Members of the community volunteered to clean the park.
cn: 社区成员自愿清理公园。

en: The event is open to all members of the community.
cn: 这个活动对所有社区成员开放。

en: The store will give a discount to loyal customers.
cn: 这家店会给忠实顾客折扣。

en: Can you give a discount if I buy in bulk?
cn: 如果我批量购买，你能给个折扣吗？

en: The two countries have been at war for years.
cn: 这两个国家已经处于战争状态多年。

en: During the time they were at war, trade between them ceased.
cn: 在他们处于战争状态期间，贸易停止了。

en: We passed through several small towns on our road trip.
cn: 我们在公路旅行中穿过了几个小镇。

en: The train passes through a tunnel before reaching the station.
cn: 火车在到达车站前穿过一条隧道。

en: He looked me in the eye and told me the truth.
cn: 他直视着我，告诉我真相。

en: If you can look someone in the eye, it shows you're confident.
cn: 如果你能直视某人，这表明你很自信。

en: The acronym NASA stands for National Aeronautics and Space Administration.
cn: 缩写NASA代表国家航空航天局。

en: This flag stands for freedom and democracy.
cn: 这面旗帜象征自由和民主。

en: She is unwilling to compromise on her principles.
cn: 她不愿意在原则问题上妥协。

en: He was unwilling to admit his mistake.
cn: 他不愿意承认自己的错误。

en: The police held back the crowd from entering the building.
cn: 警察阻止人群进入大楼。

en: She tried to hold back her tears during the sad movie.
cn: 在看悲伤电影时，她试图抑制眼泪。

en: If you hold up your end of the bargain, I'll pay you as agreed.
cn: 如果你履行自己的承诺，我会按约定付钱给你。

en: She always holds up her end of the bargain in team projects.
cn: 在团队项目中，她总是履行自己的责任。

en: They took out a mortgage to buy their first home.
cn: 他们申请了抵押贷款来购买第一套房子。

en: Paying off the mortgage early can save a lot in interest.
cn: 提前还清抵押贷款可以节省很多利息。

en: Trying to convince him is a waste of your breath; he never listens.
cn: 试图说服他是白费口舌；他从不听。

en: Don't waste your breath arguing with someone so stubborn.
cn: 不要白费口舌和这么固执的人争论。

en: She decided to go in for the marathon this year.
cn: 她决定今年参加马拉松比赛。

en: Many students go in for the scholarship exam.
cn: 许多学生参加奖学金考试。

en: He wrote a poem in the same vein as his earlier works.
cn: 他以与早期作品类似的方式写了一首诗。

en: In the same vein, we should consider alternative solutions.
cn: 类似地，我们应该考虑替代解决方案。

en: It took hours to put together the furniture from the flat-pack.
cn: 花了几个小时才把平板包装的家具组装起来。

en: She put together a presentation for the client meeting.
cn: 她为客户会议组合了一份演示文稿。

en: Employees must travel to the central office for the quarterly meeting.
cn: 员工必须前往中心办公室参加季度会议。

en: She travels to the central office every Monday to submit reports.
cn: 她每周一前往中心办公室提交报告。

en: We need to finish the report by the end of the week.
cn: 我们需要在本周末之前完成报告。

en: By the end of the year, she hopes to have saved enough money.
cn: 到年底之前，她希望存够钱。

en: Can you keep an eye on the baby while I make dinner?
cn: 我做晚饭时，你能留意一下宝宝吗？

en: Keep an eye on the stock prices for any sudden changes.
cn: 留意股价的任何突然变化。

en: Proper waste disposal is essential for environmental protection.
cn: 适当的废物处理对环境保护至关重要。

en: The city improved its waste disposal systems last year.
cn: 该市去年改进了其废物处理系统。

en: Don't bargain on him arriving on time; he's often late.
cn: 别指望他准时到达；他经常迟到。

en: We bargained on good weather for the outdoor event.
cn: 我们指望户外活动有好天气。

en: It is important to maintain historic buildings to preserve cultural heritage.
cn: 维护历史建筑以保护文化遗产很重要。

en: The government funds projects to maintain historic buildings in the city.
cn: 政府资助项目来维护城市中的历史建筑。

en: The store sells all manner of electronic gadgets.
cn: 这家商店出售各种各样的电子小玩意。

en: All manner of people attended the festival, from children to seniors.
cn: 从儿童到老年人，各种各样的人都参加了这个节日。

en: The other cars boxed in our vehicle, so we couldn't move.
cn: 其他汽车把我们的车困住了，所以我们无法移动。

en: She felt boxed in by the strict rules at work.
cn: 她感到被工作中的严格规则所困。

en: Many residents are opposed to the new construction project.
cn: 许多居民反对新的建设项目。

en: She is opposed to any changes in the company policy.
cn: 她反对公司政策的任何改变。

en: They decided to move out of the apartment and buy a house.
cn: 他们决定搬出公寓，买一栋房子。

en: She will move out next month when her lease ends.
cn: 下个月租约到期时，她会搬出去。

en: Take your time with the exam; there's no rush.
cn: 考试慢慢来，不用着急。

en: She took her time to carefully choose the perfect gift.
cn: 她慢慢来，仔细挑选完美的礼物。

en: After lunch, he likes to take forty winks to recharge.
cn: 午饭后，他喜欢小睡一会儿来恢复精力。

en: I took forty winks on the couch and felt much better.
cn: 我在沙发上小睡了一会儿，感觉好多了。

en: When planning the budget, we must take into account inflation rates.
cn: 规划预算时，我们必须考虑通货膨胀率。

en: The judge took into account the defendant's clean record.
cn: 法官考虑了被告的清白记录。

en: If you have any questions, fire away.
cn: 如果你有任何问题，尽管问吧。

en: The commander ordered the troops to fire away at the enemy.
cn: 指挥官命令部队向敌人开火。

en: Before selling the computer, make sure to erase all personal data.
cn: 在出售电脑前，确保删除所有个人数据。

en: The software can erase data permanently to prevent recovery.
cn: 该软件可以永久删除数据以防止恢复。

en: Hard work is part and parcel of achieving success.
cn: 努力工作是取得成功不可或缺的一部分。

en: Dealing with customer complaints is part and parcel of the job.
cn: 处理客户投诉是这项工作不可或缺的一部分。

en: Don't be too hard on yourself for making a mistake.
cn: 不要因为犯了一个错误就对自己太苛刻。

en: The new policy is hard on small businesses.
cn: 新政策对小企业很严厉。

en: The car sped away and was soon out of sight.
cn: 汽车疾驰而去，很快就看不见了。

en: That concert was out of sight!
cn: 那场音乐会太棒了！

en: Every defendant has the right to a fair trial.
cn: 每个被告都有权获得公正审判。

en: The judge ensured a fair trial by allowing both sides to present evidence.
cn: 法官通过允许双方出示证据来确保公正审判。

en: She plans to study at university to become a doctor.
cn: 她计划在大学学习以成为一名医生。

en: Many students study at university to gain specialized knowledge.
cn: 许多学生在大学学习以获得专业知识。

en: The access to Internet services is essential for modern education.
cn: 互联网服务的接入对现代教育至关重要。

en: They improved the access to Internet services in rural areas.
cn: 他们改善了农村地区的互联网服务接入。

en: We must take all factors into consideration before deciding.
cn: 在决定之前，我们必须考虑所有因素。

en: The design takes user feedback into consideration.
cn: 设计考虑了用户反馈。

en: As you get along in years, health becomes more important.
cn: 随着年纪渐长，健康变得更加重要。

en: My grandparents are getting along in years but still active.
cn: 我的祖父母年纪渐长，但仍然活跃。

en: Airports use metal detectors for security checks.
cn: 机场使用金属探测器进行安全检查。

en: He found an old coin with his metal detector.
cn: 他用金属探测器找到了一枚旧硬币。

en: He stopped short of accusing her directly.
cn: 他差点直接指责她，但没这么做。

en: The car stopped short of hitting the pedestrian.
cn: 汽车在撞到行人前停了下来。

en: The average life span of a cat is around 15 years.
cn: 猫的平均寿命大约是15年。

en: Advances in medicine have increased the human life span.
cn: 医学进步延长了人类的寿命。

en: New employees need time to adapt to the workplace.
cn: 新员工需要时间来适应工作环境。

en: She quickly adapted to the workplace culture.
cn: 她很快适应了工作场所的文化。

en: They often poke fun at each other's quirks.
cn: 他们经常取笑彼此的怪癖。

en: It's not nice to poke fun at someone's mistakes.
cn: 取笑别人的错误是不好的。

en: The fog began to roll in from the sea.
cn: 雾开始从海上滚滚而来。

en: The guests started to roll in for the party.
cn: 客人们开始陆续到达参加派对。

en: You should think twice before making such a big decision.
cn: 在做如此重大的决定之前，你应该三思。

en: I thought twice about accepting the job offer.
cn: 我三思后才接受了那份工作邀请。

en: She moved out and is living on her own now.
cn: 她搬出去了，现在独自生活。

en: He solved the problem on his own.
cn: 他独立解决了这个问题。

en: The new manager turned around the failing company.
cn: 新经理扭转了这家濒临倒闭的公司。

en: We need to turn around this project quickly.
cn: 我们需要迅速扭转这个项目的局面。

en: She always acts according to her moral principles.
cn: 她总是按照自己的道德原则行事。

en: The company's policies are based on strong moral principles.
cn: 公司的政策基于坚实的道德原则。

en: The facility incinerates waste to generate energy.
cn: 该设施焚烧废物以产生能源。

en: It's better to recycle than to incinerate waste.
cn: 回收比焚烧废物更好。

en: The boss put the heat on us to finish the report by Friday.
cn: 老板给我们施加压力，要求我们在周五前完成报告。

en: The media put the heat on the politician to resign.
cn: 媒体对那位政治家施加压力，要求他辞职。

en: It's important to get your message across clearly.
cn: 清晰地传达你的信息很重要。

en: He struggled to get his ideas across to the audience.
cn: 他努力让观众理解他的想法。

en: After recovering from the flu, she is now in good health.
cn: 流感康复后，她现在身体健康。

en: Regular exercise helps you to be in good health.
cn: 定期锻炼有助于保持身体健康。

en: This book is not so interesting as the one I read last week.
cn: 这本书不如我上周读的那本有趣。

en: He is not so tall as his brother.
cn: 他不如他哥哥高。

en: The museum displays a variety of artistic works from different periods.
cn: 博物馆展示了不同时期的多种艺术作品。

en: She creates artistic works using recycled materials.
cn: 她用回收材料创作艺术作品。

en: Prices range from $10 to $100.
cn: 价格从10美元到100美元不等。

en: The topics range from science to art.
cn: 主题范围从科学到艺术。

en: To her delight, she passed the exam with flying colors.
cn: 令她高兴的是，她以优异成绩通过了考试。

en: To everyone's delight, the sun came out after days of rain.
cn: 令大家高兴的是，下了几天雨后太阳出来了。

en: I racked my brains trying to remember her name.
cn: 我绞尽脑汁想记起她的名字。

en: He racked his brains for a solution to the problem.
cn: 他苦思冥想寻找问题的解决方案。

en: The company has a strict code of practice for ethical behavior.
cn: 公司有严格的行为准则来规范道德行为。

en: Doctors must adhere to the medical code of practice.
cn: 医生必须遵守医疗实践规范。

en: Children in that orphanage were exposed to abuse.
cn: 那家孤儿院的孩子们遭受了虐待。

en: Workers in some industries are exposed to verbal abuse from customers.
cn: 某些行业的工人会遭受顾客的言语虐待。

en: We should get together for coffee sometime.
cn: 我们应该找个时间聚聚喝咖啡。

en: The family gets together every Christmas.
cn: 这家人每年圣诞节都会聚在一起。

en: After his explanation, I finally got the picture.
cn: 经过他的解释，我终于明白了。

en: She nodded to show she got the picture.
cn: 她点头表示她理解了情况。

en: Teachers use interactive activities to keep students interested.
cn: 老师使用互动活动来保持学生的兴趣。

en: It's important to vary the lessons to keep students interested.
cn: 多样化课程以保持学生的兴趣很重要。

en: Everyone should do their bit to protect the environment.
cn: 每个人都应该尽自己的一份力来保护环境。

en: He did his bit by volunteering at the local shelter.
cn: 他在当地收容所做志愿者，尽了自己的一份力。

en: She derives pleasure from reading classic novels.
cn: 她从阅读经典小说中获得乐趣。

en: Many people derive pleasure from helping others.
cn: 许多人从帮助他人中获得乐趣。

en: The family was at table when the guests arrived.
cn: 客人到达时，这家人正在用餐。

en: Please wait until everyone is at table before starting to eat.
cn: 请等到所有人都就座后再开始用餐。

en: Let's put aside our differences and work together.
cn: 让我们搁置分歧，一起工作。

en: She put aside her book to answer the phone.
cn: 她把书放在一边去接电话。

en: It is not the cost but the quality that matters.
cn: 重要的不是成本，而是质量。

en: She is not angry but disappointed.
cn: 她不是生气，而是失望。

en: The final decision rests with the committee.
cn: 最终决定权在委员会。

en: The responsibility for this project rests with the manager.
cn: 这个项目的责任在于经理。

en: The company prefers to do a face-to-face interview before hiring.
cn: 公司在雇佣前倾向于进行面对面面试。

en: She will do a face-to-face interview with the candidate tomorrow.
cn: 她明天将与候选人进行面对面面试。

en: This area is liable to flooding during heavy rains.
cn: 这个地区在大雨期间容易发生洪水。

en: He is liable to forget appointments if not reminded.
cn: 如果不提醒，他容易忘记约会。

en: The room was painted in subdued colors to create a calm atmosphere.
cn: 房间涂上了柔和的颜色以营造平静的氛围。

en: She prefers subdued colors like beige and gray for her wardrobe.
cn: 她喜欢米色和灰色等柔和的颜色作为衣橱色调。

en: The police officer helped regulate the traffic during the parade.
cn: 警察在游行期间帮助管理交通。

en: New signals were installed to better regulate the traffic at the intersection.
cn: 安装了新信号灯以更好地调节十字路口的交通。

en: Some employees are resistant to change when new technology is introduced.
cn: 引入新技术时，一些员工抗拒改变。

en: The community was resistant to change in the local zoning laws.
cn: 社区抵制当地分区法的改变。

en: He's new around here, so please show him the way.
cn: 他是新来的，请给他指路。

en: Are you new around here? I haven't seen you before.
cn: 你是新来的吗？我以前没见过你。

en: The old documents will be scanned into digital files for archiving.
cn: 旧文件将被扫描成数字文件以便存档。

en: Photos from the album were scanned into digital files to preserve them.
cn: 相册中的照片被扫描成数字文件以保存。

en: Students who break rules may face disciplinary action.
cn: 违反规则的学生可能面临纪律处分。

en: He tends to break rules to achieve his goals.
cn: 他倾向于打破规矩以实现目标。

en: Parents should set an example for their children by being honest.
cn: 父母应通过诚实为孩子树立榜样。

en: The manager set an example by arriving early every day.
cn: 经理通过每天早到树立了榜样。

en: He acted as if he knew everything.
cn: 他表现得好像什么都知道。

en: It looks as if it might rain soon.
cn: 看起来好像很快要下雨了。

en: Astronauts travel in outer space to conduct experiments.
cn: 宇航员在外太空旅行以进行实验。

en: Someday, tourists might travel in outer space for leisure.
cn: 有一天，游客可能为了休闲而在外太空旅行。

en: In light of recent events, the meeting has been postponed.
cn: 鉴于最近的事件，会议已被推迟。

en: The policy was revised in light of public feedback.
cn: 考虑到公众反馈，政策被修订了。

en: The class formed a discussion group to debate the topic.
cn: 班级成立了一个讨论小组来辩论这个话题。

en: She joined a discussion group to improve her communication skills.
cn: 她加入了一个讨论小组以提高沟通技巧。

en: It took me a while to get used to waking up early.
cn: 我花了一段时间才习惯早起。

en: She quickly got used to doing her homework after school.
cn: 她很快习惯了放学后做作业。

en: In ancient times, people used simple tools for farming.
cn: 在古代，人们使用简单的工具进行农耕。

en: Many myths originate from ancient times.
cn: 许多神话起源于远古时期。

en: He seems distracted because he has something on his mind.
cn: 他看起来心不在焉，因为他心里有事。

en: She always has her family on her mind when she's away.
cn: 她在外时总是惦记着家人。

en: The school's course arrangement allows for flexible scheduling.
cn: 学校的课程安排允许灵活的时间安排。

en: Students should check the course arrangement before registering.
cn: 学生在注册前应检查课程安排。

en: The bright colors attracted the child's attention.
cn: 鲜艳的颜色吸引了孩子的注意力。

en: He raised his voice to attract the audience's attention.
cn: 他提高声音以吸引观众的注意力。

en: He told the joke with a straight face, making it funnier.
cn: 他板着脸讲笑话，让它更有趣。

en: She managed to have a straight face during the serious discussion.
cn: 在严肃的讨论中，她设法保持表情严肃。

en: The moment that she arrived, the party started.
cn: 她一到，派对就开始了。

en: I knew the truth the moment that I saw his face.
cn: 我一看到他的脸就知道了真相。

en: After the check-up, the doctor gave him a clean bill of health.
cn: 检查后，医生给了他一份健康证明。

en: The company got a clean bill of health from the auditors.
cn: 公司从审计师那里获得了无问题的报告。

en: Students need to earn 120 credit points to graduate.
cn: 学生需要获得120个学分才能毕业。

en: This course is worth three credit points.
cn: 这门课程值三个学分。

en: Setting clear goals can improve motivation.
cn: 设定明确的目标可以提高动力。

en: The manager tried to improve motivation among the team.
cn: 经理试图提高团队的积极性。

en: Many factories require employees to do shift work.
cn: 许多工厂要求员工进行轮班工作。

en: Shift work can disrupt sleep patterns.
cn: 轮班工作可能会打乱睡眠模式。

en: Winning the competition boosted her confidence.
cn: 赢得比赛增强了她的信心。

en: Positive feedback can boost a student's confidence.
cn: 积极的反馈可以增强学生的信心。

en: The actor brought the character to life on stage.
cn: 演员在舞台上使角色栩栩如生。

en: The new technology brings old photos to life.
cn: 新技术让旧照片活了起来。

en: I can't quite put my finger on what's wrong with this plan.
cn: 我无法准确指出这个计划有什么问题。

en: She put her finger on the exact reason for the delay.
cn: 她准确指出了延误的确切原因。

en: I made a bank transfer to pay the bill.
cn: 我通过银行转账支付了账单。

en: Bank transfers are a secure way to send money.
cn: 银行转账是一种安全的汇款方式。

en: Please quote this line in your report.
cn: 请在报告中引用这句话。

en: He quoted this line from the poem during his speech.
cn: 他在演讲中引用了这首诗的这句话。

en: The market sells fresh produce from local farms.
cn: 市场销售来自当地农场的新鲜农产品。

en: Eating fresh produce is good for your health.
cn: 食用新鲜农产品对健康有益。

en: We need to improve on last year's sales figures.
cn: 我们需要改进去年的销售数据。

en: The new model improves on the previous version.
cn: 新模型改进了之前的版本。

en: It took me a while to get used to the new job.
cn: 我花了一段时间才习惯新工作。

en: You'll get used to the cold weather soon.
cn: 你很快就会习惯寒冷的天气。

en: Technology plays a significant role in modern education.
cn: 技术在现代教育中扮演重要角色。

en: She played a significant role in the project's success.
cn: 她在项目的成功中扮演了重要角色。

en: I congratulated her upon her promotion.
cn: 我为她的晋升祝贺了她。

en: They congratulated him upon winning the award.
cn: 他们为他获奖表示祝贺。

en: Her life experience taught her to be resilient.
cn: 她的人生经历教会了她坚韧不拔。

en: Traveling abroad adds valuable life experience.
cn: 出国旅行增加了宝贵的生活经验。

en: Could you put me through to the manager?
cn: 你能帮我接通经理的电话吗？

en: The training program put him through rigorous exercises.
cn: 培训计划让他经历了严格的训练。

en: He takes a positive view of the changes.
cn: 他对这些变化持积极观点。

en: They take a cautious view of the economic outlook.
cn: 他们对经济前景持谨慎观点。

en: He finally made his peace with his past mistakes.
cn: 他终于与过去的错误和解了。

en: She made her peace with the decision to move away.
cn: 她接受了搬离的决定。

en: The hi-tech industry is booming in Silicon Valley.
cn: 硅谷的高科技产业正在蓬勃发展。

en: Investing in the hi-tech industry can be very profitable.
cn: 投资高科技产业可能非常有利可图。

en: She set ambitious goals for her career.
cn: 她为职业生涯设定了雄心勃勃的目标。

en: The company has ambitious goals for expansion.
cn: 公司有雄心勃勃的扩张目标。

en: He took the engine apart to fix the problem.
cn: 他拆开发动机来修理问题。

en: The kids took the toy apart to see how it works.
cn: 孩子们拆开玩具看它是如何工作的。

en: Please set the table for dinner.
cn: 请摆好餐具准备晚餐。

en: She set the table with plates and silverware.
cn: 她用盘子和银器摆好了餐桌。

en: She will star in the new movie.
cn: 她将主演这部新电影。

en: He starred in a popular TV series last year.
cn: 他去年主演了一部受欢迎的电视剧。

en: Whether you come early or late makes no difference to me.
cn: 你早来晚来对我来说没有影响。

en: The color of the car makes no difference in its performance.
cn: 汽车的颜色对其性能无关紧要。

en: In principle, I agree with your proposal.
cn: 原则上，我同意你的提议。

en: The plan is sound in principle, but needs more details.
cn: 这个计划大体上是合理的，但需要更多细节。

en: In the interest of safety, please wear a helmet.
cn: 为了安全起见，请戴上头盔。

en: We made this decision in the interest of the company.
cn: 我们出于公司利益的考虑做出了这个决定。

en: "Can you help me?" "No problem!"
cn: "你能帮我吗？" "没问题！"

en: "Thanks for your help." "No problem."
cn: "谢谢你的帮助。" "不客气。"

en: The report made mention of several key issues.
cn: 报告提到了几个关键问题。

en: He made mention of her contribution during the speech.
cn: 他在演讲中提到了她的贡献。

en: He needs to come to grips with his financial problems.
cn: 他需要认真处理他的财务问题。

en: She came to grips with the new software quickly.
cn: 她快速理解并应对了新软件。

en: They plan to move to a bigger house next year.
cn: 他们计划明年搬到更大的房子。

en: She moved to New York for her job.
cn: 她为了工作搬到了纽约。

en: When she saw him, her heart skipped a beat.
cn: 当她看到他时，她的心跳加速了。

en: The sudden noise made my heart skip a beat.
cn: 突然的噪音让我心跳加速。

en: We had fun with the new video game.
cn: 我们玩新电子游戏玩得很开心。

en: She has fun with her friends on weekends.
cn: 她在周末和朋友们享受乐趣。

en: We plan to go sightseeing in Paris next week.
cn: 我们计划下周去巴黎观光。

en: Tourists often go sightseeing to see famous landmarks.
cn: 游客经常去观光看著名地标。

en: It's necessary to study hard for the exam.
cn: 有必要为考试努力学习。

en: It's necessary to follow the rules in this company.
cn: 在这家公司有必要遵守规则。

en: For an instant, I thought I saw a ghost.
cn: 一瞬间，我以为我看到了鬼。

en: The light flashed for an instant and then disappeared.
cn: 灯光闪烁了片刻，然后消失了。

en: I caught a glimpse at the celebrity as she passed by.
cn: 当那位名人经过时，我瞥了她一眼。

en: He took a glimpse at the document before the meeting.
cn: 他在会议前匆匆看了一眼文件。

en: They encountered difficulties during the project.
cn: 他们在项目期间遇到了困难。

en: She encountered difficulties learning the new language.
cn: 她在学习新语言时遇到了困难。

en: I think of her as a close friend.
cn: 我把她看作亲密的朋友。

en: Many people think of this city as a cultural hub.
cn: 许多人把这个城市看作文化中心。

en: The artist became world famous after his exhibition.
cn: 这位艺术家在展览后变得世界闻名。

en: Some inventions become world famous overnight.
cn: 一些发明一夜之间变得世界闻名。

en: The teacher gave us a reading assignment for the weekend.
cn: 老师给我们布置了周末的阅读作业。

en: Completing the reading assignment is essential for the discussion.
cn: 完成阅读作业对讨论至关重要。

en: She is a postgraduate student studying biology.
cn: 她是一名研究生物学的研究生。

en: Postgraduate students often conduct independent research.
cn: 研究生经常进行独立研究。

en: He cried in despair after losing his job.
cn: 失业后，他绝望地哭了。

en: She looked in despair at the ruined painting.
cn: 她绝望地看着被毁的画作。

en: The new evidence cast doubt on the original theory.
cn: 新证据对原始理论产生了怀疑。

en: His inconsistent statements cast doubt on his credibility.
cn: 他前后矛盾的陈述让人对他的可信度产生怀疑。

en: We can divide the cake into eight equal pieces.
cn: 我们可以把蛋糕分成八等份。

en: The teacher divided the class into groups for the project.
cn: 老师把班级分成小组进行项目。

en: They decided to pass over his application for promotion.
cn: 他们决定忽略他的晋升申请。

en: Let's pass over the minor details and focus on the main issue.
cn: 让我们跳过次要细节，专注于主要问题。

en: Effective personnel management is key to a successful company.
cn: 有效的人事管理是公司成功的关键。

en: She works in personnel management at a large corporation.
cn: 她在一家大公司从事人事管理工作。

en: After the surgery, it took hours for him to come round.
cn: 手术后，他花了几个小时才苏醒。

en: She fainted but came round quickly with some water.
cn: 她晕倒了，但喝了些水后很快恢复了知觉。

en: How long will the meeting last?
cn: 会议将持续多久？

en: Can you tell me how long it takes to get there?
cn: 你能告诉我到那里需要多长时间吗？

en: I need to calculate the number of calories in this meal.
cn: 我需要计算这顿饭的卡路里数量。

en: Apps can help you calculate the number of calories you burn.
cn: 应用程序可以帮助你计算燃烧的卡路里数量。

en: After trying every solution, she was at her wit's end with the technical problem.
cn: 尝试了所有解决方案后，她对技术问题感到智穷计尽。

en: The parents were at their wit's end trying to calm their crying baby.
cn: 父母试图安抚哭泣的婴儿，感到不知所措。

en: Solar energy is a renewable source of power.
cn: 太阳能是一种可再生的能源。

en: Many homes now use solar energy to reduce electricity bills.
cn: 现在许多家庭使用太阳能来减少电费。

en: He took liberties with the original script, adding his own dialogue.
cn: 他擅自改动原剧本，加入了自己的对话。

en: Don't take liberties with company property; always ask for permission.
cn: 不要对公司财产过于随意，务必先征得同意。

en: She decided to take on the new project despite her busy schedule.
cn: 尽管日程繁忙，她还是决定承担这个新项目。

en: The company is taking on more employees to handle the increased workload.
cn: 公司正在招聘更多员工来处理增加的工作量。

en: Don't take your health for granted; it's important to exercise regularly.
cn: 不要认为健康是理所当然的，定期锻炼很重要。

en: She took her friend's support for granted until they had a disagreement.
cn: 直到发生分歧，她才意识到自己把朋友的支持视为理所当然。

en: I owe my success to my parents' support.
cn: 我把我的成功归功于父母的支持。

en: She owes her fluency in English to years of practice.
cn: 她把英语流利归功于多年的练习。

en: Watch out for slippery floors after they've been mopped.
cn: 拖地后要留意湿滑的地板。

en: You should watch out for scams when shopping online.
cn: 网上购物时，你应该提防诈骗。

en: I draw the line at lending money to friends; it often causes problems.
cn: 我设定底线，不借钱给朋友，因为这常引发问题。

en: The company draws the line at unethical business practices.
cn: 公司对不道德的商业行为划定界限。

en: We didn't have enough chairs, so we had to make do with sitting on the floor.
cn: 椅子不够，我们只好凑合坐在地板上。

en: With limited ingredients, she made do to prepare a simple meal.
cn: 食材有限，她将就着做了一顿简单的饭。

en: As a newcomer with no experience, he had two strikes against him in the job interview.
cn: 作为没有经验的新人，他在工作面试中处于不利地位。

en: She had two strikes against her when applying for the loan due to her low credit score.
cn: 由于信用评分低，她申请贷款时面临双重困难。

en: Additional information is available on request from the office.
cn: 如需更多信息，可向办公室索取。

en: The hotel provides extra towels on request.
cn: 酒店应请求提供额外毛巾。

en: The program gives opportunity for students to study abroad.
cn: 这个项目给学生提供出国留学的机会。

en: We should give opportunity for young artists to showcase their work.
cn: 我们应该给年轻艺术家展示作品的机会。

en: By then, the construction should be completed.
cn: 到那时，建筑工程应该已经完成。

en: We'll have more data by then to make a decision.
cn: 届时我们将有更多数据来做决定。

en: He was absent from the meeting due to illness.
cn: 他因病缺席了会议。

en: Students who are absent from class must provide a valid reason.
cn: 缺课的学生必须提供正当理由。

en: The critic pulled the new film to pieces in his review.
cn: 评论家在他的评论中严厉批评了这部新电影。

en: During the meeting, they pulled the proposal to pieces to find flaws.
cn: 会议期间，他们拆解分析了提案以找出缺陷。

en: After moving to a new city, it took him a few months to get his feet on the ground.
cn: 搬到新城市后，他花了几个月才站稳脚跟。

en: Once you get your feet on the ground at the new job, you'll feel more confident.
cn: 一旦你在新工作中适应了环境，就会更有信心。

en: She is traveling to New York on business next week.
cn: 她下周将因公前往纽约。

en: He's on business in Tokyo, attending a conference.
cn: 他正在东京出差，参加一个会议。

en: If you think that plan will work, you must have rocks in your head.
cn: 如果你认为那个计划可行，你一定是头脑不清醒。

en: He has rocks in his head for investing all his money in such a risky venture.
cn: 他把所有钱投资在如此冒险的项目上，真是愚蠢。

en: By networking with industry insiders, she got the inside track on the job opening.
cn: 通过与业内人员建立联系，她获得了职位空缺的内幕消息。

en: Investors who get the inside track can make better decisions in the stock market.
cn: 获得内幕消息的投资者能在股市中做出更好的决策。

en: Farmers often use chemical fertilisers to increase crop yields.
cn: 农民经常使用化学肥料来提高作物产量。

en: Excessive application of chemical fertilisers can harm soil health.
cn: 过量施用化学肥料会损害土壤健康。

en: Good language skills are essential for working in international business.
cn: 良好的语言能力对于从事国际商务至关重要。

en: She improved her language skills by practicing with native speakers.
cn: 她通过与母语者练习提高了语言能力。

en: Pharmaceutical companies invest billions to invent new drugs for rare diseases.
cn: 制药公司投资数十亿美元为罕见疾病发明新药。

en: Researchers aim to invent new drugs that have fewer side effects.
cn: 研究人员旨在发明副作用更少的新药。

en: Press the computer power button to turn on the device.
cn: 按下电脑电源按钮以开启设备。

en: The computer power button is usually located on the front panel.
cn: 电脑电源按钮通常位于前面板上。

en: The dancers moved in step with the music.
cn: 舞者们随着音乐同步移动。

en: Our team needs to work in step to meet the deadline.
cn: 我们团队需要协调一致工作以赶上截止日期。

en: She is bound up in her research and rarely takes breaks.
cn: 她专注于研究，很少休息。

en: He was bound up in the legal dispute for months.
cn: 他深深卷入这场法律纠纷长达数月。

en: It's wrong to lie to your friends about important matters.
cn: 在重要事情上对朋友撒谎是错误的。

en: He decided to lie to his boss to avoid trouble.
cn: 他决定对老板撒谎以避免麻烦。

en: Please bring along your ID card to the meeting.
cn: 请携带你的身份证参加会议。

en: She brought along a friend to the party.
cn: 她带了一个朋友来参加派对。

en: It's hard to keep up with the rapid pace of technological change.
cn: 很难跟上技术变化的快速步伐。

en: She exercises regularly to keep up with her fitness goals.
cn: 她定期锻炼以跟上她的健身目标。

en: The students presented their projects in turn.
cn: 学生们依次展示了他们的项目。

en: Each team member spoke in turn during the meeting.
cn: 会议期间每个团队成员轮流发言。

en: She dared to speak up against the unfair policy.
cn: 她敢于发声反对不公平的政策。

en: Few people dare to challenge the traditional methods.
cn: 很少有人敢于挑战传统方法。

en: It's no use crying over spilled milk.
cn: 为打翻的牛奶哭泣是无用的。

en: There's no use arguing with him; he won't change his mind.
cn: 与他争论无用；他不会改变主意。

en: The school lays great emphasis on academic excellence.
cn: 学校高度重视学术卓越。

en: Our company lays great emphasis on customer satisfaction.
cn: 我们公司高度重视客户满意度。

en: The manager will inform the team about the new project details.
cn: 经理将通知团队关于新项目的细节。

en: Please inform me about any changes to the schedule.
cn: 请通知我关于日程的任何变化。

en: The project deadline is next Friday, that is, the 15th.
cn: 项目截止日期是下周五，即15号。

en: He prefers outdoor activities, that is, hiking and cycling.
cn: 他更喜欢户外活动，也就是说，徒步和骑行。

en: Employees are requesting a pay rise due to increased living costs.
cn: 由于生活成本增加，员工们要求加薪。

en: She received a pay rise after her annual performance review.
cn: 她在年度绩效评估后获得了加薪。

en: I met the author in the flesh at the book signing.
cn: 我在签书会上亲自见到了作者本人。

en: Seeing the celebrity in the flesh was an exciting experience.
cn: 亲眼见到那位名人是一次激动人心的经历。

en: Volunteers help to clean up the park every weekend.
cn: 志愿者们每个周末帮助清理公园。

en: This tool will help to simplify the complex process.
cn: 这个工具将帮助简化复杂的过程。

en: The region is experiencing unusually warm conditions for this time of year.
cn: 该地区正经历一年中这个时候异常温暖的条件。

en: Unusually warm conditions have led to early blooming of flowers.
cn: 异常温暖的条件导致花朵提前开放。

en: Many senior citizens enjoy discounts at public facilities.
cn: 许多老年人在公共设施享受折扣。

en: The community center offers programs specifically for senior citizens.
cn: 社区中心为老年人提供专门的项目。

en: The documentary throws the spotlight on environmental issues.
cn: 这部纪录片聚焦于环境问题。

en: Her speech threw the spotlight on the need for educational reform.
cn: 她的演讲引起了人们对教育改革需求的关注。

en: When the alarm sounded, the thief took to his heels and disappeared into the night.
cn: 警报响起时，小偷拔腿就跑，消失在夜色中。

en: The children took to their heels as soon as they saw the teacher approaching.
cn: 孩子们一看到老师走过来，就立刻溜走了。

en: I would sooner stay home and read a book than go to that noisy party.
cn: 我宁愿待在家里看书，也不愿去那个吵闹的派对。

en: She would sooner resign than compromise her principles.
cn: 她宁愿辞职，也不愿妥协自己的原则。

en: With the help of modern technology, we can communicate instantly across the globe.
cn: 在现代技术的帮助下，我们可以即时全球沟通。

en: She completed the difficult task with the help of her supportive colleagues.
cn: 在支持她的同事的帮助下，她完成了这项困难的任务。

en: After five years together, they decided to split up amicably.
cn: 在一起五年后，他们决定友好地分手。

en: Many couples split up due to long-distance challenges.
cn: 许多情侣因异地挑战而分手。

en: He bought a lottery ticket every week, hoping to win the jackpot someday.
cn: 他每周都买一张彩票，希望有一天能中头奖。

en: Losing lottery tickets are often discarded without a second thought.
cn: 未中奖的彩票通常被随手丢弃。

en: I need to edit photos from the wedding to enhance the colors and remove blemishes.
cn: 我需要编辑婚礼照片，以增强色彩并去除瑕疵。

en: Many influencers use software to edit photos before posting them on social media.
cn: 许多网红在将照片发布到社交媒体前使用软件进行编辑。

en: The national park covers an area of over 1,000 square kilometers.
cn: 这个国家公园占地超过1000平方公里。

en: The new shopping mall will cover an area of 50 acres once completed.
cn: 新购物中心建成后将占地50英亩。

en: I prefer to relax at home on weekends rather than going out.
cn: 周末我更喜欢在家放松，而不是外出。

en: She felt most comfortable at home, surrounded by familiar things.
cn: 在家时她感到最舒适，周围都是熟悉的东西。

en: In life, you must learn to take the bitter with the sweet to maintain balance.
cn: 在生活中，你必须学会接受苦与乐，以保持平衡。

en: As an entrepreneur, she takes the bitter with the sweet, celebrating successes and learning from failures.
cn: 作为一名企业家，她接受苦与乐，庆祝成功并从失败中学习。

en: Some people are born with a natural talent for music.
cn: 有些人天生具有音乐天赋。

en: He was born with a strong sense of curiosity that drove his scientific discoveries.
cn: 他天生具有强烈的好奇心，这推动了他的科学发现。

en: Hikers should be prepared to encounter danger in remote wilderness areas.
cn: 徒步旅行者应准备好应对偏远荒野地区的危险。

en: During the storm, sailors encountered danger from high waves and strong winds.
cn: 暴风雨期间，水手们遇到了巨浪和强风的危险。

en: The mail carrier delivers letters and packages to our house every day.
cn: 邮递员每天将信件和包裹送到我们家。

en: She has worked as a mail carrier for over twenty years, rain or shine.
cn: 她担任邮递员已超过二十年，风雨无阻。

en: We need to get to the airport by 6 PM to catch our flight.
cn: 我们需要在下午6点前到达机场以赶上航班。

en: How do you get to the city center from here?
cn: 从这里怎么去市中心？

en: The dictionary defines 'altruism' as the selfless concern for the well-being of others.
cn: 词典将'利他主义'定义为对他人福祉的无私关心。

en: In this study, we define success as achieving both personal and professional goals.
cn: 在本研究中，我们将成功定义为实现个人和职业目标。

en: He ran up a huge credit card bill during his vacation.
cn: 他在度假期间积欠了一大笔信用卡账单。

en: Be careful not to run up debts you can't afford to repay.
cn: 小心不要积欠你无法偿还的债务。

en: The kids had ants in their pants waiting for the movie to start.
cn: 孩子们在等待电影开始时坐立不安。

en: He always has ants in his pants before a big presentation.
cn: 他在大型演讲前总是焦躁不安。

en: Please take away these empty plates from the table.
cn: 请把这些空盘子从桌子上拿走。

en: The police took the suspect away for questioning.
cn: 警察将嫌疑人带走审问。

en: Climate change poses a serious threat to global ecosystems.
cn: 气候变化对全球生态系统构成严重威胁。

en: The new competitor poses a threat to our market share.
cn: 新竞争对手对我们的市场份额构成威胁。

en: She puts by a little money each month for emergencies.
cn: 她每月存一点钱以备不时之需。

en: It's wise to put by some savings for retirement.
cn: 为退休积蓄一些储蓄是明智的。

en: Smoking can endanger health by increasing the risk of lung cancer.
cn: 吸烟会增加肺癌风险，从而危害健康。

en: Pollution in the city endangers the health of its residents.
cn: 城市污染危害居民的健康。

en: She struggled with the calculus course but passed with extra tutoring.
cn: 她在微积分课程上很吃力，但通过额外辅导通过了。

en: The calculus course is a prerequisite for many engineering degrees.
cn: 微积分课程是许多工程学位的先修课。

en: A well-educated workforce is essential for driving innovation in the tech industry.
cn: 受过良好教育的劳动力对于推动科技行业的创新至关重要。

en: Countries with a well-educated workforce tend to have higher economic growth.
cn: 拥有受过良好教育的劳动力的国家往往有更高的经济增长。

en: Many families face financial difficulties during economic recessions.

en: The company is experiencing financial difficulties due to declining sales.

en: Developers must innovate to meet the growing demand for housing in urban areas.
cn: 开发商必须创新以满足城市地区对住房日益增长的需求。

en: I'll see that the report is submitted by tomorrow.

en: If you feel feverish, you should take your temperature immediately.

en: To get ahead of the competition, we need to innovate faster.

en: She studied hard to get ahead of her classmates in the exams.

cn: 报告包含了一长串改进建议。

en: He has worked in the airline industry for over 20 years.
cn: 他在航空业工作了20多年。

en: Innovations in the airline industry have made travel more efficient.

en: In matters of law, I defer to the experts.

en: After the party, we need to pack away the decorations.

en: She preferred to look on rather than join the debate.
cn: 她宁愿旁观而不加入辩论。

en: He took his leave of the host after the dinner party.
cn: 晚宴后，他向主人告别。

cn: 是时候向你告别回家了。

en: The project is far from complete; we have a lot more work to do.
cn: 这个项目远未完成；我们还有很多工作要做。

en: Her attitude is far from helpful in this situation.

cn: 她的慷慨无限；她帮助每一个需要帮助的人。

en: The artist's creativity knows no bounds in his latest work.
cn: 这位艺术家在他最新的作品中创造力无限。

en: The court is in session, so please remain quiet.

en: We have family dinners every Sunday to catch up with each other.
cn: 我们每周日都有家庭晚餐来互相了解近况。

en: Be on guard for any suspicious activity in the neighborhood.
cn: 对社区内的任何可疑活动保持警惕。

en: The factory must increase production to keep pace with the demand.
cn: 工厂必须增加产量以跟上需求。

en: It's challenging to keep pace with the demand during peak seasons.

en: In reference to your email, we have updated the document.

en: My pet peeve is when people chew loudly in quiet places.
cn: 我特别讨厌有人在安静的地方大声咀嚼。

en: Leaving dirty dishes in the sink is her biggest pet peeve.
cn: 把脏盘子留在水槽里是她最讨厌的事情。

cn: 他未能在截止日期前提交报告。

en: The company failed to meet its quarterly targets.

en: She decided to get involved in the community charity event.
cn: 她决定参与社区的慈善活动。

en: It's best not to get involved in their personal disputes.
cn: 最好不要卷入他们的个人纠纷。

en: His honesty is beyond all question in this matter.
cn: 在这件事上，他的诚实是毫无疑问的。

en: The evidence proves his innocence beyond all question.

en: We made good time on the highway and arrived an hour early.
cn: 我们在高速公路上开得很快，提前一小时到达。

en: Despite the rain, the train made good time to the city.
cn: 尽管下雨，火车还是很快到达了城市。

en: The new curriculum places an emphasis on practical skills.
cn: 新课程强调实践技能。

en: Our company places an emphasis on customer satisfaction.

en: I'll take a shot at solving this difficult puzzle.
cn: 我会尝试解决这个难题。

en: He decided to take a shot at starting his own business.
cn: 他决定尝试自己创业。

en: She struggled to keep pace with the fast-moving discussion.
cn: 她努力跟上快速进行的讨论。

en: Technology must keep pace with changing consumer demands.

en: Looking at old photos helps her relive happy childhood experiences.
cn: 看旧照片帮助她重温快乐的童年经历。

en: He remains calm in difficult situations at work.
cn: 他在工作中的困难情况下保持冷静。

en: In difficult situations, it's important to seek support from friends.

cn: 他梦想成为欧洲的职业足球运动员。

en: The professional football player signed a lucrative contract with the team.
cn: 这位职业足球运动员与球队签订了一份利润丰厚的合同。

en: She made a significant contribution to the charity fundraiser.
cn: 她为慈善筹款活动做出了重要贡献。

en: Volunteers make a valuable contribution to community projects.

en: I'll take you at your word that the project will be finished on time.
cn: 我相信你的话，项目会按时完成。

en: She took him at his word when he promised to help.
cn: 当他承诺帮忙时，她相信了他的话。

en: I was impressed with her presentation skills during the meeting.
cn: 我对她在会议中的演示技巧印象深刻。

en: The judges were impressed with the innovative design of the product.

en: My mom had a conniption when she saw the messy room.

en: He'll have a conniption if he finds out about the mistake.
cn: 如果他发现这个错误，他会大发雷霆的。

en: She would go to any length to protect her family.
cn: 她会不遗余力地保护她的家人。

en: The company will change over to a new software system next month.

en: Museums and theaters help enrich cultural lives in the city.

en: We don't always see eye to eye on political issues.

en: The team saw eye to eye on the new marketing strategy.

cn: 他努力准时赴约。

en: Please make an effort to complete the assignment by Friday.

en: The outer atmosphere is where atmospheric gases escape into space.

en: The problem is political in nature, not technical.
cn: 这个问题本质上是政治性的，不是技术性的。

en: Her comments were critical in nature, but constructive.
cn: 她的评论本质上是批评性的，但具有建设性。

en: It took me a while to get a grasp on the new software.
cn: 我花了一段时间才掌握这个新软件。

en: She quickly got a grasp on the basics of calculus.
cn: 她很快就掌握了微积分的基础知识。

en: She tends to brood over past mistakes.
cn: 她倾向于忧思过去的错误。

en: Don't brood over the problem; let's find a solution.

en: Granite is a common type of igneous rock.
cn: 花岗岩是一种常见的火成岩。

cn: 火成岩由熔融物质凝固形成。

en: He has a deadline hanging over his head, so he's working late.
cn: 他有一个截止日期悬在心头，所以工作到很晚。

en: The lawsuit has been hanging over her head for months.
cn: 这场诉讼已经悬在她心头好几个月了。

en: She has a gift for languages and speaks five fluently.
cn: 她有语言天赋，能流利地说五种语言。

cn: 他有让人感到自在的天赋。

en: His comments were out of line and offended many people.
cn: 他的评论不当，冒犯了许多人。

en: You're out of line to speak to your boss like that.
cn: 你那样对老板说话是越界的。

en: The grocery store is within walking distance from my house.
cn: 杂货店离我家步行可达。

en: We chose a hotel within walking distance of the beach.

en: Please straighten up your room before guests arrive.
cn: 请在客人到来前整理好你的房间。

cn: 会议后他整理了办公室。

en: The museum is open to the public from 9 AM to 5 PM.
cn: 博物馆从上午9点到下午5点向公众开放。

en: The park will be open to the public after the renovation.
cn: 公园在翻新后将向公众开放。

en: He takes no interest in sports and prefers reading.
cn: 他对体育不感兴趣，更喜欢阅读。

en: She takes no interest in politics and avoids discussions about it.
cn: 她对政治不感兴趣，避免讨论相关话题。

en: Photographers aim to capture special moments at weddings.
cn: 摄影师旨在捕捉婚礼上的特殊时刻。

cn: 她喜欢用相机捕捉与家人的特殊时刻。

en: This model's performance is comparable with that of higher-end versions.
cn: 这个型号的性能与高端版本可比。

en: Her skills are comparable with those of a professional in the field.

en: The company will tender for the construction project next week.

en: Several firms are tendering for the government contract.

en: He was incapacitated with a severe flu and couldn't go to work.
cn: 他因严重流感而丧失能力，无法去工作。

en: The athlete was incapacitated with a knee injury during the game.
cn: 运动员在比赛中因膝盖受伤而无法行动。

en: Scientists are working to develop a new drug for cancer treatment.
cn: 科学家们正在努力研发一种治疗癌症的新药。

en: The village is on the margin of the forest, isolated from the city.

en: His behavior is on the margin of acceptability in this community.

en: I check my bank statement every month to track expenses.
cn: 我每月检查银行对账单以跟踪支出。

en: The bank statement showed an unauthorized transaction.
cn: 银行对账单显示了一笔未经授权的交易。

en: Her fashion sense is always up to the minute.
cn: 她的时尚感总是最时兴的。

en: The news app provides up-to-the-minute updates on global events.
cn: 这个新闻应用提供全球事件的最新更新。

en: She always complains about the noisy neighbors.
cn: 她总是抱怨邻居吵闹。

en: Customers complained about the slow service at the restaurant.
cn: 顾客投诉餐厅服务缓慢。

en: Her success in business is due to hard work and innovation.
cn: 她在商业上的成功归功于努力工作和创新。

en: He achieved great success in his academic career.
cn: 他在学术生涯中取得了巨大成功。

en: She takes care over every detail in her artwork.
cn: 她认真对待艺术作品的每一个细节。

en: You should take care over the wording of the contract.

en: When asked about the complex theory, she was at a loss for words.
cn: 当被问及这个复杂理论时，她不知如何回答。

cn: 突然辞职后，团队对如何继续感到困惑。

en: The manager left the difficult project on my hands while he was away.
cn: 经理离开时把这个困难项目留给我处理。

en: After the party, they left all the cleaning on her hands.
cn: 派对后，他们把所有的清洁工作留给她负责。

en: He spent a year knocking around Europe after graduation.
cn: 毕业后他花了一年时间在欧洲漫游。

en: We used to knock around the city on weekends.
cn: 我们过去常在周末在城市里闲逛。

en: Quite a number of people attended the community event.
cn: 相当多的人参加了社区活动。

en: She has read quite a number of books on the subject.
cn: 她读了相当多关于这个主题的书。

en: That classic novel has been out of print for decades.
cn: 那部经典小说已经绝版几十年了。

en: Finding a copy of the out-of-print book was a challenge.
cn: 找到这本绝版书的副本是一个挑战。

en: Much as I admire his work, I disagree with his methods.
cn: 尽管我钦佩他的工作，但我不同意他的方法。

en: Much as she wanted to go, she had to stay home.
cn: 虽然她想去，但她不得不待在家里。

en: What are you getting at with all these questions?
cn: 你问这些问题是想暗示什么？

en: I couldn't understand what he was getting at in his speech.
cn: 我不明白他在演讲中意指什么。

en: She has a good grasp on the fundamentals of physics.
cn: 她很好地掌握了物理学的基础知识。

en: After the training, he had a better grasp on the new software.
cn: 培训后，他更好地理解了新软件。

en: There was no negligence on his part in the accident.
cn: 在事故中，他方面没有疏忽。

en: An apology on your part would help resolve the conflict.
cn: 由你做出道歉将有助于解决冲突。

en: Please make out a check to the company for the invoice amount.
cn: 请开具一张支票给公司，金额为发票数额。

en: He made out a check for $100 as a donation.
cn: 他开具了一张100美元的支票作为捐款。

en: The plans for the event are all set and ready to go.
cn: 活动的计划已全部确定，准备就绪。

en: After the meeting, the date was set for the next conference.
cn: 会议后，下次会议的日期已确定。

en: Her college career was marked by academic excellence and leadership.
cn: 她的大学生涯以学术卓越和领导力为标志。

en: He reflected on his college career with fond memories.
cn: 他带着美好的回忆反思自己的大学生涯。

en: Countries are shifting towards a knowledge-based economy to boost innovation.
cn: 各国正在转向知识经济以促进创新。

en: In a knowledge-based economy, intellectual capital is more valuable than physical assets.
cn: 在知识经济中，智力资本比实物资产更有价值。

en: The statistical calculation revealed a significant correlation between the variables.
cn: 统计计算揭示了变量之间的显著相关性。

en: Accurate statistical calculation is essential for valid research conclusions.
cn: 准确的统计计算对于有效的研究结论至关重要。

en: The test was dead easy; I finished it in ten minutes.
cn: 这次测试极其容易，我十分钟就完成了。

en: Fixing that issue is dead easy with the right tools.
cn: 用合适的工具解决那个问题极其容易。

en: The store is close to my house, so I walk there often.
cn: 这家商店离我家很近，所以我经常步行去那里。

en: She is close to her sister and shares everything with her.
cn: 她和姐姐关系亲密，什么都分享。

en: Here you are, your coffee as requested.
cn: 给你，你要的咖啡。

en: Here you are, the documents you needed for the meeting.
cn: 给你，会议所需的文件。

en: I feel at ease when I'm surrounded by my family.
cn: 和家人在一起时，我感到很自在。

en: The cozy atmosphere made everyone feel at ease during the party.
cn: 温馨的氛围让每个人在派对上感到放松。

en: I am going to study abroad next year.
cn: 我打算明年出国留学。

en: It looks like it is going to rain soon.
cn: 看起来很快就要下雨了。

en: Meteorologists use advanced models to predict weather accurately.
cn: 气象学家使用先进模型来准确预测天气。

en: It's challenging to predict weather in mountainous regions due to rapid changes.
cn: 由于变化迅速，预测山区的天气具有挑战性。

en: The university offers a specialized course in artificial intelligence.
cn: 这所大学提供人工智能的专业课程。

en: Taking a specialized course can enhance your career prospects.
cn: 参加专业课程可以提升你的职业前景。

en: She saves a portion of her salary for a rainy day.
cn: 她把一部分工资存起来以备不时之需。

en: Having an emergency fund is like saving for a rainy day.
cn: 拥有应急基金就像为不时之需存钱。

en: The tragic event led him to commit suicide out of despair.
cn: 这场悲剧事件使他因绝望而自杀。

en: It's important to seek help if someone is considering to commit suicide.
cn: 如果有人考虑自杀，寻求帮助很重要。

en: The plan is cost-effective; on the other hand, it might be time-consuming.
cn: 这个计划成本效益高；另一方面，它可能耗时。

en: He loves the city life, but on the other hand, he misses the countryside.
cn: 他喜欢城市生活，但另一方面，他怀念乡村。

en: His rude comments really got my hackles up during the meeting.
cn: 他粗鲁的评论在会议上真的激怒了我。

en: Criticism from strangers tends to get her hackles up quickly.
cn: 陌生人的批评往往会迅速激怒她。

en: Managing this project is going to give me gray hairs with all its problems.
cn: 管理这个项目会因所有问题让我烦恼变老。

en: Parents often get gray hairs worrying about their children's safety.
cn: 父母常因担心孩子的安全而烦恼。

en: She received an award in recognition of her charitable work.
cn: 她因慈善工作获得表彰。

en: The ceremony was held in recognition of the team's outstanding achievements.
cn: 举行仪式是为了表彰团队的杰出成就。

en: I got a Charley horse in my calf while running this morning.
cn: 今天早上跑步时，我的小腿抽筋了。

en: Dehydration can cause you to get a Charley horse during exercise.
cn: 脱水可能导致你在运动时腿部抽筋。

en: This fruit is rich in vitamins and antioxidants.
cn: 这种水果富含维生素和抗氧化剂。

en: The region is rich in natural resources like oil and minerals.
cn: 该地区富含石油和矿产等自然资源。

en: Be careful not to slip up on the details during the presentation.
cn: 小心不要在演示中细节上犯错误。

en: Everyone slips up sometimes; it's important to learn from it.
cn: 每个人有时都会失误；重要的是从中学习。

en: The marketing team must work closely with the sales department to launch the new product.
cn: 营销团队必须与销售部门密切合作以推出新产品。

en: As a project manager, I work closely with stakeholders to ensure alignment.
cn: 作为项目经理，我与利益相关者密切合作以确保一致性。

en: After the betrayal, she hated his guts and never spoke to him again.
cn: 背叛之后，她极度憎恨他，再也不和他说话。

en: The two rivals hate each other's guts and constantly argue.
cn: 这两个对手极度憎恨对方，经常争吵。

en: After eating shellfish, she broke out into hives all over her arms.
cn: 吃了贝类后，她手臂上突然起了荨麻疹。

en: The comedian's joke made the audience break out into uncontrollable laughter.
cn: 喜剧演员的笑话让观众爆发出无法控制的笑声。

en: Safety concerns must take precedence over production deadlines in the factory.
cn: 工厂中安全问题必须优先于生产截止日期。

en: In emergency situations, patient care takes precedence over administrative paperwork.
cn: 在紧急情况下，患者护理优先于行政文书工作。

en: The retailer marks up the wholesale price by 50% to cover overhead costs.
cn: 零售商将批发价加价50%以覆盖间接成本。

en: Luxury brands often mark up their products significantly compared to production costs.
cn: 奢侈品牌通常相比生产成本大幅加价其产品。

en: She gasped in surprise when she saw the unexpected gift.
cn: 看到意外的礼物时，她惊讶地倒吸一口气。

en: He looked at me in surprise after hearing the shocking news.
cn: 听到这个令人震惊的消息后，他惊讶地看着我。

en: Hang on a moment, I'll be right back with your order.
cn: 稍等片刻，我马上把你的订单拿来。

en: Can you hang on while I check the schedule?
cn: 我查看日程时，你能稍等一下吗？

en: The cherry trees are in blossom, attracting many tourists to the park.
cn: 樱花树正在盛开，吸引了许多游客到公园。

en: In spring, the garden is in blossom with colorful flowers everywhere.
cn: 春天，花园里到处盛开着五颜六色的花朵。

en: The siblings often argue over who gets to use the car on weekends.
cn: 兄弟姐妹经常为谁在周末用车而争吵。

en: Politicians argue over budget allocations during the legislative session.
cn: 政客们在立法会议期间为预算分配争论。

en: The New York metropolitan area includes parts of New Jersey and Connecticut.
cn: 纽约大都市区包括新泽西州和康涅狄格州的部分地区。

en: Living in a metropolitan area often means higher costs but more job opportunities.
cn: 生活在大都市区通常意味着更高的成本但更多的工作机会。

en: Please take down the main points from the meeting in the minutes.
cn: 请在会议记录中记下会议要点。

en: She quickly took down the phone number before forgetting it.
cn: 她迅速记下电话号码以免忘记。

en: In the play, she will take the role of the queen, requiring extensive rehearsal.
cn: 在剧中，她将担任女王的角色，需要大量排练。

en: He agreed to take the role of team leader for the new project.
cn: 他同意为新项目担任团队领导的角色。

en: Up to now, we have received over 100 applications for the position.
cn: 到目前为止，我们已经收到100多份该职位的申请。

en: The project is on schedule up to now, but delays may occur later.
cn: 迄今项目按计划进行，但后期可能出现延误。

en: The negotiations took a new turn when a third party intervened.
cn: 当第三方介入时，谈判出现了新转折。

en: Her life took a new turn after she moved to a different country.
cn: 移居不同国家后，她的生活发生了新变化。

en: She decided to join the choir at her church to improve her singing skills.
cn: 她决定加入教堂的合唱团以提高歌唱技巧。

en: After auditioning, he was excited to join the choir for the holiday concert.
cn: 试听后，他兴奋地加入合唱团参加假日音乐会。

en: Meteorologists warn of severe thunderstorms approaching the coastal area.
cn: 气象学家警告沿海地区将有严重雷暴。

en: The label warns of potential side effects if the medication is misused.
cn: 标签警告如果药物误用可能产生副作用。

en: The dove is often considered the symbol of peace in many cultures.
cn: 在许多文化中，鸽子常被视为和平的象征。

en: The Eiffel Tower has become the symbol of Paris and French elegance.
cn: 埃菲尔铁塔已成为巴黎和法国优雅的象征。

en: The corrupt official was found to be in league with local gangsters.
cn: 发现这名腐败官员与当地黑帮勾结。

en: Rumors suggest the company is in league with competitors to fix prices.
cn: 有传言称该公司与竞争对手勾结以固定价格。

en: She took her mentor's advice to heart and made significant changes in her career.
cn: 她认真对待导师的建议，并在职业生涯中做出了重大改变。

en: He took the criticism to heart, using it as motivation to improve.
cn: 他把批评放在心上，将其作为改进的动力。

en: This is my final offer—take it or leave it, no further discussions.
cn: 这是我的最终报价——要么接受要么放弃，没有进一步讨论。

en: When buying the car, the seller said the price is fixed, take it or leave it.
cn: 买车时，卖家说价格固定，不容讨价还价。

en: She wrote helpful notes in the margin of her textbook during lectures.
cn: 她在讲座期间在教科书页边空白处写了有用的笔记。

en: The editor's comments were scribbled in the margin of the manuscript.
cn: 编辑的评论潦草地写在手稿的页边空白处。

en: As a journalist, she must keep abreast of current events to report accurately.
cn: 作为记者，她必须了解时事最新情况以准确报道。

en: Professionals in tech need to keep abreast of new software developments.
cn: 科技行业的专业人士需要跟上新软件发展的最新情况。

en: Engineering and construction are often considered male-dominated industries.
cn: 工程和建筑通常被认为是男性主导的行业。

en: She broke barriers by succeeding in a male-dominated industry like finance.
cn: 她在金融这样的男性主导行业中取得成功，打破了障碍。

en: The journalist was tipped off about the scandal by an anonymous source.
cn: 记者从一个匿名消息来源那里得到了关于丑闻的提示。

en: Police were tipped off about the planned robbery.
cn: 警方提前得到了关于计划抢劫的警告。

en: If you break the rules, you'll get what for from the teacher.
cn: 如果你违反规则，老师会惩罚你的。

en: He got what for when his boss found out about the mistake.
cn: 当老板发现错误时，他受到了责备。

en: To date, no one has solved this complex puzzle.
cn: 迄今为止，没有人解决这个复杂的谜题。

en: The project has been successful to date.
cn: 这个项目迄今为止是成功的。

en: Have an eye out for any suspicious activity in the neighborhood.
cn: 留意社区里任何可疑的活动。

en: I'll have an eye out for a good deal on a new car.
cn: 我会留意新车的好交易。

en: I reminded him not to forget his keys.
cn: 我提醒他不要忘记带钥匙。

en: She reminded the children not to run in the hallway.
cn: 她提醒孩子们不要在走廊里跑。

en: He got the boot after missing too many deadlines.
cn: 他在错过太多截止日期后被解雇了。

en: If you're late again, you might get the boot.
cn: 如果你再迟到，可能会被开除。

en: I couldn't get to sleep because of the noise outside.
cn: 因为外面的噪音，我无法入睡。

en: She finally got to sleep after reading a book.
cn: 在读书后，她终于入睡了。

en: We discussed the pros and cons of moving to a new city.
cn: 我们讨论了搬到新城市的优点和缺点。

en: Before making a decision, list all the pros and cons.
cn: 在做决定之前，列出所有的优点和缺点。

en: The school's cross-country race is held every autumn.
cn: 学校的越野赛跑每年秋天举行。

en: She trained hard for the cross-country race.
cn: 她为越野赛跑努力训练。

en: Scarcely had I left the house when it started to rain.
cn: 我一离开房子，天就开始下雨了。

en: Scarcely had she finished speaking when the phone rang.
cn: 她一说完话，电话就响了。

en: He offered a drink to the guest.
cn: 他向客人提供了一杯饮料。

en: The company offered a promotion to the employee.
cn: 公司向员工提供了一个晋升机会。

en: While he was away on business, she kept the home fires burning.
cn: 当他出差时，她维持着家庭的正常运转。

en: They kept the home fires burning during the difficult times.
cn: 在困难时期，他们维持着家庭的稳定。

en: I made the acquaintance of several interesting people at the conference.
cn: 我在会议上结识了几位有趣的人。

en: She was delighted to make the acquaintance of the famous author.
cn: 她很高兴能结识这位著名作家。

en: She enjoys keeping company with her friends on weekends.
cn: 她喜欢在周末与朋友们交往。

en: He kept company with some influential people.
cn: 他与一些有影响力的人交往。

en: The teacher read out the instructions to the class.
cn: 老师向全班大声读出了指示。

en: He read out the list of winners.
cn: 他大声读出了获奖者名单。

en: He moved up to a managerial position after years of hard work.
cn: 经过多年的努力工作，他晋升到了管理职位。

en: Please move up so others can sit down.
cn: 请向上移动，以便其他人可以坐下。

en: This dress is suitable for a formal occasion.
cn: 这件连衣裙适合正式场合。

en: The candidate is suitable for the job.
cn: 这位候选人适合这份工作。

en: Companies that violate environmental laws face heavy fines.
cn: 违反环境法的公司面临巨额罚款。

en: He was arrested for violating traffic laws while driving under the influence.
cn: 他因酒驾违反交通法规而被捕。

en: She showed sympathy for the victims of the disaster.
cn: 她对灾难的受害者表示同情。

en: He showed sympathy for her difficult situation.
cn: 他对她的困难处境表示同情。

en: Patients must consent to the surgery before the procedure can begin.
cn: 患者必须在手术开始前同意接受手术。

en: The landlord consented to the tenant's request for a pet.
cn: 房东同意了租客养宠物的请求。

en: The elevator's upward motion was smooth and fast.
cn: 电梯的向上运动平稳而快速。

en: In physics class, we studied the upward motion of a projectile.
cn: 在物理课上，我们研究了抛射体的向上运动。

en: He worked extra hours to get out from under his debt.
cn: 他加班工作以摆脱债务负担。

en: She moved to a new city to get out from under her overbearing family.
cn: 她搬到了一个新城市，以摆脱专横的家庭控制。

en: The government raised interest rates in reaction to rising inflation.
cn: 政府为应对通胀上升而提高了利率。

en: She started exercising daily in reaction to her doctor's advice.
cn: 她听从医生的建议，开始每天锻炼。

en: In the debate, her logical arguments got the best of her opponent.
cn: 在辩论中，她逻辑严密的论点战胜了对手。

en: Despite the challenges, his determination got the best of the obstacles.
cn: 尽管面临挑战，他的决心战胜了障碍。

en: After several failures, he began to lose heart and considered giving up.
cn: 几次失败后，他开始失去信心，考虑放弃。

en: Don't lose heart; keep trying and you'll eventually succeed.
cn: 不要灰心，继续努力，你最终会成功的。

en: Online courses allow students to learn at their own pace.
cn: 在线课程允许学生按照自己的节奏学习。

en: After the injury, he recovered at his own pace without rushing.
cn: 受伤后，他按照自己的节奏恢复，没有急于求成。

en: Through rigorous training, she got the edge on her competitors in the race.
cn: 通过严格训练，她在比赛中获得了对竞争对手的优势。

en: His innovative strategy helped the company get the edge on its rivals.
cn: 他的创新策略帮助公司获得了对竞争对手的优势。

en: In the negotiation, our team got the upper hand on the other party by being well-prepared.
cn: 在谈判中，我们团队通过充分准备获得了对另一方的优势。

en: The detective got the upper hand on the suspect by uncovering new evidence.
cn: 侦探通过发现新证据获得了对嫌疑人的优势。

en: After cheating for years, he finally got what was coming to him when he was caught.
cn: 多年作弊后，他被抓住时终于得到了应得的报应。

en: If you treat people poorly, you'll eventually get what's coming to you.
cn: 如果你对待别人不好，你最终会得到应得的报应。

en: She decided to pursue a hobby in painting to relax after work.
cn: 她决定从事绘画爱好，以便下班后放松。

en: Many people pursue hobbies like gardening or cooking in their free time.
cn: 许多人在空闲时间从事园艺或烹饪等爱好。

en: We baked a chocolate birthday cake for her party.
cn: 我们为她的派对烤了一个巧克力生日蛋糕。

en: It's tradition to blow out candles on a birthday cake and make a wish.
cn: 吹灭生日蛋糕上的蜡烛并许愿是传统。

en: To get approval, you need to work through channels by submitting a formal request.
cn: 要获得批准，你需要通过提交正式请求来通过正式渠道工作。

en: In large organizations, it's important to work through channels to avoid confusion.
cn: 在大型组织中，通过正式渠道工作以避免混乱很重要。

en: He got his start in the film industry as a production assistant.
cn: 他作为制片助理开始了在电影行业的职业生涯。

en: Many entrepreneurs get their start by launching small businesses.
cn: 许多企业家通过创办小企业开始他们的职业生涯。

en: He attended a vocational school to learn automotive repair skills.
cn: 他上了一所职业学校学习汽车维修技能。

en: Vocational schools offer practical training for careers like nursing or plumbing.
cn: 职业学校为护理或管道工等职业提供实践培训。

en: Pollution has caused irreversible damage to the coral reefs.
cn: 污染对珊瑚礁造成了不可逆转的损害。

en: The stroke resulted in irreversible damage to his brain functions.
cn: 中风导致他的大脑功能受到不可逆转的损害。

en: After her father retired, she took over his business and expanded it.
cn: 父亲退休后，她接管了他的生意并扩大了规模。

en: The larger company offered to take over his business through a merger.
cn: 那家更大的公司提出通过合并接管他的生意。

en: Rumors go round quickly in small towns.
cn: 谣言在小镇上流传得很快。

en: He likes to go round and visit friends on weekends.
cn: 他喜欢在周末四处走动拜访朋友。

en: The two boxers had at each other in the ring.
cn: 两名拳击手在拳击台上互相攻击。

en: She had at the project with enthusiasm, finishing it quickly.
cn: 她热情地开始做这个项目，很快就完成了。

en: He fell head over heels in love with her at first sight.
cn: 他对她一见钟情，神魂颠倒。

en: They've been head over heels for each other since college.
cn: 他们从大学起就深陷爱河。

en: Break a leg! I know you'll do great in the play.
cn: 祝你好运！我知道你在剧中会表现得很棒。

en: Before the concert, they told her, "Break a leg!"
cn: 音乐会前，他们对她说：“祝你好运！”

en: We save on electricity by using LED bulbs.
cn: 我们使用LED灯泡来节省电费。

en: Buying in bulk helps save on grocery costs.
cn: 批量购买有助于节省杂货费用。

en: Rigid rules can stifle creativity in the workplace.
cn: 僵化的规则可能会抑制工作场所的创造力。

en: The teacher avoided stifling creativity by encouraging free expression.
cn: 老师通过鼓励自由表达来避免抑制创造力。

en: I can see through his lies easily.
cn: 我能轻易看穿他的谎言。

en: She saw through the scam immediately.
cn: 她立刻识破了这个骗局。

en: She exercises regularly to keep a good body shape.
cn: 她定期锻炼以保持良好体型。

en: Eating balanced meals helps him keep a good body shape.
cn: 均衡饮食帮助他保持良好体型。

en: His statement, by implication, criticized the policy.
cn: 他的声明含蓄地批评了这项政策。

en: The contract's terms are understood by implication.
cn: 合同的条款是通过暗示来理解的。

en: Many employees now work from home due to the pandemic.
cn: 由于疫情，许多员工现在在家工作。

en: She prefers to work from home to avoid commuting.
cn: 她更喜欢在家工作以避免通勤。

en: The child has a temperature and needs to rest.
cn: 这孩子发烧了，需要休息。

en: If you have a temperature, you should see a doctor.
cn: 如果你发烧了，应该去看医生。

en: We're in no hurry to finish the project; quality matters more.
cn: 我们不着急完成项目；质量更重要。

en: She was in no hurry, so she took a leisurely walk.
cn: 她不着急，所以悠闲地散步。

en: After dinner, it's your turn to wash up.
cn: 晚餐后，轮到你洗餐具了。

en: She washed up the plates and put them away.
cn: 她洗了盘子并把它们收好。

en: The boxer knocked out his opponent in the third round.
cn: 拳击手在第三回合击倒了对手。

en: The blow knocked him out cold.
cn: 这一击使他昏迷不醒。

en: Can you take a look at my report and give me some feedback?
cn: 你能看一下我的报告并给我一些反馈吗？

en: The mechanic will take a look at the engine to diagnose the problem.
cn: 机械师将检查发动机以诊断问题。

en: He has a tendency towards procrastination when faced with difficult tasks.
cn: 面对困难任务时，他有拖延的倾向。

en: There is a growing tendency towards remote work in many industries.
cn: 许多行业越来越倾向于远程工作。

en: After losing the election, he had to resign himself to being in the opposition.
cn: 选举失败后，他不得不接受成为反对派的事实。

en: She resigned herself to the fact that her flight was cancelled due to bad weather.
cn: 她接受了航班因恶劣天气被取消的事实。

en: The old CEO is on the way out, and a new one will take over next month.
cn: 老CEO即将离职，新CEO下个月将接任。

en: This fashion trend is on the way out; people are starting to prefer more classic styles.
cn: 这种时尚潮流即将过时，人们开始更喜欢经典风格。

en: Employees who obtain job satisfaction are more likely to stay with the company long-term.
cn: 获得工作满足感的员工更有可能长期留在公司。

en: She obtained job satisfaction by working on projects that aligned with her values.
cn: 她通过从事符合自己价值观的项目获得了工作满足感。

en: Decisions are made on the basis of thorough research and analysis.
cn: 决策基于彻底的研究和分析。

en: She was hired on the basis of her impressive qualifications and experience.
cn: 她基于其令人印象深刻的资格和经验被聘用。

en: I enjoy working with my colleagues because they are supportive and creative.
cn: 我喜欢与同事合作，因为他们支持性强且富有创造力。

en: She works with a team of experts to develop new software.
cn: 她与专家团队合作开发新软件。

en: Her eyes brimmed over with tears when she heard the good news.
cn: 当她听到好消息时，她的眼睛充满了泪水。

en: The cup was so full that it brimmed over when he tried to carry it.
cn: 杯子太满了，他试图端起来时溢了出来。

en: This quiet room lends itself to focused study sessions.
cn: 这个安静的房间适合专注的学习会议。

en: The flexible material lends itself to a variety of creative uses.
cn: 这种柔性材料易于用于各种创意用途。

en: After a few tries, she got the hang of riding a bicycle.
cn: 几次尝试后，她掌握了骑自行车的技巧。

en: It took him a while to get the hang of using the new software.
cn: 他花了一段时间才熟悉使用新软件。

en: Keep your eye out for any suspicious activity in the neighborhood.
cn: 留意社区里任何可疑的活动。

en: I'll keep my eye out for a good deal on flights to Europe.
cn: 我会留意飞往欧洲的航班优惠。

en: He has a habit of checking his phone first thing in the morning.
cn: 他有早上第一件事就是查看手机的习惯。

en: She has a habit of biting her nails when she's nervous.
cn: 她紧张时有咬指甲的习惯。

en: We need to make arrangements to meet with the client next week.
cn: 我们需要安排下周与客户会面。

en: She made arrangements to travel abroad for her vacation.
cn: 她安排了出国旅行度假。

en: We need to make room for the new furniture in the living room.
cn: 我们需要在客厅为新家具腾出空间。

en: She made room in her schedule to attend the important meeting.
cn: 她在日程中腾出时间参加重要会议。

en: He took a course to improve his job skills in data analysis.
cn: 他参加了一门课程来提高数据分析的工作技能。

en: Regular training helps employees improve their job skills and stay competitive.
cn: 定期培训帮助员工提高工作技能并保持竞争力。

en: The bright lighting brings out the colors in the painting.
cn: 明亮的灯光使画中的颜色显现出来。

en: This exercise brings out the best in team collaboration.
cn: 这个练习突出了团队协作的最佳状态。

en: By contrast to last year's profits, this year's results are disappointing.
cn: 与去年的利润相比，今年的结果令人失望。

en: Her calm demeanor is by contrast to his nervous energy.
cn: 她冷静的举止与他紧张的能量形成对比。

en: The manager turned a blind eye to the minor safety violations.
cn: 经理对轻微的安全违规行为视而不见。

en: Parents should not turn a blind eye to their children's bad behavior.
cn: 父母不应对孩子的不良行为视而不见。

en: The agreement was made without prejudice to future negotiations.
cn: 达成协议时未损害未来的谈判。

en: She accepted the offer without prejudice to her legal rights.
cn: 她接受了提议，但未损害其法律权利。

en: Rumors about the merger are going around the office.
cn: 关于合并的谣言在办公室里传播。

en: He likes to go around the city exploring new neighborhoods.
cn: 他喜欢在城市里四处走动探索新社区。

en: Social norms vary greatly between different cultures.
cn: 不同文化之间的社会规范差异很大。

en: It's important to understand the social norms when visiting a foreign country.
cn: 访问外国时，了解社会规范很重要。

en: The building's internal metal skeleton provides structural support.
cn: 建筑物的内部金属骨架提供结构支撑。

en: Some animals have an internal metal skeleton made of bone.
cn: 一些动物有由骨头构成的内部金属骨架。

en: The factory had to close down due to financial difficulties.
cn: 由于财务困难，工厂不得不关闭。

en: They decided to close down the store after 50 years in business.
cn: 在经营50年后，他们决定关闭这家商店。

en: A ceremony was held in his honor for his lifetime achievements.
cn: 为纪念他一生的成就，举行了一场仪式。

en: They named the building in her honor.
cn: 他们以她的名字命名了这座建筑。

en: There were loads of people at the concert.
cn: 音乐会上有很多人。

en: She has loads of experience in this field.
cn: 她在这个领域有很多经验。

en: He went for a run to get his anger out of his system.
cn: 他去跑步以发泄愤怒。

en: Sometimes you need to cry to get it out of your system.
cn: 有时你需要哭出来以摆脱这种情绪。

en: The firefighters have the blaze under control.
cn: 消防员已经控制住了火势。

en: She has her emotions under control during the meeting.
cn: 她在会议期间控制住了自己的情绪。

en: I am proud to be part of this team.
cn: 我为成为这个团队的一员感到自豪。

en: She is proud to have graduated from that university.
cn: 她为从那所大学毕业感到自豪。

en: The ownership of the land is still in dispute.
cn: 这块土地的所有权仍有争议。

en: The two companies are in dispute over the patent.
cn: 这两家公司就专利问题存在争议。

en: The floodwaters carried away several cars.
cn: 洪水冲走了几辆车。

en: Don't get carried away by your success.
cn: 不要被成功冲昏头脑。

en: Thank goodness for the rain, it cooled everything down.
cn: 幸亏下雨了，它让一切都凉快下来。

en: Thank goodness for modern medicine, it saved his life.
cn: 感谢现代医学，它救了他的命。

en: The store was fined for selling shoddy goods.
cn: 这家商店因销售劣质商品被罚款。

en: Be careful not to buy shoddy goods online.
cn: 小心不要在网上购买劣质商品。

en: The government plans to impose a tobacco tax to reduce smoking.
cn: 政府计划征收烟草税以减少吸烟。

en: Many countries impose a tobacco tax as a public health measure.
cn: 许多国家征收烟草税作为公共卫生措施。

en: We have enough resources in hand to complete the project.
cn: 我们手头有足够的资源来完成这个项目。

en: The situation is in hand, so don't worry.
cn: 情况在控制中，所以不用担心。

en: I need to catch up with my studies after being sick.
cn: 生病后我需要赶上我的学习进度。

en: He ran faster to catch up with his friends.
cn: 他跑得更快以赶上他的朋友们。

en: She brought a new perspective into the discussion.
cn: 她为讨论带来了新的视角。

en: The company brought new technology into the market.
cn: 公司将新技术引入市场。

en: He staked his reputation on the success of the project.
cn: 他把自己的声誉押在了项目的成功上。

en: Don't stake everything on one risky investment.
cn: 不要把所有东西都押在一次风险投资上。

en: The company implemented new software to increase productivity by 20%.
cn: 公司实施了新软件，将生产力提高了20%。

en: Regular training sessions can help increase productivity in the workplace.
cn: 定期培训课程有助于提高工作场所的生产力。

en: The company focuses on the domestic market before expanding internationally.
cn: 公司在国际扩张前专注于国内市场。

en: Fluctuations in the domestic market can affect local employment rates.
cn: 国内市场的波动可能影响当地的就业率。

en: If you think you can do better, put up or shut up and show us your plan.
cn: 如果你认为你能做得更好，要么行动要么闭嘴，给我们看看你的计划。

en: He kept complaining about the rules, so I told him to put up or shut up and propose a change.
cn: 他一直在抱怨规则，所以我告诉他要么行动要么闭嘴，提出修改建议。

en: She spent hours searching for her lost keys in the house.
cn: 她花了几个小时在房子里寻找丢失的钥匙。

en: Researchers are searching for a cure to the disease.
cn: 研究人员正在寻找这种疾病的治疗方法。

en: He was none too pleased when he heard the news.
cn: 他听到这个消息时一点也不高兴。

en: The food was none too tasty, so we decided to eat elsewhere.
cn: 食物一点也不好吃，所以我们决定去别处吃。

en: Her exam grades improved significantly after she started studying regularly.
cn: 她开始定期学习后，考试成绩显著提高。

en: The school uses exam grades to determine student placements.
cn: 学校用考试成绩来决定学生的分班。

en: The suspect claimed the police had fitted him up with false evidence.
cn: 嫌疑人声称警方用虚假证据诬陷了他。

en: She was fitted up for the crime by her jealous colleague.
cn: 她被嫉妒的同事陷害，背上了罪名。

en: Before the test, make sure to review the material covered in class.
cn: 考试前，一定要复习课堂上讲过的材料。

en: The teacher asked the students to review the material for the upcoming quiz.
cn: 老师让学生为即将到来的小测验复习材料。

en: He manipulated his friend into lending him money by pretending to be in desperate need.
cn: 他假装急需用钱，操纵朋友借给他钱。

en: Politicians sometimes manipulate voters into supporting policies through emotional appeals.
cn: 政客有时通过情感诉求操纵选民支持政策。

en: The inspection of the building revealed several safety violations.
cn: 对建筑物的检查发现了几处安全违规。

en: Regular inspection of equipment is essential to prevent accidents.
cn: 定期检查设备对于预防事故至关重要。

en: If you put your back into the project, you'll finish it on time.
cn: 如果你全力以赴做这个项目，就能按时完成。

en: She put her back into training and won the competition.
cn: 她全力以赴训练，赢得了比赛。

en: We hiked to the top of the mountain to enjoy the stunning scenery.
cn: 我们徒步到山顶欣赏令人惊叹的风景。

en: The coastal drive offers stunning scenery with ocean views.
cn: 沿海公路提供了带有海景的令人惊叹的风景。

en: The government must take measures to reduce pollution in the city.
cn: 政府必须采取措施减少城市污染。

en: Companies should take measures to protect customer data from breaches.
cn: 公司应采取措施保护客户数据免受泄露。

en: Can you put me down for the charity run next weekend?
cn: 你能为我报名参加下周末的慈善跑步吗？

en: I'll put you down for two tickets to the concert.
cn: 我会为你登记两张音乐会的票。

en: Is the new movie anything like the book it's based on?
cn: 新电影有点像它基于的那本书吗？

en: This dessert isn't anything like the one I had in Italy.
cn: 这个甜点一点也不像我在意大利吃过的那个。

en: In this sense, art can be seen as a form of communication.
cn: 在这个意义上，艺术可以被视为一种沟通形式。

en: The theory is useful in this sense, but it has limitations in others.
cn: 在这个意义上，这个理论很有用，但在其他方面有局限性。

en: We plan family activities every weekend to spend quality time together.
cn: 我们每个周末都计划家庭活动，共度美好时光。

en: Board games and picnics are popular family activities during holidays.
cn: 棋盘游戏和野餐是假期中受欢迎的家庭活动。

en: Studies often explore gender differences in communication styles.
cn: 研究经常探讨沟通风格中的性别差异。

en: Gender differences in career choices can be influenced by social norms.
cn: 职业选择中的性别差异可能受社会规范影响。

en: The sailors were at the mercy of the storm.
cn: 水手们任由暴风雨摆布。

en: Small businesses are often at the mercy of market fluctuations.
cn: 小企业常常受市场波动支配。

en: People often label him as a genius because of his early achievements.
cn: 由于他早期的成就，人们经常将他标记为天才。

en: The product was labeled as organic to attract health-conscious consumers.
cn: 该产品被标记为有机，以吸引注重健康的消费者。

en: They exchanged traditional wedding vows in the ceremony.
cn: 他们在仪式上交换了传统的婚礼誓言。

en: Writing personalized wedding vows made the day more meaningful.
cn: 撰写个性化的结婚誓词让这一天更有意义。

en: I like to take a walk in the park after dinner.
cn: 我喜欢晚饭后在公园散步。

en: She decided to take a walk to clear her mind.
cn: 她决定走一走以理清思绪。

en: You need to make an effort to improve your grades.
cn: 你需要努力提高你的成绩。

en: They made a concerted effort to finish the project on time.
cn: 他们齐心协力按时完成了项目。

en: The company has been in the red for three consecutive quarters.
cn: 该公司已连续三个季度亏损。

en: After the unexpected expenses, their account went into the red.
cn: 意外开支后，他们的账户出现了负债。

en: This table is made of solid oak.
cn: 这张桌子由实心橡木制成。

en: The team is made of experienced professionals.
cn: 这个团队由经验丰富的专业人士构成。

en: After retiring, they hope to lead a happy life in the countryside.
cn: 退休后，他们希望在乡村过着幸福的生活。

en: Simple pleasures can help you lead a happy life.
cn: 简单的快乐能帮助你过着幸福的生活。

en: Don't worry about the details; it will all come out in the wash.
cn: 别担心细节，最终都会真相大白的。

en: The misunderstandings will come out in the wash after we talk.
cn: 我们谈过后，误解最终会解决的。

en: Parents often concern themselves about their children's safety.
cn: 父母常常担心孩子的安全。

en: There is growing concern about climate change worldwide.
cn: 全球对气候变化的担忧日益增长。

en: Please take out the trash before you leave.
cn: 离开前请把垃圾带出去。

en: He decided to take out a loan to buy a car.
cn: 他决定贷款买车。

en: A sedentary lifestyle can lead to health problems like obesity and heart disease.
cn: 久坐的生活方式可能导致肥胖和心脏病等健康问题。

en: To combat a sedentary lifestyle, try to incorporate more physical activity into your day.
cn: 为了对抗久坐的生活方式，尝试在日常生活中加入更多体育活动。

en: The baby weighed 3.5 kilograms at birth.
cn: 这个婴儿出生时重3.5公斤。

en: Some genetic conditions are detectable at birth.
cn: 一些遗传病在出生时就能检测出来。

en: She was unaware of the changes in the schedule.
cn: 她不知道日程表的变化。

en: Many people are unaware of the risks involved.
cn: 许多人未意识到涉及的风险。

en: The army advanced in strength to secure the area.
cn: 军队大量推进以保卫该地区。

en: Support for the candidate grew in strength over time.
cn: 对候选人的支持在力量上随时间增长。

en: The archer aimed at the target and released the arrow.
cn: 弓箭手瞄准目标并射出了箭。

en: This policy aims at reducing pollution levels.
cn: 这项政策旨在降低污染水平。

en: I need to have a word with my boss about the project.
cn: 我需要和我的老板谈一谈这个项目。

en: Can I have a word with you in private?
cn: 我能和你私下简短交谈一下吗？

en: The young athlete has a lot of promise in her career.
cn: 这位年轻运动员在她的职业生涯中很有前途。

en: This new technology has a lot of promise for future applications.
cn: 这项新技术对未来应用大有希望。

en: After the investigation, he was found to have clean hands.
cn: 调查后，他被发现是清白的。

en: In this scandal, few politicians have clean hands.
cn: 在这起丑闻中，很少有政客没有过错。

en: At the risk of sounding rude, I must disagree with your proposal.
cn: 冒着听起来粗鲁的风险，我必须不同意你的提议。

en: She spoke up at the risk of losing her job.
cn: 她冒着失去工作的风险发表了意见。

en: Hold on tight to the railing when climbing the stairs.
cn: 爬楼梯时紧紧抓住栏杆。

en: Hold on, I'll be right back with your order.
cn: 等一下，我马上把你的订单拿来。

en: Chinese New Year is based on the lunar calendar.
cn: 春节是基于农历的。

en: Many traditional festivals follow the lunar calendar.
cn: 许多传统节日遵循农历。

en: Adult education programs help people learn new skills later in life.
cn: 成人教育项目帮助人们在晚年学习新技能。

en: Many universities offer adult education courses in the evenings.
cn: 许多大学在晚上提供成人教育课程。

en: Good urban planning can reduce traffic congestion in cities.
cn: 良好的城市规划可以减少城市交通拥堵。

en: She studied urban planning to help design sustainable communities.
cn: 她学习城市规划以帮助设计可持续社区。

en: Are you all set for the trip tomorrow?
cn: 你为明天的旅行准备就绪了吗？

en: The documents are all set for the meeting.
cn: 会议文件已全部准备就绪。

en: We need to budget for unexpected expenses this year.
cn: 我们需要为今年的意外开支做预算。

en: Did you budget for the new equipment in the project?
cn: 你在项目中为新设备做预算了吗？

en: The company has a bad reputation for poor customer service.
cn: 这家公司因客户服务差而名声不好。

en: He earned a bad reputation after the scandal.
cn: 丑闻后他获得了坏名声。

en: Trying to fix that old car is like making a silk purse out of a sow's ear.
cn: 试图修理那辆旧车就像用猪耳朵做丝绸钱包一样。

en: With creativity, she made a silk purse out of a sow's ear by turning junk into art.
cn: 凭借创造力，她化腐朽为神奇，将垃圾变成了艺术品。

en: The decision was cut and dried after the committee voted.
cn: 委员会投票后，决定已成定局。

en: There's no cut and dried answer to this complex problem.
cn: 这个复杂问题没有明确的答案。

en: If you want the promotion, go for it!
cn: 如果你想升职，就努力争取吧！

en: He decided to go for it and start his own business.
cn: 他决定大胆尝试，创办自己的企业。

en: The departments worked in concert to complete the project on time.
cn: 各部门协同工作，按时完成了项目。

en: They acted in concert to address the environmental issue.
cn: 他们一致行动以解决环境问题。

en: I heard someone knock at the door late at night.
cn: 我深夜听到有人敲门。

en: Please knock at the office before entering.
cn: 进入前请先敲办公室的门。

en: The company poured millions into research and development.
cn: 公司投入数百万用于研发。

en: She poured her heart into writing the novel.
cn: 她倾注心血写作这部小说。

en: Many innovations in technology are adopted quickly in the developing world.
cn: 许多技术创新在发展中世界被迅速采用。

en: Aid organizations focus on improving healthcare in the developing world.
cn: 援助组织专注于改善发展中世界的医疗保健。

en: She took exception to the unfair criticism of her work.
cn: 她对自己作品受到的不公正批评表示异议。

en: I must take exception to that misleading statement.
cn: 我必须反对那个误导性的陈述。

en: Can you keep an eye on my bag while I go to the restroom?
cn: 我去洗手间时，你能照看一下我的包吗？

en: We need to keep an eye on the stock market trends.
cn: 我们需要留意股市趋势。

en: I'd like to change this shirt for a larger size.
cn: 我想把这件衬衫换成大一号的。

en: She changed her euros for dollars at the airport.
cn: 她在机场把欧元换成了美元。

en: The new fashion trend swept into the city last spring.
cn: 去年春天，新的时尚潮流席卷了这座城市。

en: He swept into the room with confidence.
cn: 他自信地迅速进入房间。

en: The manager has an eye on the new employee's performance.
cn: 经理关注着新员工的表现。

en: I've had my eye on that house for sale for months.
cn: 我关注那栋待售的房子好几个月了。

en: It's time to throw out these old magazines.
cn: 是时候扔掉这些旧杂志了。

en: The bouncer threw out the unruly patron from the bar.
cn: 保镖将不守规矩的顾客赶出了酒吧。

en: We placed an order for 100 units with the supplier.
cn: 我们向供应商订购了100件商品。

en: You can place an order online or by phone.
cn: 您可以在线或通过电话下订单。

en: We love to do outdoor activities like hiking and cycling on weekends.
cn: 我们喜欢在周末进行徒步和骑行等户外活动。

en: The camp encourages children to do outdoor activities to stay active.
cn: 营地鼓励孩子们进行户外活动以保持活力。

en: The teacher had to step in when the argument got heated.
cn: 争论激烈时，老师不得不介入。

en: The government stepped in to stabilize the economy.
cn: 政府介入以稳定经济。

en: His prediction about the election results was off the mark.
cn: 他对选举结果的预测不准确。

en: The sales estimates were completely off the mark.
cn: 销售估算完全偏离了目标。

en: The team agreed on a new strategy for the project.
cn: 团队就项目的新策略达成了一致。

en: They couldn't agree on a price for the car.
cn: 他们无法就汽车的价格达成一致。

en: We had to make a detour due to road construction.
cn: 由于道路施工，我们不得不绕道。

en: Let's make a detour to visit the old castle.
cn: 我们绕道去参观那座古堡吧。

en: Without a clear plan, we're just running in circles.
cn: 没有明确的计划，我们只是在原地打转。

en: The debate ran in circles without reaching a conclusion.
cn: 辩论毫无进展，没有得出结论。

en: The country is facing a large budget deficit this year.
cn: 该国今年面临巨大的预算赤字。

en: Reducing the budget deficit is a priority for the government.
cn: 减少预算赤字是政府的优先事项。

en: Follow the instructions step by step to assemble the furniture.
cn: 按照说明一步一步地组装家具。

en: She explained the process step by step to the new employees.
cn: 她向新员工逐步解释了流程。

en: She stood up to the bully and told him to stop.
cn: 她抵抗了霸凌者，让他停止。

en: The material can stand up to extreme weather conditions.
cn: 这种材料能抵抗极端天气条件。

en: Children are prone to catching colds in winter.
cn: 孩子们在冬天容易感冒。

en: He is prone to making mistakes under pressure.
cn: 他在压力下容易犯错。

en: You can do currency exchange at the airport or a bank.
cn: 您可以在机场或银行进行货币兑换。

en: The currency exchange rate fluctuates daily.
cn: 货币汇率每天波动。

en: He decided to break with tradition and start his own business.
cn: 他决定打破传统，自己创业。

en: The company broke with its old supplier due to quality issues.
cn: 由于质量问题，公司与旧供应商决裂了。

en: Drinking alcohol to excess can harm your health.
cn: 过量饮酒会损害健康。

en: She works to excess, often neglecting her personal life.
cn: 她工作过度，常常忽视个人生活。

en: There's a grocery store close by, just a five-minute walk.
cn: 附近有家杂货店，步行只需五分钟。

en: He lives close by, so we often meet for coffee.
cn: 他住在附近，所以我们经常一起喝咖啡。

en: Could you bring back some milk from the store?
cn: 你能从商店带些牛奶回来吗？

en: The new policy aims to bring back traditional values.
cn: 新政策旨在恢复传统价值观。

en: The festival is held year after year in this town.
cn: 这个小镇年复一年地举办这个节日。

en: She volunteers at the shelter year after year.
cn: 她年复一年地在收容所做志愿者。

en: Let's get on with the meeting; we're running late.
cn: 我们继续开会吧，已经迟了。

en: How are you getting on with your new project?
cn: 你的新项目进展如何？

en: We need to make arrangements for the conference next month.
cn: 我们需要为下个月的会议做安排。

en: She made all the travel arrangements herself.
cn: 她亲自做了所有的旅行安排。

en: I think of him as a mentor.
cn: 我把他看作导师。

en: She thinks of this place as her second home.
cn: 她把这个地方当作她的第二个家。

en: It's hard to distinguish the original from the copy.
cn: 很难区分原件和复印件。

en: Can you distinguish right from wrong in this situation?
cn: 在这种情况下，你能辨别是非吗？

en: She took the sudden change in plans in her stride.
cn: 她从容应对了计划的突然变化。

en: He takes criticism in his stride and uses it to improve.
cn: 他轻松面对批评并以此改进自己。

en: Climate change has a significant impact on global weather patterns.
cn: 气候变化对全球天气模式有重大影响。

en: Her speech had a profound impact on the audience.
cn: 她的演讲对观众产生了深远的影响。

en: Please put away your toys after playing.
cn: 玩完后请把玩具收起来。

en: She put away the groceries in the kitchen.
cn: 她把杂货放在厨房里收好。

en: I prefer shopping at online shops for convenience.
cn: 为了方便，我更喜欢在网店购物。

en: Many online shops offer discounts during holiday seasons.
cn: 许多在线商店在节假日期间提供折扣。

en: You need to install an internet plug-in to view this content.
cn: 你需要安装一个互联网插件才能查看这个内容。

en: This browser supports various internet plug-ins for enhanced functionality.
cn: 这个浏览器支持多种互联网插件以增强功能。

en: She attributes her success to hard work.
cn: 她把成功归因于努力工作。

en: The accident was attributed to human error.
cn: 这次事故被归因于人为错误。

en: The dog ripped apart the sofa cushions.
cn: 狗把沙发垫子撕碎了。

en: He ripped apart the letter in anger.
cn: 他生气地把信撕碎了。

en: The rules apply to everyone, irrespective of their position.
cn: 规则适用于所有人，不论其职位。

en: He continued his work irrespective of the noise around him.
cn: 他不顾周围的噪音继续工作。

en: After traveling for months, I got my fill of adventure.
cn: 旅行几个月后，我得到了足够的冒险体验。

en: He got his fill of sweets at the party.
cn: 他在派对上吃够了糖果。

en: The sailors cast off the mooring lines and set sail.
cn: 水手们解开系泊绳，扬帆起航。

en: She decided to cast off her old habits and start fresh.
cn: 她决定抛弃旧习惯，重新开始。

en: He groped around in the dark for the light switch.
cn: 他在黑暗中摸索着找电灯开关。

en: She groped around her bag for her keys.
cn: 她在包里摸索着找钥匙。

en: He lost his heart to her the moment they met.
cn: 他一见到她就爱上了她。

en: She lost her heart to the charming countryside.
cn: 她爱上了迷人的乡村。

en: They get by on a small pension each month.
cn: 他们每月靠微薄的养老金勉强过活。

en: During the crisis, many families had to get by on less food.
cn: 危机期间，许多家庭不得不靠更少的食物勉强维持。

en: I would rather stay home than go out in the rain.
cn: 我宁愿待在家里也不愿冒雨外出。

en: She would rather read a book than watch TV.
cn: 她更愿意读书而不是看电视。

en: Stick around after the meeting; we have more to discuss.
cn: 会议结束后留下来，我们还有更多要讨论。

en: He decided to stick around town for a few more days.
cn: 他决定在镇上多逗留几天。

en: Seeing that it's raining, we should cancel the picnic.
