cn: 鉴于正在下雨，我们应该取消野餐。

en: Seeing that you're tired, let's finish early.
cn: 由于你累了，我们早点结束吧。

en: In the circumstances, we decided to postpone the meeting.
cn: 在这种情况下，我们决定推迟会议。

en: Given the bad weather, in the circumstances, it's best to stay indoors.
cn: 鉴于恶劣天气，在这种情况下，最好待在室内。

en: The customer placed a special order for a custom-made dress.
cn: 顾客下了一个定制连衣裙的特殊订单。

en: We need to process this special order quickly to meet the deadline.
cn: 我们需要快速处理这个特殊订单以赶上截止日期。

en: Let's go Dutch for dinner tonight to keep it fair.
cn: 今晚晚餐我们各付各的账，这样公平。

en: They always go Dutch when they go out with friends.
cn: 他们和朋友出去时总是AA制。

en: The rocket is scheduled to blast off at noon tomorrow.
cn: 火箭计划于明天中午发射升空。

en: We watched the spacecraft blast off into the sky.
cn: 我们看着航天器发射升空。

en: She was promoted to associate professor after years of research.
cn: 经过多年研究，她被提升为副教授。

en: The associate professor teaches advanced courses in biology.
cn: 这位副教授教授生物学的高级课程。

en: She took a course to fill knowledge gaps in computer science.
cn: 她参加了一门课程来填补计算机科学的知识空白。

en: Reading books helps fill knowledge gaps about history.
cn: 阅读书籍有助于填补历史知识空白。

en: Old habits die hard, so it takes time to break them.
cn: 旧习惯很难改掉，所以需要时间。

en: Prejudices die hard in some communities.
cn: 在某些社区，偏见很难消除。

en: All their efforts came to naught when the project was canceled.
cn: 项目取消时，他们所有的努力都化为乌有。

en: His plans to start a business came to naught due to lack of funding.
cn: 他创业的计划因缺乏资金而失败。

en: He saw the writing on the wall and started looking for a new job.
cn: 他看到了不祥之兆，开始寻找新工作。

en: Investors saw the writing on the wall and pulled out their funds.
cn: 投资者预见到失败，撤回了资金。

en: She glanced at her watch to check the time.
cn: 她瞥了一眼手表看时间。

en: He glanced at the newspaper headlines while having coffee.
cn: 他喝咖啡时匆匆看了一眼报纸标题。

en: People across the world celebrate New Year in different ways.
cn: 全世界的人们以不同的方式庆祝新年。

en: The news spread across the world within hours.
cn: 消息在几小时内传遍全球。

en: I can't speak for everyone, but I support the idea.
cn: 我不能代表所有人发言，但我支持这个想法。

en: The lawyer spoke for the defendant in court.
cn: 律师在法庭上为被告辩护。

en: I like to take a nap after lunch to recharge.
cn: 我喜欢午饭后小睡一会儿来恢复精力。

en: The baby took a nap in the afternoon.
cn: 宝宝下午打了个盹。

en: She is studying comparative education to understand different school systems.
cn: 她正在学习比较教育学，以了解不同的学校系统。

en: Comparative education helps improve policies by learning from other countries.
cn: 比较教育学通过向其他国家学习，有助于改进政策。

en: I need to deposit money into my check account.
cn: 我需要把钱存入我的支票账户。

en: She uses her check account to pay bills online.
cn: 她用支票账户在线支付账单。

en: That old car has seen better days; it's time for a new one.
cn: 那辆旧车曾经风光过，现在是时候换辆新的了。

en: The neighborhood has seen better days, but it's still charming.
cn: 这个社区曾经风光过，但依然迷人。

en: The construction project is behind schedule due to bad weather.
cn: 由于天气恶劣，建筑工程落后于计划。

en: We're running behind schedule, so we need to work overtime.
cn: 我们进度落后了，所以需要加班。

en: The lead runner set the pace for the marathon.
cn: 领跑者为马拉松设定了节奏。

en: Our company sets the pace in innovation.
cn: 我们公司在创新方面领先。

en: The new law will be in effect starting next month.
cn: 新法律将从下个月开始生效。

en: The contract is still in effect until December.
cn: 合同在十二月前仍然有效。

en: The child made faces at his sister during dinner.
cn: 晚餐时，那个孩子对他姐姐做鬼脸。

en: Stop making faces at the teacher; it's disrespectful.
cn: 别对老师做鬼脸，这是不尊重的。

en: Deforestation causes severe environmental destruction.
cn: 森林砍伐导致严重的环境破坏。

en: We must prevent further environmental destruction.
cn: 我们必须防止进一步的环境破坏。

en: Compare this model with the older version to see the improvements.
cn: 将这个型号与旧版本比较，看看改进之处。

en: It's unfair to compare her performance with his.
cn: 将她的表现与他的比较是不公平的。

en: The government works to protect heritage buildings from demolition.
cn: 政府努力保护历史建筑免遭拆除。

en: We must protect heritage buildings to preserve our history.
cn: 我们必须保护历史建筑以保存我们的历史。

en: The plan is starting to take shape after our meeting.
cn: 会议后，计划开始成形。

en: The sculpture took shape under the artist's hands.
cn: 雕塑在艺术家的手下逐渐成形。

en: In the case of an emergency, follow the evacuation plan.
cn: 在紧急情况下，遵循疏散计划。

en: In the case of a tie, we'll have a rematch.
cn: 在平局的情况下，我们将进行重赛。

en: I studied hard and finally made it into college.
cn: 我努力学习，终于成功进入了大学。

en: Can you make it to the party on time?
cn: 你能准时赶到派对吗？

en: We derive energy from food.
cn: 我们从食物中获取能量。

en: The word is derived from Latin.
cn: 这个词来源于拉丁语。

en: She sent for a doctor when her child was sick.
cn: 孩子生病时，她派人去请医生。

en: The manager sent for the report immediately.
cn: 经理立即派人去取报告。

en: How much does this cost?
cn: 这个多少钱？

en: How much time do we have left?
cn: 我们还剩多少时间？

en: Don't forget to set the alarm clock for 6 AM.
cn: 别忘了把闹钟设置在早上六点。

en: I set the alarm clock every night before bed.
cn: 我每晚睡前都设置闹钟。

en: I was surprised to see him at the event.
cn: 我很惊讶在活动中见到他。

en: She'll be surprised to hear the news.
cn: 她听到这个消息会感到惊讶的。

en: There are millions of dollars in circulation.
cn: 有数百万美元在流通中。

en: The rumor is still in circulation despite being debunked.
cn: 尽管已被揭穿，谣言仍在传播。

en: All safety measures are in place before the experiment.
cn: 实验前所有安全措施都已到位。

en: The new policy is in place as of today.
cn: 新政策从今天起生效。

en: The hotel is adjacent to the beach, offering stunning ocean views.
cn: 酒店紧邻海滩，提供壮丽的海景。

en: Our office building is adjacent to the main train station for easy commuting.
cn: 我们的办公楼毗邻主要火车站，通勤方便。

en: I look forward to meeting you at the conference next week.
cn: 我期待在下周的会议上见到你。

en: She looks forward to starting her new job and learning new skills.
cn: 她期待开始新工作并学习新技能。

en: The rent is due on the first of every month, so please pay promptly.
cn: 租金每月一号到期，请及时支付。

en: Your library books are due tomorrow; remember to return them to avoid fines.
cn: 你的图书馆书籍明天到期，记得归还以避免罚款。

en: Let's establish some ground rules for the meeting.
cn: 让我们为会议制定一些基本规则。

en: The ground rules are simple: no talking during the test.
cn: 基本规则很简单：考试期间不准说话。

en: We need to clean up the kitchen after cooking.
cn: 做饭后我们需要清理厨房。

en: The volunteers helped clean up the park.
cn: 志愿者们帮助清理公园。

en: The company plans to open new retail outlets in suburban areas to reach more customers.
cn: 公司计划在郊区开设新的零售店，以接触更多客户。

en: These retail outlets offer a wide range of products, from electronics to clothing.
cn: 这些零售店提供从电子产品到服装的广泛产品。

en: He didn't get his dream job, so he had to settle for a lower-paying position.
cn: 他没有得到梦想的工作，所以不得不勉强接受一个薪水较低的职位。

en: We couldn't find the perfect house, so we settled for one that met most of our needs.
cn: 我们找不到完美的房子，所以将就了一个满足大部分需求的。

en: Many young adults struggle with debt because they spend more than they earn each month.
cn: 许多年轻人因每月支出超过收入而陷入债务困境。

en: To avoid financial trouble, it's important not to spend more than you earn over the long term.
cn: 为避免财务问题，长期来看不要入不敷出很重要。

en: The new skyscraper uses metal-frame construction for enhanced durability and flexibility.
cn: 新摩天大楼采用金属框架结构，以提高耐久性和灵活性。

en: Metal-frame construction is common in industrial buildings due to its cost-effectiveness.
cn: 金属框架结构在工业建筑中很常见，因为它具有成本效益。

en: After retirement, many people live on their pensions and savings.
cn: 退休后，许多人靠养老金和储蓄为生。

en: In remote areas, some communities live on farming and fishing for their livelihood.
cn: 在偏远地区，一些社区靠农业和捕鱼为生。

en: With advanced technology, our company gets the edge over competitors in the market.
cn: 凭借先进技术，我们公司在市场上胜过竞争对手。

en: She practiced daily to get the edge over her rivals in the upcoming tennis tournament.
cn: 她每天练习，以在即将到来的网球锦标赛中胜过对手。

en: The authorities seized the criminal's illegal earnings from fraud and money laundering.
cn: 当局没收了罪犯通过欺诈和洗钱获得的非法所得。

en: Tax evasion often involves hiding illegal earnings to avoid detection by the government.
cn: 逃税通常涉及隐藏非法收入以避免政府发现。

en: After losing his job, he cast about for new opportunities in different industries.
cn: 失业后，他在不同行业四处寻找新机会。

en: The detective cast about for clues to solve the mysterious case.
cn: 侦探四处寻找线索以解决这个神秘案件。

en: Many people rallied in support of the environmental protection bill to promote sustainability.
cn: 许多人集会支持环境保护法案以促进可持续性。

en: The company issued a statement in support of diversity and inclusion initiatives in the workplace.
cn: 公司发表声明支持工作场所的多样性和包容性倡议。

en: Even as the storm raged outside, the team continued working on the project indoors.
cn: 正当外面的风暴肆虐时，团队在室内继续项目工作。

en: She remained calm even as the pressure mounted during the final exam.
cn: 尽管期末考试压力增大，她仍保持冷静。

en: Domestic violence is a serious crime that affects millions of people worldwide each year.
cn: 家庭暴力是一种严重的犯罪，每年影响全球数百万人。

en: Organizations provide support and shelter for victims of domestic violence to help them escape abuse.
cn: 组织为家庭暴力受害者提供支持和庇护，帮助他们逃离虐待。

en: The new superhero movie broke records at the box office, earning over $1 billion worldwide.
cn: 新的超级英雄电影打破了票房纪录，全球收入超过10亿美元。

en: You can buy tickets for the concert at the box office or online through their website.
cn: 你可以在售票处或通过他们的网站在线购买音乐会门票。

en: Ever since she got promoted, she's had her nose in the air and ignores her old colleagues.
cn: 自从升职后，她就傲慢自大，不理睬老同事。

en: People who have their nose in the air often struggle to form genuine friendships.
cn: 自高自大的人常常难以建立真正的友谊。

en: The politician did a flip-flop on the tax issue, angering both supporters and opponents.
cn: 这位政治家在税收问题上改变立场，激怒了支持者和反对者。

en: Companies that do a flip-flop on environmental policies risk losing public trust.
cn: 在环境政策上出尔反尔的公司可能失去公众信任。

en: Bell-bottom pants went out of fashion in the 1980s but have made a comeback recently.
cn: 喇叭裤在20世纪80年代过时了，但最近又流行起来。

en: Some technology products quickly go out of fashion as newer models are released.
cn: 一些科技产品随着新机型发布而迅速过时。

en: His actions are at odds with his words, making it hard to trust him.
cn: 他的行动与言语不一致，让人难以信任他。

en: The new policy is at odds with the company's previous commitment to environmental sustainability.
cn: 新政策与公司先前对环境可持续性的承诺不一致。

en: Please pass on this message to your manager.
cn: 请把这个消息转交给你的经理。

en: He passed on his knowledge to the next generation.
cn: 他把知识传递给了下一代。

en: She puts on airs whenever she's around wealthy people.
cn: 她在有钱人身边时总是摆架子。

en: Don't put on airs just because you got a promotion.
cn: 别因为升职了就装腔作势。

en: Fresh water is in short supply in some arid regions.
cn: 在一些干旱地区，淡水供应短缺。

en: During the pandemic, masks were in short supply.
cn: 疫情期间，口罩供应短缺。

en: I like to surf the Internet in my free time.
cn: 我喜欢在空闲时间上网。

en: He surfs the Internet to find information for his research.
cn: 他上网为研究查找信息。

en: Both parents share child-rearing duties equally.
cn: 父母双方平等分担抚养孩子的责任。

en: Child-rearing duties can be challenging but rewarding.
cn: 抚养孩子的责任可能具有挑战性，但也很有回报。

en: I can't wait to see my family after this long trip.
cn: 这次长途旅行后，我迫不及待想见到家人。

en: She can't wait to start her new job next week.
cn: 她迫不及待想下周开始新工作。

en: Water is essential to human survival.
cn: 水对人类生存至关重要。

en: Trust is essential to a healthy relationship.
cn: 信任对健康的关系至关重要。

en: When she said she'd quit, she meant business.
cn: 她说要辞职时，是认真的。

en: The new manager means business about improving efficiency.
cn: 新经理对提高效率是动真格的。

en: I can't know right from wrong in this complex situation.
cn: 在这种复杂情况下，我无法辨别对错。

en: She knows a genuine diamond from a fake one.
cn: 她能区分真钻石和假钻石。

en: Parents should be good role models for their children.
cn: 父母应该成为孩子的好榜样。

en: Teachers often serve as good role models for students.
cn: 老师经常充当学生的好榜样。

en: The store offered a refund for the faulty goods.
cn: 商店对有缺陷的商品提供了退款。

en: Faulty goods can pose safety risks to consumers.
cn: 次品可能对消费者构成安全风险。

en: I am in sympathy with the victims of the disaster.
cn: 我同情灾难的受害者。

en: Many people are in sympathy with the workers' strike.
cn: 许多人支持工人的罢工。

en: It's hard to tell if he's joking or serious.
cn: 很难说他是开玩笑还是认真的。

en: It's hard to tell which option is better without more data.
cn: 没有更多数据，很难判断哪个选项更好。

en: His actions go against company policy.
cn: 他的行为违反了公司政策。

en: She decided to go against her parents' wishes.
cn: 她决定反对父母的意愿。

en: Before long, the sun will set and it will get dark.
cn: 不久以后，太阳会落山，天会变黑。

en: She'll be here before long, so let's wait.
cn: 她很快就会到这里，所以我们等等吧。

en: The celebrity got the red carpet treatment at the event.
cn: 这位名人在活动中受到了隆重接待。

en: When visiting the headquarters, we got the red carpet treatment.
cn: 访问总部时，我们享受了贵宾待遇。

en: He has an in with the manager, so he might get the job.
cn: 他与经理有交情，所以可能得到这份工作。

en: She has an in with the organizers, which helps her get tickets.
cn: 她与组织者有门路，这帮助她拿到票。

en: After a long day at work, she sat in her favorite chair at her ease.
cn: 工作了一整天后，她舒适地坐在她最喜欢的椅子上。

en: The guests were made to feel at their ease with the host's warm welcome.
cn: 主人的热情欢迎让客人们感到无拘无束。

en: The car began to pull away from the curb.
cn: 汽车开始从路边驶离。

en: She tried to pull away from his grip, but he held on tightly.
cn: 她试图从他的紧握中挣脱，但他抓得很紧。

en: This document is marked 'not for circulation' and should be kept confidential.
cn: 这份文件标记为'不供流通'，应保密。

en: The report is not for circulation outside the department.
cn: 这份报告不在部门外流通。

en: His controversial comment really made the feathers fly at the meeting.
cn: 他有争议的评论在会议上真的引起了骚动。

en: The new policy is sure to make the feathers fly among the employees.
cn: 新政策肯定会在员工中引发激烈争论。

en: As soon as the alarm sounded, the firefighters swung into action.
cn: 警报一响，消防员们就迅速采取行动。

en: The team swung into action to meet the tight deadline.
cn: 团队立即开始工作以赶上紧迫的截止日期。

en: The hospital invested in new medical equipment to improve patient care.
cn: 医院投资了新的医疗设备以改善病人护理。

en: Proper maintenance of medical equipment is essential for safety.
cn: 正确维护医疗设备对安全至关重要。

en: He was willing to face any punishment for his actions.
cn: 他愿意为自己的行为面对任何惩罚。

en: The criminal must face any punishment the court decides.
cn: 罪犯必须面对法庭决定的任何惩罚。

en: The application was rejected on the grounds of insufficient experience.
cn: 申请因经验不足的理由被拒绝。

en: He was dismissed on the grounds of misconduct.
cn: 他因行为不当的理由被解雇。

en: She took a part-time job to support her studies.
cn: 她找了一份兼职工作来支持她的学业。

en: Many students seek part-time jobs during the summer break.
cn: 许多学生在暑假期间寻找兼职工作。

en: We had to travel a long distance to attend the wedding.
cn: 我们不得不长途旅行去参加婚礼。

en: He enjoys traveling a long distance to explore new places.
cn: 他喜欢长途旅行去探索新地方。

en: The fireworks lit up the night sky.
cn: 烟花点亮了夜空。

en: She lit up the room with a bright smile.
cn: 她用灿烂的笑容照亮了房间。

en: He spent years building expertise in software development.
cn: 他花了多年时间积累软件开发的专业知识。

en: Continuous learning helps build expertise in any field.
cn: 持续学习有助于在任何领域培养专长。

en: She is doing research on climate change for her thesis.
cn: 她正在为她的论文对气候变化进行研究。

en: The team plans to do research on renewable energy sources.
cn: 团队计划对可再生能源进行研究。

en: The neglect of regular maintenance led to the machine's failure.
cn: 对定期维护的忽视导致了机器的故障。

en: There was a serious neglect of safety protocols at the construction site.
cn: 建筑工地上存在对安全协议的严重疏忽。

en: The strong wind blew away the papers from the table.
cn: 强风把桌子上的文件吹走了。

en: The storm blew away the roof of the old shed.
cn: 风暴吹走了旧棚屋的屋顶。

en: They are excited to have a baby next month.
cn: 他们很高兴下个月要生孩子。

en: She decided to have a baby after getting married.
cn: 她决定结婚后生孩子。

en: His friends put ideas into his head about quitting his job.
cn: 他的朋友们给他灌输了辞职的想法。

en: Don't put ideas into her head; she's too young for that.
cn: 不要给她灌输想法；她还太年轻不适合那样。

en: The fugitive had a price on his head for the robbery.
cn: 这名逃犯因抢劫被悬赏捉拿。

en: In the old west, outlaws often had a price on their heads.
cn: 在旧西部，亡命之徒经常被悬赏捉拿。

en: They plan to go abroad for their honeymoon.
cn: 他们计划去国外度蜜月。

en: Many students go abroad to study at universities.
cn: 许多学生出国去大学学习。

en: Please read through the contract before signing it.
cn: 请在签署前通读合同。

en: She read through the entire report to find the error.
cn: 她通读了整个报告以找出错误。

en: Can you remind me to call my mom later?
cn: 你能提醒我稍后给我妈妈打电话吗？

en: She reminded her friend to bring the documents to the meeting.
cn: 她提醒她的朋友把文件带到会议上。

en: Tourists marvel at the ancient architecture.
cn: 游客对古建筑感到惊叹。

en: She marveled at the child's artistic talent.
cn: 她对孩子的艺术天赋感到惊叹。

en: He manipulated his friend into lending him money.
cn: 他操纵朋友借给他钱。

en: The cult leader manipulated followers into giving up their possessions.
cn: 邪教领袖操纵追随者放弃财产。

en: The museum offers free of charge admission on Sundays.
cn: 博物馆周日提供免费入场。

en: The software update is free of charge for existing users.
cn: 软件更新对现有用户免费。

en: The workshop helps students achieve their creative potential.
cn: 研讨会帮助学生实现创造潜力。

en: With proper training, she achieved her creative potential as a writer.
cn: 经过适当训练，她实现了作为作家的创造潜力。

en: One dollar is equivalent to approximately 100 yen.
cn: 一美元大约相当于100日元。

en: His silence was equivalent to agreement.
cn: 他的沉默等同于同意。

en: The gang worked him over for refusing to pay.
cn: 帮派因他拒绝付款而殴打了他。

en: The mechanic worked over the engine to fix the problem.
cn: 机械师彻底检查发动机以解决问题。

en: He tends to run off at the mouth during meetings.
cn: 他开会时总爱喋喋不休。

en: Stop running off at the mouth and listen for a change.
cn: 别再说个不停，听一听别人的意见。

en: She works for a voluntary organization that helps the homeless.
cn: 她在一个帮助无家可归者的志愿组织工作。

en: The community relies on voluntary organizations for disaster relief.
cn: 社区依赖志愿组织进行救灾。

en: The project cost less than expected.
cn: 项目成本少于预期。

en: She has less than five minutes to finish.
cn: 她还有不到五分钟完成。

en: She teaches courses in biology at the university.
cn: 她在大学教授生物学课程。

en: He plans to teach courses online next semester.
cn: 他计划下学期在线教授课程。

en: After traveling for years, they decided to settle down in a small town.
cn: 旅行多年后，他们决定在一个小镇安定下来。

en: The children settled down to watch a movie.
cn: 孩子们平静下来看电影。

en: The news took a while to sink in.
cn: 这个消息过了一段时间才被理解。

en: Water slowly sinks into the dry soil.
cn: 水慢慢渗入干燥的土壤。

en: It becomes absolutely essential for students to practice regularly.
cn: 对学生来说，定期练习变得绝对必要。

en: Communication becomes absolutely essential for team success.
cn: 沟通对团队成功变得绝对必要。

en: She devotes herself to charitable work.
cn: 她致力于慈善工作。

en: He devoted himself to studying ancient languages.
cn: 他献身于研究古代语言。

en: The event turned out to be a great success.
cn: 活动结果非常成功。

en: The factory turns out 1000 units daily.
cn: 工厂每天生产1000个单位。

en: In this case, we should proceed with caution.
cn: 在这种情况下，我们应该谨慎进行。

en: The rule doesn't apply in this case.
cn: 规则在这种情况下不适用。

en: She brought up three children on her own.
cn: 她独自抚养了三个孩子。

en: They were brought up to respect their elders.
cn: 他们从小被教导要尊敬长辈。

en: With rising costs, it's hard to make both ends meet.
cn: 随着成本上升，很难收支平衡。

en: She works two jobs to make both ends meet.
cn: 她做两份工作以勉强维持生计。

en: Go ahead and start without me.
cn: 你们先开始吧，不用等我。

en: The project will go ahead as planned.
cn: 项目将按计划进行。

en: "Can you help me?" "You bet!"
cn: "你能帮我吗？" "当然！"

en: You bet I'll be there on time.
cn: 我当然会准时到。

en: He admitted stealing the money.
cn: 他承认偷了钱。

en: She admitted making a mistake.
cn: 她承认犯了错误。

en: Keep your chin up; things will get better.
cn: 振作起来，情况会好转的。

en: She kept her chin up despite the setbacks.
cn: 尽管遇到挫折，她仍然保持乐观。

en: I need to call about my appointment.
cn: 我需要打电话询问我的预约。

en: She called about the job advertisement.
cn: 她打电话询问招聘广告的事。

en: Technology is advancing in leaps and bounds.
cn: 科技正在飞速发展。

en: Her English improved in leaps and bounds.
cn: 她的英语进步神速。

en: He painted in the manner of Picasso.
cn: 他以毕加索的风格作画。

en: The speech was delivered in the manner of a formal address.
cn: 演讲以正式致辞的方式进行。

en: The new books are on order and will arrive next week.
cn: 新书已订购，下周会到货。

en: We have several items on order from the supplier.
cn: 我们从供应商那里订购了几件商品。

en: Let's talk over the details tomorrow.
cn: 我们明天讨论细节吧。

en: They talked over the problem and found a solution.
cn: 他们讨论了问题并找到了解决方案。

en: I booked us in at a hotel for the night.
cn: 我为我们预订了晚上的酒店。

en: She booked in early to avoid the rush.
cn: 她提前预订以避免拥挤。

en: The project was successful in all aspects.
cn: 这个项目在所有方面都很成功。

en: We need to improve in all aspects of our service.
cn: 我们需要在服务的所有方面进行改进。

en: The kids made a mess in the living room.
cn: 孩子们把客厅弄得一团糟。

en: I made a mess of the presentation.
cn: 我把演示搞砸了。

en: From an economic perspective, the policy is sound.
cn: 从经济角度来看，这项政策是合理的。

en: We need to consider the economic perspective of the decision.
cn: 我们需要考虑这个决定的经济视角。

en: The sofa takes up too much space in the room.
cn: 沙发在房间里占用了太多空间。

en: Old files are taking up space on the hard drive.
cn: 旧文件占用了硬盘空间。

en: He made up an excuse for being late.
cn: 他为迟到编造了一个借口。

en: The story was completely made up.
cn: 这个故事完全是虚构的。

en: Children depend on their parents for support.
cn: 孩子依赖父母的支持。

en: The success of the project depends on teamwork.
cn: 项目的成功依赖于团队合作。

en: I saw her the other day at the supermarket.
cn: 我前几天在超市看到了她。

en: We met for coffee the other day.
cn: 我们不久前一起喝了咖啡。

en: The bright colors attract attention.
cn: 鲜艳的颜色吸引注意力。

en: His loud voice attracted attention in the quiet library.
cn: 他响亮的声音在安静的图书馆里吸引了注意力。

en: The ship is bound for New York.
cn: 这艘船开往纽约。

en: We are bound for a vacation in Hawaii.
cn: 我们正前往夏威夷度假。

en: I always mix up the twins because they look so similar.
cn: 我总是混淆这对双胞胎，因为他们长得太像了。

en: Don't mix up the files; keep them organized.
cn: 别把文件弄混了，保持它们有序。

en: He turned up at the party an hour late.
cn: 他晚了一个小时才出现在派对上。

en: The missing keys turned up in the kitchen drawer.
cn: 丢失的钥匙在厨房抽屉里找到了。

en: I care about your well-being.
cn: 我关心你的健康。

en: She cares deeply about environmental issues.
cn: 她非常关心环境问题。

en: The lecture touched on the history of the region.
cn: 讲座简要提及了该地区的历史。

en: Her report touches on several key issues.
cn: 她的报告涉及了几个关键问题。

en: I got sick after eating spoiled food.
cn: 吃了变质的食物后我生病了。

en: She gets sick easily during flu season.
cn: 流感季节她很容易生病。

en: Activists spoke out against the new policy.
cn: 活动家们公开反对新政策。

en: She spoke out against injustice in her community.
cn: 她公开反对社区中的不公正现象。

en: The virus can transmit to humans from animals.
cn: 这种病毒可以从动物传染给人类。

en: Data is transmitted to the server via the internet.
cn: 数据通过互联网传输到服务器。

en: I have trouble with math problems.
cn: 我在数学题方面有困难。

en: She has trouble with public speaking.
cn: 她在公开演讲方面有困难。

en: In the argument, I sided with my friend.
cn: 在争论中，我支持我的朋友。

en: The judge sided with the plaintiff in the case.
cn: 法官在案件中站在原告一边。

en: It is advisable to book tickets in advance.
cn: 建议提前预订票。

en: It is advisable to consult a doctor if symptoms persist.
cn: 如果症状持续，建议咨询医生。

en: Eating fatty food regularly can lead to health issues.
cn: 经常吃高脂肪食物可能导致健康问题。

en: She avoids eating fatty food to maintain her weight.
cn: 她避免吃高脂肪食物以保持体重。

en: She gained proficiency in Spanish after living abroad.
cn: 在国外生活后，她精通了西班牙语。

en: He aims to gain proficiency in coding this year.
cn: 他目标在今年获得编程的熟练度。

en: The criminal was put to death for his crimes.
cn: 罪犯因其罪行被处死。

en: In ancient times, traitors were often put to death.
cn: 在古代，叛徒经常被处死。

en: Believe it or not, I once met a famous actor.
cn: 信不信由你，我曾经见过一位著名演员。

en: Believe it or not, the answer was right in front of us.
cn: 信不信由你，答案就在我们面前。

en: By analogy, we can understand this concept using a simple example.
cn: 通过类比，我们可以用一个简单的例子来理解这个概念。

en: He explained the complex theory by analogy to everyday life.
cn: 他通过类比日常生活来解释这个复杂理论。

en: The chairperson called the meeting to order.
cn: 主席宣布会议开始。

en: He called the crowd to order before the speech.
cn: 在演讲前，他维持了人群的秩序。

en: She is worthy to receive the award for her hard work.
cn: 她值得因努力工作而获得这个奖项。

en: This book is worthy to be read by everyone.
cn: 这本书值得每个人阅读。

en: In the name of justice, we must fight corruption.
cn: 以正义的名义，我们必须打击腐败。

en: He acted in the name of the company.
cn: 他以公司的名义行事。

en: Can you turn up the volume? I can't hear the movie.
cn: 你能把音量调高吗？我听不见电影的声音。

en: She turned up the heat to make the room warmer.
cn: 她调高了暖气，让房间更暖和。

en: In the negotiation, our company holds all the aces due to our market dominance.
cn: 在谈判中，由于我们的市场主导地位，我们公司占尽优势。

en: She holds all the aces in this project, so her decisions are final.
cn: 她在这个项目中掌控全局，所以她的决定是最终的。

en: Check the train schedule to see when the next express departs.
cn: 查看火车时刻表，看看下一班快车何时出发。

en: The train schedule is posted at every station for passengers' convenience.
cn: 为方便乘客，每个车站都张贴了火车时刻表。

en: We attend church service every Sunday morning at 10 AM.
cn: 我们每周日上午10点参加教堂礼拜。

en: The church service included hymns, prayers, and a sermon.
cn: 教堂礼拜包括赞美诗、祈祷和布道。

en: The two countries entered into a trade agreement to boost economic ties.
cn: 两国进入了一项贸易协议，以加强经济联系。

en: We should enter into negotiations to resolve this dispute amicably.
cn: 我们应该进入谈判，友好解决这一争端。

en: Employees must sign out when leaving the office for security reasons.
cn: 出于安全原因，员工离开办公室时必须签退。

en: Don't forget to sign out of your email account on public computers.
cn: 在公共电脑上不要忘记注销你的电子邮件账户。

en: In all probability, the meeting will be postponed due to the storm.
cn: 由于暴风雨，会议很可能被推迟。

en: She will, in all probability, win the award given her outstanding performance.
cn: 鉴于她的出色表现，她十有八九会赢得这个奖项。

en: Fasten on your seatbelt before the plane takes off.
cn: 飞机起飞前，请系紧安全带。

en: He fastened on the lid to keep the contents secure.
cn: 他固定了盖子，以确保内容物安全。

en: He is proficient at playing the piano, having practiced for years.
cn: 他精通弹钢琴，已经练习多年。

en: She became proficient at coding after completing the intensive course.
cn: 完成强化课程后，她精通了编码。

en: Can you hold the fort while I'm away on vacation next week?
cn: 我下周去度假时，你能坚守岗位吗？

en: She held the fort during the crisis, ensuring the team stayed on track.
cn: 在危机期间，她维持了局面，确保团队保持在正轨上。

en: The school system in this country includes primary, secondary, and tertiary education.
cn: 这个国家的学校体系包括初等、中等和高等教育。

en: Reforms are needed to improve the efficiency of the school system.
cn: 需要改革来提高学校体系的效率。

en: Everyone should have their say in the decision-making process.
cn: 在决策过程中，每个人都应该发表意见。

en: After listening to others, she finally had her say on the matter.
cn: 听完别人的意见后，她终于就此事表达了自己的观点。

en: His research ranges over various topics in environmental science.
cn: 他的研究涉及环境科学的多个主题。

en: The discussion ranged over issues from politics to economics.
cn: 讨论涵盖了从政治到经济的各种问题。

en: Please move back to allow the ambulance to pass through.
cn: 请后退，让救护车通过。

en: After living abroad, they decided to move back to their hometown.
cn: 在国外生活后，他们决定搬回故乡。

en: He behaved selfishly by taking all the credit for the team's work.
cn: 他行为自私，把团队工作的功劳全归自己。

en: Children sometimes behave selfishly when they don't want to share their toys.
cn: 孩子们有时不想分享玩具时会行为自私。

en: She attributes her success to hard work and perseverance.
cn: 她将自己的成功归因于努力工作和坚持不懈。

en: The accident was attributed to human error rather than mechanical failure.
cn: 这起事故被归因于人为错误，而非机械故障。

en: This pottery was made by hand, not by machine.
cn: 这件陶器是手工制作的，不是机器制造的。

en: She delivered the letter by hand to ensure it reached him personally.
cn: 她亲手递送了这封信，以确保他能亲自收到。

en: Students use a meal card to pay for food in the campus cafeteria.
cn: 学生们用饭卡在校园食堂支付餐费。

en: The company provides employees with a meal card as part of their benefits.
cn: 公司为员工提供餐卡，作为福利的一部分。

en: He cast around for a solution to the problem.
cn: 他四处寻找问题的解决方案。

en: They cast around for a new location to hold the event.
cn: 他们四处寻找举办活动的新地点。

en: I need to get started on my homework before dinner.
cn: 我需要在晚餐前开始做作业。

en: She got started on the project as soon as she received the instructions.
cn: 她一收到指示就开始了这个项目。

en: His excuses are starting to wear thin with his boss.
cn: 他的借口开始让老板感到厌烦了。

en: The novelty of the new gadget wore thin after a few weeks.
cn: 新小玩意的新鲜感几周后就消失了。

en: The periodic table organizes all known chemical elements based on their properties.
cn: 元素周期表根据性质组织了所有已知的化学元素。

en: Oxygen and hydrogen are common chemical elements found in water.
cn: 氧和氢是水中常见的化学元素。

en: I dozed off during the boring lecture.
cn: 我在无聊的讲座中打瞌睡了。

en: She dozed off on the couch while watching TV.
cn: 她看电视时在沙发上打瞌睡了。

en: Modern household appliances make daily chores much easier.
cn: 现代家用电器使日常家务变得容易得多。

en: They bought new household appliances for their kitchen renovation.
cn: 他们为厨房翻新购买了新的家用电器。

en: She took a liking to the new neighbor after their first conversation.
cn: 第一次交谈后，她就喜欢上了新邻居。

en: He quickly took a liking to the city's vibrant culture and friendly people.
cn: 他很快喜欢上了这座城市充满活力的文化和友好的人们。

en: She has a clear conscience about her decision to quit the job.
cn: 她对辞职的决定问心无愧。

en: He can sleep well at night because he has a clear conscience about his actions.
cn: 他晚上能睡得很好，因为他对自己的行为问心无愧。

en: He cheated on his girlfriend with a coworker.
cn: 他与一位同事对女友不忠。

en: She found out that her husband had been cheating on her.
cn: 她发现丈夫一直在对她不忠。

en: Many companies are going green by reducing their carbon footprint.
cn: 许多公司通过减少碳足迹来变得环保。

en: We decided to go green by installing solar panels on our roof.
cn: 我们决定通过在屋顶安装太阳能电池板来变得环保。

en: Intensive reading helps improve comprehension and vocabulary.
cn: 精读有助于提高理解和词汇量。

en: The course includes intensive reading of classic literature.
cn: 这门课程包括经典文学的精读。

en: She expressed delight at the surprise party.
cn: 她对惊喜派对表示高兴。

en: His delight at winning the award was evident.
cn: 他对获奖的欣喜是显而易见的。

en: Get your hands off my phone!
cn: 把你的手从我的手机上拿开！

en: She told him to get his hands off the artwork.
cn: 她告诉他不要碰那件艺术品。

en: Routine work can sometimes become monotonous.
cn: 日常工作有时会变得单调。

en: She handles the routine work efficiently to free up time for creative projects.
cn: 她高效处理日常工作，为创意项目腾出时间。

en: He doesn't like being pushed around by his colleagues.
cn: 他不喜欢被同事摆布。

en: The bully tried to push around the new student.
cn: 那个恶霸试图欺负新来的学生。

en: Teachers aim to inspire the next generation to pursue their dreams.
cn: 教师旨在激励下一代追求他们的梦想。

en: His achievements in science continue to inspire the next generation.
cn: 他在科学上的成就继续激励着下一代。

en: The Gregorian calendar is a solar calendar used worldwide.
cn: 公历是世界范围内使用的阳历。

en: Solar calendars are based on the Earth's revolution around the Sun.
cn: 阳历基于地球绕太阳的公转。

en: We stood in awe of the majestic mountain range.
cn: 我们敬畏地站立在雄伟的山脉前。

en: The audience stood in awe at the end of the powerful performance.
cn: 观众在强有力的表演结束时感到敬畏。

en: The Eiffel Tower is one of the most famous architectural landmarks in the world.
cn: 埃菲尔铁塔是世界上最著名的建筑地标之一。

en: The city is known for its historical architectural landmarks.
cn: 这座城市以其历史建筑地标而闻名。

en: You need to focus on your studies to improve your grades.
cn: 你需要专注于学习以提高成绩。

en: The company is focusing on expanding its market share.
cn: 公司正专注于扩大其市场份额。

en: I'll stop by your office tomorrow to drop off the documents.
cn: 我明天会顺道去你办公室送文件。

en: Can you stop by the grocery store on your way home?
cn: 你回家路上能顺便去趟杂货店吗？

en: She learned about ecosystems in her environmental science class.
cn: 她在环境科学课上学习了生态系统。

en: The environmental science class includes field trips to study local habitats.
cn: 环境科学课包括实地考察研究当地栖息地。

en: The studio is known to produce high-quality films that win awards.
cn: 这家制片厂以制作获奖的高质量电影而闻名。

en: They aim to produce high-quality films that appeal to international audiences.
cn: 他们的目标是制作吸引国际观众的高质量电影。

en: After months of planning, she finally put pen to paper and started her novel.
cn: 经过数月的规划，她终于动笔开始写小说了。

en: He put pen to paper to draft the important letter.
cn: 他动笔起草了那封重要的信件。

en: He contracted an illness while traveling abroad.
cn: 他在国外旅行时感染了疾病。

en: It's important to wash hands to avoid contracting an illness.
cn: 洗手很重要，以避免感染疾病。

en: The train moved off from the station on time.
cn: 火车准时从车站出发了。

en: After the meeting, everyone moved off to their next appointments.
cn: 会议结束后，大家都离开去赴下一个约了。

en: A good leader can inspire loyalty among team members.
cn: 优秀的领导者能激发团队成员的忠诚。

en: The company's ethical practices inspire loyalty in its customers.
cn: 公司的道德实践赢得了客户的忠诚。

en: Her dream of becoming a doctor finally came true.
cn: 她成为医生的梦想终于实现了。

en: With hard work, your wishes can come true.
cn: 通过努力，你的愿望可以实现。

en: The company trades on its reputation for quality.
cn: 这家公司依赖其质量声誉。

en: He trades on his family connections to get ahead.
cn: 他利用家庭关系来取得成功。

en: The cost of learning a new language includes both time and money.
cn: 学习一门新语言的成本包括时间和金钱。

en: We must consider the cost of learning from our mistakes.
cn: 我们必须考虑从错误中学习的代价。

en: With her busy schedule, she's always on the move.
cn: 由于日程繁忙，她总是忙个不停。

en: The army was on the move towards the border.
cn: 军队正向边境移动。

en: She triumphed over her fears to give the speech.
cn: 她战胜了恐惧，发表了演讲。

en: The team triumphed over their rivals in the final match.
cn: 球队在决赛中战胜了对手。

en: The changes in policy are for the better.
cn: 政策的变化是为了好转。

en: Her health has changed for the better since she started exercising.
cn: 自从开始锻炼，她的健康状况有所改善。

en: The research method used in the study was a survey.
cn: 该研究中使用的研究方法是调查。

en: Choosing the right research method is crucial for valid results.
cn: 选择正确的研究方法对获得有效结果至关重要。

en: 'Doc' is short for 'doctor'.
cn: 'Doc' 是 'doctor' 的缩写。

en: The acronym 'NASA' is short for 'National Aeronautics and Space Administration'.
cn: 缩写 'NASA' 是 'National Aeronautics and Space Administration' 的缩写。

en: We haven't even reached first base with the new client yet.
cn: 我们和新客户甚至还没有取得初步进展。

en: To reach first base with the project, we need more funding.
cn: 为了在项目中取得初步进展，我们需要更多资金。

en: Discussions in the public sphere influence government policies.
cn: 公共领域的讨论影响政府政策。

en: Social media has expanded the public sphere for debate.
cn: 社交媒体扩大了辩论的公共领域。

en: The event attracted people from all walks of life.
cn: 这个活动吸引了各行各业的人。

en: In a democracy, leaders should represent all walks of life.
cn: 在民主国家，领导者应代表社会各阶层。

en: He always puts his oar in when we're discussing family matters.
cn: 我们讨论家庭事务时，他总是要插嘴干涉。

en: I wish she wouldn't put her oar in every time I make a decision.
cn: 我希望每次我做决定时她不要总是来干涉。

en: I'm dying to try the new restaurant in town.
cn: 我迫不及待想试试镇上的新餐厅。

en: She's dying to hear the results of the exam.
cn: 她渴望听到考试结果。

en: The accident resulted from a mechanical failure.
cn: 这次事故是由机械故障引起的。

en: Her success resulted from years of hard work.
cn: 她的成功源于多年的辛勤工作。

en: The professor will lecture on ancient history tomorrow.
cn: 教授明天将讲授古代史。

en: She lectured on the importance of environmental conservation.
cn: 她就环境保护的重要性进行了讲座。

en: The hotel is convenient to the airport, just a 10-minute drive.
cn: 这家酒店离机场很方便，开车只需10分钟。

en: This app makes it convenient to pay bills online.
cn: 这个应用让在线支付账单变得很方便。

en: She's a good listener, so people often confide in her.
cn: 她善于倾听，所以人们经常向她倾诉。

en: Being a good listener is an important skill in counseling.
cn: 善于倾听是咨询中的重要技能。

en: She made a fuss over the small stain on her dress.
cn: 她对裙子上的小污渍大惊小怪。

en: Don't make a fuss over the minor details; focus on the big picture.
cn: 不要对细节小题大做，关注大局。

en: The company sent out a questionnaire to gather customer feedback.
cn: 公司分发了一份问卷来收集客户反馈。

en: We'll send out a questionnaire to all participants after the event.
cn: 活动结束后，我们将向所有参与者寄出问卷。

en: After landing, proceed to baggage reclaim to collect your luggage.
cn: 降落后，请前往行李提取处领取您的行李。

en: The baggage reclaim area was crowded with passengers waiting for their bags.
cn: 行李提取处挤满了等待行李的乘客。

en: He has a strong sense of responsibility towards his family.
cn: 他对家庭有强烈的责任感。

en: A good leader should demonstrate a sense of responsibility in all actions.
cn: 一个好的领导者应在所有行动中表现出责任感。

en: His motivation for studying hard is to get a scholarship.
cn: 他努力学习的动机是为了获得奖学金。

en: Understanding one's motivation can help improve performance.
cn: 了解某人的动机有助于提高表现。

en: He lives off his savings while looking for a new job.
cn: 他靠积蓄生活，同时寻找新工作。

en: Some animals live off plants in the forest.
cn: 一些动物依靠森林中的植物为生。

en: She prefers to do her own thing rather than follow the crowd.
cn: 她更喜欢做自己的事，而不是随大流。

en: After retirement, he plans to do his own thing and travel the world.
cn: 退休后，他计划做自己的事，环游世界。

en: To sum up, the main points of the report are efficiency and cost reduction.
cn: 总结一下，报告的主要点是效率和成本降低。

en: She summed up the meeting in just a few sentences.
cn: 她用几句话概括了会议内容。

en: He made a pile by investing in tech stocks early on.
cn: 他早期投资科技股赚了一大笔钱。

en: She hopes to make a pile from her new business venture.
cn: 她希望从新的商业冒险中赚大钱。

en: She decided to take on the new project despite the challenges.
cn: 尽管有挑战，她决定承担这个新项目。

en: He took on extra responsibilities at work to prove his capability.
cn: 他在工作中承担了额外责任以证明自己的能力。

en: We're running late, so make it snappy with your packing!
cn: 我们要迟到了，所以打包快点！

en: The boss said to make it snappy with the report submission.
cn: 老板说报告提交要快点。

en: The CEO stepped down after the scandal was revealed.
cn: 丑闻曝光后，CEO辞职了。

en: He decided to step down from his position to spend more time with family.
cn: 他决定辞去职务，花更多时间陪伴家人。

en: She glanced down at her watch to check the time.
cn: 她低头瞥了一眼手表看时间。

en: He glanced down at the floor to avoid eye contact.
cn: 他低头瞥了一眼地板以避开眼神接触。

en: Many young athletes emulate idols like Michael Jordan.
cn: 许多年轻运动员模仿像迈克尔·乔丹这样的偶像。

en: She tries to emulate her idols by practicing daily.
cn: 她通过每天练习来努力效仿她的偶像。

en: The company will exhibit its new products at the international trade fair.
cn: 公司将在国际贸易展览会上展示其新产品。

en: Attending a trade fair is a great way to network with industry professionals.
cn: 参加贸易展览会是与行业专业人士建立联系的好方法。

en: If you want to succeed in business, take a leaf out of her book.
cn: 如果你想在商业上成功，就向她学习。

en: He took a leaf out of his mentor's book and started networking more.
cn: 他模仿导师的做法，开始更多地建立人脉。

en: That's a fair comment; I should have been more careful.
cn: 那是公正的评论；我应该更小心些。

en: The reviewer's points were fair comment on the book's weaknesses.
cn: 评论者的观点是对这本书弱点的公正评论。

en: The payment was made in error and will be refunded.
cn: 这笔付款是错误支付的，将被退还。

en: He was arrested in error due to mistaken identity.
cn: 他因身份错误而被误捕。

en: She came away from the meeting feeling optimistic.
cn: 她离开会议时感到乐观。

en: He came away from the accident with minor injuries.
cn: 他离开事故现场时只受了轻伤。

en: She took pains to ensure the report was accurate.
cn: 她费心确保报告准确无误。

en: He took great pains to explain the complex topic clearly.
cn: 他尽力清晰地解释这个复杂的话题。

en: You can vary the volume using the remote control.
cn: 你可以用遥控器调节音量。

en: She varied the volume of her voice to emphasize key points.
cn: 她调节了声音的音量以强调重点。

en: He was nominated for the Best Actor award.
cn: 他被提名最佳男演员奖。

en: They nominated her for the leadership position.
cn: 他们提名她担任领导职务。

en: She took a fancy to the antique vase in the shop.
cn: 她喜欢上了商店里的那个古董花瓶。

en: He took a fancy to her at first sight.
cn: 他对她一见钟情。

en: He felt a chill at his back as he walked through the dark alley.
cn: 当他走过黑暗的小巷时，他感到背后一阵寒意。

en: With his family at his back, he pursued his dreams confidently.
cn: 有家人的支持，他自信地追求梦想。

en: The guide showed the tourists around the historical site.
cn: 导游带游客参观了历史遗址。

en: She showed her new colleague around the office.
cn: 她带新同事参观了办公室。

en: In contrast to last year, sales have increased significantly.
cn: 与去年相比，销售额显著增加。

en: Her calm demeanor was in contrast to his nervousness.
cn: 她冷静的举止与他的紧张形成了对比。

en: His schedule conflicts with the meeting time.
cn: 他的日程与会议时间冲突。

en: Her beliefs conflict with the company's policies.
cn: 她的信仰与公司的政策相矛盾。

en: She worries about her son's safety when he travels alone.
cn: 她担心儿子独自旅行时的安全。

en: Don't worry about the small details; focus on the big picture.
cn: 不要担心小细节，专注于大局。

en: Celebrities who engage in illegal activities are bad role models for youth.
cn: 从事非法活动的名人是年轻人的坏榜样。

en: Parents should avoid being bad role models by setting a positive example.
cn: 父母应通过树立积极榜样来避免成为坏榜样。

en: In the race, he had the advantage of better training.
cn: 在比赛中，他因更好的训练而具有优势。

en: She has the advantage of experience over her competitors.
cn: 她比竞争对手有经验优势。

en: The vase fell and broke to pieces on the floor.
cn: 花瓶掉在地上摔成了碎片。

en: He accidentally broke the glass to pieces.
cn: 他不小心把玻璃杯打碎了。

en: The room can hold up to 50 people.
cn: 这个房间最多可容纳50人。

en: It's up to you to decide whether to accept the offer.
cn: 由你决定是否接受这个提议。

en: The ownership of the land is still in dispute.
cn: 这块土地的所有权仍有争议。

en: The terms of the contract are in dispute between the parties.
cn: 合同的条款在各方之间存在争议。

en: She is occupied with preparing for the exam.
cn: 她正忙于准备考试。

en: He was occupied with work and couldn't attend the party.
cn: 他忙于工作，无法参加聚会。

en: The rain should ease off by this evening.
cn: 雨势应该会在今晚前减弱。

en: He needs to ease off on his workload to avoid burnout.
cn: 他需要减轻工作量以避免精疲力竭。

en: The new smartphone will be on sale starting next Monday.
cn: 新款智能手机将于下周一开售。

en: These shoes are on sale for 50% off this weekend.
cn: 这双鞋本周末打五折出售。

en: You shouldn't accept his apology at face value without understanding his true intentions.
cn: 你不应该不假思索地接受他的道歉，而不了解他的真实意图。

en: She tends to accept news reports at face value without questioning their sources.
cn: 她倾向于表面接受新闻报道，而不质疑其来源。

en: He earns his living as a freelance writer.
cn: 他靠做自由撰稿人谋生。

en: In rural areas, many people earn their living through farming.
cn: 在农村地区，许多人靠务农维持生计。

en: Balancing work and family life can be challenging.
cn: 平衡工作和家庭生活可能具有挑战性。

en: They enjoy a peaceful family life in the countryside.
cn: 他们在乡村享受着宁静的家庭生活。

en: I can't come to work today because I have a cold.
cn: 我今天不能来上班，因为我感冒了。

en: She's staying home to rest since she has a cold.
cn: 她因为感冒，待在家里休息。

en: Many people suffer from allergies during spring.
cn: 许多人在春季患有过敏症。

en: He suffers from chronic back pain.
cn: 他患有慢性背痛。

en: The government decided to take a hand in regulating the industry.
cn: 政府决定参与监管这个行业。

en: He offered to take a hand in organizing the charity event.
cn: 他主动提出参与组织慈善活动。

en: Soon after the meeting, they implemented the new policy.
cn: 会议结束后不久，他们就实施了新政策。

en: She arrived soon after I did.
cn: 她在我到达后不久就到了。

en: Reading books regularly can help you improve your vocabulary.
cn: 定期阅读书籍可以帮助你扩大词汇量。

en: She uses flashcards to improve her vocabulary for the language test.
cn: 她用抽认卡来扩大词汇量，以应对语言测试。

en: At a glance, the report seemed accurate, but upon closer inspection, errors were found.
cn: 乍看之下，报告似乎准确，但仔细检查后发现了错误。

en: She could tell at a glance that something was wrong.
cn: 她一眼就能看出有问题。

en: Proper disposal of industrial waste is crucial for environmental protection.
cn: 妥善处理工业废物对环境保护至关重要。

en: The factory was fined for illegally dumping industrial waste into the river.
cn: 这家工厂因非法向河流倾倒工业废物而被罚款。

en: This software is out of date and needs to be updated.
cn: 这个软件已经过时，需要更新。

en: His fashion sense is completely out of date.
cn: 他的时尚感完全过时了。

en: He put his reputation on the line by supporting the controversial policy.
cn: 他通过支持有争议的政策，押上了自己的声誉。

en: In the negotiation, they put everything on the line to secure the deal.
cn: 在谈判中，他们押上一切以确保达成交易。

en: He made a scene at the restaurant when his order was wrong.
cn: 当他的订单出错时，他在餐厅大吵大闹。

en: Please don't make a scene in public; it's embarrassing.
cn: 请不要在公共场合大吵大闹，这很尴尬。

en: He has been out of work for six months and is actively job hunting.
cn: 他已经失业六个月，正在积极找工作。

en: During the recession, many people were out of work.
cn: 在经济衰退期间，许多人失业了。

en: Let's see how the situation plays out before making a decision.
cn: 让我们看看情况如何展开，然后再做决定。

en: The drama played out exactly as predicted.
cn: 这场戏剧正如预测的那样发生了。

en: He's always looking for schemes to make a fast buck.
cn: 他总是在寻找快速赚钱的计划。

en: Be cautious of investments that promise to make a fast buck; they're often scams.
cn: 要警惕承诺快速赚钱的投资，它们往往是骗局。

en: The Taj Mahal is considered an architectural wonder of the world.
cn: 泰姬陵被认为是世界建筑奇迹之一。

en: The ancient pyramids are architectural wonders that still puzzle engineers today.
cn: 古老的金字塔是至今仍让工程师们困惑的建筑奇迹。

en: Over time, the river will deposit a layer of sediment on the floodplain.
cn: 随着时间的推移，河流会在洪泛区沉积一层沉积物。

en: The volcanic ash deposited a layer of sediment across the region.
cn: 火山灰在该地区沉积了一层沉积物。

en: The idea for the new product came out of nowhere during our brainstorming session.
cn: 这个新产品的想法在我们头脑风暴时突然冒了出来。

en: A sudden storm came out of nowhere and ruined our picnic.
cn: 一场突如其来的暴风雨毁了我们的野餐。

en: She is in charge of the marketing department at our company.
cn: 她负责我们公司的市场部。

en: Who will be in charge of organizing the conference next month?
cn: 谁将负责组织下个月的会议？

en: The study uncovered benefits of regular exercise for mental health.
cn: 这项研究揭示了定期锻炼对心理健康的好处。

en: Our analysis uncovered unexpected benefits of the new policy.
cn: 我们的分析揭示了这项新政策的意外好处。

en: We had a heart-to-heart talk about our relationship problems.
cn: 我们就我们的关系问题进行了一次坦诚的交谈。

en: It's good to have a heart-to-heart talk with a close friend when you're feeling down.
cn: 当你情绪低落时，与亲密朋友进行交心谈话是很好的。

en: When he kept bothering me, I told him to go fly a kite.
cn: 当他一直烦我时，我让他走开别烦我。

en: If you don't like my decision, you can just go fly a kite.
cn: 如果你不喜欢我的决定，你可以走开。

en: The city is planning to add more green spaces to improve air quality.
cn: 该市计划增加更多绿地以改善空气质量。

en: Children need access to green spaces for healthy development.
cn: 儿童需要接触绿地以促进健康发展。

en: The loud noise made everyone alert to potential danger.
cn: 巨大的声响让每个人都对潜在危险警觉起来。

en: The teacher's stern look made the students alert during the exam.
cn: 老师严厉的眼神让学生们在考试期间保持警惕。

en: She has a way with children that makes them feel comfortable immediately.
cn: 她擅长与孩子相处，能让他们立刻感到舒适。

en: He has a way with words that makes his speeches very persuasive.
cn: 他擅长言辞，使他的演讲非常有说服力。

en: The new manager likes to throw his weight around to intimidate employees.
cn: 新经理喜欢滥用权力来恐吓员工。

en: She's always throwing her weight around because her father is the CEO.
cn: 她总是仗势欺人，因为她父亲是CEO。

en: I need to take time off next week to attend my sister's wedding.
cn: 我下周需要休假去参加我姐姐的婚礼。

en: After working hard for months, she decided to take time off to travel.
cn: 辛苦工作几个月后，她决定休假去旅行。

en: The cookies were baked in the shape of hearts for Valentine's Day.
cn: 这些饼干被烤成心形以庆祝情人节。

en: Help arrived in the shape of a generous donation from an anonymous donor.
cn: 帮助以一位匿名捐赠者的慷慨捐款形式到来。

en: This region is abundant in natural resources like oil and minerals.
cn: 这个地区富含石油和矿产等自然资源。

en: The soil here is abundant in nutrients, perfect for growing vegetables.
cn: 这里的土壤营养丰富，非常适合种植蔬菜。

en: He's not so much lazy as he is unmotivated.
cn: 与其说他懒，不如说是他缺乏动力。

en: The problem is not so much technical as it is organizational.
cn: 这个问题与其说是技术性的，不如说是组织性的。

en: We need to narrow down the list of candidates to three finalists.
cn: 我们需要将候选人名单缩小到三位决赛选手。

en: The police narrowed down the suspect list based on new evidence.
cn: 警方根据新证据缩小了嫌疑人名单。

en: You need to get it together and start studying for your exams.
cn: 你需要振作起来，开始为考试学习。

en: After the breakup, it took her months to get it together emotionally.
cn: 分手后，她花了几个月时间才在情感上振作起来。

en: I make it a practice to exercise for 30 minutes every morning.
cn: 我养成了每天早上锻炼30分钟的习惯。

en: The company makes it a practice to review all projects quarterly.
cn: 公司养成了每季度审查所有项目的常规做法。

en: My decision to quit has nothing to do with my coworkers.
cn: 我辞职的决定与我的同事无关。

en: The weather had nothing to do with the cancellation of the event.
cn: 天气与活动的取消无关。

en: On the surface, everything seems fine, but there are underlying problems.
cn: 表面上一切似乎都很好，但存在潜在问题。

en: The agreement looks fair on the surface, but the details reveal imbalances.
cn: 这份协议表面上看起来公平，但细节揭示了不平衡之处。

en: The new policy may give rise to significant changes in the industry.
cn: 新政策可能会引起行业的重大变化。

en: Poor communication can give rise to misunderstandings among team members.
cn: 沟通不畅可能导致团队成员之间的误解。

en: I'm not at all tired after the long hike; I feel energized.
cn: 长途徒步后我一点也不累，反而感到精力充沛。

en: She was not at all pleased with the results of the project.
cn: 她对项目的结果完全不满意。

en: Scientists analyze meteorological data to predict upcoming weather patterns.
cn: 科学家分析气象数据以预测即将到来的天气模式。

en: The accuracy of meteorological data is essential for aviation safety.
cn: 气象数据的准确性对航空安全至关重要。

en: We decided to have our picnic in the open air to enjoy the sunshine.
cn: 我们决定在户外野餐，享受阳光。

en: The concert was held in the open air, attracting thousands of attendees.
cn: 音乐会在露天举行，吸引了数千名观众。

en: She told me the secret in a whisper so no one else could hear.
cn: 她低声告诉我这个秘密，以免别人听到。

en: The children spoke in a whisper during the library visit to avoid disturbing others.
cn: 孩子们在图书馆参观时低声说话，以免打扰他人。

en: The chemical reaction between sodium and water produces hydrogen gas and heat.
cn: 钠和水的化学反应产生氢气和热量。

en: In photosynthesis, plants use sunlight to drive a chemical reaction that converts carbon dioxide into glucose.
cn: 在光合作用中，植物利用阳光驱动化学反应，将二氧化碳转化为葡萄糖。

en: As the project manager, she is in charge of coordinating all team activities.
cn: 作为项目经理，她负责协调所有团队活动。

en: Who will be in charge of the office while the boss is on vacation?
cn: 老板度假期间，谁将负责办公室事务？

en: Do you have a specific restaurant in mind for dinner tonight?
cn: 你今晚想到哪家特定的餐厅吃饭吗？

en: When planning the event, we had a budget of $5000 in mind.
cn: 在规划活动时，我们考虑的是5000美元的预算。

en: After the meeting, he took leave of his colleagues and headed home.
cn: 会议结束后，他向同事们告别后回家了。

en: She took leave of her family at the airport before boarding the flight.
cn: 她在机场向家人告别后登上了飞机。

en: The journalist always verifies facts from a reliable source of information before publishing.
cn: 这位记者在发表前总是从可靠的信息来源核实事实。

en: For academic research, it's crucial to cite a reliable source of information like peer-reviewed journals.
cn: 对于学术研究，引用像同行评审期刊这样的可靠信息来源至关重要。

en: It's important to distinguish between facts and opinions in academic writing.
cn: 在学术写作中，区分事实和观点很重要。

en: The expert can easily distinguish between genuine and counterfeit artwork.
cn: 这位专家能轻松辨别真伪艺术品。

en: He managed to get off the hook by providing a solid alibi for the night of the incident.
cn: 他通过为事发当晚提供可靠的不在场证明，成功摆脱了困境。

en: The company got off the hook with a small fine instead of facing major legal penalties.
cn: 这家公司只被处以小额罚款，逃脱了重大的法律处罚。

en: After the experiment, she will write up the results for publication in a scientific journal.
cn: 实验结束后，她将撰写结果以便在科学期刊上发表。

en: The manager asked me to write up a report on the client meeting by tomorrow.
cn: 经理要求我明天之前撰写一份关于客户会议的报告。

en: As a seasoned lawyer, she has all the legal precedents at her fingertips.
cn: 作为一名经验丰富的律师，她对所有法律先例了如指掌。

en: With modern technology, we have vast information at our fingertips via smartphones.
cn: 借助现代技术，我们通过智能手机可以随时获取大量信息。

en: The surgeon will perform an operation to remove the tumor tomorrow morning.
cn: 外科医生明天上午将进行手术切除肿瘤。

en: It's crucial to have skilled doctors perform an operation in emergency situations.
cn: 在紧急情况下，由技术娴熟的医生进行手术至关重要。

en: Due to bad weather, the outdoor concert was held over until next weekend.
cn: 由于天气恶劣，户外音乐会被推迟到下周末。

en: The decision on the new policy has been held over for further discussion at the next meeting.
cn: 关于新政策的决定已被推迟，将在下次会议上进一步讨论。

en: The lengthy meetings take up too much time that could be spent on productive work.
cn: 冗长的会议占用了太多本可用于高效工作的时间。

en: Learning a new language can take up a significant amount of time, but it's rewarding.
cn: 学习一门新语言可能会占用大量时间，但很有回报。

en: The unfair treatment makes my blood boil every time I think about it.
cn: 每次想到这种不公平待遇，我都非常愤怒。

en: His rude comments made her blood boil during the meeting.
cn: 他粗鲁的评论让她在会议期间非常愤怒。

en: She is tired from working long hours all week.
cn: 她因整周长时间工作而感到疲倦。

en: He was tired from the long journey and went straight to bed.
cn: 他因长途旅行感到疲倦，直接上床睡觉了。

en: I need to finish this report right now.
cn: 我现在需要完成这份报告。

en: Right now, the weather is perfect for a walk.
cn: 现在天气非常适合散步。

en: It's no exaggeration to say that this discovery changed science forever.
cn: 毫不夸张地说，这一发现永远改变了科学。

en: It's no exaggeration to say that she is the best player on the team.
cn: 毫不夸张地说，她是队里最好的球员。

en: Efficient material management is key to reducing costs in manufacturing processes.
cn: 高效的物料管理是降低制造过程成本的关键。

en: The company improved its material management system to streamline inventory control.
cn: 该公司改进了物料管理系统以简化库存控制。

en: Would you like a slice of cake?
cn: 你想要一片蛋糕吗？

en: He only experienced a small slice of life in the city.
cn: 他只体验了城市生活的一小部分。

en: The region is experiencing extreme weather conditions with heavy snowfall.
cn: 该地区正经历大雪等极端天气条件。

en: Farmers must prepare for extreme weather conditions that can damage crops.
cn: 农民必须为可能损害作物的极端天气条件做好准备。

en: They bought a semi-detached house in the suburbs.
cn: 他们在郊区买了一栋半独立式住宅。

en: A semi-detached house shares one wall with a neighboring property.
cn: 半独立式住宅与相邻房产共享一堵墙。

en: The manager granted his request for a day off.
cn: 经理批准了他请一天假的请求。

en: The court granted her request for an extension.
cn: 法院批准了她延期的请求。

en: Leave room for dessert after the main course.
cn: 在主菜之后为甜点留出空间。

en: The plan should leave room for unexpected changes.
cn: 计划应为意外变化留出余地。

en: Internet technology has revolutionized communication worldwide.
cn: 互联网技术彻底改变了全球通信。

en: She works in the field of Internet technology development.
cn: 她从事互联网技术开发领域的工作。

en: The company announced salary increases across the board.
cn: 公司宣布全面加薪。

en: The new policy applies across the board to all departments.
cn: 新政策普遍适用于所有部门。

en: To begin with, let's review the agenda for today.
cn: 首先，让我们回顾一下今天的议程。

en: To begin with, the project was much smaller in scope.
cn: 一开始，这个项目的范围要小得多。

en: The charity appealed to the public for donations.
cn: 该慈善机构向公众呼吁捐款。

en: He appealed to the court for a reduced sentence.
cn: 他向法院请求减刑。

en: He tried to do a snow job on me with his fake credentials.
cn: 他试图用假证件欺骗我。

en: Don't let them do a snow job on you with their smooth talk.
cn: 别让他们用花言巧语误导你。

en: Can you see your way clear to help us with the project?
cn: 你能设法帮助我们完成这个项目吗？

en: He saw his way clear to finish the task ahead of schedule.
cn: 他设法提前完成了任务。

en: Prices shot up after the announcement.
cn: 公告发布后价格迅速上涨。

en: Her temperature shot up overnight, indicating an infection.
cn: 她的体温一夜之间迅速上升，表明有感染。

en: She takes care of her elderly parents.
cn: 她照顾年迈的父母。

en: I'll take care of the paperwork for the meeting.
cn: 我会处理会议的文件工作。

en: Watch the pot so the soup doesn't boil over.
cn: 看着锅，别让汤沸腾溢出。

en: The milk boiled over and made a mess on the stove.
cn: 牛奶沸腾溢出，把炉子弄得一团糟。

en: He looked about the room to find his keys.
cn: 他环顾房间寻找钥匙。

en: Look about carefully before crossing the street.
cn: 过马路前仔细环顾四周。

en: Let's go to the beach and make a day of it.
cn: 我们去海滩玩一整天吧。

en: We decided to make a day of it by visiting museums and having lunch out.
cn: 我们决定花一整天参观博物馆并在外吃午餐。

en: The food looks delicious, so let's tuck in!
cn: 食物看起来很好吃，我们开动吧！

en: After the long hike, we tucked into a hearty meal.
cn: 长途徒步后，我们大吃了一顿丰盛的饭菜。

en: State-funded scientific research has led to many medical breakthroughs.
cn: 国家资助的科学研究带来了许多医学突破。

en: The university conducts state-funded scientific research on climate change.
cn: 这所大学进行国家资助的气候变化科学研究。

en: We're raising money for charity by organizing a bake sale.
cn: 我们通过组织烘焙义卖为慈善筹款。

en: He ran a marathon to raise money for charity.
cn: 他跑了一场马拉松为慈善筹款。

en: He tried to make a fool out of me in front of everyone.
cn: 他试图在大家面前愚弄我。

en: Don't let them make a fool out of you with their tricks.
cn: 别让他们用诡计羞辱你。

en: Parents need to set rules for their children's screen time.
cn: 家长需要为孩子制定屏幕使用时间的规则。

en: The committee set rules to ensure fair competition.
cn: 委员会制定了规则以确保公平竞争。

en: The company plans to buy out its competitor.
cn: 这家公司计划买断其竞争对手。

en: He bought out his partner's share of the business.
cn: 他买断了合伙人在生意中的股份。

en: This watch keeps good time and rarely needs adjustment.
cn: 这块手表走时准确，很少需要调整。

en: Old clocks may not keep good time without regular maintenance.
cn: 旧钟表如果不定期维护可能走时不准确。

en: The city has many new residential buildings under construction.
cn: 这座城市有许多新的住宅建筑正在建设中。

en: Residential buildings in this area are mostly apartments and townhouses.
cn: 这个地区的住宅建筑主要是公寓和联排别墅。

en: Needless to say, safety is our top priority.
cn: 不用说，安全是我们的首要任务。

en: He was late again, needless to say, the boss was not happy.
cn: 他又迟到了，不用说，老板很不高兴。

en: She is capable of handling complex projects.
cn: 她有能力处理复杂的项目。

en: This software is capable of processing large datasets.
cn: 这个软件能够处理大型数据集。

en: She is at her best when performing on stage.
cn: 她在舞台上表演时处于最佳状态。

en: The team was at its best during the championship game.
cn: 这支队伍在冠军赛中处于最佳状态。

en: With ten years of experience under his belt, he's ready for a promotion.
cn: 拥有十年经验，他已准备好晋升。

en: She has several awards under her belt from her acting career.
cn: 她的演艺生涯已经获得了多个奖项。

en: He has an in with the hiring manager, so he might get the job.
cn: 他和招聘经理有内部关系，所以可能得到这份工作。

en: Do you have an in at that company to help with the application?
cn: 你在那家公司有门路帮忙申请吗？

en: The police came after the thief through the crowded streets.
cn: 警察穿过拥挤的街道追赶小偷。

en: He came after her for months before she agreed to a date.
cn: 他追求了她几个月，她才同意约会。

en: My old phone has nothing on this new model in terms of speed.
cn: 我的旧手机在速度上比不上这个新机型。

en: Local restaurants have nothing on the fine dining in the city.
cn: 本地餐厅比不上城市里的高级餐厅。

en: This store offers products in a wide price range.
cn: 这家商店提供价格范围广泛的产品。

en: What's the price range for apartments in this neighborhood?
cn: 这个社区的公寓价格范围是多少？

en: Maintaining a regular sleeping schedule improves overall health.
cn: 保持规律的睡眠时间表能改善整体健康。

en: Her sleeping schedule is disrupted due to shift work.
cn: 由于轮班工作，她的睡眠时间表被打乱了。

en: Many factory workers do repetitive tasks on the assembly line.
cn: 许多工厂工人在装配线上执行重复性任务。

en: Automation can help reduce the need for employees to do repetitive tasks.
cn: 自动化有助于减少员工执行重复性任务的需求。

en: His comment was completely off topic and derailed the meeting.
cn: 他的评论完全离题，使会议偏离了方向。

en: Please stay focused and avoid going off topic during the presentation.
cn: 请保持专注，在演示期间避免离题。

en: They live a frugal life to save money for their children's education.
cn: 他们过着节俭的生活，为孩子的教育存钱。

en: After retirement, he chose to live a frugal life in the countryside.
cn: 退休后，他选择在乡村过着节俭的生活。

en: The company will furnish the new office with modern furniture.
cn: 公司将为新办公室配备现代家具。

en: Can you furnish me with the necessary documents for the application?
cn: 你能为我提供申请所需的必要文件吗？

en: Wait for a moment while I check the schedule.
cn: 稍等片刻，我查一下日程。

en: She paused for a moment to collect her thoughts before speaking.
cn: 她停顿了一会儿，整理思绪后才开口。

en: You can either come with us or stay at home.
cn: 你要么和我们一起来，要么待在家里。

en: The meeting will be held either on Monday or Tuesday.
cn: 会议将在周一或周二举行。

en: I was taken aback by the sudden news of his resignation.
cn: 他突然辞职的消息让我大吃一惊。

en: She was taken aback when she received such a generous gift.
cn: 收到如此慷慨的礼物时，她感到非常惊讶。

en: He was so angry that he took a punch at his opponent.
cn: 他非常生气，向对手挥了一拳。

en: During the argument, one man took a punch at the other, but missed.
cn: 争论中，一个人向另一个人挥拳，但没打中。

en: She is one of the best scientists in the world.
cn: 她是世界上最好的科学家之一。

en: What in the world are you talking about?
cn: 你究竟在说什么？

en: I have something to do this afternoon, so I can't join you.
cn: 我今天下午有事要做，所以不能加入你们。

en: Do you have anything to do after work?
cn: 你下班后有事要做吗？

en: The government has been dragging its feet on implementing the new policy.
cn: 政府在实施新政策上一直拖延。

en: Don't drag your feet on this project; we need it finished by Friday.
cn: 不要在这个项目上拖延，我们需要在周五前完成。

en: Please reply by tomorrow, if possible.
cn: 如果可能的话，请明天前回复。

en: If possible, we should schedule the meeting for next week.
cn: 如果可能的话，我们应该将会议安排在下周。

en: He took the trouble to explain the process in detail.
cn: 他不辞辛劳地详细解释了整个过程。

en: Thank you for taking the trouble to help me with this project.
cn: 谢谢你费心帮我完成这个项目。

en: Can you bring the documents to the meeting?
cn: 你能把文件带到会议上吗？

en: The new evidence brought the case to a close.
cn: 新证据使案件得以了结。

en: The kids ate up all the cookies in no time.
cn: 孩子们很快就吃光了所有的饼干。

en: This project will eat up most of our budget.
cn: 这个项目将消耗掉我们的大部分预算。

en: It's important to keep up to date with what is happening in the industry.
cn: 及时了解行业内正在发生的事情很重要。

en: She uses social media to keep up to date with what is happening around the world.
cn: 她使用社交媒体来及时了解世界各地正在发生的事情。

en: The startup aims to carve out a niche in the market by focusing on eco-friendly products.
cn: 这家初创公司旨在通过专注于环保产品在市场中开辟一个利基市场。

en: By offering personalized services, they carved out a niche in the competitive industry.
cn: 通过提供个性化服务，他们在竞争激烈的行业中开辟了一个利基市场。

en: Don't hesitate to ask if you have any questions.
cn: 如果你有任何问题，请不要犹豫提问。

en: She hesitated to accept the offer because of the long commute.
cn: 由于通勤时间长，她犹豫是否接受这个提议。

en: Emissions from vehicles are a major contributor to air pollution in cities.
cn: 车辆排放物是城市空气污染的主要来源。

en: Reducing emissions from vehicles is crucial for combating climate change.
cn: 减少车辆排放物对于应对气候变化至关重要。

en: He explained the plan at length during the meeting.
cn: 他在会议上详细解释了计划。

en: She discussed the issue at length in her report.
cn: 她在报告中详细讨论了这个问题。

en: The registration fee for the conference is $100.
cn: 会议的注册费是100美元。

en: Students must pay the registration fee by the deadline.
cn: 学生必须在截止日期前支付注册费。

en: I'll check in on my grandmother to make sure she's okay.
cn: 我会查看一下祖母，确保她没事。

en: Can you check in on the kids while I'm out?
cn: 我不在时，你能查看一下孩子们吗？

en: The project was completed at a significant cost to the company.
cn: 该项目以公司重大代价完成。

en: They achieved success, but at a significant cost to their personal lives.
cn: 他们取得了成功，但以个人生活的重大代价。

en: She put on her coat before going outside.
cn: 她出门前穿上了外套。

en: He put on his glasses to read the fine print.
cn: 他戴上眼镜阅读小字。

en: Her managerial expertise helped the company grow rapidly.
cn: 她的管理专长帮助公司快速增长。

en: The job requires strong managerial expertise in finance.
cn: 这份工作要求在财务方面有强大的管理专长。

en: We will leave for Paris tomorrow morning.
cn: 我们明天早上动身前往巴黎。

en: She left for the airport an hour ago.
cn: 她一小时前动身去了机场。

en: It's just as well we left early, as the traffic was terrible.
cn: 幸好我们早出发了，因为交通状况很糟糕。

en: You didn't get the job? Just as well, it wasn't a good fit for you.
cn: 你没得到那份工作？也好，它不太适合你。

en: She is a successful artist in her own right, not just as her father's daughter.
cn: 她凭自身能力成为成功的艺术家，不仅仅是她父亲的女儿。

en: He earned the promotion in his own right through hard work.
cn: 他通过努力工作凭自身能力获得了晋升。

en: During the meeting, he laid his cards on the table about the budget issues.
cn: 会议期间，他就预算问题坦诚相告。

en: It's time to lay our cards on the table and discuss the real problems.
cn: 是时候摊牌并讨论真正的问题了。

en: She interpreted his silence as agreement.
cn: 她将他的沉默解释为同意。

en: The data can be interpreted as evidence of climate change.
cn: 这些数据可以被解释为气候变化的证据。

en: The bouncer kicked out the troublemaker from the club.
cn: 保镖将闹事者从俱乐部赶了出去。

en: He was kicked out of school for cheating.
cn: 他因作弊被学校开除了。

en: It's important to take exercise regularly for good health.
cn: 定期进行锻炼对健康很重要。

en: She takes exercise every morning by jogging in the park.
cn: 她每天早上在公园慢跑进行锻炼。

en: He turned a deaf ear to the complaints from his employees.
cn: 他对员工的投诉充耳不闻。

en: The government turned a deaf ear to the protesters' demands.
cn: 政府对抗议者的要求充耳不闻。

en: We like to hang out at the café on weekends.
cn: 我们喜欢周末在咖啡馆闲逛。

en: He hangs out with his friends after school.
cn: 他放学后和朋友们一起消磨时间。

en: We stay in contact through email and phone calls.
cn: 我们通过电子邮件和电话保持联系。

en: It's important to keep in contact with old friends.
cn: 与老朋友保持联系很重要。

en: He took the law into his own hands and confronted the thief.
cn: 他擅自执法，直面小偷。

en: Vigilantes often take the law into their own hands in areas with weak policing.
cn: 在治安薄弱的地区，义务警员经常私自治罪。

en: I'm stuck on this math problem and can't solve it.
cn: 我被这道数学题卡住了，无法解决。

en: The project is stuck on a technical issue.
cn: 项目因技术问题卡住了。

en: The flight was delayed as a result of bad weather.
cn: 由于恶劣天气，航班延误了。

en: He gained confidence as a result of his success.
cn: 作为成功的结果，他获得了信心。

en: We finished the project ahead of time, so we could relax.
cn: 我们提前完成了项目，所以可以放松一下。

en: Please arrive ahead of time to secure a good seat.
cn: 请提前到达以确保有个好座位。

en: I'm a beach person, so I vacation near the ocean.
cn: 我是个海滩爱好者，所以我在海边度假。

en: She's not a beach person; she prefers mountains.
cn: 她不喜欢海滩，她更喜欢山区。

en: The teacher gave out the homework assignments.
cn: 老师分发了家庭作业。

en: They gave out free samples at the store.
cn: 他们在商店分发了免费样品。

en: I need to hunt up some old photos for the family album.
cn: 我需要为家庭相册搜寻一些旧照片。

en: She hunted up the information online for her report.
cn: 她在线查找了报告所需的信息。

en: She is good at solving complex problems.
cn: 她擅长解决复杂问题。

en: He is good at making people feel welcome.
cn: 他擅长让人感到受欢迎。

en: Her red dress made her stand out in the crowd.
cn: 她的红裙子让她在人群中很显眼。

en: His talent stands out among his peers.
cn: 他的才华在同龄人中很突出。

en: You need special permission to access that area.
cn: 你需要特别许可才能进入那个区域。

en: The school granted special permission for the event.
cn: 学校为这次活动授予了特殊批准。

en: She will take charge of the new project.
cn: 她将负责这个新项目。

en: He took charge of the team during the crisis.
cn: 他在危机期间掌管了团队。

en: Despite the rain, we decided to push on with our hike.
cn: 尽管下雨，我们决定继续徒步前进。

en: Let's push on to finish the work by tonight.
cn: 让我们推进工作，今晚完成它。

en: Music has the power to bring people together.
cn: 音乐有把人们聚集在一起的力量。

en: The community event brought people together from all walks of life.
cn: 社区活动把各行各业的人们聚集在一起。

en: Sharing domestic responsibilities can strengthen a relationship.
cn: 分担家庭责任可以加强关系。

en: She manages her domestic responsibilities efficiently.
cn: 她高效地管理她的家务。

en: Don't impose upon their hospitality by staying too long.
cn: 不要待太久而打扰他们的好客。

en: The government imposed new taxes upon the citizens.
cn: 政府向公民强加了新税。

en: Economic growth often leads to a higher standard of living.
cn: 经济增长通常带来更高的生活水平。

en: They moved abroad for a higher standard of living.
cn: 他们为了更高的生活水平搬到了国外。

en: She felt lonely after moving to a new city.
cn: 搬到新城市后，她感到孤独。

en: Even in a crowd, he can feel lonely.
cn: 即使在人群中，他也会感到孤独。

en: eBay is a popular online auction website.
cn: eBay是一个受欢迎的在线拍卖网站。

en: He sold his old camera on an online auction website.
cn: 他在一个在线拍卖网站上卖掉了他的旧相机。

en: Her personal characteristics include honesty and kindness.
cn: 她的个人特征包括诚实和善良。

en: Job interviews often assess personal characteristics.
cn: 工作面试经常评估个人特征。

en: Animal welfare groups advocate for better treatment of pets.
cn: 动物福利组织倡导更好地对待宠物。

en: She volunteers with animal welfare groups on weekends.
cn: 她周末在动物福利组织做志愿者。

en: They plan to make the old building into a museum.
cn: 他们计划把旧建筑改造成博物馆。

en: She made the fabric into a beautiful dress.
cn: 她把布料制成了一件漂亮的裙子。

en: The complex issue resolved into several smaller problems.
cn: 这个复杂问题分解为几个较小的问题。

en: The mixture will resolve into its components over time.
cn: 混合物会随时间分解为其成分。

en: The company aims to make a profit this quarter.
cn: 公司目标是本季度实现盈利。

en: She made a profit by selling her old car.
cn: 她通过卖掉旧车赚了一笔钱。

en: I feel like having pizza for dinner.
cn: 我晚餐想吃披萨。

en: It feels like summer already.
cn: 感觉已经像夏天了。

en: The new factory will create jobs in the region.
cn: 新工厂将在该地区创造就业机会。

en: Small businesses help create jobs in communities.
cn: 小企业帮助在社区创造就业机会。

en: He showed the visitors round the museum.
cn: 他带参观者游览了博物馆。

en: Can you show me round the new office?
cn: 你能带我参观新办公室吗？

en: Her preferred areas of study include biology and chemistry.
cn: 她偏好的研究领域包括生物学和化学。

en: The university offers courses in students' preferred areas of study.
cn: 大学提供学生首选学科的相关课程。

en: Let's meet up with friends for coffee.
cn: 我们和朋友碰头喝咖啡吧。

en: He met up with his colleagues after work.
cn: 他下班后和同事会面。

en: She took extra courses to advance her career.
cn: 她参加了额外课程来推进职业生涯。

en: Networking can help advance your career.
cn: 建立人脉有助于提升你的事业。

en: I'll call you up tomorrow to discuss the plan.
cn: 我明天会打电话给你讨论计划。

en: She called up her friend to invite her to the party.
cn: 她打电话给朋友邀请她参加派对。

en: The machine is out of action due to a malfunction.
cn: 机器因故障无法使用。

en: He's out of action with a broken leg.
cn: 他因腿骨折而停止活动。

en: This product is inferior to the competitor's in quality.
cn: 这个产品在质量上不如竞争对手的。

en: His performance was inferior to what we expected.
cn: 他的表现比我们预期的要差。

en: Please take the book back to the library.
cn: 请把书带回图书馆。

en: She took the gift back to the store for a refund.
cn: 她把礼物带回商店退款。

en: Don't hang up, I have more to say.
cn: 别挂断电话，我还有话要说。

en: She hung up angrily after the argument.
cn: 争吵后她生气地挂断了电话。

en: The drawer is full of odds and ends.
cn: 抽屉里装满了零碎物品。

en: She collected odds and ends for her art project.
cn: 她为艺术项目收集了杂七杂八的东西。

en: The bus arrives at regular intervals.
cn: 公交车定期到达。

en: Check the equipment at regular intervals for safety.
cn: 定期检查设备以确保安全。

en: She has difficulty with math problems.
cn: 她在数学题方面有困难。

en: He has difficulty with public speaking.
cn: 他在公开演讲方面有困难。

en: Teaching is a fulfilling career for her.
cn: 教学对她来说是一份充实的职业。

en: He seeks a fulfilling career that makes a difference.
cn: 他寻求一份能带来改变的有成就感的事业。

en: We're running out of milk.
cn: 我们的牛奶快用完了。

en: Time is running out for the project deadline.
cn: 项目截止时间快到了。

en: She looks like her mother with those blue eyes.
cn: 她那双蓝眼睛看起来像她母亲。

en: The cloud looks like a dragon in the sky.
cn: 那朵云看起来像天空中的一条龙。

en: Please fill out this application form before the deadline.
cn: 请在截止日期前填写这份申请表。

en: I need to fill out a tax return every year.
cn: 我每年都需要填写纳税申报表。

en: It was raining, but we went for a walk all the same.
cn: 天在下雨，但我们仍然去散步了。

en: He apologized, but I was angry all the same.
cn: 他道歉了，但我仍然很生气。

en: The city is remarkable for its ancient architecture.
cn: 这座城市以其古建筑而著称。

en: She is remarkable for her kindness and patience.
cn: 她以善良和耐心而突出。

en: Driving without a seatbelt is asking for trouble.
cn: 不系安全带开车是自找麻烦。

en: If you argue with the boss, you're just asking for trouble.
cn: 如果你和老板争论，你就是在惹事。

en: Students are encouraged to partake in some activities after school.
cn: 鼓励学生放学后参与一些活动。

en: She will partake in some activities at the community center this weekend.
cn: 她本周末将在社区中心参与一些活动。

en: He was accused of stealing the money.
cn: 他被指控偷了钱。

en: She accused him of lying about the incident.
cn: 她指责他在事件上撒谎。

en: We'll stop at the gas station to refuel.
cn: 我们将在加油站停下加油。

en: The bus stops at every major intersection.
cn: 公交车在每个主要十字路口都会停下。

en: She puts by a little money each month for emergencies.
cn: 她每月储存一点钱以备紧急情况。

en: It's wise to put by some food for the winter.
cn: 为冬天预留一些食物是明智的。

en: A smartphone is a common man-made object in modern life.
cn: 智能手机是现代生活中常见的人造物体。

en: Archaeologists study both natural and man-made objects at the site.
cn: 考古学家在现场研究自然和人造物体。

en: The manager gave her a free hand to redesign the office.
cn: 经理给了她自由处理权来重新设计办公室。

en: He got a free hand in managing the project budget.
cn: 他在管理项目预算上获得了自由处理权。

en: The coach is training the young players for the upcoming tournament.
cn: 教练正在为即将到来的锦标赛训练年轻球员。

en: Young players often bring energy and enthusiasm to the team.
cn: 年轻球员通常为团队带来活力和热情。

en: The teacher called each student by name during roll call.
cn: 老师在点名时按名字叫每个学生。

en: I know him by name, but we've never met in person.
cn: 我按名字知道他，但我们从未见过面。

en: Can I get a ride to the airport with you?
cn: 我可以搭你的便车去机场吗？

en: He got a ride from a friend after his car broke down.
cn: 他的车坏了后，他从朋友那里获得了乘车机会。

en: The artesian spring provides fresh water to the village.
cn: 自流泉为村庄提供淡水。

en: Artesian springs are formed by underground water pressure.
cn: 自流泉是由地下水压力形成的。

en: She is crazy about jazz music and collects old records.
cn: 她对爵士乐着迷，并收集旧唱片。

en: My nephew is crazy about video games and plays them every day.
cn: 我侄子对电子游戏非常喜欢，每天都玩。

en: After the fight, he had a black eye for a week.
cn: 打架后，他眼睛淤青了一周。

en: She had a black eye from accidentally bumping into a door.
cn: 她不小心撞到门，有了黑眼圈。

en: During the fire drill, people were running around like chickens with their heads cut off.
cn: 消防演习期间，人们像无头苍蝇一样乱跑。

en: He ran around like a chicken with its head cut off trying to meet the deadline.
cn: 他为了赶上截止日期，慌乱无措地跑来跑去。

en: Several new products are in the pipeline for release next year.
cn: 几款新产品正在筹备中，计划明年发布。

en: The construction project is in the pipeline and awaiting approval.
cn: 这个建筑项目在进行中，等待批准。

en: Electric cars are becoming more popular due to their low emissions.
cn: 由于低排放，电动汽车正变得越来越受欢迎。

en: Many companies are investing in the development of electric cars.
cn: 许多公司正在投资开发电动汽车。

en: I need to go on an errand to buy groceries for dinner.
cn: 我需要跑腿去买晚餐的杂货。

en: She went on an errand to deliver a package to the post office.
cn: 她去办差事，把包裹送到邮局。

en: This software is available for download on their website.
cn: 这个软件可以在他们的网站上下载。

en: The room is available for booking from next month.
cn: 这个房间从下个月起可以预订。

en: The coach yelled at the players for not following instructions.
cn: 教练对球员大喊大叫，因为他们没有听从指示。

en: Don't yell at me; I'm just trying to help.
cn: 别对我大喊大叫；我只是想帮忙。

en: I often think back to my childhood summers at the beach.
cn: 我经常回想起童年时在海滩度过的夏天。

en: She thought back to the day they first met and smiled.
cn: 她回想起他们第一次见面的那天，露出了微笑。

en: It's likely to rain later, so bring an umbrella.
cn: 稍后很可能下雨，所以带把伞。

en: She is likely to accept the job offer because it pays well.
cn: 她很可能接受这份工作邀请，因为薪水不错。

en: We plan to pay a visit to our grandparents this weekend.
cn: 我们计划这个周末去拜访祖父母。

en: He paid a visit to the museum to see the new exhibition.
cn: 他访问了博物馆，去看新展览。

en: I regret not studying harder for the exam.
cn: 我后悔没有为考试更努力地学习。

en: She regrets telling him the secret.
cn: 她后悔告诉了他那个秘密。

en: Please fill in the application form with your details.
cn: 请用你的详细信息填写申请表。

en: Can you fill in for me at the meeting tomorrow?
cn: 你能在明天的会议上替我一下吗？

en: He worked hard to make good in his new career.
cn: 他努力工作，在新的职业生涯中取得了成功。

en: She made good on her promise to donate to charity.
cn: 她兑现了向慈善机构捐款的承诺。

en: In the interests of safety, please wear a helmet.
cn: 为了安全起见，请戴上头盔。

en: The decision was made in the interests of the company.
cn: 这个决定是出于公司的利益而做出的。

en: He has a snowball's chance in hell of winning the lottery.
cn: 他中彩票的机会渺茫。

en: With that attitude, you have a snowball's chance in hell of getting promoted.
cn: 以那种态度，你晋升的机会几乎为零。

en: Spending time in the fresh air is good for your health.
cn: 在新鲜空气中度过时间对你的健康有益。

en: We had a picnic in the fresh air of the park.
cn: 我们在公园的新鲜空气中野餐。

en: Can you look over this report before I submit it?
cn: 你能在我提交之前检查一下这份报告吗？

en: She looked over the contract carefully before signing.
cn: 她在签字前仔细审查了合同。

en: She will graduate from university next year with a degree in engineering.
cn: 她明年将从大学毕业，获得工程学位。

en: After he graduated from university, he started his own business.
cn: 他从大学毕业后，开始了自己的生意。

en: We had to dip into our savings to pay for the emergency.
cn: 我们不得不动用储蓄来支付紧急费用。

en: He dipped into the book to find a specific chapter.
cn: 他涉足这本书，寻找特定的章节。

en: I really screwed up the presentation by forgetting my notes.
cn: 我忘了带笔记，真的搞砸了演示。

en: Don't screw up this opportunity; it's important.
cn: 别搞砸这个机会；它很重要。

en: Many banks now offer online services for convenience.
cn: 许多银行现在提供在线服务以方便客户。

en: The company provides online services for booking flights and hotels.
cn: 这家公司提供预订航班和酒店的在线服务。

en: All their savings went up in smoke after the stock market crash.
cn: 股市崩盘后，他们所有的积蓄都化为乌有。

en: The project went up in smoke due to lack of funding.
cn: 由于缺乏资金，这个项目失败了。

en: I really get a bang out of watching old comedy movies.
cn: 我真的很喜欢看老喜剧电影。

en: She gets a bang out of trying new extreme sports.
cn: 她尝试新的极限运动时感到非常兴奋。

en: What are you trying to get at with that comment?
cn: 你那个评论是想暗示什么？

en: I think I understand what you're getting at.
cn: 我想我明白你的意思了。

en: The village relies on underground water for its drinking supply.
cn: 这个村庄依靠地下水作为饮用水源。

en: Pollution can contaminate underground water sources over time.
cn: 污染会逐渐污染地下水源。

en: To all intents and purposes, the project is complete.
cn: 实际上，这个项目已经完成了。

en: He is, to all intents and purposes, the leader of the group.
cn: 他实质上是这个小组的领导者。

en: Shakespeare compared the world to a stage.
cn: 莎士比亚将世界比作一个舞台。

en: She compared his smile to sunshine.
cn: 她把他的微笑比作阳光。

en: Witnesses must testify on oath in court.
cn: 证人在法庭上必须宣誓后作证。

en: He swore on oath that he was telling the truth.
cn: 他宣誓保证他说的是真话。

en: The older generation often values traditional customs more than younger people.
cn: 老一辈人通常比年轻人更重视传统习俗。

en: We can learn a lot from the wisdom of the older generation.
cn: 我们可以从老一辈人的智慧中学到很多。

en: Do you qualify for the student discount?
cn: 你有资格享受学生折扣吗？

en: Her high scores qualified her for the scholarship.
cn: 她的高分使她获得了奖学金资格。

en: We need to put more resources to this project.
cn: 我们需要将更多资源用于这个项目。

en: She put her skills to good use in the new job.
cn: 她在新工作中很好地运用了她的技能。

en: We should stock up on groceries before the storm hits.
cn: 我们应该在暴风雨来临前囤积一些食品杂货。

en: He stocked up on office supplies during the sale.
cn: 他在促销期间囤积了办公用品。

en: Many people prefer contact lenses over glasses for convenience.
cn: 许多人为了方便更喜欢隐形眼镜而不是眼镜。

en: You should clean your contact lenses regularly to avoid infections.
cn: 你应该定期清洁隐形眼镜以避免感染。

en: Italy is renowned for its delicious cuisine.
cn: 意大利以其美味的美食而闻名。

en: She is renowned for her charitable work in the community.
cn: 她因在社区的慈善工作而闻名。

en: Intensive farming can increase crop yields but may harm the environment.
cn: 集约农业可以提高作物产量，但可能对环境造成危害。

en: Many countries use intensive farming techniques to meet food demands.
cn: 许多国家使用集约农业技术来满足食物需求。

en: It's not polite to speak ill of others behind their backs.
cn: 在背后说别人的坏话是不礼貌的。

en: She never speaks ill of her colleagues, even when frustrated.
cn: 她从不抱怨她的同事，即使感到沮丧时也不说坏话。

en: Please turn on the lights; it's getting dark.
cn: 请打开灯，天快黑了。

en: He turned on the TV to watch the news.
cn: 他打开电视看新闻。

en: I have mixed feelings about moving to a new city.
cn: 我对搬到一个新城市有复杂的感觉。

en: She had mixed feelings about the job offer—excited but nervous.
cn: 她对这份工作邀请有矛盾的感觉——既兴奋又紧张。

en: Monopolistic competition involves many firms selling differentiated products.
cn: 垄断竞争涉及许多公司销售差异化产品。

en: In monopolistic competition, companies have some control over prices.
cn: 在垄断竞争中，公司对价格有一定控制权。

en: The criminal was locked up for ten years.
cn: 这个罪犯被关押了十年。

en: He was locked up after being found guilty of theft.
cn: 他被判盗窃罪后被监禁。

en: Many ancient languages have passed into oblivion over time.
cn: 许多古代语言随着时间的推移已被遗忘。

en: Without preservation efforts, this historical site might pass into oblivion.
cn: 如果没有保护努力，这个历史遗址可能会被遗忘。

en: Thieves broke into the office and stole the computers.
cn: 小偷闯入办公室偷走了电脑。

en: The police arrested the man who tried to break into the bank.
cn: 警察逮捕了试图闯入银行的那个人。

en: Rote learning of vocabulary without context is often ineffective.
cn: 没有语境的死记硬背词汇通常效果不佳。

en: The old teaching method relied heavily on rote learning of facts.
cn: 旧的教学方法严重依赖对事实的死记硬背。

en: The new owner will take possession of the house next month.
cn: 新业主下个月将占有这栋房子。

en: After paying the final installment, he took possession of the car.
cn: 支付最后一期款项后，他获得了这辆车的所有权。

en: After running up the stairs, I was completely out of breath.
cn: 跑上楼梯后，我完全上气不接下气了。

en: She was out of breath from laughing so hard at the comedy show.
cn: 她在喜剧节目上笑得太厉害，都喘不过气来了。

en: I accidentally left my keys behind at the restaurant.
cn: 我不小心把钥匙忘在餐厅了。

en: Don't leave any trash behind after the picnic.
cn: 野餐后不要留下任何垃圾。

en: Please switch off the lights before you leave the room.
cn: 离开房间前请关灯。

en: He always switches off his phone during meetings.
cn: 他开会时总是关掉手机。

en: She hails from a small town in Canada.
cn: 她来自加拿大的一个小镇。

en: Many of the students hail from different countries around the world.
cn: 许多学生来自世界各地的不同国家。

en: We should recycle waste to reduce landfill.
cn: 我们应该回收废物以减少垃圾填埋。

en: The company has a program to recycle waste paper and plastic.
cn: 该公司有一个回收废纸和塑料的计划。

en: She is bent on becoming a doctor, no matter the challenges.
cn: 她决心要成为一名医生，无论遇到什么挑战。

en: He is bent on finishing the project by the deadline.
cn: 他决心在截止日期前完成这个项目。

en: All employees share in the company's profits.
cn: 所有员工分享公司的利润。

en: We shared in the joy of their wedding celebration.
cn: 我们分享了他们婚礼庆祝的喜悦。

en: It's important to show respect to your elders.
cn: 向长辈表示尊敬很重要。

en: He showed respect to the judge by standing up in court.
cn: 他在法庭上站起来以示对法官的尊敬。

en: The school is raising funds for a new library.
cn: 学校正在为新图书馆筹集资金。

en: They organized a charity event to raise funds for cancer research.
cn: 他们组织了一场慈善活动，为癌症研究筹集资金。

en: The executive summary at the beginning of the report highlights the key findings.
cn: 报告开头的执行摘要突出了主要发现。

en: Please read the executive summary before the full meeting.
cn: 请在完整会议前阅读执行摘要。

en: Reducing energy consumption can lower electricity bills.
cn: 减少能源消耗可以降低电费。

en: The report shows an increase in energy consumption in developing countries.
cn: 报告显示发展中国家的能源消耗有所增加。
