en: In times of crisis, it's important to stand up and be counted.
cn: 在危机时刻，挺身而出很重要。

en: She stood up and was counted as a supporter of the new policy.
cn: 她挺身而出，表明支持新政策。

en: We love to watch soccer games at the local stadium on weekends.
cn: 我们喜欢周末在当地体育场观看足球比赛。

en: He watches soccer games on TV to relax after work.
cn: 他下班后看电视上的足球比赛来放松。

en: The hotel is located on Main Street, near the city center.
cn: 这家酒店位于主街，靠近市中心。

en: Their office is located on the 10th floor of the building.
cn: 他们的办公室位于大楼的10层。

en: Many people seek well-paid jobs in the tech industry.
cn: 许多人寻求科技行业的高薪工作。

en: Well-paid jobs often require advanced skills and education.
cn: 高薪工作通常需要高级技能和教育。

en: Could you look in on my cat while I'm away?
cn: 我不在的时候，你能顺便看看我的猫吗？

en: I'll look in on the meeting to see how it's progressing.
cn: 我会顺便看看会议进展如何。

en: The police searched the area with a fine-tooth comb for clues.
cn: 警察仔细搜查了该区域寻找线索。

en: Before buying a used car, search it with a fine-tooth comb for any issues.
cn: 购买二手车前，要彻底检查是否有问题。

en: She is nervous about her upcoming job interview.
cn: 她对即将到来的工作面试感到紧张。

en: He was nervous about flying for the first time.
cn: 他第一次坐飞机时感到紧张。

en: The manager gave free rein to the team to develop their own project ideas.
cn: 经理放任团队自由发展他们自己的项目想法。

en: Parents should not give free rein to their children's spending habits.
cn: 父母不应放任孩子的消费习惯。

en: Please roll up the carpet before cleaning the floor.
cn: 清洁地板前，请把地毯卷起来。

en: He rolled up to the party fashionably late.
cn: 他时髦地迟到，到达了派对。

en: I sent the important documents by registered mail for security.
cn: 为了安全，我用挂号信寄送了重要文件。

en: Registered mail provides tracking and proof of delivery.
cn: 挂号信提供追踪和投递证明。

en: A lot of hard work happens behind the scenes in film production.
cn: 电影制作中，很多辛苦工作在幕后进行。

en: Behind the scenes, they negotiated the deal for months.
cn: 私下里，他们为这笔交易谈判了数月。

en: Stop beating around the bush and tell me what you really think.
cn: 别拐弯抹角了，告诉我你的真实想法。

en: He always beats around the bush when discussing sensitive topics.
cn: 讨论敏感话题时，他总是拐弯抹角。

en: She expressed her gratitude in words during the ceremony.
cn: 她在仪式上用言语表达了感激之情。

en: It's hard to describe the beauty of the scene in words.
cn: 很难用言语描述这场景的美丽。

en: So far as I know, the meeting has been postponed.
cn: 就我所知，会议已经推迟了。

en: He will help you so far as his abilities allow.
cn: 他会在他能力范围内帮助你。

en: The prophecy finally came to pass after many years.
cn: 多年后，预言终于实现了。

en: It came to pass that they won the championship against all odds.
cn: 他们最终克服万难赢得了冠军。

en: I came across an old friend while shopping yesterday.
cn: 昨天购物时，我偶然遇到了一位老朋友。

en: She comes across as very confident in interviews.
cn: 在面试中，她给人非常自信的印象。

en: Communication and problem-solving are vital skills in the workplace.
cn: 沟通和解决问题是职场中的关键技能。

en: Learning to code has become a vital skill in the digital age.
cn: 在数字时代，学习编程已成为一项必备能力。

en: Historians ascribe the fall of the empire to economic decline.
cn: 历史学家将帝国的衰落归因于经济衰退。

en: She ascribed her success to hard work and perseverance.
cn: 她将自己的成功归因于努力和坚持。

en: He got a hard time from his boss for missing the deadline.
cn: 他因错过截止日期而受到老板的刁难。

en: New employees often get a hard time adjusting to the company culture.
cn: 新员工在适应公司文化时常常遭遇困难。

en: The new model's performance is comparable to that of high-end competitors.
cn: 新模型的性能可与高端竞争对手相比。

en: Her dedication to the project is comparable to that of a full-time employee.
cn: 她对项目的投入程度可与全职员工相似。

en: They decided to break up after five years of dating.
cn: 恋爱五年后，他们决定分手。

en: The police had to break up the protest to maintain order.
cn: 警察不得不解散抗议以维持秩序。

en: Teenagers often rebel against their parents' rules.
cn: 青少年常常反抗父母的规则。

en: The citizens rebelled against the oppressive government.
cn: 公民们反抗了压迫性的政府。

en: At the party, guests began to pair off for dancing.
cn: 在派对上，客人们开始配对跳舞。

en: The teacher asked the students to pair off for the group project.
cn: 老师让学生们为小组项目结成一对。

en: Their opinions on the issue are poles apart.
cn: 他们在这个问题上的意见截然不同。

en: The two cultures are poles apart in their traditions.
cn: 这两种文化在传统上天壤之别。

en: I hope to have a chance to visit Japan next year.
cn: 我希望明年有机会访问日本。

en: She had a chance to meet her favorite author at the book signing.
cn: 她在签售会上有机会见到了她最喜欢的作者。

en: The stage setting for the play was elaborate and colorful.
cn: 这出戏的舞台布景精致而多彩。

en: They spent weeks designing the stage setting for the concert.
cn: 他们花了数周时间设计音乐会的舞台布景。

en: The manager gave his ear to the employees' suggestions.
cn: 经理倾听了员工的建议。

en: Please give your ear to this important announcement.
cn: 请倾听这个重要公告。

en: In the debate, she managed to get the better of her opponent.
cn: 在辩论中，她设法战胜了对手。

en: His fear of failure often gets the better of him in competitions.
cn: 他对失败的恐惧常常在比赛中占上风。

en: She turned her nose up at the cheap wine, insisting on something more expensive.
cn: 她对廉价葡萄酒嗤之以鼻，坚持要更贵的。

en: Don't turn your nose up at local cuisine; it can be surprisingly delicious.
cn: 不要瞧不起当地美食，它可能出奇地美味。

en: The live coverage of the Olympic Games attracted millions of viewers.
cn: 奥运会的现场报道吸引了数百万观众。

en: We watched the live coverage of the presidential debate on TV.
cn: 我们在电视上观看了总统辩论的现场报道。

en: Listening to music helps me relax my mind after a long day.
cn: 听音乐帮助我在漫长的一天后放松心情。

en: He went for a walk in the park to relax his mind.
cn: 他去公园散步以放松头脑。

en: After retiring, they took up their abode in a quiet coastal village.
cn: 退休后，他们在一个宁静的海滨村庄定居下来。

en: The artist took up his abode in a small studio to focus on his paintings.
cn: 这位艺术家在一间小工作室里安顿下来，专注于他的绘画。

en: The new manager runs a taut ship, ensuring every task is completed on time.
cn: 新经理管理严格，确保每项任务都按时完成。

en: To succeed in this competitive industry, you need to run a taut ship.
cn: 要在这个竞争激烈的行业中成功，你需要高效运营。

en: The event was postponed on account of the bad weather.
cn: 由于天气恶劣，活动被推迟了。

en: He was excused from duty on account of his illness.
cn: 他因病被免除了职责。

en: The office staff worked overtime to meet the project deadline.
cn: 办公室员工加班加点以赶上项目截止日期。

en: All office staff are required to attend the annual meeting.
cn: 所有办公室职员都必须参加年度会议。

en: She decided to take a chance and invest in the startup.
cn: 她决定冒险投资这家初创公司。

en: If you don't take a chance, you might miss out on great opportunities.
cn: 如果你不冒险，可能会错过好机会。

en: The boss gave him an ultimatum: improve performance or face dismissal.
cn: 老板向他发出最后通牒：提高绩效否则面临解雇。

en: In negotiations, they gave the other party an ultimatum to agree by Friday.
cn: 在谈判中，他们向对方发出最后通牒，要求周五前同意。

en: They often argue with each other about politics.
cn: 他们经常就政治问题互相争论。

en: I don't want to argue with you about the details; let's focus on the solution.
cn: 我不想和你争论细节，让我们专注于解决方案。

en: This model is superior to the previous one in terms of performance.
cn: 这个型号在性能上优于前一个型号。

en: In many aspects, her skills are superior to those of her colleagues.
cn: 在许多方面，她的技能比她的同事更优秀。

en: She's on the fast track to becoming a senior executive.
cn: 她正在快速晋升为高级主管。

en: The company is on the fast track to expansion in international markets.
cn: 这家公司正在国际市场上高速扩张。

en: Her debut novel set the world on fire, becoming an instant bestseller.
cn: 她的处女作小说引起了轰动，立即成为畅销书。

en: The new tech startup aims to set the world on fire with its innovative product.
cn: 这家新科技初创公司旨在用其创新产品取得巨大成功。

en: He took apart the old clock to repair it.
cn: 他拆开旧钟表进行修理。

en: For maintenance, you need to take apart the machine carefully.
cn: 为了维护，你需要小心地拆卸机器。

en: Please turn the card face up so we can see the design.
cn: 请把卡片正面朝上翻转，这样我们可以看到图案。

en: He turned the coin face up to check if it was heads or tails.
cn: 他把硬币翻转过来检查是正面还是反面。

en: After the break, everyone got down to work on the project.
cn: 休息后，每个人都开始认真做项目。

en: It's time to stop chatting and get down to work.
cn: 是时候停止聊天，开始认真工作了。

en: She choked up while giving the heartfelt speech.
cn: 她在发表感人的演讲时哽咽了。

en: He choked up with emotion when he saw his long-lost friend.
cn: 当他见到失散已久的朋友时，激动得说不出话。

en: He is receiving medical treatments for his chronic condition.
cn: 他正在接受慢性病的医疗治疗。

en: Patients receive medical treatments at the hospital to recover from injuries.
cn: 患者在医院接受医疗治疗以从伤病中恢复。

en: She remained calm all through the crisis.
cn: 在整个危机过程中，她保持冷静。

en: The music played all through the night at the festival.
cn: 音乐在节日期间整夜播放。

en: We got the jump on our competitors by launching the product early.
cn: 我们通过提前发布产品抢占了竞争对手的先机。

en: He got the jump on the project by starting research months in advance.
cn: 他提前几个月开始研究，在这个项目上占了先机。

en: They work hard year in year out to support their family.
cn: 他们年复一年地努力工作以养家糊口。

en: The tradition has been celebrated year in year out for centuries.
cn: 这个传统已经持续庆祝了几个世纪。

en: The long hike tired out the children completely.
cn: 长途徒步让孩子们筋疲力尽。

en: Working two jobs will tire you out quickly.
cn: 打两份工会让你很快疲惫不堪。

en: The store is offering a 10% discount on all items this weekend.
cn: 本周末商店所有商品提供九折优惠。

en: You can get a 10% discount if you use this promo code online.
cn: 如果你在线使用这个促销代码，可以获得九折优惠。

en: The government is trying to keep down inflation rates.
cn: 政府正试图控制通货膨胀率。

en: Please keep down the noise so the baby can sleep.
cn: 请降低噪音，让宝宝能睡觉。

en: In a pinch, you can use vinegar as a cleaning substitute.
cn: 必要时，你可以用醋作为清洁替代品。

en: This old car will do in a pinch if my main vehicle breaks down.
cn: 如果我的主要车辆坏了，这辆旧车在紧要关头还能用。

en: You need to log in to access your email account.
cn: 你需要登录才能访问你的电子邮件账户。

en: I can't log in because I forgot my password.
cn: 我无法登录，因为我忘记了密码。

en: It took me a while to get a grasp of the new software.
cn: 我花了一些时间才掌握了这个新软件。

en: She quickly got a grasp of the basic concepts in physics.
cn: 她很快就理解了物理学的基本概念。

en: There is no point in arguing about it now; the decision is final.
cn: 现在争论这个没有意义；决定已经最终确定了。

en: There is no point in worrying over things you cannot change.
cn: 为无法改变的事情担心是没有意义的。

en: I ran across an old friend at the supermarket yesterday.
cn: 昨天我在超市偶然遇到了一位老朋友。

en: She ran across some interesting articles while browsing online.
cn: 她在网上浏览时偶然发现了一些有趣的文章。

en: In brief, the project was a success due to teamwork.
cn: 简而言之，由于团队合作，这个项目取得了成功。

en: To put it in brief, we need to cut costs immediately.
cn: 简而言之，我们需要立即削减成本。

en: He acted in defiance of the company's policies.
cn: 他的行为违抗了公司的政策。

en: The protest was held in defiance of the government's warnings.
cn: 这次抗议活动不顾政府的警告而举行。

en: I stand behind my colleague's decision on this matter.
cn: 我支持我的同事在这个问题上的决定。

en: The company stands behind the quality of its products.
cn: 公司为其产品的质量提供担保。

en: After his recovery, he felt fit as a fiddle and ready to work.
cn: 康复后，他感觉非常健康，准备好工作了。

en: My grandfather is 80 years old but still fit as a fiddle.
cn: 我祖父80岁了，但仍然非常健康。

en: He felt a stab in the back when his friend revealed his secret.
cn: 当他的朋友泄露他的秘密时，他感到被背叛了。

en: In business, a stab in the back from a colleague can be devastating.
cn: 在商业中，同事的背叛可能是毁灭性的。

en: Regular exercise can help increase blood circulation.
cn: 定期锻炼有助于促进血液循环。

en: This medication is designed to increase blood circulation in the limbs.
cn: 这种药物旨在促进四肢的血液循环。

en: The manager decided to raise my salary after the successful project.
cn: 经理在项目成功后决定提高我的薪水。

en: Employees often request to raise their salary during performance reviews.
cn: 员工经常在绩效评估期间要求提高薪水。

en: Don't make a thing out of it; it was just a minor mistake.
cn: 别小题大做；这只是个小错误。

en: She tends to make a thing out of every small issue at work.
cn: 她倾向于对工作中的每个小问题都小题大做。

en: The salary increase should be in proportion to the employee's performance.
cn: 薪水的增加应与员工的表现成比例。

en: The amount of funding is in proportion to the project's scale.
cn: 资金的数量与项目的规模成比例。

en: She has expertise in the area of environmental science.
cn: 她在环境科学领域有专业知识。

en: We need more research in the area of renewable energy.
cn: 我们需要在可再生能源领域进行更多研究。

en: I told him the truth, so he can put that in his pipe and smoke it.
cn: 我告诉了他真相，所以他可以接受这个事实。

en: The decision is final; put that in your pipe and smoke it.
cn: 决定已经最终确定；好好想想吧。

en: They decided to start a company together after graduating from business school.
cn: 他们从商学院毕业后决定一起创办一家公司。

en: It takes courage and capital to start a company in today's competitive market.
cn: 在当今竞争激烈的市场中创办公司需要勇气和资本。

en: Consumers are willing to pay more for genuine brands because of their quality assurance.
cn: 消费者愿意为正品品牌支付更多费用，因为它们有质量保证。

en: The market is flooded with counterfeits, making it hard to find genuine brands.
cn: 市场上充斥着假冒产品，很难找到正品品牌。

en: You must be kidding if you think I'll believe that outrageous story.
cn: 如果你认为我会相信那个离谱的故事，那你一定是在开玩笑。

en: I was just kidding when I said I'd quit my job tomorrow.
cn: 我说我明天要辞职只是在开玩笑。

en: He managed to shake off his pursuers by taking a shortcut through the alley.
cn: 他通过走小巷捷径成功摆脱了追赶者。

en: It took her years to shake off the negative reputation from her past mistakes.
cn: 她花了多年时间才摆脱过去错误带来的负面声誉。

en: She takes after her mother in both appearance and temperament.
cn: 她在长相和性格上都像她的母亲。

en: He takes after his grandfather, who was also an avid gardener.
cn: 他像他的祖父，祖父也是个热心的园丁。

en: The unique design makes this product distinct from others on the market.
cn: 独特的设计使这个产品与市场上的其他产品区分开来。

en: Her leadership style makes her distinct from previous managers.
cn: 她的领导风格使她与之前的经理们区分开来。

en: She misplaced her trust in a colleague who later betrayed her confidence.
cn: 她错误地信任了一位后来背叛她信任的同事。

en: Investors often misplace trust in fraudulent schemes that promise high returns.
cn: 投资者常常错误地信任承诺高回报的欺诈计划。

en: Dopamine is a neural transmitter that plays a key role in reward and motivation.
cn: 多巴胺是一种在奖励和动机中起关键作用的神经递质。

en: Scientists are studying how neural transmitters affect mood disorders like depression.
cn: 科学家正在研究神经递质如何影响抑郁症等情绪障碍。

en: The government decided to move against the corrupt officials with new legislation.
cn: 政府决定通过新立法来打击腐败官员。

en: Activists are urging the public to move against environmental pollution.
cn: 活动家们敦促公众采取行动对抗环境污染。

en: He lost his job, and what is worse, his car broke down the same day.
cn: 他丢了工作，更糟糕的是，他的车在同一天坏了。

en: The storm damaged the roof, and what is worse, it flooded the basement.
cn: 暴风雨损坏了屋顶，更糟糕的是，它淹没了地下室。

en: Despite his busy schedule, he always makes time for his family.
cn: 尽管日程繁忙，他总是为家人抽出时间。

en: You need to make time for exercise if you want to stay healthy.
cn: 如果你想保持健康，就需要抽出时间锻炼。

en: The construction project is under way and should be completed by next year.
cn: 建筑工程正在进行中，应该明年完成。

en: Negotiations between the two countries are under way to resolve the dispute.
cn: 两国之间的谈判正在进行中，以解决争端。

en: These plants are adapted to survive in arid desert conditions.
cn: 这些植物适应在干旱的沙漠条件下生存。

en: She quickly adapted to the new work environment after moving to a different city.
cn: 搬到另一个城市后，她很快适应了新的工作环境。

en: The speaker concluded her presentation with a powerful quote.
cn: 演讲者以一句有力的引语结束了她的演讲。

en: They concluded the meeting with a summary of the key decisions made.
cn: 他们以总结做出的关键决定结束了会议。

en: Always save a back-up copy of important documents to avoid data loss.
cn: 总是保存重要文件的备份副本以避免数据丢失。

en: He saved a back-up copy of the project files on an external hard drive.
cn: 他在外部硬盘上保存了项目文件的备份副本。

en: Please inform me about any changes to the schedule as soon as possible.
cn: 请尽快通知我日程的任何变化。

en: The teacher informed the students about the upcoming exam dates.
cn: 老师通知了学生们即将到来的考试日期。

en: The discussion class encourages students to share their opinions on current events.
cn: 讨论课鼓励学生分享他们对时事的看法。

en: In the discussion class, we debated the ethical implications of artificial intelligence.
cn: 在讨论课上，我们辩论了人工智能的伦理影响。

en: Make sure to plug in the charger before your phone battery dies.
cn: 在手机电池耗尽前，确保插入充电器。

en: He plugged in the laptop and started working on the report.
cn: 他插上笔记本电脑的电源，开始写报告。

en: Scientists are trying to tease apart the various factors that contribute to climate change.
cn: 科学家正试图梳理导致气候变化的各种因素。

en: It can be difficult to tease apart the emotional and logical aspects of a decision.
cn: 梳理决策的情感和逻辑方面可能很困难。

en: I have no more patience for this nonsense.
cn: 我对这种胡闹再也没有耐心了。

en: There's no more milk in the fridge.
cn: 冰箱里没有牛奶了。

en: The team showed determination to win by practicing extra hours every day.
cn: 球队通过每天额外训练表现出获胜的决心。

en: Despite the setbacks, she showed determination to win the championship.
cn: 尽管遇到挫折，她表现出赢得冠军的决心。

en: Interactive games are a great way to engage children in learning.
cn: 互动游戏是吸引儿童参与学习的好方法。

en: Teachers use storytelling to engage children during class activities.
cn: 老师用讲故事来让儿童参与课堂活动。

en: I'm just stepping out for a quick coffee break.
cn: 我只是出去喝杯咖啡休息一下。

en: She stepped out of the room to take a phone call.
cn: 她走出房间去接电话。

en: The police worked tirelessly to catch criminals in the area.
cn: 警方不懈努力抓捕该地区的罪犯。

en: New technology helps detectives catch criminals faster.

en: Get the lead out of your pants, or we'll be late for the meeting.
cn: 快点，不然我们开会要迟到了。

en: He needs to get the lead out of his pants if he wants to finish the project on time.
cn: 如果他想按时完成项目，就得加快速度。

en: Witnesses must testify under oath in court.
cn: 证人必须在法庭上宣誓作证。

en: He lied under oath and faced perjury charges.

en: The student requested to get an extension of time for the assignment.
cn: 学生请求延长作业的提交时间。

en: We managed to get an extension of time to complete the project.
cn: 我们设法获得了延长完成项目的时间。

en: The building was given over to community use.
cn: 这栋建筑被用于社区用途。

en: Her life was given over to charitable work.

en: Many people are afraid of public speaking.
cn: 很多人害怕公开演讲。

en: Don't be afraid to ask for help when you need it.
cn: 需要帮助时不要害怕求助。

en: I tried to cheer her up with a funny story.
cn: 我试图用一个有趣的故事让她振作起来。

en: A visit from friends always cheers me up.

en: We walked across the bridge to get to the other side.
cn: 我们步行穿过桥到达对岸。

en: It's safe to walk across the street at the crosswalk.
cn: 在人行横道上过马路是安全的。

en: From the hilltop, you can get a good view of the entire city.
cn: 从山顶上，你可以清楚看到整个城市。

en: We got a good view of the stage from our seats.

en: Ever since he got promoted, he's been giving himself airs.
cn: 自从他升职后，就一直摆架子。

en: Don't give yourself airs just because you have a fancy car.
cn: 别因为你有辆豪车就装腔作势。

en: I was intrigued by the mysterious plot of the novel.
cn: 我被小说神秘的情节吸引了。

en: Scientists are intrigued by the new discovery.
cn: 科学家们对这个新发现很感兴趣。

en: He put his friend up to playing a prank on the teacher.

cn: 是谁怂恿你做这种恶作剧的？

en: Are you in on the surprise party planning?

en: She was in on the secret from the beginning.

en: If you don't study, you'll drop behind in class.
cn: 如果你不学习，你会在班上落后。

en: The runner dropped behind due to an injury.
cn: 那名跑步者因受伤而掉队了。

en: I have an extra ticket for the concert if you want to come.
cn: 如果你想来，我有一张音乐会的额外票。

en: They sold the extra tickets at a discount.
cn: 他们以折扣价出售了多余的票。

en: Can you put me up for the night?
cn: 你能让我留宿一晚吗？

en: They put up their relatives during the holidays.
cn: 他们在假期期间留宿亲戚。

en: This suitcase has room for all your clothes.
cn: 这个行李箱有空间容纳你所有的衣服。

en: The auditorium has room for 500 people.

en: This room serves as a temporary office.

en: Her experience serves as a valuable lesson for others.

en: He kept back some important details during the meeting.
cn: 他在会议上隐瞒了一些重要细节。

en: She decided to keep back her true feelings to avoid conflict.
cn: 她决定隐瞒真实感受以避免冲突。

en: The bank offers an interest-free overdraft for students.
cn: 银行为学生提供免息透支。

en: She used her interest-free overdraft to cover unexpected expenses.
cn: 她用免息透支来支付意外开支。

en: Don't just stand around; help with the cleaning.
cn: 别光站着，帮忙打扫一下。

en: We stood around waiting for the bus to arrive.
cn: 我们闲站着等公交车来。

en: He decided to quit school to start his own business.
cn: 他决定辍学去创业。

en: Many students quit school due to financial difficulties.

en: She took a refresher course in first aid last month.
cn: 她上个月参加了一个急救进修课程。

en: The company offers refresher courses for employees to update their skills.

en: The dormitory area is quiet after 10 PM.
cn: 宿舍区在晚上10点后很安静。

en: He gave rein to his anger and shouted at everyone.

en: Parents should not give rein to their children's bad habits.

cn: 经过数小时讨论，团队敲定了一项协议。

en: They need to hammer out the details before signing the contract.

en: I have never set foot in that country before.

en: She was excited to set foot in the new office building.
cn: 她兴奋地踏入了新的办公楼。

en: It took me a while to get the feel of driving a manual car.
cn: 我花了一段时间才熟悉开手动挡汽车。

en: She quickly got the feel of the new software after some practice.
cn: 经过一些练习，她很快熟悉了新软件。

en: To my relief, the test results were negative.
cn: 令我欣慰的是，测试结果是阴性的。

cn: 令所有人欣慰的是，失踪的孩子被安全找到了。

en: The campaign aims to educate the public about climate change.
cn: 这项运动旨在教育公众关于气候变化。

en: Schools should educate the public about healthy eating habits.
cn: 学校应教育公众关于健康的饮食习惯。

en: The team performed well as a whole during the competition.

en: As a whole, the project was a success despite some challenges.
cn: 尽管有些挑战，项目总体上成功了。

en: Please behave yourself at the dinner party.
cn: 请在晚宴上规矩点。

cn: 老师告诉学生在实地考察时要行为端正。

en: The students entered the classroom one by one.

en: He solved the problems one by one until they were all finished.
cn: 他一个接一个地解决问题，直到全部完成。

cn: 公司聘请了专业培训师来提高员工技能。

en: Professional trainers are essential for effective sports coaching.
cn: 专业培训师对于有效的体育教练至关重要。

en: In the final round, he decided to go for broke and bet all his chips.
cn: 在最后一轮，他决定孤注一掷，押上了所有筹码。

en: She went for broke by quitting her job to start her own business.
cn: 她孤注一掷，辞去工作创办了自己的公司。

en: The kidnappers held the businessman to ransom for a large sum of money.
cn: 绑匪勒索商人一大笔钱。

en: He was held to ransom by his competitors who threatened to reveal his secrets.
cn: 他被竞争对手要挟，威胁要揭露他的秘密。

en: The manager takes a dim view of employees arriving late.

en: She takes a dim view of the new policy changes.

en: The document is attached to the email for your review.
cn: 文件附在电子邮件中供您审阅。

en: This USB drive is attached to the computer for data transfer.
cn: 这个U盘连接到电脑用于数据传输。

en: She gained practical experience through internships during college.
cn: 她通过大学期间的实习获得了实践经验。

en: Practical experience is often more valuable than theoretical knowledge in this field.
cn: 在这个领域，实践经验通常比理论知识更有价值。

en: I need to get after my son to finish his homework.
cn: 我需要催促我儿子完成他的作业。

en: The boss got after the team for missing the deadline.
cn: 老板因为团队错过了截止日期而批评了他们。

en: On the minus side, the project will require a large initial investment.

cn: 争吵后，她首先道歉，伸出了橄榄枝。

en: He took a bath in the stock market crash.

en: The employees bucked against the new work schedule.

en: He always bucks against authority figures.

en: I can't help with that now; I have other fish to fry.

en: He declined the invitation because he had other fish to fry.

en: He made a statement to the effect that he would resign soon.
cn: 他发表声明，大意是他将很快辞职。

en: The report concluded to the effect that more research is needed.

en: He leafed through the report to get an overview.

en: His talent as a musician is beyond dispute.

en: The facts of the case are beyond dispute.

cn: 她对古典音乐有强烈的喜好。

en: He has a penchant for taking risks in business.

cn: 长跑后，他的大腿肌肉痉挛了。

en: The study helped us get insight into consumer behavior.

en: She got insight into the problem after analyzing the data.

en: We spent the afternoon soaking up the sun on the beach.

en: He loves to soak up the sun in his backyard.
cn: 他喜欢在后院享受阳光。

en: Muscular cells contract to produce movement.
cn: 肌肉细胞收缩以产生运动。

cn: 这项研究专注于心脏中肌肉细胞的功能。

en: Swale erosion can lead to soil degradation in agricultural areas.
cn: 洼地侵蚀可能导致农业区的土壤退化。

en: The project aims to prevent swale erosion through vegetation planting.
cn: 该项目旨在通过植被种植防止沟壑侵蚀。

en: He got the air after missing three deadlines.
cn: 他错过了三个截止日期后被解雇了。

en: She got the air from the club for breaking the rules.

en: I lose sleep over the upcoming exam.
cn: 我为即将到来的考试失眠。

en: She loses sleep because of her noisy neighbors.
cn: 她因为吵闹的邻居睡眠不足。

en: Exercising regularly can help improve self-esteem.
cn: 定期锻炼有助于提高自尊心。

en: She took a course to improve her self-esteem.
cn: 她参加了一个课程来提高自尊心。

en: The baby made a noise while sleeping.
cn: 婴儿睡觉时发出了声音。

en: Please don't make a noise during the meeting.
cn: 会议期间请不要发出噪音。

en: Her opinion is different from mine.
cn: 她的观点与我的不同。

en: This model is different from the previous one.
cn: 这个型号与之前的那个不同。

en: Please notify me of any changes to the schedule.
cn: 请通知我日程的任何变化。

en: The company notified employees of the new policy.
cn: 公司通知员工新政策。

en: Carry on with your work despite the interruptions.
cn: 尽管有干扰，继续你的工作。

en: They decided to carry on the discussion tomorrow.
cn: 他们决定明天继续讨论。

en: Before the trip, she got her ducks in a row by packing early.
cn: 旅行前，她早早打包，把事情安排得井井有条。

en: He needs to get his ducks in a row before starting the project.
cn: 他开始项目前需要把事情安排妥当。

en: The species is in danger of extinction.
cn: 这个物种处于灭绝的危险中。

en: He is in danger of losing his job.
cn: 他处于失去工作的危险中。

en: She is without question the best candidate.
cn: 她毫无疑问是最佳候选人。

en: The evidence proves his guilt without question.
cn: 证据毫无疑问地证明了他的罪行。

en: The company hopes to break even this year.
cn: 公司希望今年能收支平衡。

en: After the initial investment, they managed to break even.
cn: 在初始投资后，他们设法做到了不赚不赔。

en: It was raining; even so, they went for a walk.
cn: 天在下雨；尽管如此，他们还是去散步了。

en: He was tired, but even so, he finished the task.
cn: 他很累，但尽管如此，他还是完成了任务。

en: There is a lack of resources in the area.
cn: 该地区资源缺乏。

en: His lack of experience showed in the presentation.
cn: 他在演示中表现出经验不足。

en: She studies classical literature from ancient Greece.
cn: 她研究古希腊的古典文学。

en: Classical literature often explores timeless themes.
cn: 古典文学常常探讨永恒的主题。

en: She keeps her colleagues at arm's length to maintain professionalism.
cn: 她与同事保持距离以维持专业性。

en: He keeps suspicious people at arm's length.
cn: 他与可疑的人保持距离。

en: She takes her cue from her mentor in business decisions.
cn: 她在商业决策上从她的导师那里得到提示。

en: The actor took his cue from the director's instructions.
cn: 演员从导演的指示中得到提示。

en: He resigned in disgrace after the scandal.
cn: 丑闻后，他不光彩地辞职了。

en: The politician left office in disgrace.

en: After the accident, he came to his senses and apologized.
cn: 事故后，他恢复理智并道歉了。

en: She finally came to her senses and ended the toxic relationship.
cn: 她终于醒悟过来，结束了这段有害的关系。

en: I'm on the way to the office and should arrive in 10 minutes.
cn: 我正在去办公室的路上，应该10分钟后到。

en: The package is on the way and will be delivered tomorrow.
cn: 包裹在途中，明天会送达。

en: Skilled workers are in demand in the tech industry.
cn: 技术行业对熟练工人的需求量大。

en: This product is in demand during the holiday season.
cn: 这个产品在假日季节很受欢迎。

en: After 10 years, she decided to resign her position as CEO.
cn: 10年后，她决定辞去CEO的职位。

en: He resigned his position due to personal reasons.
cn: 他因个人原因辞去了职位。

en: The new startup is struggling to get off the ground without enough funding.
cn: 这家新初创公司因资金不足而难以启动。

en: Once we secure the permits, the construction project will get off the ground.
cn: 一旦获得许可，建筑项目就会启动。

en: Many self-made celebrities share their success stories online.
cn: 许多白手起家的名人在网上分享他们的成功故事。

en: He is a self-made celebrity who built his empire from scratch.
cn: 他是一个白手起家的名人，从零开始建立了他的帝国。

en: After the company downsized, many employees got the ax.
cn: 公司裁员后，许多员工被解雇了。

en: He got the ax for consistently missing deadlines.
cn: 他因屡次错过截止日期而被开除。

en: Harvard and Stanford are considered elite universities worldwide.
cn: 哈佛和斯坦福被认为是全球的精英大学。

en: Admission to elite universities is highly competitive.

en: I'll have my assistant do the paperwork for the meeting.
cn: 我会让我的助理处理会议的文件工作。

en: She had the mechanic do a full check on her car.
cn: 她让机械师对她的车进行了全面检查。

en: Social norms differ from culture to culture, so it's important to be respectful when traveling.
cn: 社会规范因文化而异，因此旅行时尊重他人很重要。

en: The concept of personal space can differ from culture to culture.

cn: 学校为聪明的学生提供额外资源以促进其发展。

en: In the dark cave, we had to feel our way along the walls.
cn: 在黑暗的洞穴里，我们不得不沿着墙壁摸索前进。

en: As a new manager, she is feeling her way through the team dynamics.
cn: 作为新经理，她正在谨慎地处理团队动态。

en: Her innovative approach sets her apart from other designers in the industry.
cn: 她的创新方法使她在行业中与其他设计师不同。

en: The unique flavor of this coffee sets it apart from regular blends.
cn: 这种咖啡的独特风味使其与常规混合咖啡区分开来。

en: The teacher stood over the student to ensure he was working on the assignment.
cn: 老师站在学生旁边以确保他在做作业。

en: He felt uncomfortable when his boss stood over him during the presentation.
cn: 当老板在演示时站在他上方，他感到不舒服。

en: I need to withdraw money from the cashpoint machine at the corner.
cn: 我需要从街角的自动取款机取钱。

en: Cashpoint machines are convenient for quick transactions outside bank hours.
cn: 自动取款机在银行营业时间外进行快速交易很方便。

en: She stopped to take a selfie in front of the famous landmark.
cn: 她在著名地标前停下来自拍。

en: Taking a selfie has become a common way to capture memories.
cn: 自拍已成为捕捉记忆的常见方式。

en: Maintaining a balanced diet is key to good health and energy levels.
cn: 保持均衡饮食是良好健康和能量水平的关键。

en: A balanced diet includes fruits, vegetables, proteins, and grains.
cn: 均衡饮食包括水果、蔬菜、蛋白质和谷物。

en: With the correct password, you can gain access to the secure database.
cn: 使用正确的密码，你可以获得安全数据库的访问权限。

en: The new policy allows employees to gain access to flexible working hours.
cn: 新政策允许员工获得灵活工作时间的权限。

en: I decided to take my doctor's advice and start exercising regularly.
cn: 我决定接受医生的建议，开始定期锻炼。

en: She took her friend's advice and applied for the job.
cn: 她接受了朋友的建议，申请了那份工作。

en: There has been a significant improvement in the company's sales figures this quarter.
cn: 本季度公司的销售数据有了显著改进。

en: Regular practice leads to improvement in language skills over time.
cn: 定期练习会随着时间的推移提高语言技能。

en: A good working environment boosts employee morale and productivity.
cn: 良好的工作环境能提升员工士气和生产力。

en: Companies should strive to create a good working environment for their staff.
cn: 公司应努力为员工创造良好的工作环境。

en: The sports car can turn on a dime, making it great for tight corners.
cn: 这辆跑车能迅速转向，非常适合急转弯。

en: In business, the ability to turn on a dime can help adapt to market changes.
cn: 在商业中，迅速转向的能力有助于适应市场变化。

en: To open the file, simply click on the icon on your desktop.
cn: 要打开文件，只需点击桌面上的图标。

en: Click on the link to access the online registration form.
cn: 点击链接访问在线注册表格。

en: The Eiffel Tower is a popular sightseeing spot in Paris.
cn: 埃菲尔铁塔是巴黎的热门观光景点。

en: We visited several sightseeing spots during our trip to Japan.
cn: 我们在日本旅行期间参观了几个观光景点。

en: When he fell into the river, he immediately called for help.
cn: 他掉进河里时，立即呼救。

en: The stranded hikers had to call for help using their satellite phone.
cn: 被困的徒步旅行者不得不用卫星电话求救。

en: The government plans to bring down inflation rates.
cn: 政府计划降低通货膨胀率。

en: Efforts to bring down crime in the city have been successful.
cn: 降低城市犯罪率的努力已经取得了成功。

en: Many rare species exist in the Amazon rainforest.
cn: 许多稀有物种存在于亚马逊雨林中。

en: Opportunities for growth exist in every challenge.
cn: 成长的机会存在于每一个挑战中。

en: The new TV show aims to increase ratings for the network.
cn: 这部新电视节目旨在提高该电视网的收视率。

en: Positive reviews helped increase the restaurant's ratings online.
cn: 好评有助于提高这家餐厅的在线评分。

en: Her academic achievements did her parents proud.
cn: 她的学业成就让她的父母感到骄傲。

en: The team's victory did the entire school proud.
cn: 团队的胜利让整个学校都感到骄傲。

en: The bully called him names during recess.
cn: 那个恶霸在课间休息时辱骂他。

en: It's not polite to call people names just because you disagree with them.
cn: 仅仅因为不同意就辱骂别人是不礼貌的。

en: After winning the award, he started to have a swelled head.
cn: 获奖后，他开始变得自负。

en: Don't let success give you a swelled head.
cn: 不要让成功让你变得骄傲自大。

en: I have my eye out for a good deal on a used car.
cn: 我正在留意二手车的优惠交易。

en: She has her eye out for opportunities to advance her career.
cn: 她正在寻找职业发展的机会。

en: The company decided to scale down its operations due to budget cuts.
cn: 由于预算削减，公司决定缩减运营规模。

en: We need to scale down the project to meet the deadline.
cn: 我们需要缩减项目规模以赶上截止日期。

en: After the meeting, he fell to work on the report.
cn: 会议结束后，他开始着手写报告。

en: The children fell to playing as soon as they arrived at the park.
cn: 孩子们一到公园就开始玩耍。

en: She did her utmost to finish the assignment on time.
cn: 她竭尽全力按时完成作业。

en: The rescue team did their utmost to save the trapped miners.
cn: 救援队竭尽全力营救被困的矿工。

en: He promised to help, but he let me down at the last minute.
cn: 他答应帮忙，但在最后一刻让我失望了。

en: Don't let your team down by not preparing for the presentation.
cn: 不要因为没准备演讲而让你的团队失望。

en: He proposed marriage to her on a beach at sunset.
cn: 他在日落时的海滩上向她求婚。

en: She was surprised when he proposed marriage after only six months of dating.
cn: 当他在约会仅六个月后求婚时，她感到惊讶。

en: I met her a while back at a conference.
cn: 我不久前在一次会议上见过她。

en: He moved to New York a while back.
cn: 他不久前搬到了纽约。

en: The new law will come into operation next month.
cn: 新法律将于下个月生效。

en: The factory came into operation after extensive testing.
cn: 经过广泛测试后，工厂开始运行。

en: The government's infrastructure projects aim to create employment.
cn: 政府的基础设施项目旨在创造就业机会。

en: Small businesses are important to create employment in local communities.
cn: 小企业对在当地社区创造就业机会很重要。

en: Since it's raining, we may just as well stay indoors.
cn: 既然下雨了，我们不妨待在室内。

en: You may just as well ask for help if you're struggling with the task.
cn: 如果你在任务上遇到困难，不妨寻求帮助。

en: I am in sympathy with the victims of the disaster.
cn: 我同情这场灾难的受害者。

en: Many people are in sympathy with the environmental movement.
cn: 许多人赞同环保运动。

en: She tucks away her savings in a secret bank account.
cn: 她把积蓄藏在一个秘密的银行账户里。

en: We tucked away the old photos in a box in the attic.
cn: 我们把旧照片存放在阁楼的一个盒子里。

en: He is not always punctual, but he tries his best.
cn: 他并非总是准时，但他尽力了。

en: The weather in this region is not always sunny; it can be unpredictable.
cn: 这个地区的天气不总是晴朗的；它可能变化无常。

en: Go on! Tell me what happened next in the story.
cn: 继续！告诉我故事接下来发生了什么。

en: When she hesitated, he encouraged her by saying, 'Go on, you can do it!'
cn: 当她犹豫时，他鼓励她说：'继续，你能行的！'

en: She took to painting as a hobby after retiring.
cn: 退休后，她开始喜欢上绘画作为爱好。

en: The children quickly took to their new teacher because of her kindness.
cn: 孩子们很快对新老师产生了好感，因为她很友善。

en: The country is in the grip of a severe economic crisis.
cn: 这个国家正处于严重的经济危机掌控中。

en: He was in the grip of fear and couldn't move during the earthquake.
cn: 地震时，他受恐惧控制，无法动弹。

en: She only shares her deepest secrets with her close friends.
cn: 她只与亲密朋友分享她最深的秘密。

en: We've been close friends since childhood and trust each other completely.
cn: 我们从小就是挚友，完全信任彼此。

en: The bullies worked him over after school, leaving him with bruises.
cn: 放学后，恶霸们殴打了他，留下瘀伤。

en: In the movie, the gangsters worked over the informant to get information.
cn: 在电影中，黑帮分子粗暴对待线人以获取信息。

en: He was found in possession of illegal drugs during the police search.
cn: 在警方搜查中，他被发现持有非法毒品。

en: She is in possession of a rare antique that has been in her family for generations.
cn: 她拥有一件稀有的古董，已在家族中传了几代。

en: On weekends, they just sit around watching TV all day.
cn: 周末，他们只是闲坐着看一整天电视。

en: Don't just sit around; go out and do something productive!
cn: 别只是无所事事；出去做些有成效的事！

en: She talked her friend into joining the hiking trip despite the bad weather.
cn: 尽管天气不好，她说服朋友参加了徒步旅行。

en: He managed to talk his boss into giving him a raise after presenting his achievements.
cn: 在展示成就后，他成功说服老板给他加薪。

en: The giant panda was once on the brink of extinction but has since recovered due to conservation efforts.
cn: 大熊猫曾一度濒临灭绝，但由于保护努力已恢复。

en: Many species are on the brink of extinction due to habitat loss and climate change.
cn: 由于栖息地丧失和气候变化，许多物种濒临灭绝。

en: That cloud looks like a dragon in the sky.
cn: 那朵云看起来像天空中的一条龙。

en: She looks like her mother with the same smile and eyes.
cn: 她看起来像她母亲，有着相同的微笑和眼睛。

en: If you study hard, you are more likely to pass the exam.
cn: 如果你努力学习，你更可能通过考试。

en: In winter, it is more likely to snow in mountainous regions.
cn: 在冬季，山区更可能下雪。

en: Her performance was nearly perfect, earning her a standing ovation.
cn: 她的表演近乎完美，赢得了起立鼓掌。

en: The weather for the picnic was nearly perfect, with clear skies and a gentle breeze.
cn: 野餐的天气近乎完美，天空晴朗，微风轻拂。

en: The new regulations put many obstacles in the way of small businesses trying to expand.
cn: 新规定给试图扩张的小企业设置了许多障碍。

en: She didn't want to put anything in the way of her children's education.
cn: 她不想阻碍孩子们的教育。

en: There are a lot of books on the shelf, covering various topics.
cn: 书架上有许多书，涵盖各种主题。

en: She has a lot of experience in managing projects, which makes her a valuable team member.
cn: 她在管理项目方面有大量经验，这使她成为宝贵的团队成员。

en: She has kept a diary since she was ten years old to record her daily thoughts.
cn: 她从十岁起就记日记，记录日常想法。

en: Keeping a diary helps him reflect on his experiences and personal growth.
cn: 记日记帮助他反思经历和个人成长。

en: The lawyer spoke on behalf of her client during the court hearing.
cn: 律师在法庭听证会上代表她的客户发言。

en: On behalf of the entire team, I would like to thank you for your support.
cn: 我代表整个团队，感谢您的支持。

en: The new software is designed to meet the needs of both beginners and advanced users.
cn: 新软件旨在满足初学者和高级用户的需求。

en: A balanced diet is essential to meet one's nutritional needs for good health.
cn: 均衡饮食对于满足营养需求以保持健康至关重要。

en: The project was completed on schedule despite the challenges.
cn: 尽管面临挑战，项目还是按时完成了。

en: The train arrived on schedule, so we didn't have to wait.
cn: 火车准时到达，所以我们不必等待。

en: Don't just stand about; help us clean up the room.
cn: 别光站着，帮我们打扫房间。

en: The workers were standing about waiting for instructions.
cn: 工人们闲站着等待指示。

en: I decided to go along with their plan because it seemed reasonable.
cn: 我决定同意他们的计划，因为它看起来合理。

en: He didn't want to go along with the decision, but he had no choice.
cn: 他不想赞同这个决定，但别无选择。

en: You should make an effort to improve your English skills.
cn: 你应该努力提高你的英语技能。

en: He made an effort to arrive on time for the meeting.
cn: 他努力准时参加会议。

en: They adapted the novel for a television series.
cn: 他们将这部小说改编成了电视剧。

en: The software was adapted for use on mobile devices.
cn: 这款软件被改编用于移动设备。

en: This new policy aims to satisfy the need of low-income families.
cn: 这项新政策旨在满足低收入家庭的需求。

en: The company developed a product to satisfy the need of elderly users.
cn: 公司开发了一款产品来满足老年用户的需求。

en: We need to make a fire to keep warm in the cold night.
cn: 我们需要生火在寒冷的夜晚保暖。

en: He knows how to make a fire using only sticks and leaves.
cn: 他知道如何只用树枝和树叶生火。

en: Can you lend me a hand with moving this heavy furniture?
cn: 你能帮我搬一下这件重家具吗？

en: She always lends a hand to her neighbors when they need help.
cn: 当邻居需要帮助时，她总是伸出援手。

en: The city is promoting public transport to reduce private car use.
cn: 该市正在推广公共交通以减少私家车使用。

en: Private car use has increased significantly in urban areas.
cn: 在城市地区，私家车使用显著增加。

en: They managed to bring off the difficult project on time.
cn: 他们设法按时完成了这个困难的项目。

en: It was a risky plan, but she brought it off perfectly.
cn: 这是一个冒险的计划，但她完美地实现了它。

en: Please include a packing list with the shipment for customs clearance.
cn: 请在货物中附上装箱单以便清关。

en: The packing list details all items in the package.
cn: 装箱单详细列出了包裹中的所有物品。

en: You better watch your step on the icy sidewalk to avoid slipping.
cn: 在结冰的人行道上，你最好小心行走以防滑倒。

en: In this competitive industry, you better watch your step to stay ahead.
cn: 在这个竞争激烈的行业，你最好谨慎行事以保持领先。

en: His plan to become a millionaire overnight is just pie in the sky.
cn: 他一夜成为百万富翁的计划只是空中楼阁。

en: Don't believe those pie in the sky promises; they're unrealistic.
cn: 别相信那些不切实际的承诺；它们不现实。

en: The finish line is in sight, so keep running!
cn: 终点线在望，继续跑！

en: After hours of hiking, the mountain peak was finally in sight.
cn: 经过数小时的徒步，山峰终于可见了。

en: The police charged him with theft after finding evidence.
cn: 警方在找到证据后指控他犯有盗窃罪。

en: She was charged with fraud for her involvement in the scam.
cn: 她因参与诈骗而被指控犯有欺诈罪。

en: Children are often curious about how things work.
cn: 孩子们常常对事物如何运作感到好奇。

en: She was curious about the new neighbor and decided to introduce herself.
cn: 她对新邻居感到好奇，决定自我介绍。

en: Many small businesses went to the wall during the economic crisis.
cn: 在经济危机期间，许多小企业破产了。

en: If we don't improve sales, our company might go to the wall.
cn: 如果我们不提高销售额，我们的公司可能会失败。

en: She came into a large fortune after her grandfather passed away.
cn: 她的祖父去世后，她继承了一大笔财产。

en: He came into the family business when he turned 30.
cn: 他30岁时继承了家族企业。

en: The more you practice, the more skilled you become.
cn: 你练习得越多，就越熟练。

en: The more he studied, the more confused he felt about the topic.
cn: 他学得越多，对这个话题就越感到困惑。

en: There's a long waiting list for the new iPhone.
cn: 新款iPhone的等候名单很长。

en: The restaurant has a long waiting list on weekends.
cn: 这家餐厅周末的等候名单很长。

en: Students learn about history from textbooks and documentaries.
cn: 学生们从教科书和纪录片中了解历史。

en: I want to learn about different cultures by traveling the world.
cn: 我想通过环游世界来了解不同的文化。

en: The hotel has a pool, and what's more, it's free for guests.
cn: 这家酒店有游泳池，而且对客人免费。

en: She's intelligent, and what's more, she works very hard.
cn: 她很聪明，而且工作非常努力。

en: Do you have this book in stock?
cn: 这本书你们有现货吗？

en: We have several sizes in stock for immediate delivery.
cn: 我们有多种尺码的现货，可以立即发货。

en: Let's run through the presentation one more time.
cn: 让我们再快速排练一遍演示。

en: He ran through the list of names quickly.
cn: 他快速浏览了一遍名单。

en: Food prices have risen sharply this year.
cn: 今年食品价格大幅上涨。

en: The government is trying to control food prices.
cn: 政府正试图控制食品价格。

en: Keep your eye out for any suspicious activity.
cn: 留意任何可疑活动。

en: I'm keeping my eye out for a good used car.
cn: 我正在留意寻找一辆好的二手车。

en: He turned about and walked away without a word.
cn: 他转身一言不发地走开了。

en: The company's fortunes turned about after the new CEO took over.
cn: 新CEO接手后，公司的命运发生了转变。

en: Broadway is famous for its musical shows.
cn: 百老汇以其音乐剧而闻名。

en: We went to see several musical shows during our trip to London.
cn: 我们在伦敦旅行期间去看了几场音乐表演。

en: The teacher asked students to give comments on the story.
cn: 老师让学生们对故事发表评论。

en: I'd like to give comments on the proposed changes.
cn: 我想对提议的更改发表评论。

en: The people bowed down before the king.
cn: 人们向国王鞠躬。

en: He refused to bow down to pressure from his opponents.
cn: 他拒绝屈服于对手的压力。

en: The child always gets his way by crying.
cn: 这个孩子总是通过哭闹来达到目的。

en: She usually gets her way in business negotiations.
cn: 在商业谈判中她通常能如愿以偿。

en: I'd be delighted to help you with your project.
cn: 我很高兴帮助你完成项目。

en: We were delighted to hear the good news.
cn: 听到这个好消息我们很高兴。

en: The novel's mysterious plot aroused my interest.
cn: 这部小说神秘的情节引起了我的兴趣。

en: His speech aroused the audience's interest in environmental issues.
cn: 他的演讲引起了观众对环境问题的兴趣。

en: The agreement was made without prejudice to future negotiations.
cn: 达成此协议不影响未来的谈判。

en: The payment is accepted without prejudice to our rights.
cn: 接受付款不影响我们的权利。

en: As a music lover, she attends concerts regularly.
cn: 作为一名音乐爱好者，她定期参加音乐会。

en: This radio station is popular among music lovers.
cn: 这个电台在音乐爱好者中很受欢迎。

en: The video is available on demand.
cn: 这个视频可以按需观看。

en: Payment will be made on demand.
cn: 一经要求即付款。

en: He blacked out after hitting his head.
cn: 他撞到头后昏厥了。

en: The patient blacked out during the procedure.
cn: 病人在手术过程中失去了知觉。

en: She began to despair of ever finding a job.
cn: 她开始对找到工作感到绝望。

en: I despair of him ever changing his habits.
cn: 我对他改变习惯感到绝望。

en: After the accident, he decided to mend his ways and drive more carefully.
cn: 事故发生后，他决定改过自新，更加小心驾驶。

en: The judge gave him a chance to mend his ways instead of sending him to prison.
cn: 法官给了他一个改过自新的机会，而不是送他进监狱。

en: The manager keeps tabs on all the projects.
cn: 经理密切注意所有项目。

en: Parents should keep tabs on their children's online activities.
cn: 父母应该密切注意孩子的在线活动。

en: We use disposable paper cups at the office to serve coffee to guests.
cn: 我们在办公室使用一次性纸杯给客人提供咖啡。

en: To reduce waste, some cafes have stopped offering disposable paper cups.
cn: 为了减少浪费，一些咖啡馆已停止提供一次性纸杯。

en: He finally got up enough nerve to ask his boss for a raise.
cn: 他终于鼓起勇气向老板要求加薪。

en: It took her weeks to get up enough nerve to try skydiving.
cn: 她花了数周才鼓起勇气尝试跳伞。

en: The river is heavily polluted due to industrial waste dumping.
cn: 由于工业废料倾倒，这条河严重污染。

en: Living in a heavily polluted city can lead to health problems.
cn: 生活在严重污染的城市可能导致健康问题。

en: Let's take five and grab a coffee before we continue the meeting.
cn: 让我们休息五分钟，喝杯咖啡再继续开会。

en: After two hours of studying, she decided to take five to relax.
cn: 学习两小时后，她决定休息五分钟放松一下。

en: Can you have a look at this document and see if there are any errors?
cn: 你能看一下这份文件，看看有没有错误吗？

en: I'll have a look at the car engine to diagnose the problem.
cn: 我会检查一下汽车引擎来诊断问题。

en: He always buys the latest gadgets as soon as they are released.
cn: 他总是最新小玩意一发布就购买。

en: The store showcases the latest gadgets from various tech companies.
cn: 这家商店展示来自不同科技公司的最新科技产品。

en: It goes against the grain for him to be dishonest.
cn: 不诚实违反了他的本性。

en: Her decision went against the grain of company policy.
cn: 她的决定违背了公司政策的常理。

en: We need to get cracking if we want to finish this project on time.
cn: 如果我们想按时完成这个项目，就需要开始行动。

en: Get cracking on your homework before it gets too late.
cn: 赶紧做你的作业，别太晚了。

en: She spoke on her colleague's behalf at the conference.
cn: 她在会议上代表她的同事发言。

en: I'll sign the contract on your behalf since you're unavailable.
cn: 既然你不在，我将代表你签署合同。

en: The workers decided to stick out for better working conditions.
cn: 工人们决定坚持要求更好的工作条件。

en: She stuck out for a higher salary during the job interview.
cn: 她在工作面试中争取更高的薪水。

en: The price of fruits can vary with the season.
cn: 水果的价格可能随季节而变化。

en: Her mood tends to vary with the weather.
cn: 她的情绪往往随天气而变化。

en: Vaccines help protect against certain diseases.
cn: 疫苗有助于防止某些疾病。

en: Wearing sunscreen can protect against skin damage from the sun.
cn: 涂防晒霜可以保护免受太阳对皮肤的伤害。

en: This neighborhood has gone to the dogs since the new management took over.
cn: 自从新管理层接手后，这个社区就衰败了。

en: If we don't maintain the equipment, the whole system will go to the dogs.
cn: 如果我们不维护设备，整个系统就会堕落。

en: I've been meaning to clean the garage, but I haven't gotten around to it yet.
cn: 我一直想清理车库，但还没抽出时间去做。

en: She finally got around to reading that book she bought months ago.
cn: 她终于抽出时间去读几个月前买的那本书。

en: He decided to bring up the issue during the meeting.
cn: 他决定在会议上提出这个问题。

en: It's challenging to bring up children in a busy city.
cn: 在繁忙的城市抚养孩子很有挑战性。

en: Many people watch videos online to learn new skills.
cn: 许多人在线观看视频以学习新技能。

en: She likes to watch videos online to relax after work.
cn: 她喜欢下班后在线观看视频来放松。

en: His success story is a case in point of how hard work pays off.
cn: 他的成功故事是努力会有回报的恰当例子。

en: The recent data breach is a case in point of the need for better cybersecurity.
cn: 最近的数据泄露是需要更好网络安全的例证。

en: The thief ran off with the stolen goods before the police arrived.
cn: 小偷在警察到达前带着赃物跑掉了。

en: Can you run off a few copies of this report for the meeting?
cn: 你能为会议复印几份这份报告吗？

en: She has an eye for beautiful antiques.
cn: 她对美丽的古董有鉴赏力。

en: He has an eye for detail in his architectural designs.
cn: 他在建筑设计中注重细节。

en: Let's get this paperwork out of the way before the meeting.
cn: 让我们在会议前把这些文书工作处理掉。

en: I need to get my chores out of the way so I can relax.
cn: 我需要完成家务，这样我才能放松。

en: The child threw up after eating too much candy.
cn: 孩子吃了太多糖果后呕吐了。

en: She felt nauseous and had to throw up.
cn: 她感到恶心，不得不呕吐。

en: He decided to skip a lecture to catch up on sleep.
cn: 他决定逃课去补觉。

en: If you skip a lecture, you might miss important information.
cn: 如果你错过讲座，可能会漏掉重要信息。

en: His honesty gave him a reputation for trustworthiness.
cn: 他的诚实给他带来了可信赖的名声。

en: The scandal gave the politician a bad reputation.
cn: 丑闻给这位政治家带来了坏名声。

en: The new building has ramps for people with disabilities.
cn: 新大楼为残疾人设置了坡道。

en: Society should provide equal opportunities for people with disabilities.
cn: 社会应该为残疾人提供平等的机会。

en: Can you give me a rough idea of how much this project will cost?
cn: 你能给我一个大概的概念，这个项目要花多少钱吗？

en: The manager gave us a rough idea of the new marketing strategy.
cn: 经理给了我们新营销策略的一个大概概念。

en: Just give it to me straight—did I get the job?
cn: 直截了当地告诉我——我得到这份工作了吗？

en: She gave it to him straight about his poor performance.
cn: 她直截了当地告诉他表现不佳。

en: The store sells all kinds of fruits and vegetables.
cn: 这家商店出售各种各样的水果和蔬菜。

en: She has all kinds of hobbies, from painting to hiking.
cn: 她有各种各样的爱好，从绘画到徒步旅行。

en: They forced the water out through the pipe using pressure.
cn: 他们用压力迫使水通过管道流出。

en: The protesters forced their way out through the barricade.
cn: 抗议者强行通过路障出去。

en: The boss gave her a free hand to manage the project.
cn: 老板给了她自由处理权来管理这个项目。

en: Parents should give their children a free hand in choosing their hobbies.
cn: 父母应该给孩子自由选择爱好的权利。

en: At the end of the year, the company takes stock of its inventory.
cn: 年底时，公司盘点库存。

en: It's time to take stock of your life and set new goals.
cn: 是时候评估你的生活并设定新目标了。

en: The children are eager to open their presents on Christmas morning.
cn: 孩子们渴望在圣诞节早上打开礼物。

en: He is eager to start his new job next week.
cn: 他渴望下周开始他的新工作。

en: He has a bee in his bonnet about recycling and talks about it constantly.
cn: 他对回收利用念念不忘，经常谈论它。

en: She has a bee in her bonnet that the project will fail, despite evidence to the contrary.
cn: 她固执地认为这个项目会失败，尽管有相反的证据。

en: It's hard to keep up with the latest technology trends.
cn: 很难跟上最新的技术趋势。

en: She exercises regularly to keep up with her fitness goals.
cn: 她定期锻炼以跟上她的健身目标。

en: The magician's tricks were beyond belief.
cn: 魔术师的戏法令人难以置信。

en: Her kindness to strangers is beyond belief.
cn: 她对陌生人的善良令人难以置信。

en: We are on the way toward achieving our sales targets for the year.
cn: 我们正在通往实现年度销售目标的路上。

en: The country is on the way toward economic recovery after the crisis.
cn: 这个国家在危机后正在通往经济复苏的路上。

en: She has more than ten years of experience in this field.
cn: 她在这个领域有超过十年的经验。

en: The project cost more than we expected.
cn: 这个项目的花费超过了我们的预期。

en: You need to weigh up the pros and cons before making a decision.
cn: 在做决定前，你需要权衡利弊。

en: The jury weighed up the evidence carefully in the trial.
cn: 陪审团在审判中仔细评估了证据。

en: The success of the project hinges upon securing adequate funding.
cn: 项目的成功取决于能否获得足够的资金。

en: His decision hinges upon the outcome of the meeting.
cn: 他的决定取决于会议的结果。

en: She is busy with her homework and can't join us.
cn: 她正忙于做作业，不能加入我们。

en: He was busy with preparations for the conference all week.
cn: 他整个星期都忙于会议准备工作。

en: She always stands up for her friends when they are in trouble.
cn: 当朋友遇到麻烦时，她总是支持他们。

en: It's important to stand up for your beliefs in a debate.
cn: 在辩论中维护自己的信念很重要。

en: Online retailers like Amazon have transformed shopping habits.
cn: 像亚马逊这样的在线零售商已经改变了购物习惯。

en: Many traditional stores now compete with online retailers.
cn: 许多传统商店现在与在线零售商竞争。

en: She sighed in relief when she heard the good news.
cn: 当她听到好消息时，她如释重负地叹了口气。

en: He smiled in relief after passing the difficult exam.
cn: 通过困难的考试后，他如释重负地笑了。

en: After months of debt, he finally got his head above water.
cn: 经过数月的债务，他终于摆脱了困境。

en: With this new job, I can get my head above water financially.
cn: 有了这份新工作，我可以在经济上勉强维持。

en: I see no objection to your proposal; let's proceed.
cn: 我对你的提议没有异议，我们继续吧。

en: The committee saw no objection to the new policy.
cn: 委员会对新政策没有异议。

en: Reading books is a great way to expand your knowledge.
cn: 读书是扩展知识的好方法。

en: He traveled abroad to expand his knowledge of different cultures.
cn: 他出国旅行以扩展对不同文化的了解。

en: The region decided to break away and form its own country.
cn: 该地区决定脱离并成立自己的国家。

en: She broke away from the group to explore on her own.
cn: 她脱离小组独自探索。

en: This restaurant caters to vegetarian customers.
cn: 这家餐厅迎合素食顾客。

en: The school caters to the needs of students with disabilities.
cn: 学校满足残疾学生的需求。

en: The workers are on strike for better wages.
cn: 工人们正在罢工要求更高的工资。

en: The airline staff were on strike, causing flight cancellations.
cn: 航空公司员工在罢工，导致航班取消。

en: His fear got the better of him, and he couldn't speak.
cn: 恐惧战胜了他，他无法说话。

en: In the end, patience got the better of anger in the argument.
cn: 最终，在争论中耐心战胜了愤怒。

en: He decided to go cold turkey and quit smoking immediately.
cn: 他决定突然戒除，立即戒烟。

en: After years of drinking, she went cold turkey and hasn't touched alcohol since.
cn: 多年饮酒后，她突然戒除，从此再没碰过酒。

en: Please count up all the votes and announce the result.
cn: 请计算所有选票并宣布结果。

en: She counted up the expenses to see how much she spent.
cn: 她把开支加起来看花了多少钱。

en: We'll finish the project one way or another by Friday.
cn: 无论如何，我们会在周五前完成这个项目。

en: One way or another, I'll find a solution to this problem.
cn: 无论如何，我会找到这个问题的解决方案。

en: The divorce rate has been increasing in many countries.
cn: 许多国家的离婚率一直在上升。

en: Researchers study the divorce rate to understand social trends.
cn: 研究人员研究离婚率以了解社会趋势。

en: You should stick to your diet to lose weight effectively.
cn: 你应该坚持节食以有效减肥。

en: He sticks to the rules even when it's inconvenient.
cn: 即使不方便，他也遵守规则。

en: She draws on her experience to solve new problems.
cn: 她利用自己的经验来解决新问题。

en: The author draws on historical events for inspiration.
cn: 作者从历史事件中汲取灵感。

en: I tried to explain, but I couldn't get through to him.
cn: 我试图解释，但无法让他理解。

en: After many attempts, she finally got through to her stubborn friend.
cn: 经过多次尝试，她终于与固执的朋友沟通成功。

en: He made light of his injury, but it turned out to be serious.
cn: 他轻描淡写地对待自己的伤势，但结果证明很严重。

en: Don't make light of her concerns; they are valid.
cn: 不要轻视她的担忧；这些担忧是合理的。

en: That old house gives me the creeps at night.
cn: 那栋老房子在晚上让我感到毛骨悚然。

en: I have the creeps whenever I watch horror movies.
cn: 每当我看恐怖电影时，我都会起鸡皮疙瘩。

en: We need to pack up our camping gear before leaving.
cn: 我们需要在离开前收拾好露营装备。

en: She packed up her books and moved to a new apartment.
cn: 她收拾好书籍，搬到了新公寓。

en: You got that right—this is the best pizza in town.
cn: 你说得对——这是镇上最好的披萨。

en: If you think it's too expensive, you got that right.
cn: 如果你觉得太贵了，你说得没错。

en: She worked hard to get on in life and became a successful lawyer.
cn: 她努力工作以在生活中取得成功，成为了一名成功的律师。

en: Education is key to getting on in life.
cn: 教育是在生活中取得进步的关键。

en: After much discussion, they settled upon a date for the wedding.
cn: 经过多次讨论，他们决定了婚礼的日期。

en: We settled upon blue as the color for the new logo.
cn: 我们选择了蓝色作为新标志的颜色。

en: The class scored with an average of 85% on the test.
cn: 这个班级在测试中平均得分为85%。

en: The company produces with an average of 100 units per day.
cn: 该公司平均每天生产100个单位。

en: The government took a hard line with protesters to maintain order.
cn: 政府对抗议者采取强硬态度以维持秩序。

en: Parents should take a hard line with children who break rules.
cn: 父母应对违反规则的孩子采取严格态度。

en: We discussed movies, books, and that sort of thing.
cn: 我们讨论了电影、书籍以及类似的东西。

en: He's into hiking, camping, that sort of thing.
cn: 他喜欢徒步、露营之类的事情。

en: The music was playing at full blast, so we couldn't hear each other.
cn: 音乐以最大音量播放，所以我们听不到彼此说话。

en: The factory operates at full blast during peak season.
cn: 工厂在旺季以最大强度运行。

en: We divided up the tasks among team members.
cn: 我们在团队成员之间分配了任务。

en: The inheritance was divided up equally among the siblings.
cn: 遗产在兄弟姐妹之间平均分配。

en: Poor sanitation in the area led to disease outbreaks.
cn: 该地区卫生条件差导致了疾病爆发。

en: Improving poor sanitation is crucial for public health.
cn: 改善卫生条件差对公共卫生至关重要。

en: Whether you go or stay, let me know your decision.
cn: 无论你是去是留，请告诉我你的决定。

en: We'll proceed whether it rains or shines.
cn: 无论下雨还是晴天，我们都会继续。

en: Parents often buy educational toys to help children learn.
cn: 父母经常购买教育性玩具来帮助孩子学习。

en: This educational toy teaches basic math skills.
cn: 这个教育性玩具教授基础数学技能。

en: The new factory has been in operation since January.
cn: 新工厂自一月份以来一直在运行。

en: The system is currently in operation and functioning well.
cn: 该系统目前正在运行且功能良好。

en: A strange thing happened to me on the way home.
cn: 在回家的路上，一件奇怪的事发生在我身上。

en: What happened to him after the accident?
cn: 事故后他发生了什么？

en: Separate the eggs into whites and yolks.
cn: 将鸡蛋分成蛋白和蛋黄。

en: We separated the students into groups for the project.
cn: 我们将学生分成小组进行项目。

en: In the debate, she refused to take sides.
cn: 在辩论中，她拒绝支持任何一方。

en: Parents should avoid taking sides in sibling arguments.
cn: 父母应避免在兄弟姐妹的争吵中偏袒一方。

en: Students must complete the course to get credit.
cn: 学生必须完成课程才能获得学分。

en: She got credit for her innovative research.
cn: 她因其创新研究获得了认可。

en: To some extent, I agree with your point.
cn: 在某种程度上，我同意你的观点。

en: The problem is solved to some extent, but not completely.
cn: 问题在某种程度上解决了，但并非完全解决。

en: They have a thing going, but they're not officially dating.
cn: 他们之间有暧昧关系，但还没有正式交往。

en: We have a thing going with that new project at work.
cn: 我们在工作中那个新项目上进展顺利。

en: Many shops on high streets are struggling due to online competition.
cn: 由于在线竞争，主要商业街上的许多商店都在挣扎。

en: You can find the bank on high streets in most towns.
cn: 在大多数城镇的主要商业街上都能找到银行。

en: It took her time to come to grips with the loss of her job.
cn: 她花了一些时间来认真处理失业的问题。

en: We need to come to grips with the challenges ahead.
cn: 我们需要认真处理前方的挑战。

en: She felt she had a raw deal when she was passed over for promotion.
cn: 当她被忽略晋升时，她觉得自己受到了不公平待遇。

en: The workers had a raw deal with the new contract terms.
cn: 工人们在新合同条款下受到了不公平待遇。

en: She bought the dress on impulse without thinking about the cost.
cn: 她一时冲动买了那条裙子，没考虑价格。

en: He decided to travel on impulse and booked a flight immediately.
cn: 他一时冲动决定旅行，并立即预订了航班。

en: I make a point of exercising every morning to stay healthy.
cn: 我特意每天早上锻炼以保持健康。

en: She makes a point of thanking her team after every project.
cn: 她在每个项目后都特意感谢她的团队。

en: His constant complaining really gets on my nerves.
cn: 他不断的抱怨真的惹恼了我。

en: The loud music from next door is getting on her nerves.
cn: 隔壁的吵闹音乐正在惹恼她。

en: The rebels took up arms against the government.
cn: 叛军拿起武器反对政府。

en: They decided to take up arms against the invading forces.
cn: 他们决定拿起武器反对入侵的军队。

en: Murder and robbery are considered serious crimes.
cn: 谋杀和抢劫被认为是严重罪行。

en: The police prioritize investigating serious crimes.
cn: 警方优先调查严重罪行。

en: The company provides employees with health insurance.
cn: 公司为员工提供健康保险。

en: Can you provide me with more details about the event?
cn: 你能提供给我更多关于活动的细节吗？

en: This old car screams for a repair.
cn: 这辆旧车迫切需要修理。

en: The situation screams for immediate attention.
cn: 这种情况迫切需要立即关注。

en: I'm going to have a day off tomorrow to relax.
cn: 我明天要休息一天来放松。

en: She has a day off every week to spend time with family.
cn: 她每周休息一天来陪伴家人。

en: Your achievements do credit to your hard work.
cn: 你的成就为你的辛勤工作增光。

en: The team's performance did credit to their coach.
cn: 团队的表现为他们教练增光。

en: I need to choose a paper topic for my history class.
cn: 我需要为我的历史课选择一个论文主题。

en: Her paper topic focuses on climate change effects.
cn: 她的论文主题聚焦于气候变化的影响。

en: She always shops around to get the best deal.
cn: 她总是货比三家以获得最优惠的交易。

en: We negotiated hard to get the best deal on the car.
cn: 我们努力谈判以获得汽车的最优惠交易。

en: The expenses add up to over $1000.
cn: 费用总计超过1000美元。

en: All these small efforts add up to significant progress.
cn: 所有这些小努力总计达到显著的进步。

en: I need to enquire about the availability of rooms.
cn: 我需要询问关于房间的可用性。

en: She enquired about the job application process.
cn: 她询问了关于工作申请流程。

en: He went off half-cocked and made a decision without all the facts.
cn: 他仓促行动，在没有所有事实的情况下做出了决定。

en: Don't go off half-cocked; let's plan this carefully.
cn: 不要仓促行动；让我们仔细计划。

en: Local charity groups organized a food drive for the homeless.
cn: 当地慈善团体为无家可归者组织了一次食品募捐活动。

en: Many charity groups rely on volunteers to run their operations.
cn: 许多慈善团体依靠志愿者来运营他们的活动。

en: The hotel staff is at your service 24 hours a day.
cn: 酒店员工全天24小时听候您的吩咐。

en: As your assistant, I am at your service for any tasks you need.
cn: 作为您的助手，我随时听候您的吩咐处理任何任务。

en: The presentation will begin with an overview of the project.
cn: 演示将以项目概述开始。

en: Let's begin with a simple exercise to warm up.
cn: 让我们从一个简单的练习开始来热身。

en: The bully threatened to give him a black eye if he didn't hand over his lunch money.
cn: 那个恶霸威胁说，如果他不交出午餐钱，就把他打得鼻青脸肿。

en: During the fight, one of the players gave the other a black eye.
cn: 在打斗中，一名球员把另一名打得鼻青脸肿。

en: I always enjoy the company of my friends on weekends.
cn: 我总是享受周末朋友的陪伴。

en: She enjoys the company of her grandchildren.
cn: 她享受孙辈的陪伴。

en: Despite the provocation, she managed to keep her temper and respond calmly.
cn: 尽管受到挑衅，她还是设法忍住脾气，冷静回应。

en: It's important to keep your temper in stressful situations at work.
cn: 在工作中的压力情况下，忍住脾气很重要。

en: This shirt goes well with those pants.
cn: 这件衬衫和那条裤子很相配。

en: I'll go with you to the store.
cn: 我会和你一起去商店。

en: Can you look after my dog while I'm on vacation?
cn: 我度假期间，你能照顾我的狗吗？

en: She looks after her elderly parents with great care.
cn: 她非常细心地照顾年迈的父母。

en: She plans to complete a degree in engineering next year.
cn: 她计划明年完成工程学学位。

en: After completing a degree in biology, he pursued a career in research.
cn: 在完成生物学学位后，他从事了研究工作。

en: You can exchange the defective product for a new one at the store.
cn: 你可以在商店将有缺陷的产品换成一个新的。

en: He exchanged his old car for a more fuel-efficient model.
cn: 他用旧车换了一款更省油的型号。

en: The hot shower steamed up the bathroom mirror.
cn: 热水淋浴使浴室的镜子起雾了。

en: Cold weather can steam up car windows quickly.
cn: 寒冷的天气会使车窗迅速起雾。

en: The movie is based upon a true story from the 19th century.
cn: 这部电影基于19世纪的一个真实故事。

en: Our decision should be based upon solid evidence, not assumptions.
cn: 我们的决定应基于确凿的证据，而不是假设。

en: Let's kick about some ideas for the new marketing campaign.
cn: 让我们随意讨论一下新营销活动的一些想法。

en: We kicked about the proposal over coffee before making a decision.
cn: 我们在做决定前，边喝咖啡边随意讨论了提案。

en: I need a pick-me-up like a cup of coffee to get through the afternoon.
cn: 我需要一杯咖啡这样的提神东西来度过下午。

en: A short walk outside can be a great pick-me-up when you're feeling tired.
cn: 当你感到疲倦时，到外面短暂散步可以是一个很好的提神活动。

en: He held the mistake over her head to get her to agree to his terms.
cn: 他用那个错误威胁她，让她同意他的条件。

en: Don't let them hold that old debt over your head; it's been settled.
cn: 别让他们用那笔旧债威胁你；已经还清了。

en: The company aims to tap into the growing market for eco-friendly products.
cn: 该公司旨在利用不断增长的环保产品市场。

en: By using social media, we can tap into a wider audience.
cn: 通过使用社交媒体，我们可以接入更广泛的受众。

en: After months of losses, the business has turned the corner and is now profitable.
cn: 经过数月的亏损，企业已渡过难关，现在开始盈利。

en: Her health has turned the corner since she started the new treatment.
cn: 自从开始新治疗后，她的健康状况已开始好转。

en: The high cost of the project gave the committee pause before approving it.
cn: 项目的高成本让委员会在批准前停下来思考。

en: His unexpected resignation gave everyone in the office pause.
cn: 他意外的辞职让办公室里的每个人都停下来思考。

en: The union decided to hold out for better wages and working conditions.
cn: 工会决定坚持要求更好的工资和工作条件。

en: She's holding out for a job offer that matches her career goals.
cn: 她坚持要求一份符合她职业目标的工作机会。

en: During the crisis, she managed to keep her head and make rational decisions.
cn: 在危机期间，她设法保持冷静并做出理性决定。

en: It's important to keep your head when dealing with emergencies.
cn: 处理紧急情况时保持冷静很重要。

en: Even after moving abroad, she stays in touch with her old friends via video calls.
cn: 即使在移居国外后，她仍通过视频通话与老朋友保持联系。

en: It's important to stay in touch with industry trends to remain competitive.
cn: 与行业趋势保持联系以保持竞争力很重要。

en: They had to call off the meeting due to bad weather.
cn: 由于天气恶劣，他们不得不取消会议。

en: The event was called off at the last minute.
cn: 活动在最后一刻被取消了。

en: The job requires strong accounting competencies, including proficiency in financial software.
cn: 这份工作要求具备强大的会计能力，包括熟练使用财务软件。

en: Developing accounting competencies is essential for career advancement in finance.
cn: 培养会计能力对于在金融领域的职业发展至关重要。

en: The manager will hold the team accountable for meeting the project deadline.
cn: 经理将让团队对按时完成项目负责。

en: In a democracy, leaders are held accountable for their actions by the public.
cn: 在民主国家，领导人的行为由公众负责。

en: The teacher made an example of the student who cheated to deter others.
cn: 老师惩罚了作弊的学生以警示他人。

en: The company made an example of the employee to enforce the new policy.
cn: 公司惩罚了这名员工以强制执行新政策。

en: During the war, many young men were drafted into the army.
cn: 战争期间，许多年轻人被征召入伍。

en: He was drafted into service after graduating from college.
cn: 大学毕业后，他被征召服役。

en: Please get out of my way; I'm in a hurry.
cn: 请让开，我赶时间。

en: He asked the crowd to get out of his way so he could pass.
cn: 他请人群让开以便通过。

en: Her ideas are in tune with the company's values.
cn: 她的想法与公司的价值观协调一致。

en: The team needs to be in tune with each other to succeed.
cn: 团队需要彼此协调一致才能成功。

en: The company's financial budget for next year includes increased marketing expenses.
cn: 公司明年的财务预算包括增加的营销费用。

en: Creating a personal financial budget helps manage spending effectively.
cn: 制定个人财务预算有助于有效管理支出。

en: The dog tore at the fabric with its teeth.
cn: 狗用牙齿撕扯布料。

en: She tore at the package to open it quickly.
cn: 她撕扯包裹以快速打开。

en: Human activities have a significant impact on the environment.
cn: 人类活动对环境有重大影响。

en: The study focuses on human activities in urban areas.
cn: 这项研究关注城市地区的人类活动。

en: Stop fooling about and get to work!
cn: 别胡闹了，开始工作吧！

en: They were fooling about in the park instead of studying.
cn: 他们在公园胡闹而不是学习。

en: The office has a new copying machine that is very efficient.
cn: 办公室有一台非常高效的新复印机。

en: Please use the copying machine to duplicate these papers.
cn: 请使用复印机复制这些文件。

en: The crime rate in the city has decreased over the past year.
cn: 该城市的犯罪率在过去一年有所下降。

en: High crime rates can affect property values in an area.
cn: 高犯罪率会影响一个地区的房产价值。

en: With hard work, you stand a chance of winning the competition.
cn: 通过努力，你有机会赢得比赛。

en: Do you think we stand a chance of getting the contract?
cn: 你认为我们有机会获得合同吗？

en: The store is close to my house, so I walk there.
cn: 商店靠近我家，所以我步行去。

en: We live close to the beach for easy access.
cn: 我们住在海滩附近以便轻松前往。

en: The judge made an example of the criminal to deter others.
cn: 法官惩罚了这名罪犯以警示他人。

en: The company made an example of the employee for violating the rules.
cn: 公司惩罚了这名违反规定的员工作为警示。

en: The expenses amount to over $1000 this month.
cn: 本月的费用总计超过1000美元。

en: Her savings amount to a significant sum for retirement.
cn: 她的储蓄总计为一笔可观的退休金。

en: I have an overdraft on my account, so I need to deposit money soon.
cn: 我的账户有透支，所以我需要尽快存钱。

en: Having an overdraft can incur high fees from the bank.
cn: 有透支可能会产生银行的高额费用。

en: Rumors say she has a thing going with her coworker.
cn: 传闻她与同事有暧昧关系。

en: Do you think they have a thing going with each other?
cn: 你觉得他们之间有浪漫关系吗？

en: He made an ill-informed decision because he didn't research the market properly.
cn: 他做出了一个消息不灵通的决定，因为没有好好研究市场。

en: The journalist's article was criticized for being ill-informed about the local customs.
cn: 这位记者的文章因对当地习俗了解不充分而受到批评。

en: I have confidence in her ability to lead the team successfully.
cn: 我对她成功领导团队的能力有信心。

en: Investors have confidence in the company's long-term growth strategy.
cn: 投资者对公司的长期增长战略有信心。

en: The news coverage of the election was extensive and detailed.
cn: 对选举的新闻报道广泛而详细。

en: Good news coverage helps inform the public about important issues.
cn: 良好的新闻报道有助于公众了解重要问题。

en: The party was in full swing by the time we arrived.
cn: 我们到达时，派对正处在高潮。

en: Construction on the new building is in full swing.
cn: 新大楼的建设正在全面展开。

en: He wanted to get even with his colleague for stealing his idea.
cn: 他想向偷了他创意的同事报复。

en: She got even with her friend by playing a harmless prank.
cn: 她通过一个无害的恶作剧与朋友扯平了。

en: Prices vary from $10 to $50 depending on the model.
cn: 价格根据型号从10美元到50美元不等。

en: Opinions on the issue vary from strong support to complete opposition.
cn: 对这个问题的意见从强烈支持到完全反对都有。

en: They have a good thing going with their new business partnership.
cn: 他们的新商业伙伴关系进展顺利。

en: Don't ruin it—we have a good thing going here with this project.
cn: 别搞砸了——我们在这个项目上进展得很顺利。

en: She tripped over a loose cable on the floor.
cn: 她被地板上松脱的电缆绊倒了。

en: He tripped over his words during the important presentation.
cn: 他在重要演讲中说话出错了。

en: Many pop singers perform at large concerts to huge audiences.
cn: 许多流行歌手在大型音乐会上为众多观众表演。

en: Pop singers often release new albums to stay relevant in the industry.
cn: 流行歌手经常发布新专辑以在行业中保持影响力。

en: The constant noise from the construction site is driving me up the wall.
cn: 建筑工地的持续噪音让我非常恼火。

en: Her habit of interrupting others drives her colleagues up the wall.
cn: 她打断别人的习惯让她的同事们逼得发疯。

en: We have a meeting scheduled for the day after tomorrow.
cn: 我们安排在后天开会。

en: The package is expected to arrive the day after tomorrow.
cn: 包裹预计在后天到达。

en: Parents must fulfill childcare duties to ensure their children's well-being.
cn: 父母必须履行育儿职责以确保孩子的福祉。

en: She balances her career while fulfilling childcare duties at home.
cn: 她在平衡事业的同时在家履行育儿职责。

en: You shouldn't take everything you read on the internet on faith.
cn: 你不应该盲目相信在网上读到的一切。

en: He took her promise on faith without asking for proof.
cn: 他未经证实就盲目相信了她的承诺。

en: This dish has a unique taste of spices from the region.
cn: 这道菜有该地区香料的独特味道。

en: Traveling gave her a taste of different cultures around the world.
cn: 旅行让她体验了世界各地不同的文化。

en: The hotel charges $200 per night for a standard room.
cn: 这家酒店的标准间每晚收费200美元。

en: They charge extra for delivery services.
cn: 他们对送货服务额外收费。

en: We stopped by the lake to enjoy the scenery during our hike.
cn: 我们在徒步旅行时停在湖边欣赏风景。

en: Tourists often visit this park to enjoy the scenic views.
cn: 游客经常参观这个公园以欣赏风景。

en: She argued for stricter environmental regulations in the meeting.
cn: 她在会议上主张更严格的环境法规。

en: The lawyer argued for his client's innocence in court.
cn: 律师在法庭上为他的客户的无罪辩护。

en: We had a ball at the beach party last weekend.
cn: 我们上周末在海滩派对上玩得很开心。

en: The kids had a ball playing games in the park.
cn: 孩子们在公园里玩游戏玩得很开心。

en: Finding a balance between work and personal life is important for well-being.
cn: 找到工作和个人生活之间的平衡对福祉很重要。

en: The policy aims to strike a balance between economic growth and environmental protection.
cn: 这项政策旨在实现经济增长和环境保护之间的平衡。

en: Starting the project early gave us a head start on the competition.
cn: 提前开始项目让我们在竞争中有了领先起步的优势。

en: Her parents gave her a head start on learning languages by teaching her from a young age.
cn: 她的父母从小教她语言，给了她在学习语言上领先起步的优势。

en: The plan failed financially, but it succeeded in other ways, such as building team morale.
cn: 这个计划在财务上失败了，但在其他方面成功了，比如提升了团队士气。

en: You can contribute to the community in other ways, not just through donations.
cn: 你可以以其他方式为社区做贡献，不仅仅是捐款。

en: The wildfire spread over thousands of acres in just a few days.
cn: 野火在短短几天内蔓延了数千英亩。

en: She spread the map over the table to plan the route.
cn: 她把地图铺在桌子上规划路线。

en: The rapid population expansion in urban areas has led to housing shortages.
cn: 城市地区人口的快速增长导致了住房短缺。

en: Scientists study population expansion to predict future resource needs.
cn: 科学家研究人口增长以预测未来的资源需求。

en: Her name is on the tip of my tongue, but I just can't recall it right now.
cn: 她的名字就在我嘴边，但我一时想不起来。

en: The answer was on the tip of his tongue during the quiz, but he blanked out.
cn: 测验时答案就在他嘴边，但他脑子一片空白。

en: I have a sweet tooth, so I always save room for dessert.
cn: 我喜欢吃甜食，所以总会留点肚子吃甜点。

en: She has a sweet tooth and can't resist chocolate cakes.
cn: 她喜欢吃甜食，无法抗拒巧克力蛋糕。

en: Despite the loss, he kept a stiff upper lip and congratulated the winner.
cn: 尽管输了，他仍保持坚强，并向获胜者表示祝贺。

en: She kept a stiff upper lip during the crisis to reassure her team.
cn: 在危机期间，她保持坚强以安抚团队。

en: A good set of kitchen utensils makes cooking much easier.
cn: 一套好的厨房用具能让烹饪变得更容易。

en: She organized all her kitchen utensils in the drawer for quick access.
cn: 她把所有厨房用具整理在抽屉里，方便取用。

en: Please proceed to the baggage counter to check in your luggage.
cn: 请前往行李柜台办理行李托运。

en: The baggage counter at the airport was crowded with travelers.
cn: 机场的行李柜台挤满了旅客。

en: The new museum aims to attract tourists with its interactive exhibits.
cn: 新博物馆旨在通过互动展览吸引游客。

en: Beautiful beaches attract tourists from all over the world.
cn: 美丽的海滩吸引了来自世界各地的游客。

en: The company has a vacant position for a marketing manager.
cn: 公司有一个市场营销经理的空缺职位。

en: She applied for the vacant position as soon as it was advertised.
cn: 她一看到广告就申请了这个空缺职位。

en: You need to concentrate on doing your homework without distractions.
cn: 你需要专注于做作业，不要分心。

en: He concentrated on doing the task perfectly to impress his boss.
cn: 他专注于完美地完成任务，以给老板留下好印象。

en: The boss called him on the carpet for missing the deadline.
cn: 老板因他错过截止日期而严厉批评了他。

en: She was called on the carpet by her teacher for cheating on the test.
cn: 她因考试作弊被老师严厉训斥。

en: The manager turned a blind eye to the minor violations to maintain team morale.
cn: 经理对轻微违规行为视而不见，以保持团队士气。

en: She turned a blind eye to her friend's mistakes to avoid conflict.
cn: 她对朋友的错误视而不见，以避免冲突。

en: Good organizational skills are essential for project managers.
cn: 良好的组织能力对项目经理至关重要。

en: She demonstrated strong organizational skills by planning the event flawlessly.
cn: 她通过完美策划活动展示了强大的组织能力。

en: Of late, there has been a noticeable increase in online shopping.
cn: 近来，网上购物有明显增加。

en: He has been very busy of late with his new job.
cn: 他最近因新工作非常忙碌。

en: The two teams stood off in a tense match until the final minutes.
cn: 两支队伍在紧张的比赛中对峙，直到最后几分钟。

en: Negotiators stood off over the terms of the agreement for hours.
cn: 谈判代表就协议条款僵持了数小时。

en: This tradition originates from ancient cultural practices.
cn: 这个传统起源于古老的文化习俗。

en: The rumor originated from a misunderstanding among colleagues.
cn: 这个谣言源于同事间的误解。

en: The detective quickly got to the heart of the matter by interviewing key witnesses.
cn: 侦探通过采访关键证人迅速触及了问题的核心。

en: To solve the conflict, we need to get to the heart of the matter and address the root cause.
cn: 要解决冲突，我们需要触及问题的核心并处理根本原因。

en: For my part, I believe we should invest more in renewable energy.
cn: 就我而言，我认为我们应该在可再生能源上投入更多。

en: For her part, she agreed to take on additional responsibilities.
cn: 就她而言，她同意承担额外的责任。

en: The scientific study of climate change is crucial.
cn: 对气候变化的科学研究至关重要。

en: She published a scientific study on marine biology.
cn: 她发表了一篇关于海洋生物学的科学研究。

en: I finally laid my hands on that rare book.
cn: 我终于得到了那本稀有书籍。

en: She laid her hands on some valuable information.
cn: 她获取了一些有价值的信息。

en: The new policy is in effect as of today.
cn: 新政策从今天起生效。

en: In effect, the company is operating at a loss.
cn: 实际上，公司正在亏损运营。

en: He had a narrow escape from the car accident.
cn: 他在车祸中侥幸逃脱。

en: They had a narrow escape when the building collapsed.
cn: 大楼倒塌时，他们死里逃生。

en: She has a busy schedule with meetings all day.
cn: 她日程繁忙，整天都在开会。

en: Managing a busy schedule can be stressful.
cn: 管理繁忙的日程可能会有压力。

en: Everyone needs to do their share to keep the community clean.
cn: 每个人都需要尽自己的一份力来保持社区清洁。

en: She did her share of the work and helped the team succeed.
cn: 她尽了自己的一份力，帮助团队取得成功。

en: Every cloud has a silver lining.
cn: 每朵乌云背后都有一线希望。

en: The silver lining of the pandemic was more family time.
cn: 疫情的一线希望是更多的家庭时光。

en: I'll ring you back in ten minutes.
cn: 我十分钟后给你回电话。

en: She asked him to ring back later.
cn: 她让他稍后回电话。

en: Good computer skills are essential for this job.
cn: 良好的计算机技能对这份工作至关重要。

en: He improved his computer skills through online courses.
cn: 他通过在线课程提高了计算机技能。

en: They decided to make peace with each other after the argument.
cn: 争论后，他们决定与彼此和解。

en: It's time to make peace with your old friend.
cn: 是时候与你的老朋友和解了。

en: She pored through the documents to find evidence.
cn: 她仔细阅读文件以寻找证据。

en: He pored through the data for hours.
cn: 他花了几个小时深入研究数据。

en: Senior citizens often receive discounts.
cn: 老年人通常享受折扣。

en: Programs for senior citizens are expanding.
cn: 针对老年人的项目正在扩展。

en: Without a plan, you'll get nowhere.
cn: 没有计划，你将一事无成。

en: The negotiations got nowhere after hours of discussion.
cn: 经过数小时讨论，谈判毫无进展。

en: There is a growing demand for renewable energy.
cn: 对可再生能源的需求日益增长。

en: A growing demand for skilled workers is evident.
cn: 对熟练工人的需求日益增长是显而易见的。

en: She outlined her idea for the project in the meeting.
cn: 她在会议上概述了她的项目想法。

en: He outlined his idea briefly before discussing details.
cn: 他在讨论细节前简要概述了他的想法。

en: The bus route goes through the city center.
cn: 这条公交路线穿过市中心。

en: Check the bus route before you travel.
cn: 出行前检查公交路线。

en: We need to step up our efforts to meet the deadline.
cn: 我们需要加强努力以赶上截止日期。

en: The company stepped up production to meet demand.
cn: 公司增加了产量以满足需求。

en: She was dazzled by the bright lights of the city.
cn: 她被城市的明亮灯光所震撼。

en: He was dazzled by her intelligence and charm.
cn: 他被她的智慧和魅力所迷惑。

en: These materials lend themselves to creative projects.
cn: 这些材料适合于创意项目。

en: The quiet environment lends itself to studying.
cn: 安静的环境适用于学习。

en: She teaches subjects like math and science.
cn: 她教授数学和科学等科目。

en: Teachers often specialize in specific subjects they teach.
cn: 教师通常专攻他们教授的特定科目。

en: I'll phone up the restaurant to make a reservation.
cn: 我会打电话给餐厅预订。

en: She phoned up her friend to chat about the news.
cn: 她打电话给朋友聊新闻。

en: Even after retirement, he keeps his hand in by playing chess weekly.
cn: 即使退休后，他每周下棋以保持棋艺。

en: She keeps her hand in with painting by taking occasional classes.
cn: 她偶尔上课以保持绘画技能。

en: Farmers grow crops like wheat and corn in this region.
cn: 农民在这个地区种植小麦和玉米等农作物。

en: They grow crops organically to protect the environment.
cn: 他们有机种植农作物以保护环境。

en: He got into trouble for breaking the school rules.
cn: 他因违反校规而陷入麻烦。

en: If you don't pay the bill on time, you might get into trouble with the company.
cn: 如果你不按时付账单，可能会和公司陷入困境。

en: With the market booming, we should make hay while the sun is shining and invest now.
cn: 市场繁荣时，我们应该趁热打铁，现在就投资。

en: She made hay while the sun was shining by finishing all her work during the quiet morning.
cn: 她趁早晨安静时完成了所有工作，抓住了有利时机。

en: He works best under pressure, meeting tight deadlines.
cn: 他在压力下工作得最好，能按时完成紧迫任务。

en: The team is under pressure to win the championship this year.
cn: 团队今年承受着赢得冠军的压力。

en: Since we're already here, we might as well visit the museum.
cn: 既然我们已经在这里了，不妨参观一下博物馆。

en: You might as well start studying now to avoid last-minute stress.
cn: 你最好现在就开始学习，以避免最后一刻的压力。

en: He drank some coffee to sober up before driving.
cn: 他喝了些咖啡以在开车前清醒过来。

en: It took her a few hours to sober up after the party.
cn: 派对后，她花了几个小时才从醉酒中恢复。

en: After the party, I'll drive home carefully.
cn: 派对结束后，我会小心开车回家。

en: She drives home every evening after work.
cn: 她每晚下班后开车回家。

en: He turned a deaf ear to all the criticism and continued his work.
cn: 他对所有批评充耳不闻，继续工作。

en: She turned a deaf ear to their pleas for help.
cn: 她对他们的求助置之不理。

en: Don't worry, the children came to no harm during the storm.
cn: 别担心，孩子们在暴风雨中没有受到伤害。

en: The package was delivered and came to no harm in transit.
cn: 包裹已送达，在运输过程中安然无恙。

en: The candidate is trying to draw support for her environmental policies.
cn: 候选人正试图争取对她环境政策的支持。

en: They organized events to draw support for the charity cause.
cn: 他们组织活动以争取对慈善事业的支持。

en: The manager is responsible to the board of directors for company performance.
cn: 经理对公司绩效向董事会负责。

en: In this role, you will be responsible to the team leader for project updates.
cn: 在这个职位上，你将向团队领导负责项目更新。

en: The celebrity's private residence is heavily guarded to ensure privacy.
cn: 这位名人的私人住宅戒备森严，以确保隐私。

en: You need permission to enter a private residence without the owner's consent.
cn: 未经业主同意，进入私人住宅需要许可。

en: Students should prepare for the exam by reviewing all the materials.
cn: 学生应通过复习所有材料来为考试做准备。

en: We need to prepare for the worst-case scenario in this project.
cn: 我们需要为这个项目的最坏情况做准备。

en: The new product must meet the standard before it can be released to the market.
cn: 新产品必须达到标准才能投放市场。

en: Her performance didn't meet the standard required for promotion.
cn: 她的表现未达到晋升所需的标准。

en: The storm will die down by evening, so we can go out then.
cn: 风暴将在傍晚逐渐减弱，那时我们可以出去。

en: After the argument, the tension in the room slowly died down.
cn: 争论过后，房间里的紧张气氛逐渐平息。

en: I don't want to go to that restaurant; for one thing, it's too expensive.
cn: 我不想去那家餐厅；首先，它太贵了。

en: For one thing, the weather is bad, so we should postpone the trip.
cn: 首先，天气不好，所以我们应该推迟旅行。

en: She went through a difficult time after losing her job.
cn: 失业后，她经历了一段困难时期。

en: The company is going through major changes this year.
cn: 公司今年正在经历重大变革。

en: She could see through his lies immediately.
cn: 她立刻就看穿了他的谎言。

en: It's hard to see through a well-crafted disguise.
cn: 很难看穿精心设计的伪装。

en: The country's gross national product increased by 3% last year.
cn: 该国的国民生产总值去年增长了3%。

en: Economists use gross national product to assess economic health.
cn: 经济学家使用国民生产总值来评估经济健康状况。

en: The team needs to collect information before making a decision.
cn: 团队需要在做决定前收集信息。

en: She collected information from various sources for her report.
cn: 她从各种来源收集信息来写报告。
