en: After winning the game, he looked like the cat that swallowed the canary.
cn: 赢得比赛后，他看起来得意洋洋。

en: She had a secret and looked like the cat that swallowed the canary all day.
cn: 她有个秘密，一整天都看起来沾沾自喜。

en: The rain finally let up after hours of heavy downpour.
cn: 大雨持续数小时后终于减弱了。

en: The pressure at work never seems to let up.
cn: 工作压力似乎从未减弱。

en: London's congestion tax aims to reduce traffic in the city center.
cn: 伦敦的拥堵税旨在减少市中心的交通流量。

en: Drivers must pay a congestion tax to enter the designated zone during peak hours.
cn: 司机在高峰时段进入指定区域必须支付拥堵税。

en: He left early for fear that he would miss the train.
cn: 他早早离开，生怕错过火车。

en: She double-checked the report for fear that there might be errors.
cn: 她反复检查报告，以免有错误。

en: After shouting at the concert, I lost my voice for a day.
cn: 在音乐会上大喊后，我失声了一天。

en: She lost her voice due to a severe cold.
cn: 由于重感冒，她失声了。

en: My siblings and I get along very well.
cn: 我的兄弟姐妹和我相处得非常融洽。

en: It's important to get along with your coworkers in a professional setting.
cn: 在职业环境中，与同事相处融洽很重要。

en: She had a head start in the race because she trained earlier.
cn: 她在比赛中占有先发优势，因为她训练得更早。

en: Learning a language as a child gives you a head start in fluency.
cn: 从小学习语言能让你在流利度上占有先发优势。

en: He decided to take the blame for the team's failure.
cn: 他决定为团队的失败承担责任。

en: It's honorable to take the blame when you've made a mistake.
cn: 犯错时承担责任是光荣的。

en: The manager isn't afraid to get his hands dirty and help with the manual labor.
cn: 经理不怕亲自动手帮忙干体力活。

en: To succeed in this business, you have to be willing to get your hands dirty.
cn: 要在这个行业成功，你必须愿意亲自动手。

en: The government is cracking down on tax evasion.
cn: 政府正在严厉打击逃税行为。

en: Police are cracking down on speeding in residential areas.
cn: 警方正在严厉打击住宅区的超速行为。

en: The committee is made up of representatives from each department.
cn: 委员会由各部门的代表组成。

en: Water is made up of hydrogen and oxygen atoms.
cn: 水由氢原子和氧原子组成。

en: Please gather up all the toys and put them in the box.
cn: 请把所有玩具收集起来放进盒子里。

en: She gathered up her courage and spoke in front of the crowd.
cn: 她鼓起勇气在人群面前发言。

en: I need some time to think over your proposal before I decide.
cn: 我需要一些时间仔细考虑你的提议再做决定。

en: He thought over the problem and came up with a solution.
cn: 他仔细考虑了这个问题并想出了解决方案。

en: Lucky you! You got the last ticket to the concert.
cn: 你真幸运！你拿到了音乐会的最后一张票。

en: Lucky you, finding that vintage watch at a flea market.
cn: 你真幸运，在跳蚤市场找到了那块复古手表。

en: The criminal managed to escape punishment due to lack of evidence.
cn: 由于证据不足，罪犯设法逃脱了惩罚。

en: He thought he could escape punishment by fleeing the country.
cn: 他以为通过逃离国家就能逃脱惩罚。

en: She decided to cast away her old clothes and start fresh.
cn: 她决定丢弃旧衣服，重新开始。

en: The sailor was cast away on a deserted island after the shipwreck.
cn: 海难后，水手被抛弃在一个荒岛上。

en: Don't pass up this opportunity to study abroad.
cn: 不要错过这个出国留学的机会。

en: He passed up the chance to invest in the startup, which later became successful.
cn: 他放弃了投资那家初创公司的机会，后来它成功了。

en: She has great respect for her elders.
cn: 她对长辈非常尊重。

en: The team showed respect for the opponent's skills.
cn: 团队对对手的技能表示尊重。

en: Please help yourself to some cookies from the plate.
cn: 请自取盘子里的饼干。

en: At the buffet, guests are encouraged to help themselves to the food.
cn: 在自助餐上，鼓励客人自取食物。

en: Parents should be strict with their children about homework.
cn: 父母应该对孩子的作业严格要求。

en: The teacher is strict with deadlines for assignments.
cn: 老师对作业的截止日期很严格。

en: The two boxers squared off in the ring before the match began.
cn: 比赛开始前，两位拳击手在拳击台上摆好架势。

en: The rival companies squared off in a fierce marketing battle.
cn: 竞争对手公司在激烈的营销战中准备对抗。

en: To some degree, I agree with your point about climate change.
cn: 在某种程度上，我同意你关于气候变化的观点。

en: The success of the project depends to some degree on external funding.
cn: 项目的成功在某种程度上取决于外部资金。

en: He failed in his attempt to climb the mountain due to bad weather.
cn: 由于恶劣天气，他攀登这座山的尝试失败了。

en: The company failed in its mission to reduce plastic waste.
cn: 公司在减少塑料废物的使命上失败了。

en: Her English improved by leaps and bounds after living abroad.
cn: 在国外生活后，她的英语飞速提高。

en: The company's profits grew by leaps and bounds last quarter.
cn: 上个季度，公司的利润大幅度增长。

en: I bought a can of cola from the soda machine in the hallway.
cn: 我从走廊的苏打水贩卖机买了一罐可乐。

en: The soda machine at the office is out of order again.
cn: 办公室的苏打水贩卖机又坏了。

en: This software enables users to edit videos easily.
cn: 这个软件使用户能够轻松编辑视频。

en: The scholarship enabled her to attend university.
cn: 奖学金使她能够上大学。

en: Her facial expression showed she was surprised by the news.
cn: 她的面部表情显示她对这消息感到惊讶。

en: Actors use facial expressions to convey emotions on stage.
cn: 演员在舞台上使用面部表情来传达情感。

en: Volunteering can make a difference in your community.
cn: 志愿服务可以在你的社区产生影响。

en: Every small action can make a difference in protecting the environment.
cn: 每一个小行动都能在保护环境方面有所作为。

en: She turned round to see who was calling her name.
cn: 她转身看是谁在叫她的名字。

en: The car turned round at the end of the street.
cn: 汽车在街道尽头回转了。

en: He apologized of his own accord without anyone asking him to.
cn: 他自愿道歉，没有人要求他这样做。

en: The child cleaned his room of his own accord.
cn: 孩子主动打扫了他的房间。

en: The new software will improve efficiency in our office.
cn: 新软件将提高我们办公室的效率。

en: We need to improve efficiency to meet the deadline.
cn: 我们需要提高效率以赶上截止日期。

en: The hikers were in danger when the storm hit.
cn: 暴风雨来临时，徒步旅行者处于危险之中。

en: If you don't wear a seatbelt, you'll be in danger in an accident.
cn: 如果不系安全带，发生事故时你会处于危险之中。

en: I prefer to meet clients in person rather than over video call.
cn: 我更喜欢亲自会见客户，而不是通过视频通话。

en: She delivered the award in person at the ceremony.
cn: 她在颁奖典礼上亲自颁发了奖项。

en: The new curriculum places emphasis on critical thinking skills.
cn: 新课程强调批判性思维技能。

en: There is a strong emphasis on teamwork in this company.
cn: 这家公司非常强调团队合作。

en: During the power outage, we had to go without electricity for hours.
cn: 停电期间，我们不得不忍受几个小时没有电。

en: He can go without sleep for days when working on a project.
cn: 在做项目时，他可以几天不睡觉。

en: I can't put my hands on my keys; have you seen them?
cn: 我找不到我的钥匙了，你看到了吗？

en: She quickly put her hands on the document in the file cabinet.
cn: 她很快在文件柜里找到了那份文件。

en: The company gained an unfair advantage over competitors by using insider information.
cn: 该公司通过使用内幕信息获得了对竞争对手的不公平优势。

en: Cheating in the exam allowed him to gain an unfair advantage over his classmates.
cn: 考试作弊让他获得了对同学的不公平优势。

en: When he announced his resignation, everyone raised their eyebrows.
cn: 当他宣布辞职时，所有人都扬起了眉毛。

en: She raised her eyebrows at the outrageous price.
cn: 她对离谱的价格扬起了眉毛。

en: They plan to tear down the old building to make space for a park.
cn: 他们计划拆除旧建筑，为公园腾出空间。

en: The city tore down the unsafe bridge.
cn: 城市拆除了不安全的桥梁。

en: After he helped me move, I owe him a favor.
cn: 他帮我搬家后，我欠他一个人情。

en: She owes me a favor from last year's project.
cn: 她因为去年的项目欠我一个人情。

en: The company booked a charter flight for the employees' retreat.
cn: 公司为员工度假预订了包机航班。

en: Charter flights are often cheaper for group travel.
cn: 对于团体旅行，包机航班通常更便宜。

en: It took months to get the new business off the ground.
cn: 花了几个月时间才让新业务启动起来。

en: We need funding to get this project off the ground.
cn: 我们需要资金来启动这个项目。

en: He idled away the afternoon watching TV.
cn: 他看电视虚度了整个下午。

en: Don't idle away your youth; study hard.
cn: 不要虚度青春，努力学习。

en: Technology and finance are considered high-paying industries.
cn: 技术和金融被认为是高薪行业。

en: He chose a career in a high-paying industry to support his family.
cn: 他选择在高薪行业工作以养家糊口。

en: The bullet went right through him, causing serious injury.
cn: 子弹穿透了他，造成了严重伤害。

en: Her harsh words went right through him, leaving him upset.
cn: 她尖刻的话语深深影响了他，让他很沮丧。

en: The speech was published in the Congressional Record.
cn: 演讲被发表在国会记录中。

en: Researchers often refer to the Congressional Record for historical debates.
cn: 研究人员经常参考国会记录来了解历史辩论。

en: Please refrain from smoking in this area.
cn: 请避免在这个区域吸烟。

en: He refrained from commenting on the sensitive issue.
cn: 他克制自己不对这个敏感问题发表评论。

en: I read news stories every morning to stay informed.
cn: 我每天早上阅读新闻报道以保持信息灵通。

en: She enjoys reading news stories about technology.
cn: 她喜欢阅读关于技术的新闻报道。

en: Smoking is correlated with an increased risk of lung cancer.
cn: 吸烟与肺癌风险增加相关。

en: Study hours are correlated with higher test scores.
cn: 学习时间与更高的考试成绩相关。

en: We decided to go out for dinner tonight.
cn: 我们决定今晚出去吃晚饭。

en: She likes to go out with friends on weekends.
cn: 她喜欢在周末和朋友外出。

en: He got involved with a charity organization last year.
cn: 他去年参与了一个慈善组织。

en: She got involved with a complicated legal case.
cn: 她卷入了一个复杂的法律案件。

en: He fell in with some old friends at the conference.
cn: 他在会议上偶然遇到了一些老朋友。

en: She fell in with a group of hikers during her trip.
cn: 她在旅行中遇到了一群徒步旅行者并加入了他们。

en: Diamonds are one of the most valuable precious stones.
cn: 钻石是最有价值的宝石之一。

en: She wore a necklace adorned with precious stones.
cn: 她戴了一条镶有宝石的项链。

en: The security guard allowed us in after checking our IDs.
cn: 保安检查了我们的身份证后允许我们进入。

en: Pets are not allowed in this restaurant.
cn: 这家餐厅不允许宠物进入。

en: The beautiful landscape of the mountains took our breath away.
cn: 山区的美丽风景让我们惊叹不已。

en: She painted a picture of the beautiful landscape she saw on her trip.
cn: 她画了一幅她在旅行中看到的美丽风景的画。

en: If you buy the car, we'll throw in a free GPS.
cn: 如果你买这辆车，我们会额外赠送一个免费的GPS。

en: She threw in some extra spices to enhance the flavor.
cn: 她额外加了一些香料来提升味道。

en: He excused himself, saying he had to see a man about a dog.
cn: 他借口说要去处理点私事。

en: When she left the meeting, she joked she was going to see a man about a dog.
cn: 当她离开会议时，她开玩笑说要去处理点私事。

en: Car ownership has increased significantly in urban areas.
cn: 城市地区的汽车所有权显著增加。

en: The document proves his car ownership.
cn: 这份文件证明了他的汽车所有权。

en: The university offers a wide spectrum of courses.
cn: 这所大学提供广泛的课程。

en: There is a wide spectrum of opinions on this issue.
cn: 在这个问题上有各种各样的意见。

en: The criminal is now behind bars for his crimes.
cn: 这名罪犯因他的罪行现在被关在监狱里。

en: He spent ten years behind bars before being released.
cn: 他在被释放前在监狱里度过了十年。

en: We rounded off the evening with a toast.
cn: 我们以祝酒圆满结束了这个晚上。

en: She rounded off her presentation with a summary.
cn: 她以总结圆满结束了她的演示。

en: The local residents opposed the new construction project.
cn: 当地居民反对新的建设项目。

en: As a local resident, she knows all the best restaurants.
cn: 作为当地居民，她知道所有最好的餐厅。

en: She worked hard to get ahead of her competitors.
cn: 她努力工作以领先于她的竞争对手。

en: The company aims to get ahead of the market trends.
cn: 公司旨在领先于市场趋势。

en: He admitted he was in the wrong after the argument.
cn: 争论后他承认自己错了。

en: If you're in the wrong, you should apologize.
cn: 如果你错了，你应该道歉。

en: She completed a certificate course in digital marketing.
cn: 她完成了一个数字营销的证书课程。

en: The university offers a certificate course in project management.
cn: 这所大学提供项目管理证书课程。

en: Under the circumstances, we decided to cancel the event.
cn: 在这种情况下，我们决定取消活动。

en: It was the best decision under the circumstances.
cn: 在这种情况下，这是最好的决定。

en: Let go of the rope before you fall.
cn: 在你摔倒之前放开绳子。

en: She let go of the balloon and watched it float away.
cn: 她放开了气球，看着它飘走。

en: The document in question is missing from the files.
cn: 讨论中的文件从档案中丢失了。

en: The person in question denied the allegations.
cn: 讨论中的人否认了这些指控。

en: She is intent on finishing her degree this year.
cn: 她决心今年完成学位。

en: He was intent on proving his theory correct.
cn: 他专注于证明他的理论是正确的。

en: It's hard to tell the twins apart.
cn: 很难区分这对双胞胎。

en: Can you tell the original painting apart from the copy?
cn: 你能辨别出原画和复制品吗？

en: Engineers need to have a good grasp of advanced technology.
cn: 工程师需要熟练掌握先进技术。

en: He has a good grasp of advanced technology, which helps in his job.
cn: 他熟练掌握先进技术，这有助于他的工作。

en: He showed courtesy by holding the door open for her.
cn: 他很有礼貌地为她开着门。

en: It's important to show courtesy to your elders.
cn: 对长辈表现出尊重很重要。

en: They are hunting for a new apartment in the city.
cn: 他们正在城市里寻找新公寓。

en: I've been hunting for my keys all morning.
cn: 我一整个早上都在找我的钥匙。

en: She made history by becoming the first woman to win the award.
cn: 她成为第一位获得该奖项的女性，创造了历史。

en: The team made history with their unprecedented victory.
cn: 这支队伍以史无前例的胜利创造了历史。

en: My car was blocked in by other vehicles in the parking lot.
cn: 我的车在停车场被其他车辆堵住了。

en: The protesters blocked in the entrance to the building.
cn: 抗议者堵住了大楼的入口。

en: Despite his rough exterior, he has a heart of gold.
cn: 尽管他外表粗犷，但他心地善良。

en: She has a heart of gold and always helps those in need.
cn: 她心地善良，总是帮助那些需要帮助的人。

en: I doubt he will arrive on time.
cn: 我怀疑他会准时到达。

en: I doubt the truth of that statement.
cn: 我怀疑那个陈述的真实性。

en: The area is now free of pollution after the cleanup.
cn: 清理后，该地区现在没有污染了。

en: She wants to be free of all her debts.
cn: 她想摆脱所有的债务。

en: You can borrow my car so long as you return it by tonight.
cn: 只要你今晚还回来，就可以借我的车。

en: So long as you study hard, you will pass the exam.
cn: 只要你努力学习，就会通过考试。

en: He looks down on people who don't have a college degree.
cn: 他看不起没有大学学位的人。

en: Don't look down on others just because they are different.
cn: 不要因为别人不同就看不起他们。

en: Proper disposal of household waste is important for the environment.
cn: 正确处理家庭垃圾对环境很重要。

en: The city collects household waste every Tuesday.
cn: 城市每周二收集家庭垃圾。

en: She leads a healthy life by exercising regularly and eating well.
cn: 她通过定期锻炼和健康饮食来过健康的生活。

en: To lead a healthy life, avoid smoking and excessive drinking.
cn: 要过健康的生活，避免吸烟和过量饮酒。

en: He bought a bunch of flowers for his mother.
cn: 他给母亲买了一束花。

en: A bunch of kids were playing in the park.
cn: 一群孩子在公园里玩耍。

en: The police suspect him of theft.
cn: 警方怀疑他盗窃。

en: I suspect her of lying about her whereabouts.
cn: 我怀疑她在行踪上撒谎。

en: The car ran down a pedestrian on the street.
cn: 汽车在街上撞倒了一个行人。

en: He always runs down his colleagues in meetings.
cn: 他总是在会议上批评他的同事。

en: High medical expenses can be a burden for many families.
cn: 高额医疗费用对许多家庭来说可能是个负担。

en: The insurance helps cover high medical expenses.
cn: 保险有助于支付高额医疗费用。

en: This key doesn't fit into the lock.
cn: 这把钥匙不适合这个锁。

en: She fits into the new team very well.
cn: 她很好地融入了新团队。

en: Please confirm your reservation by calling the hotel.
cn: 请致电酒店确认您的预订。

en: I need to confirm my flight reservation before traveling.
cn: 旅行前我需要确认我的航班预订。

en: Bear in mind that the deadline is next Friday.
cn: 记住截止日期是下周五。

en: When planning the trip, bear in mind the weather conditions.
cn: 计划旅行时，要考虑天气条件。

en: Judging from the dark clouds, it might rain soon.
cn: 从乌云来看，可能很快就要下雨了。

en: Judging from his smile, he seems very happy with the results.
cn: 从他的笑容来看，他似乎对结果非常满意。

en: She decided to donate her old clothes to the local charity.
cn: 她决定把旧衣服捐给当地的慈善机构。

en: The company will donate a portion of its profits to environmental causes.
cn: 公司将把一部分利润捐赠给环保事业。

en: I can't say for certain when the project will be completed.
cn: 我不能肯定地说项目何时能完成。

en: She knew for certain that she had made the right decision.
cn: 她确信自己做出了正确的决定。

en: The new smartphone will be on sale starting next week.
cn: 这款新智能手机将于下周开始销售。

en: These shoes are on sale for 50% off this weekend.
cn: 这双鞋本周末特价，打五折。

en: The hikers were careful not to get close to the edge of the cliff.
cn: 徒步旅行者小心不靠近悬崖边缘。

en: Over time, they managed to get close to each other and become good friends.
cn: 随着时间的推移，他们设法接近彼此并成为了好朋友。

en: The sales representative visited our office to demonstrate the new software.
cn: 销售代表来我们办公室演示新软件。

en: As a sales representative, he travels frequently to meet with clients.
cn: 作为销售代表，他经常出差会见客户。

en: On the one hand, the job offers a high salary; on the other hand, it requires long hours.
cn: 一方面，这份工作薪水高；另一方面，它需要长时间工作。

en: On the one hand, moving to a new city is exciting; on the other hand, it can be stressful.
cn: 一方面，搬到新城市令人兴奋；另一方面，它可能带来压力。

en: She devotes most of her time to volunteering at the animal shelter.
cn: 她把大部分时间都奉献给了动物收容所的志愿工作。

en: He decided to devote his life to scientific research.
cn: 他决定将一生奉献给科学研究。

en: The two cars had a near miss at the intersection, but no one was hurt.
cn: 两辆车在十字路口险些相撞，但没有人受伤。

en: We had a near miss when the tree branch fell just inches from our heads.
cn: 树枝掉下来离我们的头只有几英寸，我们差一点就出事了。

en: People started to queue up early in the morning to buy tickets for the concert.
cn: 人们一大早就开始排队购买音乐会门票。

en: We had to queue up for over an hour at the airport security checkpoint.
cn: 我们不得不在机场安检处排队等候一个多小时。

en: You should take his promises with a pinch of salt; he often doesn't follow through.
cn: 你应该对他的承诺持保留态度，他经常不兑现。

en: I take rumors with a pinch of salt until I see official confirmation.
cn: 在见到官方确认之前，我对谣言半信半疑。

en: The documentary shows animals living in the raw, without human interference.
cn: 这部纪录片展示了动物在自然状态下的生活，没有人类干预。

en: He prefers to sleep in the raw during hot summer nights.
cn: 在炎热的夏夜，他喜欢裸睡。

en: Let's solve this problem once and for all so it doesn't come up again.
cn: 让我们一劳永逸地解决这个问题，这样它就不会再出现了。

en: The court's decision settled the dispute once and for all.
cn: 法院的判决彻底解决了这场纠纷。

en: The police are searching for an escaping criminal who fled from the prison last night.
cn: 警方正在搜寻一名昨晚从监狱逃跑的逃犯。

en: Residents were warned to stay indoors due to an escaping criminal in the area.
cn: 由于该地区有一名逃犯，居民被警告待在室内。

en: On paper, the plan looks perfect, but we need to test it in practice.
cn: 理论上，这个计划看起来完美，但我们需要在实践中测试它。

en: The agreement is solid on paper, but we must ensure both parties comply.
cn: 协议在书面形式上很牢固，但我们必须确保双方都遵守。

en: Doctors and firefighters often have high-stress jobs due to the life-or-death situations they face.
cn: 医生和消防员通常有高压工作，因为他们面临生死攸关的情况。

en: Many people in high-stress jobs practice mindfulness to manage their anxiety.
cn: 许多从事高压工作的人练习正念来管理焦虑。

en: She put on her coat before going outside in the cold weather.
cn: 在寒冷的天气外出前，她穿上了外套。

en: The school will put on a play for the end-of-year celebration.
cn: 学校将为年终庆祝活动上演一出戏剧。

en: The store agreed to give me a refund because the product was defective.
cn: 商店同意给我退款，因为产品有缺陷。

en: If you're not satisfied, we can give you a refund within 30 days of purchase.
cn: 如果您不满意，我们可以在购买后30天内给您退款。

en: The new policy has been reviewed as a positive step towards environmental protection.
cn: 新政策被评价为向环境保护迈出的积极一步。

en: His performance in the play was reviewed as outstanding by the critics.
cn: 他在戏剧中的表演被评论家评价为出色。

en: I would like to thank everyone for their support during this project.
cn: 我想感谢大家在这个项目期间的支持。

en: She would like to visit Japan next year to experience the culture.
cn: 她明年想去日本体验文化。

en: She prepared thoroughly for her job interview at the tech company.
cn: 她为科技公司的求职面试做了充分准备。

en: The job interview lasted two hours and included a practical test.
cn: 这次求职面试持续了两小时，包括一项实践测试。

en: The runner in second place is gaining on the leader in the final lap.
cn: 第二名的选手在最后一圈逐渐赶上了领先者。

en: Our sales team is gaining on our competitors in the market share race.
cn: 我们的销售团队在市场份额竞争中逐渐赶上了竞争对手。

en: The benefit concert raised over $50,000 for disaster relief efforts.
cn: 这场慈善音乐会为救灾工作筹集了超过5万美元。

en: Many famous musicians performed at the benefit concert for children's education.
cn: 许多著名音乐家在为儿童教育举办的义演中表演。

en: I try to do exercise for at least 30 minutes every morning.
cn: 我尽量每天早上至少锻炼30分钟。

en: Doing regular exercise can improve both physical and mental health.
cn: 定期做运动可以改善身心健康。

en: The company decided to branch out into the Asian market to increase its global presence.
cn: 公司决定拓展亚洲市场以增加全球影响力。

en: After years in publishing, she branched out to start her own consulting firm.
cn: 在出版业工作多年后，她拓展业务创办了自己的咨询公司。

en: After graduation, he plans to go into the field of medicine.
cn: 毕业后，他计划进入医学领域。

en: Let's go into more detail about the project timeline.
cn: 让我们更详细地讨论项目时间表。

en: During the drought, the villagers had to survive on limited water supplies.
cn: 干旱期间，村民们不得不依靠有限的水源生存。

en: Many students survive on a tight budget while in college.
cn: 许多大学生靠紧张的预算维持生活。

en: The insurance company will pay out the claim within two weeks.
cn: 保险公司将在两周内支付索赔。

en: The lottery winner received a lump sum payout of $10 million.
cn: 彩票中奖者一次性收到了1000万美元的支付。

en: Fans often put celebrities on a pedestal, ignoring their human flaws.
cn: 粉丝们常常把名人理想化，忽视他们的人性缺点。

en: It's unhealthy to put your partner on a pedestal in a relationship.
cn: 在恋爱关系中过度崇拜伴侣是不健康的。

en: Advances in space science have led to discoveries about distant planets.
cn: 空间科学的进步带来了关于遥远行星的发现。

en: She pursued a degree in space science to work at NASA one day.
cn: 她攻读空间科学学位，希望有一天能在NASA工作。

en: Tourists visit the city in large numbers during the summer festival.
cn: 夏季节日期间，大量游客参观这座城市。

en: Protesters gathered in large numbers to demand political reform.
cn: 抗议者大量聚集要求政治改革。

en: Other than John, no one knew about the surprise party.
cn: 除了约翰，没人知道这个惊喜派对。

en: I have no plans other than to relax this weekend.
cn: 我这个周末除了放松没有其他计划。

en: Government policies aim to bridge the gap between rich and poor through tax reforms.
cn: 政府政策旨在通过税制改革缩小贫富差距。

en: Education is often seen as a way to bridge the gap between rich and poor.
cn: 教育常被视为缩小贫富差距的一种方式。

en: She built her business from scratch with just a small loan.
cn: 她仅凭一小笔贷款白手起家创办了自己的企业。

en: I decided to bake the cake from scratch instead of using a mix.
cn: 我决定从零开始烤蛋糕，而不是用预拌粉。

en: Despite the setback, she took the criticism in stride and improved her work.
cn: 尽管遇到挫折，她从容应对批评并改进了工作。

en: He takes challenges in stride, viewing them as opportunities to grow.
cn: 他坦然接受挑战，将其视为成长的机会。

en: The company adopted a market-oriented approach to better meet customer needs.
cn: 公司采用市场导向的方法以更好地满足客户需求。

en: Market-oriented reforms have boosted economic growth in the region.
cn: 市场导向的改革促进了该地区的经济增长。

en: Governments worldwide are implementing policies to tackle pollution effectively.
cn: 世界各国政府正在实施政策以有效治理污染。

en: New technologies are being developed to tackle pollution in urban areas.
cn: 正在开发新技术以解决城市地区的污染问题。

en: In every argument, he always has to get the last word.
cn: 每次争论中，他总是要说最后一句话。

en: She made a clever retort to get the last word in the debate.
cn: 她机智地反驳，在辩论中占了上风。

en: When you arrive at the museum, take some time to have a look around.
cn: 到达博物馆时，花点时间四处看看。

en: I like to have a look around new cities to get a feel for the local culture.
cn: 我喜欢在新城市四处看看，感受当地文化。

en: They decided to go steady with each other after dating for a few months.
cn: 约会几个月后，他们决定建立稳定的恋爱关系。

en: My parents didn't allow me to go steady with anyone in high school.
cn: 我父母不允许我在高中时与任何人建立稳定的恋爱关系。

en: She hit on a brilliant idea for the marketing campaign during the meeting.
cn: 她在会议上想到了一个绝妙的营销活动创意。

en: Researchers hit on a new method to treat the disease by accident.
cn: 研究人员偶然发现了一种治疗该疾病的新方法。

en: She was engaged to her high school sweetheart for two years before they got married.
cn: 她与高中时的恋人订婚两年后才结婚。

en: He announced that he is engaged to his partner and they plan to wed next summer.
cn: 他宣布与伴侣订婚，并计划明年夏天结婚。

en: The project requires a large amount of funding to be completed on time.
cn: 这个项目需要大量资金才能按时完成。

en: She spent a large amount of time preparing for the presentation.
cn: 她花了大量时间准备这次演示。

en: As the CEO, she calls the tune on all major company decisions.
cn: 作为首席执行官，她对所有重大公司决策发号施令。

en: In this partnership, the investor calls the tune because they provided most of the capital.
cn: 在这个合伙关系中，投资者掌控局面，因为他们提供了大部分资金。

en: To improve his health, he decided to cut down on sugar and processed foods.
cn: 为了改善健康，他决定减少糖和加工食品的摄入。

en: The company needs to cut down on expenses to stay profitable during the economic downturn.
cn: 公司需要削减开支，以在经济低迷时期保持盈利。

en: After reading the summary, I got a rough idea of what the book is about.
cn: 读完摘要后，我对这本书的内容有了大致的了解。

en: The manager gave us a brief overview to help us get a rough idea of the new project.
cn: 经理给我们做了简要概述，帮助我们大致了解新项目。

en: The city implemented policies to curb car use and reduce traffic congestion.
cn: 该市实施政策限制汽车使用，以减少交通拥堵。

en: To combat air pollution, governments are encouraging public transport to curb car use.
cn: 为了对抗空气污染，政府鼓励公共交通以限制汽车使用。

en: When moving abroad, it's important to learn the language to integrate with locals.
cn: 移居国外时，学习当地语言以与当地人融合很重要。

en: Volunteering in community events helped her integrate with locals in her new neighborhood.
cn: 参与社区活动的志愿服务帮助她与新社区的当地人融合。

en: International aid is crucial for supporting development in impoverished countries.
cn: 国际援助对于支持贫困国家的发展至关重要。

en: Many impoverished countries struggle with access to clean water and healthcare.
cn: 许多贫困国家难以获得清洁水和医疗保健。

en: I haven't seen my old friend for ages; we should catch up soon.
cn: 我很久没见到老朋友了；我们应该尽快叙叙旧。

en: She's been working on that report for ages and still hasn't finished it.
cn: 她做那份报告已经很久了，但还没完成。

en: The government launched new programs to reduce poverty in rural areas.
cn: 政府启动了新项目以减少农村地区的贫困。

en: Education and job opportunities are key strategies to reduce poverty globally.
cn: 教育和就业机会是全球减少贫困的关键策略。

en: I can't put up with his constant complaining anymore; it's too annoying.
cn: 我再也无法容忍他不断的抱怨了；这太烦人了。

en: She has to put up with a long commute every day to get to work.
cn: 她每天不得不忍受长时间的通勤去上班。

en: After the team disbanded, he decided to go it alone and start his own business.
cn: 团队解散后，他决定独自行动，创办自己的企业。

en: She prefers to go it alone on hiking trips rather than joining a group.
cn: 她更喜欢在徒步旅行中单干，而不是加入团队。

en: At the party, they went hog wild and danced until the early morning.
cn: 在派对上，他们疯狂行事，跳舞直到凌晨。

en: When shopping during the sale, she went hog wild and bought more than she needed.
cn: 在促销期间购物时，她放纵自己，买了超出需要的东西。

en: We need to speed up the production process to meet the deadline.
cn: 我们需要加快生产过程以赶上截止日期。

en: The car sped up as it entered the highway.
cn: 汽车进入高速公路时加速了。

en: I'm not sure how to go about fixing this computer issue; maybe I should ask for help.
cn: 我不确定如何着手解决这个电脑问题；也许我应该寻求帮助。

en: She went about organizing the event by first creating a detailed plan.
cn: 她通过首先制定详细计划来着手组织这次活动。

en: He got off lightly with just a warning after breaking the school rules.
cn: 违反校规后，他轻易逃脱惩罚，只受到了警告。

en: Despite the serious mistake, she got off lightly because her boss was understanding.
cn: 尽管犯了严重错误，但由于老板的理解，她受到了轻微处理。

en: He spent $2000 on a new stereo system for his living room.
cn: 他花了2000美元为客厅买了一套新的立体声音响系统。

en: The stereo system produces high-quality sound with clear bass.
cn: 这套立体声音响系统能产生高质量的声音，低音清晰。

en: The understudy was waiting in the wings in case the lead actor got sick.
cn: 替补演员在幕后等着，以防主角生病。

en: Several new products are in the wings and will be launched next year.
cn: 几款新产品已准备就绪，将于明年推出。

en: She makes her living as a freelance writer.
cn: 她以自由撰稿人的身份谋生。

en: In rural areas, many people make their living from farming.
cn: 在农村地区，许多人靠务农谋生。

en: Please close up the shop before you leave.
cn: 离开前请把店关好。

en: He closed up the book and put it back on the shelf.
cn: 他合上书，把它放回书架。

en: In the Internet age, information is accessible at our fingertips.
cn: 在互联网时代，信息触手可及。

en: The Internet age has revolutionized how we communicate and do business.
cn: 互联网时代彻底改变了我们沟通和做生意的方式。

en: The new teacher is very popular with the students.
cn: 新老师很受学生欢迎。

en: This brand of smartphone is popular with young adults.
cn: 这个品牌的智能手机很受年轻人欢迎。

en: His constant complaining really gets my goat.
cn: 他不停的抱怨真的让我很生气。

en: The noisy neighbors get her goat every weekend.
cn: 吵闹的邻居每个周末都惹她生气。

en: The offer is limited to the first 100 customers.
cn: 此优惠仅限于前100名顾客。

en: His knowledge is limited to basic mathematics.
cn: 他的知识仅限于基础数学。

en: The weather turned out to be sunny despite the forecast.
cn: 尽管预报有雨，结果天气是晴朗的。

en: He turned out to be a reliable friend in times of need.
cn: 在需要时，他结果是一个可靠的朋友。

en: I was shocked to hear about the accident.
cn: 听到事故的消息，我感到震惊。

en: She was shocked to discover the truth.
cn: 她发现真相后感到震惊。

en: You should take notice of the warning signs.
cn: 你应该注意警告标志。

en: He didn't take notice of the changes in the schedule.
cn: 他没有注意到日程表的变化。

en: I am allergic to peanuts, so I avoid them.
cn: 我对花生过敏，所以避免食用。

en: She is allergic to pollen and sneezes a lot in spring.
cn: 她对花粉过敏，春天时经常打喷嚏。

en: I have half a notion to quit my job and travel the world.
cn: 我有点想辞职去环游世界。

en: She had half a notion to call him, but decided against it.
cn: 她有点想给他打电话，但决定不打了。

en: The department chair will review the new curriculum proposals.
cn: 系主任将审查新的课程提案。

en: She was appointed as the department chair last year.
cn: 她去年被任命为系主任。

en: Let's knock off early today and go for a drink.
cn: 我们今天早点下班去喝一杯吧。

en: He knocks off at 5 PM every day.
cn: 他每天下午5点下班。

en: We watched the solar eclipse through special glasses.
cn: 我们通过特殊眼镜观看了日食。

en: A total solar eclipse is a rare astronomical event.
cn: 日全食是一种罕见的天文事件。

en: The movie used impressive special effects to create the fantasy world.
cn: 这部电影使用令人印象深刻的特效来创造奇幻世界。

en: Modern special effects make action scenes more realistic.
cn: 现代特效使动作场景更加逼真。

en: The underdog team gave the champions a real run for their money in the final match.
cn: 在决赛中，弱队让冠军队伍付出了巨大努力才获胜。

en: Her innovative design gave the established brands a run for their money in the market.
cn: 她的创新设计让市场上的老牌品牌面临激烈竞争。

en: I took a pain reliever for my headache, and it worked within minutes.
cn: 我吃了止痛药治疗头痛，几分钟内就见效了。

en: Over-the-counter pain relievers like ibuprofen are commonly used for minor aches.
cn: 像布洛芬这样的非处方止痛药常用于缓解轻微疼痛。

en: I'm bored to death with this repetitive work.
cn: 我对这种重复性工作感到极度无聊。

en: She was scared to death when she heard the noise.
cn: 听到噪音时，她害怕得要死。

en: They shut out the noise by closing the windows and using earplugs.
cn: 他们通过关窗和使用耳塞来隔绝噪音。

en: The home team shut out their opponents with a score of 3-0 in the soccer match.
cn: 在足球比赛中，主队以3-0的比分零封了对手。

en: Developing critical thinking skills is essential for solving complex problems in the workplace.
cn: 培养批判性思维能力对于解决工作中的复杂问题至关重要。

en: The course aims to enhance students' critical thinking skills through debate and analysis.
cn: 这门课程旨在通过辩论和分析提高学生的批判性思维能力。

en: She is a professional through and through, always meeting deadlines with high quality.
cn: 她是个彻头彻尾的专业人士，总能高质量地按时完成任务。

en: The document was checked through and through to ensure there were no errors.
cn: 这份文件被彻底检查，以确保没有任何错误。

en: Our team has the advantage over theirs due to more experience.
cn: 由于经验更丰富，我们队比他们队有优势。

en: In this negotiation, we have the advantage over the other party.
cn: 在这次谈判中，我们比对方有优势。

en: In the job interview, he felt he didn't get a fair shake because the questions were biased.
cn: 在求职面试中，他觉得没有得到公平对待，因为问题带有偏见。

en: The new policy ensures that all employees get a fair shake in promotion opportunities.
cn: 新政策确保所有员工在晋升机会上都能得到公平对待。

en: After months of training, she is fit to run the marathon next week.
cn: 经过几个月的训练，她适合参加下周的马拉松比赛。

en: Only certified professionals are fit to handle this delicate equipment.
cn: 只有持证的专业人员才有资格操作这台精密设备。

en: At the beginning of the year, we set new goals for our team to achieve.
cn: 在年初，我们为团队设定了新的目标。

en: The professor outlined the course syllabus at the beginning of the semester.
cn: 教授在学期开始时概述了课程大纲。

en: Since she caught the flu, she has had a poor appetite and barely eats anything.
cn: 自从得了流感，她食欲不振，几乎不吃东西。

en: Stress can cause people to have a poor appetite, affecting their overall health.
cn: 压力会导致人们食欲不振，影响整体健康。

en: After retiring, they moved to the countryside to live a comfortable life away from the city hustle.
cn: 退休后，他们搬到乡下，远离城市喧嚣，过着舒适的生活。

en: With a stable job and good savings, she can live a comfortable life without financial stress.
cn: 有一份稳定的工作和良好的储蓄，她可以过着没有经济压力的舒适生活。

en: Please turn off the lights before you leave the room to save energy.
cn: 请在离开房间前关灯以节约能源。

en: His arrogant attitude really turns people off during meetings.
cn: 他傲慢的态度在会议中真的让人失去兴趣。

en: The explosive news about the company's scandal spread quickly across social media.
cn: 关于公司丑闻的爆炸性新闻在社交媒体上迅速传播。

en: Journalists uncovered explosive news that could change the outcome of the election.
cn: 记者揭露了可能改变选举结果的爆炸性新闻。

en: I lent him my car for one day, and now he wants it for a week—if you give him an inch, he'll take a mile.
cn: 我把车借给他一天，现在他想借一周——真是得寸进尺。

en: In negotiations, be cautious not to give too much initially, as if you give an inch, they'll take a mile.
cn: 在谈判中，要谨慎不要一开始就让步太多，因为得寸进尺。

en: You are at liberty to choose any topic for your research paper.
cn: 你可以自由选择研究论文的任何主题。

en: After the trial, the defendant was found not guilty and set at liberty.
cn: 审判后，被告被判无罪并获释。

en: In the fog, I could barely make out the road signs ahead.
cn: 在雾中，我几乎辨认不出前方的路标。

en: Can you make out what he's saying in this noisy room?
cn: 在这个嘈杂的房间里，你能理解他在说什么吗？

en: The harsh punishment deprived him of his freedom for several years.
cn: 严厉的惩罚剥夺了他几年的自由。

en: Poverty can deprive children of access to quality education and healthcare.
cn: 贫困可能剥夺儿童获得优质教育和医疗保健的机会。

en: The company supplies local schools with free textbooks every year.
cn: 这家公司每年向当地学校提供免费教科书。

en: We need to supply the team with the necessary tools to complete the project on time.
cn: 我们需要向团队提供必要的工具，以按时完成项目。

en: For the present, we'll postpone the meeting until more information is available.
cn: 目前，我们将推迟会议，直到获得更多信息。

en: This solution works for the present, but we need a long-term plan.
cn: 这个解决方案暂时有效，但我们需要一个长期计划。

en: The corrupt official was motivated by greed, accepting bribes for personal gain.
cn: 这名腐败官员受贪婪驱使，为个人利益接受贿赂。

en: Some companies are motivated by greed, prioritizing profits over environmental concerns.
cn: 一些公司受贪婪驱使，将利润置于环境问题之上。

en: She finished her homework in no time and went out to play.
cn: 她很快完成了作业，然后出去玩。

en: With his help, we fixed the car in no time.
cn: 在他的帮助下，我们很快就修好了车。

en: When he tried to apologize, his words stuck in his throat, and he couldn't speak.
cn: 当他试图道歉时，话到嘴边说不出口，无法言语。

en: She had her words stick in her throat as she delivered the sad news to her family.
cn: 当她向家人传达这个悲伤的消息时，话到嘴边说不出口。

en: I'll always stand by my friends in times of trouble.
cn: 在困难时期，我会一直支持我的朋友。

en: He stood by his wife during the scandal, showing great loyalty.
cn: 在丑闻期间，他忠于妻子，表现出极大的忠诚。

en: Scientists are searching for habitable planets beyond our solar system.
cn: 科学家正在太阳系外寻找宜居行星。

en: The discovery of a habitable planet could revolutionize our understanding of life.
cn: 发现一颗宜居行星可能会彻底改变我们对生命的理解。

en: When they argued about politics, they really made the fur fly.
cn: 他们争论政治时，真的吵得不可开交。

en: His criticism at the meeting made the fur fly among the team members.
cn: 他在会议上的批评引发了团队成员间的激烈争吵。

en: Freelancing is a popular form of alternative work in the gig economy.
cn: 自由职业是零工经济中一种流行的替代性工作形式。

en: She chose alternative work like remote jobs to balance her lifestyle.
cn: 她选择了远程工作等替代性工作来平衡生活方式。

en: The law prohibits minors from purchasing alcohol.
cn: 法律禁止未成年人购买酒精饮料。

en: The company policy prohibits employees from using personal devices at work.
cn: 公司政策禁止员工在工作时使用个人设备。

en: Don't make a big deal about the spilled milk; just clean it up.
cn: 别对洒了的牛奶大惊小怪，清理干净就行。

en: She made a big deal about her promotion, throwing a huge party.
cn: 她对升职大做文章，办了个盛大的派对。

en: In a consumer culture, people often buy things they don't really need.
cn: 在消费文化中，人们经常购买他们并不真正需要的东西。

en: Advertising thrives in a consumer culture by promoting constant spending.
cn: 广告在消费文化中蓬勃发展，通过促进持续消费。

en: Her approach to problem-solving is very systematic and efficient.
cn: 她解决问题的方法非常系统且高效。

en: We need a new approach to marketing to reach younger audiences.
cn: 我们需要一种新的营销方法来接触年轻受众。

en: She told me the news in confidence, so please don't share it.
cn: 她私下告诉我这个消息，所以请不要泄露。

en: The documents were shared in confidence between the two companies.
cn: 这些文件是在两家公司之间保密共享的。

en: She's been out of sorts all day because of the bad weather.
cn: 由于天气不好，她一整天都心情不佳。

en: He felt out of sorts after missing his morning coffee.
cn: 错过早上的咖啡后，他感到身体不适。

en: He is something of an expert in ancient history.
cn: 他在某种程度上是古代史方面的专家。

en: The movie was something of a disappointment after all the hype.
cn: 在所有的炒作之后，这部电影有点令人失望。

en: Due to budget cuts, the manager had his hands tied and couldn't hire new staff.
cn: 由于预算削减，经理束手无策，无法雇佣新员工。

en: She wanted to help, but with the strict rules, she had her hands tied.
cn: 她想帮忙，但由于严格的规定，她束手无策。

en: The deadline put pressure upon the team to finish the project quickly.
cn: 截止日期给团队施加压力，要求他们快速完成项目。

en: Parents sometimes put pressure upon their children to excel academically.
cn: 父母有时会给孩子施加压力，要求他们在学业上出类拔萃。

en: As an undergraduate student, she is majoring in biology.
cn: 作为一名本科生，她主修生物学。

en: Undergraduate students often live on campus during their first year.
cn: 本科生通常在第一年住在校园里。

en: He was in and out of the office all morning for meetings.
cn: 他整个上午都在办公室进进出出开会。

en: The cat kept going in and out through the pet door.
cn: 猫不停地通过宠物门进进出出。

en: After being stuck indoors for a week, he started to go stir crazy.
cn: 在室内困了一周后，他开始变得烦躁不安。

en: The long winter made everyone go stir crazy from lack of outdoor activities.
cn: 漫长的冬天让每个人都因缺乏户外活动而变得烦躁不安。

en: The noisy neighbor made a nuisance of himself by playing loud music late at night.
cn: 吵闹的邻居在深夜播放大声音乐，惹人讨厌。

en: Don't make a nuisance of yourself at the party by interrupting conversations.
cn: 别在派对上打断谈话惹人讨厌。

en: I agree with you that we should start the project earlier.
cn: 我同意你的意见，我们应该早点开始这个项目。

en: She agreed with her colleague's proposal during the meeting.
cn: 她在会议上同意了同事的提议。

en: Deep down, she knew the truth but was afraid to admit it.
cn: 内心深处，她知道真相但不敢承认。

en: He seems tough, but deep down he's very kind.
cn: 他看起来很坚强，但本质上非常善良。

en: The construction team finished the project ahead of schedule.
cn: 施工团队提前完成了项目。

en: We delivered the report ahead of schedule, which impressed the client.
cn: 我们提前提交了报告，给客户留下了深刻印象。

en: This software is licensed for used commercially in large corporations.
cn: 这款软件已获许可，可在大型公司中商业使用。

en: The new material is safe and effective for used commercially in packaging.
cn: 这种新材料安全有效，可用于商业包装。

en: The party formed a government in coalition with several smaller groups.
cn: 该党与几个小团体结盟组建了政府。

en: They worked in coalition with environmental organizations to pass the bill.
cn: 他们与环保组织合作通过了该法案。

en: His criticism really got my back up during the meeting.
cn: 他的批评在会议上真的让我生气了。

en: She gets her back up whenever someone questions her decisions.
cn: 每当有人质疑她的决定时，她就会变得防御性。

en: After finishing the work, I just sat back and watched a movie.
cn: 完成工作后，我放松下来看了一部电影。

en: You can't just sit back and let others do all the work.
cn: 你不能只是袖手旁观，让别人做所有的工作。

en: Athletes develop physical skills through rigorous training.
cn: 运动员通过严格训练发展身体技能。

en: Carpentry requires good physical skills and attention to detail.
cn: 木工需要良好的身体技能和对细节的关注。

en: The protesters tried to shout down the speaker at the rally.
cn: 抗议者试图在集会上大声压倒演讲者。

en: He was shouted down when he expressed an unpopular opinion.
cn: 当他表达不受欢迎的意见时，被大声阻止了。

en: We were caught in a traffic jam on the way to the airport.
cn: 我们在去机场的路上被困在交通堵塞中。

en: He was caught in a conflict between his friends.
cn: 他被卷入朋友之间的冲突中。

en: The company played off its competitors to get a better deal.
cn: 该公司利用竞争对手以获得更好的交易。

en: He played off their rivalry to advance his own career.
cn: 他操纵他们的竞争来推进自己的职业生涯。

en: The two neighbors came to blows over a parking space.
cn: 两个邻居因一个停车位而打架。

en: They almost came to blows over the political debate.
cn: 他们因政治辩论几乎激烈争吵起来。

en: The documentary gives an insight into the lives of endangered species.
cn: 这部纪录片提供了对濒危物种生活的深刻见解。

en: Her research gives an insight into how climate change affects agriculture.
cn: 她的研究提供了关于气候变化如何影响农业的深刻理解。

en: Five plus three is equal to eight.
cn: 五加三等于八。

en: Her dedication is equal to that of any professional athlete.
cn: 她的奉献精神相当于任何职业运动员。

en: The outcome of the election is still in the balance.
cn: 选举的结果仍然悬而未决。

en: His future career hangs in the balance after the scandal.
cn: 丑闻后，他未来的职业生涯悬而未决。

en: Can I get a hand with moving this heavy furniture?
cn: 我能得到帮助搬动这件重家具吗？

en: She got a hand with her homework from her older brother.
cn: 她从哥哥那里得到了做作业的帮助。

en: The caterpillar turned into a beautiful butterfly.
cn: 毛毛虫变成了一只美丽的蝴蝶。

en: Their small startup turned into a successful company.
cn: 他们的小初创公司变成了一家成功的公司。

en: Please attach the file to your email before sending it.
cn: 请在发送前将文件附加到您的电子邮件中。

en: The document is attached to the report for reference.
cn: 该文档附加在报告上以供参考。

en: Many people regard him as a hero for his bravery.
cn: 许多人因他的勇敢而将他视为英雄。

en: She is regarded as an expert in her field.
cn: 她被认为是她所在领域的专家。

en: His behavior borders on rudeness sometimes.
cn: 他的行为有时近乎粗鲁。

en: The town borders on the national park, offering stunning views.
cn: 该镇接近国家公园，提供壮丽的景色。

en: I'll get back to you with the details by tomorrow.
cn: 我明天会回复您详细信息。

en: He promised to get back to me after checking the schedule.
cn: 他答应在检查日程后联系我。

en: Please leave me alone; I need some time to think.
cn: 请别打扰我，我需要一些时间思考。

en: The cat was sleeping, so we decided to leave it alone.
cn: 猫在睡觉，所以我们决定不打扰它。

en: Moving to a new city is a great opportunity to make new friends.
cn: 搬到新城市是结交新朋友的好机会。

en: She joined a club to make new friends with similar interests.
cn: 她加入了一个俱乐部，以结交志趣相投的新朋友。

en: I had to break the news to my parents that I failed the exam.
cn: 我不得不向父母透露我考试不及格的坏消息。

en: The doctor gently broke the news to the patient about the diagnosis.
cn: 医生温和地向病人透露了诊断结果。

en: Please write your report in English for the international team.
cn: 请用英语撰写报告，以便国际团队阅读。

en: She can speak fluently in English after years of practice.
cn: 经过多年练习，她能流利地用英语交谈。

en: We made our way through the crowded street to reach the concert.
cn: 我们穿过拥挤的街道前往音乐会。

en: She made her way to the top of the mountain after hours of hiking.
cn: 经过数小时徒步后，她成功登上了山顶。

en: She loves to take photographs of nature during her travels.
cn: 她喜欢在旅行中拍摄自然照片。

en: He took photographs at the wedding to capture the special moments.
cn: 他在婚礼上拍照以捕捉特殊时刻。

en: His part-time job helps cover living expenses while he studies.
cn: 他的兼职工作帮助支付学习期间的生活费用。

en: The scholarship is enough to cover living expenses for the semester.
cn: 这笔奖学金足以支付这个学期的生活费用。

en: The report is based on statistical data collected over five years.
cn: 这份报告基于五年收集的统计数据。

en: Accurate statistical data is essential for making informed decisions.
cn: 准确的统计数据对于做出明智决策至关重要。

en: It's not likely to rain today, according to the forecast.
cn: 根据预报，今天不太可能下雨。

en: He is not likely to agree with such a risky plan.
cn: 他不太可能同意如此冒险的计划。

en: He drove away quickly after dropping off the package.
cn: 他放下包裹后迅速驱车离开了。

en: We watched the car drive away into the distance.
cn: 我们看着汽车驱车离开，消失在远方。

en: The professor exhausted the topic of climate change in his lecture.
cn: 教授在讲座中详尽讨论了气候变化这个话题。

en: We exhausted the topic of budget cuts during the meeting.
cn: 我们在会议上详尽讨论了预算削减这个话题。

en: I got off on the wrong foot with my new boss by being late on the first day.
cn: 我第一天上班迟到，和新老板一开始就关系不顺。

en: Their project got off on the wrong foot due to miscommunication.
cn: 由于沟通不畅，他们的项目一开始就出问题了。

en: Witnesses are encouraged to come forward with any information about the crime.
cn: 鼓励目击者站出来提供有关犯罪的任何信息。

en: She came forward to volunteer for the charity event.
cn: 她主动站出来志愿参加慈善活动。

en: The annual office party is a chance for employees to socialize.
cn: 年度办公室聚会是员工社交的机会。

en: We organized an office party to celebrate the project's success.
cn: 我们组织了一次办公室聚会来庆祝项目的成功。

en: He took sick leave to recover from the flu.
cn: 他请了病假来从流感中恢复。

en: Employees are entitled to paid sick leave according to company policy.
cn: 根据公司政策，员工有权享受带薪病假。

en: He held up the trophy for everyone to see.
cn: 他举起奖杯让每个人都能看到。

en: The pillars hold up the roof of the building.
cn: 柱子支撑着建筑物的屋顶。

en: The cat curled up on the sofa and fell asleep.
cn: 猫蜷缩在沙发上睡着了。

en: She curled up with a book on a rainy afternoon.
cn: 在一个下雨的下午，她蜷缩着看书。

en: The startup is having growing pains as it expands rapidly.
cn: 这家初创公司在快速扩张时正经历成长中的困难。

en: Teenagers often have growing pains as they adjust to new responsibilities.
cn: 青少年在适应新责任时常常经历成长中的困难。

en: In a sense, all art is subjective.
cn: 在某种意义上，所有艺术都是主观的。

en: He was right in a sense, but missed the bigger picture.
cn: 在某种意义上他是对的，但忽略了更大的局面。

en: You should act on the advice of your doctor for better health.
cn: 你应该根据医生的建议行动以改善健康。

en: The police acted on the tip-off and arrested the suspect.
cn: 警方根据线报行动并逮捕了嫌疑人。

en: The award ceremony for the film festival will be held next week.
cn: 电影节的颁奖典礼将于下周举行。

en: She felt honored to attend the award ceremony for scientific achievements.
cn: 她感到荣幸能参加科学成就的颁奖典礼。

en: We will notify you of the results in due course.
cn: 我们会在适当的时候通知你结果。

en: In due course, all the details will become clear.
cn: 最终，所有细节都会变得清晰。

en: I need to make a call to my boss to discuss the project.
cn: 我需要给老板打个电话讨论这个项目。

en: She made a call to customer service to report the issue.
cn: 她给客服打了个电话报告这个问题。

en: She has a reputation as a reliable employee.
cn: 她以可靠的员工而闻名。

en: The company has a reputation as an innovator in the tech industry.
cn: 这家公司以科技行业的创新者而闻名。

en: It's important to handle enquiries politely to maintain good customer relations.
cn: 礼貌地处理询问对于维持良好的客户关系很重要。

en: She always handles enquiries politely, even under pressure.
cn: 即使在压力下，她也总是礼貌地处理询问。

en: Together with my friends, I went to the concert.
cn: 我和朋友们一起去听了音乐会。

en: The report, together with the data, was submitted to the committee.
cn: 报告连同数据一起提交给了委员会。

en: If you stick at your studies, you'll eventually succeed.
cn: 如果你坚持学习，最终会成功的。

en: He stuck at the task until it was completed.
cn: 他坚持完成任务直到完成。

en: At the end of the year, we take stock of our achievements and challenges.
cn: 在年底，我们评估我们的成就和挑战。

en: It's time to take stock of the situation before making a decision.
cn: 在做出决定之前，是时候评估一下情况了。

en: Teachers must maintain discipline in the classroom for effective learning.
cn: 教师必须在课堂上维持纪律以实现有效学习。

en: The manager works hard to maintain discipline among the team members.
cn: 经理努力在团队成员中维持纪律。

en: The bullies ganged up on the new student at school.
cn: 霸凌者们在学校联合起来对付新同学。

en: They ganged up on him during the debate to weaken his argument.
cn: 他们在辩论中联合起来对付他以削弱他的论点。

en: Please submit your report by Friday at the latest.
cn: 请最迟在周五提交你的报告。

en: We expect to finish the project by next month at the latest.
cn: 我们期望最迟在下个月完成这个项目。

en: Her response to the question was thoughtful and detailed.
cn: 她对问题的回应是深思熟虑且详细的。

en: The company issued a response to the customer complaints.
cn: 公司对客户投诉做出了回应。

en: The city has seen a rise in juvenile delinquency in recent years.
cn: 近年来，这个城市的青少年犯罪有所增加。

en: Programs aimed at reducing juvenile delinquency focus on education and support.
cn: 旨在减少青少年犯罪的项目侧重于教育和支持。

en: She embarked on a new career in marketing.
cn: 她开始了市场营销的新职业。

en: The team embarked on the project with enthusiasm.
cn: 团队热情地着手进行这个项目。

en: Stop beating around the bush and come to the point.
cn: 别拐弯抹角了，切入正题吧。

en: In his presentation, he quickly came to the point to save time.
cn: 在他的演示中，他很快切入正题以节省时间。

en: I love the hustle and bustle of city life.
cn: 我喜欢城市生活的熙熙攘攘。

en: The market was full of hustle and bustle on Saturday morning.
cn: 周六早晨的市场充满了繁忙喧闹。

en: He carved out a successful niche in the competitive market.
cn: 他在竞争激烈的市场中开辟了一个成功的利基市场。

en: She carved out time in her busy schedule for exercise.
cn: 她在繁忙的日程中挤出时间锻炼。

en: You should stay away from that dangerous neighborhood.
cn: 你应该远离那个危险的街区。

en: The doctor advised him to stay away from sugary foods.
cn: 医生建议他避开含糖食物。

en: The government is cracking down on illegal activities.
cn: 政府正在严厉打击非法活动。

en: Police cracked down on the protest to maintain order.
cn: 警方镇压了抗议以维持秩序。

en: She was caught up in the excitement of the concert.
cn: 她被音乐会的兴奋气氛所感染。

en: He got caught up in office politics and lost focus on his work.
cn: 他卷入了办公室政治，失去了对工作的专注。

en: A Swiss Army knife always comes in handy during camping trips.
cn: 瑞士军刀在露营旅行中总是派上用场。

en: His language skills came in handy when traveling abroad.
cn: 他的语言技能在国外旅行时很有用。

en: The benefits of economic growth should trickle down to all citizens.
cn: 经济增长的好处应该涓滴到所有公民。

en: Wealth doesn't always trickle down from the rich to the poor.
cn: 财富并不总是从富人涓滴到穷人。

en: The government is investing in state housing for low-income families.
cn: 政府正在投资为低收入家庭提供国家住房。

en: State housing projects aim to provide affordable homes.
cn: 国家住房项目旨在提供负担得起的住房。

en: The firefighters held the flames at bay until reinforcements arrived.
cn: 消防员阻止了火焰蔓延，直到增援到达。

en: She held her emotions at bay during the difficult meeting.
cn: 在艰难的会议中，她控制住了自己的情绪。

en: Let's go back to the main topic of discussion.
cn: 让我们回到讨论的主要话题。

en: He plans to go back to his hometown after retirement.
cn: 他计划退休后返回家乡。

en: The parent put their foot down and said no to the late-night party.
cn: 家长坚决反对，不允许参加深夜派对。

en: The manager put his foot down on the issue of workplace safety.
cn: 经理在工作场所安全问题上采取了强硬立场。

en: The apartment is for lease starting next month.
cn: 这套公寓从下个月起供出租。

en: There's a commercial space for lease in the downtown area.
cn: 市中心有一个商业空间供出租。

en: They set the captured bird loose back into the wild.
cn: 他们将捕获的鸟放回野外。

en: The rumor set loose a wave of panic in the community.
cn: 谣言在社区中引发了一波恐慌。

en: This table is made out of solid oak.
cn: 这张桌子由实心橡木制成。

en: The sculpture is made out of recycled materials.
cn: 这个雕塑由回收材料制成。

en: Employees have access to the company's database.
cn: 员工有权使用公司的数据库。

en: Students have access to the library 24/7.
cn: 学生可以全天候使用图书馆。

en: After the fire, they had to start from scratch to rebuild their home.
cn: 火灾后，他们不得不从头开始重建家园。

en: He decided to start from scratch with a new business idea.
cn: 他决定用一个新商业想法白手起家。

en: The comment sparked off a heated debate.
cn: 这个评论引发了一场激烈的辩论。

en: The incident sparked off a series of protests.
cn: 这个事件触发了一系列抗议活动。

en: We kicked around some ideas for the new project.
cn: 我们随意讨论了一些新项目的想法。

en: Let's kick around the possibility of moving to a new office.
cn: 让我们考虑一下搬到新办公室的可能性。

en: Come to think of it, I did see her at the store yesterday.
cn: 突然想起来，我昨天确实在商店看到她了。

en: Come to think of it, we should have booked the tickets earlier.
cn: 突然意识到，我们本应该早点订票的。

en: Students must submit a tutorial paper by the end of the semester.
cn: 学生必须在学期末提交一篇辅导论文。

en: The tutorial paper covered advanced topics in physics.
cn: 这篇教程论文涵盖了物理学的高级主题。

en: I stumbled on an old photo album while cleaning the attic.
cn: 打扫阁楼时，我偶然发现了一本旧相册。

en: She stumbled on a great restaurant during her trip.
cn: 旅行期间，她偶然发现了一家很棒的餐厅。

en: By and by, the sun began to set over the horizon.
cn: 不久以后，太阳开始在地平线上落下。

en: You'll understand the situation by and by.
cn: 你逐渐会理解这个情况的。

en: We can get by with just one car for now.
cn: 目前我们凑合用一辆车就行。

en: He gets by with a small income but manages to save some money.
cn: 他靠微薄的收入勉强应付，但还能存点钱。

en: Bees were buzzing around the flowers in the garden.
cn: 蜜蜂在花园的花朵周围忙碌地飞来飞去。

en: Rumors are buzzing around the office about the merger.
cn: 关于合并的谣言在办公室里四处传播。

en: The manager took him to task for missing the deadline.
cn: 经理因他错过截止日期而严厉批评了他。

en: She was taken to task by her parents for her poor grades.
cn: 她因成绩差被父母责备。

en: The company offers telephone rental for short-term events.
cn: 该公司为短期活动提供电话租赁服务。

en: We considered telephone rental instead of buying new phones.
cn: 我们考虑租赁电话而不是购买新手机。

en: The party got into full swing after midnight.
cn: 午夜后派对进入了高潮阶段。

en: Production is getting into full swing with the new machinery.
cn: 随着新机器的使用，生产正进入全面活跃阶段。

en: His skills are far beyond those of his peers.
cn: 他的技能远远超过了他的同龄人。

en: The village is far beyond the mountains, isolated from the city.
cn: 村庄远在山脉之外，与城市隔绝。

en: Data processing is essential for analyzing large datasets.
cn: 数据处理对于分析大型数据集至关重要。

en: The company upgraded its data processing systems to improve efficiency.
cn: 该公司升级了数据处理系统以提高效率。

en: I don't like him, but give the devil his due, he is a hard worker.
cn: 我不喜欢他，但公平地说，他是个努力工作的人。

en: Give the devil his due, the plan was well thought out, even if it failed.
cn: 公平对待，这个计划考虑得很周全，即使它失败了。

en: Many English words derive from Latin.
cn: 许多英语单词源自拉丁语。

en: The theory derives from extensive research in the field.
cn: 这个理论来源于该领域的广泛研究。

en: Weight lifting is a popular way to build muscle strength.
cn: 举重是增强肌肉力量的流行方式。

en: She includes weight lifting in her weekly exercise routine.
cn: 她将举重纳入每周的锻炼计划中。

en: The waiter will wait on you shortly.
cn: 服务员很快就会来服侍您。

en: She waited on her elderly mother with great care.
cn: 她精心服侍年迈的母亲。

en: He awoke to the reality of his financial problems.
cn: 他意识到了自己财务问题的现实。

en: The public is slowly awaking to the dangers of climate change.
cn: 公众正逐渐意识到气候变化的危险。

en: She lived through two world wars and many hardships.
cn: 她经历了两次世界大战和许多艰难困苦。

en: It's amazing how people live through natural disasters and rebuild.
cn: 人们经历自然灾害并重建，这真是令人惊叹。

en: The meeting dragged on for hours without any conclusion.
cn: 会议拖延了数小时，没有任何结论。

en: The legal case has been dragging on for years.
cn: 这个法律案件已经拖延了多年。

en: The Great Depression caused widespread unemployment in the 1930s.
cn: 大萧条在20世纪30年代导致了广泛的失业。

en: Many families struggled during the Great Depression.
cn: 许多家庭在大萧条期间挣扎求生。

en: The view from the mountaintop took my breath away.
cn: 山顶的景色美得让我窒息。

en: Her performance in the play took everyone's breath away.
cn: 她在剧中的表演让所有人都惊叹不已。

en: We sat on the balcony to enjoy the view of the ocean.
cn: 我们坐在阳台上欣赏海景。

en: Tourists often stop here to enjoy the view of the mountains.
cn: 游客经常在这里停下来欣赏山景。

en: We visited several war museums during our trip to Europe.
cn: 我们在欧洲旅行期间参观了几家战争博物馆。

en: The war museum displays artifacts from World War II.
cn: 这家战争博物馆展示了二战时期的文物。

en: Can you cover for me at the meeting tomorrow?
cn: 你能在明天的会议上代替我吗？

en: She covered for her colleague who was sick.
cn: 她顶替了生病的同事。

en: He had to raise his voice to be heard over the noise.
cn: 他不得不提高声音以便在噪音中被听到。

en: Please don't raise your voice during the meeting.
cn: 请不要在会议期间大声说话。

en: We need to go across the bridge to reach the other side.
cn: 我们需要穿过桥才能到达另一边。

en: The message went across the country quickly.
cn: 这个消息迅速传遍了全国。

en: She prevailed on her friend to join the club.
cn: 她说服她的朋友加入俱乐部。

en: He prevailed on the committee to approve the proposal.
cn: 他劝服委员会批准了这个提议。

en: He stripped down to his shorts before jumping into the pool.
cn: 他脱掉衣服只剩短裤，然后跳进游泳池。

en: The doctor asked the patient to strip down for the examination.
cn: 医生要求病人脱掉衣服进行检查。

en: She decided to pursue a career in medicine.
cn: 她决定追求医学职业。

en: He is pursuing a career as a software engineer.
cn: 他正在追求软件工程师的职业。

en: She looked like a million dollars in her new dress.
cn: 她穿着新裙子看起来非常漂亮。

en: After the makeover, he looked like a million dollars.
cn: 改造后，他看起来非常富有魅力。

en: I spaced out during the boring lecture.
cn: 我在无聊的讲座中走神了。

en: He often spaces out when he's tired.
cn: 他累的时候经常发呆。

en: She freaked out when she saw the spider.
cn: 她看到蜘蛛时惊慌失措。

en: Don't freak out; everything will be fine.
cn: 别紧张，一切都会好的。

en: He tried to get on the good side of his new boss.
cn: 他试图讨好他的新老板。

en: Getting on the good side of the teacher can help with grades.
cn: 赢得老师的好感有助于提高成绩。

en: The company launched a new advertising campaign for its product.
cn: 公司为其产品推出了新的广告活动。

en: The advertising campaign increased sales by 20%.
cn: 这次广告活动使销售额增加了20%。

en: Shake up the bottle before opening it.
cn: 打开瓶子前先摇动它。

en: The earthquake shook up the entire city.
cn: 地震震动了整个城市。

en: He knocked up his neighbor early in the morning.
cn: 他一大早敲门叫醒了他的邻居。

en: Can you knock me up at 6 AM tomorrow?
cn: 你能明天早上6点敲门叫醒我吗？

en: The students' union organized a charity event.
cn: 学生会组织了一场慈善活动。

en: She is the president of the students' union.
cn: 她是学生会的主席。

en: Children often have abundant energy to play all day.
cn: 孩子们通常精力充沛，可以玩一整天。

en: After a good night's sleep, she had abundant energy for work.
cn: 睡了一晚好觉后，她精力充沛地工作。

en: She got mad when her brother broke her favorite toy.
cn: 她弟弟弄坏了她最喜欢的玩具时，她生气了。

en: Don't get mad at me for telling the truth.
cn: 别因为我说了实话就对我发火。

en: The party came to life when the music started.
cn: 音乐开始时，派对变得活跃起来。

en: The old story came to life in the movie adaptation.
cn: 这个古老的故事在电影改编中变得生动。

en: The city plans to renovate old buildings in the historic district.
cn: 该市计划翻新历史街区的旧建筑。

en: They hired a contractor to renovate old buildings for modern use.
cn: 他们聘请了承包商翻新旧建筑以供现代使用。

en: Bird migration is a fascinating natural phenomenon observed worldwide.
cn: 鸟类迁徙是世界范围内观察到的迷人自然现象。

en: Scientists study bird migration patterns to understand climate effects.
cn: 科学家研究鸟类迁徙模式以了解气候影响。

en: Many people view him as a role model for his charitable work.
cn: 许多人因他的慈善工作而将他视为榜样。

en: She views the challenge as an opportunity to grow.
cn: 她将挑战视为成长的机会。

en: Students benefit from hands-on learning experiences.
cn: 学生从实践学习经验中受益。

en: The company will benefit from the new tax incentives.
cn: 公司将受益于新的税收优惠政策。

en: Athletes often go to the limit to achieve their personal best.
cn: 运动员常常竭尽全力以达到个人最佳成绩。

en: The team went to the limit to meet the tight deadline.
cn: 团队竭尽全力以赶上紧迫的截止日期。

en: The restaurant adds a 10% service charge to all bills.
cn: 这家餐厅在所有账单上加收10%的服务费。

en: The hotel's service charge covers amenities like housekeeping and concierge.
cn: 酒店的服务费包括客房清洁和礼宾服务等设施。

en: Employees are expected to complete tasks by the deadline.
cn: 员工应在截止日期前完成任务。

en: She uses a checklist to help her complete tasks efficiently.
cn: 她使用清单来帮助高效完成任务。

en: Against all odds, they managed to bring off the difficult project.
cn: 尽管困难重重，他们还是成功完成了这个艰难的项目。

en: He brought off a stunning victory in the final match.
cn: 他在决赛中取得了惊人的胜利。

en: Researchers experiment on mice to study disease treatments.
cn: 研究人员在小鼠身上进行实验以研究疾病治疗方法。

en: It is unethical to experiment on humans without consent.
cn: 未经同意在人类身上进行实验是不道德的。

en: Housing developers are building new apartments in the suburban area.
cn: 住房开发商正在郊区建造新公寓。

en: The city council works with housing developers to plan affordable homes.
cn: 市议会与住房开发商合作规划经济适用房。

en: After the explanation, I finally get it.
cn: 解释之后，我终于明白了。

en: Do you get it? It's a simple concept.
cn: 你明白了吗？这是个简单的概念。

en: The survey method used in the study involved online questionnaires.
cn: 该研究中使用的调查方法包括在线问卷。

en: Researchers compared different survey methods to gather accurate data.
cn: 研究人员比较了不同的调查方法以收集准确数据。

en: He plans to leave school after graduating high school.
cn: 他计划高中毕业后离开学校。

en: Some students leave school early to start working.
cn: 一些学生早早离开学校开始工作。

en: The new policy will open up trade opportunities with other countries.
cn: 新政策将开放与其他国家的贸易机会。

en: She decided to open up about her feelings to her friend.
cn: 她决定向朋友敞开心扉谈论自己的感受。

en: He tried to gloss over the mistakes in the report.
cn: 他试图掩盖报告中的错误。

en: Politicians often gloss over difficult issues during debates.
cn: 政治家在辩论中常常掩饰困难的问题。

en: She polished up the silverware before the dinner party.
cn: 她在晚宴前擦亮了银器。

en: He spent hours polishing up his car to make it shine.
cn: 他花了几个小时抛光他的车，让它闪闪发光。

en: Rust can eat away at metal over time.
cn: 锈会随着时间的推移侵蚀金属。

en: Worry began to eat away at her confidence.
cn: 担忧开始逐渐侵蚀她的信心。

en: Many countries are reducing their reliance on traditional fossil fuels.
cn: 许多国家正在减少对传统化石燃料的依赖。

en: Traditional fossil fuels contribute significantly to greenhouse gas emissions.
cn: 传统化石燃料对温室气体排放有显著贡献。

en: I don't have time for another meeting today.
cn: 我今天没时间再开一个会了。

en: Do you have time for a quick coffee?
cn: 你有时间喝杯咖啡吗？

en: Please make out a check to John Smith for the invoice amount.
cn: 请开具一张给约翰·史密斯的支票，金额为发票总额。

en: I'll make out a check to the charity organization as a donation.
cn: 我会开具一张支票给慈善机构作为捐款。

en: He broke the chocolate into chunks of various sizes.
cn: 他把巧克力掰成了大小不一的块。

en: The report contains chunks of data that need analysis.
cn: 报告包含大量需要分析的数据。

en: The new software is designed to meet the needs of small businesses.
cn: 新软件旨在满足小企业的需求。

en: We must meet the basic needs of all community members.
cn: 我们必须满足所有社区成员的基本需求。

en: The kids love to play jokes on their teacher during April Fools' Day.
cn: 孩子们喜欢在愚人节时开老师的玩笑。

en: He often plays jokes on his colleagues to lighten the mood.
cn: 他经常开同事的玩笑来活跃气氛。

en: I don't like spicy food, and for that matter, I avoid anything too salty.
cn: 我不喜欢辣食，就此而言，我也避免任何太咸的东西。

en: She's not interested in politics, or for that matter, any serious discussions.
cn: 她对政治不感兴趣，同样地，对任何严肃的讨论也不感兴趣。

en: Most freshmen are required to live on campus during their first year.
cn: 大多数新生在第一年被要求住在校园内。

en: Living on campus makes it easier to attend early morning classes.
cn: 住在校园内使得参加早课更容易。

en: He's such a tedious fellow, always talking about the same old topics.
cn: 他是个如此乏味的人，总是谈论同样老套的话题。

en: Avoid that tedious fellow at parties; he'll bore you with long stories.
cn: 在派对上避开那个乏味的人；他会用长篇大论让你厌烦。

en: After a long day, I want a pick-me-up like a cup of coffee.
cn: 漫长的一天后，我想要一杯咖啡这样的提神物。

en: She said she wants a pick-me-up to boost her energy in the afternoon.
cn: 她说她想要一个提神物来在下午提升精力。

en: She is learning to cope with the stress of her new job.
cn: 她正在学习应对新工作的压力。

en: It's hard to cope with the loss of a loved one.
cn: 很难应对失去亲人的痛苦。

en: In all likelihood, it will rain tomorrow, so bring an umbrella.
cn: 很可能明天会下雨，所以带把伞。

en: The project will, in all likelihood, be completed by next month.
cn: 这个项目十有八九会在下个月完成。

en: A new issue came up during the meeting that we need to address.
cn: 会议中出现了一个我们需要解决的新问题。

en: His name came up in conversation as a potential candidate.
cn: 在谈话中，他的名字被提及为潜在候选人。

en: The police stopped the thief from escaping.
cn: 警察阻止了小偷逃跑。

en: She tried to stop her child from eating too much candy.
cn: 她试图阻止她的孩子吃太多糖果。

en: The flag is flying at the top of the building.
cn: 旗帜在大楼的顶部飘扬。

en: Write your name at the top of the page.
cn: 在页面的顶部写下你的名字。

en: The security team kept the protesters at bay during the event.
cn: 安保团队在活动期间控制住了抗议者。

en: Regular exercise helps keep illnesses at bay.
cn: 定期锻炼有助于控制疾病。

en: The small startup developed into a multinational corporation.
cn: 这家小初创公司发展成了一家跨国公司。

en: Their friendship developed into a romantic relationship over time.
cn: 随着时间的推移，他们的友谊发展成了恋爱关系。

en: The mirror reflects back your image clearly.
cn: 镜子清晰地反射出你的影像。

en: She likes to reflect back on her childhood memories.
cn: 她喜欢回想她的童年记忆。

en: Scientists have linked smoking to various health problems.
cn: 科学家已将吸烟与各种健康问题联系起来。

en: The article links economic growth to technological innovation.
cn: 这篇文章将经济增长与技术革新联系起来。

en: The constant traffic noise from the highway makes it hard to sleep at night.
cn: 高速公路持续的交通噪音让人晚上难以入睡。

en: Living in the city center exposes you to high levels of traffic noise.
cn: 住在市中心会让你暴露在高水平的交通噪音中。

en: Cotton is a common plant fiber used in textile manufacturing.
cn: 棉花是一种常用于纺织制造的植物纤维。

en: Plant fibers like hemp are being explored for sustainable packaging solutions.
cn: 像大麻这样的植物纤维正在被探索用于可持续包装解决方案。

en: The car got stuck in the mud during the heavy rain.
cn: 大雨中，汽车陷进了泥里。

en: I got stuck on a difficult math problem for hours.
cn: 我被一道数学难题困住了几个小时。

en: He went ape when he found out his car had been scratched.
cn: 他发现自己的车被刮花时，气得发疯。

en: The fans went ape after their team scored the winning goal.
cn: 球迷们在球队打入制胜球后变得疯狂起来。

en: The doctor gave a prescription for antibiotics to treat the infection.
cn: 医生开了抗生素处方来治疗感染。

en: Only licensed physicians can legally give a prescription for controlled substances.
cn: 只有持牌医生才能合法开具管制药物的处方。

en: After traveling the world, she saw her problems in perspective and felt less stressed.
cn: 环游世界后，她正确地看待了自己的问题，压力减轻了。

en: It's important to keep things in perspective when facing challenges.
cn: 面对挑战时，保持正确看待事物很重要。

en: The company introduced merit pay to reward employees based on their performance.
cn: 公司引入了绩效工资，根据员工的表现给予奖励。

en: Merit pay systems can motivate workers to achieve higher productivity.
cn: 绩效工资制度可以激励工人提高生产力。

en: She had a hand in organizing the charity event, helping with the logistics.
cn: 她参与了慈善活动的组织，协助了后勤工作。

en: The manager suspected that an insider had a hand in the security breach.
cn: 经理怀疑有内部人员参与了安全漏洞事件。

en: Strong analytical skills are essential for solving complex problems in engineering.
cn: 强大的分析能力对于解决工程中的复杂问题至关重要。

en: The job requires candidates to demonstrate their analytical skills through case studies.
cn: 这份工作要求候选人通过案例研究展示他们的分析能力。

en: I leave home early to avoid rush-hour traffic and get to work on time.
cn: 我早早出门以避开高峰时段交通，准时上班。

en: Using public transport can help you avoid rush-hour traffic jams.
cn: 使用公共交通可以帮助你避开高峰时段的交通堵塞。

en: Every so often, I like to take a break and go for a walk in the park.
cn: 偶尔，我喜欢休息一下，去公园散步。

en: He checks his email every so often to stay updated on work matters.
cn: 他时不时地查看电子邮件，以了解工作动态。

en: It takes a few minutes for the computer to boot up after being turned off.
cn: 计算机关机后启动需要几分钟时间。

en: Make sure to boot up the system before running the software installation.
cn: 在运行软件安装之前，确保启动系统。

en: Welsh is a minority language in the United Kingdom, spoken mainly in Wales.
cn: 威尔士语是英国的少数民族语言，主要在威尔士使用。

en: Efforts are being made to preserve minority languages that are at risk of extinction.
cn: 人们正在努力保护濒临灭绝的少数民族语言。

en: The committee was in agreement with the proposed changes to the policy.
cn: 委员会同意对政策提出的修改。

en: Her findings are in agreement with previous research on the topic.
cn: 她的发现与之前关于该主题的研究一致。

en: Companies are encouraged to use resources in an environmentally friendly way to reduce their carbon footprint.
cn: 鼓励公司以环保的方式使用资源，以减少碳足迹。

en: Using resources in an environmentally friendly way includes recycling and conserving water.
cn: 以环保的方式使用资源包括回收利用和节约用水。

en: Extending the deadline is out of the question due to strict regulations.
cn: 由于严格的规定，延长截止日期是不可能的。

en: Buying a new car right now is out of the question because of budget constraints.
cn: 由于预算限制，现在买新车是不可能的。

en: What about going to the movies tonight?
cn: 今晚去看电影怎么样？

en: What about trying the new restaurant?
cn: 试试那家新餐厅怎么样？

en: He promised on his honor to return the borrowed money by next week.
cn: 他以名誉担保，承诺下周前归还借的钱。

en: Students are expected to complete the exam on their honor, without cheating.
cn: 学生应以名誉担保完成考试，不作弊。

en: The rain should ease up by the afternoon, according to the weather forecast.
cn: 根据天气预报，雨势应该在下午减轻。

en: He needs to ease up on his workload to avoid burnout.
cn: 他需要减轻工作量以避免精疲力竭。

en: The difficult project put her skills to the test, but she succeeded.
cn: 这个困难的项目考验了她的技能，但她成功了。

en: Emergency situations put the team's preparedness to the test.
cn: 紧急情况考验了团队的准备情况。

en: After the presentation, the moderator will open the floor for questions.
cn: 演示结束后，主持人将开放提问环节。

en: Let's open the floor to any comments from the audience.
cn: 让我们开放给听众发表任何评论。

en: She has an ear for languages and picks them up quickly.
cn: 她对语言有天赋，学得很快。

en: He has an ear for classical music and can identify composers easily.
cn: 他对古典音乐有鉴赏力，能轻松识别作曲家。

en: The suspenseful movie kept the audience on tenterhooks.
cn: 这部悬疑电影让观众紧张不已。

en: Waiting for the exam results kept her on tenterhooks all week.
cn: 等待考试结果让她整个星期都焦虑不安。

en: I ran into an old friend at the supermarket yesterday.
cn: 昨天我在超市偶然遇到了一位老朋友。

en: She ran into her teacher while walking in the park.
cn: 她在公园散步时偶然遇到了她的老师。

en: There are many discounts on offer during the holiday sale.
cn: 假日促销期间有许多折扣可供选择。

en: The new software features are on offer for a limited time.
cn: 新软件功能限时提供。

en: He always rakes up old arguments during family gatherings.
cn: 他总是在家庭聚会上重提旧争论。

en: Don't rake up past mistakes; let's focus on the future.
cn: 不要重提过去的错误；让我们专注于未来。

en: She exercises regularly to tone up her muscles.
cn: 她定期锻炼以使肌肉更结实。

en: He started running to tone up before the summer.
cn: 他开始跑步以在夏天前让身体更健康。

en: I am willing to help you with your homework.
cn: 我愿意帮你做作业。

en: She is willing to take on extra responsibilities at work.
cn: 她愿意在工作中承担额外的责任。

en: To make a long story short, we decided to cancel the trip.
cn: 长话短说，我们决定取消旅行。

en: Make a long story short, he got the job after all.
cn: 简而言之，他最终还是得到了那份工作。

en: It took me a while to take in all the details of the plan.
cn: 我花了一些时间才理解计划的所有细节。

en: She couldn't take in the shocking news immediately.
cn: 她无法立即吸收这个令人震惊的消息。

en: Please turn over the page to continue reading.
cn: 请翻到下一页继续阅读。

en: He turned over the pancake to cook the other side.
cn: 他翻转了煎饼以烹饪另一面。

en: The plan is innovative in that it uses new technology.
cn: 这个计划具有创新性，因为它使用了新技术。

en: He succeeded in that he worked harder than anyone else.
cn: 他成功了，因为他比任何人都更努力。

en: Economic factors have a bearing on investment decisions.
cn: 经济因素对投资决策有影响。

en: Her experience has a bearing on her ability to lead the team.
cn: 她的经验对她领导团队的能力有影响。

en: We've been running around in circles trying to fix the bug.
cn: 我们一直忙得团团转试图修复这个错误。

en: Without a clear plan, you'll just run around in circles.
cn: 没有明确的计划，你只会做无用功。

en: Investing in stocks runs risks of losing money.
cn: 投资股票有亏钱的风险。

en: He runs risks by driving without a seatbelt.
cn: 他不系安全带开车是在冒险。

en: His opinions are removed from the mainstream views.
cn: 他的观点与主流观点无关。

en: She tries to be removed from office politics.
cn: 她试图远离办公室政治。

en: He studies hard with the purpose of getting into a good university.
cn: 他努力学习是为了进入一所好大学。

en: The meeting was held with the purpose of discussing future strategies.
cn: 召开会议的目的是讨论未来战略。

en: She will attend the tournament as a competitor next month.
cn: 她下个月将作为参赛者参加锦标赛。

en: Many fans attended the tournament to support their favorite teams.
cn: 许多粉丝参加了锦标赛，支持他们最喜欢的队伍。

en: After the argument, she needed to cool down before speaking again.
cn: 争吵后，她需要冷静下来再说话。

en: Let the engine cool down before checking the oil.
cn: 在检查机油前，让发动机先降温。

en: Take the smartphone for example, it has revolutionized communication.
cn: 以智能手机为例，它彻底改变了通信方式。

en: Take Shakespeare for example, his plays are still performed worldwide.
cn: 以莎士比亚为例，他的戏剧仍在全球上演。

en: After losing the debate, he left with his tail between his legs.
cn: 辩论失败后，他夹着尾巴离开了。

en: The team had their tails between their legs after the embarrassing defeat.
cn: 在尴尬的失败后，整个团队都夹着尾巴。

en: Despite the company's bankruptcy, he landed on his feet with a new job.
cn: 尽管公司破产，他找到新工作，安然度过了困境。

en: After the divorce, she landed on her feet and started a successful business.
cn: 离婚后，她成功应对，创办了一家成功的企业。

en: I have no use for this old computer anymore.
cn: 我不再需要这台旧电脑了。

en: He has no use for people who don't keep their promises.
cn: 他不重视不守承诺的人。

en: She sent out graduation announcements to all her relatives.
cn: 她向所有亲戚发出了毕业通知。

en: The graduation announcements included the date and location of the ceremony.
cn: 毕业通知包括了典礼的日期和地点。

en: With this tight deadline, we have our work cut out for us.
cn: 截止日期这么紧，我们面临艰巨任务。

en: She has her work cut out to finish the project by Friday.
cn: 她面临艰巨任务，要在周五前完成项目。

en: The comedian's joke made the audience crack up.
cn: 喜剧演员的笑话让观众大笑。

en: We cracked up at the funny video online.
cn: 我们在网上看到有趣的视频时大笑。

en: I happened to see her at the supermarket yesterday.
cn: 我昨天碰巧在超市看到她。

en: Do you happen to know the answer to this question?
cn: 你碰巧知道这个问题的答案吗？

en: She was instrumental in securing the funding for the project.
cn: 她在为项目争取资金中起了关键作用。

en: His research was instrumental in developing the new vaccine.
cn: 他的研究在开发新疫苗中起了关键作用。

en: A good leader has a strong sense of responsibility.
cn: 一个好的领导者有强烈的责任感。

en: He showed his sense of responsibility by always being on time.
cn: 他总是准时，显示了他的责任感。

en: You are free to leave whenever you want.
cn: 你可以随时自由离开。

en: Students are free to choose their own topics for the essay.
cn: 学生可以自由选择论文的主题。

en: She arrived at the party with her children in tow.
cn: 她带着孩子们跟随她参加了派对。

en: The truck had a trailer in tow.
cn: 卡车拖着一辆拖车。

en: He told the aggressive dog to back off.
cn: 他让那只凶猛的狗后退。

en: Back off and give me some space to think.
cn: 退让一下，给我一些思考的空间。

en: His schedule is in conflict with the meeting time.
cn: 他的日程与会议时间冲突。

en: The new policy is in conflict with existing laws.
cn: 新政策与现有法律冲突。

en: I watch TV news every evening to stay informed.
cn: 我每晚看电视新闻以了解最新信息。

en: TV news provides updates on current events around the world.
cn: 电视新闻提供全球时事的最新报道。

en: She dedicates her energy to helping the homeless.
cn: 她致力于帮助无家可归者。

en: He dedicated his energy to mastering the piano.
cn: 他致力于掌握钢琴。

en: What do you make of this strange situation?
cn: 你怎么理解这个奇怪的情况？

en: I don't know what to make of his sudden resignation.
cn: 我不知道如何看待他突然辞职。

en: She showed talent in music from an early age.
cn: 她从幼年起就显示出音乐天赋。

en: From an early age, he was taught to respect others.
cn: 从幼年起，他就被教导要尊重他人。

en: The graduation ceremony will be held in the university auditorium next Friday.
cn: 毕业典礼将于下周五在大学礼堂举行。

en: She felt proud as she walked across the stage at her graduation ceremony.
cn: 她在毕业典礼上走过舞台时感到自豪。

en: Hold tight to the railing when climbing the stairs.
cn: 爬楼梯时抓紧栏杆。

en: Hold tight, the situation will improve soon.
cn: 坚持住，情况很快就会改善。

en: If you go outside without an umbrella, you'll get wet in the rain.
cn: 如果你不带伞出门，你会在雨中淋湿。

en: The children got wet while playing in the sprinklers.
cn: 孩子们在洒水器中玩耍时弄湿了。

en: He achieved success at the expense of his health.
cn: 他以健康为代价取得了成功。

en: The company grew rapidly at the expense of employee well-being.
cn: 公司以员工福祉为代价迅速增长。

en: The manager needs to sign off on the budget before we proceed.
cn: 经理需要在预算上签字同意，我们才能继续。

en: The radio host signed off with a cheerful goodbye.
cn: 电台主持人以愉快的告别结束了广播。

en: She lives by the principle of honesty in all her dealings.
cn: 她在所有交易中都遵循诚实的原则。

en: He lives by fishing in the coastal village.
cn: 他在沿海村庄以捕鱼为生。

en: The company's registered capital is $1 million, as stated in the incorporation documents.
cn: 根据公司注册文件，公司的注册资本为100万美元。

en: Increasing the registered capital can enhance the firm's credibility with investors.
cn: 增加注册资本可以提高公司与投资者的信誉。

en: When she talks about becoming an actress, she has stars in her eyes.
cn: 当她谈论成为演员时，她眼中充满了憧憬。

en: He had stars in his eyes after meeting his childhood hero.
cn: 见到童年偶像后，他眼中闪烁着兴奋的光芒。

en: He had a narrow escape from the car accident.
cn: 他在车祸中侥幸逃脱。

en: It was a narrow escape when the fire broke out.
cn: 火灾发生时，那是一次侥幸逃脱。

en: I don't have time to do the laundry today because of my busy schedule.
cn: 由于日程繁忙，我今天没时间洗衣服。

en: Do you have time to do a quick review of the report before the meeting?
cn: 会议前你有时间快速审查一下报告吗？

en: She used statistical data to support her argument in the research paper.
cn: 她在研究论文中使用统计数据来支持她的论点。

en: To support his argument, he cited several expert opinions during the discussion.
cn: 为了支持他的论点，他在讨论中引用了多位专家的意见。

en: They plan to host a party to celebrate their anniversary next weekend.
cn: 他们计划下周末举办派对庆祝周年纪念。

en: She loves to host a party at her home during the holidays.
cn: 她喜欢在假期期间在家里举办派对。

en: I like to go for a jog in the park every morning to stay fit.
cn: 我喜欢每天早上在公园慢跑以保持健康。

en: She decided to go for a jog to clear her mind after work.
cn: 她决定下班后去慢跑以清醒头脑。

en: Climate change is causing more frequent extreme weather events worldwide.
cn: 气候变化正在全球范围内导致更频繁的极端天气事件。

en: Scientists are studying the impacts of climate change on polar ice caps.
cn: 科学家正在研究气候变化对极地冰盖的影响。

en: Despite the difficulties, she kept on doing her research until she succeeded.
cn: 尽管困难重重，她继续进行研究直到成功。

en: He told me to keep on doing the exercises to improve my skills.
cn: 他告诉我继续做练习以提高技能。

en: Students from low-income families may be exempted from tuition fees at this university.
cn: 这所大学的低收入家庭学生可能被免除学费。

en: He was exempted from tuition fees due to his outstanding academic performance.
cn: 由于出色的学术表现，他被免除了学费。

en: She is not only intelligent but also very hardworking.
cn: 她不仅聪明，而且非常勤奋。

en: The project requires not only funding but also technical expertise.
cn: 这个项目不仅需要资金，还需要技术专长。

en: The committee called the director to account for the financial discrepancies.
cn: 委员会要求主任对财务差异负责。

en: The public is calling the government to account for its environmental policies.
cn: 公众正在要求政府对其环境政策负责。

en: She keeps her emotions in check during stressful situations.
cn: 她在压力情况下控制自己的情绪。

en: The new regulations are designed to keep pollution levels in check.
cn: 新法规旨在控制污染水平。

en: He had to make up an excuse for being late to the meeting.
cn: 他不得不为开会迟到编造一个借口。

en: She tried to make up for her mistake by working extra hours.
cn: 她试图通过加班来弥补自己的错误。

en: We are running short of time to complete the project before the deadline.
cn: 我们在截止日期前完成项目的时间短缺。

en: The store ran short of supplies during the holiday sale.
cn: 商店在假日促销期间供应短缺。

en: Can you tell me about your trip to Japan?
cn: 你能告诉我你的日本之旅吗？

en: He told his friend about the new job opportunity.
cn: 他告诉朋友关于新工作机会的事。

en: Many species are going extinct due to habitat loss.
cn: 由于栖息地丧失，许多物种正濒临灭绝。

en: If we don't act now, these animals will be going extinct within decades.
cn: 如果我们现在不采取行动，这些动物将在几十年内濒临灭绝。

en: This software is out of date and needs an update.
cn: 这个软件已经过时，需要更新。

en: Her fashion sense is completely out of date.
cn: 她的时尚感完全过时了。

en: The popular toy is out of stock until next month.
cn: 这款热门玩具缺货，要到下个月才有。

en: We're sorry, but that item is out of stock at the moment.
cn: 很抱歉，那个商品目前缺货。

en: I need to make an appointment with the dentist for a check-up.
cn: 我需要和牙医预约一次检查。

en: She made an appointment with her lawyer to discuss the contract.
cn: 她和律师预约讨论合同事宜。

en: The survey had a high response rate of 80%.
cn: 这项调查的响应率高达80%。

en: Improving the response rate is key to getting accurate data.
cn: 提高回复率是获得准确数据的关键。

en: She excels in track and field events like sprinting and long jump.
cn: 她在短跑和跳远等田径项目中表现出色。

en: The school's track and field team won several medals at the competition.
cn: 学校的田径队在比赛中赢得了多枚奖牌。

en: There is an upper limit of $1000 for expenses on this trip.
cn: 这次旅行的费用上限是1000美元。

en: The upper limit for participants in the workshop is 20 people.
cn: 研讨会参与人数的上限是20人。

en: The project is all but finished; we just need to add the final touches.
cn: 这个项目差不多完成了，我们只需要做最后的润色。

en: He was all but certain he would win the competition.
cn: 他几乎确定自己会赢得比赛。

en: The hotel is located in the heart of downtown.
cn: 这家酒店位于市中心的中心地带。

en: They live in the heart of the forest, far from any city.
cn: 他们住在森林的中心，远离任何城市。

en: The soldiers worked to liberate the city from enemy control.
cn: 士兵们努力将这座城市从敌人控制中解放出来。

en: Technology has liberated us from many tedious tasks.
cn: 技术使我们从许多繁琐的任务中解放出来。

en: Please hold up your hand if you have a question.
cn: 如果你有问题，请举手。

en: The pillars hold up the entire structure of the building.
cn: 这些柱子支撑着整栋建筑的结构。

en: The melting point of ice is 0 degrees Celsius.
cn: 冰的熔点是0摄氏度。

en: Different metals have different melting points.
cn: 不同的金属有不同的熔点。

en: In comparison to last year, sales have increased by 10%.
cn: 与去年相比，销售额增长了10%。

en: This car is very efficient in comparison to older models.
cn: 与旧型号相比，这辆车非常高效。

en: After the massage, I felt completely relaxed.
cn: 按摩后，我感到完全放松了。

en: Listening to music helps me feel relaxed after a long day.
cn: 听音乐帮助我在漫长的一天后感到放松。

en: Let's start the ball rolling by introducing ourselves.
cn: 让我们通过自我介绍来开始吧。

en: She started the ball rolling on the project by sending out the first email.
cn: 她通过发送第一封电子邮件启动了项目。

en: By studying harder, she got the advantage over her classmates.
cn: 通过更努力学习，她胜过了她的同学。

en: The team got the advantage over their rivals by scoring early in the game.
cn: 球队通过在比赛早期得分占得了对手的上风。

en: She can cook dinner and help the kids with homework at the same time.
cn: 她可以同时做晚餐和帮助孩子们做作业。

en: The two events happened at the same time in different cities.
cn: 这两个事件在不同城市同时发生。

en: Please turn off the lights when you leave the room.
cn: 离开房间时请关灯。

en: She turned off the TV to focus on her homework.
cn: 她关掉电视以专注于作业。

en: The artist used graphic imagery for its shock value to provoke discussion.
cn: 这位艺术家使用生动的图像以其震惊价值来引发讨论。

en: The advertisement relied on shock value to stand out in a crowded market.
cn: 这则广告依靠震惊价值在拥挤的市场中脱颖而出。

en: He really put his foot in his mouth when he joked about the boss's mistake.
cn: 当他拿老板的错误开玩笑时，他真的说错话了。

en: I put my foot in my mouth by accidentally revealing the surprise party.
cn: 我不小心透露了惊喜派对，真是失言了。

en: Planning the party before inviting guests is putting the cart before the horse.
cn: 在邀请客人之前计划派对是本末倒置。

en: He's buying furniture before he even has a house—that's putting the cart before the horse.
cn: 他连房子都没有就在买家具——这真是本末倒置。

en: The child clung on to his mother's hand in the crowded mall.
cn: 在拥挤的商场里，孩子紧紧抓住妈妈的手。

en: She clings on to old memories even though they make her sad.
cn: 她紧紧抓住旧的记忆，即使它们让她伤心。

en: The interior designer suggested using light colors to make the room feel larger.
cn: 室内设计师建议使用浅色让房间感觉更大。

en: She hired an interior designer to renovate her apartment.
cn: 她雇了一位室内设计师来翻新她的公寓。

en: I need to cash the cheque at the bank today.
cn: 我今天需要去银行兑现支票。

en: You can cash the cheque at any branch of this bank.
cn: 你可以在这家银行的任何分行兑现支票。

en: When the alarm sounded, they decided to make a run for it.
