cn: 警报响起时，他们决定逃跑。

en: He made a run for it as soon as he saw the police approaching.
cn: 他一看到警察靠近就赶紧跑开了。

en: Low-density neighbourhoods often have more green spaces and larger yards.
cn: 低密度社区通常有更多的绿地和更大的院子。

en: Many people prefer low-density neighbourhoods for their quiet and privacy.
cn: 许多人更喜欢低密度社区，因为它们安静且私密。

en: We spent the afternoon wandering about the old town.
cn: 我们下午在古镇闲逛。

en: He likes to wander about in the park to clear his mind.
cn: 他喜欢在公园里闲逛以清空思绪。

en: They pay a mortgage of $1,500 every month for their house.
cn: 他们每月支付1500美元的抵押贷款来供房。

en: It's important to budget carefully to pay a mortgage on time.
cn: 仔细预算以按时支付抵押贷款很重要。

en: The balloon floated in the air for hours.
cn: 气球在空中漂浮了几个小时。

en: Birds fly in the air with ease.
cn: 鸟儿在空中轻松飞翔。

en: The lecture was punctuated by frequent questions from the audience.
cn: 讲座被观众频繁的提问打断。

en: Her speech was punctuated by moments of silence for emphasis.
cn: 她的演讲被强调性的沉默时刻点缀。

en: It's hard to put my gratitude into words.
cn: 很难用言语表达我的感激之情。

en: She finally put her fears into words during the therapy session.
cn: 在治疗期间，她终于用言语表达了自己的恐惧。

en: It's pointless to argue with someone who won't listen.
cn: 与一个不听的人争论是徒劳的。

en: She often argues with her brother over trivial matters.
cn: 她经常和哥哥为琐事争吵。

en: His talent, coupled with hard work, led to his success.
cn: 他的天赋加上努力工作，导致了他的成功。

en: The high cost, coupled with the long commute, made her reconsider the job offer.
cn: 高成本加上长通勤时间，让她重新考虑这份工作邀请。

en: After the fall, his leg was black and blue.
cn: 摔倒后，他的腿青一块紫一块。

en: The boxer was black and blue after the intense match.
cn: 激烈的比赛后，拳击手身上青一块紫一块。

en: The agricultural experimental station tests new crop varieties.
cn: 农业实验站测试新的作物品种。

en: Researchers at the experimental station are studying climate change effects.
cn: 实验站的研究人员正在研究气候变化的影响。

en: After the argument, she gave him the cold shoulder for days.
cn: 争吵后，她冷落了他好几天。

en: He felt hurt when his friends gave him the cold shoulder at the party.
cn: 当朋友们在派对上冷落他时，他感到受伤。

en: Despite early setbacks, she got the last laugh by winning the competition.
cn: 尽管早期遇到挫折，她通过赢得比赛笑到了最后。

en: He was mocked at first, but he got the last laugh when his idea succeeded.
cn: 他起初被嘲笑，但当他的想法成功时，他笑到了最后。

en: He was the last person to leave the building.
cn: 他是最后一个离开大楼的人。

en: This is the last piece of cake.
cn: 这是最后一块蛋糕。

en: The public turned against the politician after the scandal.
cn: 丑闻后，公众反对这位政治家。

en: He turned against his former allies.
cn: 他背叛了以前的盟友。

en: He hopes to find employment in the tech industry.
cn: 他希望在科技行业找到工作。

en: After graduating, she quickly found employment at a local firm.
cn: 毕业后，她很快在当地一家公司找到了工作。

en: She gave a brief introduction to the topic.
cn: 她对主题做了简要介绍。

en: The book includes a brief introduction to each chapter.
cn: 这本书包括每章的简要介绍。

en: She has five years of working experience in marketing.
cn: 她有五年的市场营销工作经验。

en: This job requires prior working experience in the field.
cn: 这份工作要求有该领域的先前工作经验。

en: He made a comment about the new policy.
cn: 他对新政策发表了评论。

en: Please feel free to make a comment on the proposal.
cn: 请随意对提案发表评论。

en: Her talent is without compare in the industry.
cn: 她的才华在行业中无与伦比。

en: The beauty of the landscape is without compare.
cn: 风景之美无可比拟。

en: They cut corners to finish the project quickly, but the quality suffered.
cn: 他们为了快速完成项目而偷工减料，但质量受损了。

en: Don't cut corners when it comes to safety.
cn: 在安全问题上不要走捷径。

en: We go hiking once in a while.
cn: 我们偶尔去远足。

en: He visits his grandparents once in a while.
cn: 他偶尔去看望他的祖父母。

en: He spends hours in front of a screen every day.
cn: 他每天花几个小时在屏幕前。

en: Children should limit their time in front of a screen.
cn: 孩子们应该限制在屏幕前的时间。

en: We strive to provide excellent customer service.
cn: 我们努力提供优质的客户服务。

en: She strives to improve her skills every day.
cn: 她每天努力提升自己的技能。

en: One dollar is equivalent to about 7 yuan.
cn: 一美元大约相当于7元人民币。

en: This certificate is equivalent to a bachelor's degree.
cn: 这个证书等同于学士学位。

en: I haven't heard from him till now.
cn: 直到现在我还没有收到他的消息。

en: Till now, the project has been successful.
cn: 直到现在，这个项目一直很成功。

en: He acted in the knowledge of the risks involved.
cn: 他在知道涉及风险的情况下采取了行动。

en: She made the decision in the knowledge of all the facts.
cn: 她在知道所有事实的情况下做出了决定。

en: Please bring the book back to the library by Friday.
cn: 请在周五前把书带回图书馆。

en: She brought the conversation back to the main topic.
cn: 她把对话带回到主要话题上。

en: The government provides financial help to low-income families.
cn: 政府向低收入家庭提供经济援助。

en: He applied for financial help from the university to cover his tuition fees.
cn: 他向大学申请经济援助以支付学费。

en: She exercises regularly to stay in shape.
cn: 她定期锻炼以保持身体健康。

en: After the injury, it took months for him to get back in shape.
cn: 受伤后，他花了几个月才恢复状态。

en: The old houses were demolished to make way for modern buildings.
cn: 旧房子被拆除，为现代建筑让路。

en: The city is making way for modern buildings to attract more businesses.
cn: 这座城市正在为现代建筑腾出空间以吸引更多企业。

en: I prefer instant coffee in the morning because it's quick to prepare.
cn: 我早上更喜欢速溶咖啡，因为它准备起来很快。

en: She always keeps a jar of instant coffee in her office for emergencies.
cn: 她总是在办公室里放一罐速溶咖啡以备不时之需。

en: He is bad at math and often needs extra help.
cn: 他不擅长数学，经常需要额外帮助。

en: I'm bad at remembering names, so I use a notebook.
cn: 我不擅长记住名字，所以我用笔记本。

en: I've got to finish this report by tomorrow.
cn: 我必须在明天之前完成这份报告。

en: You've got to see that movie; it's amazing!
cn: 你必须看那部电影；它太棒了！

en: The investigation brought to light new evidence in the case.
cn: 调查揭露了案件中的新证据。

en: The documentary brought to light the struggles of endangered species.
cn: 这部纪录片揭示了濒危物种的困境。

en: The car moved forward slowly in the traffic jam.
cn: 汽车在交通堵塞中缓慢向前移动。

en: Please move forward in the queue to make space for others.
cn: 请在队列中向前移动，为其他人腾出空间。

en: The manager gave her a free hand with the new marketing campaign.
cn: 经理让她自由处理新的营销活动。

en: He has a free hand with the budget, so he can make decisions quickly.
cn: 他对预算有自由处理权，因此可以快速做出决定。

en: There is a generation gap between my parents and me regarding technology use.
cn: 在技术使用方面，我和父母之间存在代沟。

en: The generation gap often leads to misunderstandings in families.
cn: 代沟常常导致家庭中的误解。

en: The child tried to catch at the balloon as it floated away.
cn: 孩子试图抓住飘走的气球。

en: He caught at the rope to prevent himself from falling.
cn: 他抓住绳子以防止自己摔倒。

en: The company will come out with a new smartphone next month.
cn: 这家公司下个月将推出一款新智能手机。

en: She came out with a book that became a bestseller.
cn: 她出版了一本成为畅销书的书。

en: Despite difficulties, they carried through the plan successfully.
cn: 尽管有困难，他们成功地完成了这个计划。

en: He carried through his promise to donate to charity.
cn: 他贯彻了向慈善机构捐款的承诺。

en: She has her hands full with three young children.
cn: 她忙于照顾三个年幼的孩子。

en: I have my hands full with work this week, so I can't go out.
cn: 我这周工作很忙，所以不能出去。

en: The activists struggle against environmental pollution.
cn: 活动家们与环境污染作斗争。

en: He struggled against his illness for years before recovering.
cn: 他与疾病斗争了多年才康复。

en: I am tired of eating the same food every day.
cn: 我对每天吃同样的食物感到厌倦。

en: She is tired of waiting for his response.
cn: 她对等待他的回应感到厌倦。

en: He must have a screw loose to think that plan will work.
cn: 他一定是疯了才会认为那个计划会成功。

en: After hearing his bizarre story, I thought he had a screw loose.
cn: 听完他离奇的故事后，我觉得他精神不正常。

en: To live a healthy life, she exercises regularly and eats balanced meals.
cn: 为了过健康的生活，她定期锻炼并吃均衡的饮食。

en: He decided to live a healthy life by quitting smoking and reducing stress.
cn: 他决定通过戒烟和减轻压力来过健康的生活。

en: Please send the document via email by tomorrow.
cn: 请明天前通过电子邮件发送文件。

en: We confirmed the meeting details via email.
cn: 我们通过电子邮件确认了会议细节。

en: We stopped to admire the scenery from the mountain top.
cn: 我们停下来欣赏山顶的风景。

en: She loves to admire the scenery while hiking in the countryside.
cn: 她喜欢在乡村徒步时欣赏风景。

en: We camped in sight of the mountain peak.
cn: 我们在山峰的视线范围内扎营。

en: Keep the emergency exit in sight of all employees.
cn: 让所有员工都能看到紧急出口。

en: Pollution can damage the beautiful landscape of our national parks.
cn: 污染会破坏我们国家公园的美丽风景。

en: Construction projects should avoid damaging the beautiful landscape.
cn: 建设项目应避免破坏美丽的风景。

en: I thought it would rain, and sure enough, it started pouring.
cn: 我以为会下雨，果然开始下大雨了。

en: He predicted the team would win, and sure enough, they did.
cn: 他预测球队会赢，确实他们赢了。

en: I meant to call you, but it completely slipped my mind.
cn: 我本想给你打电话，但完全忘记了。

en: Don't let important deadlines slip your mind.
cn: 不要让重要的截止日期被疏忽。

en: You can use a mobile phone to make calls and send texts.
cn: 你可以用手机打电话和发短信。

en: It's important to use a mobile phone responsibly while driving.
cn: 开车时负责任地使用手机很重要。

en: News reports indicated a rise in unemployment rates.
cn: 新闻报道显示失业率上升。

en: I rely on news reports to stay informed about current events.
cn: 我依靠新闻报道来了解时事。

en: He took his daughter in his arms after a long trip.
cn: 长途旅行后，他拥抱了他的女儿。

en: She took the crying child in her arms to comfort him.
cn: 她拥抱哭泣的孩子来安慰他。

en: Many students receive vocational training to prepare for specific careers.
cn: 许多学生接受职业培训为特定职业做准备。

en: The company offers employees the chance to receive vocational training.
cn: 公司为员工提供接受职业培训的机会。

en: Hundreds of people attended the concert last night.
cn: 昨晚有数百人参加了音乐会。

en: There are hundreds of different species in this forest.
cn: 这片森林里有成百上千种不同的物种。

en: What if we miss the train? We should leave early.
cn: 如果我们错过火车会怎样？我们应该早点出发。

en: What if it rains tomorrow? We need a backup plan.
cn: 如果明天下雨会怎样？我们需要一个备用计划。

en: Many patients suffer with chronic pain for years.
cn: 许多患者多年来遭受慢性疼痛之苦。

en: She suffers with anxiety during stressful situations.
cn: 她在压力情况下忍受焦虑。

en: We need a quantity of paper for the printing job.
cn: 我们需要一定数量的纸来完成印刷工作。

en: A quantity of food was donated to the shelter.
cn: 一些食物被捐赠给了收容所。

en: I take off my hat to the volunteers for their hard work.
cn: 我向志愿者的辛勤工作致敬。

en: We should take off our hats to the medical staff during the pandemic.
cn: 疫情期间，我们应该向医护人员表示钦佩。

en: The new product took the market by storm with its innovative features.
cn: 新产品以其创新功能迅速征服了市场。

en: The band took the music scene by storm after their debut album.
cn: 这支乐队在首张专辑后风靡了音乐界。

en: In that company, marketing plays second fiddle to sales.
cn: 在那家公司，营销居于销售的次要地位。

en: He didn't want to play second fiddle to his more famous colleague.
cn: 他不想为他更著名的同事充当配角。

en: I take issue with your interpretation of the data.
cn: 我对你数据的解释有异议。

en: She took issue with the manager's decision during the meeting.
cn: 她在会议上对经理的决定提出了争论。

en: Prices are high relative to average incomes in this city.
cn: 相对于这个城市的平均收入，价格很高。

en: Her success is relative to the effort she puts in.
cn: 她的成功与她付出的努力相关。

en: I have no idea where she went after the party.
cn: 我不知道派对后她去了哪里。

en: He had no idea how to solve the complex math problem.
cn: 他对如何解决这个复杂的数学问题毫无头绪。

en: The cat likes to jump on the sofa to nap.
cn: 猫喜欢跳上沙发小睡。

en: Investors jumped on the chance to buy stocks at a low price.
cn: 投资者迅速抓住机会以低价购买股票。

en: The team reached a consensus on the project timeline.
cn: 团队就项目时间表达成了共识。

en: There is broad consensus on the need for environmental protection.
cn: 关于环境保护的必要性存在广泛共识。

en: The dam uses water flow to generate electricity.
cn: 大坝利用水流发电。

en: Solar panels generate electricity from sunlight.
cn: 太阳能电池板利用阳光发电。

en: Many countries have strict regulations for labeling GM food.
cn: 许多国家对转基因食品的标签有严格规定。

en: The debate over GM food safety continues among scientists.
cn: 关于转基因食品安全的争论在科学家中持续进行。

en: I need to have it out with my roommate about the noise.
cn: 我需要和室友解决噪音问题。

en: They decided to have their differences out with a calm discussion.
cn: 他们决定通过冷静讨论来解决分歧。

en: Solar and wind power are popular alternative energy sources.
cn: 太阳能和风能是流行的替代能源。

en: Investing in alternative energy sources can reduce carbon emissions.
cn: 投资替代能源可以减少碳排放。

en: The children are eager for the holiday to begin.
cn: 孩子们渴望假期开始。

en: She is eager for new challenges in her career.
cn: 她渴望职业生涯中的新挑战。

en: Investing all your money in one stock is like putting all your eggs in one basket.
cn: 把所有钱投资在一只股票上就像孤注一掷。

en: Diversify your investments to avoid putting all your eggs in one basket.
cn: 分散投资以避免孤注一掷。

en: The eyes and ears are important sensory organs.
cn: 眼睛和耳朵是重要的感觉器官。

en: Sensory organs help organisms interact with their environment.
cn: 感觉器官帮助生物体与环境互动。

en: The chef serves the steak with roasted vegetables.
cn: 厨师将牛排与烤蔬菜一起提供。

en: Coffee is often served with milk and sugar.
cn: 咖啡通常与牛奶和糖一起提供。

en: Please write down the instructions for reference.
cn: 请写下说明以供参考。

en: He wrote down his thoughts in a journal.
cn: 他在日记中写下了自己的想法。

en: She promised to see the project through to completion.
cn: 她承诺坚持完成这个项目。

en: It's important to see your commitments through.
cn: 坚持完成你的承诺很重要。

en: We need to lock in the prices before they increase.
cn: 我们需要在价格上涨前锁定价格。

en: The contract locks in the terms for five years.
cn: 合同锁定了五年的条款。

en: Fill the glass with water.
cn: 用水填满玻璃杯。

en: The room filled with laughter during the party.
cn: 派对期间房间里充满了笑声。

en: Use a metric ruler to measure the length in centimeters.
cn: 使用公制尺以厘米为单位测量长度。

en: The metric ruler is essential for science experiments.
cn: 公制尺对科学实验至关重要。

en: He managed to bring her around to his point of view.
cn: 他设法说服她接受他的观点。

en: The doctor brought the patient around after the surgery.
cn: 手术后医生使病人恢复了意识。

en: Compost is made from decomposed organic material.
cn: 堆肥由分解的有机材料制成。

en: Organic material in soil improves plant growth.
cn: 土壤中的有机材料促进植物生长。

en: Owls are nocturnal animals that hunt at night.
cn: 猫头鹰是夜间狩猎的夜行动物。

en: Nocturnal animals have adapted to low-light conditions.
cn: 夜行动物已经适应了低光条件。

en: She has a food allergy to peanuts.
cn: 她对花生有食物过敏。

en: Food allergies can cause severe reactions in some people.
cn: 食物过敏在某些人中可能引起严重反应。

en: Her eyes gleamed with excitement.
cn: 她的眼睛闪烁着兴奋的光芒。

en: The polished metal gleamed with a bright shine.
cn: 抛光的金属闪烁着明亮的光泽。

en: Compared to last year, sales have increased by 20%.
cn: 与去年相比，销售额增长了20%。

en: This car is much faster compared to the older model.
cn: 与旧型号相比，这辆车快得多。

en: Many people are scared of public speaking.
cn: 许多人害怕公开演讲。

en: She is scared of spiders and always asks someone to remove them.
cn: 她害怕蜘蛛，总是请别人把它们弄走。

en: The company has links with several international partners.
cn: 这家公司与几个国际合作伙伴有联系。

en: He is suspected to have links with criminal organizations.
cn: 他被怀疑与犯罪组织有联系。

en: He is, as it were, the heart and soul of the team.
cn: 他可以说是团队的核心和灵魂。

en: The old building stands, as it were, as a monument to history.
cn: 这座旧建筑在某种程度上是历史的纪念碑。

en: Why did you invite him in the first place if you didn't want him here?
cn: 如果你不想让他来，为什么一开始要邀请他？

en: We should have planned the trip better in the first place.
cn: 我们一开始就应该更好地计划这次旅行。

en: She felt nervous the first time she performed on the stage.
cn: 她第一次在舞台上表演时感到紧张。

en: The actor has spent decades on the stage and is highly respected.
cn: 这位演员在舞台上度过了数十年，备受尊敬。

en: Children need to interact with their peers to develop social skills.
cn: 孩子们需要与同龄人互动以发展社交技能。

en: The software allows users to interact with the interface easily.
cn: 该软件允许用户轻松与界面互动。

en: I can't sleep well when I have a stuffed nose from a cold.
cn: 当我因感冒鼻子堵塞时，我睡不好觉。

en: Allergies often cause her to have a stuffed nose in the spring.
cn: 过敏常常使她在春天鼻子堵塞。

en: Governments are implementing policies to combat obesity in children.
cn: 政府正在实施政策以对抗儿童肥胖。

en: Regular exercise and a balanced diet are key to combat obesity.
cn: 定期锻炼和均衡饮食是对抗肥胖的关键。

en: As a slow reader, he takes longer to finish books but enjoys them thoroughly.
cn: 作为一个阅读速度慢的人，他需要更长时间读完书，但充分享受阅读。

en: Teachers provide extra support for slow readers in the classroom.
cn: 老师在课堂上为阅读速度慢的学生提供额外支持。

en: On hot days, we often go for a swim at the local pool.
cn: 在炎热的日子里，我们经常去当地游泳池游泳。

en: She likes to go for a swim in the ocean to relax.
cn: 她喜欢去海里游泳以放松身心。

en: They have managed to maintain a lifelong relationship despite living in different countries.
cn: 尽管生活在不同的国家，他们设法维持了终身关系。

en: It takes effort and communication to maintain a lifelong relationship with friends.
cn: 与朋友维持终身关系需要努力和沟通。

en: The idea in itself is good, but the execution needs improvement.
cn: 这个想法本身是好的，但执行需要改进。

en: Learning a new language is challenging in itself, but also rewarding.
cn: 学习一门新语言本身具有挑战性，但也很有回报。

en: The children learned to play in cooperation with each other during the game.
cn: 孩子们在游戏中学会了彼此合作玩耍。

en: The team will play in cooperation with local clubs to organize the event.
cn: 该团队将与当地俱乐部合作组织活动。

en: If you break that vase, you'll have hell to pay with your parents.
cn: 如果你打碎那个花瓶，你会有大麻烦，父母会严厉惩罚你。

en: He knew he would have hell to pay for missing the important meeting.
cn: 他知道错过重要会议会有大麻烦。

en: The success of the project rides on the team's ability to meet deadlines.
cn: 项目的成功依赖于团队按时完成任务的能力。

en: We decided to ride on the bus to save time in traffic.
cn: 我们决定乘坐公交车以节省交通时间。

en: When making investment decisions, it's important to consider non-financial factors like sustainability.
cn: 在做投资决策时，考虑可持续性等非财务因素很重要。

en: Employee satisfaction is a key non-financial factor in company performance.
cn: 员工满意度是公司绩效的一个关键非财务因素。

en: Moving to a new city often brings a sense of loneliness until you make friends.
cn: 搬到一个新城市常常会带来孤独感，直到你交到朋友。

en: Despite being surrounded by people, he sometimes experiences a sense of loneliness.
cn: 尽管被人群包围，他有时会感到孤独。

en: At the worst, we'll have to postpone the trip until next month.
cn: 在最坏的情况下，我们不得不将旅行推迟到下个月。

en: Even at the worst, the company can still survive with some restructuring.
cn: 即使在最坏的情况下，公司通过一些重组仍能生存。

en: She prides herself upon her ability to speak multiple languages fluently.
cn: 她以自己能流利说多种语言为傲。

en: The company prides itself upon providing excellent customer service.
cn: 这家公司以提供优质的客户服务为傲。

en: The police suspect him of stealing the valuable painting.
cn: 警方怀疑他偷了那幅珍贵的画。

en: I suspect her of lying about her qualifications on the resume.
cn: 我怀疑她在简历上关于资历的说法不实。

en: The offer is made without prejudice to our right to pursue further claims.
cn: 此提议不影响我们进一步索赔的权利。

en: They settled the dispute without prejudice, allowing future negotiations.
cn: 他们无损害地解决了争议，为未来谈判留有余地。

en: It took me a while to get the hang of using this new software.
cn: 我花了一些时间才掌握了使用这个新软件的窍门。

en: Once you get the hang of driving a manual car, it becomes easy.
cn: 一旦你掌握了开手动挡汽车的窍门，就会变得容易。

en: She was on the point of leaving when the phone rang.
cn: 她正要离开时电话响了。

en: The project is on the point of completion after months of hard work.
cn: 经过数月的努力，这个项目即将完成。

en: Kepler's laws describe the planetary motions in our solar system.
cn: 开普勒定律描述了太阳系中的行星运动。

en: Scientists study planetary motions to understand gravitational forces.
cn: 科学家研究行星运动以理解引力作用。

en: This job offers excellent career prospects with opportunities for advancement.
cn: 这份工作提供了极佳的职业前景，有晋升机会。

en: She considered the career prospects before accepting the position abroad.
cn: 她在接受国外职位前考虑了职业前景。

en: After walking all day, I need to take a load off my feet.
cn: 走了一整天后，我需要坐下休息一下。

en: Come in and take a load off your feet; you must be tired from work.
cn: 进来坐下休息吧，你工作一定很累了。

en: The rumor quickly went the round of the office.
cn: 谣言很快在办公室里传开了。

en: News of the promotion went the round of the company in no time.
cn: 晋升的消息立刻在公司里传遍了。

en: The government is trying to hold inflation in check with new policies.
cn: 政府正试图通过新政策控制通货膨胀。

en: She held her emotions in check during the difficult meeting.
cn: 在艰难的会议中，她抑制住了自己的情绪。

en: Students must turn in their assignments by Friday.
cn: 学生必须在周五前上交作业。

en: He turned in his resignation letter yesterday.
cn: 他昨天提交了辞职信。

en: The discussion revolved around the new marketing strategy.
cn: 讨论围绕着新的营销策略展开。

en: Her life revolves around her family and work.
cn: 她的生活以家庭和工作为中心。

en: Despite the rain, we decided to press on with our hike.
cn: 尽管下雨，我们决定继续徒步前进。

en: The team pressed on with the project despite the challenges.
cn: 尽管面临挑战，团队仍坚持不懈地推进项目。

en: The artist used dark pigments to create a dramatic effect in the painting.
cn: 艺术家使用深色颜料在画作中营造出戏剧性效果。

en: Dark pigments like black and brown are common in traditional dyes.
cn: 像黑色和棕色这样的深色颜料在传统染料中很常见。

en: She enrolled in a diploma course in graphic design at the local college.
cn: 她在当地学院报读了一个平面设计的文凭课程。

en: This diploma course prepares students for careers in healthcare.
cn: 这个文凭课程为学生从事医疗保健职业做准备。

en: He railed at the unfair treatment he received from his boss.
cn: 他怒斥了老板对他的不公平待遇。

en: She railed at the slow service in the restaurant.
cn: 她抱怨餐厅服务太慢。

en: I decided to sign up for the yoga class starting next week.
cn: 我决定报名参加下周开始的瑜伽课。

en: He signed up for the marathon to raise money for charity.
cn: 他报名参加马拉松为慈善筹款。

en: Air fares tend to be higher during the holiday season.
cn: 节假日期间机票价格往往更高。

en: We compared air fares from different airlines before booking our flight.
cn: 我们在预订航班前比较了不同航空公司的机票价格。

en: I'm busy at the moment, can I call you back later?
cn: 我此刻很忙，可以稍后回电吗？

en: At the moment, we have no vacancies in our department.
cn: 目前我们部门没有空缺职位。

en: Many students rely on a student loan to pay for their university tuition.
cn: 许多学生依靠学生贷款支付大学学费。

en: She applied for a student loan to cover her living expenses while studying.
cn: 她申请了学生贷款以支付学习期间的生活费用。

en: You should take out insurance before your trip abroad.
cn: 出国旅行前你应该购买保险。

en: They took out insurance on their new house immediately after purchase.
cn: 他们买下新房子后立即购买了保险。

en: All their careful planning came to nothing when the project was canceled.
cn: 项目取消后，他们所有的精心计划都无果而终。

en: The negotiations came to nothing after both sides refused to compromise.
cn: 双方拒绝妥协后，谈判以失败告终。

en: She bought the expensive dress on impulse and later regretted it.
cn: 她冲动买下了那件昂贵的裙子，后来后悔了。

en: Many people buy snacks on impulse while waiting in checkout lines.
cn: 许多人在排队结账时会冲动购买零食。

en: She got all dolled up for her high school reunion.
cn: 她为高中同学聚会精心打扮了一番。

en: We're getting dolled up to go to the fancy restaurant tonight.
cn: 我们今晚要精心打扮去那家高级餐厅。

en: He was torn between accepting the job offer and staying with his current company.
cn: 他在接受工作邀请和留在现任公司之间难以抉择。

en: I'm torn between going to the beach or visiting the museum this weekend.
cn: 这个周末我在去海滩和参观博物馆之间难以抉择。

en: To my knowledge, the meeting has been postponed until next week.
cn: 据我所知，会议已推迟到下周。

en: To her knowledge, no one has ever solved this puzzle completely.
cn: 据她所知，从未有人完全解开过这个谜题。

en: The elevation of his status came with increased responsibilities.
cn: 他地位的提升伴随着责任的增加。

en: The elevation of the platform made it easier for everyone to see.
cn: 平台的升高让每个人都能更容易看到。

en: I wouldn't trade places with anyone in the world right now.
cn: 我现在不会和世界上任何人交换位置。

en: Sometimes I wish I could trade places with my more successful sibling.
cn: 有时我希望能和更成功的兄弟姐妹交换位置。

en: The city planning department uses aerial photographs to map urban development.
cn: 城市规划部门使用航拍照片来绘制城市发展地图。

en: This aerial photograph clearly shows the pattern of crop circles in the field.
cn: 这张航拍照片清晰地显示了田地里麦田圈的图案。

en: Our company will be exhibiting at the international trade show next month.
cn: 我们公司将在下个月的国际贸易展览会上参展。

en: The annual electronics trade show attracts buyers from around the world.
cn: 年度电子贸易展览会吸引了来自世界各地的买家。

en: We'll have to make do with what we have until the supplies arrive.
cn: 在补给到达之前，我们只能凑合使用现有的东西。

en: When the power went out, we made do with candles and flashlights.
cn: 停电时，我们凑合使用蜡烛和手电筒。

en: I usually come home around 6 PM after work.
cn: 我通常下班后晚上6点左右回家。

en: The children were excited to come home for the holidays.
cn: 孩子们很高兴回家过节。

en: The teacher singled out three students for special praise.
cn: 老师特别表扬了三名学生。

en: Why do you always single me out for criticism?
cn: 你为什么总是单独批评我？

en: After months of losses, the company finally turned the corner and started making profits.
cn: 经过数月的亏损，公司终于渡过难关开始盈利。

en: The patient turned the corner yesterday and is now recovering well.
cn: 病人昨天病情好转，现在恢复得很好。

en: The two brothers finally made peace after years of arguing.
cn: 经过多年的争吵，两兄弟终于和解了。

en: The warring nations agreed to make peace and end the conflict.
cn: 交战国家同意讲和并结束冲突。

en: We plan to call on our grandparents this weekend.
cn: 我们计划本周末去拜访祖父母。

en: The sales representative calls on clients every Tuesday.
cn: 销售代表每周二拜访客户。

en: Children should do their homework before watching television.
cn: 孩子们应该在看电视前做作业。

en: I need to do my math homework before class tomorrow.
cn: 我需要在明天上课前完成数学作业。

en: The old factory burned down in the fire last night.
cn: 昨晚那场大火把旧工厂烧毁了。

en: If you're not careful, the whole forest could burn down.
cn: 如果不小心，整片森林都可能被烧光。

en: She can play several musical instruments, including the piano and violin.
cn: 她会演奏好几种乐器，包括钢琴和小提琴。

en: The museum has a collection of ancient musical instruments from around the world.
cn: 博物馆收藏了来自世界各地的古代乐器。

en: After winning the lottery, he decided to lead a life of luxury.
cn: 中彩票后，他决定过奢侈的生活。

en: The retired CEO now leads a life of luxury in his beachfront villa.
cn: 那位退休的CEO现在在海滨别墅过着奢侈的生活。

en: Conservationists plan to reintroduce wolves to the national park.
cn: 环保主义者计划将狼重新引入国家公园。

en: The program aims to reintroduce endangered species to their natural habitats.
cn: 该项目旨在将濒危物种重新引入它们的自然栖息地。

en: The government increased funding for social welfare programs.
cn: 政府增加了对社会福利项目的资金投入。

en: Access to social welfare is a basic right in many developed countries.
cn: 在许多发达国家，享受社会福利是一项基本权利。

en: After years of estrangement, she finally reconciled with her brother.
cn: 疏远多年后，她终于和哥哥和解了。

en: It's time to reconcile with your past mistakes and move forward.
cn: 是时候与过去的错误和解，继续前进了。

en: You need to make a choice between these two job offers.
cn: 你需要在这两份工作邀请中做出选择。

en: Making a choice can be difficult when all options seem good.
cn: 当所有选项看起来都不错时，做出选择可能很困难。

en: The teacher made an exception of John and allowed him to submit the assignment late.
cn: 老师把约翰作为例外，允许他迟交作业。

en: We usually don't allow pets, but we'll make an exception of your service dog.
cn: 我们通常不允许宠物，但会把你的服务犬作为例外。

en: Are you ready for the exam tomorrow?
cn: 你为明天的考试做好准备了吗？

en: The team is ready for any challenges that may come.
cn: 团队已为可能到来的任何挑战做好准备。

en: Don't put obstacles in my way when I'm trying to succeed.
cn: 当我努力成功时，不要在我路上设置障碍。

en: Fate seemed to put every possible difficulty in her way.
cn: 命运似乎在她路上设置了所有可能的困难。

en: She spoke on her own behalf at the court hearing.
cn: 她在法庭听证会上代表自己发言。

en: You must sign the contract on your own behalf, not for someone else.
cn: 你必须代表自己签署合同，而不是替别人签。

en: The new product didn't come up to our expectations.
cn: 新产品没有达到我们的期望。

en: His performance came up to the required standard.
cn: 他的表现达到了要求的标准。

en: Even though we were worried, everything worked out for the best.
cn: 尽管我们很担心，但结果一切都是最好的。

en: I hope this difficult situation will work out for the best in the end.
cn: 我希望这个困难局面最终会有最好的结果。

en: The manager held the aggressive employee in check during the meeting.
cn: 经理在会议期间控制住了那位咄咄逼人的员工。

en: Parents must hold their children in check to ensure good behavior.
cn: 父母必须约束孩子以确保良好行为。

en: Please come down from the ladder carefully.
cn: 请小心地从梯子上下来。

en: The price of oil has come down significantly this month.
cn: 这个月油价大幅下降。

en: The government's policy aims to expand productive forces through technological innovation.
cn: 政府的政策旨在通过技术创新发展生产力。

en: Investing in education is key to expanding productive forces in the long term.
cn: 投资教育是长期发展生产力的关键。

en: The plane deviated from its original course due to bad weather.
cn: 由于恶劣天气，飞机偏离了原定航线。

en: We should not deviate from our core values.
cn: 我们不应偏离核心价值观。

en: I had to sit through a three-hour lecture on tax regulations.
cn: 我不得不忍耐着听完一场关于税务法规的三小时讲座。

en: The children sat through the entire movie without complaining.
cn: 孩子们毫无怨言地看完了整部电影。

en: My mom had a conniption fit when she saw the mess in my room.
cn: 妈妈看到我房间一团糟时大发雷霆。

en: He'll have a conniption fit if he finds out we lost the contract.
cn: 如果他发现我们丢了合同，他会大发雷霆的。

en: His statement was self-contradictory and confused everyone.
cn: 他的陈述自相矛盾，让所有人都困惑了。

en: A self-contradictory argument cannot be logically valid.
cn: 自相矛盾的论点在逻辑上不可能是有效的。

en: How come you didn't tell me about the meeting?
cn: 你怎么没告诉我开会的事？

en: How come it's so cold in here?
cn: 这里怎么会这么冷？

en: The harsh winter killed off many of the insects in the garden.
cn: 严冬消灭了花园里的许多昆虫。

en: The company decided to kill off the unpopular product line.
cn: 公司决定彻底淘汰那条不受欢迎的产品线。

en: I have a rough idea of what the project will cost.
cn: 我对项目成本有个大概的想法。

en: Can you give me a rough idea of when you'll arrive?
cn: 你能给我个大概的想法，你什么时候到吗？

en: The team needs to come up with creative ideas for the new marketing campaign.
cn: 团队需要为新的营销活动提出创意想法。

en: She always comes up with creative ideas for decorating her home.
cn: 她总能想出装饰家居的创意点子。

en: Many parents struggle to combine work and raising a family effectively.
cn: 许多父母难以有效兼顾工作和养育家庭。

en: Flexible hours help her combine work and raising a family.
cn: 弹性工作时间帮助她兼顾工作和养育家庭。

en: They plan to move into their new apartment next month.
cn: 他们计划下个月搬入新公寓。

en: The company is moving into the Asian market this year.
cn: 公司今年将进军亚洲市场。

en: He ate the cookies on the sly while no one was looking.
cn: 他趁没人注意时偷偷吃了饼干。

en: She checked her phone on the sly during the meeting.
cn: 她在开会时偷偷查看了手机。

en: Poor diet can lead to various health problems.
cn: 不良饮食可能导致各种健康问题。

en: He has been dealing with chronic health problems for years.
cn: 他多年来一直处理慢性健康问题。

en: This company places a premium on employee creativity.
cn: 这家公司高度重视员工的创造力。

en: The school places a premium on academic excellence.
cn: 这所学校高度重视学术卓越。

en: It's advisable to have a check-up once a year.
cn: 建议每年进行一次体检。

en: She went to the clinic to have a check-up for her persistent cough.
cn: 她去诊所为持续咳嗽做了体检。

en: China implements a nine-year compulsory education system for all children.
cn: 中国对所有儿童实行九年义务教育制度。

en: The government has increased funding for nine-year compulsory education in rural areas.
cn: 政府增加了对农村地区九年义务教育的资金投入。

en: Sunscreen helps protect your skin from sun damage.
cn: 防晒霜有助于保护皮肤免受阳光伤害。

en: The law protects consumers from fraudulent practices.
cn: 法律保护消费者免受欺诈行为侵害。

en: If your visa is denied, you can reapply for it after six months.
cn: 如果签证被拒，你可以在六个月后重新申请。

en: He decided to reapply for the job after gaining more experience.
cn: 在获得更多经验后，他决定重新申请那份工作。

en: Keep on practicing, and you'll improve your skills.
cn: 继续练习，你会提高技能的。

en: Despite the difficulties, they kept on working towards their goal.
cn: 尽管困难重重，他们仍继续朝着目标努力。

en: She told a white lie to avoid hurting his feelings.
cn: 她说了一个善意的谎言，以避免伤害他的感情。

en: Sometimes it's kinder to tell a white lie than to be brutally honest.
cn: 有时说善意的谎言比残酷的诚实更仁慈。

en: I am certain of his honesty in this matter.
cn: 我确信他在这件事上是诚实的。

en: Are you certain of the meeting time?
cn: 你确定会议时间吗？

en: The puppy loves to roll over on the grass.
cn: 小狗喜欢在草地上打滚。

en: You can roll over your retirement savings into a new account.
cn: 你可以将退休储蓄转入新账户。

en: I'll look in on my grandmother on my way home.
cn: 我回家路上会顺便看望一下我的祖母。

en: Can you look in on the baby while I'm out?
cn: 我出去的时候你能顺便看看宝宝吗？

en: This product meets the requirements of safety regulations.
cn: 这个产品符合安全法规的要求。

en: She worked hard to meet the requirements of the job.
cn: 她努力工作以满足这份工作的要求。

en: I haven't heard from my cousin since she moved abroad.
cn: 自从表姐移居国外后，我就没收到她的消息了。

en: We hope to hear from the committee by next week.
cn: 我们希望在下周前收到委员会的消息。

en: I bought a monthly gym pass to access the facilities.
cn: 我买了一张月卡来使用健身房的设施。

en: She lost her gym pass and had to get a replacement.
cn: 她丢了健身房通行证，不得不补办一张。

en: It's not a problem but an opportunity.
cn: 这不是一个问题，而是一个机会。

en: She is not tired but excited about the trip.
cn: 她不累，而是对这次旅行感到兴奋。

en: Judging from his expression, he was not happy.
cn: 从他的表情判断，他不高兴。

en: We can judge from the data that sales are increasing.
cn: 我们可以从数据判断销售额在增长。

en: The temperature dropped by degrees throughout the night.
cn: 温度在夜间逐渐下降。

en: She improved her skills by degrees through practice.
cn: 她通过练习逐渐提高了技能。

en: Water is indispensable to human survival.
cn: 水对人类生存是必不可少的。

en: Her expertise is indispensable to the project's success.
cn: 她的专业知识对项目的成功是不可或缺的。

en: He apologized to his friend for being late.
cn: 他为迟到向朋友道歉。

en: She apologized to the customer for the mistake.
cn: 她为错误向客户道歉。

en: The mountains were in sight as we drove closer.
cn: 我们开车靠近时，山脉在视线内。

en: Victory is in sight after months of hard work.
cn: 经过数月的努力，胜利在望。

en: The team gained ground in the second half of the game.
cn: 球队在下半场比赛中取得了进展。

en: New technologies are gaining ground in the market.
cn: 新技术在市场上正占上风。

en: I need to catch up on my homework this weekend.
cn: 这个周末我需要赶上我的作业。

en: Let's meet for coffee to catch up on old times.
cn: 我们见面喝咖啡叙叙旧吧。

en: She will stand in for the manager while he is on vacation.
cn: 经理度假期间，她将代替他。

en: An understudy stood in for the lead actor who was ill.
cn: 一名替补演员顶替了生病的主演。

en: Be careful not to fall down on the slippery floor.
cn: 小心别在滑的地板上跌倒。

en: The plan fell down due to lack of funding.
cn: 由于缺乏资金，这个计划失败了。

en: Students acquire knowledge through reading and research.
cn: 学生通过阅读和研究获取知识。

en: It's important to acquire knowledge in various fields.
cn: 在各个领域获取知识很重要。

en: He put forward a new idea at the meeting.
cn: 他在会议上提出了一个新想法。

en: She was put forward as a candidate for the position.
cn: 她被推荐为该职位的候选人。

en: In the light of recent events, we need to reconsider our strategy.
cn: 鉴于最近的事件，我们需要重新考虑我们的策略。

en: The decision was made in the light of expert advice.
cn: 这个决定是考虑到专家建议后做出的。

en: Admission to the museum is no charge on Sundays.
cn: 博物馆周日入场免费。

en: They offered the service at no charge as a promotion.
cn: 他们作为促销免费提供这项服务。

en: The meeting was held over until next week.
cn: 会议被推迟到下周。

en: He held the secret over her to get what he wanted.
cn: 他用这个秘密威胁她以得到他想要的。

en: This car is not as fast as the other one.
cn: 这辆车不如另一辆快。

en: She is not as tall as her brother.
cn: 她不如她哥哥高。

en: In practice, the theory is difficult to apply.
cn: 实际上，这个理论很难应用。

en: The plan sounds good, but in practice it may fail.
cn: 这个计划听起来不错，但在实践中可能会失败。

en: The government exerts pressure on the media.
cn: 政府对媒体施加压力。

en: He exerted his influence on the decision.
cn: 他对这个决定施加了影响。

en: Her kind words made me feel better.
cn: 她善意的话语让我感觉好多了。

en: A warm cup of tea can make you feel better when you're sick.
cn: 生病时，一杯热茶能让你感觉好些。

en: She demonstrated determination by finishing the marathon.
cn: 她通过完成马拉松展示了决心。

en: He demonstrated determination in overcoming the obstacles.
cn: 他在克服障碍时展示了决心。

en: Don't let money come between you and your friend.
cn: 不要让金钱破坏你和朋友之间的关系。

en: Her jealousy came between her and her partner.
cn: 她的嫉妒心破坏了她和伴侣的关系。

en: I wanted to go, but then I remembered I had work.
cn: 我想去，但接着我想起我有工作。

en: The plan seemed perfect, but then problems arose.
cn: 这个计划似乎很完美，但接着问题出现了。

en: The research excavation uncovered ancient artifacts.
cn: 这次研究性挖掘发现了古代文物。

en: They conducted a research excavation at the historical site.
cn: 他们在历史遗址进行了研究性挖掘。

en: Bear in mind that the deadline is tomorrow.
cn: 记住截止日期是明天。

en: You should bear the cost in mind before making a decision.
cn: 在做决定前，你应该考虑到成本。

en: She uses talcum powder to keep her skin dry.
cn: 她用滑石粉来保持皮肤干燥。

en: Talcum powder is often applied after a shower.
cn: 滑石粉通常在淋浴后使用。

en: She does volunteer work at the local shelter.
cn: 她在当地收容所做志愿工作。

en: Volunteer work is a great way to give back to the community.
cn: 志愿工作是回馈社区的好方法。

en: The high cost deters many from buying the product.
cn: 高昂的成本阻止了许多人购买这个产品。

en: Fear of punishment can deter people from committing crimes.
cn: 对惩罚的恐惧可以阻止人们犯罪。

en: Stay out of the kitchen while I'm cooking.
cn: 我做饭时，待在厨房外面。

en: The sign says 'Stay out' to keep people away.
cn: 牌子上写着'禁止入内'以阻止人们进入。

en: The child is running a temperature and needs rest.
cn: 这个孩子在发烧，需要休息。

en: If you run a temperature, you should see a doctor.
cn: 如果你发烧了，应该去看医生。

en: Please take out the household rubbish.
cn: 请把家庭垃圾拿出去。

en: Household rubbish should be sorted for recycling.
cn: 家庭垃圾应该分类以便回收。

en: She insists on paying the bill.
cn: 她坚持要付账。

en: He insisted on seeing the manager.
cn: 他坚持要见经理。

en: He went so far as to say that the project was a failure.
cn: 他甚至说这个项目是失败的。

en: I wouldn't go so far as to say she's dishonest.
cn: 我不会甚至说她不诚实。

en: It looks as if it's going to rain.
cn: 看起来好像要下雨了。

en: She looks as if she's seen a ghost.
cn: 她看起来好像见了鬼一样。

en: I have half a mind to quit my job and travel.
cn: 我有点想辞职去旅行。

en: He had half a mind to tell her the truth.
cn: 他有点想告诉她真相。

en: Please locate the nearest fire exit when you enter the building.
cn: 进入大楼时请找到最近的紧急出口。

en: The fire exit must be kept clear at all times.
cn: 紧急出口必须始终保持畅通。

en: I'm getting tired of eating the same food every day.
cn: 我开始厌倦每天吃同样的食物了。

en: She got tired of waiting and decided to leave.
cn: 她等得不耐烦了，决定离开。

en: When it comes to cooking, she is an expert.
cn: 谈到烹饪，她是个专家。

en: He is very confident when it comes to public speaking.
cn: 当涉及公开演讲时，他非常自信。

en: He focused on his work to the exclusion of everything else.
cn: 他专注于工作，以至于排除了其他一切。

en: The policy favors one group to the exclusion of others.
cn: 这个政策偏袒一个群体，排除了其他群体。

en: We should make use of this opportunity to learn new skills.
cn: 我们应该利用这个机会学习新技能。

en: He made use of old materials to build a shed.
cn: 他利用旧材料搭建了一个棚子。

en: Can you help out with the dishes after dinner?
cn: 晚饭后你能帮忙洗碗吗？

en: She helped out at the local shelter during the holidays.
cn: 假期期间她在当地收容所帮忙。

en: When the bear appeared, they had to run for their lives.
cn: 熊出现时，他们不得不拼命逃跑。

en: The villagers ran for their lives during the flood.
cn: 洪水期间，村民们拼命逃跑保命。

en: His fashion sense is a bit behind the times.
cn: 他的时尚感有点落伍了。

en: The company's technology is behind the times compared to competitors.
cn: 与竞争对手相比，这家公司的技术落后了。

en: Government programs aim to support low income people.
cn: 政府计划旨在支持低收入人群。

en: Low income people often struggle to afford healthcare.
cn: 低收入人群常常难以负担医疗费用。

en: He decided to drop out of college to start a business.
cn: 他决定从大学辍学去创业。

en: Many students drop out due to financial difficulties.
cn: 许多学生因经济困难而辍学。

en: I'll try to fit the meeting into my schedule next week.
cn: 我会试着把会议安排进下周的日程中。

en: Can you fit a quick call into your schedule today?
cn: 你今天能安排一个简短的通话吗？

en: He died of a heart attack last year.
cn: 他去年死于心脏病发作。

en: Many people in history died of infectious diseases.
cn: 历史上许多人死于传染病。

en: The two friends walked side by side along the beach.
cn: 两个朋友沿着海滩并肩行走。

en: The paintings were hung side by side in the gallery.
cn: 画作在画廊里并排悬挂。

en: I'm having a hard time understanding this math problem.
cn: 我在理解这道数学题上很吃力。

en: She had a hard time adjusting to the new city.
cn: 她很难适应新城市。

en: Our company is in competition with several larger firms.
cn: 我们公司与几家大公司竞争。

en: She is in competition with top athletes from around the world.
cn: 她与来自世界各地的顶尖运动员竞争。

en: As a working parent, she has to juggle different roles every day.
cn: 作为在职父母，她每天必须同时处理多个角色。

en: He juggles different roles as a manager, mentor, and team member.
cn: 他同时扮演经理、导师和团队成员的不同角色。

en: We went to the airport to see off our friends.
cn: 我们去机场为朋友们送行。

en: She saw off her son as he left for college.
cn: 她送儿子去上大学。

en: His comment about the weather was beside the point in our budget discussion.
cn: 在我们预算讨论中，他关于天气的评论离题了。

en: Whether you like the color is beside the point; we need to focus on functionality.
cn: 你是否喜欢这个颜色不相关；我们需要关注功能性。

en: The scientific discovery of penicillin revolutionized medicine.
cn: 青霉素的科学发现彻底改变了医学。

en: This new scientific discovery could lead to more efficient energy sources.
cn: 这项新的科学发现可能带来更高效的能源。

en: None but the brave deserve the fair.
cn: 只有勇者才配得上美人。

en: He trusts none but his closest friends.
cn: 他只信任他最亲密的朋友。

en: The city is famous for its landmark and historic sites.
cn: 这座城市以其地标和历史遗址而闻名。

en: We visited several landmark and historic sites during our trip.
cn: 我们在旅行期间参观了几处地标和历史遗址。

en: She used a knife to scrape off the old paint from the wall.
cn: 她用刀刮掉了墙上的旧油漆。

en: You should scrape off the ice from your car windshield before driving.
cn: 开车前你应该刮掉汽车挡风玻璃上的冰。

en: He decided to sit out the game due to a minor injury.
cn: 由于轻微受伤，他决定不参加这场比赛。

en: I'll sit out this round of negotiations and let others handle it.
cn: 我将不参与这轮谈判，让其他人处理。

en: The two companies joined hands to develop a new technology.
cn: 两家公司携手合作开发了一项新技术。

en: Let's join hands to clean up the community park this weekend.
cn: 让我们这个周末携手合作清理社区公园。

en: It took her a while to fit in with the new team at work.
cn: 她花了一段时间才适应工作中的新团队。

en: His ideas didn't fit in with the company's traditional approach.
cn: 他的想法与公司的传统方法不融合。

en: Keep your eyes peeled for any suspicious activity in the neighborhood.
cn: 密切注意社区里任何可疑的活动。

en: I'm keeping my eyes peeled for a good deal on a used car.
cn: 我正在留神寻找一辆二手车的优惠交易。

en: The advertisement made broad claims about the product's effectiveness without evidence.
cn: 广告对产品的有效性做出了没有证据的宽泛主张。

en: Avoid making broad claims in your essay; be specific with examples.
cn: 在你的文章中避免做出笼统的说法；用例子具体说明。

en: The children are eager for the summer vacation to start.
cn: 孩子们渴望暑假开始。

en: She is eager for feedback on her latest project.
cn: 她热切期待对她最新项目的反馈。

en: There is a heavy demand for electric vehicles due to environmental concerns.
cn: 由于环境问题，对电动汽车有高需求。

en: The new smartphone model created a heavy demand for accessories.
cn: 新款智能手机型号创造了对配件的高需求。

en: He visits his hometown once in a blue moon since moving abroad.
cn: 自从移居国外后，他千载难逢地回一次家乡。

en: Getting a perfect score on that test happens once in a blue moon.
cn: 在那次考试中得满分是极其罕见的。

en: The new policy proved to be effective in reducing waste.
cn: 新政策证明在减少浪费方面是有效的。

en: His prediction proved to be accurate after the election results.
cn: 选举结果后，他的预测证明是准确的。

en: During the debate, please keep a civil tongue in your head and avoid personal attacks.
cn: 在辩论期间，请说话礼貌，避免人身攻击。

en: My grandmother always told us to keep a civil tongue in our heads when speaking to elders.
cn: 我祖母总是告诉我们对长辈说话时要言辞文明。

en: Could you do the honors and cut the cake at the party?
cn: 你能在派对上主持切蛋糕吗？

en: As the host, I'll do the honors and introduce our guest speaker.
cn: 作为主持人，我将执行介绍我们特邀演讲者的荣誉性任务。

en: The company aims to make profits by expanding into new markets.
cn: 公司旨在通过拓展新市场来盈利。

en: Small businesses often struggle to make profits in their first year.
cn: 小企业通常在头一年难以赚钱。

en: Managers are required to attend meetings every Monday to discuss project updates.
cn: 经理们需要每周一参加会议，讨论项目进展。

en: She will attend meetings with international clients next week.
cn: 她下周将参加与国际客户的会议。

en: Our plans for a picnic fell through because of the rain.
cn: 我们野餐的计划因为下雨而落空了。

en: The business deal fell through at the last minute due to funding issues.
cn: 由于资金问题，这笔商业交易在最后一刻失败了。

en: The Gulf Stream is a warm ocean current that affects Europe's climate.
cn: 墨西哥湾流是影响欧洲气候的温暖洋流。

en: Scientists study ocean currents to understand climate patterns.
cn: 科学家研究洋流以理解气候模式。

en: Good managerial skills are essential for leading a team effectively.
cn: 良好的管理技能对于有效领导团队至关重要。

en: She improved her managerial skills through training and experience.
cn: 她通过培训和经验提高了她的管理技能。

en: Due to budget cuts, our expansion plans went by the board.
cn: 由于预算削减，我们的扩张计划被放弃了。

en: Old traditions often go by the board in rapidly changing societies.
cn: 在快速变化的社会中，旧传统常常被忽略。

en: She provided emotional support to her friend during the difficult divorce.
cn: 在朋友艰难的离婚期间，她提供了情感支持。

en: The therapy dog offers emotional support to patients in the hospital.
cn: 治疗犬为医院里的病人提供情感支持。

en: Animal tests are conducted to ensure the safety of new pharmaceuticals before human trials.
cn: 在人体试验之前，进行动物测试以确保新药的安全性。

en: Many cosmetics companies have banned animal tests due to ethical concerns.
cn: 由于伦理问题，许多化妆品公司已禁止动物测试。

en: After I ignored his calls, he finally got the message that I wasn't interested.
cn: 在我忽略他的电话后，他终于明白我不感兴趣了。

en: The team got the message from the manager to work harder after the poor performance review.
cn: 在绩效评估不佳后，团队明白了经理要他们更努力工作的信息。

en: I can't help laughing when I watch that comedy show.
cn: 我看那个喜剧节目时忍不住笑。

en: She can't help worrying about her children when they're away.
cn: 当孩子们不在身边时，她忍不住担心他们。

en: He abandoned himself to despair after losing his job.
cn: 失业后，他沉溺于绝望之中。

en: On vacation, she abandoned herself to the joy of relaxation.
cn: 度假时，她沉溺于放松的快乐中。

en: The local business executive was interviewed about the new factory opening.
cn: 这位本地企业高管接受了关于新工厂开业的采访。

en: As a local business executive, she focuses on community engagement and growth.
cn: 作为本地企业高管，她专注于社区参与和发展。

en: Your homework grades count towards 30% of your final score.
cn: 你的作业成绩计入最终分数的30%。

en: Volunteer hours can count towards community service requirements.
cn: 志愿服务时间可以计入社区服务要求。

en: I'm feeling under the weather today, so I'll work from home.
cn: 我今天感觉身体不适，所以会在家工作。

en: She stayed in bed because she was under the weather with a cold.
cn: 她因感冒身体不适而待在床上。

en: When she heard the sad news, she broke out into tears.
cn: 当她听到这个悲伤的消息时，突然哭了起来。

en: The child broke out into tears after losing his favorite toy.
cn: 孩子丢了最喜欢的玩具后，突然哭了起来。

en: The government imposed a protective tariff on steel imports to support local manufacturers.
cn: 政府对钢铁进口征收保护性关税，以支持本地制造商。

en: Protective tariffs can lead to trade disputes between countries.
cn: 保护性关税可能导致国家间的贸易争端。

en: Movie stars often attend red carpet events to promote their films.
cn: 电影明星经常参加红毯活动来宣传他们的电影。

en: Many children dream of becoming movie stars when they grow up.
cn: 许多孩子梦想长大后成为电影明星。

en: She struggles with anxiety in social situations.
cn: 她在社交场合中与焦虑作斗争。

en: Many students struggle with math homework without proper guidance.
cn: 许多学生在没有适当指导的情况下努力应对数学作业。

en: This company puts a premium on innovation and creativity.
cn: 这家公司高度重视创新和创造力。

en: Parents often put a premium on their children's education.
cn: 父母通常高度重视孩子的教育。

en: Workers in the chemical plant must wear protective clothes at all times.
cn: 化工厂的工人必须始终穿着防护服。

en: The firefighter's protective clothes shielded him from the intense heat.
cn: 消防员的防护服保护他免受高温伤害。

en: Your package is in transit and should arrive by tomorrow.
cn: 您的包裹在运输中，应该明天到达。

en: Passengers in transit at the airport can use the lounge facilities.
cn: 在机场中转的乘客可以使用休息室设施。

en: Learning a new language is worth doing for career advancement.
cn: 学习一门新语言对职业发展来说是值得的。

en: The hike was tiring, but the view from the top was worth doing.
cn: 徒步很累，但山顶的景色值得这么做。

en: He waved aside the waiter's offer to help with his bags.
cn: 他挥手示意服务员不用帮他拿包。

en: She waved aside the criticism and continued with her project.
cn: 她不理会批评，继续她的项目。

en: The kids started to act up when they were bored.
cn: 孩子们无聊时开始调皮捣蛋。

en: My dog acts up whenever we have guests over.
cn: 每当我们有客人来时，我的狗就会行为不端。

en: There isn't much in the way of entertainment in this small town.
cn: 这个小镇在娱乐方面没什么可提供的。

en: What do you have in the way of vegetarian options?
cn: 你们有什么素食选择？

en: Let's get the meeting started on time.
cn: 让我们准时开始会议。

en: He got the car started after a few tries.
cn: 他试了几次后启动了汽车。

en: Keep your shirt on, we'll get there soon.
cn: 冷静点，我们很快就到了。

en: He told his friend to keep his shirt on during the argument.
cn: 在争论中，他告诉朋友要保持冷静。

en: The decision was made in the interest of the company's shareholders.
cn: 这个决定是为了公司股东的利益而做出的。

en: In the interest of public safety, the road was closed.
cn: 为了公共安全，道路被关闭了。

en: She convinced me of the importance of recycling.
cn: 她让我相信了回收的重要性。

en: The evidence convinced the jury of his innocence.
cn: 证据使陪审团相信了他的清白。

en: She walks so fast that I can't keep up with her.
cn: 她走得很快，我跟不上她。

en: I try to keep up with my old friends through social media.
cn: 我试图通过社交媒体与老朋友保持联系。

en: Parents should have control over their children's internet usage.
cn: 父母应该对孩子使用互联网有控制权。

en: The manager has full control over the project budget.
cn: 经理对项目预算有完全控制权。

en: To be fair, he did apologize for his mistake.
cn: 公平地说，他确实为他的错误道歉了。

en: To be fair, the movie had some good special effects.
cn: 公平地说，这部电影有一些好的特效。

en: Please separate the recyclables from the regular trash.
cn: 请将可回收物与普通垃圾分开。

en: It's important to separate personal feelings from professional decisions.
cn: 将个人情感与职业决策分开很重要。

en: Text messaging has become a popular way to communicate quickly.
cn: 短信已成为快速沟通的流行方式。

en: She prefers text messaging over phone calls for casual chats.
cn: 对于随意聊天，她更喜欢短信而不是电话。

en: The company is faced with financial difficulties.
cn: 公司面临财务困难。

en: When faced with a challenge, she always stays positive.
cn: 当面临挑战时，她总是保持积极。

en: Government bonds are considered a low-risk investment.
cn: 政府债券被认为是低风险投资。

en: For retirees, a low-risk investment portfolio is often recommended.
cn: 对于退休人员，通常推荐低风险投资组合。

en: He tried to smooth over the disagreement between his friends.
cn: 他试图缓和朋友之间的分歧。

en: A good apology can smooth over many misunderstandings.
cn: 一个好的道歉可以平息许多误解。

en: The company launched a series of new products this year.
cn: 公司今年推出了一系列新产品。

en: A series of unfortunate events led to their downfall.
cn: 一连串不幸事件导致了他们的失败。

en: The soil is deficient in nutrients, so plants don't grow well.
cn: 土壤缺乏养分，所以植物长得不好。

en: His diet is deficient in vitamin C.
cn: 他的饮食缺乏维生素C。

en: You can tell by her accent that she's from London.
cn: 从她的口音可以判断她来自伦敦。

en: I could tell by the smell that dinner was ready.
cn: 通过气味我能判断晚餐准备好了。

en: The lullaby put the baby to sleep quickly.
cn: 摇篮曲让宝宝很快入睡。

en: They had to put their old dog to sleep due to illness.
cn: 由于疾病，他们不得不对老狗实施安乐死。

en: On weekends, we like to do some activities like hiking or swimming.
cn: 周末，我们喜欢做一些活动，比如徒步或游泳。

en: The children will do some activities at the summer camp.
cn: 孩子们将在夏令营做一些活动。

en: Be sure to lock the door when you leave.
cn: 离开时务必锁门。

en: I'll be sure to call you tomorrow.
cn: 我一定会明天给你打电话。

en: Recent technological advances have revolutionized communication.
cn: 最近的技术进步彻底改变了通信方式。

en: The company invests heavily in technological advances to stay competitive.
cn: 这家公司大力投资技术进步以保持竞争力。

en: Don't take your health for granted; it's precious.
cn: 不要把你的健康视为理所当然；它很宝贵。

en: She took his kindness for granted and never thanked him.
cn: 她认为他的善良是理所当然的，从未感谢过他。

en: She has a lot going for her with her talent and hard work.
cn: 凭借她的才华和努力，她有很多优势。

en: He has something going for him because of his connections.
cn: 由于他的人脉，他有一些有利条件。

en: As of today, the new policy is in effect.
cn: 自今日起，新政策生效。

en: The report is accurate as of last month.
cn: 这份报告截至上个月是准确的。

en: Oil does not mix with water.
cn: 油不溶于水。

en: She likes to mix with people from different backgrounds.
cn: 她喜欢与不同背景的人交往。

en: Stop fooling around and get to work!
cn: 别胡闹了，开始工作吧！

en: They were just fooling around in the park.
cn: 他们只是在公园里胡闹。

en: She touched up the painting to fix some flaws.
cn: 她修饰了这幅画以修复一些瑕疵。

en: I need to touch up this report before submitting it.
cn: 我需要在提交前润色这份报告。

en: He shut himself away to study for the exam.
cn: 他把自己关起来准备考试。

en: The old documents were shut away in a vault.
cn: 旧文件被锁在保险库里。

en: There's still an open ticket for the software bug.
cn: 软件漏洞还有一个未解决的工单。

en: Please check the open tickets in the system.
cn: 请检查系统中的开放工单。

en: Get off my tail! I'm driving safely.
cn: 别跟着我！我开得很安全。

en: He told his boss to get off his tail about the deadline.
cn: 他告诉老板别在截止日期上催他了。

en: I love you as much as she does.
cn: 我和她一样爱你。

en: He works as much as possible to save money.
cn: 他尽可能多工作以省钱。

en: If you get a fever, you should rest and drink fluids.
cn: 如果你发烧了，应该休息并多喝水。

en: She got a fever after being out in the rain.
cn: 她在雨中外出后发烧了。

en: He had to slam on the brakes to avoid hitting the deer.
cn: 他不得不猛踩刹车以避免撞到鹿。

en: When the light turned red, she slammed on the brakes suddenly.
cn: 当红灯亮起时，她突然猛踩刹车。

en: She works as a teacher at the local school.
cn: 她在当地学校担任教师。

en: He worked as a consultant for several years.
cn: 他担任顾问工作了好几年。

en: She's been on a diet for two months to lose weight.
cn: 她为了减肥已经节食两个月了。

en: After the holidays, I need to go on a diet to get back in shape.
cn: 假期过后，我需要节食来恢复身材。

en: They offered a part exchange for my old car.
cn: 他们为我的旧车提供了部分交换。

en: Part exchange can reduce the cost of a new purchase.
cn: 部分交换可以降低新购物的成本。

en: If you keep practicing, you're bound to improve your skills.
cn: 如果你坚持练习，你一定会提高你的技能。

en: With such heavy rain, the match is bound to be postponed.
cn: 下这么大的雨，比赛注定要被推迟。

en: In most cases, the problem can be solved easily.
cn: 在大多数情况下，这个问题可以轻松解决。

en: In most cases, he arrives on time.
cn: 在大多数情况下，他准时到达。

en: After the treatment, his health took a turn for the better.
cn: 治疗后，他的健康状况好转了。

en: The economy is expected to take a turn for the better next year.
cn: 预计经济明年会好转。

en: The project will take no more than two weeks to complete.
cn: 这个项目完成不会超过两周。

en: He earns no more than $30,000 a year.
cn: 他一年挣的钱不超过3万美元。

en: Don't get worked up over such a small issue.
cn: 别为这么小的事情生气。

en: He got worked up during the argument and started shouting.
cn: 他在争论中变得激动并开始大喊大叫。

en: The rare books are kept in the closed stacks and require special permission to access.
cn: 珍本书籍存放在闭架书库，需要特殊许可才能访问。

en: In some libraries, the closed stacks are only open to researchers.
cn: 在一些图书馆，闭架书库只对研究人员开放。

en: I'm in the mood for pizza tonight.
cn: 我今晚想吃披萨。

en: She wasn't in the mood for watching a movie, so we went for a walk instead.
cn: 她没有心情看电影，所以我们去散步了。

en: It's time to take my break and have some coffee.
cn: 是时候休息一下喝点咖啡了。

en: Employees are allowed to take their breaks every two hours.
cn: 员工被允许每两小时休息一次。

en: We arrived at the ticket office, but we were out of luck as all tickets were sold out.
cn: 我们到了售票处，但运气不好，所有票都卖光了。

en: If you're looking for a job here, you might be out of luck because the market is slow.
cn: 如果你想在这里找工作，你可能运气不好，因为市场不景气。

en: She has her heart set on becoming a doctor.
cn: 她一心想成为一名医生。

en: He has his heart set on buying that vintage car.
cn: 他决心要买那辆古董车。

en: There's only a faint hope that the missing hiker will be found alive.
cn: 失踪的徒步旅行者被活着找到的希望很渺茫。

en: He clung to a faint hope that his application would be accepted.
cn: 他抱着一丝微弱的希望，认为他的申请会被接受。

en: When planning the trip, we must take account of the weather conditions.
cn: 计划旅行时，我们必须考虑到天气条件。

en: The design takes account of the needs of elderly users.
cn: 这个设计顾及了老年用户的需求。

en: I opened a savings account to save money for my future studies.
cn: 我开了一个储蓄账户，为将来的学习存钱。

en: A savings account typically offers interest on the deposited funds.
cn: 储蓄账户通常对存入的资金提供利息。

en: The first item on the agenda is the budget discussion.
cn: 议程上的第一个项目是预算讨论。

en: We need to add this new issue as an item on the agenda for the next meeting.
cn: 我们需要把这个新问题作为下次会议的议题添加到议程上。

en: We need to calculate the budget for next quarter before the meeting.
cn: 我们需要在会议前计算下一季度的预算。

en: She spent hours calculating the budget to ensure all expenses were covered.
cn: 她花了几个小时计算预算，以确保所有费用都得到覆盖。

en: The internship offers opportunity for students to gain practical experience.
cn: 这个实习为学生提供了获得实践经验的机会。

en: This program offers opportunity for young artists to showcase their work.
cn: 这个项目为年轻艺术家提供了展示作品的机会。

en: She had to keep up an act of being happy even though she was sad inside.
cn: 即使内心悲伤，她也必须维持快乐的伪装。

en: He kept up an act of confidence during the presentation, though he was nervous.
cn: 在演示过程中，他继续假装自信，尽管他很紧张。

en: He earns a decent salary that allows him to live comfortably.
cn: 他挣着一份体面的薪水，能让他生活舒适。

en: The company offers a decent salary along with good benefits.
cn: 公司提供不错的工资以及良好的福利。

en: I need to get away from the city for a relaxing weekend.
cn: 我需要离开城市去度一个放松的周末。

en: He tried to get away from his stressful job by taking up a hobby.
cn: 他试图通过培养一个爱好来逃避压力大的工作。

en: New cafes seem to sprout up on every corner in this neighborhood.
cn: 这个街区的每个角落似乎都迅速出现了新咖啡馆。

en: After the rain, mushrooms sprouted up overnight in the garden.
cn: 雨后，花园里一夜之间长出了蘑菇。

en: She has an interest in learning foreign languages and cultures.
cn: 她对学习外语和文化感兴趣。

en: He has always had an interest in astronomy since he was a child.
cn: 他从小就对天文学感兴趣。

en: He took sick suddenly and had to cancel his appointments.
cn: 他突然生病，不得不取消他的约会。

en: Many employees took sick during the flu season, affecting productivity.
cn: 流感季节期间，许多员工生病，影响了生产力。

en: The teacher caught him out when he tried to copy his friend's homework.
cn: 当他试图抄袭朋友的作业时，老师发现了他。

en: Her careful questions caught the suspect out in a lie.
cn: 她仔细的问题发现了嫌疑人在说谎。

en: I took him for his brother because they look so similar.
cn: 我把他误认为他的兄弟，因为他们长得太像了。

en: She was taken for a celebrity due to her striking appearance.
cn: 由于她引人注目的外表，她被误认为是一位名人。

en: It took me a while to figure out how to use the new software.
cn: 我花了一段时间才弄明白如何使用这个新软件。

en: Can you figure out the answer to this math problem?
cn: 你能解出这道数学题的答案吗？

en: She always speaks up for her friends when they are unfairly criticized.
cn: 当她的朋友受到不公正批评时，她总是为他们辩护。

en: The lawyer spoke up for the defendant's rights in court.
cn: 律师在法庭上为被告的权利辩护。

en: After a short break, we decided to travel on to the next city.
cn: 短暂休息后，我们决定继续旅行到下一个城市。

en: They traveled on through the night to reach their destination by morning.
cn: 他们连夜继续旅行，以便在早上到达目的地。

en: He set his heart on becoming a doctor from a young age.
cn: 他从小就把心定在成为一名医生上。

en: She set her heart on buying that vintage car, no matter the cost.
cn: 她下定决心要买那辆古董车，无论代价如何。

en: The bank offers a savings account with a competitive interest rate of 2%.
cn: 银行提供利率为2%的有竞争力的储蓄账户。

en: Rising interest rates can make loans more expensive for borrowers.
cn: 利率上升可能使借款人的贷款更加昂贵。

en: They bought a new car just to keep up with the Joneses, even though their old one was fine.
cn: 他们买了一辆新车只是为了与邻居攀比，尽管旧车还好好的。

en: In some communities, there's pressure to keep up with the Joneses by having the latest gadgets.
cn: 在一些社区，有通过拥有最新小工具来与邻居攀比的压力。

en: I couldn't help laughing when I saw the funny video.
cn: 当我看到那个有趣的视频时，我忍不住笑了。

en: She couldn't help crying at the emotional ending of the movie.
cn: 在电影感人的结尾处，她忍不住哭了。

en: The government tests fruits and vegetables for pesticide residue to ensure safety.
cn: 政府检测水果和蔬菜中的农药残留以确保安全。

en: Consumers are concerned about pesticide residue on their food and prefer organic options.
cn: 消费者担心食物上的农药残留，更喜欢有机选择。

en: Tokyo is a megacity with a population of over 13 million people.
cn: 东京是一个拥有超过1300万人口的超大城市。

en: The small island has a village with a population of just 200 residents.
cn: 这个小岛上有一个只有200名居民的村庄。

en: It's important to differentiate between facts and opinions in academic writing.
cn: 在学术写作中，区分事实和观点很重要。

en: The expert can easily differentiate between genuine and counterfeit products.
cn: 专家可以轻松区分真品和假冒产品。

en: Her new song made a hit with audiences and quickly topped the charts.
cn: 她的新歌给观众留下了深刻印象，并迅速登上了排行榜榜首。

en: The comedian's jokes made a hit with the crowd, who laughed throughout the show.
cn: 喜剧演员的笑话给人群留下了深刻印象，他们在整个演出中都笑了。

en: Investors can draw dividend from their stock holdings quarterly.
cn: 投资者可以每季度从他们的股票持有中领取股息。

en: She decided to draw dividend from her investments to supplement her retirement income.
cn: 她决定从投资中领取股息来补充退休收入。

en: A huge explosion rocked the city, causing widespread damage.
cn: 一次巨大爆炸震撼了城市，造成了广泛的破坏。

en: The firefighters responded quickly to the scene of the huge explosion.
cn: 消防员迅速响应了巨大爆炸的现场。

en: She has been suffering from insomnia for months, often lying awake until dawn.
cn: 她患有失眠症已经好几个月了，经常躺到天亮也睡不着。

en: Many people suffer from insomnia due to stress and anxiety.
cn: 许多人因压力和焦虑而患有失眠症。

en: The construction project got the go-ahead from the city council after months of review.
cn: 经过数月的审查，这个建筑项目获得了市议会的批准。

en: We can start the marketing campaign once we get the go-ahead from management.
cn: 一旦获得管理层的批准，我们就可以开始营销活动。

en: The key was found at the bottom of the drawer.
cn: 钥匙在抽屉底部找到了。

en: There is a note at the bottom of the page explaining the terms.
cn: 页面底部有一个注释解释了条款。

en: Please go away and let me finish my work in peace.
cn: 请走开，让我安静地完成工作。

en: The pain will go away after you take this medicine.
cn: 吃了这药后，疼痛就会消失。

en: The company decided to computerise the service to improve efficiency and reduce errors.
cn: 公司决定将服务计算机化以提高效率并减少错误。

en: Many banks have computerised their customer service systems.
cn: 许多银行已经将客户服务系统计算机化了。

en: Her mathematical talents were evident from a young age, solving complex problems easily.
cn: 她从小就展现出数学才能，能轻松解决复杂问题。

en: The school nurtures students with mathematical talents through special programs.
cn: 学校通过特殊项目培养有数学才能的学生。

en: She bent over backwards to help her friend move to a new apartment.
cn: 她竭尽全力帮助朋友搬到新公寓。

en: The company bends over backwards to ensure customer satisfaction.
cn: 公司不遗余力地确保客户满意。

en: The academic calendar for the upcoming year includes holidays and exam periods.
cn: 下一年的校历包括了假期和考试期。

en: Students should check the academic calendar for important dates like registration deadlines.
cn: 学生应查看校历以了解注册截止日期等重要日期。

en: It's important to be objective about the situation before making a decision.
cn: 在做决定之前，对情况保持客观很重要。

en: As a journalist, she tries to be objective about the news she reports.
cn: 作为一名记者，她努力对她报道的新闻保持客观。

en: The negotiations came to a dead end when neither side would compromise.
cn: 当双方都不愿妥协时，谈判陷入了僵局。

en: His research came to a dead end after he ran out of funding.
cn: 他的研究在资金用完后走到了尽头。

en: New evidence came to light that changed the course of the investigation.
cn: 新证据暴露出来，改变了调查的方向。

en: The scandal came to light after a whistleblower reported it.
cn: 在举报人报告后，丑闻被发现了。

en: First and foremost, we need to ensure the safety of all employees.
cn: 首先，我们需要确保所有员工的安全。

en: He is first and foremost a teacher, dedicated to his students.
cn: 他首先是一位老师，致力于他的学生。

en: She always has her nose in a book, even during breaks.
cn: 她总是埋头读书，甚至在休息时间也是如此。

en: As a child, he had his nose in a book most of the time.
cn: 小时候，他大部分时间都专心阅读。

en: They made a bargain with the supplier to get a better price.
cn: 他们与供应商达成协议以获得更好的价格。

en: He made a bargain with his friend to share the workload.
cn: 他与朋友达成协议分担工作量。

en: I need to have my hair cut before the job interview next week.
cn: 我需要在下周工作面试前理发。

en: She had her hair cut short for the summer.
cn: 她为了夏天把头发剪短了。

en: After the fall, he struggled to his feet and continued walking.
cn: 摔倒后，他挣扎着站起来继续走。

en: The injured player struggled to his feet with the help of teammates.
cn: 受伤的球员在队友的帮助下挣扎着站起来。

en: In a globalised world, businesses must adapt to international markets.
cn: 在全球化的世界中，企业必须适应国际市场。

en: Cultural exchange is essential in a globalised world to foster understanding.
cn: 在全球化的世界中，文化交流对于促进理解至关重要。

en: Parents are often concerned about their children's safety.
cn: 父母常常担心孩子的安全。

en: She is concerned about the environmental impact of the project.
cn: 她关心这个项目对环境的影响。

en: The exam results will be announced next Monday on the school website.
cn: 考试成绩将于下周一在学校网站上公布。

en: She was anxious about her exam results, hoping to get into a good university.
cn: 她对考试成绩感到焦虑，希望能进入一所好大学。

en: With exams approaching, she put her nose to the grindstone and studied every day.
cn: 随着考试临近，她埋头苦干，每天学习。

en: He put his nose to the grindstone to finish the project on time.
cn: 他努力工作以按时完成项目。

en: She pegged away at her studies until she mastered the subject.
cn: 她坚持不懈地学习，直到掌握了这门学科。

en: He's been pegging away at the project for months.
cn: 他几个月来一直在努力做这个项目。

en: The discussion centred upon the main issues of the debate.
cn: 讨论集中于辩论的主要问题。

en: Her research centres upon climate change effects.
cn: 她的研究以气候变化影响为中心。

en: The rescue team freed the trapped animal from the net.
cn: 救援队把被困的动物从网中释放出来。

en: She freed her mind from distractions to focus on work.
cn: 她摆脱干扰，专注于工作。

en: We must find ways to sustain our civilisation without harming the planet.
cn: 我们必须找到在不伤害地球的情况下维持文明的方法。

en: Sustainable practices are key to sustaining our civilisation for future generations.
cn: 可持续实践是维持文明给后代的关键。

en: She entered for the marathon to challenge herself.
cn: 她报名参加马拉松来挑战自己。

en: Students can enter for the competition by submitting their projects.
cn: 学生可以通过提交项目来登记参与比赛。

en: In an emergency, it's important to get your wits about you and think clearly.
cn: 紧急情况下，保持冷静并清晰思考很重要。

en: After the shock, she got her wits about her and called for help.
cn: 震惊之后，她恢复理智并呼救。

en: Due to work commitments, he couldn't attend the family event.
cn: 由于工作承诺，他无法参加家庭活动。

en: She manages her work commitments efficiently to maintain a work-life balance.
cn: 她高效管理职业责任以保持工作与生活的平衡。

en: I've just about finished my homework.
cn: 我差不多完成了作业。

en: The project is just about ready for launch.
cn: 这个项目几乎准备好启动了。

en: Employees are obliged to follow company policies.
cn: 员工有义务遵守公司政策。

en: He was obliged to pay the fine for the violation.
cn: 他必须为违规支付罚款。

en: She fell ill with the flu and had to stay home.
cn: 她患了流感，不得不待在家里。

en: Many people fall ill during the winter season.
cn: 许多人在冬季生病。

en: She keeps track of her expenses in a spreadsheet.
cn: 她在电子表格中记录她的开支。

en: It's hard to keep track of all the changes in the schedule.
cn: 很难跟踪日程中的所有变化。

en: He tried to finish the report before the deadline.
cn: 他尝试在截止日期前完成报告。

en: She tries to exercise every day for her health.
cn: 她为了健康努力每天锻炼。

en: In comparison, the new model is much more efficient.
cn: 相比之下，新模型效率高得多。

en: Her performance was excellent in comparison to last year.
cn: 比较而言，她的表现比去年优秀。

en: The company plans to phase out the old software by next year.
cn: 公司计划明年逐步淘汰旧软件。

en: Governments are phasing out single-use plastics to reduce waste.
cn: 政府正在逐步淘汰一次性塑料以减少浪费。

en: He would give his right arm for a chance to meet his idol.
cn: 他愿意付出极大代价来见他的偶像。

en: She'd give her right arm for a promotion at work.
cn: 她不惜一切想要工作晋升。

en: New technologies can help improve productivity in the workplace.
cn: 新技术可以帮助提高工作场所的生产力。

en: Training programs are designed to improve productivity among employees.
cn: 培训项目旨在提升员工的效率。

en: The decision kicked up a lot of controversy among the staff.
cn: 这个决定在员工中引起了很多争议。

en: He kicked up a fuss when his order was delayed.
cn: 订单延迟时，他激起了骚动。

en: Factories must treat waste water before releasing it into rivers.
cn: 工厂必须在将废水排入河流前进行处理。

en: Proper management of waste water is crucial for public health.
cn: 妥善管理污水对公共健康至关重要。

en: A stable broadband connection is essential for remote work.
cn: 稳定的宽带连接对于远程工作至关重要。

en: The company upgraded its broadband connection to fiber optics.
cn: 该公司将其宽带连接升级为光纤。

en: Let's meet up for coffee this weekend.
cn: 我们这周末见面喝咖啡吧。

en: They met up at the park to discuss the project.
cn: 他们在公园见面讨论项目。

en: The program aims to rehabilitate young offenders.
cn: 该项目旨在改造少年犯。

en: Young offenders are often handled differently in the justice system.
cn: 少年犯在司法系统中通常被区别对待。

en: During the debate, she made her position clear on environmental issues.
cn: 在辩论中，她明确表达了自己在环境问题上的立场。

en: The manager made his position clear regarding the new policy.
cn: 经理就新政策明确表达了自己的立场。

en: Her job responsibility includes managing the team's budget.
cn: 她的工作职责包括管理团队的预算。

en: Understanding your job responsibility is key to performance.
cn: 理解你的工作职责是表现的关键。

en: The discussion went in circles without reaching a conclusion.
cn: 讨论兜圈子，没有得出结论。

en: If we keep going in circles, we'll never solve this problem.
cn: 如果我们继续兜圈子，永远解决不了这个问题。

en: Mountain climbing requires physical fitness and proper gear.
cn: 登山需要良好的体力和合适的装备。

en: They went mountain climbing in the Alps last summer.
cn: 他们去年夏天去阿尔卑斯山登山了。

en: The government implemented laws to curb smoking in public places.
cn: 政府实施法律以控制公共场所吸烟。

en: Efforts to curb smoking have led to a decline in lung cancer rates.
cn: 控制吸烟的努力已导致肺癌率下降。

en: I need to put my hands on that document before the meeting.
cn: 我需要在会议前找到那份文件。

en: She managed to put her hands on a rare book at the library.
cn: 她在图书馆设法找到了一本稀有书籍。

en: Please take out the trash before you leave.
cn: 请在离开前把垃圾拿出来。

en: He took out his wallet to pay for the meal.
cn: 他拿出钱包支付餐费。

en: Drastic climatic variation is affecting agriculture worldwide.
cn: 剧烈的气候变化正在影响全球农业。

en: Scientists study drastic climatic variation to predict future weather patterns.
cn: 科学家研究剧烈的气候变化以预测未来天气模式。

en: The advertisement was accused of misleading the public about the product's benefits.
cn: 该广告被指控在产品益处方面误导公众。

en: Politicians should not mislead the public with false promises.
cn: 政治家不应以虚假承诺误导公众。

en: The judge will deliver a judgment in the case next week.
cn: 法官将在下周对此案作出判决。

en: After reviewing the evidence, the court delivered a judgment of not guilty.
cn: 审查证据后，法庭宣判无罪。

en: We need to make allowances for his inexperience in this role.
cn: 我们需要考虑到他在这个角色上缺乏经验。

en: The teacher made allowances for the student's illness when grading.
cn: 老师在评分时体谅了学生的病情。

en: Good leadership skills are essential for managing a team effectively.
cn: 良好的领导技能对于有效管理团队至关重要。

en: He developed his leadership skills through training and experience.
cn: 他通过培训和经验发展了自己的领导技能。

en: I prefer to drink tea rather than coffee in the morning.
cn: 我早上更喜欢喝茶而不是咖啡。

en: She prefers to work from home on Fridays.
cn: 她更喜欢周五在家工作。

en: She is senior to me in the company hierarchy.
cn: 她在公司层级中比我资历更深。

en: My brother is senior to me by five years.
cn: 我哥哥比我年长五岁。

en: Get a move on, or we'll be late for the movie.
cn: 快点，否则我们看电影要迟到了。

en: We need to get a move on to finish this project on time.
cn: 我们需要赶紧完成这个项目以按时交付。

en: The company is lagging behind its competitors in technology.
cn: 这家公司在技术上落后于竞争对手。

en: She tends to lag behind during group hikes.
cn: 在团体徒步时，她常常落在后面。

en: The government is faced with a difficult decision on the budget.
cn: 政府在预算上面临一个艰难的决定。

en: She was faced with the challenge of learning a new language.
cn: 她面临着学习一门新语言的挑战。

en: It takes time to break in a new pair of shoes.
cn: 磨合一双新鞋需要时间。

en: He's breaking in the new car by driving it gently.
cn: 他通过轻柔驾驶来磨合这辆新车。

en: There is some confusion as to the exact date of the event.
cn: 关于活动的确切日期，存在一些困惑。

en: As to your question, I will need to consult my notes.
cn: 至于你的问题，我需要查阅我的笔记。

en: He struggled to get his point across during the meeting.
cn: 他在会议上努力传达自己的观点。

en: Using simple language helps get the message across to children.
cn: 使用简单的语言有助于让孩子们理解信息。

en: I used to play the piano when I was younger.
cn: 我年轻时常常弹钢琴。

en: They used to live in the city before moving to the countryside.
cn: 在搬到乡村之前，他们过去住在城市里。

en: Combine the flour with the eggs to make the dough.
cn: 将面粉与鸡蛋混合制作面团。

en: This software combines with other tools to enhance productivity.
cn: 这款软件与其他工具结合以提高生产力。

en: All children are required to attend school until a certain age.
cn: 所有儿童在达到一定年龄前都必须上学。

en: She attends school in the city and commutes daily.
cn: 她在城市上学，每天通勤。

en: By combining the meetings, we can kill two birds with one stone.
cn: 通过合并会议，我们可以一举两得。

en: She killed two birds with one stone by exercising while listening to audiobooks.
cn: 她通过边锻炼边听有声书，实现了一举两得。

en: The chaos ensued from the sudden power outage.
cn: 混乱是由突然停电引起的。

en: Legal disputes often ensue from unclear contracts.
cn: 法律纠纷常常由不明确的合同引起。

en: The festival showcases works by talented filmmakers from around the world.
cn: 这个电影节展示了来自世界各地有才华的电影制作人的作品。

en: Talented filmmakers often push the boundaries of storytelling.
cn: 有才华的电影制作人常常突破讲故事的界限。

en: Employees who show initiative are often promoted quickly.
cn: 表现出主动性的员工常常晋升很快。

en: She showed initiative by proposing a new solution to the problem.
cn: 她通过提出问题的新解决方案，表现出了主动性。

en: We're on the same wavelength when it comes to project goals.
cn: 在项目目标上，我们的想法一致。

en: Good friends are often on the same wavelength without saying a word.
cn: 好朋友常常无需言语就能心有灵犀。

en: Studies show that exercise correlates with better mental health.
cn: 研究表明，锻炼与更好的心理健康相关。

en: The data correlates with previous research findings.
cn: 这些数据与之前的研究发现相关。

en: He's so kind that he'd give you the shirt off his back if you needed it.
cn: 他非常善良，如果你需要，他会倾其所有帮助你。

en: In times of crisis, true friends give you the shirt off their back.
cn: 在危机时刻，真正的朋友会非常慷慨地帮助你。

en: The smell in the kitchen was from rotten meat left in the fridge.
cn: 厨房里的气味来自冰箱里留下的腐烂的肉。

en: Eating rotten meat can cause food poisoning.
cn: 吃腐烂的肉可能导致食物中毒。

en: The teacher hushed up the noisy classroom.
cn: 老师让吵闹的教室安静下来。

en: The company tried to hush up the scandal to avoid bad publicity.
cn: 公司试图掩盖丑闻以避免负面宣传。

en: I'm looking for a new job in the tech industry.
cn: 我正在科技行业寻找一份新工作。

en: She looked for her keys everywhere but couldn't find them.
cn: 她到处寻找她的钥匙，但找不到。

en: I've told him a hundred times, but I can't get it through his thick skull.
cn: 我已经告诉他一百遍了，但我无法让他理解。

en: It took a while to get the safety rules through his thick skull.
cn: 花了一段时间才让他理解安全规则。

en: The store sells fruits, vegetables, dairy products, and so forth.
cn: 这家商店出售水果、蔬菜、乳制品等等。

en: He listed his hobbies as reading, hiking, painting, and so forth.
cn: 他列举了自己的爱好，如阅读、徒步、绘画等等。

en: She arranged for a taxi to pick us up at the airport.
cn: 她安排了一辆出租车在机场接我们。

en: He arranged for the meeting to be held next Monday.
cn: 他安排会议在下周一举行。

en: The graphic details of the accident turned my stomach.
cn: 事故的详细描述让我感到恶心。

en: His rude comments about her appearance turned everyone's stomach.
cn: 他对她外貌的粗鲁评论让所有人都感到厌恶。

en: Schools should focus on helping students develop their talents.
cn: 学校应专注于帮助学生培养他们的才能。

en: He took extra classes to develop his musical talents.
cn: 他上了额外的课程来发展他的音乐天赋。

en: After I lost the game, he kept rubbing it in by mentioning my mistakes.
cn: 我输了比赛后，他不断提及我的错误来让我更难受。

en: She didn't need to rub it in that I was late again.
cn: 她没必要反复强调我又迟到了。

en: The government sent troops to crash the rebellion in the northern region.
cn: 政府派遣军队镇压北部地区的叛乱。

en: They managed to crash the rebellion before it could spread further.
cn: 他们在叛乱进一步扩散前成功将其粉碎。

en: Please count me in for the weekend trip.
cn: 请把我也算进周末旅行中。

en: Don't forget to count in the extra expenses when budgeting.
cn: 做预算时别忘了把额外开支包括在内。

en: The package should weigh not more than 5 kilograms.
cn: 包裹重量不应超过5公斤。

en: She spent not more than an hour on the assignment.
cn: 她在这项任务上花费了不超过一小时。

en: We decided to take a stroll around the park after dinner.
cn: 我们决定晚饭后在公园里散步。

en: He likes to take a stroll around the neighborhood in the evenings.
cn: 他喜欢晚上在附近散步。

en: I wonder at her ability to stay calm under pressure.
cn: 我对她在压力下保持冷静的能力感到惊奇。

en: They wondered at the beauty of the ancient architecture.
cn: 他们对古建筑的美丽感到惊讶。

en: The main course is cooking; in the meantime, let's have some appetizers.
cn: 主菜正在烹饪；与此同时，我们吃些开胃菜吧。

en: She is waiting for the results; in the meantime, she is looking for other opportunities.
cn: 她在等待结果；在此期间，她正在寻找其他机会。

en: I'll wait for you at the entrance.
cn: 我会在入口处等你。

en: They are waiting for the bus to arrive.
cn: 他们在等公交车到来。

en: He got into a mess by forgetting to pay his bills on time.
cn: 他因忘记按时付账单而陷入困境。

en: The project got into a mess due to poor planning.
cn: 由于计划不周，这个项目陷入混乱。

en: The team worked hard to complete the project on time.
cn: 团队努力工作以按时完成项目。

en: She needs to complete the project by the end of the month.
cn: 她需要在月底前完成这个项目。

en: Every time he talks about his vacation, he goes into his song and dance about it.
cn: 每次他谈论假期时，都会开始长篇大论。

en: She went into her song and dance about how difficult the task was.
cn: 她开始夸张地谈论这项任务有多难。

en: He is accustomed to waking up early for work.
cn: 他习惯于早起工作。

en: She is accustomed to the cold weather after living there for years.
cn: 在那里生活多年后，她习惯了寒冷的天气。

en: The constant noise from the construction made him go around the bend.
cn: 建筑工地的持续噪音让他发疯。

en: She went around the bend when she found out about the mistake.
cn: 当她发现这个错误时，她变得非常愤怒。

en: Seed reproduction is common in many flowering plants.
cn: 种子繁殖在许多开花植物中很常见。

en: The study focuses on the mechanisms of seed reproduction in crops.
cn: 这项研究专注于作物种子繁殖的机制。

en: This information is relevant to our discussion.
cn: 这条信息与我们的讨论相关。

en: His experience is relevant to the job requirements.
cn: 他的经验与工作要求相关。

en: A cup of tea can take the edge off your stress.
cn: 一杯茶可以减轻你的压力。

en: The painkiller took the edge off his headache.
cn: 止痛药减轻了他的头痛。

en: The teacher held her up as an example of hard work.
cn: 老师把她作为勤奋工作的榜样。

en: They held the company up as an example of innovation.
cn: 他们把这家公司作为创新的典范。

en: She took a shine to the new puppy immediately.
cn: 她立刻对那只新小狗产生了好感。

en: He took a shine to classical music after attending the concert.
cn: 参加音乐会后，他开始喜欢上古典音乐。

en: They settled the dispute through mediation.
cn: 他们通过调解解决了争端。

en: The court helped settle the dispute between the neighbors.
cn: 法院帮助解决了邻居之间的纠纷。

en: His behavior is akin to that of a child.
cn: 他的行为类似于孩子。

en: The process is akin to baking a cake.
cn: 这个过程类似于烤蛋糕。

en: Environmental protection is crucial for future generations.
cn: 环境保护对后代至关重要。

en: The government has implemented new policies for environmental protection.
cn: 政府实施了新的环境保护政策。

en: Hey, what's up? Haven't seen you in a while.
cn: 嘿，最近怎么样？好久没见你了。

en: What's up? You look worried.
cn: 有什么事吗？你看起来很担心。

en: They set up a new business last year.
cn: 他们去年建立了一家新公司。

en: Can you help me set up the meeting room?
cn: 你能帮我安排会议室吗？

en: She decided to take a hand in organizing the event.
cn: 她决定参与组织这个活动。

en: He took a hand in resolving the conflict.
cn: 他介入解决了冲突。

en: He went back on his word and didn't help as promised.
cn: 他食言了，没有像承诺的那样提供帮助。

en: It's important not to go back on your word in business.
cn: 在商业中不食言很重要。

en: She dreamed up a fantastic story for her novel.
cn: 她为小说想象出了一个奇妙的故事。

en: He dreamed up a new invention in his spare time.
cn: 他在业余时间虚构了一项新发明。

en: He got away with cheating on the test.
cn: 他考试作弊而未受惩罚。

en: They got away with breaking the rules because no one noticed.
cn: 他们违反规则而逃脱了责任，因为没人注意到。

en: She prepared an outline of her speech before writing it.
cn: 她在写演讲稿之前准备了一个提纲。

en: The outline of the speech included key points and examples.
cn: 演讲的提纲包括了要点和例子。

en: Many young people admire celebrities for their talent.
cn: 许多年轻人因名人的才华而钦佩他们。

en: She admires celebrities who use their fame for good causes.
cn: 她崇拜那些利用名声做好事的名人。

en: I know of him, but I've never met him personally.
cn: 我听说过他，但从未亲自见过。

en: Do you know of any good restaurants in this area?
cn: 你知道这个地区有什么好餐厅吗？

en: We place reliance on our team to complete the project.
cn: 我们依赖团队来完成这个项目。

en: It's unwise to place too much reliance on a single source.
cn: 过度依赖单一来源是不明智的。

en: Just let him do his thing; he knows what he's doing.
cn: 就让他按自己的方式行事吧；他知道自己在做什么。

en: She does her thing in the art studio every weekend.
cn: 她每个周末都在艺术工作室做自己喜欢的事。

en: The company profited from the new market trends.
cn: 公司从新的市场趋势中获利。

en: She profited from the experience by learning new skills.
cn: 她通过这次经历学习新技能而受益。

en: They developed a lifelong friendship during college.
cn: 他们在大学期间建立了终身的友谊。

en: It's rare to develop a lifelong friendship with someone you meet online.
cn: 与在网上认识的人建立终身友谊是罕见的。

en: The retiring CEO got a big send-off with speeches and gifts from the entire company.
cn: 即将退休的首席执行官获得了全公司演讲和礼物的盛大欢送。

en: When she moved abroad, her friends organized a big send-off party at the local pub.
cn: 当她移居国外时，朋友们在当地酒吧组织了一场盛大的送别派对。

en: The technical details went over my head during the presentation.
cn: 演示中的技术细节超出了我的理解能力。

en: He went over his boss's head to complain to the manager.
cn: 他越过上司向经理投诉。

en: Web-based technology has revolutionized communication.
cn: 基于网络的技术彻底改变了通信方式。

en: The company uses web-based technology for its online services.
cn: 这家公司使用基于网络的技术提供在线服务。

en: After years of experience, he finally landed a well-paid job at a tech startup.
cn: 经过多年的经验积累，他最终在一家科技初创公司找到了一份高薪工作。

en: Many people seek a well-paid job to afford a comfortable lifestyle in the city.
cn: 许多人寻求高薪工作以负担城市中的舒适生活。

en: Against all the odds, the small team won the championship despite being the underdogs.
cn: 尽管困难重重，这支小团队作为劣势方赢得了冠军。

en: She recovered from the illness against all the odds, amazing her doctors.
cn: 她出乎意料地从疾病中康复，让医生们感到惊讶。

en: Paris is famous for its tourist attractions like the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre.
cn: 巴黎以其旅游景点如埃菲尔铁塔和卢浮宫而闻名。

en: We visited several tourist attractions during our vacation in Japan.
cn: 我们在日本度假期间参观了几个旅游景点。

en: The coffee was too hot to drink immediately, so I waited a few minutes.
cn: 咖啡太烫了，不能立即喝，所以我等了几分钟。

en: She was too tired to finish the marathon, so she stopped halfway.
cn: 她太累了，无法完成马拉松，所以中途停了下来。

en: I booked the hotel room over the phone to confirm the details quickly.
cn: 我通过电话预订了酒店房间以快速确认细节。

en: She resolved the issue over the phone without needing to visit the office.
cn: 她通过电话解决了问题，无需访问办公室。

en: We had a good time at the beach yesterday, swimming and playing games.
cn: 昨天我们在海滩玩得很开心，游泳和玩游戏。

en: I hope you have a good time at the party tonight!
cn: 我希望你今晚在派对上玩得开心！

en: Prices vary from store to store, so it's good to compare before buying.
cn: 价格因商店而异，所以购买前比较一下是好的。
