en: The weather can vary from sunny to rainy very quickly in this region.
cn: 在这个地区，天气可以从晴天迅速变化到雨天。

en: Don't blame me for the delay; the traffic was terrible this morning.
cn: 别因延误责备我；今天早上的交通太糟糕了。

en: The manager blamed the employee for the mistake in the report.
cn: 经理因报告中的错误责备了那名员工。

en: After signing the contract, he had second thoughts about the job offer.
cn: 签署合同后，他对这份工作邀请产生了疑虑。

en: I'm having second thoughts about buying this car because of the high maintenance costs.
cn: 由于高昂的维护成本，我正在重新考虑购买这辆车。

en: His constant tapping on the desk really gets on my nerves during meetings.
cn: 他在会议上不停地敲桌子真的让我很烦躁。

en: Loud noises from the construction site are getting on the neighbors' nerves.
cn: 建筑工地的噪音让邻居们很烦躁。

en: The protest was a clear manifestation of public dissatisfaction with the new policy.
cn: 这次抗议是公众对新政策不满的明确表现。

en: Her kindness is a manifestation of her compassionate nature.
cn: 她的善良是她同情心本质的体现。

en: The deadline was extended, giving us an extra day's time to complete the project.
cn: 截止日期延长了，给了我们额外一天的时间来完成项目。

en: I need an extra day's time to review the documents before the meeting.
cn: 在会议前，我需要额外一天的时间来审查文件。

en: Please fill up the water bottle before we leave for the hike.
cn: 在我们出发徒步前，请把水瓶装满。

en: The gas station attendant helped me fill up the car's tank.
cn: 加油站服务员帮我加满了汽车的油箱。

en: The old heating system in the house broke down during the winter, so we had to repair it.
cn: 房子里的旧供暖系统在冬天坏了，所以我们不得不修理它。

en: Installing an energy-efficient heating system can reduce utility bills.
cn: 安装节能供暖系统可以减少水电费。

en: Visiting the Grand Canyon is definitely worth doing if you're in the area.
cn: 如果你在该地区，参观大峡谷绝对值得。

en: Learning a new language is worth doing for both personal and professional growth.
cn: 学习一门新语言对个人和职业成长都值得。

en: The president will deliver an address to the nation tonight on live television.
cn: 总统今晚将在电视直播中向全国发表演讲。

en: She delivered an inspiring address at the graduation ceremony.
cn: 她在毕业典礼上发表了一场鼓舞人心的演讲。

en: The children used colorful plastic beads to make necklaces in art class.
cn: 孩子们在美术课上用彩色塑料珠子制作项链。

en: You can find plastic beads in various sizes at the craft store.
cn: 你可以在手工艺品店找到各种尺寸的塑料珠子。

en: The shy child grew into a confident public speaker.
cn: 那个害羞的孩子逐渐成长为一名自信的公众演讲者。

en: She grew into her new role as manager within a few months.
cn: 她在几个月内逐渐适应了经理的新角色。

en: She got admitted to Harvard University with a full scholarship.
cn: 她获得了全额奖学金，被哈佛大学录取。

en: He got admitted to the hospital for emergency surgery.
cn: 他因紧急手术被送入医院。

en: The company took steps to prevent data breaches by upgrading its security systems.
cn: 公司通过升级安全系统来采取措施预防数据泄露。

en: We should take steps to prevent accidents by following safety protocols.
cn: 我们应该通过遵循安全规程来采取措施预防事故。

en: You should put your ideas on paper before the meeting.
cn: 你应该在会议前把你的想法写下来。

en: The agreement was finally put on paper after months of negotiation.
cn: 经过数月的谈判，协议终于被正式记录下来。

en: If you don't study regularly, you'll fall behind in class.
cn: 如果你不经常学习，你会在课堂上落后。

en: The project fell behind schedule due to unexpected delays.
cn: 由于意外的延误，项目进度落后了。

en: Take heart, things will get better soon.
cn: 振作起来，情况很快就会好转的。

en: She took heart from the support of her friends during tough times.
cn: 在困难时期，她从朋友的支持中获得了勇气。

en: How did she react to the surprising news?
cn: 她对这令人惊讶的消息有何反应？

en: The market reacted positively to the new policy announcement.
cn: 市场对新政策的宣布做出了积极反应。

en: The school's annual talent show features singing, dancing, and comedy acts.
cn: 学校的年度才艺表演包括唱歌、舞蹈和喜剧表演。

en: She won first prize in the local talent show with her piano performance.
cn: 她在当地的才艺表演中以钢琴演奏获得了一等奖。

en: Employees are expected to arrive on time for meetings.
cn: 员工应准时参加会议。

en: The project is expected to be completed by next month.
cn: 该项目预计下个月完成。

en: Why don't you come along to the party with us?
cn: 你为什么不和我们一起去派对？

en: She came along to help with the preparations.
cn: 她来帮忙准备。

en: I trust you to keep a secret about my promotion.
cn: 我相信你会保守我晋升的秘密。

en: Can you keep a secret? I'm planning a surprise party.
cn: 你能保密吗？我在计划一个惊喜派对。

en: The new song made a hit on the charts within its first week of release.
cn: 这首新歌在发布的第一周就在排行榜上大获成功。

en: Her comedy show made a hit with audiences, leading to a second season.
cn: 她的喜剧节目在观众中大受欢迎，导致了第二季的制作。

en: Once again, he forgot to lock the door.
cn: 他又一次忘记锁门了。

en: Let's try once again to solve this puzzle.
cn: 让我们再试一次解决这个谜题。

en: He tried to play down the importance of the mistake.
cn: 他试图淡化这个错误的重要性。

en: The company played down the negative news in the press release.
cn: 公司在新闻稿中淡化了负面消息。

en: Carbon is a basic element in organic chemistry.
cn: 碳是有机化学中的基本元素。

en: Understanding the basic elements of grammar is essential for language learning.
cn: 理解语法的基本元素对语言学习至关重要。

en: The doctor took a blood sample to check for infections.
cn: 医生取了血液样本来检查感染。

en: A blood sample is required for the laboratory test.
cn: 实验室检测需要血液样本。

en: Citizens are urged to vote in the upcoming election.
cn: 敦促公民在即将到来的选举中投票。

en: Employees were urged to complete the safety training.
cn: 敦促员工完成安全培训。

en: Take Japan for instance, it has a unique culture.
cn: 以日本为例，它有着独特的文化。

en: Take this case for instance, it illustrates the point perfectly.
cn: 以这个案例为例，它完美地说明了这一点。

en: He was hired on the spot after the interview.
cn: 面试后他当场被录用。

en: The police arrived on the spot within minutes.
cn: 警察几分钟内就赶到了现场。

en: She had to let go of her old grudges to move on.
cn: 她必须放下旧怨才能继续前进。

en: Let go of the rope when I say so.
cn: 我说放的时候就放开绳子。

en: We plan to link up with other departments for the project.
cn: 我们计划与其他部门联系以进行这个项目。

en: The new highway will link up with the existing network.
cn: 新高速公路将与现有网络连接。

en: He has a thirst for knowledge and reads constantly.
cn: 他渴望知识，不断阅读。

en: The team showed a thirst for victory in the competition.
cn: 团队在比赛中表现出对胜利的渴望。

en: He decided to sleep off his headache.
cn: 他决定通过睡觉来缓解头痛。

en: After the party, she slept off the tiredness.
cn: 派对后，她通过睡觉消除了疲劳。

en: I'll have a shot at solving this puzzle.
cn: 我会尝试解决这个谜题。

en: She decided to have a shot at learning Spanish.
cn: 她决定尝试学习西班牙语。

en: Keep an eye out for any suspicious activity.
cn: 留意任何可疑活动。

en: I'll keep an eye out for your package delivery.
cn: 我会留意你的包裹投递。

en: The new evidence calls his alibi into question.
cn: 新证据质疑了他的不在场证明。

en: Her actions call her integrity into question.
cn: 她的行为质疑了她的诚信。

en: With three kids and a job, she has her hands full.
cn: 有三个孩子和一份工作，她非常忙碌。

en: During the holiday season, retailers have their hands full.
cn: 假日季节期间，零售商们非常忙碌。

en: We need to automate the process to save time.
cn: 我们需要使这个过程自动化以节省时间。

en: The company automated the process of data entry.
cn: 公司使数据录入过程自动化了。

en: This photo doesn't do justice to the beautiful scenery.
cn: 这张照片没有充分展现美丽的风景。

en: He did justice to the role in the play.
cn: 他充分演绎了剧中的角色。

en: He shouted in a furious way.
cn: 他以愤怒的方式大喊。

en: She reacted in a furious way to the news.
cn: 她对这消息反应愤怒。

en: I'll ask around to find a good plumber.
cn: 我会四处打听找个好水管工。

en: Ask around if anyone has seen my keys.
cn: 四处打听一下是否有人看到我的钥匙。

en: The factory uses mechanised assembly lines for car production.
cn: 工厂使用机械化装配线生产汽车。

en: Mechanised assembly lines improve efficiency.
cn: 机械化装配线提高了效率。

en: I have a sore throat and can't speak well.
cn: 我喉咙痛，说话不方便。

en: She has a sore throat from the cold.
cn: 她因感冒喉咙痛。

en: She went to the trouble of baking a cake for me.
cn: 她不辞辛苦为我烤了蛋糕。

en: He went to the trouble to help us move.
cn: 他不辞辛苦帮我们搬家。

en: He did the project on his own.
cn: 他独自完成了这个项目。

en: She learned to cook on her own.
cn: 她自学了烹饪。

en: His success makes his parents look good.
cn: 他的成功让父母有面子。

en: The new suit makes him look good.
cn: 新西装让他显得好看。

en: It's hard to say when the rain will stop.
cn: 很难说雨什么时候会停。

en: It's hard to say if he will agree.
cn: 很难说他是否会同意。

en: It took a week to get into the swing of things at the new job.
cn: 花了一周时间适应新工作。

en: She quickly got into the swing of things at school.
cn: 她很快适应了学校生活。

en: It's little more than a rumor.
cn: 这只不过是个谣言。

en: He is little more than a beginner.
cn: 他仅仅是个初学者。

en: At this rate, we'll finish by tomorrow.
cn: 照此速度，我们明天就能完成。

en: At this rate, the company will go bankrupt.
cn: 照此情况，公司会破产。

en: I wake up at 7 AM every day.
cn: 我每天早上7点醒来。

en: She woke up from a deep sleep.
cn: 她从沉睡中醒来。

en: The cherry trees are in full blossom.
cn: 樱花树盛开了。

en: The garden is in full blossom in spring.
cn: 春天花园里鲜花盛开。

en: Follow the instructions to the letter to avoid mistakes.
cn: 严格按照说明操作以避免错误。

en: He executed the plan to the letter.
cn: 他丝毫不差地执行了这个计划。

en: The sudden news took me aback.
cn: 这个突如其来的消息让我大吃一惊。

en: Her harsh criticism took everyone aback.
cn: 她严厉的批评让所有人都感到震惊。

en: The police towed away the illegally parked car.
cn: 警察拖走了违章停放的汽车。

en: They had to tow away the broken-down truck.
cn: 他们不得不拖走抛锚的卡车。

en: The company shifted to renewable energy.
cn: 公司转向了可再生能源。

en: He shifted to a new career.
cn: 他转换到了新的职业。

en: This is the same book that I read last year.
cn: 这就是我去年读的那本书。

en: She wore the same dress that she had at the party.
cn: 她穿了在派对上穿的那条裙子。

en: You are supposed to finish the report by Friday.
cn: 你应该在周五前完成这份报告。

en: We are supposed to arrive at 8 PM.
cn: 我们应该在晚上8点到达。

en: All things considered, it was a successful event.
cn: 总的来说，这是一次成功的活动。

en: All things considered, I think we made the right decision.
cn: 全面考虑后，我认为我们做出了正确的决定。

en: The new policy gave rise to many complaints.
cn: 新政策引起了许多投诉。

en: His actions gave rise to serious concerns.
cn: 他的行为引起了严重的担忧。

en: Her success made her a target of envy among her peers.
cn: 她的成功使她成为同龄人嫉妒的对象。

en: His luxurious car is a target of envy in the neighborhood.
cn: 他的豪华汽车是邻里嫉妒的对象。

en: I had to slog through hundreds of pages of documentation.
cn: 我不得不费力地处理数百页的文档。

en: They slogged through the muddy terrain.
cn: 他们艰难地穿过了泥泞的地形。

en: We plant trees every spring to help the environment.
cn: 我们每年春天植树以帮助环境。

en: The community organized an event to plant trees in the park.
cn: 社区组织了一次在公园植树的活动。

en: Traveling abroad can broaden your horizons.
cn: 出国旅行可以开阔你的视野。

en: Reading diverse books helps broaden one's horizons.
cn: 阅读多样化的书籍有助于开阔视野。

en: She is as tough as nails and never gives up.
cn: 她非常坚强，从不放弃。

en: The old soldier was as tough as nails.
cn: 那位老兵坚韧不拔。

en: When I saw the surprise, my heart missed a beat.
cn: 当我看到这个惊喜时，我的心跳漏了一拍。

en: Her sudden appearance made his heart miss a beat.
cn: 她的突然出现让他的心漏跳了一拍。

en: The discussion centred on the main issue.
cn: 讨论聚焦于主要问题。

en: Her research centres on environmental science.
cn: 她的研究以环境科学为中心。

en: The project is going great guns since we started.
cn: 自从我们开始以来，这个项目进展顺利。

en: She went great guns on her new business venture.
cn: 她在新的商业冒险中全力以赴。

en: The positive effects cancel out the negative ones.
cn: 积极效果抵消了消极效果。

en: His apology did not cancel out the damage done.
cn: 他的道歉并没有抵消所造成的损害。

en: This rule is true of all employees.
cn: 这条规则适用于所有员工。

en: What is true of one case may not be true of another.
cn: 适用于一种情况的不一定适用于另一种情况。

en: The situation is improving by the day.
cn: 情况正在逐日改善。

en: He is getting stronger by the day.
cn: 他一天天地变得更加强壮。

en: They fought for their rights.
cn: 他们为自己的权利而战。

en: She is fighting for a better future.
cn: 她正在为一个更美好的未来而奋斗。

en: She completed the project by herself.
cn: 她独自完成了这个项目。

en: He prefers to work by himself.
cn: 他更喜欢独自工作。

en: Animal experiments are conducted to test the safety of new drugs.
cn: 进行动物实验是为了测试新药的安全性。

en: The university has strict ethical guidelines for animal experiments.
cn: 该大学对动物实验有严格的伦理准则。

en: Her beauty was beyond expression, leaving everyone speechless.
cn: 她的美无法形容，让所有人都哑口无言。

en: The joy I felt at that moment was beyond expression.
cn: 那一刻我感到的喜悦难以表达。

en: He tried to get round the rules by finding a loophole.
cn: 他试图通过寻找漏洞来规避规则。

en: We can get round the traffic by taking the back roads.
cn: 我们可以走小路来避开交通拥堵。

en: She portioned out the cake equally among the children.
cn: 她把蛋糕平均分给了孩子们。

en: We need to portion out the supplies for the week.
cn: 我们需要把这周的物资分配好。

en: If you don't wear a helmet, you run a risk of serious injury.
cn: 如果你不戴头盔，就有严重受伤的风险。

en: Investing in startups runs a risk of losing money.
cn: 投资初创公司有亏钱的风险。

en: Good city planning can reduce traffic congestion.
cn: 良好的城市规划可以减少交通拥堵。

en: The mayor emphasized the importance of sustainable city planning.
cn: 市长强调了可持续城市规划的重要性。

en: I get along with my colleagues very well at work.
cn: 我在工作中与同事们相处得非常融洽。

en: It's important to get along with your neighbors.
cn: 与邻居相处融洽很重要。

en: Her promotion put his nose out of joint because he wanted the job.
cn: 她的晋升让他感到不快，因为他想要那份工作。

en: Don't let their success put your nose out of joint; focus on your own goals.
cn: 别让他们的成功让你嫉妒，专注于你自己的目标。

en: During the holiday season, hotel rooms are at a premium.
cn: 在假期期间，酒店房间价格高昂。

en: Fresh water is at a premium in some desert regions.
cn: 在一些沙漠地区，淡水非常稀缺。

en: The professor exhausted the subject of climate change in his lecture.
cn: 教授在讲座中详尽讨论了气候变化这个话题。

en: We've exhausted this subject; let's move on to the next agenda item.
cn: 我们已经穷尽了这个话题，让我们进入下一个议程项目。

en: There's only a faint chance that it will rain tomorrow.
cn: 明天下雨的可能性很小。

en: He has a faint chance of winning the lottery, but he still buys tickets.
cn: 他中彩票的机会渺茫，但他仍然买票。

en: He went out of his way to help me move into my new apartment.
cn: 他不辞辛劳地帮我搬进新公寓。

en: She always goes out of her way to make guests feel welcome.
cn: 她总是特意让客人感到受欢迎。

en: She's trying for a promotion at work.
cn: 她正在工作中争取晋升。

en: He decided to try for a scholarship to study abroad.
cn: 他决定争取奖学金出国留学。

en: I prefer taking a non-stop flight to avoid layovers.
cn: 我更喜欢乘坐直飞航班以避免中转。

en: The non-stop flight from New York to London takes about 7 hours.
cn: 从纽约到伦敦的直飞航班大约需要7小时。

en: Are you hungry? Not really, I just ate.
cn: 你饿吗？不太饿，我刚吃过。

en: Do you like this movie? Not really, it's a bit boring.
cn: 你喜欢这部电影吗？不完全是，有点无聊。

en: Mathematics and science are key areas of knowledge in education.
cn: 数学和科学是教育中的关键知识领域。

en: She has expertise in multiple areas of knowledge, including history and literature.
cn: 她在多个知识领域有专长，包括历史和文学。

en: After hearing the evidence, he did an about face on his opinion.
cn: 听到证据后，他彻底改变了自己的观点。

en: The company did an about face on its policy after customer complaints.
cn: 在客户投诉后，公司彻底改变了其政策。

en: You should take his promises with a grain of salt; he often doesn't follow through.
cn: 你应该对他的承诺持保留态度，他经常不兑现。

en: I take online reviews with a grain of salt because they can be biased.
cn: 我对在线评论半信半疑，因为它们可能有偏见。

en: The poem was written in praise of nature's beauty.
cn: 这首诗是为了歌颂大自然的美丽而写的。

en: He spoke in praise of the team's hard work and dedication.
cn: 他发言赞扬了团队的辛勤工作和奉献精神。

en: She always stands up for her friends when they're being bullied.
cn: 当她的朋友被欺负时，她总是站出来维护他们。

en: It's important to stand up for your beliefs even when it's difficult.
cn: 即使困难，坚持自己的信念也很重要。

en: Good parenting skills include patience and effective communication.
cn: 良好的育儿技能包括耐心和有效的沟通。

en: She attended a workshop to improve her parenting skills.
cn: 她参加了一个研讨会来提高她的育儿技能。

en: He punches out at 5 PM every day after finishing his tasks.
cn: 他每天完成任务后下午5点打卡下班。

en: Make sure to punch out before leaving the office.
cn: 离开办公室前确保打卡下班。

en: The speaker touched upon several key issues in his presentation.
cn: 演讲者在报告中提到了几个关键问题。

en: We only touched upon the topic briefly during the meeting.
cn: 我们在会议上只是简要地涉及了这个话题。

en: Don't get worked up over a small mistake; it's easily fixable.
cn: 不要为一个小错误而激动，这很容易纠正。

en: She tends to get worked up over deadlines at work.
cn: 她往往为工作截止日期而生气。

en: Global temperatures are on the increase due to climate change.
cn: 由于气候变化，全球气温正在上升。

en: The number of online shoppers is on the increase every year.
cn: 网上购物者的数量每年都在增加。

en: The company decided to buy out the minority shareholders.
cn: 公司决定买断少数股东的股份。

en: He was bought out of the partnership after a disagreement.
cn: 在一次分歧后，他被买断了合伙关系。

en: Generally speaking, exercise is good for your health.
cn: 一般来说，锻炼对健康有益。

en: Generally speaking, people prefer sunny weather over rain.
cn: 一般来说，人们喜欢晴天胜过雨天。

en: The new regulations could choke off economic growth if not implemented carefully.
cn: 如果不谨慎实施，新规定可能会阻止经济增长。

en: They choked off the water supply to fix the leak.
cn: 他们切断了供水来修理漏水。

en: She finally got up enough nerve to ask for a promotion.
cn: 她终于鼓起勇气要求升职。

en: It took him a while to get up enough nerve to speak in public.
cn: 他花了一段时间才鼓起勇气在公众面前发言。

en: He drove the joke into the ground by repeating it too many times.
cn: 他重复太多次，把这个笑话讲烂了。

en: The company drove the product into the ground with poor marketing.
cn: 公司因营销不善而毁了这个产品。

en: We need to sort out these files before the audit.
cn: 我们需要在审计前整理这些文件。

en: They sorted out their differences through a calm discussion.
cn: 他们通过冷静的讨论解决了分歧。

en: The holidays are just round the corner, so start planning your trip.
cn: 假期即将到来，所以开始计划你的旅行吧。

en: A solution to the problem is round the corner if we keep trying.
cn: 如果我们继续努力，问题的解决方案即将出现。

en: She currently resides with her parents while saving for a house.
cn: 她目前与父母同住，同时为买房存钱。

en: The students reside with host families during the exchange program.
cn: 学生在交流项目期间与寄宿家庭同住。

en: The security guard held the thief down until the police arrived.
cn: 保安压制住小偷直到警察到来。

en: Financial difficulties can hold people down from pursuing their dreams.
cn: 经济困难会限制人们追求梦想。

en: Please turn the page over to continue reading.
cn: 请翻到下一页继续阅读。

en: He turned over the management of the project to his assistant.
cn: 他把项目的管理移交给了他的助手。

en: Their writing styles are similar, making it hard to tell them apart.
cn: 他们的写作风格相似，很难区分。

en: The two recipes are similar in ingredients but differ in cooking methods.
cn: 这两种食谱在成分上相似，但烹饪方法不同。

en: The apartment is furnished with modern appliances and comfortable furniture.
cn: 这套公寓配备有现代电器和舒适的家具。

en: The office is furnished with all the necessary tools for efficient work.
cn: 办公室配备有高效工作所需的所有必要工具。

en: She tried to keep from laughing during the serious meeting.
cn: 在严肃的会议上，她努力忍住不笑。

en: He kept from eating sweets to maintain his diet.
cn: 为了保持饮食，他避免吃甜食。

en: After the concert, we made our way to the nearest restaurant.
cn: 音乐会结束后，我们前往最近的餐厅。

en: He made his way to the office through the crowded streets.
cn: 他穿过拥挤的街道走向办公室。

en: He is no more likely to win the lottery than I am.
cn: 他中彩票的可能性不比我大。

en: The new plan is no more likely to succeed than the old one.
cn: 新计划成功的可能性不比旧计划大。

en: I flicked through the magazine while waiting.
cn: 我等待时快速翻阅了杂志。

en: She flicked through the pages to find the answer.
cn: 她快速翻页寻找答案。

en: She drew upon her savings to buy a car.
cn: 她动用了积蓄来买车。

en: The writer draws upon historical events for inspiration.
cn: 这位作家借鉴历史事件获取灵感。

en: I am through with my homework.
cn: 我完成了作业。

en: She said she is through with that project.
cn: 她说那个项目已经结束了。

en: She made short work of the difficult task.
cn: 她迅速完成了这项困难的任务。

en: The team made short work of the competition.
cn: 团队迅速击败了竞争对手。

en: The new system was put into operation last week.
cn: 新系统上周投入运行。

en: They plan to put the policy into operation next month.
cn: 他们计划下个月实施这项政策。

en: He no longer lives in that city.
cn: 他不再住在那座城市。

en: The store is no longer open on Sundays.
cn: 这家商店周日不再营业。

en: He gave an off-the-cuff speech at the event.
cn: 他在活动上发表了即兴演讲。

en: Her off-the-cuff remarks were surprisingly insightful.
cn: 她即兴的评论出人意料地有见地。

en: The computer is in use right now.
cn: 电脑现在正在使用中。

en: This method has been in use for decades.
cn: 这种方法已经使用了几十年。

en: As a matter of fact, I did finish the report on time.
cn: 事实上，我确实按时完成了报告。

en: He is, as a matter of fact, the best candidate for the job.
cn: 事实上，他是这份工作的最佳人选。

en: I need to find out when the meeting starts.
cn: 我需要查明会议何时开始。

en: She found out the truth about the incident.
cn: 她发现了事件的真相。

en: The children enjoyed the party no end.
cn: 孩子们非常喜欢这个派对。

en: Her kindness has helped me no end.
cn: 她的善良对我帮助极大。

en: Artificial organs can save lives when transplants are not available.
cn: 当无法进行移植时，人造器官可以挽救生命。

en: Research on artificial organs is advancing rapidly.
cn: 人造器官的研究正在迅速发展。

en: He brought up the issue during the meeting.
cn: 他在会议上提出了这个问题。

en: She brought up her concerns with the manager.
cn: 她向经理提出了她的担忧。

en: People often associate rain with sadness.
cn: 人们常将雨与悲伤联系起来。

en: She associates that song with her childhood.
cn: 她将那首歌与童年联系起来。

en: We bought perfume at the duty-free shop before boarding.
cn: 我们在登机前在免税店买了香水。

en: Duty-free shops offer goods without local taxes.
cn: 免税店提供不含地方税的商品。

en: She makes a point of exercising every day.
cn: 她特意每天锻炼。

en: He made a point of thanking everyone involved.
cn: 他特意感谢了所有相关人员。

en: Cut the apple in half.
cn: 把苹果切成两半。

en: The time was reduced in half for the task.
cn: 这项任务的时间减少了一半。

en: With his small income, he can just get by each month.
cn: 靠他微薄的收入，他每个月只能勉强过活。

en: We managed to get by with limited resources during the trip.
cn: 旅行中，我们用有限的资源凑合着过了。

en: On the average, people sleep about eight hours a night.
cn: 平均而言，人们每晚大约睡八小时。

en: On the average, this model sells 100 units per month.
cn: 平均来说，这款型号每月售出100台。

en: Effective political management requires strong communication skills.
cn: 有效的政治管理需要强大的沟通技巧。

en: The course covers topics in political management and strategy.
cn: 这门课程涵盖政治管理和战略主题。

en: The new evidence brought his alibi into question.
cn: 新证据使他的不在场证明受到质疑。

en: The scandal brought the company's ethics into question.
cn: 丑闻使公司的道德受到质疑。

en: A vacation will do you good after all that hard work.
cn: 在辛苦工作后，度假会对你有好处。

en: Eating vegetables does your health good.
cn: 吃蔬菜对你的健康有好处。

en: Improving spoken English requires regular practice with native speakers.
cn: 提高英语口语需要定期与母语者练习。

en: Her spoken English is fluent and clear.
cn: 她的英语口语流利而清晰。

en: The athlete broke records in the 100-meter dash.
cn: 这位运动员在100米短跑中打破了纪录。

en: The company broke sales records last quarter.
cn: 该公司上个季度打破了销售纪录。

en: Oil is extracted from underground reservoirs.
cn: 石油是从地下储层中提取的。

en: The data was extracted from the database for analysis.
cn: 数据从数据库中提取出来进行分析。

en: Climate change has an effect on global weather patterns.
cn: 气候变化对全球天气模式有影响。

en: Her advice had a positive effect on my decision.
cn: 她的建议对我的决定产生了积极影响。

en: The report draws attention to the issue of pollution.
cn: 这份报告引起了人们对污染问题的注意。

en: He drew attention to the mistake in the contract.
cn: 他引起了大家对合同中错误的注意。

en: The project's success is dependent on team cooperation.
cn: 项目的成功依赖于团队合作。

en: Many plants are dependent on sunlight for growth.
cn: 许多植物的生长依赖于阳光。

en: She will participate in the marathon next month.
cn: 她将参加下个月的马拉松比赛。

en: Students are encouraged to participate in class discussions.
cn: 鼓励学生参与课堂讨论。

en: I believe in his ability to succeed.
cn: 我相信他有能力成功。

en: She believes in the power of positive thinking.
cn: 她相信积极思考的力量。

en: He got off easy with just a warning for speeding.
cn: 他超速只得到了警告，轻易逃脱了惩罚。

en: The thief got off easy because it was his first offense.
cn: 小偷因为是初犯而从轻发落。

en: Scores of people attended the concert.
cn: 许多人参加了音乐会。

en: There are scores of books on that topic in the library.
cn: 图书馆里有许多关于那个主题的书。

en: She keeps her childhood memories in a photo album.
cn: 她把童年回忆保存在相册里。

en: We looked through the photo album from our vacation.
cn: 我们翻阅了度假时的相册。

en: The class had a group discussion about the novel.
cn: 班级就这部小说进行了小组讨论。

en: Group discussions are common in team meetings.
cn: 小组讨论在团队会议中很常见。

en: He always calls a spade a spade, even if it's uncomfortable.
cn: 他总是直言不讳，即使这让人不舒服。

en: In business, it's important to call a spade a spade to avoid misunderstandings.
cn: 在商业中，实话实说以避免误解很重要。

en: The anthropologist conducted a field study in a remote village.
cn: 人类学家在一个偏远村庄进行了实地研究。

en: Field studies are essential for ecological research.
cn: 实地研究对于生态研究至关重要。

en: He works like a horse to support his family.
cn: 他辛勤工作以养家糊口。

en: During harvest season, farmers work like horses.
cn: 在收获季节，农民们像马一样辛勤工作。

en: The events that led up to the war were complex.
cn: 导致战争的事件很复杂。

en: Her speech led up to the announcement of the new policy.
cn: 她的演讲为新政策的宣布做了准备。

en: At the party, he got the glad hand from all the guests.
cn: 在聚会上，他受到了所有客人的热情欢迎。

en: New employees often get the glad hand on their first day.
cn: 新员工通常在第一天会受到热情接待。

en: In the short term, we need to cut costs to survive.
cn: 短期内，我们需要削减成本以求生存。

en: The stock may drop in the short term but recover later.
cn: 股票可能在短期内下跌，但之后会回升。

en: The average salary in this industry is $60,000 per year.
cn: 这个行业的平均工资是每年6万美元。

en: He earns above the average salary for his position.
cn: 他的收入高于他职位的平均工资。

en: The store sells non-medical products like bandages and thermometers.
cn: 这家商店销售绷带和体温计等非医疗产品。

en: Regulations for non-medical products are less strict.
cn: 对非医疗产品的规定不那么严格。

en: Living in a foreign country gave her a sense of isolation.
cn: 在国外生活让她感到一种孤立感。

en: The pandemic increased many people's sense of isolation.
cn: 疫情加剧了许多人的孤独感。

en: We went to the airport to see him off on his trip.
cn: 我们去机场为他送行。

en: She saw her friend off at the train station.
cn: 她在火车站为朋友送行。

en: He received a university education in engineering.
cn: 他接受了工程学的大学教育。

en: Many students aspire to receive a university education abroad.
cn: 许多学生渴望在国外接受大学教育。

en: He had a tongue-lashing from his boss for being late.
cn: 他因为迟到受到了老板的严厉斥责。

en: The child had a tongue-lashing after breaking the vase.
cn: 孩子打碎花瓶后受到了严厉斥责。

en: Traveling to Japan was a memorable experience for her.
cn: 去日本旅行对她来说是一次难忘的经历。

en: Graduating from college is a memorable experience for many.
cn: 大学毕业对许多人来说是一次难忘的经历。

en: The CEO decided to stand down after 20 years of service.
cn: CEO在服务20年后决定辞职。

en: The troops were ordered to stand down after the threat passed.
cn: 威胁过后，部队被命令解除戒备状态。

en: The police worked hard to bring the criminal to justice.
cn: 警方努力将罪犯绳之以法。

en: It's important to bring corrupt officials to justice.
cn: 将腐败官员绳之以法很重要。

en: Scientists extract the cellulose from plants for research.
cn: 科学家从植物中提取纤维素进行研究。

en: The process to extract the cellulose is complex and costly.
cn: 提取纤维素的过程复杂且成本高。

en: In the long run, investing in education pays off.
cn: 从长远来看，投资教育会有回报。

en: Saving money now will benefit you in the long run.
cn: 现在存钱最终会对你有益。

en: The couple walked hand in hand along the beach.
cn: 这对情侣手拉手沿着海滩散步。

en: Economic growth often goes hand in hand with technological advancement.
cn: 经济增长通常与技术进步密切相关。

en: She passed her driving test on the first attempt.
cn: 她第一次尝试就通过了驾驶考试。

en: The driving test includes both theory and practical sections.
cn: 驾驶考试包括理论和实践部分。

en: She is at home with public speaking after years of practice.
cn: 经过多年练习，她对公开演讲感到自在。

en: He feels at home with advanced mathematics.
cn: 他对高等数学很熟悉。

en: That horror movie always gives me the creeps.
cn: 那部恐怖电影总是让我感到毛骨悚然。

en: Walking alone in the dark forest made him get the creeps.
cn: 独自走在黑暗的森林里让他起鸡皮疙瘩。

en: She had a bright idea to solve the problem quickly.
cn: 她有一个好主意来快速解决问题。

en: During the meeting, he had a bright idea for the new project.
cn: 会议期间，他对新项目有了一个好主意。

en: He can't run a mile, much less a marathon.
cn: 他连一英里都跑不了，更不用说马拉松了。

en: She doesn't have time to read a book, much less write one.
cn: 她连读书的时间都没有，何况写书了。

en: As often as not, she arrives late to meetings.
cn: 她开会经常迟到。

en: As often as not, the simplest solution is the best one.
cn: 多半情况下，最简单的解决方案是最好的。

en: I'll try to finish the report by tomorrow.
cn: 我会努力在明天之前完成报告。

en: Try to stay calm during the interview.
cn: 面试时尽量保持冷静。

en: He got fresh with his coworker and was reported to HR.
cn: 他对同事行为放肆，被报告给了人力资源部。

en: Don't get fresh with me, or I'll end this conversation.
cn: 别对我无礼，否则我就结束这次谈话。

en: He is addicted to video games and plays for hours every day.
cn: 他对电子游戏上瘾，每天玩好几个小时。

en: She is addicted to coffee and can't start her day without it.
cn: 她对咖啡上瘾，没有咖啡就无法开始一天。

en: She made a fuss over the small stain on her dress.
cn: 她对裙子上的小污渍大惊小怪。

en: Don't make a fuss over the minor delay; it's not a big deal.
cn: 别对这点小延误大惊小怪，没什么大不了的。

en: The cost is relative to the quality of the materials used.
cn: 成本相对于所用材料的质量而定。

en: Success is often relative to one's effort and perseverance.
cn: 成功往往与个人的努力和毅力相关。

en: The dog turned on its owner and bit him.
cn: 狗突然攻击主人并咬了他。

en: He turned on his friend during the argument.
cn: 他在争论中突然反对他的朋友。

en: Quite a few people attended the concert last night.
cn: 昨晚有相当多的人参加了音乐会。

en: She has quite a few books on her shelf.
cn: 她书架上有不少书。

en: It's important to discriminate between facts and opinions.
cn: 区分事实和观点很重要。

en: The test helps discriminate between skilled and unskilled workers.
cn: 这个测试有助于区分熟练和非熟练工人。

en: He turned around and walked back the way he came.
cn: 他转身沿着来的路走回去。

en: The car turned around at the end of the street.
cn: 汽车在街道尽头调头。

en: We need to analyze the data before making a decision.
cn: 我们需要在做出决定前分析数据。

en: Scientists analyze the data to draw conclusions about climate change.
cn: 科学家分析数据以得出关于气候变化的结论。

en: This candidate fills the bill for the job perfectly.
cn: 这位候选人完全符合这份工作的要求。

en: The new software fills the bill for our data management needs.
cn: 新软件适合我们的数据管理需求。

en: Let's start with the basics before moving to advanced topics.
cn: 让我们从基础开始，然后再进入高级主题。

en: The meeting will start with a brief introduction.
cn: 会议将以简短介绍开始。

en: She made a name for herself as a talented artist.
cn: 她作为一名有才华的艺术家而成名。

en: He worked hard to make a name for himself in the tech industry.
cn: 他努力在科技行业建立声誉。

en: He decided to go stag to the wedding since he didn't have a date.
cn: 他决定独自参加婚礼，因为没有约会对象。

en: Many of the guys are going stag to the party tonight.
cn: 很多男生今晚将独自参加派对。

en: His success has to do with his dedication and hard work.
cn: 他的成功与他的奉献和努力有关。

en: The problem has to do with the software's compatibility issues.
cn: 这个问题涉及软件的兼容性问题。

en: The president was accompanied by his security team.
cn: 总统由他的安全团队陪同。

en: The storm was accompanied by strong winds and heavy rain.
cn: 风暴伴随着强风和暴雨。

en: The apple fell off the tree and landed on the ground.
cn: 苹果从树上掉下来落在地上。

en: Sales have fallen off significantly this quarter.
cn: 本季度销售额大幅下降。

en: He was caught off his guard by the sudden question.
cn: 他被突然的问题弄得措手不及。

en: The team was off its guard and lost the game in the final minutes.
cn: 球队放松了警惕，在最后几分钟输掉了比赛。

en: We had to put the project on hold due to budget constraints.
cn: 由于预算限制，我们不得不暂停这个项目。

en: She put her career on hold to raise her children.
cn: 她搁置事业以抚养孩子。

en: They decided to make love under the stars during their romantic getaway.
cn: 在浪漫的度假中，他们决定在星空下做爱。

en: After a long day, they just wanted to relax and make love.
cn: 漫长的一天后，他们只想放松并做爱。

en: The corrupt politician finally got his comeuppance when he was sentenced to prison.
cn: 这位腐败的政客最终得到了应有的惩罚，被判入狱。

en: After years of bullying others, she got her comeuppance when she lost her job.
cn: 多年来欺负他人后，她丢了工作，得到了报应。

en: Portland is a medium-sized city known for its vibrant arts scene.
cn: 波特兰是一个中等规模的城市，以其充满活力的艺术氛围而闻名。

en: Living in a medium-sized city offers a balance between urban amenities and a slower pace.
cn: 生活在中等规模的城市提供了城市便利和较慢生活节奏之间的平衡。

en: The teacher discouraged the students from cheating on the exam.
cn: 老师劝阻学生考试作弊。

en: High costs often discourage people from traveling abroad.
cn: 高昂的费用常常劝阻人们出国旅行。

en: After the vaccine, she was immune to the flu virus.
cn: 接种疫苗后，她对流感病毒免疫了。

en: He seems to be immune to criticism and never gets upset.
cn: 他似乎对批评免疫，从不生气。

en: She supplements her diet with vitamin D during the winter months.
cn: 她在冬季用维生素D补充饮食。

en: The report was supplemented with additional data from recent studies.
cn: 报告用最近研究中的额外数据进行了补充。

en: The company is open to new ideas from all employees.
cn: 公司对所有员工的新想法持开放态度。

en: I am open to suggestions on how to improve the project.
cn: 我愿意接受如何改进项目的建议。

en: The decision comes down to whether we can afford it.
cn: 这个决定归结为我们是否能负担得起。

en: In the end, it all comes down to trust in the relationship.
cn: 最终，一切都归结为关系中的信任。

en: The hotel aims to cater for the needs of travellers by offering multilingual staff.
cn: 这家酒店旨在通过提供多语言员工来满足旅行者的需求。

en: Airports must cater for the needs of travellers with disabilities.
cn: 机场必须满足残疾旅行者的需求。

en: The company tried to cover up the financial scandal.
cn: 公司试图掩盖财务丑闻。

en: She used makeup to cover up the bruise on her face.
cn: 她用化妆品掩盖脸上的瘀伤。

en: The factory workers are on strike for better wages.
cn: 工厂工人正在罢工，要求更高的工资。

en: Public transport was disrupted because the drivers were on strike.
cn: 公共交通中断，因为司机在罢工。

en: Even though he made a mistake, he has his heart in the right place and meant well.
cn: 尽管他犯了错误，但他心地善良，本意是好的。

en: She may be clumsy, but she has her heart in the right place and always tries to help.
cn: 她可能笨拙，但心地善良，总是尽力帮忙。

en: I have no time for gossip and prefer to focus on work.
cn: 我没有时间闲聊，更喜欢专注于工作。

en: She has no time for people who are always complaining.
cn: 她对总是抱怨的人没有耐心。

en: The community fought against the construction of the new highway.
cn: 社区对抗新高速公路的建设。

en: She has been fighting against cancer for years.
cn: 她多年来一直在与癌症作斗争。

en: She studied under a famous scientist during her PhD.
cn: 她在博士期间在一位著名科学家的指导下学习。

en: Many artists study under masters to hone their skills.
cn: 许多艺术家在大师指导下学习以磨练技能。

en: I prefer to read a book rather than watch TV in the evening.
cn: 我晚上宁愿看书而不愿看电视。

en: She prefers to travel by train rather than fly because it's more scenic.
cn: 她宁愿坐火车旅行而不愿坐飞机，因为风景更好。

en: She had a telephone interview for the remote job position.
cn: 她为远程职位进行了电话面试。

en: The first round of the hiring process is usually a telephone interview.
cn: 招聘过程的第一轮通常是电话面试。

en: He turned down the job offer because it required too much travel.
cn: 他拒绝了这份工作邀请，因为它需要太多出差。

en: She turned down his proposal, saying she wasn't ready for marriage.
cn: 她拒绝了他的求婚，说她还没准备好结婚。

en: The success of the project is dependent upon securing adequate funding.
cn: 项目的成功取决于能否获得足够的资金。

en: Many plants are dependent upon sunlight for photosynthesis.
cn: 许多植物依赖阳光进行光合作用。

en: She planned to get back at her colleague for spreading rumors.
cn: 她计划报复散布谣言的同事。

en: He got back at his friend by playing a prank on him.
cn: 他通过恶作剧报复了他的朋友。

en: Thus far, the project has been progressing smoothly.
cn: 迄今为止，项目进展顺利。

en: He has not received any complaints thus far.
cn: 到目前为止，他还没有收到任何投诉。

en: We need to get out of the house before it starts raining.
cn: 我们需要在下雨前离开房子。

en: Get out of the car and check the engine.
cn: 下车检查发动机。

en: The party turned out to be a huge success.
cn: 派对结果非常成功。

en: It turned out that he had been lying all along.
cn: 结果证明他一直在撒谎。

en: The decision will come down to which option is more cost-effective.
cn: 决定将归结为哪个选项更具成本效益。

en: It all comes down to whether you trust him or not.
cn: 这一切都归结为你是否信任他。

en: If the new plan fails, we can always fall back on the old one.
cn: 如果新计划失败，我们总可以依靠旧计划。

en: She has savings to fall back on in case of emergencies.
cn: 她有储蓄可以在紧急情况下依靠。

en: Smartphones are common wireless devices used for communication.
cn: 智能手机是用于通信的常见无线设备。

en: The office is equipped with various wireless devices like routers and printers.
cn: 办公室配备了各种无线设备，如路由器和打印机。

en: The education system in this country emphasizes critical thinking.
cn: 这个国家的教育体系强调批判性思维。

en: Reforms are needed to improve the education system.
cn: 需要改革来改善教育体系。

en: Government action is required to address climate change.
cn: 需要政府行动来应对气候变化。

en: The new law is a result of government action on public safety.
cn: 新法律是政府在公共安全方面采取行动的结果。

en: His decision has nothing to do with your opinion.
cn: 他的决定与你的意见无关。

en: The accident had nothing to do with mechanical failure.
cn: 事故与机械故障无关。

en: I can't make heads or tails of these instructions.
cn: 我无法理解这些说明。

en: He tried to make heads or tails of the complex data.
cn: 他试图弄明白这些复杂的数据。

en: She has a good relationship with her colleagues at work.
cn: 她与工作上的同事关系良好。

en: It's important to have a good relationship with your neighbors.
cn: 与邻居关系良好很重要。

en: It was such a beautiful day that we decided to go for a picnic.
cn: 天气如此美好，以至于我们决定去野餐。

en: He made such a convincing argument that everyone agreed with him.
cn: 他的论点如此有说服力，以至于每个人都同意他。

en: Proper disposal of hazardous waste is essential for environmental protection.
cn: 妥善处理危险废物对环境保护至关重要。

en: The factory produces hazardous waste that must be handled carefully.
cn: 工厂产生必须小心处理的危险废物。

en: Police officers are authorized to carry firearms for protection.
cn: 警察被授权携带枪支以保护自己。

en: It is illegal to carry firearms in this area without a permit.
cn: 未经许可在此区域携带枪支是违法的。

en: New employees need time to fit into the workplace culture.
cn: 新员工需要时间来适应职场文化。

en: Her skills fit well into the workplace requirements.
cn: 她的技能很好地适应了职场要求。

en: The refreshments were provided courtesy of the local bakery.
cn: 茶点由当地面包店提供。

en: This opportunity came courtesy of a generous donor.
cn: 这个机会承蒙一位慷慨捐赠者的好意。

en: During the crisis, it's important to keep cool and think clearly.
cn: 在危机期间，保持冷静并清晰思考很重要。

en: She managed to keep cool even when everyone else was panicking.
cn: 即使其他人都惊慌失措，她也能保持镇定。

en: He persists in practicing the piano every day despite the challenges.
cn: 尽管有挑战，他仍坚持每天练习钢琴。

en: If you persist in studying hard, you will eventually succeed.
cn: 如果你坚持努力学习，最终会成功的。

en: The company faces stiff competition from new startups in the market.
cn: 这家公司面临市场上新创业公司的激烈竞争。

en: There is stiff competition for the championship title this season.
cn: 本赛季冠军头衔的竞争非常激烈。

en: Scientists are working hard to cure diseases like cancer.
cn: 科学家们正在努力治愈癌症等疾病。

en: Advances in medicine have helped cure many infectious diseases.
cn: 医学的进步帮助治愈了许多传染病。

en: Organic chemistry is the study of carbon-based compounds.
cn: 有机化学是研究碳基化合物的学科。

en: She excelled in organic chemistry during her university studies.
cn: 她在大学学习期间在有机化学方面表现出色。

en: The company hired a marketing consultant to improve its advertising strategy.
cn: 公司聘请了一位营销顾问来改进其广告策略。

en: As a marketing consultant, she advises clients on brand development.
cn: 作为一名营销顾问，她就品牌发展向客户提供建议。

en: The meeting will last at the longest two hours.
cn: 会议最多持续两个小时。

en: You can borrow the book for at the longest one week.
cn: 这本书你最多可以借一周。

en: After years of struggling, he finally gave up the ghost and quit the project.
cn: 经过多年的挣扎，他终于放弃并退出了这个项目。

en: The old car gave up the ghost on the highway and stopped working.
cn: 那辆旧车在高速公路上报废了，停止工作了。

en: I had a custom dress made for the wedding.
cn: 我为婚礼定制了一件连衣裙。

en: They had the furniture made by a local carpenter.
cn: 他们让当地木匠制作了家具。

en: She models her leadership style on her mentor's approach.
cn: 她以导师的方法为榜样来塑造自己的领导风格。

en: The new policy is modeled on successful practices from other countries.
cn: 新政策模仿了其他国家的成功做法。

en: He was just going through the motions at work, not really putting in effort.
cn: 他在工作中只是敷衍了事，并没有真正投入努力。

en: She went through the motions of apologizing without meaning it.
cn: 她敷衍地道歉，并非真心实意。

en: The room was filled with laughter during the party.
cn: 派对期间，房间里充满了笑声。

en: Her heart is filled with gratitude for the support she received.
cn: 她的心中充满了对所获支持的感激之情。

en: No matter how hard it gets, don't give up on your dreams.
cn: 无论多么困难，都不要放弃你的梦想。

en: She will help you no matter how busy she is.
cn: 无论她多忙，都会帮助你。

en: He cast about for a new job after being laid off.
cn: 被解雇后，他四处寻找新工作。

en: She cast about for ideas to solve the problem.
cn: 她四处寻找解决问题的办法。

en: The constant friction wears away the surface of the stone.
cn: 持续的摩擦磨损了石头的表面。

en: Over time, the inscription on the monument has worn away.
cn: 随着时间的推移，纪念碑上的铭文已经磨损了。

en: He rushed to the station only to find that the train had already left.
cn: 他冲到车站，结果却发现火车已经开走了。

en: She studied hard for the exam only to fail by one point.
cn: 她为考试努力学习，结果却以一分之差不及格。

en: Owning a luxury car is often seen as a status symbol in many societies.
cn: 在许多社会中，拥有一辆豪车常被视为地位象征。

en: In some cultures, expensive jewelry serves as a status symbol among the elite.
cn: 在某些文化中，昂贵的珠宝在精英阶层中充当地位象征。

en: The company produces goods on a large scale to meet global demand.
cn: 这家公司大规模生产商品以满足全球需求。

en: The government implemented the policy on a large scale across the country.
cn: 政府在全国范围内大规模实施了这项政策。

en: We need to find ways to reduce costs without sacrificing quality.
cn: 我们需要找到在不牺牲质量的情况下降低成本的方法。

en: She always finds ways to motivate her team.
cn: 她总能找到激励团队的方法。

en: The cost of the project is in the neighbourhood of $10,000.
cn: 这个项目的成本大约为一万美元。

en: She lives in the neighbourhood of the city center.
cn: 她住在市中心附近。

en: Good management skills are essential for running a successful team.
cn: 良好的管理技能对于成功领导团队至关重要。

en: She improved her management skills through years of experience in the industry.
cn: 通过多年行业经验，她提升了自己的管理技能。

en: He remained calm in the face of adversity.
cn: 面对逆境，他保持冷静。

en: The team showed great resilience in the face of criticism.
cn: 面对批评，团队表现出极大的韧性。

en: We are short of staff for the upcoming project.
cn: 对于即将到来的项目，我们人手不足。

en: The company fell short of its sales targets this quarter.
cn: 公司本季度未达到销售目标。

en: We need to be off by 6 AM to catch the early train.
cn: 我们需要在早上6点前出发以赶上早班火车。

en: She was off to the market to buy some groceries.
cn: 她出发去市场买些杂货。

en: All their transactions are above board and fully documented.
cn: 他们所有的交易都光明正大且有完整记录。

en: We ensure that our business practices are always above board.
cn: 我们确保商业行为始终光明正大。

en: He found himself in hot water after missing the deadline.
cn: 错过截止日期后，他发现自己陷入了麻烦。

en: The company is in hot water over the recent scandal.
cn: 由于最近的丑闻，公司陷入了困境。

en: A smooth gear change is important for efficient driving.
cn: 平稳换挡对于高效驾驶很重要。

en: He struggled with the gear change when learning to drive a manual car.
cn: 学习开手动车时，他在换挡上遇到了困难。

en: There was a lack of effort on the part of the team.
cn: 在团队方面，努力不足。

en: Any mistakes on the part of the management will be addressed promptly.
cn: 管理方面的任何错误都将及时处理。

en: The city is named after a famous historical figure.
cn: 这座城市以一位著名的历史人物命名。

en: The species was named after its discoverer.
cn: 这个物种以其发现者命名。

en: The market was flooded with fake products that deceived many consumers.
cn: 市场上充斥着欺骗许多消费者的假冒产品。

en: Authorities seized a shipment of fake products at the border.
cn: 当局在边境查获了一批假冒产品。

en: The sun emerged from behind the clouds.
cn: 太阳从云层后出现。

en: She emerged from the meeting with a clear plan.
cn: 她从会议中出来，有了清晰的计划。

en: She prefers to keep strangers at a distance until she gets to know them.
cn: 在了解陌生人之前，她倾向于与他们保持距离。

en: It's wise to keep potential risks at a distance in business dealings.
cn: 在商业交易中，与潜在风险保持距离是明智的。

en: Farmers cultivate crops such as wheat and corn in this region.
cn: 农民在这个地区种植小麦和玉米等作物。

en: They use sustainable methods to cultivate crops without harming the environment.
cn: 他们使用可持续方法种植作物，不损害环境。

en: He failed to submit the report on time, and as a consequence, he faced penalties.
cn: 他未能按时提交报告，因此面临处罚。

en: The road was closed, and as a consequence, traffic was diverted.
cn: 道路封闭，因此交通改道。

en: It's never acceptable to be rude to customers.
cn: 对顾客粗鲁是绝不可接受的。

en: She apologized for being rude to her colleague during the argument.
cn: 她为在争论中对同事粗鲁而道歉。

en: Please respond to the email without delay.
cn: 请立即回复这封邮件。

en: The emergency services arrived without delay after the call.
cn: 紧急服务在接到电话后立即到达。

en: He used his arms to break his fall when he slipped on the ice.
cn: 在冰上滑倒时，他用胳膊缓冲了坠落。

en: The soft ground helped break her fall and prevent serious injury.
cn: 柔软的地面帮助缓冲了她的坠落，防止了严重受伤。

en: The protest got out of control and turned violent.
cn: 抗议失控并变得暴力。

en: If you don't manage your budget, your spending can get out of control.
cn: 如果不管理预算，你的支出可能会失控。

en: Students benefit by participating in extracurricular activities.
cn: 学生通过参加课外活动受益。

en: The company will benefit by implementing new technology.
cn: 公司通过实施新技术将受益。

en: The bird's colorful plumage is a distinctive characteristic.
cn: 这只鸟色彩鲜艳的羽毛是一个显著特征。

en: His sense of humor is a distinctive characteristic that everyone notices.
cn: 他的幽默感是每个人都注意到的显著特征。

en: Let's settle up the bill before we leave the restaurant.
cn: 我们离开餐厅前把账单结清吧。

en: They settled up their debts after the business deal.
cn: 他们在商业交易后结清了债务。

en: She centered her attention on the speaker's main argument.
cn: 她把注意力集中在演讲者的主要论点上。

en: During meditation, try to center your attention on your breathing.
cn: 冥想时，试着将注意力集中在呼吸上。

en: He fixed my computer for nothing, as a favor.
cn: 他免费修好了我的电脑，作为帮忙。

en: All our efforts were for nothing when the project was canceled.
cn: 项目取消时，我们所有的努力都白费了。

en: The scary movie made me get goose bumps.
cn: 那部恐怖电影让我起鸡皮疙瘩。

en: Listening to her beautiful singing gave me goose bumps.
cn: 听她美妙的歌声让我起鸡皮疙瘩。

en: The ambitious project came to grief due to lack of funding.
cn: 这个雄心勃勃的项目因缺乏资金而失败。

en: He came to grief when his car skidded on the icy road.
cn: 当他的车在结冰的路上打滑时，他遭遇了不幸。

en: I made a mistake, so I need to do the assignment over.
cn: 我犯了个错误，所以需要重做这个作业。

en: They decided to do the experiment over to ensure accuracy.
cn: 他们决定重做实验以确保准确性。

en: The meeting dragged out for hours without a conclusion.
cn: 会议拖延了几个小时没有结论。

en: Don't drag out the decision-making process; we need to act quickly.
cn: 不要拖延决策过程；我们需要迅速行动。

en: Set aside some money each month for emergencies.
cn: 每月留出一些钱以备紧急情况。

en: We need to set aside time to discuss this issue.
cn: 我们需要留出时间来讨论这个问题。

en: It rained all day yesterday, so we stayed indoors.
cn: 昨天下了一整天的雨，所以我们待在室内。

en: She worked on the report all day without a break.
cn: 她一整天都在写报告，没有休息。

en: Please return the book at your convenience.
cn: 请在您方便的时候归还这本书。

en: We can schedule the meeting at your convenience.
cn: 我们可以在您方便的时候安排会议。

en: He has an itching palm and is always looking for ways to make extra money.
cn: 他贪财，总是在寻找赚外快的方法。

en: Politicians with itching palms are often involved in corruption.
cn: 贪财的政客常常涉及腐败。

en: If you don't like my ideas, you can take a hike.
cn: 如果你不喜欢我的想法，你可以走开。

en: He told the annoying salesman to take a hike.
cn: 他告诉那个烦人的推销员走开。

en: We need to build on our previous successes to achieve more.
cn: 我们需要在以往成功的基础上发展，以取得更多成就。

en: The new theory builds on earlier research in the field.
cn: 新理论建立在该领域早期研究的基础上。

en: The children threw a ball at each other in the park.
cn: 孩子们在公园里互相扔球。

en: He threw a stone at the window, breaking it.
cn: 他向窗户扔了一块石头，打破了它。

en: The teacher was pleased with the students' progress.
cn: 老师对学生的进步感到满意。

en: I am pleased with the results of the project.
cn: 我对项目的结果感到满意。

en: She put her language skills to use by working as a translator.
cn: 她通过担任翻译来利用她的语言技能。

en: We should put this old equipment to use instead of throwing it away.
cn: 我们应该利用这台旧设备，而不是扔掉它。

en: The store offered a replacement for the defective product.
cn: 商店为有缺陷的产品提供了替换品。

en: If the item is damaged, we can offer a replacement or a refund.
cn: 如果物品损坏，我们可以提供替换品或退款。

en: The garbage collector comes every Tuesday to pick up our trash.
cn: 垃圾收集者每周二来收我们的垃圾。

en: He works as a garbage collector and starts his shift at 5 AM.
cn: 他是一名垃圾收集者，早上5点开始工作。

en: I was scared to death when I saw the spider crawling on my pillow.
cn: 当我看到蜘蛛在我枕头上爬时，我吓得要死。

en: The loud thunder scared the children to death during the storm.
cn: 雷声大作时，孩子们被吓得要死。

en: He went overboard with the decorations and spent thousands of dollars.
cn: 他在装饰上做得太过分，花了好几千美元。

en: Don't go overboard with the spices, or the dish will be too spicy.
cn: 别放太多香料，否则这道菜会太辣。

en: Bell-bottom pants are out of fashion now, but they were popular in the 1970s.
cn: 喇叭裤现在已经过时了，但在20世纪70年代很流行。

en: That hairstyle is completely out of fashion; you should try something more modern.
cn: 那个发型完全过时了，你应该试试更现代的发型。

en: To start with, let's review the agenda for today's meeting.
cn: 首先，让我们回顾一下今天会议的议程。

en: We only had $100 to start with, but we managed to grow the business.
cn: 一开始我们只有100美元，但我们设法扩大了业务。

en: As a full-time student, she takes at least 12 credits per semester.
cn: 作为一名全日制学生，她每学期至少修12个学分。

en: He works part-time while being a full-time student to pay for his tuition.
cn: 他在做全日制学生的同时兼职工作来支付学费。

en: She plans to retire from teaching next year after 30 years of service.
cn: 她计划在服务30年后明年从教学岗位退休。

en: He retired from the military and now enjoys a quiet life in the countryside.
cn: 他从军队退休，现在在乡村享受宁静的生活。

en: They kept me in the dark about the surprise party until the last minute.
cn: 他们对我隐瞒了惊喜派对的事，直到最后一刻。

en: The public was left in the dark about the company's financial troubles.
cn: 公众对公司的财务困境一无所知。

en: Despite their divorce, they remain on good terms for the sake of their children.
cn: 尽管离婚了，但为了孩子，他们仍然保持良好关系。

en: It's important to be on good terms with your neighbors.
cn: 与邻居保持良好关系很重要。

en: The dog likes to chew on bones to keep its teeth clean.
cn: 这只狗喜欢啃骨头来保持牙齿清洁。

en: Make sure to chew on your food thoroughly before swallowing.
cn: 确保在吞咽前彻底咀嚼食物。

en: They offered the software for free to attract more users.
cn: 他们免费提供该软件以吸引更多用户。

en: You can download the e-book for free from the website.
cn: 你可以从网站上免费下载这本电子书。

en: Don't waste your money on unnecessary gadgets.
cn: 别把钱浪费在不必要的小玩意上。

en: He wasted three hours on a project that was later canceled.
cn: 他在一个后来被取消的项目上浪费了三个小时。

en: She has a great deal of experience in marketing.
cn: 她在市场营销方面有丰富的经验。

en: The project requires a great deal of time and effort.
cn: 这个项目需要大量的时间和精力。

en: I'm not in the mood for a movie tonight; let's just stay home.
cn: 我今晚没心情看电影，我们就待在家里吧。

en: She was not in the mood for small talk after a long day at work.
cn: 工作了一整天后，她没心情闲聊。

en: All employees must adhere to the company regulations regarding dress code.
cn: 所有员工必须遵守公司关于着装的规定。

en: The new company regulations were introduced to improve workplace safety.
cn: 引入了新的公司规章制度以提高工作场所安全。

en: She gave birth to a healthy baby boy last night.
cn: 她昨晚生下了一个健康的男婴。

en: The panda gave birth to twins at the zoo.
cn: 这只熊猫在动物园产下了一对双胞胎。

en: Let's get this straight: you are responsible for the report, not me.
cn: 让我们弄清楚：你负责这份报告，不是我。

en: I need to get the facts straight before I can make a decision.
cn: 我需要先弄清楚事实才能做决定。

en: The committee voted in favour of the new policy.
cn: 委员会投票支持新政策。

en: I am in favour of reducing plastic waste.
cn: 我赞成减少塑料垃圾。

en: The building has a handicapped toilet on the ground floor.
cn: 这栋楼的一楼有一个残疾人厕所。

en: Please reserve the handicapped toilet for those with disabilities.
cn: 请将残疾人厕所留给残障人士使用。

en: I would sooner walk than take the bus in this traffic.
cn: 在这种交通状况下，我宁愿走路也不坐公交车。

en: She would sooner resign than work under such unfair conditions.
cn: 她宁愿辞职也不愿在如此不公平的条件下工作。

en: I'm still on the fence about whether to accept the job offer.
cn: 我还在犹豫是否接受这份工作邀请。

en: Many voters are on the fence before the election.
cn: 许多选民在选举前持观望态度。

en: After moving to the countryside, they put down roots and started a farm.
cn: 搬到乡下后，他们扎根下来并开始经营农场。

en: It's time to put down roots and buy a house in this city.
cn: 是时候在这个城市扎根并买房子了。

en: Students should make notes during the lecture to review later.
cn: 学生应该在讲座期间做笔记以便之后复习。

en: I made notes of the key points from the meeting.
cn: 我记录了会议的关键点。

en: Please submit your application to the admissions office by Friday.
cn: 请在周五前将你的申请提交给招生办公室。

en: He submitted the report to his manager for approval.
cn: 他将报告提交给经理审批。

en: You need two passport photos for the visa application.
cn: 申请签证需要两张护照照片。

en: The passport photo must meet specific size and background requirements.
cn: 护照照片必须符合特定的尺寸和背景要求。

en: She had hold of the rope tightly to avoid falling.
cn: 她紧紧抓住绳子以防摔倒。

en: The child had hold of his mother's hand in the crowd.
cn: 孩子在人群中紧紧握住妈妈的手。

en: The store specializes in selling hi-tech products like smartphones and drones.
cn: 这家商店专门销售智能手机和无人机等高科技产品。

en: Investing in hi-tech products can be profitable but risky.
cn: 投资高科技产品可能有利可图但也有风险。

en: Fans swarmed into the stadium for the concert.
cn: 粉丝们蜂拥而入体育场参加音乐会。

en: Tourists swarm into the city during the holiday season.
cn: 游客在假日季节大量涌入这座城市。

en: In the main, the project was a success despite some minor issues.
cn: 大体上，尽管有一些小问题，这个项目是成功的。

en: The report is accurate in the main, but needs a few corrections.
cn: 这份报告大体上是准确的，但需要一些修正。

en: The artist conveys emotions to the audience through her paintings.
cn: 这位艺术家通过她的画作向观众传达情感。

en: He conveyed his gratitude to his friends with a heartfelt speech.
cn: 他用真挚的演讲向朋友们传达了他的感激之情。

en: I will be away from the office next week on vacation.
cn: 我下周将离开办公室去度假。

en: She has been away from home for months due to work.
cn: 由于工作，她已经离开家好几个月了。

en: Employees are entitled to paid vacation days.
cn: 员工有权享有带薪休假。

en: As a citizen, you are entitled to vote in elections.
cn: 作为公民，你有权在选举中投票。

en: If you don't study, you run the risk of failing the exam.
cn: 如果你不学习，你就有考试不及格的风险。

en: Investing in stocks runs the risk of losing money.
cn: 投资股票有亏钱的风险。

en: The party was held in celebration of her graduation.
cn: 这个派对是为庆祝她毕业而举行的。

en: Fireworks are set off in celebration of the New Year.
cn: 燃放烟花是为了庆祝新年。

en: I am proud of my daughter for winning the competition.
cn: 我为女儿赢得比赛感到自豪。

en: They are proud of their country's achievements.
cn: 他们为自己国家的成就感到自豪。

en: She exerted herself to finish the project on time.
cn: 她努力按时完成这个项目。

en: Athletes exert themselves to achieve their best performance.
cn: 运动员们努力达到最佳表现。

en: After winning three lotteries, he felt his luck had run out when he lost his job.
cn: 中了三次彩票后，他丢了工作，感觉运气已经用尽了。

en: The gambler knew his luck had run out when he lost all his savings in one night.
cn: 赌徒一夜之间输光了所有积蓄，知道自己的运气已经到头了。

en: At quitting time, employees quickly packed up and left the office.
cn: 下班时间一到，员工们迅速收拾东西离开办公室。

en: The factory's quitting time is 5 PM sharp every day.
cn: 工厂的下班时间是每天下午5点整。

en: Keep the first aid kit at hand in case of emergencies.
cn: 把急救箱放在手边，以备紧急情况使用。

en: She always has a notebook at hand to jot down ideas.
cn: 她总是把笔记本放在手边，以便随时记下想法。

en: With regard to your inquiry, we will respond within 24 hours.
cn: 关于您的询问，我们将在24小时内回复。

en: The report provides details with regard to the company's financial performance.
cn: 这份报告提供了关于公司财务表现的详细信息。

en: During the storm, we were shut in the house for safety.
cn: 暴风雨期间，我们为了安全被关在房子里。

en: The cat was shut in the room accidentally and meowed loudly.
cn: 猫被意外关在房间里，大声喵喵叫。

en: The entrepreneur made a pitch to investors for funding her startup.
cn: 这位企业家向投资者推销，为她的初创公司争取资金。

en: He made a pitch for the new product during the sales meeting.
cn: 他在销售会议上为新产品的推广做了宣传。

en: She is in the habit of reading a book before bed every night.
cn: 她习惯于每晚睡前读一本书。

en: He is in the habit of checking his email first thing in the morning.
cn: 他习惯于早上第一件事就是查看电子邮件。

en: The bird flew out of sight behind the trees.
cn: 鸟飞到了树后，看不见了。

en: Keep the medicine out of sight of children to prevent accidents.
cn: 把药放在孩子看不见的地方，以防意外。

en: He had to bend over to pick up the coin from the floor.
cn: 他不得不弯腰从地板上捡起硬币。

en: She bent over to tie her shoelaces before starting the run.
cn: 她在开始跑步前弯腰系鞋带。

en: He often boasts of his wealth and expensive possessions.
cn: 他经常夸耀自己的财富和昂贵的财产。

en: She boasted of her academic achievements during the interview.
cn: 她在面试中吹嘘了自己的学术成就。

en: The store will stay open until midnight during the holiday season.
cn: 假日期间，商店将一直营业到午夜。

en: Please leave the window stay open to let in some fresh air.
cn: 请让窗户保持打开，让新鲜空气进来。

en: Banks and credit unions are common types of financial institutions.
cn: 银行和信用合作社是常见的金融机构类型。

en: The government regulates financial institutions to ensure stability.
cn: 政府监管金融机构以确保稳定。

en: I can't make out the words on the sign from this distance.
cn: 从这个距离我辨认不出标志上的字。

en: It was hard to make out what she was saying in the noisy room.
cn: 在嘈杂的房间里，很难理解她在说什么。

en: Visiting the theme park was a pleasurable experience for the whole family.
cn: 参观主题公园对全家人来说是一次愉快的经历。

en: Reading a good book by the fireplace is always a pleasurable experience.
cn: 在壁炉旁读一本好书总是一种愉快的经历。

en: Whales and dolphins are examples of large marine animals.
cn: 鲸鱼和海豚是大型海洋动物的例子。

en: The aquarium showcases a variety of marine animals from different oceans.
cn: 水族馆展示了来自不同海洋的各种海洋动物。

en: The new employee didn't measure up to the company's expectations.
cn: 新员工没有达到公司的期望。

en: This product measures up well against its competitors.
cn: 这款产品在与竞争对手的比较中表现出色。

en: You have no business criticizing her decisions without knowing the facts.
cn: 在不了解事实的情况下，你无权批评她的决定。

en: He has no business entering the restricted area without permission.
cn: 他未经许可无权进入限制区域。

en: This is the hottest summer on record for the region.
cn: 这是该地区有记录以来最热的夏天。

en: Her statement is on record with the police as evidence.
cn: 她的陈述作为证据被警方正式记录在案。

en: The rocket successfully pulled the satellite into orbit.
cn: 火箭成功将卫星拉入轨道。

en: They plan to pull the space station into a higher orbit.
cn: 他们计划将空间站拉入更高的轨道。

en: The investigation showed that the driver was at fault for the accident.
cn: 调查显示司机对这起事故负有责任。

en: If the product fails, the manufacturer may be at fault.
cn: 如果产品失效，制造商可能有过错。

en: The company had to cut back on expenses to survive the crisis.
cn: 公司不得不削减开支以度过危机。

en: We need to cut back our carbon emissions to protect the environment.
cn: 我们需要减少碳排放以保护环境。

en: She is partial to chocolate ice cream over other flavors.
cn: 她偏爱巧克力冰淇淋胜过其他口味。

en: He is partial to classical music and attends concerts regularly.
cn: 他特别喜欢古典音乐，定期参加音乐会。

en: The community rallied around the family after the fire.
cn: 火灾后，社区团结起来支持这个家庭。

en: Fans rallied around the team during their losing streak.
cn: 在球队连败期间，球迷们团结起来支持他们。

en: I hope you can see your way clear to helping us with this project.
cn: 我希望你能找到方法来帮助我们完成这个项目。

en: After careful consideration, she saw her way clear to accepting the offer.
cn: 经过仔细考虑，她找到了接受这个提议的方法。

en: The new evidence sheds light on the mysterious disappearance.
cn: 新证据阐明了这起神秘失踪事件。

en: This study sheds light on the causes of climate change.
cn: 这项研究阐明了气候变化的原因。

en: I will complete the task to the best of my ability.
cn: 我会尽我最大努力完成这项任务。

en: She always performs to the best of her ability in every competition.
cn: 她在每次比赛中都尽自己最大努力去表现。

en: Their constant arguments drove them apart over time.
cn: 他们不断的争吵最终导致他们分开了。

en: Political differences can drive friends apart.
cn: 政治分歧可能导致朋友之间产生隔阂。

en: The building was on fire, and firefighters rushed to the scene.
cn: 大楼着火了，消防员迅速赶到现场。

en: Be careful with that candle, or the curtains might catch on fire.
cn: 小心那支蜡烛，否则窗帘可能会着火。

en: You need to snap out of this depression and start living again.
cn: 你需要摆脱这种抑郁状态，重新开始生活。

en: He snapped out of his daydream when the phone rang.
cn: 电话铃响时，他迅速从白日梦中回过神来。

en: After much discussion, they decided upon a plan of action.
cn: 经过多次讨论，他们决定了一个行动计划。

en: We need to decide upon a date for the meeting.
cn: 我们需要决定一个会议日期。

en: Her excellent performance put all the other competitors to shame.
cn: 她出色的表现让所有其他竞争者相形见绌。

en: His generosity put my selfishness to shame.
cn: 他的慷慨让我为自己的自私感到羞愧。

en: Bring an umbrella, just to be on the safe side.
cn: 带把伞吧，以防万一。

en: To be on the safe side, we should arrive at the airport two hours early.
cn: 为安全起见，我们应该提前两小时到达机场。

en: The car crashed into a tree on the side of the road.
cn: 汽车撞上了路边的一棵树。

en: Two planes nearly crashed into each other in mid-air.
cn: 两架飞机差点在空中相撞。

en: The university offers a wide range of academic courses in the sciences.
cn: 这所大学提供广泛的科学类学术课程。

en: Students must complete certain academic courses to graduate.
cn: 学生必须完成特定的学术课程才能毕业。

en: What should we do with all this leftover food?
cn: 我们该怎么处理这些剩菜？

en: I don't know what to do with this difficult situation.
cn: 我不知道该如何应对这个困难局面。

en: Internships help students improve their practical skills in real-world settings.
cn: 实习帮助学生在实际环境中提高实践技能。

en: He took a course to improve his practical skills in carpentry.
cn: 他参加了一门课程来提高木工实践技能。

en: As the CEO, she calls the shots in the company.
cn: 作为首席执行官，她在公司里发号施令。

en: In this family, my grandmother calls the shots.
cn: 在这个家庭里，我祖母说了算。

en: This new restaurant is very popular with young people.
cn: 这家新餐厅很受年轻人欢迎。

en: The teacher is popular with students because of her engaging lessons.
cn: 这位老师因其引人入胜的课程而受学生欢迎。

en: She got into the habit of reading before bed.
cn: 她养成了睡前阅读的习惯。

en: He's trying to get into the habit of exercising daily.
cn: 他正努力养成每天锻炼的习惯。

en: The suspenseful movie had us on tenterhooks until the end.
cn: 这部悬疑电影让我们一直悬着心直到结束。

en: The delayed results had the students on tenterhooks.
cn: 延迟公布的结果让学生们焦虑不安。

en: The police rounded up the suspects.
cn: 警察围捕了嫌疑人。

en: Round up the total to the nearest dollar.
cn: 将总数四舍五入到最接近的美元。

en: The criminal was sentenced to death for murder.
cn: 这名罪犯因谋杀被判处死刑。

en: In some countries, drug traffickers can be sentenced to death.
cn: 在一些国家，毒贩可能被判处死刑。

en: I'm busy preparing for the exam.
cn: 我正忙于准备考试。

en: She was busy cooking dinner when I called.
cn: 我打电话时她正忙着做晚饭。

en: The photo doesn't do justice to the beauty of the sunset.
cn: 这张照片没有充分展现日落的美丽。

en: He did justice to the role in the play.
cn: 他公正地演绎了剧中的角色。

en: The dog tore apart the old newspaper.
cn: 狗撕碎了旧报纸。

en: The scandal tore the family apart.
cn: 丑闻使这个家庭分裂了。

en: She put her success down to hard work.
cn: 她把成功归因于努力工作。

en: The delay was put down to bad weather.
cn: 延误被归因于恶劣天气。

en: The complex instructions made my head swim.
cn: 复杂的说明让我头晕。

en: All the technical jargon made her head swim.
cn: 所有的技术术语让她感到困惑。

en: We stand in awe of the majestic mountains.
cn: 我们对雄伟的山脉感到敬畏。

en: He stands in awe of his mentor's achievements.
cn: 他对导师的成就感到敬畏。

en: He called me out of the blue after years of no contact.
cn: 多年没联系后，他突然给我打了电话。

en: The job offer came out of the blue.
cn: 这份工作邀请来得出乎意料。

en: This movie is suitable for children.
cn: 这部电影适合儿童观看。

en: The tool is suitable for heavy-duty tasks.
cn: 这个工具适合重负荷任务。

en: She counted out the coins one by one.
cn: 她逐一数出了硬币。

en: You can count me out of the plan.
cn: 你可以把我排除在这个计划之外。

en: The company uses group interviews to assess teamwork skills.
cn: 公司使用小组面试来评估团队合作能力。

en: She felt nervous during the group interview.
cn: 她在小组面试中感到紧张。

en: It's illegal to carry weapons in this area.
cn: 在这个区域携带武器是违法的。

en: Soldiers often carry weapons for protection.
cn: 士兵通常携带武器以自卫。

en: He tangled with a difficult customer at work.
cn: 他在工作中与一位难缠的顾客发生了争执。

en: The vines tangled with the fence.
cn: 藤蔓与篱笆纠缠在一起。

en: The noise was too much for me to bear.
cn: 噪音太多，我无法忍受。

en: He ate too much cake and felt sick.
cn: 他吃了太多蛋糕，感到恶心。

en: There is strong resistance to the new policy.
cn: 对新政策有强烈的抵抗。

en: The material has high resistance to heat.
cn: 这种材料具有很高的耐热性。

en: The city implemented new policies to reduce traffic congestion during rush hours.
cn: 该市实施了新政策以减少高峰时段的交通拥堵。

en: Building more public transit options can help reduce traffic congestion in metropolitan areas.
cn: 建设更多公共交通选择有助于减少大都市区的交通拥堵。

en: News of the festival spread far and wide, attracting visitors from many countries.
cn: 节日的消息传播得很广，吸引了许多国家的游客。

en: He traveled far and wide in search of rare artifacts for his collection.
cn: 他到处旅行，为他的收藏寻找稀有文物。

en: After lying to his friend, he was filled with remorse and apologized immediately.
cn: 对朋友撒谎后，他充满悔恨并立即道歉。

en: She was filled with remorse for not visiting her grandmother more often.
cn: 她因没有更常看望祖母而充满悔恨。

en: We booked a direct flight to Paris.
cn: 我们预订了直飞巴黎的航班。

en: Direct flights are more convenient but often more expensive.
cn: 直飞航班更方便，但通常更贵。

en: The negotiations broke off when neither side could agree on the terms.
cn: 当双方无法就条款达成一致时，谈判中断了。

en: He broke off in the middle of his speech to answer a phone call.
cn: 他在演讲中途中断去接电话。

en: If you keep procrastinating, sooner or later you'll miss the deadline.
cn: 如果你继续拖延，迟早会错过截止日期。

en: Sooner or later, the truth about the scandal will come out.
cn: 关于丑闻的真相迟早会水落石出。

en: I need to get my book back from the library before it's overdue.
cn: 我需要在逾期前从图书馆取回我的书。

en: After the dispute was resolved, she managed to get her money back.
cn: 争议解决后，她设法取回了她的钱。

en: Several passengers suffered injuries in the car accident and were taken to the hospital.
cn: 几名乘客在车祸中受伤并被送往医院。

en: Athletes often suffer injuries during intense training sessions.
cn: 运动员在激烈训练中经常受伤。

en: The employee was shouted at by his boss for making a costly mistake.
cn: 这名员工因犯了一个代价高昂的错误而被老板大声呵斥。

en: Children should not be shouted at as it can harm their self-esteem.
cn: 不应该对孩子们大声呵斥，因为这可能损害他们的自尊心。

en: She requested to get time off from work to attend her sister's wedding.
cn: 她请求从工作中获得休假去参加姐姐的婚礼。

en: Employees can get time off from work for medical appointments with prior approval.
cn: 员工在事先批准后可以从工作中获得休假去看病。

en: It's important to keep an account of all business expenses for tax purposes.
cn: 为了税务目的，记录所有业务开支很重要。

en: She keeps an account of her daily activities in a journal.
cn: 她在日记中记录她的日常活动。

en: They had a close call when their car skidded on the icy road but managed to avoid a crash.
cn: 当他们的车在结冰的路面上打滑时，他们侥幸脱险，设法避免了撞车。

en: The hiker had a close call with a bear but escaped unharmed.
cn: 这名徒步旅行者与一只熊擦肩而过，但安然逃脱。

en: To what extent do you agree with the new policy?
cn: 你在多大程度上同意新政策？

en: The success of the project depends to a large extent on team collaboration.
cn: 项目的成功在很大程度上取决于团队合作。

en: When she suggested going for pizza, he said, 'You took the words right out of my mouth!'
cn: 当她建议去吃披萨时，他说：“你正好说出了我想说的话！”

en: I was about to complain about the service, but my friend took the words out of my mouth.
cn: 我正要抱怨服务，但我的朋友说出了我想说的话。

en: The manager will be available to answer questions after the meeting.
cn: 会议结束后，经理将有空回答问题。

en: This software is available to all employees for free.
cn: 这款软件免费供所有员工使用。

en: He put his success down to hard work and perseverance.
cn: 他将自己的成功归因于努力工作和坚持不懈。

en: The delay can be put down to bad weather conditions.
cn: 延误可以归因于恶劣的天气条件。

en: The activists campaigned to set free the captive dolphins.
cn: 活动家们发起运动以释放被捕获的海豚。

en: After serving his sentence, the prisoner was set free.
cn: 服刑后，这名囚犯被释放了。

en: The plan is, at best, a temporary solution to the problem.
cn: 这个计划充其量只是问题的临时解决方案。

en: His performance in the exam was mediocre at best.
cn: 他在考试中的表现最多算是平庸。

en: The new regulations will be carried into effect starting next month.
cn: 新规定将从下个月开始实施。

en: It took years to carry the peace treaty into effect after the war.
cn: 战争后，花了数年时间才实施和平条约。

en: She tried to talk her friend out of quitting his job without another offer.
cn: 她试图说服她的朋友在没有另一份工作机会的情况下不要辞职。

en: The doctor talked the patient out of undergoing unnecessary surgery.
cn: 医生说服患者放弃不必要的手术。

en: He tried to pass off the fake painting as an original.
cn: 他试图把这幅假画冒充成真品。

en: She passed off her friend's work as her own.
cn: 她把朋友的作品冒充为自己的。

en: Let's get a head start on the project by brainstorming ideas today.
cn: 我们今天通过头脑风暴来抢先开始这个项目。

en: She got a head start on her homework during the weekend.
cn: 她在周末提前开始了她的作业。

en: Daily prayer is an important religious practice in many faiths.
cn: 每日祈祷是许多宗教中重要的宗教实践。

en: The community gathers for religious practices every Sunday morning.
cn: 社区每周日早晨聚集进行宗教活动。

en: As far as I know, the meeting starts at 3 PM.
cn: 据我所知，会议下午三点开始。

en: As far as quality goes, this product is excellent.
cn: 就质量而言，这个产品非常出色。

en: He was denied entry to the club because he was under age.
cn: 他被拒绝进入俱乐部，因为他未成年。

en: It's illegal to sell alcohol to anyone under age.
cn: 向未成年人出售酒精是违法的。

en: Many Third World countries face challenges like poverty and lack of infrastructure.
cn: 许多第三世界国家面临贫困和基础设施不足等挑战。

en: Aid organizations often focus on helping Third World countries.
cn: 援助组织通常专注于帮助第三世界国家。

en: Email has become a common means of communication in business.
cn: 电子邮件已成为商业中常见的沟通方式。

en: Sign language is an important means of communication for the deaf.
cn: 手语是聋人重要的沟通方式。

en: She longs for the peaceful days of her childhood.
cn: 她渴望童年那些平静的日子。

en: I long for a vacation after this busy project.
cn: 这个繁忙的项目结束后，我渴望去度假。

en: We have a lay over in Dubai before continuing to Sydney.
cn: 我们在迪拜中途停留，然后继续前往悉尼。

en: The flight includes a lay over of three hours in Tokyo.
cn: 这次航班包括在东京三小时的中途停留。

en: In retrospect, I should have studied harder for the exam.
cn: 回顾起来，我本应该为考试更努力学习的。

en: In retrospect, the decision to move was a good one.
cn: 事后看来，搬家的决定是正确的。

en: We use plastic trash bags to dispose of household waste.
cn: 我们用塑料垃圾袋来处理家庭垃圾。

en: Plastic trash bags are convenient but can harm the environment.
cn: 塑料垃圾袋很方便，但可能对环境有害。

en: In the event that it rains, the picnic will be moved indoors.
cn: 如果下雨，野餐将移到室内进行。

en: In the event that you need assistance, please contact our support team.
cn: 假使你需要帮助，请联系我们的支持团队。

en: Governments should promote sustainable development to protect natural resources.
cn: 政府应促进可持续发展以保护自然资源。

en: The company's policies aim to promote sustainable development in the region.
cn: 公司的政策旨在促进该地区的可持续发展。

en: He stared at the painting for a long time, admiring its beauty.
cn: 他盯着那幅画看了很久，欣赏它的美。

en: It's rude to stare at strangers in public.
cn: 在公共场合盯着陌生人看是不礼貌的。

en: She thinks nothing of walking five miles to work every day.
cn: 她认为每天走五英里去上班没什么。

en: He thinks nothing of spending large amounts of money on hobbies.
cn: 他不把花大笔钱在爱好上当回事。

en: The company secured a corporate loan to expand its operations.
cn: 该公司获得了一笔企业贷款以扩大业务。

en: Banks offer corporate loans with competitive interest rates.
cn: 银行提供利率有竞争力的企业贷款。

en: The waiter will serve drinks before the meal.
cn: 服务员会在餐前提供饮料。

en: At the party, they served drinks and snacks to the guests.
cn: 在派对上，他们为客人提供饮料和小吃。

en: She managed to overcome challenges in her career by staying persistent.
cn: 她通过坚持不懈成功克服了职业生涯中的挑战。

en: The team worked together to overcome challenges during the project.
cn: 团队合作克服了项目期间的挑战。

en: Can you give me a ride to the airport tomorrow?
cn: 明天你能开车送我去机场吗？

en: She gave her friend a ride to the train station.
cn: 她开车送她的朋友去火车站。

en: Her skills are on a par with those of a professional.
cn: 她的技能与专业人士相当。

en: This product is on a par with the best in the market.
cn: 这款产品与市场上最好的产品同等。

en: The old book started to come apart at the seams.
cn: 这本旧书开始从接缝处散开。

en: Their relationship came apart after the argument.
cn: 争吵后，他们的关系破裂了。

en: I'm taking an astronomy class to learn about stars and planets.
cn: 我正在上天文学课程，学习恒星和行星的知识。

en: The astronomy class includes a field trip to the observatory.
cn: 天文学课程包括一次去天文台的实地考察。

en: He likes to run around with his friends on weekends.
cn: 他喜欢在周末和朋友一起闲逛。

en: She's been running around with a new group of people lately.
cn: 她最近一直和一群新朋友一起社交。

en: Living in a small town gives her a strong sense of community.
cn: 住在一个小镇给了她强烈的社区感。

en: Volunteering helps build a sense of community among residents.
cn: 志愿服务有助于在居民中建立归属感。

en: He is connected with several charitable organizations.
cn: 他与几个慈善组织有关联。

en: The issue is connected with environmental policies.
cn: 这个问题与环境政策有关。

en: She was put to it to finish the project on time.
cn: 她面临按时完成项目的挑战。

en: During the crisis, everyone was put to it to find solutions.
cn: 危机期间，每个人都面临寻找解决方案的困难。

en: He tends to set his mentors on a pedestal, ignoring their flaws.
cn: 他倾向于将导师理想化，忽视他们的缺点。

en: Fans often set celebrities on a pedestal.
cn: 粉丝常常过度崇拜名人。

en: This model is superior to the previous one in performance.
cn: 这款型号在性能上优于前一款。

en: Her knowledge is superior to that of her peers.
cn: 她的知识比同龄人更高级。

en: We will proceed with the meeting as scheduled.
cn: 我们将按计划继续进行会议。

en: Please proceed with caution when handling the equipment.
cn: 处理设备时请谨慎进行。

en: The negative feedback took the wind out of his sails.
cn: 负面反馈使他泄气了。

en: Losing the game took the wind out of the team's sails.
cn: 输掉比赛挫败了团队的士气。

en: She has a penchant for traveling to exotic places.
cn: 她对去异国旅行有偏好。

en: He has a penchant for making detailed plans.
cn: 他有制定详细计划的倾向。

en: He decided to make a play for the promotion by working extra hours.
cn: 他决定通过加班来争取晋升。

en: The company is making a play for a larger market share.
cn: 这家公司正试图获得更大的市场份额。

en: Parents have a significant influence on their children's development.
cn: 父母对孩子的成长有重大影响。

en: Social media has an influence on public opinion.
cn: 社交媒体对公众舆论有影响。

en: I don't hold with the idea of working on weekends.
cn: 我不同意周末工作的想法。

en: She holds with traditional values in education.
cn: 她支持教育中的传统价值观。

en: He caught the devil from his boss for being late.
cn: 他因为迟到受到了老板的严厉责备。

en: If you break the rules, you'll catch the devil.
cn: 如果你违反规则，你会惹上麻烦。

en: The professor will deliver a lecture on climate change tomorrow.
cn: 教授明天将发表关于气候变化的演讲。

en: She delivered a lecture to the students about history.
cn: 她向学生们讲授了历史。

en: Time seems to go by quickly when you're having fun.
cn: 当你玩得开心时，时间似乎流逝得很快。

en: I saw him go by the window earlier.
cn: 早些时候我看到他从窗户经过。

en: Glacial movement carved out the valleys in this region thousands of years ago.
cn: 数千年前，冰川运动塑造了这个地区的山谷。

en: Scientists study glacial movement to understand climate change effects.
cn: 科学家研究冰川运动以了解气候变化的影响。

en: She has a head start on the project because she started earlier.
cn: 她在项目上有领先优势，因为她开始得更早。

en: The team has a head start on the competition due to their experience.
cn: 由于经验丰富，团队在竞争中具有领先优势。

en: She managed to hold down a full-time job while studying for her degree.
cn: 她在攻读学位的同时设法保住了一份全职工作。

en: The government is trying to hold down inflation with new policies.
cn: 政府正试图通过新政策来抑制通货膨胀。

en: Please take note of the safety instructions before starting the machine.
cn: 启动机器前请注意安全说明。

en: Investors should take note of the company's recent financial reports.
cn: 投资者应留意公司最近的财务报告。

en: Please take out the trash before you leave.
cn: 请在离开前把垃圾拿出去。

en: He took out his wallet to pay for the meal.
cn: 他拿出钱包来付餐费。

en: She has an eye for fashion and always dresses impeccably.
cn: 她对时尚有鉴赏力，总是穿着得体。

en: As a curator, he has an eye for valuable artworks.
cn: 作为策展人，他对有价值的艺术品有眼光。

en: The new cars are equipped with advanced safety features.
cn: 新车配备了先进的安全功能。

en: We equipped the laboratory with the latest technology.
cn: 我们为实验室配备了最新的技术。

en: She looked like a million bucks in her new evening gown.
cn: 她穿着新的晚礼服，看起来光彩照人。

en: After his vacation, he came back looking like a million bucks.
cn: 度假回来后，他看起来精神焕发。

en: The course covers various research methodologies used in social sciences.
cn: 这门课程涵盖了社会科学中使用的各种研究方法论。

en: Her thesis includes a detailed section on research methodology.
cn: 她的论文包括一个关于研究方法的详细部分。

en: The new smartphone model is already in stock at most retailers.
cn: 新款智能手机在大多数零售商处已有现货。

en: We have the item in stock and can ship it immediately.
cn: 我们有该商品的库存，可以立即发货。

en: Please add sugar to your coffee if you like it sweet.
cn: 如果你喜欢甜，请往咖啡里加糖。

en: We need to add more details to the report before submitting it.
cn: 在提交报告前，我们需要添加更多细节。

en: Several companies are bidding for the construction contract.
cn: 几家公司正在投标这个建筑合同。

en: He bid for the antique vase at the auction.
cn: 他在拍卖会上出价竞拍那个古董花瓶。

en: The United Kingdom is a constitutional monarchy with a parliamentary system.
cn: 英国是一个君主立宪制国家，实行议会制。

en: In a constitutional monarchy, the monarch's powers are limited by law.
cn: 在君主立宪制中，君主的权力受到法律限制。

en: Stop obsessing over trivial things and get a life!
cn: 别再纠结于琐事了，找点有意义的事做吧！

en: He told his friend to get a life instead of playing video games all day.
cn: 他告诉朋友别整天打游戏，找点有意义的事做。

en: Don't get fresh with me, young man!
cn: 别对我无礼，年轻人！

en: He got fresh and started making inappropriate comments.
cn: 他变得放肆，开始发表不恰当的评论。

en: The store is having a sale with 50% off all winter clothing.
cn: 这家商店正在打折，所有冬装五折。

en: I bought this jacket at 50% off the original price.
cn: 我以原价的五折买了这件夹克。

en: It's easy to make friends with people who share your interests.
cn: 与有共同兴趣的人交朋友很容易。

en: She made friends with her new neighbors soon after moving in.
cn: 搬进来后，她很快就和新邻居交上了朋友。

en: We had to make do with canned food during the camping trip.
cn: 露营期间我们只能凑合吃罐头食品。

en: She made do with an old laptop until she could afford a new one.
cn: 她将就用一台旧笔记本电脑，直到买得起新的。

en: He was dressed in a suit for the job interview.
cn: 他穿着西装去参加求职面试。

en: The children were dressed in colorful costumes for the school play.
cn: 孩子们穿着色彩鲜艳的戏服参加学校戏剧表演。

en: Investors are buying up shares in the tech company.
cn: 投资者正在大量购买这家科技公司的股票。

en: The corporation bought up all the available land in the area.
cn: 这家公司收购了该地区所有可用的土地。

en: The protest movement gained momentum after the viral social media post.
cn: 抗议运动在社交媒体帖子走红后势头增强。

en: Our project is finally gaining momentum with more team members joining.
cn: 随着更多团队成员加入，我们的项目终于获得了动力。

en: The president will deliver a speech at the graduation ceremony.
cn: 总统将在毕业典礼上发表演讲。

en: She delivered a powerful speech on environmental conservation.
cn: 她就环境保护发表了一场有力的演讲。

en: He stopped to help the elderly woman cross the street.
cn: 他停下来帮助那位老妇人过马路。

en: We stopped to admire the beautiful sunset.
cn: 我们停下来欣赏美丽的日落。

en: The police officer signaled for the car to pull over.
cn: 警察示意那辆车靠边停车。

en: I need to pull over to check the map.
cn: 我需要靠边停车查看地图。

en: The elevator is under repair, so please use the stairs.
cn: 电梯正在维修中，请使用楼梯。

en: The road is under repair and will be closed for a week.
cn: 这条路正在维修，将关闭一周。

en: Get ready to leave in five minutes.
cn: 准备好五分钟后出发。

en: She got ready to present her project to the team.
cn: 她准备好向团队展示她的项目。

en: She is suspicious of his sudden generosity.
cn: 她对他突然的慷慨表示怀疑。

en: The police are suspicious of the man's alibi.
cn: 警方对那个人的不在场证明表示怀疑。

en: Speed is calculated as a function of distance and time.
cn: 速度是距离和时间的函数。

en: The cost varies as a function of the quantity ordered.
cn: 成本随订购数量的变化而变化。

en: The guest speaker was none other than the famous author.
cn: 特邀演讲者正是那位著名作家。

en: It was none other than my old friend who called me.
cn: 打电话给我的正是我的老朋友。

en: The study focuses on weather variations in coastal regions.
cn: 这项研究关注沿海地区的天气变化。

en: Farmers must adapt to seasonal weather variations.
cn: 农民必须适应季节性的天气变化。

en: The church bells ring out every Sunday morning.
cn: 教堂的钟声每周日早上都会响起。

en: A shot rang out in the quiet night.
cn: 一声枪响打破了宁静的夜晚。

en: The drought put a severe strain on the local water supply.
cn: 干旱对当地供水造成了严重压力。

en: The financial crisis put a severe strain on the company's resources.
cn: 金融危机对公司的资源造成了严重压力。

en: It took hours to put together the new furniture.
cn: 组装新家具花了几个小时。

en: She put together a report based on the data collected.
cn: 她根据收集的数据整理了一份报告。

en: I bought a round-trip ticket to New York.
cn: 我买了一张去纽约的往返票。

en: A round-trip ticket is often cheaper than two one-way tickets.
cn: 往返票通常比两张单程票便宜。

en: The flowers give off a pleasant fragrance.
cn: 这些花散发出宜人的香味。

en: The chemical reaction gives off heat.
cn: 这个化学反应释放热量。

en: The manager has the final word on hiring decisions.
cn: 经理在招聘决定上有最终决定权。

en: In our family, my father has the final word on major purchases.
cn: 在我们家，父亲对大额购买有最终决定权。

en: He was found innocent of all charges.
cn: 他被判所有指控均不成立。

en: She is innocent of any wrongdoing in the matter.
cn: 她在这件事上没有任何过错。

en: Mathematics is a required course for all engineering students.
cn: 数学是所有工程专业学生的必修课。

en: She completed all the required courses for her degree.
cn: 她完成了学位所需的所有必修课。

en: People were queuing for tickets outside the theater.
cn: 人们在剧院外排队买票。

en: We had to queue for an hour to get into the museum.
cn: 我们不得不排队一小时才能进入博物馆。

en: I'll write back to you as soon as I receive your letter.
cn: 我一收到你的信就会给你回信。

en: She wrote back immediately to confirm the meeting details.
cn: 她立即回信确认会议细节。

en: Regular practice helps build up your confidence in public speaking.
cn: 定期练习有助于建立你在公开演讲中的自信。

en: Positive feedback from her mentor built up her confidence in the project.
cn: 导师的积极反馈增强了她在项目中的信心。

en: During the earthquake, we were advised to stay put under the table.
cn: 地震期间，我们被建议待在桌子下面不要动。

en: The dog will stay put until its owner gives the command to move.
cn: 这只狗会待在原地，直到主人发出移动的命令。

en: Above all, we must ensure the safety of our employees.
cn: 最重要的是，我们必须确保员工的安全。

en: He values honesty above all in his relationships.
cn: 他在人际关系中最看重诚实。

en: Parents are often considered the first educators in a child's life.
cn: 父母通常被认为是孩子生命中的第一位教育者。

en: As the first educator, she taught her son basic manners before he started school.
cn: 作为第一位教育者，她在儿子上学前教了他基本的礼仪。

en: Employees are more motivated to do their best when they feel valued.
cn: 当员工感到被重视时，他们更有动力做到最好。

en: She was motivated to do volunteer work after seeing the community's needs.
cn: 在看到社区的需求后，她有动力去做志愿工作。

en: You can find maps and brochures at the information desk in the lobby.
cn: 你可以在大厅的问讯处找到地图和小册子。

en: The information desk is staffed to assist visitors with their inquiries.
cn: 问讯处有工作人员协助访客咨询。

en: Scientists are exploring alternative methods of research to reduce animal testing.
cn: 科学家正在探索替代研究方法以减少动物实验。

en: This study uses alternative methods of research, such as qualitative interviews.
cn: 这项研究使用了替代研究方法，如定性访谈。

en: He has a tendency to do things at the last minute.
cn: 他有在最后一刻做事的倾向。

en: There's a growing tendency to do remote work in modern companies.
cn: 现代公司中远程工作的趋势日益增长。

en: Let's go over the report before submitting it.
cn: 在提交之前，我们检查一下报告。
