en: She went over her notes to prepare for the exam.
cn: 她复习笔记为考试做准备。

en: Neither the manager nor the employees were satisfied with the decision.
cn: 经理和员工都不满意这个决定。

en: She neither confirmed nor denied the rumors.
cn: 她既不确认也不否认这些传闻。

en: It took me a while to get a handle on the new software.
cn: 我花了一段时间才掌握这个新软件。

en: Once you get a handle on the basics, the advanced concepts become easier.
cn: 一旦你掌握了基础知识，高级概念就会变得更容易。

en: Her suggestion gave me a bright idea for the project.
cn: 她的建议给了我一个关于项目的好主意。

en: Reading that book gave him a bright idea to start his own business.
cn: 读那本书启发了他创业的好主意。

en: All new students receive a copy of the student handbook at orientation.
cn: 所有新生在迎新时都会收到一本学生手册。

en: The student handbook outlines the school's policies and procedures.
cn: 学生手册概述了学校的政策和程序。

en: It's important to arrive punctually for job interviews.
cn: 准时到达工作面试很重要。

en: She always arrives punctually at 9 AM for her meetings.
cn: 她总是上午9点准时到达会议。

en: The police gave chase to the suspect after the robbery.
cn: 抢劫后，警察追赶嫌疑人。

en: The dog gave chase to the squirrel across the yard.
cn: 狗在院子里追赶松鼠。

en: Coastal areas are at risk of flooding during storms.
cn: 沿海地区在风暴期间有洪水风险。

en: Smokers are at risk of developing lung diseases.
cn: 吸烟者有患肺部疾病的风险。

en: You should be familiar with the software before using it.
cn: 在使用这个软件之前，你应该熟悉它。

en: He is familiar with the local customs after living there for years.
cn: 在那里生活多年后，他熟悉了当地的风俗。

en: The argument boils down to a difference in values.
cn: 争论归结为价值观的差异。

en: All the complex issues boil down to one simple question.
cn: 所有复杂问题都简化为一个简单的问题。

en: In the negotiation, they had the best of the deal.
cn: 在谈判中，他们占了交易的优势。

en: She always has the best of intentions when giving advice.
cn: 她提建议时总是怀着最好的意图。

en: The laboratory is equipped with up-to-date equipment for research.
cn: 实验室配备了用于研究的最新设备。

en: Investing in up-to-date equipment can improve productivity.
cn: 投资最新设备可以提高生产力。

en: In addition to English, she speaks French fluently.
cn: 除了英语，她还能流利地讲法语。

en: The package includes breakfast in addition to accommodation.
cn: 这个套餐除了住宿外还包括早餐。

en: When you enter a new place, it's good to look around first.
cn: 进入一个新地方时，最好先环顾四周。

en: She looked around the room to find her keys.
cn: 她环顾房间寻找她的钥匙。

en: The school is working to reduce its drop-out rate.
cn: 学校正在努力降低其辍学率。

en: A high drop-out rate can indicate problems in the education system.
cn: 高辍学率可能表明教育系统存在问题。

en: She is fond of classical music and attends concerts often.
cn: 她喜欢古典音乐，经常参加音乐会。

en: He is fond of his grandmother's cooking.
cn: 他喜欢他祖母做的菜。

en: The filter helps remove impurities from the water.
cn: 这个过滤器有助于从水中去除杂质。

en: They use chemicals to remove impurities from the metal.
cn: 他们使用化学物质从金属中去除杂质。

en: She takes pride in her work and always does her best.
cn: 她以她的工作为傲，总是尽力而为。

en: They take pride in their community's achievements.
cn: 他们以社区的成就为傲。

en: In the long term, investing in education benefits society.
cn: 从长远来看，投资教育对社会有益。

en: This strategy may be costly now but profitable in the long term.
cn: 这个策略现在可能成本高，但从长远来看是有利可图的。

en: He decided to keep the news to himself until the official announcement.
cn: 他决定在官方宣布之前保守这个消息。

en: It's wise to keep some personal thoughts to oneself.
cn: 将一些个人想法保守秘密是明智的。

en: The government plans to clamp down on illegal activities.
cn: 政府计划严厉打击非法活动。

en: Police are clamping down on speeding in this area.
cn: 警察正在这个区域严厉打击超速行为。

en: If you break the rules, you might get a licking from your parents.
cn: 如果你违反规则，可能会挨父母的打。

en: The team got a licking in the final game.
cn: 这支队伍在决赛中受到了惩罚（指惨败）。

en: Take a gander at this new car; it's amazing!
cn: 瞧一瞧这辆新车；它太棒了！

en: He took a gander out the window to check the weather.
cn: 他朝窗外看了一眼以查看天气。

en: Tune in at 8 PM for the live broadcast.
cn: 晚上8点收听直播。

en: Millions of people tune in to watch the championship game.
cn: 数百万人收看冠军赛。

en: The criminal will be behind bars for many years.
cn: 这个罪犯将在监狱里待很多年。

en: He was put behind bars after being found guilty.
cn: 在被判有罪后，他被关进了监狱。

en: I enjoy reading books in my leisure time.
cn: 我喜欢在闲暇时间读书。

en: Having enough leisure time is important for relaxation.
cn: 拥有足够的闲暇时间对放松很重要。

en: Let me clear up any confusion about the schedule.
cn: 让我澄清一下关于时间表的任何困惑。

en: The manager cleared up the misunderstanding with the team.
cn: 经理澄清了与团队的误解。

en: They fell out over a disagreement about money.
cn: 他们因为钱的分歧而闹翻了。

en: It's sad when friends fall out and stop talking.
cn: 当朋友们争吵并停止交谈时，这很可悲。

en: Many people regard him as a hero for his bravery.
cn: 许多人因他的勇敢而视他为英雄。

en: She is regarded as an expert in her field.
cn: 她被公认为她所在领域的专家。

en: Increased police presence can help deter crime in the neighborhood.
cn: 增加警力可以帮助阻止社区犯罪。

en: Strict laws are designed to deter crime by imposing harsh penalties.
cn: 严格的法律旨在通过严厉惩罚来威慑犯罪。

en: The laundry started to pile up during the busy week.
cn: 在忙碌的一周里，脏衣服开始堆积起来。

en: Snow can pile up quickly in a blizzard.
cn: 在暴风雪中，雪可以快速堆积。

en: The modern architecture poses a contrast to the historic buildings nearby.
cn: 现代建筑与附近的历史建筑形成鲜明对比。

en: His calm demeanor poses a contrast to the chaotic situation.
cn: 他冷静的举止与混乱的局面形成对比。

en: The manager always speaks highly of her team's dedication.
cn: 经理总是高度赞扬她团队的奉献精神。

en: He spoke highly of the new policy during the meeting.
cn: 他在会议上对新政策给予了高度评价。

en: The blue sky shades into orange at sunset.
cn: 日落时，蓝天逐渐变成橙色。

en: Her anger shaded into sadness as she reflected on the situation.
cn: 当她反思情况时，她的愤怒逐渐变成了悲伤。

en: Can you give me a hand with moving this heavy table?
cn: 你能帮我搬一下这张重桌子吗？

en: She gave her neighbor a hand with gardening over the weekend.
cn: 周末她帮邻居打理了花园。

en: He takes a delight in solving complex puzzles.
cn: 他以解决复杂谜题为乐。

en: She takes a delight in watching birds in her backyard.
cn: 她非常喜欢在后院观鸟。

en: Shortly after the meeting ended, they received an important call.
cn: 会议结束后不久，他们接到了一个重要电话。

en: He arrived shortly after I left the office.
cn: 我离开办公室后不久他就到了。

en: Lions feed on other animals in the wild.
cn: 狮子在野外以其他动物为食。

en: Rumors often feed on people's fears and uncertainties.
cn: 谣言常常依靠人们的恐惧和不确定性传播。

en: The company must assume obligation for any damages caused by its products.
cn: 公司必须对其产品造成的任何损害承担责任。

en: As a citizen, it's important to assume obligation for community service.
cn: 作为公民，承担社区服务的义务很重要。

en: He took responsibility for the mistake and apologized.
cn: 他为错误承担责任并道歉了。

en: Parents must take responsibility for their children's education.
cn: 父母必须对孩子的教育负责。

en: Despite the challenges, our team came out on top in the competition.
cn: 尽管面临挑战，我们团队在比赛中获胜了。

en: She always manages to come out on top in difficult situations.
cn: 她总是能在困难情况下脱颖而出。

en: I've been in contact with her since we graduated.
cn: 自从毕业以来，我一直与她保持联系。

en: The doctor advised staying in contact with the patient for updates.
cn: 医生建议与患者保持联系以获取最新情况。

en: It's important to follow social rules to maintain harmony in the community.
cn: 遵守社会规则对维护社区和谐很重要。

en: Children are taught to follow social rules from a young age.
cn: 孩子们从小就被教导要遵守社会规则。

en: After long negotiations, they finally reached an agreement.
cn: 经过长时间谈判，他们终于达成了协议。

en: The two countries reached an agreement on trade policies.
cn: 两国就贸易政策达成了一致意见。

en: This model is more efficient by comparison to the old one.
cn: 相比之下，这个型号比旧的更高效。

en: By comparison, her performance was outstanding.
cn: 相比之下，她的表现很出色。

en: Many companies jumped on the bandwagon of digital transformation.
cn: 许多公司跟风进行了数字化转型。

en: He jumped on the bandwagon and started investing in cryptocurrencies.
cn: 他随大流开始投资加密货币。

en: Don't stand on ceremony; just make yourself at home.
cn: 别拘泥礼节，就像在自己家一样。

en: In informal settings, there's no need to stand on ceremony.
cn: 在非正式场合，不需要讲究客套。

en: Her creativity springs from her love of nature.
cn: 她的创造力源于她对自然的热爱。

en: Many traditions spring from ancient customs.
cn: 许多传统起源于古老的习俗。

en: My old TV is on the blink again, so I need to get it repaired.
cn: 我的旧电视又出故障了，所以我需要找人修理。

en: The printer has been on the blink all week, causing delays in the office.
cn: 打印机整个星期都失灵，导致办公室工作延误。

en: You can find the manual on line if you search the manufacturer's website.
cn: 如果你搜索制造商的网站，可以在线找到手册。

en: Many people shop on line for convenience and better prices.
cn: 许多人在线购物是为了方便和更优惠的价格。

en: We had to put off the meeting until next week due to scheduling conflicts.
cn: 由于日程冲突，我们不得不将会议推迟到下周。

en: Don't put off your homework until the last minute; start early.
cn: 不要把你的作业拖到最后一刻；早点开始。

en: The zoo's animal in captivity program focuses on breeding endangered species.
cn: 动物园的圈养动物项目专注于繁殖濒危物种。

en: Studying animal behavior in captivity helps understand their needs in the wild.
cn: 研究圈养动物的行为有助于了解它们在野外的需求。

en: During the hike, we paused to admire the beautiful mountain view.
cn: 在徒步旅行中，我们停下来欣赏美丽的山景。

en: She paused to think before answering the difficult question.
cn: 她在回答这个难题之前停下来思考。

en: In recent years, the gender gap narrows in many industries.
cn: 近年来，许多行业的性别差距缩小了。

en: Efforts to promote equality have helped the gender gap narrows in education.
cn: 促进平等的努力帮助教育领域的性别差距缩小了。

en: We ran out of milk, so I need to go to the store to buy more.
cn: 我们的牛奶用完了，所以我需要去商店买更多。

en: She stepped out of the car and into the bright sunlight.
cn: 她从车里出来，走进明亮的阳光下。

en: The company decided to break away from its parent organization to become independent.
cn: 公司决定脱离其母公司，成为独立的实体。

en: He wanted to break away from his old habits and start a healthier lifestyle.
cn: 他想摆脱旧习惯，开始更健康的生活方式。

en: The rare books are kept in a closed reserve and can only be accessed by special permission.
cn: 稀有书籍被保存在封闭储备中，只能通过特殊许可访问。

en: The national park has a closed reserve to protect endangered wildlife from disturbance.
cn: 国家公园有一个封闭储备区，以保护濒危野生动物免受干扰。

en: Before buying the new software, we decided to test it out with a free trial.
cn: 在购买新软件之前，我们决定用免费试用版来测试它。

en: The engineers will test out the prototype to ensure it works properly.
cn: 工程师们将测试原型以确保其正常工作。

en: The restaurant has gotten a reputation for serving the best pizza in town.
cn: 这家餐厅因提供镇上最好的比萨而获得了名声。

en: He got a reputation for being always punctual and reliable at work.
cn: 他因在工作中总是准时可靠而获得了名声。

en: The government provides subsidies to support low income families with housing costs.
cn: 政府提供补贴以支持低收入家庭的住房费用。

en: Many charities focus on helping low income families access education and healthcare.
cn: 许多慈善机构专注于帮助低收入家庭获得教育和医疗保健。

en: After being sick for a week, she worked extra hours to make up for lost time on the project.
cn: 生病一周后，她加班工作以弥补项目上失去的时间。

en: They traveled extensively to make up for lost time during the years they were too busy.
cn: 他们广泛旅行，以弥补那些年太忙而失去的时间。

en: The human body uses sweating as a method of temperature regulation in hot weather.
cn: 人体在炎热天气中使用出汗作为温度调节的方法。

en: The new building has advanced systems for temperature regulation to save energy.
cn: 新建筑有先进的温度调节系统以节省能源。

en: The museum displays the original handwriting of famous authors in their letters.
cn: 博物馆展示了著名作家信件中的原始笔迹。

en: Experts analyzed the original handwriting to verify the authenticity of the document.
cn: 专家分析了原始笔迹以验证文件的真实性。

en: Even though it was raining, we decided to go for a walk in the park.
cn: 尽管在下雨，我们决定去公园散步。

en: She passed the exam even though she hadn't studied much.
cn: 即使她没有怎么学习，她还是通过了考试。

en: I had to wade through hundreds of emails to find the important one.
cn: 我不得不费力地处理数百封电子邮件以找到重要的那一封。

en: The hikers waded through the shallow river to reach the other side.
cn: 徒步旅行者涉水通过浅河到达对岸。

en: The company reimburses employees for travel expenses incurred during business trips.
cn: 公司报销员工在商务旅行中产生的旅行费用。

en: We need to budget carefully for travel expenses like flights and accommodation.
cn: 我们需要仔细预算旅行费用，如机票和住宿。

en: Scientists are working hard to invent a new drug that can cure the disease more effectively.
cn: 科学家们正在努力发明一种能更有效治疗这种疾病的新药。

en: It takes years of research and testing to invent a new drug and get it approved.
cn: 发明一种新药并获得批准需要多年的研究和测试。

en: I'll drop over to your place after work to return your book.
cn: 下班后我会顺便去你家还你的书。

en: Feel free to drop over anytime; we're usually home on weekends.
cn: 随时可以来拜访，我们周末通常在家。

en: The larger company decided to take over the smaller startup to expand its market share.
cn: 较大的公司决定接管较小的初创公司以扩大其市场份额。

en: She will take over the project management role while her colleague is on leave.
cn: 在她的同事休假期间，她将接手项目管理角色。

en: The dormitory officer is responsible for ensuring the safety and order in the student residence.
cn: 宿舍管理员负责确保学生宿舍的安全和秩序。

en: Students can report any issues to the dormitory officer for assistance.
cn: 学生可以向宿舍管理员报告任何问题以寻求帮助。

en: Our class project involves building a small robot from scratch.
cn: 我们的课堂项目包括从头开始建造一个小型机器人。

en: She spent the entire weekend working on her class project about climate change.
cn: 她整个周末都在做关于气候变化的课程作业。

en: She makes good money as a software engineer at a tech startup.
cn: 她在一家科技初创公司担任软件工程师，收入丰厚。

en: If you invest wisely, you can make good money in the stock market.
cn: 如果你投资明智，可以在股市赚很多钱。

en: The thick fog blotted out the view of the mountains.
cn: 浓雾遮盖了山景。

en: He tried to blot out the painful memories by keeping busy.
cn: 他试图通过忙碌来抹去痛苦的回忆。

en: I'll get in touch with you as soon as I have more information.
cn: 我一有更多信息就会与你联系。

en: It's important to get in touch with old friends from time to time.
cn: 时不时与老朋友联系很重要。

en: The project is on hold until we receive more funding.
cn: 这个项目暂停了，直到我们获得更多资金。

en: I was put on hold for twenty minutes when I called customer service.
cn: 我打电话给客服时被搁置了二十分钟。

en: I had to drink coffee to stay awake during the long lecture.
cn: 我不得不喝咖啡以在漫长的讲座中保持清醒。

en: She stayed awake all night worrying about the exam.
cn: 她整晚没睡，担心考试。

en: They made a killing by selling their company at the peak of the market.
cn: 他们在市场高峰期出售公司，赚了大钱。

en: Investors made a killing during the cryptocurrency boom.
cn: 投资者在加密货币热潮期间发大财。

en: As a trusted advisor, she always has the CEO's ear.
cn: 作为值得信赖的顾问，她总能得到CEO的倾听。

en: If you have the teacher's ear, you might be able to suggest changes to the curriculum.
cn: 如果你能得到老师的关注，或许可以建议修改课程。

en: The spy went to the meeting in disguise to avoid being recognized.
cn: 间谍伪装后去参加会议，以免被认出。

en: Sometimes a setback is a blessing in disguise.
cn: 有时挫折是伪装的祝福。

en: His voice trailed off as he realized no one was listening.
cn: 当他意识到没人在听时，他的声音逐渐减弱了。

en: The conversation trailed off into an awkward silence.
cn: 谈话逐渐消失，陷入尴尬的沉默。

en: I missed your call earlier; I'll call you back in an hour.
cn: 我之前错过了你的电话，一小时后我会回电。

en: The company had to call back the defective products for safety reasons.
cn: 出于安全原因，公司不得不召回有缺陷的产品。

en: Can you send on this email to the rest of the team?
cn: 你能把这封邮件转寄给团队的其他人吗？

en: The post office will send on your mail to your new address.
cn: 邮局会将你的邮件转寄到你的新地址。

en: He couldn't look her in the face after telling the lie.
cn: 说谎后，他无法直视她。

en: You need to look the problem in the face and find a solution.
cn: 你需要直面问题并找到解决方案。

en: Watch for any changes in the patient's condition and report them immediately.
cn: 留意病人状况的任何变化，并立即报告。

en: We're watching for a good opportunity to invest in the market.
cn: 我们正在等待投资市场的好机会。

en: She bought a new digital camera for her photography hobby.
cn: 她为摄影爱好买了一台新的数码相机。

en: Digital cameras have largely replaced film cameras in modern photography.
cn: 在现代摄影中，数码相机已很大程度上取代了胶片相机。

en: You need to be flexible in your approach to solve this complex problem.
cn: 你需要灵活处理来解决这个复杂问题。

en: Employers value employees who are flexible in adapting to new technologies.
cn: 雇主看重能灵活适应新技术的员工。

en: Exercise is a great way to release stress after a long day at work.
cn: 运动是工作一整天后释放压力的好方法。

en: Meditation helps her release stress and stay calm.
cn: 冥想帮助她释放压力并保持冷静。

en: We need to build a fire to keep warm tonight.
cn: 我们需要生火来保暖过夜。

en: He built a fire using dry twigs and leaves.
cn: 他用干树枝和树叶生了一堆火。

en: Energy conservation is crucial for reducing carbon emissions.
cn: 节能对于减少碳排放至关重要。

en: The government promotes energy conservation through public campaigns.
cn: 政府通过公共宣传活动推广节能。

en: He gave an off-the-cuff speech that impressed everyone.
cn: 他做了一次即兴演讲，给所有人留下了深刻印象。

en: Her off-the-cuff remarks were surprisingly insightful.
cn: 她即兴的评论出人意料地有见地。

en: The country is facing a severe economic crisis.
cn: 该国正面临严重的经济危机。

en: The 2008 economic crisis affected markets worldwide.
cn: 2008年的经济危机影响了全球市场。

en: The boss put the screws on him to finish the project early.
cn: 老板对他施加压力，要求他提前完成项目。

en: They put the screws on the suspect during the interrogation.
cn: 他们在审讯中对嫌疑人施加压力。

en: I stayed up late to finish my homework.
cn: 我熬夜完成作业。

en: They stayed up all night talking.
cn: 他们通宵聊天。

en: I heard she has something going with her coworker.
cn: 我听说她和同事有暧昧关系。

en: They've had something going for months now.
cn: 他们暧昧关系已经持续几个月了。

en: What lies behind his sudden decision to quit?
cn: 他突然决定辞职的背后原因是什么？

en: Complex social issues lie behind the rise in crime rates.
cn: 复杂的社会问题是犯罪率上升的背后原因。

en: Take notice of the warning signs on the road.
cn: 注意路上的警告标志。

en: The teacher asked the students to take notice of the new rules.
cn: 老师要求学生留意新规定。

en: He did me out of my inheritance with a fake will.
cn: 他用假遗嘱骗走了我的遗产。

en: They did the company out of millions in a scam.
cn: 他们通过骗局骗走了公司数百万。

en: I am in awe of her talent and dedication.
cn: 我对她的才华和奉献精神感到敬畏。

en: The tourists were in awe of the ancient temple.
cn: 游客们对这座古庙感到敬畏。

en: They began their work in earnest after the meeting.
cn: 会议后，他们开始认真地工作。

en: The negotiations started in earnest last week.
cn: 谈判上周郑重地开始了。

en: She got a scholarship to the university for her academic excellence.
cn: 她因学业优秀获得了大学奖学金。

en: He hopes to get a scholarship to the university to study engineering.
cn: 他希望获得大学奖学金学习工程学。

en: She gets along well with her colleagues.
cn: 她和同事相处得很好。

en: Do you get along with your neighbors?
cn: 你和邻居相处得和睦吗？

en: I object to the proposed changes in the policy.
cn: 我反对政策中的拟议变更。

en: Many residents object to the construction of the new highway.
cn: 许多居民反对修建新高速公路。

en: The factory uses advanced electrical equipment for production.
cn: 工厂使用先进的电气设备进行生产。

en: Safety checks are essential for all electrical equipment.
cn: 对所有电气设备进行安全检查至关重要。

en: If you break that antique vase, you'll have the devil to pay with your grandmother.
cn: 如果你打碎那个古董花瓶，你奶奶会让你吃不了兜着走。

en: He knew he'd have the devil to pay when his boss found out about the mistake.
cn: 他知道老板发现这个错误后，他会有大麻烦。

en: The large tree provides the shade we need on hot days.
cn: 这棵大树在炎热的日子里提供我们所需的阴凉。

en: Can this umbrella provide enough shade for everyone?
cn: 这把伞能为所有人提供足够的阴凉吗？

en: The sudden push caught him off balance.
cn: 突然的推搡让他失去了平衡。

en: She felt off balance on the icy sidewalk.
cn: 她在结冰的人行道上感到失去平衡。

en: "This weather is terrible." "You can say that again!"
cn: "这天气真糟糕。" "你说得对！"

en: "The movie was amazing." "You can say that again!"
cn: "这部电影太棒了。" "我完全同意！"

en: I'm busy at the moment, can I call you back later?
cn: 我现在很忙，稍后给你回电话好吗？

en: She captured the perfect moment in her photograph.
cn: 她在照片中捕捉到了完美的瞬间。

en: He decided to buy into the startup company early on.
cn: 他决定早期投资这家初创公司。

en: Many investors are buying into renewable energy stocks.
cn: 许多投资者正在购入可再生能源股票。

en: Please inform the team of the meeting schedule changes.
cn: 请通知团队会议日程的变更。

en: The doctor informed her of the test results immediately.
cn: 医生立即告知了她检测结果。

en: You need to make a payment by the end of the month to avoid late fees.
cn: 你需要在月底前付款以避免滞纳金。

en: I made a payment online for my utility bill yesterday.
cn: 我昨天在线支付了水电费。

en: Before making a decision, it's important to think through all the consequences.
cn: 做决定前，仔细考虑所有后果很重要。

en: He spent hours thinking through the problem before proposing a solution.
cn: 他花了几个小时全面思考这个问题，然后提出了解决方案。

en: They sat on the porch making chin music all afternoon.
cn: 他们整个下午都坐在门廊上闲聊。

en: Stop making chin music and focus on your work.
cn: 别闲聊了，专心工作。

en: Can you lead the way to the conference room? I'm not familiar with this building.
cn: 你能带路去会议室吗？我不熟悉这栋楼。

en: She led the way in developing new environmental policies.
cn: 她在制定新环境政策方面起到了引领作用。

en: She took against her new neighbor after their first argument.
cn: 第一次争吵后，她开始不喜欢她的新邻居了。

en: He took against the proposal as soon as he heard the details.
cn: 他一听到细节就开始反对这个提议。

en: We had fish and chips for dinner at the seaside restaurant.
cn: 我们在海边餐厅吃了炸鱼薯条当晚餐。

en: Fish and chips is a popular takeaway meal in the UK.
cn: 炸鱼薯条是英国流行的外卖食品。

en: The copy is identical to the original painting.
cn: 这幅复制品与原画完全相同。

en: His opinion is identical to mine on this matter.
cn: 在这个问题上，他的观点和我完全一致。

en: All citizens must obey laws to maintain social order.
cn: 所有公民都必须遵守法律以维持社会秩序。

en: Drivers who obey traffic laws reduce the risk of accidents.
cn: 遵守交通法规的司机降低了事故风险。

en: The loud music drowned out our conversation.
cn: 大声的音乐淹没了我们的谈话声。

en: Cheers from the crowd drowned out the speaker's voice.
cn: 人群的欢呼声盖过了演讲者的声音。

en: Muscular dystrophy affects muscle strength and function over time.
cn: 肌肉萎缩症会随时间影响肌肉力量和功能。

en: Research is ongoing to find a cure for muscular dystrophy.
cn: 正在进行研究以寻找肌肉萎缩症的治疗方法。

en: Don't make yourself miserable by worrying about things you can't control.
cn: 别为无法控制的事情担忧而让自己痛苦。

en: She made herself miserable by constantly comparing her life to others'.
cn: 她不断将自己的生活与他人比较，使自己难受。

en: The new company came into being after months of planning.
cn: 经过数月的规划，新公司成立了。

en: Many traditions come into being over centuries of cultural evolution.
cn: 许多传统是在几个世纪的文化演变中形成的。

en: Compulsive shopping can lead to financial problems and emotional distress.
cn: 强迫性购物可能导致财务问题和情绪困扰。

en: She sought therapy to address her compulsive shopping habits.
cn: 她寻求治疗来解决她的强迫性购物习惯。

en: Without evidence, you don't have a leg to stand on in court.
cn: 没有证据，你在法庭上就没有站得住脚的理由。

en: His argument doesn't have a leg to stand on because it's based on false assumptions.
cn: 他的论点没有依据，因为它是基于错误的假设。

en: The negotiation ended in a successful agreement.
cn: 谈判以达成协议告终。

en: Their relationship ended in a bitter breakup.
cn: 他们的关系以痛苦的分手结束。

en: The new model improves upon the previous version with better battery life.
cn: 新机型改进了电池续航，比上一版更好。

en: She aims to improve upon her personal best in the next race.
cn: 她旨在下一场比赛中改进自己的个人最佳成绩。

en: Using new fertilizers can increase yields in crop production.
cn: 使用新肥料可以提高农作物产量。

en: The factory implemented automation to increase yields by 20%.
cn: 工厂实施自动化，将产量提高了20%。

en: She was admitted to Harvard University last year.
cn: 她去年被哈佛大学录取了。

en: The patient was admitted to the hospital for emergency surgery.
cn: 病人被送入医院进行紧急手术。

en: I made sure to eat a lot at the buffet to get my money's worth.
cn: 我在自助餐上吃了很多，以确保物有所值。

en: She uses the gym daily to get her money's worth from the membership.
cn: 她每天去健身房，让会员资格物有所值。

en: The bird perched on a branch, singing softly.
cn: 鸟儿栖息在树枝上，轻声歌唱。

en: He perched on the edge of the chair, looking nervous.
cn: 他坐在椅子边缘，看起来很紧张。

en: Even if it rains, we will still go for a walk.
cn: 即使下雨，我们还是会去散步。

en: She will try her best even if the task seems impossible.
cn: 即使任务看似不可能，她也会尽力而为。

en: The complex math problem made my head spin.
cn: 复杂的数学题让我头晕。

en: All the new information made her head spin during the meeting.
cn: 会议中所有的新信息让她感到困惑。

en: With the company's future at stake, they made a risky decision.
cn: 公司的未来岌岌可危，他们做出了一个冒险的决定。

en: Lives are at stake in this emergency situation.
cn: 在这种紧急情况下，生命危在旦夕。

en: Students must turn in their essays by Friday.
cn: 学生必须在周五前提交论文。

en: He turned in the project report to his boss.
cn: 他向老板提交了项目报告。

en: The government promotes the equal access to education for all children.
cn: 政府促进所有儿童平等接受教育。

en: Ensuring the equal access to education is key to reducing inequality.
cn: 确保平等接受教育是减少不平等的关键。

en: Any engineer worth their salt can solve this problem.
cn: 任何称职的工程师都能解决这个问题。

en: She proved she was worth her salt by completing the task efficiently.
cn: 她高效完成任务，证明了自己是称职的。

en: The journalists got wind of the scandal before it was public.
cn: 记者在丑闻公开前就听到了风声。

en: He got wind of the surprise party, so it wasn't a surprise anymore.
cn: 他得知了惊喜派对的消息，所以不再是个惊喜了。

en: The repair took ages, so we were late for the meeting.
cn: 修理花了很长时间，所以我们开会迟到了。

en: It takes ages to download large files on a slow internet connection.
cn: 在慢速网络连接上下载大文件要花很长时间。

en: The two companies agreed to cooperate with each other on the project.
cn: 两家公司同意在项目上相互合作。

en: It's important to cooperate with your teammates to achieve success.
cn: 与队友合作以实现成功很重要。

en: The charity operates under the name of 'Hope for All'.
cn: 这家慈善机构以'全民希望'的名义运作。

en: He published the book under the name of a pseudonym.
cn: 他以笔名出版了这本书。

en: He is working on a new novel that will be published next year.
cn: 他正在写一部将于明年出版的新小说。

en: The team is working on improving the software's performance.
cn: 团队正在致力于提高软件的性能。

en: Many parents struggle to combine work and family commitments effectively.
cn: 许多父母难以有效平衡工作和家庭责任。

en: She uses flexible hours to combine work and family commitments.
cn: 她利用弹性工作时间来平衡工作和家庭责任。

en: I've never baked a cake before, but I'll take a crack at it.
cn: 我以前从未烤过蛋糕，但我会尝试一下。

en: He decided to take a crack at solving the difficult puzzle.
cn: 他决定尝试解决这个难题。

en: She got the job on the strength of her impressive portfolio.
cn: 她凭借令人印象深刻的履历获得了这份工作。

en: The company expanded on the strength of its successful product launch.
cn: 公司凭借其成功的产品发布进行了扩张。

en: After the initial setback, the project went from bad to worse when the main investor withdrew.
cn: 最初的挫折之后，当主要投资者撤资时，这个项目的情况变得越来越糟。

en: His health went from bad to worse despite the doctor's best efforts.
cn: 尽管医生尽了最大努力，他的健康状况还是每况愈下。

en: She sat all alone in the park, thinking about her future.
cn: 她独自一人坐在公园里，思考着她的未来。

en: After everyone left, he was all alone in the house.
cn: 所有人都离开后，他独自一人在房子里。

en: Regular exercise is vital to maintaining good health.
cn: 定期锻炼对保持健康至关重要。

en: Trust is vital to a successful partnership.
cn: 信任对于成功的伙伴关系是必不可少的。

en: In the debate, our team was on the weaker side due to lack of preparation.
cn: 在辩论中，由于准备不足，我们队处于劣势。

en: The small business is on the weaker side compared to large corporations.
cn: 与大型企业相比，这家小企业处于劣势。

en: The government introduced new policies to reduce unemployment.
cn: 政府推出了新政策以减少失业。

en: Investing in education can help reduce unemployment in the long term.
cn: 投资教育有助于长期减少失业。

en: The spy managed to throw off his pursuers in the crowded market.
cn: 间谍在拥挤的市场中成功甩掉了追踪者。

en: She threw off her worries and enjoyed the vacation.
cn: 她摆脱了烦恼，享受假期。

en: He went for an interview at the tech company yesterday.
cn: 他昨天去那家科技公司参加了面试。

en: She is nervous as she goes for an interview for her dream job.
cn: 她去参加梦想工作的面试时很紧张。

en: In the debate, she took sides with the environmentalists.
cn: 在辩论中，她支持环保主义者。

en: He refused to take sides with either party in the conflict.
cn: 他拒绝在冲突中支持任何一方。

en: As a project manager, she is responsible for managing budgets effectively.
cn: 作为项目经理，她负责有效地管理预算。

en: Small businesses must learn to manage budgets to survive.
cn: 小企业必须学会管理预算才能生存。

en: Given his hard work, his promotion came as no surprise.
cn: 鉴于他的努力工作，他的晋升毫不意外。

en: The team's victory came as no surprise to their fans.
cn: 球队的胜利在他们的球迷意料之中。

en: Students should concentrate upon their studies during exam periods.
cn: 学生在考试期间应该专注于学习。

en: She concentrated upon finishing the report before the deadline.
cn: 她集中精力在截止日期前完成报告。

en: Investors often make a trade based on market trends.
cn: 投资者经常根据市场趋势进行交易。

en: He made a trade to exchange his old car for a newer model.
cn: 他做了一笔交易，用旧车换了一辆更新的型号。

en: It took him years to come to terms with his father's death.
cn: 他花了多年时间才接受父亲的去世。

en: The two companies came to terms with a new partnership agreement.
cn: 两家公司就新的伙伴关系协议达成了妥协。

en: The hospital provides excellent nursing care for all patients.
cn: 医院为所有病人提供优质的护理。

en: Elderly people may require specialized nursing care at home.
cn: 老年人可能在家需要专业的看护。

en: The ceremony paid tribute to the heroes of the war.
cn: 仪式向战争英雄们致敬。

en: She paid tribute to her mentor in her acceptance speech.
cn: 她在获奖感言中赞扬了她的导师。

en: He followed his doctor's advice and started exercising regularly.
cn: 他听从医生的建议，开始定期锻炼。

en: If you follow my advice, you will avoid many common mistakes.
cn: 如果你听从我的建议，你会避免许多常见错误。

en: She kept the news to herself until she was ready to share it.
cn: 她保守这个消息，直到准备好分享。

en: He decided to keep his plans to himself to avoid criticism.
cn: 他决定不告诉别人他的计划，以避免批评。

en: She took the risk of investing in a startup company.
cn: 她冒了投资一家初创公司的风险。

en: He didn't want to take the risk of losing his job.
cn: 他不想冒失去工作的风险。

en: He paid for the dinner with his credit card.
cn: 他用信用卡支付了晚餐。

en: She offered to pay for the repairs to the car.
cn: 她提出支付汽车的修理费用。

en: The movie was so boring that I fell asleep halfway through.
cn: 这部电影太无聊了，以至于我看到一半就睡着了。

en: She was so excited that she couldn't stop talking about it.
cn: 她如此兴奋，以至于不停地谈论这件事。

en: Paris and Tokyo are popular tourist destinations worldwide.
cn: 巴黎和东京是全球受欢迎的旅游目的地。

en: The country is developing new tourist destinations to boost its economy.
cn: 该国正在开发新的旅游目的地以促进经济。

en: The company compensated for the delay by offering a discount.
cn: 公司通过提供折扣来补偿延误。

en: Hard work can compensate for a lack of natural talent.
cn: 努力工作可以弥补天赋的不足。

en: He let the minor mistake slide to avoid an argument.
cn: 他放任这个小错误不管，以避免争吵。

en: Sometimes it's better to let small issues slide for the sake of peace.
cn: 有时为了和平，最好放任小问题不管。

en: The runner came up from behind to win the race in the final stretch.
cn: 那位跑步者在最后阶段从后面赶上，赢得了比赛。

en: Our team came up from behind to secure a surprising victory.
cn: 我们队后来居上，取得了令人惊讶的胜利。

en: His performance was disappointing, to say the least.
cn: 他的表现至少可以说是令人失望的。

en: The weather was unpredictable, to say the least, during our trip.
cn: 我们旅行期间的天气，至少可以说是变化无常的。

en: The company gained a reputation for excellent customer service.
cn: 这家公司因优质的客户服务而获得声誉。

en: She gained a reputation for being a reliable and hardworking employee.
cn: 她因可靠和勤奋而获得声誉。

en: We plan to meet up with friends for coffee this weekend.
cn: 我们计划这个周末与朋友见面喝咖啡。

en: She loves to meet up with friends to catch up on old times.
cn: 她喜欢与朋友见面，叙叙旧。

en: At the party, everyone enjoyed themselves dancing and chatting.
cn: 在派对上，每个人都跳舞聊天，玩得很开心。

en: Make sure to enjoy yourself on your vacation.
cn: 确保你在假期中玩得开心。

en: In a team project, everyone needs to pull their weight to succeed.
cn: 在团队项目中，每个人都需要尽自己的本分才能成功。

en: He always pulls his weight at work, so his colleagues respect him.
cn: 他在工作中总是尽自己的本分，因此同事们尊重他。

en: He is capable of handling complex projects under pressure.
cn: 他有能力在压力下处理复杂的项目。

en: This software is capable of performing multiple tasks simultaneously.
cn: 这个软件有能力同时执行多个任务。

en: During the power outage, we had to do without electricity for a few hours.
cn: 停电期间，我们不得不没有电将就几个小时。

en: If you forget your umbrella, you'll have to do without it in the rain.
cn: 如果你忘了带伞，下雨时你就得将就一下了。

en: She jotted down the phone number on a piece of paper.
cn: 她在一张纸上快速记下了电话号码。

en: During the meeting, I jotted down key points for later reference.
cn: 会议期间，我快速记下了关键点以供以后参考。

en: Employees should have a say in company policies that affect them.
cn: 员工应该对影响他们的公司政策有发言权。

en: In a democracy, every citizen has a say in the government.
cn: 在民主国家，每个公民对政府都有发言权。

en: The parked car was in the way, so we couldn't pass.
cn: 那辆停着的车挡路了，所以我们无法通过。

en: Don't leave your bag in the way; someone might trip over it.
cn: 别把你的包放在挡路的地方；有人可能会被绊倒。

en: The price is $100, exclusive of taxes and shipping fees.
cn: 价格是100美元，不包括税费和运费。

en: The report covers data from January to March, exclusive of April.
cn: 这份报告涵盖一月到三月的数据，不包括四月。

en: I missed your call earlier; I'll call you back in a few minutes.
cn: 我之前错过了你的电话；我几分钟后给你回电话。

en: Please ask him to call me back when he's free.
cn: 请让他有空时给我回电话。

en: I need to get a day off next week to attend my sister's wedding.
cn: 我下周需要请一天假去参加我姐姐的婚礼。

en: If you finish the project early, you might get a day off as a reward.
cn: 如果你提前完成项目，可能会得到一天休假作为奖励。

en: His success goes to show that hard work pays off.
cn: 他的成功证明努力是有回报的。

en: The experiment's results go to show the effectiveness of the new method.
cn: 实验结果表明了新方法的有效性。

en: Please throw the empty bottle in the garbage can.
cn: 请把空瓶子扔进垃圾桶。

en: The garbage can is full and needs to be emptied.
cn: 垃圾桶满了，需要清空。

en: Her job is her primary source of income.
cn: 她的工作是她的主要收入来源。

en: Investments can be a reliable source of income for retirees.
cn: 投资可以是退休人员可靠的收入来源。

en: The river dried up during the summer drought.
cn: 在夏季干旱期间，这条河干涸了。

en: Leave the paint to dry up completely before touching it.
cn: 让油漆完全变干后再触摸。

en: You can see the new software in action during the demo.
cn: 你可以在演示中看到新软件在运行。

en: The firefighters were in action within minutes of the alarm.
cn: 消防员在警报响起几分钟内就行动了。

en: It's important to show respect to your elders in many cultures.
cn: 在许多文化中，向长辈表示尊敬很重要。

en: He always shows respect to his colleagues by listening carefully to their ideas.
cn: 他总是通过认真倾听同事的想法来表示尊敬。

en: With the deadline approaching, she had her back to the wall and worked all night.
cn: 随着截止日期临近，她背水一战，整夜工作。

en: The team had their backs to the wall after losing three key players.
cn: 在失去三名关键球员后，团队处于困境。

en: The teacher drew an analogy between the human brain and a computer.
cn: 老师将人脑和电脑进行了类比。

en: In his essay, he draws an analogy to explain complex economic theories.
cn: 在他的文章中，他进行类比来解释复杂的经济理论。

en: Teachers should encourage students to ask questions in class.
cn: 老师应该鼓励学生在课堂上提问。

en: Her parents encouraged her to pursue her passion for art.
cn: 她的父母鼓励她追求对艺术的热爱。

en: Employees must punch in by 9 AM to start their shift.
cn: 员工必须在上午9点前打卡上班开始轮班。

en: She forgot to punch in this morning, so she had to report it to HR.
cn: 她今早忘记打卡上班了，所以必须向人力资源部报告。

en: Traveling allows people to experience happiness in new cultures.
cn: 旅行让人们在新文化中体验幸福。

en: She experienced great happiness when her book was published.
cn: 当她的书出版时，她体验到了巨大的幸福。

en: I have the day off tomorrow, so I'm planning to go hiking.
cn: 我明天休假一天，所以计划去远足。

en: Employees are allowed to have the day off on their birthdays.
cn: 员工被允许在生日当天休假一天。

en: Her talent as a pianist is beyond compare.
cn: 她作为钢琴家的才华无与伦比。

en: The beauty of the sunset over the ocean was beyond compare.
cn: 海洋上日落的美丽无与伦比。

en: I agree with you on that score; we need to improve our communication.
cn: 在那一点上我同意你；我们需要改进沟通。

en: On that score, the project has been a success despite the delays.
cn: 就那方面而言，尽管有延迟，项目还是成功的。

en: After completing the last assignment, we will embark on another team project next month.
cn: 完成上一个任务后，我们下个月将开始另一个团队项目。

en: The company decided to embark on another team project to develop a new product line.
cn: 公司决定开始另一个团队项目来开发新产品线。

en: International trade has increased significantly due to globalization.
cn: 由于全球化，国际贸易显著增加。

en: The company specializes in international trade of agricultural products.
cn: 这家公司专门从事农产品的国际贸易。

en: The report provides valuable insight into consumer behavior.
cn: 这份报告提供了对消费者行为的宝贵洞察。

en: Her experience gave her deep insight into the challenges of entrepreneurship.
cn: 她的经历让她对创业的挑战有了深刻的洞察。

en: I check online news every morning to stay updated on current events.
cn: 我每天早上查看在线新闻以了解时事。

en: She uses her phone to check online news during her commute.
cn: 她在通勤期间用手机查看在线新闻。

en: Many students feel stressed during exam periods.
cn: 许多学生在考试期间感到压力。

en: He started to feel stressed when the workload increased at his job.
cn: 当工作负荷增加时，他开始感到压力。

en: Patients with contagious diseases are isolated from others to prevent spread.
cn: 传染病患者被隔离以防止传播。

en: He isolated himself from social media to focus on his studies.
cn: 他脱离社交媒体以专注于学习。

en: Despite the pressure, she refused to back down from her decision.
cn: 尽管有压力，她拒绝从决定中退缩。

en: The government backed down on the tax increase after public protests.
cn: 在公众抗议后，政府在增税问题上让步了。

en: After losing three major clients, the company is on the ropes financially.
cn: 失去三个大客户后，公司在财务上处于困境。

en: The boxer was on the ropes in the final round, barely defending himself.
cn: 拳击手在最后一轮处于困境，几乎无法自卫。

en: She always finds fault with my cooking, no matter how hard I try.
cn: 无论我多努力，她总是挑剔我的厨艺。

en: The manager tends to find fault with employees' reports to push for perfection.
cn: 经理倾向于挑剔员工的报告，以追求完美。

en: He talked so much that no one could get a word in edgeways.
cn: 他说得太多，以至于没人能插话。

en: During the debate, she struggled to get a word in edgeways against the more vocal participants.
cn: 在辩论中，她很难在更健谈的参与者面前插话。

en: We need to take steps to reduce our carbon footprint immediately.
cn: 我们需要立即采取措施减少碳足迹。

en: The school took steps to improve safety after the incident.
cn: 事件发生后，学校采取措施提高了安全性。

en: Students have access to the library database for research purposes.
cn: 学生有权访问图书馆数据库进行研究。

en: The new policy grants access to healthcare for all citizens.
cn: 新政策授予所有公民医疗保健使用权。

en: Protesters chanted 'down with the government' during the rally.
cn: 抗议者在集会上高呼'打倒政府'。

en: Down with unfair policies that harm the environment!
cn: 打倒损害环境的不公平政策！

en: Completing the project gave her a strong sense of progress.
cn: 完成项目给了她强烈的进步感。

en: Regular feedback helps employees maintain a sense of progress in their work.
cn: 定期反馈帮助员工在工作中保持进步感。

en: The university invested in new teaching facilities to enhance learning.
cn: 大学投资了新教学设施以提升学习效果。

en: Modern teaching facilities include smart boards and computer labs.
cn: 现代教学设施包括智能白板和计算机实验室。

en: The ebb and flow of the stock market can be unpredictable.
cn: 股市的涨落可能难以预测。

en: Life has its natural ebb and flow of good and bad times.
cn: 生活有其自然的起伏，有顺境也有逆境。

en: His jokes kept the audience in stitches throughout the show.
cn: 他的笑话让观众在整个演出中笑个不停。

en: The comedian's story about his cat kept us all in stitches.
cn: 喜剧演员关于他猫的故事让我们都笑个不停。

en: He passed out from exhaustion after running the marathon.
cn: 跑完马拉松后，他因疲惫昏倒了。

en: The teacher will pass out the exam papers in a few minutes.
cn: 老师将在几分钟内分发试卷。

en: I prefer tea to coffee in the morning.
cn: 早上我更喜欢茶而不是咖啡。

en: She prefers reading books to watching TV for entertainment.
cn: 作为娱乐，她更喜欢读书而不是看电视。

en: The new regulations inflict additional costs upon small businesses.
cn: 新规定给小企业强加了额外成本。

en: He didn't want to inflict his problems upon his friends.
cn: 他不想把自己的问题强加给朋友。

en: I caught sight of a rare bird while hiking in the forest.
cn: 在森林徒步时，我瞥见了一只稀有鸟类。

en: She caught sight of her friend across the crowded room.
cn: 她在拥挤的房间对面瞥见了她的朋友。

en: He had a brush with the law when he was caught speeding.
cn: 他因超速被逮时与法律有了短暂冲突。

en: She had a brush with fame when her photo went viral online.
cn: 当她的照片在网上疯传时，她与名声有了短暂接触。

en: I got a dirty look from my neighbor when I parked in his spot.
cn: 当我停在他的车位时，我收到了邻居厌恶的眼神。

en: She got a dirty look from the teacher for talking during class.
cn: 她因上课说话收到了老师厌恶的眼神。

en: Do you got the time to help me with this project?
cn: 你有时间帮我做这个项目吗？

en: Excuse me, have you got the time? My watch stopped.
cn: 打扰一下，你知道时间吗？我的表停了。

en: The hotel provides fresh bed linen daily.
cn: 酒店每天提供干净的床上用品。

en: She prefers cotton bed linen for its breathability.
cn: 她更喜欢棉质床上用品，因为它透气性好。

en: Keep in mind that the deadline is next Friday.
cn: 记住截止日期是下周五。

en: When planning the trip, keep the budget in mind.
cn: 计划旅行时，要考虑预算。

en: Some people pursue material goods at the expense of personal relationships.
cn: 有些人以牺牲人际关系为代价追求物质财富。

en: In consumer societies, many are encouraged to pursue material goods.
cn: 在消费社会中，许多人被鼓励追求物质商品。

en: The team reached a consensus about the project timeline.
cn: 团队就项目时间表达成了共识。

en: There is a broad consensus about the need for environmental protection.
cn: 关于环境保护的必要性，存在广泛的共识。

en: As a student, I had to get along on a shoestring budget.
cn: 作为学生，我不得不靠极少的预算维持生活。

en: The startup managed to get along on a shoestring until it secured funding.
cn: 这家初创公司在获得资金前，一直用极少的钱维持运营。

en: On the one hand, the job offers a high salary; on the other hand, it requires long hours.
cn: 一方面，这份工作薪水高；另一方面，它需要长时间工作。

en: On the one hand, technology improves efficiency; on the other hand, it can lead to job losses.
cn: 一方面，技术提高了效率；另一方面，它可能导致失业。

en: She impressed the interviewers with her extensive knowledge.
cn: 她用广博的知识给面试官留下了深刻印象。

en: He impressed his guests with a gourmet meal.
cn: 他用一顿美食给客人留下了深刻印象。

en: Children tend to learn languages more quickly than adults.
cn: 儿童往往比成年人学习语言更快。

en: He tends to avoid conflict in discussions.
cn: 他倾向于在讨论中避免冲突。

en: What has become of your old friend from school?
cn: 你学校的老朋友后来怎么样了？

en: I wonder what will become of that abandoned building.
cn: 我想知道那座废弃建筑会变成什么样子。

en: Don't worry, I was just pulling your leg about the test.
cn: 别担心，我只是在考试的事上跟你开玩笑。

en: He often pulls his friends' legs with funny stories.
cn: 他经常用有趣的故事戏弄朋友。

en: I'm not in the least interested in that topic.
cn: 我对那个话题一点也不感兴趣。

en: She wasn't in the least surprised by the news.
cn: 她对这消息一点也不感到惊讶。

en: The store is selling winter coats at a discount.
cn: 这家商店正在打折销售冬装外套。

en: He bought the car at a discount because it was a demo model.
cn: 他以折扣价买了这辆车，因为它是展示车。

en: She gets along well with her colleagues at work.
cn: 她在工作中与同事相处得很好。

en: It's important to get along with your neighbors.
cn: 与邻居相处融洽很重要。

en: Keep a first aid kit on hand in case of emergencies.
cn: 手边备一个急救箱，以防紧急情况。

en: We have extra supplies on hand for the event.
cn: 我们手边有额外的物资用于这次活动。

en: In research papers, key words help in indexing and searching.
cn: 在研究论文中，关键词有助于索引和搜索。

en: The key word in his speech was 'innovation'.
cn: 他演讲中的关键词是'创新'。

en: I need to recharge my phone's batteries before we leave.
cn: 在我们离开前，我需要给手机电池充电。

en: After a busy week, she took a vacation to recharge her batteries.
cn: 忙碌一周后，她休假以恢复精力。

en: The two companies came to terms on the merger deal.
cn: 两家公司就合并交易达成了协议。

en: It took him years to come to terms with his loss.
cn: 他花了好几年才接受自己的损失。

en: A number of students were absent from class today.
cn: 今天有一些学生缺课。

en: We received a number of complaints about the service.
cn: 我们收到了一些关于服务的投诉。

en: Boil water before drinking it to ensure it's safe.
cn: 喝水前先烧开以确保安全。

en: She boiled water to make a cup of tea.
cn: 她烧开水泡了一杯茶。

en: Solving this complex problem is beyond the capability of a single person.
cn: 解决这个复杂问题超出了单个人的能力。

en: The advanced technology is beyond the capability of our current team.
cn: 这项先进技术超出了我们当前团队的能力范围。

en: Overcoming challenges helps build character in young adults.
cn: 克服挑战有助于培养年轻人的品格。

en: Military service is often said to build character through discipline.
cn: 人们常说，通过纪律约束，服兵役可以塑造性格。

en: The new superhero movie was a box office smash, earning over $1 billion worldwide.
cn: 这部新的超级英雄电影票房大卖，全球收入超过10亿美元。

en: Her Broadway debut became a box office smash, with tickets selling out for months.
cn: 她的百老汇首演票房大卖，门票售罄长达数月。

en: The store will offer a discount of 20% on all items during the holiday sale.
cn: 在假日促销期间，这家商店将对所有商品提供20%的折扣。

en: To attract new customers, the company decided to offer a discount on first-time purchases.
cn: 为了吸引新客户，公司决定对首次购买提供折扣。

en: The politician did a flip-flop on the tax policy after public pressure.
cn: 在公众压力下，这位政治家在税收政策上改变了立场。

en: She did a flip-flop on her decision to move abroad, citing family reasons.
cn: 她出尔反尔，改变了移居国外的决定，理由是家庭原因。

en: Her success is rooted in years of hard work and dedication.
cn: 她的成功根植于多年的辛勤工作和奉献。

en: The tradition is rooted in ancient cultural practices that date back centuries.
cn: 这个传统根植于可以追溯到几个世纪前的古老文化习俗。

en: For some reason, the computer keeps crashing whenever I open that program.
cn: 出于某种原因，每当我打开那个程序时，电脑就会崩溃。

en: He was late for the meeting for some reason he didn't explain.
cn: 他开会迟到了，出于某种他没有解释的原因。

en: You can either take the bus or walk to the station; both options are available.
cn: 你可以要么乘公交车，要么步行去车站；两种选择都可以。

en: Either finish your homework now or you won't be allowed to watch TV later.
cn: 要么现在完成作业，要么你稍后就不能看电视。

en: Investing in startups can run a risk of losing your entire capital.
cn: 投资初创公司可能会冒损失全部资本的风险。

en: If you don't wear a helmet, you run a risk of serious injury while biking.
cn: 如果你不戴头盔，骑自行车时可能会冒严重受伤的风险。

en: As a public figure, he has a glass jaw and gets upset over minor criticisms.
cn: 作为一名公众人物，他很容易受到打击，对轻微的批评就会感到不安。

en: In boxing, a fighter with a glass jaw is likely to be knocked out easily.
cn: 在拳击中，下巴脆弱的拳击手很可能容易被击倒。

en: The prosecutor plans to bring the suspect to trial next month for the alleged crime.
cn: 检察官计划下个月将嫌疑人送上法庭审判，指控其犯罪。

en: After gathering enough evidence, the authorities decided to bring the corrupt official to trial.
cn: 收集到足够证据后，当局决定将这名腐败官员送上法庭审判。

en: As a journalist, she must keep abreast of current events to report accurately.
cn: 作为一名记者，她必须了解最新事件，以便准确报道。

en: He reads industry journals daily to keep abreast of technological advancements.
cn: 他每天阅读行业期刊，以了解技术进展的最新情况。

en: The contract terms are written in black and white, so there should be no confusion.
cn: 合同条款写得黑白分明，因此不应该有任何混淆。

en: She sees the world in black and white, with little room for gray areas.
cn: 她看世界黑白分明，几乎没有灰色地带的余地。

en: Parents work hard to provide for their children's education and well-being.
cn: 父母努力工作，以供养孩子的教育和福祉。

en: The government program aims to provide for the basic needs of low-income families.
cn: 政府计划旨在为低收入家庭提供基本需求。

en: While traveling in a new city, it's wise to keep your eyes open for pickpockets.
cn: 在新城市旅行时，明智的做法是保持警惕，留意扒手。

en: Keep your eyes open for any job opportunities that might arise in the industry.
cn: 留意行业中可能出现的任何工作机会。

en: The committee reviewed the proposal to do a feasibility study on the new project.
cn: 委员会审查了关于对新项目进行可行性研究的提议。

en: She submitted a proposal to do volunteer work abroad during the summer break.
cn: 她提交了一份在暑假期间去国外做志愿工作的提议。

en: After the surgery, it took him a few months to be back on his feet and return to work.
cn: 手术后，他花了几个月时间才恢复健康并重返工作岗位。

en: With some financial help, she managed to be back on her feet after losing her job.
cn: 在一些经济帮助下，她在失业后设法重新站了起来。

en: The government is working to improve the living conditions in urban slums.
cn: 政府正在努力改善城市贫民窟的生活条件。

en: Access to clean water is a basic aspect of good living conditions.
cn: 获得清洁水是良好生活条件的基本方面。

en: To avoid misunderstandings, always clarify expectations in writing.
cn: 为避免误解，务必以书面形式明确期望。

en: She spoke slowly to avoid misunderstandings during the negotiation.
cn: 她说话很慢，以避免谈判中的误解。

en: Volunteering makes me feel like I'm part of the community.
cn: 志愿服务让我感觉自己属于社区的一部分。

en: Being part of a community provides a sense of belonging.
cn: 作为社区的一部分能带来归属感。

en: His success has a lot to do with his dedication.
cn: 他的成功很大程度上与他的奉献精神有关。

en: This decision has nothing to do with personal feelings.
cn: 这个决定与个人感情无关。

en: Turbidity currents can transport sediment across the ocean floor.
cn: 浊流能将沉积物输送过海底。

en: Scientists study turbidity currents to understand underwater landslides.
cn: 科学家研究浊流以了解水下滑坡。

en: She learned the poem by heart for the recitation contest.
cn: 她为朗诵比赛熟记了这首诗。

en: He knows all the lyrics by heart and sings along perfectly.
cn: 他熟记所有歌词，能完美地跟着唱。

en: The manager gave the team to understand that deadlines must be met without exception.
cn: 经理让团队理解，截止日期必须无一例外地满足。

en: His tone gave me to understand that he was not pleased with the results.
cn: 他的语气让我理解，他对结果不满意。

en: It is illegal to discriminate against someone based on their race.
cn: 基于种族歧视他人是非法的。

en: The company was fined for discriminating against older applicants.
cn: 该公司因歧视年长申请者而被罚款。

en: Her quick-witted response saved the awkward situation.
cn: 她机智的回答化解了尴尬的局面。

en: A quick-witted detective can solve cases faster.
cn: 机智的侦探能更快破案。

en: We're planning a trip to Europe for the summer holiday.
cn: 我们计划在暑假去欧洲旅行。

en: Students look forward to the summer holiday after exams.
cn: 学生们在考试后期待着暑假。

en: The project has been on the shelf due to budget cuts.
cn: 由于预算削减，这个项目被搁置了。

en: Old books often end up on the shelf, forgotten.
cn: 旧书常常被闲置在书架上，被人遗忘。

en: I saw him just now at the coffee shop.
cn: 我刚才在咖啡店看到他了。

en: We're busy just now, but can call back later.
cn: 我们此刻很忙，但可以稍后回电。

en: Her colleagues think highly of her work ethic.
cn: 她的同事们高度评价她的职业道德。

en: I think highly of anyone who volunteers their time.
cn: 我尊重任何自愿奉献时间的人。

en: He found it hard to part with his childhood toys.
cn: 他发现很难放弃童年的玩具。

en: She had to part with her savings to pay for the emergency.
cn: 她不得不动用积蓄来支付紧急费用。

en: Please sign in to your account to access the files.
cn: 请登录您的账户以访问文件。

en: Guests must sign in at the reception upon arrival.
cn: 客人到达时必须在接待处签到。

en: She decided to take up painting as a new hobby.
cn: 她决定开始学习绘画作为新爱好。

en: This meeting will take up most of the afternoon.
cn: 这次会议将占用下午的大部分时间。

en: Students worked in pairs to complete the experiment.
cn: 学生们两人一组完成实验。

en: The dance requires participants to move in pairs.
cn: 这支舞要求参与者成对移动。

en: They have something going with that new project.
cn: 他们在那个新项目上有所进展。

en: I think there's something going between those two coworkers.
cn: 我觉得那两个同事之间有点事情。

en: The athlete must show discipline in training to achieve peak performance.
cn: 运动员必须在训练中表现出自律以达到最佳表现。

en: Students who show discipline in their studies often earn higher grades.
cn: 在学习中表现出自律的学生通常能获得更高的成绩。

en: The comments were made off the record and shouldn't be published.
cn: 这些评论是非正式的，不应被公开。

en: Let's discuss this off the record to avoid any leaks.
cn: 我们非正式地讨论这个，以避免任何泄露。

en: The research was conducted in collaboration with several universities.
cn: 这项研究是与几所大学合作进行的。

en: They launched the product in collaboration with a tech startup.
cn: 他们与一家科技初创公司合作推出了这款产品。

en: Moving to a new country often causes culture shock.
cn: 搬到新国家常常会引起文化冲击。

en: He experienced culture shock when he first arrived in Japan.
cn: 他初到日本时经历了文化冲击。

en: The company had to take a drastic step and lay off half its workforce to survive.
cn: 公司不得不采取极端措施，裁员一半以生存下去。

en: To combat climate change, governments must take drastic steps to reduce emissions.
cn: 为了应对气候变化，政府必须采取激进措施减少排放。

en: She is bucking for a promotion by taking on extra projects.
cn: 她通过承担额外项目来努力争取晋升。

en: He has been bucking for the manager position for months.
cn: 他几个月来一直在谋求经理职位。

en: I have yet to finish my homework, so I can't go out.
cn: 我尚未完成作业，所以不能出去。

en: The results have yet to be announced by the committee.
cn: 委员会尚未公布结果。

en: I have faith in my team's ability to win the championship.
cn: 我相信我的团队有能力赢得冠军。

en: Parents should have faith in their children's decisions.
cn: 父母应该信任孩子的决定。

en: The tennis player is in good form and won the match easily.
cn: 这位网球选手状态良好，轻松赢得了比赛。

en: After a week of rest, the singer was in good form for the concert.
cn: 休息一周后，歌手在音乐会上状态良好。

en: She enrolled in the Faculty of Law to study criminal justice.
cn: 她进入法学院学习刑事司法。

en: The Faculty of Law at this university is renowned for its research.
cn: 这所大学的法学院以其研究而闻名。

en: The author invested the character with great wisdom and courage.
cn: 作者赋予这个角色极大的智慧和勇气。

en: The ceremony invested the event with a sense of tradition.
cn: 仪式赋予这个事件一种传统感。

en: We can't afford to buy a new car this year.
cn: 我们今年买不起新车。

en: He can afford to travel abroad every summer.
cn: 他每年夏天都有经济能力出国旅行。

en: The sailors were at sea for three months during the voyage.
cn: 水手们在航行期间在海上航行了三个月。

en: The ship is currently at sea, heading towards the port.
cn: 船目前正在海上，驶向港口。

en: The car moved in reverse to park in the tight space.
cn: 汽车倒车以停入狭窄的空间。

en: She read the list in reverse order, starting from the bottom.
cn: 她从底部开始，以相反的顺序阅读列表。

en: The accountant is responsible for managing financial records accurately.
cn: 会计师负责准确管理财务记录。

en: Small businesses must manage financial records to track expenses and income.
cn: 小企业必须管理财务记录以跟踪支出和收入。

en: The government attempted to cover up political scandals to avoid public outrage.
cn: 政府试图掩盖政治丑闻以避免公众愤怒。

en: Journalists exposed efforts to cover up political scandals involving corruption.
cn: 记者揭露了掩盖涉及腐败的政治丑闻的努力。

en: The job market is competitive, with many applicants for few positions.
cn: 就业市场竞争激烈，许多申请者竞争少数职位。

en: Graduates are entering the job market during an economic downturn.
cn: 毕业生在经济低迷时期进入就业市场。

en: She knows better than to trust strangers online.
cn: 她明智到不会信任网上的陌生人。

en: He knows better than to skip breakfast before a long day.
cn: 他明智到不会在漫长的一天前跳过早餐。

en: The product must conform with safety regulations before sale.
cn: 产品在销售前必须符合安全规定。

en: Her actions conform with the company's ethical guidelines.
cn: 她的行为符合公司的道德准则。

en: She peeled off the sticker from the book cover.
cn: 她从书封上撕下了贴纸。

en: The paint began to peel off the old wall.
cn: 油漆开始从旧墙上剥落。

en: Soldiers must survive in the hostile environment of a war zone.
cn: 士兵必须在战区的敌对环境中生存。

en: The plant adapted to grow in the hostile environment of the desert.
cn: 这种植物适应了在沙漠的敌对环境中生长。

en: Smoking is a major risk factor for developing laryngeal cancer.
cn: 吸烟是患喉癌的主要风险因素。

en: Early detection of laryngeal cancer can improve treatment outcomes.
cn: 早期发现喉癌可以改善治疗结果。

en: If the service is poor, you should make a complaint to the manager.
cn: 如果服务不好，你应该向经理投诉。

en: She made a complaint about the noisy neighbors to the landlord.
cn: 她向房东投诉了吵闹的邻居。

en: Athletes always warm up before a race to prevent injuries.
cn: 运动员在比赛前总是热身以防止受伤。

en: She warmed up with some light stretching before her workout.
cn: 她在锻炼前通过轻度拉伸来热身。

en: He was accused of stealing money from the company.
cn: 他被指控从公司偷钱。

en: The politician was accused of corruption by the media.
cn: 这位政治家被媒体指控腐败。

en: We need to get ready for the big exam next week.
cn: 我们需要为下周的大考做准备。

en: She's getting ready for her wedding day.
cn: 她正在为婚礼日做准备。

en: The company reported double-digit growth in sales this quarter.
cn: 该公司报告本季度销售额实现了两位数增长。

en: Inflation reached double-digit levels for the first time in years.
cn: 通货膨胀多年来首次达到两位数水平。

en: I have classes every morning from 9 to 12.
cn: 我每天早上9点到12点有课。

en: Do you have classes on weekends?
cn: 你周末有课吗？

en: They decided to give away old clothes to charity.
cn: 他们决定把旧衣服捐赠给慈善机构。

en: The company will give away free samples at the event.
cn: 公司将在活动中分发免费样品。

en: At the buffet, you can eat to your heart's content.
cn: 在自助餐上，你可以尽情地吃。

en: She read books to her heart's content during the holiday.
cn: 假期里她尽情地读书。

en: She stood on the hill, drinking in the beautiful sunset.
cn: 她站在山上，尽情欣赏美丽的日落。

en: He drank in every word of the inspiring speech.
cn: 他吸收了那场鼓舞人心演讲的每一个字。

en: Please keep off the grass to protect the lawn.
cn: 请远离草坪以保护草地。

en: He kept off sugary foods to improve his health.
cn: 他避开含糖食物以改善健康。

en: It's important to complete work on time to meet deadlines.
cn: 按时完成工作以满足截止日期很重要。

en: She always manages to complete work on time, even under pressure.
cn: 即使在压力下，她也总能按时完成工作。

en: The police tracked down the suspect after a week-long search.
cn: 经过一周的搜寻，警察追踪找到了嫌疑人。

en: I finally tracked down that rare book in an online store.
cn: 我终于在一家网店搜寻到了那本稀有书籍。

en: Please enter the website address in the browser to access the page.
cn: 请在浏览器中输入网址以访问该页面。

en: I forgot the website address for the online store.
cn: 我忘了那个在线商店的网址。

en: He had a close shave when the car almost hit him.
cn: 汽车差点撞到他时，他侥幸脱险。

en: We had a close shave with missing our flight by just a few minutes.
cn: 我们差点错过航班，只差几分钟，真是侥幸。

en: She decided to take up painting as a hobby.
cn: 她决定开始学习绘画作为爱好。

en: He took up the challenge of learning a new language.
cn: 他接受了学习一门新语言的挑战。

en: My friend is going to sleep over at my house tonight.
cn: 今晚我的朋友要在我家过夜。

en: We had a sleepover party with movies and snacks.
cn: 我们举办了一个有电影和零食的过夜派对。

en: The damages were in excess of $10,000.
cn: 损失超过10,000美元。

en: The temperature rose in excess of 40 degrees Celsius.
cn: 温度上升到超过40摄氏度。

en: It's time to put our new ideas into practice.
cn: 是时候把我们的新想法付诸实践了。

en: She put the training she received into practice at work.
cn: 她在工作中实施了所接受的培训。

en: To her delight, she received a promotion at work.
cn: 令她高兴的是，她在工作中获得了晋升。

en: To our delight, the weather cleared up for the picnic.
cn: 令我们高兴的是，天气转晴适合野餐。

en: I need to get this secret off my chest; it's been bothering me for years.
cn: 我需要把这个秘密说出来，它困扰我多年了。

en: After getting his worries off his chest, he felt much lighter.
cn: 倾诉完他的担忧后，他感觉轻松多了。

en: She walked away with the first prize in the competition.
cn: 她轻松赢得了比赛的一等奖。

en: The team walked away with the championship trophy.
cn: 该队轻松获得了冠军奖杯。

en: The charity is raising money for disaster relief.
cn: 该慈善机构正在为救灾筹集资金。

en: We need to raise money to expand our business.
cn: 我们需要筹集资金来扩展业务。

en: What can I do for you today?
cn: 今天我能为您做些什么？

en: She did a lot for the community by volunteering.
cn: 她通过志愿服务为社区做了很多。

en: Scientists are developing a new type of fuel that reduces carbon emissions.
cn: 科学家正在开发一种减少碳排放的新型燃料。

en: This car runs on a new type of fuel made from algae.
cn: 这辆车使用一种由藻类制成的新型燃料。

en: Please set down your bags and take a seat.
cn: 请放下你的包，坐下。

en: He set down his thoughts in a journal.
cn: 他在日记中记下了自己的想法。

en: Come off it, you know that's not true!
cn: 别胡说了，你知道那不是真的！

en: Oh, come off it, you can't expect me to believe that.
cn: 哦，算了吧，你别指望我相信那个。

en: We'll stop off in Paris on our way to Rome.
cn: 我们在去罗马的途中会在巴黎停留。

en: He stopped off at a café for a quick coffee.
cn: 他在一家咖啡馆中途停留，快速喝了杯咖啡。

en: Can you spell out your plan so everyone understands?
cn: 你能详细说明你的计划，让大家都明白吗？

en: The teacher asked the student to spell out the difficult word.
cn: 老师让学生拼写出那个难词。

en: We've got the contract sewed up, so we can relax now.
cn: 我们已经搞定了合同，现在可以放松了。

en: She got the promotion sewed up with her excellent performance.
cn: 她凭借出色的表现确保了晋升。

en: The company needs to tighten up its security measures.
cn: 公司需要加强其安全措施。

en: We should tighten up the budget to save money.
cn: 我们应该收紧预算以节省资金。

en: The store offers a full refund if you're not satisfied.
cn: 如果您不满意，该店提供全额退款。

en: I requested a full refund for the defective product.
cn: 我为有缺陷的产品要求了全额退款。

en: To find the area, multiply the length by the width.
cn: 要找到面积，将长度乘以宽度。

en: If you multiply 5 by 3, you get 15.
cn: 如果你将5乘以3，得到15。

en: After paying off some debts, I finally have my head above water.
cn: 还清一些债务后，我终于勉强维持了。

en: With this new job, she can keep her head above water financially.
cn: 有了这份新工作，她能在财务上勉强维持。

en: Many species face a high risk of extinction due to habitat loss.
cn: 许多物种因栖息地丧失而面临高度灭绝风险。

en: Polar bears face a high risk of extinction because of climate change.
cn: 北极熊因气候变化而面临高度灭绝风险。

en: As far as I know, the meeting is still scheduled for tomorrow.
cn: 据我所知，会议仍定于明天举行。

en: He hasn't arrived yet, as far as I know.
cn: 据我所知，他还没到。

en: I was out of pocket after paying for the repairs.
cn: 支付维修费用后，我自掏腰包了。

en: The business venture left him out of pocket by thousands.
cn: 这次商业冒险让他亏损了数千元。

en: The new policy is subject to approval by the board.
cn: 新政策需经董事会批准。

en: Prices are subject to change without notice.
cn: 价格如有变动，恕不另行通知。

en: She is able to speak three languages fluently.
cn: 她能够流利地说三种语言。

en: Will you be able to attend the meeting tomorrow?
cn: 你明天能参加会议吗？

en: The journalist managed to get something on the politician to pressure him.
cn: 记者设法掌握了那位政治家的把柄来施压。

en: If you get something on your rival, you can use it in negotiations.
cn: 如果你掌握了对手的把柄，可以在谈判中加以利用。

en: Employees earn salaries based on their experience and performance.
cn: 员工根据经验和表现赚取薪水。

en: In this company, managers earn higher salaries than assistants.
cn: 在这家公司，经理比助理赚更高的薪水。

en: Scientists are researching into the causes of climate change.
cn: 科学家们正在深入研究气候变化的原因。

en: Her thesis involves researching into ancient Roman history.
cn: 她的论文涉及对古罗马历史的深入研究。

en: I often dream about flying when I sleep.
cn: 我睡觉时经常梦见飞翔。

en: She dreamed about her childhood home last night.
cn: 她昨晚梦见了童年的家。

en: The ethics of artificial intelligence is a complicated question.
cn: 人工智能的伦理是一个复杂的问题。

en: Solving climate change involves many complicated questions.
cn: 解决气候变化涉及许多复杂的问题。

en: When I give him advice, it goes in one ear and out the other.
cn: 我给他建议时，他总是左耳进右耳出。

en: The teacher's instructions went in one ear and out the other for the distracted student.
cn: 老师的话对那个分心的学生来说左耳进右耳出。

en: Please stick the label on the package before shipping.
cn: 请在发货前把标签贴在包裹上。

en: Kids love to stick stickers on their notebooks.
cn: 孩子们喜欢把贴纸贴在笔记本上。

en: Tourists descend on the beach town every summer.
cn: 每年夏天游客大量涌入这个海滩小镇。

en: Reporters descended on the scene after the accident.
cn: 事故发生后，记者们蜂拥而至现场。

en: The school provides students with textbooks at the beginning of the year.
cn: 学校在年初为学生提供教科书。

en: Can you provide me with more details about the project?
cn: 你能提供更多关于这个项目的细节吗？

en: The museum offers free entry on Sundays.
cn: 博物馆周日提供免费入场。

en: There is free entry to the concert for children under 12.
cn: 12岁以下儿童可免费入场音乐会。

en: The job requires applicants to have a master's degree.
cn: 这份工作要求申请者拥有硕士学位。

en: The law requires drivers to wear seat belts.
cn: 法律要求司机系安全带。

en: The bright colors of the painting drew my attention immediately.
cn: 画作的鲜艳色彩立刻吸引了我的注意力。

en: She raised her hand to draw the teacher's attention.
cn: 她举手以吸引老师的注意力。

en: I learned of his promotion through a company email.
cn: 我通过公司邮件得知了他的晋升。

en: She learned of the accident from the news report.
cn: 她从新闻报道中获悉了事故。

en: The nurse will attend to the patient's needs shortly.
cn: 护士将很快处理病人的需求。

en: Please attend to this matter as soon as possible.
cn: 请尽快处理此事。

en: Don't let all that food go to waste; we can donate it to a shelter.
cn: 别让那些食物浪费掉，我们可以捐给收容所。

en: His talent went to waste because he never pursued his passion for music.
cn: 他的才华被浪费了，因为他从未追求自己对音乐的热爱。

en: She decided to vote against the proposal due to its environmental impact.
cn: 由于环境影响，她决定投票反对这项提案。

en: Many senators voted against the bill, leading to its failure.
cn: 许多参议员投票反对该法案，导致其失败。

en: The advanced physics lecture went right over my head.
cn: 那场高级物理讲座完全超出了我的理解范围。

en: Her explanation of the stock market was over my head; I couldn't grasp it.
cn: 她对股市的解释我理解不了，我无法掌握。

en: The dog came at me barking loudly.
cn: 那只狗大声吠叫着冲向我。

en: He came at his opponent with a fierce punch.
cn: 他用一记猛拳攻击对手。

en: By studying extra hours, she managed to get an edge on her classmates.
cn: 通过额外学习几个小时，她成功获得了对同学的优势。

en: The new technology gave our company an edge on the competition.
cn: 这项新技术使我们公司在竞争中获得了优势。

en: If you break that vase, Mom will have your hide!
cn: 如果你打碎那个花瓶，妈妈会狠狠惩罚你的！

en: The boss said he'd have our hides if we missed the deadline again.
cn: 老板说如果我们再错过截止日期，他会让我们吃不了兜着走。

en: I need to ask for leave next week to attend a family event.
cn: 我下周需要请假参加一个家庭活动。

en: She asked for leave due to illness and provided a doctor's note.
cn: 她因病请假，并提供了医生证明。

en: We should cut down on sugar to improve our health.
cn: 我们应该减少糖的摄入以改善健康。

en: The company plans to cut down expenses by 10% this year.
cn: 公司计划今年削减10%的开支。

en: The weather conditions are favorable to outdoor activities today.
cn: 今天的天气条件有利于户外活动。

en: The new policy is favorable to small businesses.
cn: 新政策对小企业有利。

en: After the long break, the athlete felt out of condition for the race.
cn: 长假过后，这位运动员感觉状态不佳，不适合比赛。

en: He's been out of condition lately due to lack of exercise.
cn: 他最近由于缺乏锻炼，身体状况不佳。

en: The company will release news about its new product next week.
cn: 公司将于下周发布关于其新产品的新闻。

en: Journalists rushed to release news of the election results.
cn: 记者们急忙发布选举结果的新闻。

en: The advent of the internet revolutionized communication.
cn: 互联网的出现彻底改变了通信方式。

en: With the advent of spring, flowers began to bloom everywhere.
cn: 随着春天的到来，到处都开始开花。

en: The city's public transport system includes buses, subways, and trams.
cn: 这座城市的公共交通系统包括公交车、地铁和有轨电车。

en: Investing in the public transport system can reduce traffic congestion.
cn: 投资公共交通系统可以减少交通拥堵。

en: There is no substitute for hard work when it comes to success.
cn: 在成功方面，没有什么可以替代努力工作。

en: Fresh ingredients are no substitute for in cooking delicious meals.
cn: 新鲜食材是烹饪美味佳肴无法替代的。

en: She started learning piano at the age of five.
cn: 她在五岁时开始学习钢琴。

en: At the age of 18, he moved out to live independently.
cn: 在18岁时，他搬出去独立生活。

en: The cat's hunting instincts kicked in when it saw a mouse.
cn: 猫看到老鼠时，它的狩猎本能被激发了。

en: Wolves rely on their hunting instincts to survive in the wild.
cn: 狼依靠狩猎本能在野外生存。

en: After visiting the museum, she developed a serious interest in ancient history.
cn: 参观博物馆后，她对古代历史产生了浓厚兴趣。

en: He developed a serious interest in photography during his college years.
cn: 他在大学期间对摄影产生了浓厚兴趣。

en: There are several restaurants in the vicinity of the hotel.
cn: 酒店附近有几家餐厅。

en: The project cost is in the vicinity of $1 million.
cn: 项目成本大约在100万美元左右。

en: Global temperatures are on the increase due to climate change.
cn: 由于气候变化，全球气温正在上升。

en: Crime rates in the area have been on the increase over the past year.
cn: 过去一年，该地区的犯罪率一直在增加。

en: We plan to make a trip to Japan next summer.
cn: 我们计划明年夏天去日本旅行。

en: He made a trip to the grocery store to buy some milk.
cn: 他去了一趟杂货店买牛奶。

en: Please keep the dog out of the kitchen while I'm cooking.
cn: 我做饭时请把狗挡在厨房外面。

en: The fence is designed to keep intruders out of the property.
cn: 栅栏的设计是为了防止入侵者进入该物业。

en: He ran up a large credit card bill during his vacation.
cn: 他在度假期间积累了一大笔信用卡账单。

en: The temperature ran up to 40 degrees Celsius in the afternoon.
cn: 下午温度快速上升到40摄氏度。

en: All employees must attend the meeting, and the manager is no exception.
cn: 所有员工都必须参加会议，经理也不例外。

en: The rule applies to everyone, with no exception.
cn: 这条规则适用于所有人，没有例外。

en: A rumor about the company's merger is going the rounds in the office.
cn: 关于公司合并的谣言在办公室里流传。

en: The doctor goes the rounds of the hospital wards every morning.
cn: 医生每天早上在医院病房巡回查房。

en: After the recent thefts, the security team is on their guard at all times.
cn: 最近发生盗窃案后，安保团队时刻保持警惕。

en: She was on her guard when walking alone at night in the unfamiliar city.
cn: 她独自一人在陌生城市夜间行走时非常警惕。

en: The project got into high gear after the funding was approved.
cn: 资金获批后，项目进入了高速运转状态。

en: As the deadline approaches, the team is getting into high gear to finish the report.
cn: 随着截止日期临近，团队正在加速完成报告。

en: It's hard to get a start in the competitive job market.
cn: 在竞争激烈的就业市场中很难获得开端。

en: The new business got a start with a small loan from the bank.
cn: 新业务从银行获得一笔小额贷款后开始了。

en: The team won three games in a row.
cn: 这个队连续赢了三场比赛。

en: The students sat in a row during the assembly.
cn: 学生们在集会时坐成一排。

en: She finally has a car of her own after years of saving.
cn: 经过多年储蓄，她终于有了属于自己的车。

en: Every child should have a room of their own for privacy.
cn: 每个孩子都应该有一个属于自己的房间以保护隐私。

en: Her speech was imbued with passion and conviction.
cn: 她的演讲充满了激情和信念。

en: The old house is imbued with a sense of history.
cn: 这所老房子充满了历史感。

en: This report is concerned with the environmental impact of the new factory.
cn: 这份报告涉及新工厂对环境的影响。

en: As a teacher, she is deeply concerned with her students' well-being.
cn: 作为一名教师，她非常关心学生的福祉。

en: The bubble economy of the 1990s led to a severe recession when it burst.
cn: 1990年代的泡沫经济破裂后导致了严重的经济衰退。

en: Experts warn that the current housing market might be a bubble economy.
cn: 专家警告当前的房地产市场可能是一种泡沫经济。

en: The company plans to send up a new satellite next month.
cn: 公司计划下个月发射一颗新卫星。

en: They sent up a distress signal when their boat started sinking.
cn: 船开始下沉时，他们发出了求救信号。

en: After the exams, the students went on a binge to celebrate.
cn: 考试结束后，学生们去狂欢庆祝。

en: He went on a shopping binge and spent all his savings.
cn: 他疯狂购物，花光了所有积蓄。

en: You needn't have bought tickets in advance; there were plenty available at the door.
cn: 你本不必提前买票；门口有很多票。

en: She needn't have worried about the exam; she passed with flying colors.
cn: 她本不必担心考试；她以优异成绩通过了。

en: She decided to confine herself to studying only the most relevant chapters.
cn: 她决定只学习最相关的章节。

en: During the pandemic, many people had to confine themselves to their homes.
cn: 疫情期间，许多人不得不将自己限制在家中。

en: The government provides special benefits for the elderly.
cn: 政府为老年人提供特殊福利。

en: It's important to show respect and care for the elderly in our community.
cn: 对我们社区的老年人表示尊重和关怀很重要。

en: The police took off after the speeding car.
cn: 警察追赶那辆超速行驶的汽车。

en: She took off after her dog when it ran into the street.
cn: 她的狗跑到街上时，她追了上去。

en: The temperature dropped down to freezing overnight.
cn: 夜间温度下降到了冰点。

en: She dropped down from the tree branch safely.
cn: 她从树枝上安全地落了下来。

en: There are lots of books on the shelf.
cn: 书架上有许多书。

en: She has lots of friends from different countries.
cn: 她有许多来自不同国家的朋友。

en: Achieving social recognition often requires consistent positive contributions to the community.
cn: 获得社会认可通常需要对社区做出持续的积极贡献。

en: The artist gained social recognition after her work was featured in a major exhibition.
cn: 这位艺术家在她的作品在大型展览中展出后获得了社会认可。

en: I congratulated him on his promotion at work.
cn: 我祝贺他工作晋升。

en: They congratulated the team on winning the championship.
cn: 他们祝贺团队赢得冠军。

en: I looked for my keys high and low but couldn't find them.
cn: 我到处找我的钥匙，但找不到。

en: They looked for the missing document high and low throughout the office.
cn: 他们在办公室里到处寻找那份丢失的文件。

en: The new employee training program is designed to orient staff to company policies.
cn: 新员工培训计划旨在使员工适应公司政策。

en: We need to orient our strategy to meet changing market demands.
cn: 我们需要调整策略以适应不断变化的市场需求。

en: The company's assets have a book value of $1 million.
cn: 该公司的资产账面价值为100万美元。

en: Investors often compare the market price to the book value of a stock.
cn: 投资者经常将市场价格与股票的账面价值进行比较。

en: The key point of the argument was that sustainability must be prioritized.
cn: 这个论点的关键点是必须优先考虑可持续性。

en: In her presentation, she highlighted the key points for successful project management.
cn: 在她的演示中，她强调了成功项目管理的关键点。

en: In many cultures, people are expected to conform to social norms regarding dress.
cn: 在许多文化中，人们被期望遵守关于着装的社会规范。

en: Teenagers sometimes rebel against the pressure to conform to social norms.
cn: 青少年有时会反抗遵守社会规范的压力。

en: The project is as good as finished; we just need to add the final touches.
cn: 这个项目差不多完成了；我们只需要做最后的润色。

en: With that mistake, his chances of winning are as good as gone.
cn: 犯了那个错误，他获胜的机会几乎没有了。

en: My heart goes out to the families affected by the natural disaster.
cn: 我同情受自然灾害影响的家庭。

en: She had her heart go out to the homeless people she met on the street.
cn: 她同情在街上遇到的无家可归者。

en: After a long day at work, he likes to lie down and relax.
cn: 在漫长的一天工作后，他喜欢躺下放松。

en: The doctor advised her to lie down if she felt dizzy.
cn: 医生建议她如果感到头晕就躺下。

en: Please turn on the lights; it's getting dark.
cn: 请打开灯；天变黑了。

en: He turned on the computer to start his work.
cn: 他打开电脑开始工作。

en: I look forward to meeting you next week.
cn: 我期待下周见到你。

en: Children often look forward to their birthdays with great excitement.
cn: 孩子们常常非常兴奋地期待他们的生日。

en: You need to make your mind up about which college to attend.
cn: 你需要决定上哪所大学。

en: After much thought, she made her mind up to quit her job and travel.
cn: 经过深思熟虑，她决定辞职去旅行。

en: I'm not sure what you're driving at with that comment.
cn: 我不确定你那个评论是什么意思。

en: Her long explanation was driving at the need for more funding.
cn: 她冗长的解释是在暗示需要更多资金。

en: It took a few minutes for the engine to start up in the cold weather.
cn: 在寒冷的天气里，发动机花了几分钟才启动。

en: She plans to start up a new business next year.
cn: 她计划明年创办一家新企业。

en: After the accident, he lost his sight completely.
cn: 事故后，他完全失明了。

en: She feared losing her sight due to the disease.
cn: 她担心因疾病而丧失视力。

en: The oil spill was an ecological disaster for the marine life in the area.
cn: 石油泄漏对该地区的海洋生物是一场生态灾难。

en: Deforestation can lead to ecological disasters such as soil erosion and loss of biodiversity.
cn: 森林砍伐可能导致土壤侵蚀和生物多样性丧失等生态灾难。

en: If you're planning a trip, count me in!
cn: 如果你计划旅行，算我一个！

en: We should count all expenses in when calculating the total cost.
cn: 计算总成本时，我们应该包括所有费用。

en: No wonder you're tired—you've been working all day.
cn: 难怪你累了——你已经工作了一整天。

en: It's no wonder she won the award with such talent.
cn: 她有如此才华，难怪赢得了奖项。

en: The company specializes in renewable energy solutions.
cn: 这家公司专门从事可再生能源解决方案。

en: She decided to specialize in pediatric medicine.
cn: 她决定专攻儿科医学。

en: In the midst of the storm, we found shelter.
cn: 在暴风雨中，我们找到了避难所。

en: She remained calm in the midst of chaos.
cn: 她在混乱中保持冷静。

en: The old song brought back fond memories of my childhood.
cn: 这首老歌唤起了我童年的美好回忆。

en: Visiting the park always brings back fond memories of family trips.
cn: 参观这个公园总是唤起家庭旅行的美好回忆。

en: She plans to get married to her longtime partner next year.
cn: 她计划明年与她的长期伴侣结婚。

en: They got married to each other in a small ceremony.
cn: 他们在一个小型仪式上结婚了。

en: The time difference between New York and London is five hours.
cn: 纽约和伦敦之间的时差是五个小时。

en: Adjusting to the time difference can be challenging for travelers.
cn: 适应时差对旅行者来说可能具有挑战性。

en: Upon my honour, I will keep this secret safe.
cn: 以我的名誉担保，我会保守这个秘密。

en: He swore upon his honour to tell the truth.
cn: 他郑重承诺说实话。

en: Regardless of the weather, the event will proceed.
cn: 不管天气如何，活动将继续进行。

en: He pursued his dreams regardless of the obstacles.
cn: 他不顾障碍追求自己的梦想。

en: I like to chat with my friends over coffee.
cn: 我喜欢和朋友们边喝咖啡边聊天。

en: She chatted with the customer to resolve the issue.
cn: 她与客户聊天以解决问题。

en: She blew out the candles and made a wish on her birthday.
cn: 她吹灭蜡烛，在生日时许了个愿。

en: Make a wish when you see a shooting star.
cn: 当你看到流星时，许个愿吧。

en: Kelp is a common ocean plant found in coastal waters.
cn: 海带是沿海水域常见的海洋植物。

en: Ocean plants play a crucial role in marine ecosystems.
cn: 海洋植物在海洋生态系统中起着至关重要的作用。

en: The company aims to grow business by expanding into new markets.
cn: 该公司旨在通过扩展到新市场来发展业务。

en: They used innovative strategies to grow business rapidly.
cn: 他们使用创新策略快速扩大生意。

en: In the deal, he felt he got the short end of the stick.
cn: 在这笔交易中，他觉得自己吃亏了。

en: She always gets the short end of the stick in group projects.
cn: 在小组项目中，她总是处于不利地位。

en: Industrial waste is a major cause of water pollution.
cn: 工业废物是水污染的主要原因。

en: Efforts to reduce water pollution are crucial for public health.
cn: 减少水污染的努力对公共健康至关重要。

en: With support from family, he managed to pull through the illness.
cn: 在家人的支持下，他设法渡过了疾病难关。

en: The company pulled through the financial crisis successfully.
cn: 该公司成功渡过了金融危机。

en: Our team has an advantage over the others due to more experience.
cn: 由于经验更丰富，我们团队比其他团队有优势。

en: She has an advantage over her competitors in the market.
cn: 她在市场上比竞争对手有优势。

en: Early education lays the foundation for lifelong learning.
cn: 早期教育为终身学习奠定基础。

en: This research lays the foundation for future medical breakthroughs.
cn: 这项研究为未来的医学突破奠定了基础。

en: Strawberries often use vegetative reproduction through runners.
cn: 草莓通常通过匍匐茎进行营养繁殖。

en: Vegetative reproduction is common in many plant species.
cn: 营养繁殖在许多植物物种中很常见。

en: The company opened a new distribution center to improve delivery times.
cn: 公司开设了一个新的配送中心以改善交货时间。

en: Goods are sorted and shipped from the distribution center to retail stores.
cn: 货物从分销中心分拣并运送到零售店。

en: I'm dying for a cup of coffee after that long meeting.
cn: 在那次漫长的会议后，我非常想喝杯咖啡。

en: She's dying for a vacation to escape the stress of work.
cn: 她非常渴望休假以逃离工作压力。

en: After the holidays, I put on weight from all the festive meals.
cn: 假期过后，我因为节日大餐而体重增加了。

en: She put on weight during her pregnancy, which is completely normal.
cn: 她在怀孕期间体重增加了，这完全正常。

en: He turned a deaf ear to the warnings and continued with his risky plan.
cn: 他对警告充耳不闻，继续执行他的冒险计划。

en: The government turned a deaf ear to the public's concerns about pollution.
cn: 政府对公众关于污染的担忧置之不理。

en: I owe my success to the support of my family and friends.
cn: 我的成功归功于家人和朋友的支持。

en: She owes a lot of money to the bank from her student loans.
cn: 她因学生贷款欠银行很多钱。

en: Many students live off campus to have more independence.
cn: 许多学生住在校外以获得更多独立性。

en: The event will be held off campus at a local community center.
cn: 活动将在校外的当地社区中心举行。

en: He realized that material possessions don't bring true happiness.
cn: 他意识到物质财富并不能带来真正的幸福。

en: In some cultures, accumulating material possessions is seen as a sign of success.
cn: 在一些文化中，积累物质财富被视为成功的标志。

en: Please listen to the instructions carefully before starting the test.
cn: 在开始测试前，请仔细听说明。

en: I love to listen to classical music while I work.
cn: 我喜欢在工作时听古典音乐。

en: On the one hand, the job offers a high salary; on the other, it requires long hours.
cn: 一方面，这份工作提供高薪；另一方面，它需要长时间工作。

en: On the one hand, technology improves efficiency; on the other, it can lead to job losses.
cn: 一方面，技术提高效率；另一方面，它可能导致失业。

en: If you keep spending recklessly, you'll wind up in debt.
cn: 如果你继续挥霍无度，最终会负债累累。

en: The meeting wound up earlier than expected due to technical issues.
cn: 由于技术问题，会议比预期提前结束了。

en: The committee will enquire into the allegations of misconduct.
cn: 委员会将调查行为不当的指控。

en: Scientists are enquiring into the causes of climate change.
cn: 科学家们正在探究气候变化的原因。

en: He apologized publicly to save face after the embarrassing mistake.
cn: 他在尴尬的错误后公开道歉以保全面子。

en: In negotiations, both sides often make concessions to save face.
cn: 在谈判中，双方经常做出让步以保全面子。

en: Without proper guidance, young people can easily go astray.
cn: 没有适当的指导，年轻人很容易误入歧途。

en: The package went astray during delivery and arrived at the wrong address.
cn: 包裹在配送过程中走错了路，送到了错误的地址。

en: She's very particular about the quality of ingredients she uses in cooking.
cn: 她对烹饪中使用的食材质量非常讲究。

en: He's particular about his appearance and always dresses neatly.
cn: 他对自己的外表很挑剔，总是穿着整洁。

en: She is a key person in the project, responsible for coordinating all teams.
cn: 她是项目的关键人物，负责协调所有团队。

en: The CEO is often seen as the key person in a company's success.
cn: 首席执行官通常被视为公司成功的关键人物。

en: The hikers were in danger when a storm suddenly hit the mountain.
cn: 当暴风雨突然袭击山区时，徒步旅行者处于危险中。

en: Many species are in danger of extinction due to habitat loss.
cn: 由于栖息地丧失，许多物种处于灭绝的危险中。

en: He laid claim to the inheritance based on the will.
cn: 他根据遗嘱声称拥有继承权。

en: The country lays claim to the disputed territory in the region.
cn: 该国声称拥有该地区有争议的领土。

en: Please put away your toys after playing.
cn: 玩完后请把你的玩具收拾好。

en: He put away the groceries in the kitchen cabinets.
cn: 他把杂货放进厨房橱柜里。

en: His research is related to climate change.
cn: 他的研究与气候变化有关。

en: The symptoms are related to stress.
cn: 这些症状与压力有关。

en: The mob tried to put the bite on the shopkeeper for protection money.
cn: 黑帮试图向店主勒索保护费。

en: He put the bite on his friend to lend him money.
cn: 他向朋友施压借钱。

en: Technology plays a part in modern education.
cn: 技术在现代教育中起着作用。

en: She played a part in organizing the event.
cn: 她在组织活动中扮演了角色。

en: She looks down her nose at people who don't have a college degree.
cn: 她瞧不起没有大学学位的人。

en: Some elites look down their noses at popular culture as being inferior.
cn: 一些精英轻视流行文化，认为其低劣。

en: The ship will call at several ports.
cn: 这艘船将停靠几个港口。

en: I called at her office to drop off the documents.
cn: 我去了她的办公室送文件。

en: I bought this shirt dirt cheap at the sale.
cn: 我在促销时以极低的价格买了这件衬衫。

en: The rent is dirt cheap in that area.
cn: 那个地区的租金非常便宜。

en: The evidence proved his guilt beyond doubt.
cn: 证据确凿无疑地证明了他的罪行。

en: Her talent is beyond doubt.
cn: 她的才华是毫无疑问的。

en: He's between jobs and looking for new opportunities.
cn: 他目前失业，正在寻找新机会。

en: She took a break between jobs to travel.
cn: 她在失业期间休息去旅行了。

en: The missile shot down the enemy aircraft.
cn: 导弹击落了敌机。

en: They shot down the drone over the border.
cn: 他们在边境击落了无人机。

en: The negotiations culminated in a successful agreement.
cn: 谈判以达成成功协议告终。

en: The festival culminated in a fireworks display.
cn: 节日以烟花表演达到高潮。

en: Reading books helps expand knowledge.
cn: 读书有助于扩展知识。

en: Traveling can expand your knowledge of different cultures.
cn: 旅行可以增加你对不同文化的了解。

en: That horror movie gave me the willies.
cn: 那部恐怖电影让我感到害怕。

en: The dark alley gave him the willies.
cn: 那条黑暗的小巷让他感到紧张。

en: We need to find a way to reduce costs.
cn: 我们需要找到降低成本的方法。

en: She found a way to finish the project on time.
cn: 她找到了按时完成项目的方法。

en: If you don't study, you run the risk of failing the exam.
cn: 如果你不学习，你就有考试不及格的风险。

en: He ran the risk of losing his job by speaking out.
cn: 他冒着失业的风险直言不讳。

en: His behavior was rude in the extreme.
cn: 他的行为极其粗鲁。

en: The weather was hot in the extreme during the summer.
cn: 夏天天气非常炎热。

en: I have no interest in watching sports.
cn: 我对观看体育比赛不感兴趣。

en: She has no interest in politics.
cn: 她对政治不感兴趣。

en: The company is liable for any damages caused.
cn: 公司对造成的任何损害负有法律责任。

en: You are liable for the debt if you sign the contract.
cn: 如果你签署合同，你对债务负有法律责任。

en: She turned her back on her family when they needed her.
cn: 当家人需要她时，她背弃了他们。

en: He turned his back on his old friends after becoming successful.
cn: 成功后，他背弃了老朋友。

en: Can you stay with me until I feel better?
cn: 你能陪着我直到我感觉好些吗？

en: He decided to stay with his grandparents for the weekend.
cn: 他决定周末和祖父母待在一起。
