en: The job offers flexible working hours to accommodate parents.
cn: 这份工作提供弹性工作时间以适应父母的需求。

en: Many companies now provide flexible working hours for better work-life balance.
cn: 许多公司现在提供弹性工作时间以实现更好的工作与生活平衡。

en: They negotiated the contract in good faith.
cn: 他们真诚地谈判了合同。

en: I made the offer in good faith, hoping for a fair deal.
cn: 我善意地提出报价，希望达成公平交易。

en: Thanks for your help with the project.
cn: 感谢你在项目上的帮助。

en: Thanks for coming to my party.
cn: 感谢你来参加我的派对。

en: Many people feel pressured to live in a materialistic world.
cn: 许多人感到生活在物质主义世界里有压力。

en: It's challenging to find spiritual meaning when you live in a materialistic world.
cn: 当你生活在物质主义世界里时，很难找到精神意义。

en: The thief robbed him of his wallet.
cn: 小偷抢走了他的钱包。

en: The scam robbed the elderly couple of their savings.
cn: 骗局抢走了那对老年夫妇的积蓄。

en: Please sweep up the broken glass from the floor.
cn: 请把地板上的碎玻璃清扫干净。

en: She swept up the leaves in the garden.
cn: 她把花园里的叶子清扫干净了。

en: Keep in mind that the deadline is next Friday.
cn: 记住截止日期是下周五。

en: Always keep in mind the safety rules when operating machinery.
cn: 操作机器时始终牢记安全规则。

en: His lies eventually came home to roost when he was caught.
cn: 他的谎言最终自食其果，被抓住了。

en: The company's unethical practices came home to roost with a massive lawsuit.
cn: 公司的不道德行为自食其果，面临大规模诉讼。

en: Can you assist with the preparation for the meeting?
cn: 你能协助准备会议吗？

en: She assisted with the research project by collecting data.
cn: 她通过收集数据协助了研究项目。

en: The seconds ticked by as we waited for the results.
cn: 我们等待结果时，秒针滴答流逝。

en: Time ticks by quickly when you're having fun.
cn: 当你玩得开心时，时间滴答流逝得很快。

en: Many students from less well-off families receive scholarships.
cn: 许多来自不太富裕家庭的学生获得了奖学金。

en: He grew up in a neighborhood with children from less well-off families.
cn: 他在一个有许多来自不太富裕家庭孩子的社区长大。

en: Staying home is preferable to going out in bad weather.
cn: 坏天气时待在家里比出门更可取。

en: A quiet evening is preferable to a noisy party for me.
cn: 对我来说，安静的夜晚比嘈杂的派对更可取。

en: Please slow down when driving through the school zone.
cn: 开车经过学校区域时请减速。

en: He slowed down his pace to match hers.
cn: 他放慢步伐以配合她。

en: There is an excess charge for luggage over the weight limit.
cn: 行李超重有额外费用。

en: The hotel added an excess charge for late checkout.
cn: 酒店对延迟退房加了额外费用。

en: He always sticks his oar in when we're discussing family matters.
cn: 我们讨论家庭事务时，他总是多管闲事。

en: Don't stick your oar in; this is between me and my friend.
cn: 别多管闲事，这是我和我朋友之间的事。

en: We'll see how the new strategy pans out over the next few months.
cn: 我们看看新策略在未来几个月结果如何。

en: His plan didn't pan out as expected, so he had to adjust.
cn: 他的计划没有如预期发展，所以他不得不调整。

en: English is often considered a global language for business.
cn: 英语常被认为是商业的全球语言。

en: The spread of the internet has promoted the use of global languages.
cn: 互联网的传播促进了全球语言的使用。

en: The company has a reputation for producing high-quality products.
cn: 这家公司以生产高质量产品而闻名。

en: She has a reputation for being punctual in all her meetings.
cn: 她以在所有会议上准时而有名声。

en: After the war, the country lived in peace for decades.
cn: 战争结束后，这个国家和平地生活了几十年。

en: She wanted to be left alone to read her book in peace.
cn: 她想独自一人安宁地读她的书。

en: Her cooking skills have improved significantly after taking a culinary course.
cn: 参加烹饪课程后，她的烹饪技能显著提高了。

en: Good cooking skills are essential for preparing healthy meals at home.
cn: 良好的烹饪技能对于在家准备健康餐食至关重要。

en: We visited the Grand Canyon during our road trip across the USA.
cn: 我们在穿越美国的公路旅行中参观了大峡谷。

en: The Grand Canyon is known for its stunning geological formations.
cn: 大峡谷以其令人惊叹的地质构造而闻名。

en: The fans cheered on their team during the championship game.
cn: 粉丝们在冠军赛中为他们的队伍加油。

en: We cheered her on as she ran the marathon.
cn: 她跑马拉松时，我们为她加油。

en: Learning to cope with stress is important for mental health.
cn: 学会应对压力对心理健康很重要。

en: She uses meditation to cope with stress at work.
cn: 她用冥想来应对工作压力。

en: He finally got wise to their scam and reported it to the police.
cn: 他终于意识到他们的骗局，并向警方报告了。

en: It took me a while to get wise to the fact that she was lying.
cn: 我花了一段时间才意识到她在撒谎。

en: She saved money in order that she could buy a new car.
cn: 她存钱是为了能买一辆新车。

en: He studied hard in order that he might pass the exam.
cn: 他努力学习是为了能通过考试。

en: The boss put the screws on the team to meet the deadline.
cn: 老板向团队施加压力，要求他们按时完成。

en: They put the screws on him to reveal the secret.
cn: 他们强迫他透露秘密。

en: Access to the building is restricted to authorized personnel only.
cn: 进入大楼仅限于授权人员。

en: The discussion was restricted to topics related to the project.
cn: 讨论仅限于与项目相关的话题。

en: I'm keeping my fingers crossed for her job interview tomorrow.
cn: 我为她明天的求职面试祈祷好运。

en: Keep your fingers crossed for good weather on our wedding day.
cn: 为我们的婚礼日有好天气祈祷吧。

en: The company came into existence in 1995.
cn: 这家公司成立于1995年。

en: New species come into existence through evolutionary processes.
cn: 新物种通过进化过程形成。

en: It took him five years to pay off all his student loan debts.
cn: 他花了五年时间偿还了所有的学生贷款债务。

en: She worked extra hours to pay off her credit card debts.
cn: 她加班工作以偿还信用卡债务。

en: I heard from so and so that the party was cancelled.
cn: 我从某某人那里听说派对取消了。

en: So and so told me you're looking for a new job.
cn: 某某人告诉我你在找新工作。

en: He held forth on politics for over an hour at the dinner party.
cn: 在晚宴上，他就政治话题长篇大论地讲了一个多小时。

en: She loves to hold forth about her travels to anyone who will listen.
cn: 她喜欢向任何愿意听的人长篇大论地谈论她的旅行。

en: A wave of nostalgia swept over her when she visited her childhood home.
cn: 当她参观童年故居时，一股怀旧之情席卷了她。

en: Panic swept over the crowd when they heard the loud noise.
cn: 当他们听到巨响时，恐慌席卷了人群。

en: After much debate, they settled on a blue color for the living room walls.
cn: 经过多次辩论，他们决定将客厅墙壁涂成蓝色。

en: We need to settle on a date for the meeting as soon as possible.
cn: 我们需要尽快决定会议的日期。

en: There is plenty of food at the buffet, so help yourself.
cn: 自助餐有大量的食物，所以请自便。

en: She has plenty of experience in managing large teams.
cn: 她在管理大型团队方面有丰富的经验。

en: Public hospitals often provide care to low-income patients.
cn: 公立医院通常为低收入患者提供医疗服务。

en: The government is investing more funds into public hospitals.
cn: 政府正在向公立医院投入更多资金。

en: Let's head over to the café for a quick coffee.
cn: 我们去咖啡馆喝杯咖啡吧。

en: After work, I'll head over to the gym to exercise.
cn: 下班后，我会去健身房锻炼。

en: The dog broke loose from its leash and ran into the park.
cn: 狗挣脱了皮带，跑进了公园。

en: Chaos broke loose when the fire alarm went off.
cn: 火警响起时，混乱爆发了。

en: Recognition from peers can be a good motivator for employees.
cn: 同事的认可可以是员工的一个良好激励因素。

en: Setting clear goals acts as a good motivator to stay focused.
cn: 设定明确的目标是保持专注的良好激励因素。

en: The hotel charges a laundry fee for washing guests' clothes.
cn: 酒店为清洗客人衣物收取洗衣费。

en: Students must pay a laundry fee to use the dormitory's washing machines.
cn: 学生必须支付洗衣费才能使用宿舍的洗衣机。

en: Harvard and Oxford are examples of prestigious universities.
cn: 哈佛和牛津是名牌大学的例子。

en: Graduating from a prestigious university can enhance your career prospects.
cn: 从名牌大学毕业可以提升你的职业前景。

en: Precise measurement is crucial in scientific experiments.
cn: 在科学实验中，精确测量至关重要。

en: The engineer used tools for precise measurement of the components.
cn: 工程师使用工具对部件进行精确测量。

en: Poor planning can result in project delays.
cn: 计划不周可能导致项目延误。

en: Eating too much sugar may result in health problems.
cn: 摄入过多糖分可能导致健康问题。

en: Running for 30 minutes can burn a lot of calories.
cn: 跑步30分钟可以燃烧大量卡路里。

en: To lose weight, you need to burn more calories than you consume.
cn: 要减肥，你需要燃烧比摄入更多的卡路里。

en: If you break your promise, people may lose trust in you.
cn: 如果你违背诺言，人们可能会失去对你的信任。

en: He felt guilty after breaking his promise to his friend.
cn: 违背了对朋友的承诺后，他感到内疚。

en: The Grand Canyon is a breathtaking natural sight.
cn: 大峡谷是一个令人叹为观止的自然景观。

en: Tourists flock to see the natural sights of the national park.
cn: 游客蜂拥而至，观看国家公园的自然景观。

en: The police decided to stake out the suspect's house overnight.
cn: 警方决定整夜监视嫌疑人的房子。

en: Detectives often stake out locations to gather evidence.
cn: 侦探经常监视地点以收集证据。

en: Can you give me a hand with moving this heavy furniture?
cn: 你能帮我搬一下这件沉重的家具吗？

en: She offered to give him a hand with his homework.
cn: 她主动提出帮助他做作业。

en: The news media plays a vital role in informing the public.
cn: 新闻媒体在告知公众方面起着至关重要的作用。

en: Social media has changed how traditional news media operates.
cn: 社交媒体改变了传统新闻媒体的运作方式。

en: Medical students gain clinical experience by working in hospitals.
cn: 医学生通过在医院工作获得临床经验。

en: Her clinical experience helped her diagnose the patient accurately.
cn: 她的临床经验帮助她准确诊断了病人。

en: He responded to the emergency on the instant.
cn: 他立即对紧急情况做出了回应。

en: The decision was made on the instant without hesitation.
cn: 决定立即做出，没有犹豫。

en: Many people aspire to have a high-paying job to improve their lifestyle.
cn: 许多人渴望拥有一份高薪工作来改善生活方式。

en: A high-paying job often requires specialized skills or education.
cn: 高薪工作通常需要专业技能或教育背景。

en: Learning effective job-search techniques can improve your chances of getting hired.
cn: 学习有效的求职技巧可以提高你被录用的机会。

en: Workshops often teach job-search techniques like networking and resume writing.
cn: 研讨会经常教授如建立人脉和简历写作等求职技巧。

en: In contrast to last year, sales have increased significantly.
cn: 与去年相比，销售额显著增长。

en: Her calm demeanor was in contrast to the chaotic situation.
cn: 她冷静的举止与混乱的局面形成对比。

en: Policies should consider each person's individual circumstance.
cn: 政策应考虑每个人的个人情况。

en: Her success was influenced by her unique individual circumstance.
cn: 她的成功受到她独特的个人情况的影响。

en: I have a rough idea of how the project will proceed.
cn: 我对项目如何进行有个大致的了解。

en: She has a rough idea of the budget needed for the trip.
cn: 她对旅行所需的预算有个大致的了解。

en: This issue merits attention from policymakers.
cn: 这个问题值得政策制定者关注。

en: His innovative ideas merit attention in the industry.
cn: 他的创新想法在行业中值得关注。

en: Whether we go out tonight is up to you.
cn: 今晚是否出去由你决定。

en: The final decision is up to the manager.
cn: 最终决定取决于经理。

en: The kids often make fun of his accent.
cn: 孩子们经常取笑他的口音。

en: It's not nice to make fun of someone's mistakes.
cn: 取笑别人的错误是不好的。

en: Before the speech, I had butterflies in my stomach.
cn: 演讲前，我感到紧张不安。

en: She always has butterflies in her stomach before a big exam.
cn: 每次大考前，她总是忐忑不安。

en: The meeting was held for the purpose of discussing new strategies.
cn: 会议是为了讨论新策略的目的而举行的。

en: Data is collected for the purpose of analysis and improvement.
cn: 收集数据是为了分析和改进的目的。

en: It was so cold that the lake froze.
cn: 天气如此寒冷，以至于湖面结冰了。

en: She was so tired that she fell asleep immediately.
cn: 她如此疲惫，以至于立刻睡着了。

en: I was going to go out, but I changed my mind and stayed home.
cn: 我本来要出去，但改变主意待在家里了。

en: After hearing the news, she quickly changed her mind.
cn: 听到消息后，她很快改变了主意。

en: Please tie up the boat securely.
cn: 请把船系牢。

en: He tied up the package with string.
cn: 他用绳子把包裹捆好。

en: He is incapable of telling a lie.
cn: 他不会说谎。

en: The old machine is incapable of handling heavy loads.
cn: 这台旧机器无法处理重负荷。

en: Technology is advancing so fast that it's hard to keep pace with.
cn: 技术发展如此之快，很难跟上。

en: She runs to keep pace with her younger brother.
cn: 她跑步以跟上她弟弟的步伐。

en: The alarm clock went off at 6 AM.
cn: 闹钟在早上6点响了。

en: The bomb went off without warning.
cn: 炸弹毫无预警地爆炸了。

en: I always carry bottled water when I travel.
cn: 旅行时我总是带着瓶装水。

en: Bottled water is convenient but can be expensive.
cn: 瓶装水很方便，但可能很贵。

en: The accident brought traffic to a halt.
cn: 事故使交通停止了。

en: The strike brought production to a halt.
cn: 罢工使生产中止了。

en: She looked him up and down before speaking.
cn: 说话前，她上下打量了他。

en: The guard looked up and down the street for any suspicious activity.
cn: 警卫上下打量街道，寻找可疑活动。

en: It was nothing more than a simple mistake.
cn: 这不过是一个简单的错误。

en: He is nothing more than a beginner in this field.
cn: 在这个领域，他不过是个初学者。

en: He struck upon a brilliant idea while walking.
cn: 走路时他突然想到了一个绝妙的主意。

en: They struck upon an old map in the attic.
cn: 他们在阁楼里偶然发现了一张旧地图。

en: A good therapist is responsive to emotional needs.
cn: 一个好的治疗师对情感需求很体贴。

en: Parents should be responsive to their children's emotional needs.
cn: 父母应该对孩子的情绪需求有反应。

en: She decided to take up painting as a hobby.
cn: 她决定开始画画作为爱好。

en: This project will take up a lot of my time.
cn: 这个项目会占用我很多时间。

en: The labour market is competitive for recent graduates.
cn: 对刚毕业的学生来说，劳动力市场竞争激烈。

en: Changes in technology affect the labour market.
cn: 技术变化影响劳动力市场。

en: They decided to break up after five years together.
cn: 在一起五年后，他们决定分手。

en: The argument caused them to break up.
cn: 争吵导致他们分手了。

en: She helped me move, and in return, I cooked her dinner.
cn: 她帮我搬家，作为回报，我给她做了晚饭。

en: He offered his support in return for a favor.
cn: 他提供支持以换取一个帮助。

en: She loves to grow plants in her garden.
cn: 她喜欢在花园里种植植物。

en: It's important to know how to grow plants properly.
cn: 知道如何正确种植植物很重要。

en: The mediator helped smooth away the disagreements between the parties.
cn: 调解员帮助消除了各方之间的分歧。

en: She used diplomacy to smooth away the tensions in the meeting.
cn: 她运用外交手段消除了会议中的紧张气氛。

en: The policy was changed in the interests of public safety.
cn: 为了公共安全，政策被修改了。

en: In the interests of fairness, we should hear both sides.
cn: 为了公平起见，我们应该听取双方的意见。

en: He always speaks in a friendly manner to customers.
cn: 他总是以友好的方式对顾客说话。

en: Try to speak in a friendly manner to avoid conflicts.
cn: 试着以友好的方式说话以避免冲突。

en: The bouncer kicked the troublemaker out of the club.
cn: 保安把闹事者赶出了俱乐部。

en: She was kicked out of the meeting for being disruptive.
cn: 她因扰乱会议而被赶了出去。

en: The Grand Canyon is a popular scenic spot for tourists.
cn: 大峡谷是游客喜爱的热门景点。

en: We visited several scenic spots during our trip to the mountains.
cn: 我们在山区旅行期间参观了几个景点。

en: His actions are often driven by self-interest rather than altruism.
cn: 他的行为常常受自身利益驱动，而非利他主义。

en: The decision was driven by self-interest, ignoring the community's needs.
cn: 这个决定是受自身利益驱动，忽视了社区的需求。

en: The magazine launched a new campaign to expand its readership among young adults.
cn: 该杂志发起了一项新活动，以扩大其在年轻成年人中的读者群。

en: By offering digital subscriptions, they hope to expand their readership globally.
cn: 通过提供数字订阅，他们希望在全球范围内扩大读者群。

en: He always criticizes the new policy because he has an axe to grind with the management.
cn: 他总是批评新政策，因为他与管理层有私怨。

en: Be careful of her advice; she might have an axe to grind in this matter.
cn: 小心她的建议；她在这件事上可能有私心。

en: Economic growth is closely linked to technological innovation.
cn: 经济增长与技术创新紧密相关。

en: His success is closely linked to his hard work and dedication.
cn: 他的成功与他的努力和奉献精神密切相关。

en: He managed to get out of a mess by apologizing sincerely.
cn: 他通过真诚道歉成功摆脱了困境。

en: With some clever thinking, she got out of a messy situation at work.
cn: 凭借一些聪明的想法，她摆脱了工作中的困境。

en: Despite the pressure, she held her ground and refused to compromise.
cn: 尽管有压力，她坚守立场，拒绝妥协。

en: In the negotiation, it's important to hold your ground on key issues.
cn: 在谈判中，在关键问题上坚守立场很重要。

en: The technology was originally developed for military use.
cn: 这项技术最初是为军事用途开发的。

en: Strict regulations control the military use of certain chemicals.
cn: 严格的规定控制某些化学品的军事用途。

en: She has a good grasp of advanced mathematics.
cn: 她很好地掌握了高等数学。

en: To succeed in this job, you need to have a grasp of the latest technology.
cn: 要胜任这份工作，你需要掌握最新技术。

en: The fugitive has been on the run from the police for months.
cn: 逃犯已逃避警方追捕数月。

en: With her busy schedule, she's always on the run between meetings.
cn: 由于日程繁忙，她总是在会议之间奔波。

en: The teacher left the students to their own devices during the project, and they came up with creative solutions.
cn: 老师在做项目时让学生们自行其是，他们想出了有创意的解决方案。

en: After the instructions, he was left to his own devices to complete the task.
cn: 在指示之后，他被放任自行完成任务。

en: He looked about for his keys but couldn't find them.
cn: 他四处寻找钥匙，但没找到。

en: We need to look about for a new office space as our lease is ending.
cn: 由于租约即将到期，我们需要四处寻找新的办公空间。

en: The fire spread quickly and was soon out of control.
cn: 火势迅速蔓延，很快就失控了。

en: His spending habits are getting out of control, leading to debt.
cn: 他的消费习惯正变得失控，导致债务。

en: She decided to give up smoking for her health.
cn: 她为了健康决定戒烟。

en: Don't give up on your dreams, even when it gets tough.
cn: 即使困难，也不要放弃你的梦想。

en: I will agree to the deal only if the terms are fair.
cn: 只有在条款公平的情况下，我才会同意这笔交易。

en: You can borrow my car only if you promise to drive carefully.
cn: 只有你答应小心驾驶，才能借我的车。

en: Her jewelry is considered a personal possession and is not part of the shared assets.
cn: 她的珠宝被视为个人财产，不属于共有资产。

en: He keeps his passport as a personal possession in a safe place.
cn: 他把护照作为私人物品保存在安全的地方。

en: She is regarded as an expert in her field due to her extensive research.
cn: 由于广泛的研究，她被视为所在领域的专家。

en: This ancient artifact is regarded as a national treasure.
cn: 这件古代文物被视为国宝。

en: Risk is inherent in any investment, so it's important to diversify your portfolio.
cn: 风险是任何投资固有的，因此分散投资组合很重要。

en: The flaws inherent in the system became apparent after years of use.
cn: 系统内在的缺陷在使用多年后变得明显。

en: If you're not coming, in that case, I'll go alone.
cn: 如果你不来，那样的话，我就一个人去。

en: The weather forecast predicts rain; in that case, we should bring umbrellas.
cn: 天气预报预测有雨；既然如此，我们应该带伞。

en: Human-caused disturbances, such as deforestation, threaten wildlife habitats.
cn: 人为干扰，如森林砍伐，威胁着野生动物的栖息地。

en: The study focuses on the impact of human-caused disturbances on coastal ecosystems.
cn: 这项研究关注人为干扰对沿海生态系统的影响。

en: This tool is meant to simplify the process, not complicate it.
cn: 这个工具旨在简化过程，而不是使其复杂化。

en: You are meant to arrive on time for the meeting.
cn: 你应该准时参加会议。

en: The company invested in new technology to improve efficiency.
cn: 公司投资新技术以提高效率。

en: New technology has revolutionized the way we communicate.
cn: 新技术彻底改变了我们的交流方式。

en: I think I left my keys on the table or something.
cn: 我想我把钥匙落在桌子上了或类似的地方。

en: She said she'd be late because of traffic or something.
cn: 她说她会因为交通或诸如此类的原因迟到。

en: His arrogant behavior needed to be addressed, so his friends brought him down a peg or two.
cn: 他傲慢的行为需要处理，所以朋友们挫了他的锐气。

en: After winning the award, a little criticism brought her down a peg or two.
cn: 获奖后，一点批评让她谦虚了一点。

en: I need to deposit money in a bank to save for my vacation.
cn: 我需要在银行存款来为度假存钱。

en: She deposits money in a bank every month to build her savings.
cn: 她每月在银行存款以积累储蓄。

en: This software is compatible with both Windows and Mac operating systems.
cn: 这个软件与Windows和Mac操作系统都兼容。

en: Her values are compatible with the company's mission, making her a good fit.
cn: 她的价值观与公司的使命一致，使她很适合。

en: As a citizen, it is important to do one's duty by voting in elections.
cn: 作为公民，通过投票选举来履行职责很重要。

en: The soldier did his duty by protecting his country.
cn: 士兵通过保护国家来尽他的义务。

en: As far as I am concerned, the decision is final.
cn: 就我而言，这个决定是最终的。

en: As far as the budget is concerned, we need to cut costs.
cn: 至于预算，我们需要削减成本。

en: Let's stop discussing general ideas and get down to the nitty-gritty of the contract.
cn: 我们别再讨论一般想法了，深入合同的细节吧。

en: After the introductions, the team got down to the nitty-gritty of planning the project.
cn: 介绍之后，团队开始处理项目规划的实质性问题。

en: He offered his services in exchange for free accommodation.
cn: 他提供服务以换取免费住宿。

en: The company provided funding in exchange for a share of the profits.
cn: 公司提供资金以换取一部分利润。

en: The evidence doesn't match up with his alibi, raising suspicions.
cn: 证据与他的不在场证明不符，引起了怀疑。

en: Her skills match up with the job requirements perfectly.
cn: 她的技能与工作要求完美匹配。

en: The police had him dead to rights with the security footage.
cn: 警方通过监控录像掌握了他确凿的犯罪证据。

en: She had her coworker dead to rights for stealing office supplies.
cn: 她掌握了同事偷窃办公用品的铁证。

en: Regular exercise and a balanced diet can help improve our health.
cn: 定期锻炼和均衡饮食有助于改善我们的健康。

en: We should adopt healthier habits to improve our health over time.
cn: 我们应该养成更健康的习惯来逐步改善健康状况。

en: Please complete the course feedback form to help improve the curriculum.
cn: 请填写课程反馈表以帮助改进课程设置。

en: The university requires students to submit a course feedback form at the end of each semester.
cn: 大学要求学生在每学期末提交课程反馈表。

en: I need to get the lowdown on the new project before the meeting.
cn: 开会前我需要了解这个新项目的内情。

en: He got the lowdown on the company's financial troubles from a reliable source.
cn: 他从可靠来源得知了公司财务问题的内幕。

en: Managing this project is going to make me get gray hair.
cn: 管理这个项目会让我操心到长白头发。

en: Parents often get gray hair worrying about their children.
cn: 父母常因担心孩子而操心到长白头发。

en: The company adopted unconventional measures to boost sales during the crisis.
cn: 公司在危机期间采取了非常规措施来提升销售额。

en: Sometimes unconventional measures are necessary to solve complex problems.
cn: 有时解决复杂问题需要采取非常规措施。

en: In any case, we should prepare for the worst.
cn: 无论如何，我们都应该做最坏的准备。

en: He might not come, but in any case, we'll start the meeting on time.
cn: 他可能不来，但不管怎样，我们会准时开始会议。

en: Please clear away the dishes after dinner.
cn: 晚餐后请把盘子收拾干净。

en: We need to clear away the clutter before the guests arrive.
cn: 客人到来前我们需要清理杂物。

en: She took to painting as a hobby after retirement.
cn: 退休后她开始喜欢上绘画作为爱好。

en: The puppy quickly took to its new owner.
cn: 小狗很快就喜欢上了它的新主人。

en: His actions are of a piece with his previous behavior.
cn: 他的行为与他之前的表现是一致的。

en: The new policy is of a piece with the company's overall strategy.
cn: 新政策与公司的整体战略是一致的。

en: After reading the summary, I got a rough idea about the book's plot.
cn: 读完摘要后，我对这本书的情节有了个大致的了解。

en: Can you give me a quick overview so I can get a rough idea about the project?
cn: 你能给我一个快速概述，让我对项目有个大致了解吗？

en: He couldn't resist taking a dig at his rival during the speech.
cn: 他在演讲中忍不住挖苦了他的对手。

en: She often takes a dig at her brother for being messy.
cn: 她经常挖苦她哥哥邋遢。

en: We got the jump on our competitors by launching the product early.
cn: 我们通过提前推出产品抢占了竞争对手的先机。

en: He always tries to get the jump on others in negotiations.
cn: 在谈判中，他总是试图抢先别人一步。

en: He plunged into the cold water without hesitation.
cn: 他毫不犹豫地跳进了冷水中。

en: The country plunged into an economic crisis after the war.
cn: 战后该国陷入了经济危机。

en: She put up a front of confidence even though she was nervous.
cn: 尽管紧张，她还是装出自信的样子。

en: He put up a front to hide his disappointment from his friends.
cn: 他装出样子向朋友掩饰自己的失望。

en: He was ashamed of his rude behavior at the party.
cn: 他为在派对上粗鲁的行为感到羞愧。

en: She is ashamed of not helping her friend when needed.
cn: 她为在朋友需要时没有提供帮助而感到惭愧。

en: Employees should have a say in decisions that affect their work.
cn: 员工应该在影响他们工作的决策中有发言权。

en: As a shareholder, she has a say in the company's major policies.
cn: 作为股东，她在公司重大政策上有发言权。

en: Please take your seat before the meeting begins.
cn: 请在会议开始前就座。

en: The audience was asked to take their seats for the performance.
cn: 观众被要求就座观看演出。

en: The child made a face when given vegetables to eat.
cn: 给孩子蔬菜吃时，他做了个鬼脸。

en: She made a face at the boring presentation.
cn: 她对无聊的演讲露出了不满的表情。

en: Access to a clean water supply is essential for public health.
cn: 获得清洁的供水对公共卫生至关重要。

en: The village built a new system to ensure a clean water supply.
cn: 村庄新建了一个系统以确保清洁的供水。

en: During the power outage, we had to go without electricity for hours.
cn: 停电期间，我们不得不忍受几个小时没有电。

en: He can go without coffee in the morning if necessary.
cn: 必要时，他早上可以不喝咖啡。

en: Her speech inspired the students to pursue their dreams.
cn: 她的演讲激励学生们去追求梦想。

en: The coach inspired the team to train harder.
cn: 教练激励队伍更加努力训练。

en: I am acquainted with the new software after the training.
cn: 培训后我熟悉了这款新软件。

en: She is well acquainted with the local customs.
cn: 她非常熟悉当地的风俗习惯。

en: Never mind, I can fix the mistake myself.
cn: 没关系，我可以自己改正这个错误。

en: Never mind what others think, just do your best.
cn: 别在意别人怎么想，尽力就好。

en: The government provides financial support to small businesses.
cn: 政府为小企业提供财务支持。

en: She received financial support from her family to pursue her studies.
cn: 她得到家人的资金援助以继续学业。

en: Mechanised farming has increased crop yields significantly.
cn: 机械化农业显著提高了作物产量。

en: The farm adopted mechanised farming to reduce labor costs.
cn: 农场采用机械化农业以降低劳动力成本。

en: The university allows credit transfer from other institutions.
cn: 这所大学允许从其他机构转移学分。

en: He completed a credit transfer to move funds between accounts.
cn: 他完成了信用转账，将资金在账户间转移。

en: The government will take action against illegal logging.
cn: 政府将对非法伐木采取行动。

en: The company decided to take action against the copyright infringement.
cn: 公司决定对版权侵权采取行动。

en: It took him a while to fit in at the new school.
cn: 他花了一段时间才融入新学校。

en: She tries to fit in with her colleagues by joining social events.
cn: 她通过参加社交活动来适应同事。

en: She decided to keep quiet about the incident to avoid trouble.
cn: 她决定对这件事保持沉默以避免麻烦。

en: Please keep quiet about the surprise party until the day.
cn: 请对惊喜派对保密直到那天。

en: The teacher drew the students' attention to the important details.
cn: 老师引起了学生们对重要细节的注意。

en: He drew my attention to the error in the report.
cn: 他引起了我的注意，指出了报告中的错误。

en: The new policy will impact on small businesses significantly.
cn: 新政策将显著影响小企业。

en: Climate change has a major impact on global ecosystems.
cn: 气候变化对全球生态系统有重大影响。

en: She picked up the book from the floor.
cn: 她从地板上捡起了书。

en: Can you pick up the phone? It's ringing.
cn: 你能接一下电话吗？它在响。

en: The museum charges admission fees to fund its operations.
cn: 博物馆收取入场费以资助其运营。

en: They decided to charge admission fees for the charity concert.
cn: 他们决定为慈善音乐会收取入场费。

en: The train arrived on time despite the bad weather.
cn: 尽管天气恶劣，火车还是准时到达。

en: Please submit your report on time to avoid penalties.
cn: 请准时提交报告以避免处罚。

en: In so far as I know, the project is on schedule.
cn: 就我所知，项目按计划进行。

en: The agreement is valid in so far as both parties comply.
cn: 只要双方遵守，协议就有效。

en: The two political parties are in opposition on most major issues.
cn: 这两个政党在大多数重大问题上都处于对立状态。

en: She found herself in opposition to her colleagues' proposal.
cn: 她发现自己反对同事们的提议。

en: She cuts her hair short every summer.
cn: 她每年夏天都把头发剪短。

en: I need to cut my hair before the job interview.
cn: 我需要在工作面试前剪头发。

en: Can you think of a good name for the new product?
cn: 你能为新产品想个好名字吗？

en: I often think of my childhood friends.
cn: 我经常想起儿时的朋友。

en: The company came under fire for its environmental practices.
cn: 该公司因其环保做法受到抨击。

en: The proposal came under scrutiny from the committee.
cn: 该提案受到委员会的审查。

en: We used honey in place of sugar in the recipe.
cn: 我们在食谱中用蜂蜜代替了糖。

en: He attended the meeting in place of his manager.
cn: 他代替经理参加了会议。

en: When the food arrived, we all dove in without hesitation.
cn: 食物一上来，我们都毫不犹豫地开吃了。

en: She dove into the new project with great enthusiasm.
cn: 她以极大的热情投入了这个新项目。

en: From a historical viewpoint, this event was a turning point.
cn: 从历史观点来看，这个事件是一个转折点。

en: Her book offers a unique historical viewpoint on the war.
cn: 她的书提供了关于这场战争的独特历史视角。

en: He decided to quit smoking for his health.
cn: 为了健康，他决定戒烟。

en: It's challenging to quit smoking without support.
cn: 没有支持，戒烟很有挑战性。

en: After hours of shopping, she came away empty-handed.
cn: 逛了几个小时后，她空手而归。

en: The negotiators came away empty-handed from the talks.
cn: 谈判人员从会谈中一无所获。

en: Please come in and have a seat.
cn: 请进来坐。

en: The train comes in at 3 PM.
cn: 火车下午3点到达。

en: The new building blends in with the historic neighborhood.
cn: 新建筑融入了历史街区。

en: She tried to blend in with the crowd to avoid attention.
cn: 她试图融入人群以避免注意。

en: On the eve of the election, tensions were high.
cn: 在选举前夕，气氛非常紧张。

en: They celebrated on the eve of the new year.
cn: 他们在新年前夕庆祝。

en: The interplay between genetics and environment affects health.
cn: 遗传和环境之间的相互作用影响健康。

en: Economists study the interplay between supply and demand.
cn: 经济学家研究供需之间的相互作用。

en: I spend two hours doing homework every day.
cn: 我每天花两个小时做作业。

en: They spent the weekend doing gardening.
cn: 他们周末都在做园艺。

en: Please keep quiet during the movie.
cn: 看电影时请保持安静。

en: He kept quiet about the secret to avoid trouble.
cn: 他对这个秘密保持沉默以避免麻烦。

en: His efforts are worthy of recognition.
cn: 他的努力值得认可。

en: This book is worthy of a careful read.
cn: 这本书值得仔细阅读。

en: He had to dash off to catch the bus.
cn: 他不得不匆忙离开去赶公交车。

en: She dashed off a quick email before the meeting.
cn: 她在会议前快速写了一封电子邮件。

en: She wrote a compelling personal statement for her college application.
cn: 她为大学申请写了一篇有说服力的个人陈述。

en: The job requires a personal statement outlining your goals.
cn: 这份工作要求一份概述你目标的个人陈述。

en: This photo doesn't do the beautiful scenery justice.
cn: 这张照片没有充分展现这美丽的风景。

en: He did justice to the role in the play with his excellent performance.
cn: 他通过出色的表演公正地诠释了剧中的角色。

en: This tradition dates from the 18th century.
cn: 这个传统始于18世纪。

en: The building dates from the Roman era.
cn: 这座建筑可以追溯到罗马时代。

en: Let's get this issue out in the open so we can resolve it.
cn: 让我们公开讨论这个问题以便解决。

en: She finally got her feelings out in the open during the meeting.
cn: 她终于在会议上公开表达了自己的感受。

en: The children take turns at cleaning the classroom.
cn: 孩子们轮流打扫教室。

en: We take turns at driving on long road trips.
cn: 我们在长途公路旅行中轮流开车。

en: Fans often place celebrities on a pedestal.
cn: 粉丝们常常把名人理想化。

en: She placed her mentor on a pedestal, ignoring his flaws.
cn: 她把导师过分崇拜，忽略了他的缺点。

en: He was arrested for committing a crime of theft.
cn: 他因犯盗窃罪而被捕。

en: Committing a crime can lead to severe legal consequences.
cn: 犯罪可能导致严重的法律后果。

en: The two companies negotiated on equal terms.
cn: 两家公司在平等条件下进行谈判。

en: All participants should compete on equal terms.
cn: 所有参与者应在同等条件下竞争。

en: Her father will give the bride away at the wedding ceremony.
cn: 她的父亲将在婚礼仪式上将新娘交给新郎。

en: Traditionally, the bride's father gives the bride away.
cn: 传统上，由新娘的父亲将新娘交给新郎。

en: The new fashion trend is starting to catch on among teenagers.
cn: 新的时尚趋势开始在青少年中流行起来。

en: It took him a while to catch on to the new software.
cn: 他花了一段时间才理解这个新软件。

en: She decided to take the lead in organizing the event.
cn: 她决定带头组织这次活动。

en: Our team took the lead in the competition early on.
cn: 我们队在比赛中早早领先。

en: It's important to stay abreast of the latest industry trends.
cn: 跟上最新的行业趋势很重要。

en: She reads daily news to stay abreast of current events.
cn: 她阅读每日新闻以了解时事。

en: This wood can be made into beautiful furniture.
cn: 这种木材可以被制成漂亮的家具。

en: The story was made into a successful movie.
cn: 这个故事被改编成了一部成功的电影。

en: Please calm down and tell me what happened.
cn: 请冷静下来告诉我发生了什么。

en: It took him a few minutes to calm down after the argument.
cn: 争论后他花了几分钟才冷静下来。

en: Overconsumption can deplete all natural resources quickly.
cn: 过度消费可能迅速耗尽所有自然资源。

en: We must avoid practices that deplete all natural resources.
cn: 我们必须避免耗尽所有自然资源的做法。

en: He made no bones about it and told her exactly what he thought.
cn: 他直言不讳，告诉了她他的真实想法。

en: She made no bones about her dislike for the new policy.
cn: 她毫不掩饰对新政策的不满。

en: He decided to resign from his position as manager.
cn: 他决定辞去经理的职位。

en: She resigned from the company after ten years of service.
cn: 她在公司服务十年后辞职了。

en: The doctor ordered several medical tests to diagnose the condition.
cn: 医生要求进行几项医学检查以诊断病情。

en: Regular medical tests are important for maintaining good health.
cn: 定期医学检查对保持健康很重要。

en: I need to reply to this email as soon as possible.
cn: 我需要尽快回复这封邮件。

en: She always replies to messages promptly.
cn: 她总是及时回复消息。

en: Let's put our heads together to solve this problem.
cn: 让我们集思广益来解决这个问题。

en: We put our heads together and came up with a great plan.
cn: 我们共同商量，想出了一个好计划。

en: He often thinks aloud while solving problems.
cn: 他经常在解决问题时自言自语。

en: She was thinking aloud about her vacation plans.
cn: 她在自言自语地谈论她的假期计划。

en: He washed down the pill with a glass of water.
cn: 他用一杯水送服了药片。

en: Wash down the spicy food with some cold beer.
cn: 用一些冰啤酒来送服辛辣食物。

en: They made fun of his new haircut.
cn: 他们取笑他的新发型。

en: It's not nice to make fun of someone's mistakes.
cn: 取笑别人的错误是不好的。

en: It's always best to tell the truth in any situation.
cn: 在任何情况下说实话总是最好的。

en: She decided to tell the truth about what happened.
cn: 她决定说出事情的真相。

en: She put in many hours to finish the project.
cn: 她投入了许多小时来完成这个项目。

en: He put in a lot of effort to learn the new language.
cn: 他投入了很多努力来学习这门新语言。

en: Please wipe off the dust from the table.
cn: 请擦掉桌子上的灰尘。

en: He used a cloth to wipe off the mud from his shoes.
cn: 他用布擦掉了鞋子上的泥。

en: He stopped short when he saw the accident ahead.
cn: 当他看到前方的事故时，他突然停了下来。

en: She stopped short of revealing the secret.
cn: 她差点就泄露了秘密，但突然停住了。

en: Students often need to learn facts by heart for exams.
cn: 学生通常需要为考试熟记事实。

en: He learned all the historical dates by heart.
cn: 他熟记了所有的历史日期。

en: She exercises on a daily basis to stay healthy.
cn: 她每天锻炼以保持健康。

en: We check the inventory on a daily basis.
cn: 我们每天检查库存。

en: He devotes time to volunteering every weekend.
cn: 他每个周末都投入时间做志愿者。

en: She devotes time to learning new skills.
cn: 她投入时间学习新技能。

en: The workers decided to go out on strike for better wages.
cn: 工人们决定举行罢工以争取更好的工资。

en: They went out on strike last week.
cn: 他们上周举行了罢工。

en: The news about the storm aroused her anxiety.
cn: 关于风暴的消息引起了她的焦虑。

en: His uncertain future arouses my anxiety.
cn: 他不确定的未来引起了我的焦虑。

en: He has pull with the manager, so he can get things done quickly.
cn: 他对经理有影响力，所以能快速办成事情。

en: She has pull with the local authorities.
cn: 她对当地当局有影响力。

en: She looked cross-eyed at him when he made the silly suggestion.
cn: 当他提出愚蠢的建议时，她斜眼看着他。

en: He looked cross-eyed at the strange noise.
cn: 他对奇怪的声音斜眼看去。

en: When he asked about my salary, I told him to mind his own business.
cn: 当他问起我的薪水时，我告诉他管好自己的事。

en: She should mind her own business instead of gossiping.
cn: 她应该管好自己的事，而不是说闲话。

en: Can I take away the leftovers?
cn: 我可以带走剩菜吗？

en: The police took away the evidence.
cn: 警察拿走了证据。

en: Pollution is harming the aquatic environment.
cn: 污染正在损害水生环境。

en: Fish thrive in a healthy aquatic environment.
cn: 鱼在健康的水生环境中茁壮成长。

en: In truth, he was not as confident as he seemed.
cn: 实际上，他并不像看起来那么自信。

en: In truth, the project was more difficult than expected.
cn: 事实上，这个项目比预期的更难。

en: There are twice as many students in this class compared to last year.
cn: 这个班的学生数量是去年的两倍。

en: She bought twice as many apples as she needed.
cn: 她买的苹果数量是她需要的两倍。

en: She decided to take on the challenging project at work.
cn: 她决定承担工作中的这个挑战性项目。

en: He took on extra responsibilities after the promotion.
cn: 晋升后，他承担了额外的责任。

en: Volunteers give of themselves to help the community.
cn: 志愿者们奉献自己来帮助社区。

en: He gives of himself tirelessly to support his family.
cn: 他不懈地奉献自己来支持他的家庭。

en: The loan was approved on condition that he provides collateral.
cn: 贷款被批准的条件是他提供抵押品。

en: She agreed to help on condition of anonymity.
cn: 她同意帮助，条件是不透露她的身份。

en: He fell for her at first sight.
cn: 他对她一见钟情。

en: She fell for his charming personality.
cn: 她迷恋上了他迷人的个性。

en: He took the rap for the mistake even though it wasn't his fault.
cn: 他承担了这个错误的责备，尽管这不是他的错。

en: She took the rap for the team's failure to meet the deadline.
cn: 她为团队未能按时完成而承担责任。

en: She took exception to his rude comments during the meeting.
cn: 她对他会议期间的粗鲁评论表示不满。

en: He took exception to the unfair treatment he received.
cn: 他对他受到的不公平待遇表示反对。

en: In the lawsuit, they took him to the cleaners.
cn: 在诉讼中，他们彻底击败了他。

en: The scam took many people to the cleaners.
cn: 这个骗局让许多人损失惨重。

en: She runs a successful business in the tech industry.
cn: 她在科技行业经营一家成功的企业。

en: To run a successful business, you need good management skills.
cn: 要经营一家成功的企业，你需要良好的管理技能。

en: Parents have a significant influence on their children's development.
cn: 父母对孩子的成长有重大影响。

en: Social media has a strong influence on public opinion.
cn: 社交媒体对公众舆论有很强的影响。

en: The government launched programs to get rid of poverty in rural areas.
cn: 政府启动了消除农村地区贫困的项目。

en: International aid aims to help countries get rid of poverty.
cn: 国际援助旨在帮助国家消除贫困。

en: Can you look over this report before I submit it?
cn: 你能在我提交前检查一下这份报告吗？

en: She looked over the contract carefully before signing.
cn: 她在签署前仔细审阅了合同。

en: Traditional crafts must adapt to fit into the modern world.
cn: 传统手工艺必须适应以融入现代世界。

en: He struggled to fit into the modern world after retiring.
cn: 退休后，他努力适应现代世界。

en: After the hike, he had a strong appetite and ate a big meal.
cn: 徒步后，他有强烈的食欲，吃了一顿大餐。

en: Children often have a strong appetite for sweets.
cn: 孩子们通常对甜食有强烈的食欲。

en: It's better to communicate face to face to avoid misunderstandings.
cn: 最好面对面交流以避免误解。

en: They decided to communicate face to face to discuss the sensitive issue.
cn: 他们决定面对面交流来讨论这个敏感问题。

en: Raising social awareness about environmental issues is crucial.
cn: 提高对环境问题的社会意识至关重要。

en: Schools should promote social awareness among students.
cn: 学校应该促进学生之间的社会意识。

en: Graduates in computer science have excellent job prospects.
cn: 计算机科学专业的毕业生有极好的就业前景。

en: The economic downturn affected job prospects in many industries.
cn: 经济衰退影响了许多行业的就业前景。

en: He made no attempt to apologize for his mistake.
cn: 他没有尝试为他的错误道歉。

en: She made no attempt to hide her disappointment.
cn: 她没有尝试掩饰她的失望。

en: She studies with enthusiasm because she loves the subject.
cn: 她热情地学习，因为她喜欢这个科目。

en: To succeed, you need to study with enthusiasm and dedication.
cn: 要成功，你需要热情和专注地学习。

en: A market economy relies on supply and demand to set prices.
cn: 市场经济依靠供需来设定价格。

en: Many countries have transitioned to a market economy in recent decades.
cn: 近几十年来，许多国家已过渡到市场经济。

en: Our supplies are running low, so we need to restock soon.
cn: 我们的补给快用完了，所以我们需要尽快补充。

en: Patience runs low when dealing with constant delays.
cn: 处理不断的延误时，耐心会减少。

en: Let's get the ball rolling on this project by scheduling a meeting.
cn: 让我们通过安排会议来启动这个项目。

en: He got the ball rolling by submitting the initial proposal.
cn: 他通过提交初步提案来推动进程。

en: Make sure your software is up to date to avoid security risks.
cn: 确保你的软件是最新的，以避免安全风险。

en: She always keeps up to date with the latest fashion trends.
cn: 她总是紧跟最新的时尚潮流。

en: Planting more trees can help alleviate pollution in urban areas.
cn: 多种树有助于减轻城市地区的污染。

en: Governments are implementing policies to alleviate pollution from factories.
cn: 政府正在实施政策以减轻工厂造成的污染。

en: If you have a complaint, you must go through channels and speak to your supervisor first.
cn: 如果你有投诉，必须通过正规渠道，先和你的主管谈。

en: All requests for funding need to go through channels for approval.
cn: 所有资金申请都需要按程序审批。

en: Between you and me, I think the manager is planning to resign.
cn: 私下跟你说，我觉得经理打算辞职了。

en: This is just between you and me—don't tell anyone else.
cn: 这事就咱俩知道，别告诉别人。

en: She will graduate from Harvard University next year.
cn: 她明年将从哈佛大学毕业。

en: He graduated from high school with honors.
cn: 他以优异成绩从高中毕业。

en: Try to speak at natural speed so people can understand you better.
cn: 试着以自然语速说话，这样别人能更好地理解你。

en: In language exams, it's important to speak at natural speed to sound fluent.
cn: 在语言考试中，以自然语速说话对于听起来流利很重要。

en: We need to create a detailed financial plan for our retirement.
cn: 我们需要为退休制定一个详细的财务计划。

en: A good financial plan can help you achieve your long-term goals.
cn: 一个好的理财规划能帮助你实现长期目标。

en: You need to loosen up a bit and enjoy the party.
cn: 你需要放松一点，享受派对。

en: After a long day at work, I like to loosen up by listening to music.
cn: 工作一整天后，我喜欢听音乐来放松。

en: I know it's not my area, but let me put my two cents in on the marketing strategy.
cn: 我知道这不是我的领域，但让我对营销策略发表一下意见。

en: He always puts his two cents in during meetings, even when it's not necessary.
cn: 他总是在会议上插嘴，即使没必要。

en: He prefers a single-speed cycle for commuting in the city because it's simple and low-maintenance.
cn: 他更喜欢用单速自行车在城市通勤，因为它简单且维护成本低。

en: Single-speed cycles are popular among urban cyclists for their minimalist design.
cn: 单速自行车因其极简设计在城市骑行者中很受欢迎。

en: Many students choose to study overseas to gain international experience.
cn: 许多学生选择海外留学以获得国际经验。

en: She plans to study overseas in Canada next year.
cn: 她计划明年去加拿大海外留学。

en: In the debate, she turned the tables on her opponent with a strong argument.
cn: 在辩论中，她用有力的论点扭转了局势，反败为胜。

en: The underdog team turned the tables on the champions in the final match.
cn: 那支弱队在决赛中扭转局势，反败为胜击败了冠军。

en: The defendant pleaded for mercy in court.
cn: 被告在法庭上恳求宽恕。

en: She pleaded for help when she got lost in the forest.
cn: 她在森林里迷路时请求帮助。

en: I got a lot out of that workshop; it really improved my skills.
cn: 我从那个工作坊中获益良多；它确实提高了我的技能。

en: Students who participate actively get a lot out of their education.
cn: 积极参与的学生从教育中获益良多。

en: The stadium was packed with excited fans during the concert.
cn: 音乐会期间，体育场挤满了兴奋的粉丝。

en: This book is packed with useful tips for beginners.
cn: 这本书充满了对初学者有用的建议。

en: The comedian's jokes brought the house down at the theater.
cn: 那位喜剧演员的笑话在剧院引起了轰动。

en: Her performance was so amazing that it brought the house down.
cn: 她的表演太精彩了，博得了满堂彩。

en: We're trying to pay down our mortgage as quickly as possible.
cn: 我们正试图尽快偿还我们的抵押贷款。

en: It's wise to pay down high-interest debt first.
cn: 先偿还高息债务是明智的。

en: I decided to trade in my old car for a newer model.
cn: 我决定用我的旧车折价换一辆更新的车型。

en: You can trade in your old phone when buying the latest smartphone.
cn: 购买最新款智能手机时，你可以用旧手机折价。

en: He keeps his colleagues at a distance to maintain professionalism.
cn: 他与同事保持距离以维持专业性。

en: It's best to keep at a distance from people who spread negativity.
cn: 最好与传播负面情绪的人保持距离。

en: It's important to make good friends who support you through life's challenges.
cn: 结交能在生活挑战中支持你的好朋友很重要。

en: She managed to make good friends quickly after moving to the new city.
cn: 搬到新城市后，她很快结交了好朋友。

en: It took me a while to take in all the information from the lecture.
cn: 我花了一些时间来理解讲座中的所有信息。

en: She couldn't take in the news of her friend's sudden death.
cn: 她无法接受朋友突然去世的消息。

en: The teacher inspired the students with stories of great scientists.
cn: 老师用伟大科学家的故事激励了学生们。

en: He inspired his team with a powerful vision for the future.
cn: 他用一个强大的未来愿景激励了他的团队。

en: We should use environmentally friendly products to reduce pollution.
cn: 我们应该使用环保产品以减少污染。

en: This company is known for its environmentally friendly practices.
cn: 这家公司以其环保实践而闻名。

en: The spy operated under cover for years without being detected.
cn: 这名间谍秘密行动多年未被发现。

en: They conducted the investigation under cover to avoid alerting the suspects.
cn: 他们秘密进行调查，以免惊动嫌疑人。

en: She committed herself to learning a new language this year.
cn: 她今年致力于学习一门新语言。

en: He committed himself to the project with full dedication.
cn: 他全身心投入到这个项目中。

en: The room relies on artificial light since it has no windows.
cn: 这个房间没有窗户，依赖人造光。

en: Artificial light from street lamps illuminates the city at night.
cn: 夜晚，街灯的人造光照亮了城市。

en: They decided to make an offer on the house after viewing it.
cn: 看完房子后，他们决定提出报价。

en: The company made an offer to buy out its competitor.
cn: 公司提出收购其竞争对手的提议。

en: You can't have your cake and eat it too; you must choose between a high salary and flexible hours.
cn: 你不能鱼与熊掌兼得；你必须在高薪和灵活工作时间之间做出选择。

en: He wants to travel the world without spending money, but you can't have your cake and eat it too.
cn: 他想不花钱环游世界，但鱼与熊掌不可兼得。

en: She puts her children to bed at 8 PM every night.
cn: 她每晚8点安顿孩子们睡觉。

en: After reading a story, he put the baby to bed.
cn: 读完故事后，他安顿婴儿睡觉。

en: His actions are at odds with his stated principles.
cn: 他的行为与他声明的原则不一致。

en: The two departments are at odds with each other over the budget allocation.
cn: 这两个部门在预算分配上存在分歧。

en: I need to check with my manager before approving this expense.
cn: 在批准这笔费用之前，我需要与我的经理核实。

en: Please check with the team to see if they are available for the meeting.
cn: 请与团队核实他们是否有空参加会议。

en: We experienced a spell of hot weather last summer.
cn: 去年夏天，我们经历了一段炎热天气。

en: He went through a spell of unemployment before finding a new job.
cn: 在找到新工作之前，他经历了一段失业期。

en: Are you for real? I can't believe you won the lottery!
cn: 你是认真的吗？我不敢相信你中了彩票！

en: This time, he's for real about quitting his job and traveling the world.
cn: 这次，他是真的打算辞职去环游世界。

en: Fax machines were commonly used for document transmission before email became popular.
cn: 在电子邮件普及之前，传真机常用于文件传输。

en: Many offices still keep fax machines for legal or formal communications.
cn: 许多办公室仍保留传真机用于法律或正式通讯。

en: He decided to lay aside his personal projects to focus on work.
cn: 他决定搁置个人项目，专注于工作。

en: Let's lay aside our differences and work together on this issue.
cn: 让我们搁置分歧，共同解决这个问题。

en: Go easy on the salt when cooking for guests.
cn: 为客人做饭时少放点盐。

en: The teacher went easy on the students who tried their best.
cn: 老师对那些尽力了的学生很宽容。

en: Students who cheat in exams risk severe penalties.
cn: 考试作弊的学生面临严厉处罚。

en: He was caught cheating in exams using a hidden device.
cn: 他使用隐藏设备考试作弊被抓。

en: The police caught the thief red handed with the stolen goods.
cn: 警察当场抓获了小偷和赃物。

en: She was caught red handed cheating on the test.
cn: 她考试作弊被当场抓住。

en: She received a pay raise after her annual performance review.
cn: 年度绩效评估后，她获得了加薪。

en: Employees are requesting a pay raise due to increased living costs.
cn: 由于生活成本上涨，员工们正在要求加薪。

en: His excuse was made up out of whole cloth to avoid trouble.
cn: 他的借口完全是编造的，为了逃避麻烦。

en: The story she told was made up out of whole cloth; none of it happened.
cn: 她讲的故事纯属虚构，没一件是真的。

en: I'll treat you to dinner to celebrate your promotion.
cn: 我请你吃饭庆祝你升职。

en: She treated her friends to a movie after work.
cn: 她下班后请朋友看了场电影。

en: Driving under the influence breaks laws and endangers others.
cn: 酒驾违法并危及他人。

en: Companies that break environmental laws face heavy fines.
cn: 违反环境法的公司面临重罚。

en: I need to get a new phone because mine is broken.
cn: 我需要买部新手机，因为我的坏了。

en: Did you get the package I sent you?
cn: 你收到我寄的包裹了吗？

en: Industrial waste can contaminate water supplies if not properly managed.
cn: 工业废物处理不当会污染供水。

en: The oil spill contaminated water in the river, harming wildlife.
cn: 石油泄漏污染了河水，危害野生动物。

en: She argued against the proposal, citing high costs.
cn: 她以成本过高为由反对这个提议。

en: He argued against changing the policy without evidence.
cn: 他辩驳说没有证据不应改变政策。

en: You need a password to gain access to the secure database.
cn: 你需要密码才能访问安全数据库。

en: The hacker gained unauthorized access to the network.
cn: 黑客未经授权访问了网络。

en: Employees get paid every two weeks.
cn: 员工每两周领一次工资。

en: Freelancers often get paid upon project completion.
cn: 自由职业者通常在项目完成后获得报酬。

en: In the debate, she gave as good as she got, matching every argument point for point.
cn: 在辩论中，她以牙还牙，逐点回应每一个论点。

en: He's not afraid to give as good as he gets in a tough negotiation.
cn: 在艰难的谈判中，他不怕以牙还牙。

en: Please return the form at your convenience.
cn: 请在您方便时归还表格。

en: We can schedule the meeting at your convenience.
cn: 我们可以根据您方便的时间安排会议。

en: She poured out a glass of water for the guest.
cn: 她为客人倒了一杯水。

en: Be careful not to pour out too much milk.
cn: 小心别倒太多牛奶。

en: The government launched awareness campaigns about recycling.
cn: 政府发起了关于回收的宣传活动。

en: NGOs often launch awareness campaigns for social issues.
cn: 非政府组织常为社会问题发起宣传活动。

en: You can try out the new software before buying it.
cn: 你可以在购买前试用新软件。

en: I'm going to try out this recipe for dinner.
cn: 我打算晚餐试试这个食谱。

en: I'll take a whack at fixing the car, though I'm not an expert.
cn: 我会试试修车，虽然我不是专家。

en: She took a whack at learning Spanish last year.
cn: 她去年尝试学习西班牙语。

en: The food package must list all ingredients clearly.
cn: 食品包装必须清楚列出所有成分。

en: Recyclable food packages are better for the environment.
cn: 可回收的食品包装对环境更好。

en: She stood up to the bully and told him to stop.
cn: 她勇敢面对霸凌者，让他停止。

en: The small country stood up to the invasion for months.
cn: 这个小国抵抗入侵数月。

en: The insurance will cover the cost of the repairs.
cn: 保险将支付维修费用。

en: The grant covers the cost of tuition for low-income students.
cn: 助学金支付低收入学生的学费。

en: In his speech, he made a reference to recent economic data.
cn: 在他的演讲中，他引用了最近的经济数据。

en: The article makes a reference to a study from 2020.
cn: 这篇文章引用了2020年的一项研究。

en: They decided to go to court over the property dispute.
cn: 他们决定就财产纠纷提起诉讼。

en: If you don't pay the fine, you may have to go to court.
cn: 如果你不支付罚款，可能得出庭。

en: The population of the town is on the decline.
cn: 这个城镇的人口正在减少。

en: His health has been on the decline since last year.
cn: 自去年以来，他的健康状况一直在衰退。

en: They danced to the rhythm of the drums.
cn: 他们随着鼓的节奏跳舞。

en: She loves to dance to pop music.
cn: 她喜欢随着流行音乐跳舞。

en: Lions prey on antelopes in the savanna.
cn: 狮子在草原上捕食羚羊。

en: Some birds prey on insects for food.
cn: 一些鸟类捕食昆虫。

en: She mopped up the spilled milk with a towel.
cn: 她用毛巾擦干了洒出的牛奶。

en: After the flood, they had to mop up the water.
cn: 洪水过后，他们得清理积水。

en: The concert tickets sold out in minutes.
cn: 音乐会门票几分钟内就售罄了。

en: The new product sold out on the first day.
cn: 新产品第一天就售罄了。

en: To all appearances, the deal was successful, but there were hidden problems.
cn: 从表面看，交易成功了，但有隐藏问题。

en: He seemed happy to all appearances, but was actually stressed.
cn: 从表面看他很快乐，但实际上压力很大。

en: During the pandemic, freedom is restricted to prevent spread.
cn: 疫情期间，自由受到限制以防止传播。

en: In some countries, freedom is restricted by strict laws.
cn: 在一些国家，自由受到严格法律的限制。

en: With this new technology, we can get an edge over our competitors.
cn: 有了这项新技术，我们可以获得对竞争对手的优势。

en: She got an edge over him by studying harder.
cn: 她通过更努力学习获得了对他的优势。

en: I'll take up the issue with the manager.
cn: 我会向经理提出这个问题。

en: She took up her complaint with customer service.
cn: 她向客服提出了投诉。

en: They broke off negotiations due to disagreements.
cn: 由于分歧，他们中断了谈判。

en: He broke off the conversation to answer the phone.
cn: 他中断谈话去接电话。

en: He burned out after working 80-hour weeks.
cn: 他每周工作80小时后精疲力竭。

en: Many nurses burn out due to stress.
cn: 许多护士因压力而耗尽精力。

en: I deleted the file by mistake.
cn: 我错误地删除了文件。

en: He took my bag by mistake at the airport.
cn: 他在机场无意中拿错了我的包。

en: The store's opening time is 9 AM.
cn: 商店的营业时间是上午9点。

en: Check the museum's opening time before you visit.
cn: 参观前查看博物馆的开放时间。

en: I wonder if it will rain tomorrow.
cn: 我想知道明天是否会下雨。

en: She wonders if he will come to the party.
cn: 她想知道他是否会来参加派对。

en: The company uses sustainable materials in its products.
cn: 公司在产品中使用可持续材料。

en: Building with sustainable materials reduces environmental impact.
cn: 使用可持续材料建筑减少环境影响。

en: Farmers grow hemp for its fibers and seeds.
cn: 农民种植大麻以获取纤维和种子。

en: It is legal to grow hemp in some regions for industrial use.
cn: 在一些地区，为工业用途种植大麻是合法的。

en: She is on vacation in Hawaii for two weeks.
cn: 她在夏威夷度假两周。

en: The office is closed because the staff are on vacation.
cn: 办公室关闭了，因为员工都在休假。

en: She is not only intelligent but also very hardworking.
cn: 她不仅聪明，而且非常勤奋。

en: The movie was not only entertaining but also thought-provoking.
cn: 这部电影不仅娱乐性强，而且发人深省。

en: He inquired after her health during the call.
cn: 他在电话中问候她的健康。

en: She inquired after the well-being of his family.
cn: 她询问了他家人的安康。

en: She is pursuing a degree in engineering.
cn: 她正在攻读工程学位。

en: He decided to pursue a degree abroad.
cn: 他决定在国外攻读学位。

en: The company specializes in manufacturing medical products like bandages and syringes.
cn: 这家公司专门生产绷带和注射器等医疗产品。

en: Regulations ensure the safety of medical products on the market.
cn: 法规确保市场上医疗产品的安全性。

en: The driver slowed up as he approached the intersection.
cn: 司机在接近十字路口时减速了。

en: Production has slowed up due to supply chain issues.
cn: 由于供应链问题，生产速度放慢了。

en: At one time, this town was a bustling port.
cn: 这个城镇曾经是一个繁忙的港口。

en: He was at one time the CEO of a major company.
cn: 他曾一度是一家大公司的首席执行官。

en: The company cashed in on the holiday season by launching a new product.
cn: 这家公司通过推出新产品在假日季节获利。

en: He cashed in on his fame by writing a bestselling book.
cn: 他利用自己的名气写了一本畅销书来赚钱。

en: We need to create a household budget to manage our expenses better.
cn: 我们需要制定一个家庭预算来更好地管理开支。

en: Sticking to a household budget can help save money for emergencies.
cn: 坚持家庭预算有助于为紧急情况存钱。

en: I often think back to my childhood summers.
cn: 我经常回想童年的夏天。

en: When I think back on that day, I realize how much has changed.
cn: 当我回想那一天时，我意识到变化有多大。

en: Regular exercise helps keep illnesses at bay.
cn: 定期锻炼有助于防止疾病发生。

en: The security system keeps intruders at bay.
cn: 安全系统使入侵者无法接近。

en: Be careful not to let the milk spill out of the cup.
cn: 小心别让牛奶从杯子里溢出来。

en: The crowd spilled out into the street after the concert.
cn: 音乐会结束后，人群涌到了街上。

en: You can't just sit by while injustice happens.
cn: 当不公正发生时，你不能只是袖手旁观。

en: He sat by and watched as the argument escalated.
cn: 他袖手旁观，看着争论升级。

en: The government is implementing policies to tackle unemployment.
cn: 政府正在实施政策来解决失业问题。

en: We need innovative solutions to tackle unemployment in the region.
cn: 我们需要创新的解决方案来应对该地区的失业问题。

en: She is studying hard in preparation for the exam.
cn: 她正在努力学习，为考试做准备。

en: The team trained rigorously in preparation for the competition.
cn: 团队为比赛进行了严格的训练准备。

en: Her unique talent sets her apart from other candidates.
cn: 她独特的才能使她与其他候选人区分开来。

en: The special edition features set this book apart from the regular version.
cn: 特别版的特点使这本书与普通版不同。

en: They went to bed with each other on their first date.
cn: 他们在第一次约会时就发生了关系。

en: He admitted going to bed with his colleague.
cn: 他承认与同事发生了性关系。

en: After working for ten hours, we decided to call it a day.
cn: 工作了十小时后，我们决定收工。

en: Let's call it a day and continue tomorrow.
cn: 我们今天到此为止，明天继续。

en: She manages all the domestic work in the household.
cn: 她管理家庭中的所有家务劳动。

en: Domestic work includes cleaning, cooking, and childcare.
cn: 家务劳动包括清洁、烹饪和照顾孩子。

en: Keep this news under your hat until we make an official announcement.
cn: 在我们正式宣布之前，请对这个消息保密。

en: She kept the surprise party under her hat for weeks.
cn: 她为惊喜派对保密了好几周。

en: You can always count on her to keep a secret.
cn: 你总是可以指望她保守秘密。

en: We're counting on good weather for the outdoor event.
cn: 我们指望天气好能举办户外活动。

en: The old building is in need of urgent repairs.
cn: 这栋旧建筑急需维修。

en: He is in need of financial assistance to complete his studies.
cn: 他需要经济援助来完成学业。

en: We plan to go surfing at the beach this weekend.
cn: 我们计划这个周末去海滩冲浪。

en: He learned to go surfing during his vacation in Australia.
cn: 他在澳大利亚度假期间学会了冲浪。

en: She remarked on how beautiful the sunset was.
cn: 她评论说日落多么美丽。

en: He didn't remark on the changes in the office layout.
cn: 他没有评论办公室布局的变化。

en: The basement has been converted into a recreation room with a pool table.
cn: 地下室被改造成了一个有台球桌的娱乐室。

en: Students gather in the recreation room to play video games.
cn: 学生们聚集在娱乐室玩电子游戏。

en: It's better to err on the side of caution when dealing with sensitive data.
cn: 处理敏感数据时，宁可过于谨慎。

en: The doctor erred on the side of prescribing extra tests.
cn: 医生偏向于多开一些检查以防万一。

en: The effort is worth doing if it leads to success.
cn: 如果努力能带来成功，那就值得做。

en: Visiting that museum is worth doing for its historical artifacts.
cn: 参观那个博物馆因其历史文物而值得。

en: It's just a matter of time before they announce the merger.
cn: 他们宣布合并只是时间问题。

en: With his dedication, success is only a matter of time.
cn: 以他的奉献精神，成功只是时间问题。

en: Internships help students get their foot in the door of the industry.
cn: 实习帮助学生获得进入该行业的初步机会。

en: He got his foot in the door by networking at the conference.
cn: 通过在会议上建立人脉，他迈出了第一步。

en: The password must not contain arbitrary characters like symbols.
cn: 密码不能包含像符号这样的任意字符。

en: In programming, an arbitrary character can be any letter or number.
cn: 在编程中，任意字符可以是任何字母或数字。

en: Employees often groan about the long working hours.
cn: 员工经常抱怨工作时间长。

en: He groaned about having to do the dishes again.
cn: 他抱怨又得洗碗了。

en: Public opinion is set against the new tax proposal.
cn: 公众舆论反对新的税收提案。

en: The scandal set him against his former allies.
cn: 丑闻使他与以前的盟友对立。

en: In view of the recent developments, we must reconsider our strategy.
cn: 鉴于最近的发展，我们必须重新考虑我们的策略。

en: The meeting was postponed in view of the bad weather.
cn: 考虑到恶劣天气，会议被推迟了。

en: I go jogging every morning to stay fit.
cn: 我每天早上慢跑来保持健康。

en: They decided to go jogging in the park after work.
cn: 他们决定下班后去公园慢跑。

en: I intend to finish the report by tomorrow.
cn: 我打算明天前完成报告。

en: They intend to travel abroad next summer.
cn: 他们计划明年夏天出国旅行。

en: The student center has a cafeteria and study rooms.
cn: 学生中心有自助餐厅和学习室。

en: Clubs often hold meetings at the student center.
cn: 社团经常在学生中心举行会议。

en: She is attracted to intelligent people.
cn: 她被聪明的人所吸引。

en: Many tourists are attracted to the historical sites.
cn: 许多游客被历史遗迹所吸引。

en: I agree with you up to a point, but not entirely.
cn: 我在一定程度上同意你，但不是完全同意。

en: The plan works up to a point, but needs adjustments.
cn: 这个计划在一定程度上有效，但需要调整。

en: The dog ran after the ball in the park.
cn: 狗在公园里追赶球。

en: He's always running after the latest fashion trends.
cn: 他总是追求最新的时尚潮流。

en: The nuclear family consists of parents and their children.
cn: 核心家庭由父母和他们的子女组成。

en: In modern societies, the nuclear family is common.
cn: 在现代社会，核心家庭很常见。

en: He came down with a cold last week.
cn: 他上周感冒了。

en: Many students came down with the flu during winter.
cn: 许多学生在冬天患上了流感。

en: Good communication is one of the key leadership qualities.
cn: 良好的沟通是关键领导素质之一。

en: She demonstrated strong leadership qualities during the crisis.
cn: 她在危机期间展现了强大的领导才能。

en: Fans cheered the team on during the match.
cn: 球迷们在比赛中为球队加油。

en: We cheered her on as she ran the marathon.
cn: 我们为她跑马拉松加油鼓劲。

en: He lost his temper when the computer crashed.
cn: 电脑崩溃时，他发脾气了。

en: Try not to lose your temper during the discussion.
cn: 讨论时尽量不要发脾气。

en: The politician is under fire for his recent comments.
cn: 这位政治家因最近的言论受到批评。

en: The company came under fire from environmental groups.
cn: 这家公司受到环保组织的抨击。

en: We decided to hold off the meeting until next week.
cn: 我们决定将会议推迟到下周。

en: Hold off making a decision until you have more information.
cn: 在获得更多信息之前，暂缓做决定。

en: The manager called the dogs off after the employee apologized.
cn: 员工道歉后，经理停止了批评。

en: He asked the media to call the dogs off the celebrity.
cn: 他要求媒体停止对这位名人的攻击。

en: His business venture came a cropper due to poor planning.
cn: 由于计划不周，他的商业冒险失败了。

en: She came a cropper in the exam because she didn't study.
cn: 她因为没学习，考试栽了跟头。

en: This photo is used by courtesy of the photographer.
cn: 这张照片承蒙摄影师的允许使用。

en: The event was sponsored by courtesy of a local company.
cn: 这次活动承蒙一家本地公司的赞助。

en: Many residents object to the new construction project.
cn: 许多居民反对这个新的建设项目。

en: She objected to his rude behavior at the meeting.
cn: 她反对他在会议上的粗鲁行为。

en: We need to cut back on expenses to save money.
cn: 我们需要削减开支来省钱。

en: He cut back on sugar to improve his health.
cn: 他减少糖的摄入以改善健康。

en: The fire is now under control.
cn: 火势现在已得到控制。

en: Keep your emotions under control during the negotiation.
cn: 在谈判中保持情绪受控。

en: The government pushed through the new law despite opposition.
cn: 尽管有反对，政府还是强行通过了新法律。

en: She pushed through the project to meet the deadline.
cn: 她强行完成了项目以赶上截止日期。

en: I would love to visit Japan someday.
cn: 我很想有一天去日本旅游。

en: She would love to help you with the project.
cn: 她非常愿意帮助你完成这个项目。

en: I need some time to chew over the job offer before making a decision.
cn: 我需要一些时间仔细考虑这个工作机会再做决定。

en: Let's chew over the proposal and discuss it tomorrow.
cn: 让我们反复思考这个提议，明天再讨论。

en: Understanding the historical perspective helps us learn from past mistakes.
cn: 理解历史视角有助于我们从过去的错误中学习。

en: The book offers a historical perspective on the development of democracy.
cn: 这本书提供了民主发展的历史视角。

en: I'm not tired at all after the long walk.
cn: 长途步行后我一点也不累。

en: She did not understand the instructions at all.
cn: 她完全没理解这些说明。

en: Students are encouraged to study independently.
cn: 鼓励学生独立学习。

en: He studied independently to prepare for the exam.
cn: 他独立学习以准备考试。

en: He finally got a break in his acting career.
cn: 他终于在演艺事业上得到了机会。

en: Let's get a break and have some coffee.
cn: 让我们休息一下，喝点咖啡。

en: I need to fix an appointment with the manager to discuss the project.
cn: 我需要与经理约定时间讨论这个项目。

en: She fixed an appointment with the dentist for next Tuesday.
cn: 她与牙医约定了下周二的时间。

en: With the new project, I have a pretty heavy workload this month.
cn: 由于新项目，我这个月的工作量相当重。

en: The team is managing a pretty heavy workload during the holiday season.
cn: 团队在假日期间管理着相当重的工作量。

en: It took a few weeks to settle into the new apartment.
cn: 花了几个星期才适应新公寓。

en: She quickly settled into her role as team leader.
cn: 她很快适应了团队领导的角色。

en: The library's open stacks allow students to browse books freely.
cn: 图书馆的开架式书库允许学生自由浏览图书。

en: I found the reference book in the open stacks on the second floor.
cn: 我在二楼的开架式书库找到了参考书。

en: We have many resources at our disposal on the Internet for research.
cn: 我们在互联网上有许多可用于研究的资源。

en: The resources at our disposal on the Internet make learning more accessible.
cn: 互联网上可用的资源使学习更容易获取。

en: She flagged down a taxi to get to the airport.
cn: 她挥手示意一辆出租车停下以去机场。

en: We flagged down a bus when we missed the earlier one.
cn: 当我们错过早一班车时，我们挥手示意一辆公交车停下。

en: We need to book in at the hotel before 6 PM.
cn: 我们需要在下午6点前到酒店登记入住。

en: I'll book in for the conference next week.
cn: 我将预订下周的会议。

en: We can discuss the details later on in the meeting.
cn: 我们可以在会议稍后讨论细节。

en: I'll call you later on to confirm the plans.
cn: 我稍后会打电话给你确认计划。

en: I hope you don't take my comment the wrong way; I meant it as advice.
cn: 我希望你不要误解我的评论；我是想提建议。

en: He took her joke the wrong way and got upset.
cn: 他误解了她的玩笑并感到不安。

en: It's important to maintain balance while riding a bicycle.
cn: 骑自行车时保持平衡很重要。

en: She practices yoga to maintain balance in her life.
cn: 她练习瑜伽以保持生活平衡。

en: Nerve cells transmit signals throughout the body.
cn: 神经细胞在全身传递信号。

en: Damage to nerve cells can affect movement and sensation.
cn: 神经细胞损伤会影响运动和感觉。

en: When he hit his head, he saw stars for a moment.
cn: 当他撞到头时，他眼冒金星了一会儿。

en: The sudden fall made her see stars.
cn: 突然的摔倒让她眼冒金星。

en: He achieved success at the cost of his health.
cn: 他以健康为代价取得了成功。

en: The company expanded rapidly at the cost of quality control.
cn: 公司以质量控制为代价迅速扩张。

en: The parliamentary session turned into a tedious debate about procedural rules.
cn: 议会会议变成了一场关于程序规则的冗长乏味的辩论。

en: After three hours of tedious debate, the committee still hadn't reached a decision.
cn: 经过三小时冗长乏味的辩论后，委员会仍未做出决定。

en: After the injury, the doctor advised him to take it slow with exercise.
cn: 受伤后，医生建议他锻炼时慢慢来。

en: We decided to take it slow in our new relationship.
cn: 我们决定在我们的新关系中慢慢来。

en: We are short of time to complete the project.
cn: 我们缺乏时间来完成这个项目。

en: The hospital is short of medical supplies.
cn: 这家医院缺乏医疗用品。

en: The Amazon contains vast areas of virgin forest that have never been logged.
cn: 亚马逊拥有大片从未被砍伐过的原始森林。

en: Conservationists are fighting to protect the last remaining virgin forests in Europe.
cn: 环保主义者正在努力保护欧洲最后剩余的原始森林。

en: The farmers celebrated a good harvest after the favorable growing season.
cn: 在有利的生长季节后，农民们庆祝丰收。

en: A good harvest this year should help stabilize food prices in the region.
cn: 今年的丰收应有助于稳定该地区的食品价格。

en: He made free with my belongings without asking.
cn: 他未经允许随意使用我的物品。

en: She made free with the office supplies, which annoyed her colleagues.
cn: 她随意使用办公用品，这惹恼了她的同事。

en: The old church is a protected heritage building.
cn: 这座老教堂是受保护的遗产建筑。

en: Many heritage buildings in the city are open to tourists.
cn: 城市里的许多遗产建筑对游客开放。

en: She was exhausted to the point of collapsing after running the marathon.
cn: 跑完马拉松后，她累得几乎要晕倒。

en: His dedication to his work is to the point of neglecting his family.
cn: 他对工作的投入程度到了忽视家庭的地步。

en: She's been in a good mood ever since she got the promotion.
cn: 自从升职以来，她一直心情很好。

en: The sunny weather put everyone in a good mood.
cn: 阳光明媚的天气让每个人都心情愉快。

en: An army of volunteers helped clean up the park after the festival.
cn: 一支志愿者大军在节日后帮助清理公园。

en: The disaster relief effort was supported by an army of volunteers from across the country.
cn: 救灾工作得到了来自全国各地大批志愿者的支持。

en: After years of saving, they can now live comfortably in retirement.
cn: 经过多年的储蓄，他们现在可以在退休后舒适地生活。

en: With his new job, he earns enough to live comfortably in the city.
cn: 有了新工作，他赚的钱足够在城里舒适地生活。

en: Please note down the main points from the meeting.
cn: 请记下会议的主要要点。

en: I always note down interesting ideas when they come to me.
cn: 当有趣的想法出现时，我总是把它们记下来。

en: Parents often worry about who their teenagers associate with.
cn: 父母常常担心他们的青少年子女与谁交往。

en: In business, it's important to associate with reputable partners.
cn: 在商业中，与信誉良好的伙伴交往很重要。

en: The mother tried to draw away the child's attention from the broken toy.
cn: 母亲试图将孩子的注意力从坏掉的玩具上引开。

en: The decoy was used to draw away the enemy forces.
cn: 诱饵被用来引开敌军。

en: The company's stock took a nose dive after the scandal was revealed.
cn: 丑闻曝光后，该公司的股票急剧下跌。

en: Sales have gone into a nose dive since the new competitor entered the market.
cn: 自从新竞争对手进入市场以来，销售额急剧下降。

en: This was one of the coldest winters in the history of the state.
cn: 这是该州历史上最寒冷的冬天之一。

en: In the history of space exploration, the moon landing remains a landmark achievement.
cn: 在太空探索的历史上，登月仍然是一个里程碑式的成就。

en: The factory was fined for improperly disposing of toxic chemicals.
cn: 该工厂因不当处理有毒化学品而被罚款。

en: Exposure to toxic chemicals can have serious health consequences.
cn: 接触有毒化学品可能对健康造成严重后果。

en: I always get butterflies in my stomach before giving a speech.
cn: 演讲前我总是感到紧张。

en: She got butterflies in her stomach when she saw her crush approaching.
cn: 当她看到暗恋对象走近时，心里七上八下的。

en: I usually get up at 6:30 AM on weekdays.
cn: 我平时工作日通常在早上6:30起床。

en: It's hard to get up early when you've stayed up late.
cn: 熬夜后很难早起。

en: The student has made great progress in mathematics this semester.
cn: 这学期这名学生在数学方面取得了巨大进步。

en: Our research team has made great progress toward finding a cure.
cn: 我们的研究团队在寻找治疗方法方面取得了巨大进展。

en: I'd like a coffee to go, please.
cn: 请给我一杯外带咖啡。

en: We ordered pizza to go because we wanted to eat at home.
cn: 我们点了外卖披萨，因为想在家吃。

en: The evidence proved his guilt beyond a doubt.
cn: 证据确凿地证明了他的罪行。

en: She is, beyond a doubt, the most qualified candidate for the position.
cn: 毫无疑问，她是这个职位最有资格的候选人。

en: If you start this project, you should go all the way and finish it.
cn: 如果你开始这个项目，就应该全力以赴完成它。

en: They went all the way to win the championship.
cn: 他们全力以赴赢得了冠军。

en: The coach motivated the team to train harder.
cn: 教练激励队伍更加努力地训练。

en: Her success motivated me to pursue my own goals.
cn: 她的成功激励我去追求自己的目标。

en: It's important to do social activities to meet new people.
cn: 参与社交活动以结识新朋友很重要。

en: They do social activities every weekend to relax.
cn: 他们每个周末都参与社交活动来放松。

en: The embassy will hold a reception to welcome the new ambassador.
cn: 大使馆将举行招待会欢迎新大使。

en: After the wedding ceremony, they held a reception at a nearby hotel.
cn: 婚礼仪式后，他们在附近的一家酒店举行了招待会。

en: He backed out of the deal at the last minute.
cn: 他在最后一刻退出了这笔交易。

en: She promised to help but backed out when it got difficult.
cn: 她答应帮忙，但在事情变得困难时却食言了。

en: The company is trying to reduce the cost of operation.
cn: 公司正试图降低运营成本。

en: High energy prices increased the cost of operation.
cn: 高能源价格增加了运营成本。

en: Universal education is a key goal for many developing countries.
cn: 普及教育是许多发展中国家的关键目标。

en: The government promotes universal education for all children.
cn: 政府推广所有儿童的普及教育。

en: Please mark off the items you have completed.
cn: 请标记出你已经完成的项目。

en: They marked off the area for the new garden.
cn: 他们划出了新花园的区域。

en: The situation cries out for immediate action.
cn: 这种情况迫切需要立即行动。

en: The old building cries out for renovation.
cn: 这栋旧建筑迫切需要翻新。

en: He is enrolled in a computer science course.
cn: 他注册了一门计算机科学课程。

en: She is enrolled in the local high school.
cn: 她在当地高中入学。

en: We need to go back home before it gets dark.
cn: 我们需要在天黑前回家。

en: He decided to go back to his old job.
cn: 他决定回到他的旧工作。

en: I feel sorry for being late.
cn: 我为迟到感到抱歉。

en: She felt sorry for her mistake.
cn: 她为自己的错误感到抱歉。

en: The museum is definitely worth a visit.
cn: 这个博物馆绝对值得一游。

en: This small town is worth a visit for its historic sites.
cn: 这个小镇因其历史遗迹值得一游。

en: Please keep a civil tongue during the debate.
cn: 请在辩论中说话礼貌。

en: He was told to keep a civil tongue in his head.
cn: 他被要求说话要礼貌。

en: It's important for children to receive a good education.
cn: 孩子们接受良好教育很重要。

en: She received a good education at a prestigious university.
cn: 她在一所著名大学接受了良好教育。

en: She refused to comment on the rumors.
cn: 她拒绝评论这些谣言。

en: The expert will comment on the new policy.
cn: 专家将评论这项新政策。

en: She woke up to the importance of saving money.
cn: 她意识到了存钱的重要性。

en: They woke up to the reality of the situation.
cn: 他们意识到了情况的现实。

en: She lost her balance and fell on the ice.
cn: 她失去平衡，摔倒在冰上。

en: He lost his balance while climbing the ladder.
cn: 他在爬梯子时失去了平衡。

en: This tool is fit for the job.
cn: 这个工具适合这项工作。

en: She is fit for the leadership role.
cn: 她适合领导角色。

en: As yet, we have not received any response from the company.
cn: 到目前为止，我们还没有收到公司的任何回复。

en: Is there any news as yet about the project's approval?
cn: 关于项目批准，迄今有任何消息吗？

en: The patient complained of a headache and dizziness.
cn: 病人抱怨头痛和头晕。

en: She complained of poor service at the restaurant.
cn: 她抱怨那家餐厅的服务很差。

en: In the final race, the athlete decided to go the limit to win.
cn: 在决赛中，运动员决定全力以赴去赢得比赛。

en: When working on this project, we need to go the limit to ensure success.
cn: 在这个项目上，我们需要全力以赴以确保成功。

en: They decided to immigrate to Canada for better job opportunities.
cn: 他们决定移民到加拿大以寻求更好的工作机会。

en: Many people immigrate to the United States in search of a new life.
cn: 许多人移民到美国寻找新生活。

en: No sooner had I arrived than the meeting started.
cn: 我一到，会议就开始了。

en: No sooner did she finish her work than she went to bed.
cn: 她一完成工作就去睡觉了。

en: The dodo is an extinct species that once lived on Mauritius.
cn: 渡渡鸟是一种曾生活在毛里求斯的灭绝物种。

en: Scientists are working to prevent more animals from becoming extinct species.
cn: 科学家们正在努力防止更多动物成为灭绝物种。

en: Reporters on the ground provided live updates from the disaster area.
cn: 现场的记者从灾区提供了实时更新。

en: The general assessed the situation on the ground before making a decision.
cn: 将军在做出决定前评估了现场情况。

en: The hotel is a stone's throw away from the beach, making it very convenient.
cn: 酒店离海滩很近，非常方便。

en: My office is just a stone's throw away from the train station.
cn: 我的办公室离火车站只有一箭之遥。

en: This new model is similar to the previous one but with improved features.
cn: 这个新模型与之前的相似，但功能有所改进。

en: Her writing style is similar to that of famous authors.
cn: 她的写作风格类似于著名作家。

en: It's cold outside, so bundle up before you go out.
cn: 外面很冷，出门前穿暖和点。

en: The children bundled up in coats and scarves for the winter walk.
cn: 孩子们穿上外套和围巾，为冬季散步保暖。

en: I didn't bargain for such bad weather during our vacation.
cn: 我没预料到假期期间天气会这么糟糕。

en: They got more than they bargained for when the project became very complex.
cn: 当项目变得非常复杂时，他们得到的比预料的要多。

en: In geometry, a vertical line goes straight up and down.
cn: 在几何学中，垂直线是直上直下的。

en: The artist drew a vertical line to divide the painting into two parts.
cn: 艺术家画了一条垂直线将画作分成两部分。

en: During exam week, students have to hold their noses to the grindstone to study.
cn: 考试周期间，学生们必须埋头苦干地学习。

en: He held his nose to the grindstone to finish the report on time.
cn: 他埋头苦干，按时完成了报告。

en: Now that you're here, we can start the meeting.
cn: 既然你来了，我们可以开始会议了。

en: Now that the rain has stopped, we can go for a walk.
cn: 既然雨停了，我们可以去散步了。

en: The car is in excellent condition after the repair.
cn: 修理后，这辆车处于极佳状态。

en: The patient is in stable condition following the surgery.
cn: 手术后，病人处于稳定状态。

en: The hotel staff is at your service 24 hours a day.
cn: 酒店员工24小时听候您的差遣。

en: If you need any help, I am at your service.
cn: 如果您需要任何帮助，我随时为您服务。

en: Hold on to the railing when walking down the stairs.
cn: 下楼梯时紧紧抓住扶手。

en: She decided to hold on to her old photos for sentimental reasons.
cn: 出于情感原因，她决定保留她的旧照片。

en: This material is resistant to water and heat.
cn: 这种材料耐水和耐热。

en: Some bacteria are resistant to antibiotics, making infections hard to treat.
cn: 一些细菌对抗生素有抵抗力，使得感染难以治疗。

en: How soon can you finish the report?
cn: 你多久能完成这份报告？

en: I wonder how soon the package will arrive.
cn: 我想知道包裹多久能到。

en: I lost track of time while reading that interesting book.
cn: 读那本有趣的书时，我忘记了时间。

en: It's easy to lose track of expenses if you don't keep a budget.
cn: 如果不做预算，很容易忘记开支。

en: Michael Jordan is considered the greatest basketball player of all time.
cn: 迈克尔·乔丹被认为是有史以来最伟大的篮球运动员。

en: This is my favorite movie of all time.
cn: 这是我有史以来最喜欢的电影。

en: He always wears a suit to important meetings.
cn: 他总是穿西装参加重要会议。

en: You should wear a suit for the job interview.
cn: 你应该穿西装去参加求职面试。

en: After the illness, he was out of condition for weeks.
cn: 生病后，他身体状况不佳了好几周。

en: If you're out of condition, you shouldn't try to run a marathon.
cn: 如果你身体状况不佳，就不应该尝试跑马拉松。

en: We visited the art gallery to see the new exhibition.
cn: 我们参观了美术馆看新展览。

en: The local art gallery features works by regional artists.
cn: 当地美术馆展出地区艺术家的作品。

en: The company was fined for making illegal profits from fraudulent activities.
cn: 该公司因从欺诈活动中获取非法利润而被罚款。

en: Authorities are cracking down on businesses that earn illegal profits.
cn: 当局正在打击获取非法利润的企业。

en: Work deadlines are a major source of stress for many people.
cn: 工作截止日期是许多人的主要压力来源。

en: Financial problems can be a significant source of stress.
cn: 财务问题可能是一个重要的压力来源。

en: Many companies do business internationally.
cn: 许多公司在国际上做生意。

en: It's important to trust the people you do business with.
cn: 信任与你做生意的人很重要。

en: I'll look in on my way home from work.
cn: 我下班回家时会顺便拜访一下。

en: Can you look in on the baby while I'm out?
cn: 我不在的时候你能顺便看看宝宝吗？

en: You need to make an application for a visa at the embassy.
cn: 你需要在大使馆申请签证。

en: She made an application to join the club.
cn: 她申请加入俱乐部。

en: Tourists stream into the city during the summer.
cn: 夏季游客涌入这座城市。

en: Sunlight streamed into the room through the window.
cn: 阳光透过窗户流入房间。

en: Feel free to drop in anytime you're in the neighborhood.
cn: 你任何时候在附近都可以顺便来拜访。

en: She dropped in for a cup of coffee yesterday.
cn: 她昨天顺便来喝了杯咖啡。

en: They decided to move away from the city for a quieter life.
cn: 他们决定搬离城市去过更安静的生活。

en: Please move away from the edge of the platform.
cn: 请从站台边缘移开。

en: She took a sip of her coffee before answering.
cn: 她喝了一小口咖啡才回答。

en: He took a sip of water to clear his throat.
cn: 他喝了一小口水清嗓子。

en: He was forced to sign the contract against his will.
cn: 他被迫违背自己的意愿签署了合同。

en: It's illegal to detain someone against their will.
cn: 违背他人意愿拘留他人是违法的。

en: We should all strive for excellence in our work.
cn: 我们都应该在工作中力求卓越。

en: The team strives for perfection in every project.
cn: 团队在每个项目中都力求完美。

en: Her approach is distinct from traditional methods.
cn: 她的方法有别于传统方法。

en: The two species are distinct from each other.
cn: 这两个物种彼此不同。

en: I didn't mean to hurt your feelings.
cn: 我不是有意伤害你的感情。

en: What do you mean to do about the problem?
cn: 你打算怎么处理这个问题？

en: Many people seek a stable career in government jobs.
cn: 许多人寻求在政府工作中获得稳定的职业。

en: After years of freelancing, she wanted a stable career with benefits.
cn: 经过多年的自由职业，她想要一份有福利的稳定职业。

en: The students were distracted by the noise outside.
cn: 学生们被外面的噪音分心了。

en: Don't be distracted by social media while working.
cn: 工作时不要被社交媒体分心。

en: The dog began to show aggression when the stranger approached.
cn: 当陌生人靠近时，狗开始表现出攻击性。

en: In negotiations, it's unwise to show aggression too early.
cn: 在谈判中，过早表现出攻击性是不明智的。

en: I took the liberty of booking a table for us at the restaurant.
cn: 我冒昧地在餐厅为我们预订了一张桌子。

en: She took the liberty of correcting the error in the report without asking.
cn: 她未经允许就冒昧地纠正了报告中的错误。

en: The police ran him in for speeding.
cn: 警察因超速逮捕了他。

en: They ran the suspect in after finding evidence at the scene.
cn: 在现场找到证据后，他们逮捕了嫌疑人。

en: Poor communication can lead to misunderstandings.
cn: 沟通不畅可能导致误解。

en: Regular exercise leads to better health.
cn: 定期锻炼能带来更好的健康。

en: After hours of arguing, he finally gave in and agreed to her terms.
cn: 经过数小时的争论，他终于屈服并同意了她的条件。

en: Don't give in to peer pressure; stand by your principles.
cn: 不要屈服于同辈压力，坚持你的原则。

en: The government aims to regulate spending to reduce the budget deficit.
cn: 政府旨在控制支出以减少预算赤字。

en: Families should regulate spending to avoid debt.
cn: 家庭应控制支出以避免债务。

en: She worked her fingers to the bone to support her family.
cn: 她非常努力地工作来养家糊口。

en: Farmers often work their fingers to the bone during harvest season.
cn: 农民在收获季节常常非常努力地工作。

en: The stress of the job is taking its toll on his health.
cn: 工作的压力正在损害他的健康。

en: Years of neglect have taken their toll on the old building.
cn: 多年的疏忽对这栋旧建筑造成了损害。

en: After finishing the project, he got a load off his mind.
cn: 完成项目后，他卸下了心理负担。

en: Talking to a friend can help get a load off your mind.
cn: 与朋友交谈可以帮助你卸下心理负担。

en: The new product line is expected to create revenues for the company.
cn: 新产品线预计将为公司创造收入。

en: Innovative strategies can help create revenues in a competitive market.
cn: 创新策略可以在竞争激烈的市场中帮助创造收入。

en: She went to the trouble to bake a cake for the party.
cn: 她不辞辛苦地为聚会烤了一个蛋糕。

en: He went to the trouble to research all the options before deciding.
cn: 他在决定前不辞辛苦地研究了所有选项。

en: The book is out on loan and will be back next week.
cn: 这本书已借出，下周归还。

en: The player is out on loan to another team for the season.
cn: 这名球员本赛季被租借到另一支球队。

en: Be prepared for bad weather during the hike.
cn: 为徒步旅行期间的恶劣天气做好准备。

en: She was prepared for any questions in the meeting.
cn: 她为会议中的任何问题做好了准备。

en: She made a great impression at the job interview.
cn: 她在工作面试中留下了很好的印象。

en: His speech made a lasting impression on the audience.
cn: 他的演讲给观众留下了持久的印象。

en: Many students travel during spring break.
cn: 许多学生在春假期间旅行。

en: The university will be closed for spring break next week.
cn: 大学下周将因春假关闭。

en: Check the weather report before planning your outdoor activities.
cn: 在计划户外活动前查看天气预报。

en: The weather report predicts rain for tomorrow.
cn: 天气预报预测明天下雨。

en: She is willing to help with the project.
cn: 她愿意帮忙做这个项目。

en: Are you willing to relocate for the job?
cn: 你愿意为这份工作搬家吗？

en: They set out in quest of adventure.
cn: 他们出发去寻求冒险。

en: He traveled in quest of knowledge.
cn: 他旅行以追求知识。

en: An inactive lifestyle can lead to health problems like obesity.
cn: 不活跃的生活方式可能导致健康问题，如肥胖。

en: He changed from an inactive lifestyle to exercising regularly.
cn: 他从不活跃的生活方式改为定期锻炼。

en: He got a bright idea to solve the problem quickly.
cn: 他想到一个好主意来快速解决问题。

en: While brainstorming, she got a bright idea for the project.
cn: 在头脑风暴时，她为项目想到了一个好主意。

en: She took the criticism in her stride.
cn: 她从容地接受了批评。

en: He takes setbacks in his stride and keeps going.
cn: 他轻松应对挫折并继续前进。

en: The parliament is responsible for making laws in the country.
cn: 议会负责制定国家的法律。

en: It takes time and debate to make laws that are fair and effective.
cn: 制定公平有效的法律需要时间和辩论。

en: That horror movie gave me the willies.
cn: 那部恐怖电影让我感到害怕。

en: Walking alone at night gets me the willies.
cn: 晚上独自走路让我感到紧张。

en: Different parenting styles can affect child development.
cn: 不同的育儿风格会影响儿童发展。

en: Authoritative parenting styles are often recommended.
cn: 权威型育儿风格常被推荐。

en: At the time of the accident, he was at home.
cn: 事故发生时，他在家。

en: She was young at the time of her first book.
cn: 她出版第一本书时还很年轻。

en: She prefers to work at home to avoid commuting.
cn: 她更喜欢在家工作以避免通勤。

en: Many people work at home due to the pandemic.
cn: 由于疫情，许多人在家工作。

en: That face looks familiar, but I can't place it.
cn: 那张脸看起来很熟悉，但我记不起来。

en: Does this street look familiar to you?
cn: 这条街对你来说看起来熟悉吗？

en: I ran across an old friend at the mall.
cn: 我在商场偶然遇到了一位老朋友。

en: She ran across some interesting facts in her research.
cn: 她在研究中偶然发现了一些有趣的事实。

en: Scientists study planet formation in young star systems.
cn: 科学家研究年轻恒星系统中的行星形成。

en: Planet formation involves accretion of material.
cn: 行星形成涉及物质的吸积。

en: Compare this model with the older version.
cn: 将这个型号与旧版本进行比较。

en: She compared her results with the national average.
cn: 她将自己的结果与全国平均水平进行了比较。

en: The company went bust after the financial crisis.
cn: 金融危机后，这家公司破产了。

en: Many startups go bust within the first year.
cn: 许多初创公司在第一年内倒闭。

en: I have trouble sleeping at night.
cn: 我晚上难以入睡。

en: He has trouble understanding complex instructions.
cn: 他难以理解复杂的指示。

en: They marked out the boundaries of the property.
cn: 他们划出了财产的边界。

en: His talent marks him out as a future leader.
cn: 他的才能使他脱颖而出，成为未来的领导者。

en: I take my hat off to her for her dedication.
cn: 我向她的奉献精神致敬。

en: We take our hats off to the volunteers.
cn: 我们向志愿者们致敬。

en: We count down to New Year's Eve.
cn: 我们倒计时到新年前夜。

en: The team counted down the seconds until launch.
cn: 团队倒数秒数直到发射。

en: I made his acquaintance at a conference.
cn: 我在一次会议上结识了他。

en: She was pleased to make your acquaintance.
cn: 她很高兴认识你。

en: The soldiers held the line against the attack.
cn: 士兵们坚守阵地抵御攻击。

en: We must hold the line on our principles.
