cn: 我们必须坚守我们的原则。

en: The lawyer will act for the defendant in court.
cn: 律师将在法庭上代表被告。

en: She acts for several clients in real estate deals.
cn: 她在房地产交易中代表几位客户。

en: As manager, she has the authority to approve budget requests.
cn: 作为经理，她有权批准预算请求。

en: Only the CEO has the authority to sign such contracts.
cn: 只有首席执行官有权签署此类合同。

en: She tries to balance work and family commitments by working flexible hours.
cn: 她通过弹性工作时间来平衡工作和家庭责任。

en: Many professionals struggle to balance work and family commitments effectively.
cn: 许多专业人士难以有效平衡工作和家庭责任。

en: I hope you get well soon after your surgery.
cn: 我希望你手术后能尽快康复。

en: She sent a card to wish him to get well quickly.
cn: 她寄了一张卡片，祝他早日康复。

en: His elevation to CEO was announced yesterday.
cn: 他晋升为CEO的消息昨天宣布了。

en: The elevation to a higher rank requires hard work.
cn: 晋升到更高职位需要努力工作。

en: In meetings, he learned to assert himself to ensure his ideas were heard.
cn: 在会议中，他学会了坚持自己以确保自己的想法被听到。

en: She needed to assert herself more in negotiations to get a better deal.
cn: 她需要在谈判中更自信地表达自己以获得更好的交易。

en: He received a pink slip after the company downsized.
cn: 公司裁员后，他收到了解雇通知。

en: Many employees fear getting a pink slip during economic downturns.
cn: 许多员工在经济低迷时期害怕收到解雇通知。

en: He gave the car a lick and a promise instead of a proper wash.
cn: 他只是马马虎虎地擦了一下车，没有好好清洗。

en: She gave her homework a lick and a promise, so it was full of errors.
cn: 她草草完成了作业，所以错误百出。

en: She has had a crush on her classmate since high school.
cn: 她从高中起就一直暗恋她的同学。

en: He admitted to having a crush on the new intern at work.
cn: 他承认迷恋上了公司的新实习生。

en: I don't understand this concept at all.
cn: 我完全不明白这个概念。

en: Are you interested in this topic at all?
cn: 你对这个话题有一点兴趣吗？

en: Darkness fell upon the village as the sun set.
cn: 太阳落山时，黑暗降临了村庄。

en: Misfortune fell upon the family after the accident.
cn: 事故后，不幸降临到了这个家庭。

en: He will go for the interview tomorrow morning at 10 AM.
cn: 他明天上午10点将去参加面试。

en: Make sure to prepare well before you go for the interview.
cn: 去参加面试前，一定要好好准备。

en: He prefers driving a car with manual gear for better control.
cn: 他更喜欢开手动挡的车，以便更好地控制。

en: Learning to use manual gear can be challenging for new drivers.
cn: 学习使用手动挡对新司机来说可能很有挑战性。

en: The city plans to broaden roads to reduce traffic congestion.
cn: 该市计划拓宽道路以减少交通拥堵。

en: Broadening roads can improve safety and flow for vehicles.
cn: 拓宽道路可以提高车辆的安全性和流动性。

en: I often mistake her for her twin sister because they look so similar.
cn: 我经常把她误认为是她的双胞胎姐妹，因为她们长得太像了。

en: Don't mistake his silence for agreement; he might be thinking.
cn: 不要把他的沉默误认为是同意；他可能在思考。

en: I had to cancel my reservation at the hotel due to a change in plans.
cn: 由于计划变更，我不得不取消酒店的预订。

en: Please call to cancel your reservation at least 24 hours in advance.
cn: 请至少提前24小时打电话取消您的预订。

en: Please fill out the application form and submit it by the deadline.
cn: 请填写申请表并在截止日期前提交。

en: The job application form requires details about your work experience.
cn: 工作申请表需要你提供工作经历的详细信息。

en: The book fell out of my bag while I was running.
cn: 我跑步时，书从包里掉了出来。

en: He fell out of favor with his boss after the mistake.
cn: 犯错后，他失去了老板的青睐。

en: We had a productive meeting and resolved all the key issues.
cn: 我们开了一个富有成效的会议，解决了所有关键问题。

en: A productive meeting should result in clear action items.
cn: 一个富有成效的会议应该产生明确的行事项目。

en: Parents should keep a close watch on their children's online activities.
cn: 家长应密切监视孩子的在线活动。

en: The police are keeping a close watch on the suspect's movements.
cn: 警方正在密切监视嫌疑人的动向。

en: I recommend this book for beginners in programming.
cn: 我推荐这本书给编程初学者。

en: She recommended him for the manager position due to his leadership skills.
cn: 由于他的领导能力，她推荐他担任经理职位。

en: I did a double-take when I saw my teacher at the concert.
cn: 当我在音乐会上看到我的老师时，我惊讶地又看了一眼。

en: She did a double-take at the unexpected news.
cn: 她对这意外的消息感到困惑，又看了一遍。

en: The children take turns playing with the toy.
cn: 孩子们轮流玩这个玩具。

en: We take turns driving on long road trips.
cn: 在长途公路旅行中，我们轮流开车。

en: The baby spit out the mashed peas immediately.
cn: 婴儿立刻把豌豆泥吐了出来。

en: He spit out the bitter medicine with a grimace.
cn: 他苦着脸把苦药吐了出来。

en: The project's success was a result of our joint effort.
cn: 项目的成功是我们共同努力的结果。

en: International joint effort is needed to tackle climate change.
cn: 应对气候变化需要国际共同努力。

en: She gained a reputation as a reliable employee.
cn: 她获得了可靠员工的名声。

en: The restaurant gained a reputation as the best in town.
cn: 这家餐厅获得了镇上最佳的名声。

en: We spend quality time together every weekend.
cn: 我们每个周末都一起度过有意义的时光。

en: He makes sure to spend quality time with his children.
cn: 他确保与孩子们度过有意义的时光。

en: He decided to join the army after high school.
cn: 高中毕业后，他决定参军。

en: Many young people join the army to serve their country.
cn: 许多年轻人参军以报效国家。

en: Keep your spending in check to save money.
cn: 控制你的开支以节省金钱。

en: The manager keeps the team's progress in check.
cn: 经理控制团队的进展。

en: He is sick with the flu and needs to rest.
cn: 他患了流感，需要休息。

en: She was sick with anxiety before the exam.
cn: 考试前她焦虑得生病了。

en: The resort is open all year round for tourists.
cn: 这个度假村全年对游客开放。

en: She works hard all year round to achieve her goals.
cn: 她全年努力工作以实现目标。

en: Many politicians got on the environmental bandwagon after the protests.
cn: 抗议后，许多政治家加入了环保的潮流。

en: Don't just get on his bandwagon without thinking critically.
cn: 不要不加批判地跟风支持他的观点。

en: Conservation efforts aim to protect the gene pool of endangered species.
cn: 保护工作旨在保护濒危物种的基因库。

en: A diverse gene pool helps populations adapt to changes.
cn: 多样化的基因库有助于种群适应变化。

en: Reducing greenhouse gas emissions is crucial to combat climate change.
cn: 减少温室气体排放对应对气候变化至关重要。

en: The report highlights the increase in greenhouse gas emissions from industries.
cn: 报告强调了工业温室气体排放的增加。

en: The prosecutor is assembling a case against the suspect.
cn: 检察官正在收集证据以起诉嫌疑人。

en: They assembled a strong case against the company for fraud.
cn: 他们收集了强有力的证据起诉该公司欺诈。

en: The thief ran away with the valuable painting.
cn: 小偷带着珍贵的画逃跑了。

en: They ran away with each other to start a new life.
cn: 他们私奔以开始新生活。

en: Take this advice as a guideline for your project.
cn: 将这个建议视为你项目的指导方针。

en: I take his silence as agreement.
cn: 我将他的沉默视为同意。

en: Please go on with your presentation despite the interruption.
cn: 尽管有干扰，请继续你的演示。

en: He decided to go on with his studies abroad.
cn: 他决定继续在国外学习。

en: She made a thing of the small stain on her dress.
cn: 她对裙子上的小污渍小题大做。

en: Don't make a thing of it; it was just a minor mistake.
cn: 别小题大做，这只是个小错误。

en: Scientists extract DNA from blood samples.
cn: 科学家从血液样本中提取DNA。

en: She extracted a key piece of information from the report.
cn: 她从报告中提取了一个关键信息。

en: For all his wealth, he is not happy.
cn: 尽管他很有钱，但他并不快乐。

en: For all her efforts, she still failed the exam.
cn: 尽管她努力了，考试还是没及格。

en: I'm getting my feet wet in the stock market by investing a small amount.
cn: 我通过投资一小笔钱来初次尝试股市。

en: She got her feet wet in journalism by writing for the school newspaper.
cn: 她通过为校报写作来涉足新闻业。

en: She has the ability to speak three languages fluently.
cn: 她有流利说三种语言的能力。

en: The ability to adapt is crucial in today's fast-paced world.
cn: 在当今快节奏的世界中，适应能力至关重要。

en: Everyone joined in the singing at the party.
cn: 派对上每个人都加入了唱歌。

en: Feel free to join in the discussion if you have ideas.
cn: 如果你有想法，请随时加入讨论。

en: The driver was at fault for the accident.
cn: 司机对这起事故负有责任。

en: If the machine breaks, who is at fault?
cn: 如果机器坏了，谁有过错？

en: He won't take that insult lying down.
cn: 他不会默默忍受那种侮辱。

en: She refused to take the unfair treatment lying down.
cn: 她拒绝逆来顺受地接受不公平待遇。

en: She decided to major in biology at university.
cn: 她决定在大学主修生物学。

en: He majored in computer science and now works as a software engineer.
cn: 他主修计算机科学，现在是一名软件工程师。

en: My opinion differs from yours on this matter.
cn: 在这个问题上，我的意见与你的不同。

en: The new model differs from the old one in several ways.
cn: 新模型在几个方面与旧模型不同。

en: She is without doubt the best candidate for the job.
cn: 她毫无疑问是这份工作的最佳人选。

en: This is without doubt the most beautiful place I've ever seen.
cn: 这毫无疑问是我见过的最美的地方。

en: The city has seen a rise in youth crimes recently.
cn: 最近该市的青少年犯罪有所增加。

en: Programs are in place to prevent youth crimes in the community.
cn: 社区有项目旨在预防青少年犯罪。

en: I can visualize him winning the race.
cn: 我可以想象他赢得比赛。

en: She visualized her team completing the project successfully.
cn: 她想象她的团队成功完成了项目。

en: He must have taken leave of his senses to quit such a good job.
cn: 他一定是失去理智了，才会辞掉这么好的工作。

en: If you think that's a good idea, you've taken leave of your senses.
cn: 如果你认为那是个好主意，你就是发疯了。

en: The old factory has been out of use for years.
cn: 这家旧工厂已经废弃多年了。

en: This software is out of use due to security issues.
cn: 由于安全问题，这个软件已不再使用。

en: Her attitude toward work is very positive.
cn: 她对工作的态度非常积极。

en: We need to change our attitude toward environmental issues.
cn: 我们需要改变对环境问题的态度。

en: After the setback, the company managed to bounce back quickly.
cn: 遭遇挫折后，公司迅速恢复了。

en: She bounced back from her illness and returned to work.
cn: 她从疾病中恢复过来，回到了工作岗位。

en: The plants are grown in an artificial environment to control conditions.
cn: 这些植物在人工环境中种植以控制条件。

en: Scientists study animal behavior in artificial environments.
cn: 科学家在人工环境中研究动物行为。

en: The children made faces at each other during class.
cn: 孩子们在课上互相做鬼脸。

en: He made a funny face to cheer her up.
cn: 他做了个滑稽的鬼脸来让她高兴起来。

en: They set sail for the Caribbean at dawn.
cn: 他们在黎明时分启航前往加勒比海。

en: The ship set sail from the harbor yesterday.
cn: 这艘船昨天从港口开船了。

en: How old is your daughter?
cn: 你女儿多大了？

en: I wonder how old that building is.
cn: 我想知道那栋建筑有多老了。

en: A host of problems arose during the project.
cn: 项目期间出现了大量问题。

en: She received a host of compliments on her performance.
cn: 她的表演收到了许多赞扬。

en: She met with her advisor to discuss the project.
cn: 她与导师会面讨论项目。

en: The plan met with strong opposition from the community.
cn: 这个计划遭遇了社区的强烈反对。

en: The decision was based upon thorough research.
cn: 这个决定是基于彻底的研究。

en: Her theory is based upon years of observation.
cn: 她的理论是基于多年的观察。

en: The main point at issue is the budget allocation.
cn: 争论的主要焦点是预算分配。

en: Her qualifications are not at issue; it's her attitude that concerns us.
cn: 她的资格没有争议；我们担心的是她的态度。

en: He lost face when he failed the exam in front of his peers.
cn: 他在同龄人面前考试不及格，丢了脸。

en: The company lost face after the scandal was exposed.
cn: 丑闻曝光后，公司失掉了面子。

en: I'm on my way to the airport to pick up a friend.
cn: 我在去机场接朋友的路上。

en: She stopped for coffee on her way to work.
cn: 她在去上班的路上停下来喝了咖啡。

en: He managed to finish the report on time despite the distractions.
cn: 尽管有干扰，他还是设法按时完成了报告。

en: They managed to secure funding for the new project.
cn: 他们设法为新项目争取到了资金。

en: She worked her way through the difficult textbook chapter by chapter.
cn: 她一章一章地努力完成了那本难懂的教科书。

en: He worked his way through the crowd to reach the stage.
cn: 他努力穿过人群到达舞台。

en: You need a parking permit to park in this lot overnight.
cn: 你需要停车许可证才能在这个停车场过夜停车。

en: The university issues parking permits to students and staff.
cn: 大学向学生和员工发放停车许可证。

en: His actions run counter to the company's ethical guidelines.
cn: 他的行为与公司的道德准则相违背。

en: The new policy runs counter to public opinion.
cn: 新政策与公众意见相反。

en: I found a parking place near the entrance of the mall.
cn: 我在商场入口附近找到了一个停车位。

en: The city has designated new parking places for electric vehicles.
cn: 城市为电动汽车指定了新的停车位。

en: She threw herself into her studies and graduated with honors.
cn: 她全力以赴地学习，以优异成绩毕业。

en: After the loss, he threw himself into his work to cope.
cn: 失败后，他投身于工作来应对。

en: She changed the old dress into a stylish skirt.
cn: 她把旧连衣裙变成了一条时尚的裙子。

en: The magician changed the rabbit into a dove.
cn: 魔术师把兔子变成了鸽子。

en: The king sent forth his army to defend the borders.
cn: 国王派遣军队保卫边境。

en: The organization sends forth volunteers to assist in disaster areas.
cn: 该组织派遣志愿者协助灾区。

en: The company amassed debt during the economic downturn.
cn: 公司在经济衰退期间积累了债务。

en: He amassed debt from multiple credit cards and loans.
cn: 他从多张信用卡和贷款中积累了债务。

en: She takes after her mother in both looks and personality.
cn: 她在长相和性格上都像她的母亲。

en: He takes after his grandfather, who was also a talented musician.
cn: 他像他的祖父，也是一位有才华的音乐家。

en: She called out her colleague for taking credit for her work.
cn: 她公开指责同事窃取她的工作成果。

en: The manager called out the team's lack of preparation.
cn: 经理公开批评团队准备不足。

en: I finally set my hand on that rare book I've been searching for.
cn: 我终于找到了我一直在寻找的那本稀有书籍。

en: He set his hand on a great investment opportunity last year.
cn: 他去年获得了一个很好的投资机会。

en: There is an extra cost for shipping to remote areas.
cn: 运送到偏远地区有额外费用。

en: The hotel charges an extra cost for late check-out.
cn: 酒店对延迟退房收取额外费用。

en: You should see doctors if you have persistent symptoms.
cn: 如果症状持续，你应该去看医生。

en: She sees doctors regularly for her chronic condition.
cn: 她因慢性病定期就医。

en: She took a fancy to the antique vase in the shop.
cn: 她喜欢上了店里的古董花瓶。

en: He took a fancy to learning French after his trip to Paris.
cn: 巴黎之行后，他对学习法语产生了兴趣。

en: Italy is famous for its delicious cuisine.
cn: 意大利以其美味佳肴而闻名。

en: She is famous for her contributions to science.
cn: 她因对科学的贡献而闻名。

en: He buys items in bulk and sells them on at a profit.
cn: 他批量购买物品并转售获利。

en: The company sells on its products through various online platforms.
cn: 公司通过多个在线平台继续销售其产品。

en: I've told him three times, but he can't get it into his thick head.
cn: 我已经告诉他三次了，但他就是记不住。

en: She needs to get the safety rules into her thick head before starting the job.
cn: 她需要在开始工作前理解安全规则。

en: Employees have access to confidential files.
cn: 员工有权访问机密文件。

en: Students have access to the library's online resources.
cn: 学生可以使用图书馆的在线资源。

en: Climate change has a significant impact on global ecosystems.
cn: 气候变化对全球生态系统有重大影响。

en: The new policy will have a significant impact on the economy.
cn: 新政策将对经济产生重大影响。

en: Efforts to preserve language diversity are crucial for cultural heritage.
cn: 保护语言多样性的努力对文化遗产至关重要。

en: The organization works to preserve language diversity in indigenous communities.
cn: 该组织致力于保护土著社区的语言多样性。

en: He saved money so as to buy a new car.
cn: 他存钱是为了买一辆新车。

en: She studied hard so as to pass the exam.
cn: 她努力学习以便通过考试。

en: Please check the flight schedule for any delays.
cn: 请查看航班时刻表以了解是否有延误。

en: The airline updated its flight schedule for the holiday season.
cn: 航空公司更新了假日季节的航班时刻表。

en: They played a joke on their friend by hiding his keys.
cn: 他们通过藏起朋友的钥匙来开他的玩笑。

en: She loves to play jokes on her siblings.
cn: 她喜欢开兄弟姐妹的玩笑。

en: I took him for a tourist because of his camera.
cn: 我因为他的相机误认为他是游客。

en: She took the new employee for an intern at first.
cn: 她起初误认为新员工是实习生。

en: A man by the name of John called for you.
cn: 一个名叫约翰的男人打电话找你。

en: She met a artist by the name of Picasso in Paris.
cn: 她在巴黎遇到了一位名叫毕加索的艺术家。

en: He established a reputation as a reliable consultant.
cn: 他建立了作为可靠顾问的声誉。

en: The company established a reputation as an innovator in technology.
cn: 公司建立了作为技术革新者的声誉。

en: Employees should have a voice in company policies.
cn: 员工应在公司政策上有发言权。

en: Citizens want to have a voice in local government decisions.
cn: 公民希望在地方政府决策中有发言权。

en: We need to get moving if we want to arrive on time.
cn: 如果我们想准时到达，就需要开始行动了。

en: Get moving, or you'll be late for school!
cn: 动身吧，否则你上学要迟到了！

en: Time seems to slip by when you're having fun.
cn: 当你玩得开心时，时间似乎悄悄流逝。

en: The thief managed to slip by the security guard unnoticed.
cn: 小偷设法悄悄溜过保安，未被察觉。

en: In the competition, she gave a good account of herself and won a medal.
cn: 在比赛中，她表现出色并赢得了一枚奖牌。

en: He gave a good account of himself during the job interview.
cn: 他在工作面试中为自己争光。

en: They engage in volunteer work every weekend.
cn: 他们每个周末都参与志愿工作。

en: The countries agreed to engage in peaceful negotiations.
cn: 各国同意进行和平谈判。

en: The mountain looks beautiful at a distance.
cn: 那座山在远处看起来很美丽。

en: Keep at a distance from the wild animals for safety.
cn: 为了安全，与野生动物保持距离。

en: She used traveller's cheques to pay for her hotel in Europe.
cn: 她用旅行支票支付了在欧洲的酒店费用。

en: Traveller's cheques are safer than carrying large amounts of cash.
cn: 旅行支票比携带大量现金更安全。

en: He decided to stay on at the company for another year.
cn: 他决定在公司再待一年。

en: The light stayed on all night by mistake.
cn: 灯误开了一整夜。

en: Can you tidy up your room before guests arrive?
cn: 你能在客人到来前整理好你的房间吗？

en: She tidied up the kitchen after cooking dinner.
cn: 她做完晚餐后整理了厨房。

en: He had a dispute with his neighbor over the property line.
cn: 他与邻居就财产界线发生了争执。

en: The union is in dispute with management about wages.
cn: 工会与管理层就工资问题发生争执。

en: Please arrange the files in sequence by date.
cn: 请按日期顺序排列文件。

en: The numbers should be listed in sequence from 1 to 10.
cn: 数字应按从1到10的顺序列出。

en: We need to cooperate with our partners in launching the new product.
cn: 我们需要与合作伙伴合作推出新产品。

en: The two companies cooperated in developing the software.
cn: 两家公司合作开发了这款软件。

en: The spy entered the country under the disguise of a tourist.
cn: 间谍以游客的伪装进入该国。

en: He criticized the policy under the disguise of offering advice.
cn: 他以提供建议为名批评了这项政策。

en: We went to the airport to send off our friend who was moving abroad.
cn: 我们去机场送别移居国外的朋友。

en: The team sent off their coach with a farewell party.
cn: 团队用告别派对送别了他们的教练。

en: Can you give me a hand with moving this furniture?
cn: 你能帮我搬一下这件家具吗？

en: She always gives a hand to her neighbors in need.
cn: 她总是帮助有需要的邻居。

en: Good interpersonal skills are essential for a team leader.
cn: 良好的人际交往能力对团队领导至关重要。

en: She improved her interpersonal skills through communication workshops.
cn: 她通过沟通研讨会提高了人际交往能力。

en: The new clinic provides easier access to medical services for rural residents.
cn: 新诊所为农村居民提供了更容易的医疗服务。

en: Telemedicine offers easier access to medical services from home.
cn: 远程医疗提供了在家更容易获得医疗服务的方式。

en: To save money, he denied himself the luxury of eating out.
cn: 为了省钱，他克制了自己外出就餐的奢侈。

en: She denied herself sweets to maintain a healthy diet.
cn: 她为了保持健康饮食放弃了甜食。

en: It's important to keep a record of all business transactions.
cn: 记录所有商业交易很重要。

en: She keeps a record of her daily expenses in a notebook.
cn: 她在笔记本上记录每日开支。

en: I need a couple of minutes to finish this task.
cn: 我需要几分钟来完成这个任务。

en: She bought a couple of apples at the market.
cn: 她在市场买了几个苹果。

en: The manager called a meeting to discuss the project deadline.
cn: 经理召集会议讨论项目截止日期。

en: We need to call a meeting to address the budget issues.
cn: 我们需要召集会议解决预算问题。

en: I was tempted to buy the expensive dress, but I resisted.
cn: 我很想买那件昂贵的裙子，但我忍住了。

en: He is tempted to skip work and go to the beach.
cn: 他很想翘班去海滩。

en: Many customers are dissatisfied with the slow service at the restaurant.
cn: 许多顾客对餐厅的缓慢服务不满意。

en: He was dissatisfied with his performance in the exam and decided to study harder.
cn: 他对自己的考试成绩不满意，决定更加努力学习。

en: She takes care of her elderly parents every day.
cn: 她每天照顾年迈的父母。

en: I'll take care of the paperwork while you handle the meeting.
cn: 你处理会议时，我会处理文书工作。

en: After he helped me fix my car, I felt I was in his debt.
cn: 他帮我修车后，我觉得欠他一个人情。

en: She is in her friend's debt for the loan during hard times.
cn: 她因困难时期的朋友贷款而欠债。

en: After working with him for years, I have his number and know when he's bluffing.
cn: 与他共事多年后，我了解他的底细，知道他在虚张声势。

en: The detective had the suspect's number and quickly solved the case.
cn: 侦探了解嫌疑人的底细，迅速破案。

en: At the start of the movie, the main character is introduced.
cn: 电影开始时，主角被介绍出场。

en: We met at the start of the conference and became friends.
cn: 我们在会议开始时相遇并成为朋友。

en: Plants need sunlight during daylight hours to grow properly.
cn: 植物在白天需要阳光才能正常生长。

en: We prefer to travel during daylight hours for safety reasons.
cn: 出于安全考虑，我们更喜欢在白天旅行。

en: The hurricane wiped out entire villages along the coast.
cn: 飓风彻底摧毁了沿海的整个村庄。

en: The disease wiped out a large portion of the population.
cn: 这种疾病消灭了大部分人口。

en: My grandmother has a green thumb; her garden is always full of flowers.
cn: 我祖母有园艺技能；她的花园总是开满鲜花。

en: With his green thumb, he can grow vegetables even in poor soil.
cn: 凭借他的园艺技能，他即使在贫瘠的土壤中也能种出蔬菜。

en: The loud noise scared off the birds from the tree.
cn: 巨大的噪音吓跑了树上的鸟。

en: High prices might scare off potential buyers.
cn: 高价格可能会吓跑潜在买家。

en: I hope you won't take my criticism amiss; I only meant to help.
cn: 我希望你不会误解我的批评；我只是想帮忙。

en: She took his joke amiss and didn't speak to him for days.
cn: 她误解了他的玩笑，好几天没和他说话。

en: I came across an old photo album while cleaning the attic.
cn: 我在清理阁楼时偶然发现了一本旧相册。

en: She came across a rare book in the library.
cn: 她在图书馆偶然发现了一本稀有书籍。

en: Students practice pronunciation in the language lab every week.
cn: 学生每周在语言实验室练习发音。

en: The university upgraded its language lab with new computers and software.
cn: 大学用新电脑和软件升级了语言实验室。

en: When the argument started, he made himself scarce to avoid trouble.
cn: 争论开始时，他悄悄离开以避免麻烦。

en: She made herself scarce during the boring meeting.
cn: 在无聊的会议期间，她悄悄离开了。

en: I need some advice on how to improve my resume.
cn: 我需要一些关于如何改进简历的建议。

en: She gave me excellent advice on investing in stocks.
cn: 她给了我关于投资股票的绝佳建议。

en: I bumped into an old friend at the supermarket yesterday.
cn: 我昨天在超市偶然遇见了一位老朋友。

en: We bumped into each other at the conference and had a nice chat.
cn: 我们在会议上偶然相遇，愉快地聊了聊。

en: He got the old heave-ho from his job after missing too many deadlines.
cn: 他因错过太多截止日期而被解雇。

en: The noisy partygoers got the old heave-ho from the hotel manager.
cn: 吵闹的派对参与者被酒店经理赶了出去。

en: The comedian's jokes had them rolling in the aisles all night.
cn: 喜剧演员的笑话让观众整晚捧腹大笑。

en: His funny story had everyone rolling in the aisles at the party.
cn: 他有趣的故事让派对上的每个人都捧腹大笑。

en: She is both intelligent and hardworking.
cn: 她既聪明又勤奋。

en: The movie was both entertaining and thought-provoking.
cn: 这部电影既娱乐又发人深省。

en: Please pay attention to the safety instructions before starting the machine.
cn: 启动机器前，请注意安全说明。

en: Teachers should pay attention to each student's individual needs.
cn: 老师应关注每个学生的个体需求。

en: She made no bones about her dislike for the new policy.
cn: 她直言不讳地表达了对新政策的不满。

en: He made no bones about wanting a promotion as soon as possible.
cn: 他毫不掩饰地想尽快获得晋升。

en: He is very fussy about his food.
cn: 他对食物非常挑剔。

en: She is fussy about the cleanliness of her house.
cn: 她对房子的清洁度很讲究。

en: Children love blowing soap bubbles.
cn: 孩子们喜欢吹肥皂泡。

en: The soap bubble popped when it touched the ground.
cn: 肥皂泡碰到地面就破了。

en: She was buzzing about the office all morning.
cn: 她整个上午都在办公室里四处奔走。

en: The workers buzzed about to finish the project on time.
cn: 工人们忙碌着按时完成项目。

en: I wouldn't trade my family for the world.
cn: 我无论如何都不会用我的家庭做交易。

en: She wouldn't reveal the secret for the world.
cn: 她绝对不会泄露这个秘密。

en: The country is experiencing a severe economic recession.
cn: 该国正在经历严重的经济衰退。

en: Many businesses closed during the economic recession.
cn: 许多企业在经济衰退期间倒闭了。

en: The guide led on the tourists through the forest.
cn: 导游带领游客穿过森林。

en: He led on the team to victory.
cn: 他带领团队走向胜利。

en: We faced obstacles at every turn.
cn: 我们处处都遇到障碍。

en: He was criticized at every turn for his decisions.
cn: 他的决定每次都受到批评。

en: Regular exercise can boost our health significantly.
cn: 定期锻炼可以显著促进我们的健康。

en: Eating fruits and vegetables helps boost our health.
cn: 吃水果和蔬菜有助于促进我们的健康。

en: The program matches interests of students with suitable courses.
cn: 这个项目将学生的兴趣与合适的课程匹配。

en: We try to match interests in our dating service.
cn: 在我们的约会服务中，我们尝试匹配兴趣。

en: The company aims to foster innovation among its employees.
cn: 该公司旨在培养员工的创新精神。

en: Schools should foster innovation in students.
cn: 学校应该培养学生的创新精神。

en: He grabbed at the rope to save himself.
cn: 他试图抓住绳子以自救。

en: The child grabbed at the toy on the shelf.
cn: 孩子试图抓住架子上的玩具。

en: The medication has some side effects like dizziness.
cn: 这种药物有一些副作用，比如头晕。

en: He experienced side effects after the treatment.
cn: 他在治疗后出现了副作用。

en: Government intervention is necessary in times of crisis.
cn: 在危机时期，政府干预是必要的。

en: The market was stabilized by government intervention.
cn: 市场通过政府干预得以稳定。

en: She is engaged in research at the university.
cn: 她在大学从事研究工作。

en: They are engaged in a heated discussion.
cn: 他们正在进行激烈的讨论。

en: He had his dander up when he heard the news.
cn: 他听到这个消息时生气了。

en: Don't get your dander up over small things.
cn: 不要为小事发怒。

en: I'll get back to you with the details by tomorrow.
cn: 我明天会回复你详细情况。

en: Can you get back to me after the meeting?
cn: 会议结束后你能回复我吗？

en: She will attend the conference next week.
cn: 她下周将参加会议。

en: Many experts attended the conference on climate change.
cn: 许多专家参加了气候变化会议。

en: The boss gave him the old heave-ho for being late.
cn: 老板因为他迟到而解雇了他。

en: She got the old heave-ho from her job yesterday.
cn: 她昨天被工作开除了。

en: I like to hang out with my friends on weekends.
cn: 我喜欢在周末和朋友们一起闲逛。

en: He hangs out with his colleagues after work sometimes.
cn: 他有时下班后和同事们一起消磨时间。

en: Our company is in cooperation with several international partners on this project.
cn: 我们公司在这个项目上与几家国际合作伙伴合作。

en: The university is in cooperation with local industries to provide internships.
cn: 这所大学与当地产业合作提供实习机会。

en: No one was happy with the decision, least of all the employees.
cn: 没有人对这个决定感到满意，尤其是员工们。

en: I don't like any of these options, least of all the most expensive one.
cn: 我不喜欢这些选项中的任何一个，尤其不喜欢最贵的那个。

en: The factory produces goods in quantity to meet demand.
cn: 工厂大量生产商品以满足需求。

en: We buy supplies in quantity to get a discount.
cn: 我们大批购买物资以获得折扣。

en: He is every inch a professional in his field.
cn: 他在自己的领域完全是个专业人士。

en: The room was decorated every inch with care.
cn: 这个房间被彻底精心装饰过。

en: The library has a wide range of reference materials for researchers.
cn: 图书馆为研究人员提供了广泛的参考资料。

en: Please consult the reference materials before writing your report.
cn: 在写报告之前，请查阅参考资料。

en: It's rude to jump a queue at the supermarket.
cn: 在超市插队是很粗鲁的。

en: He tried to jump the queue, but the people behind him complained.
cn: 他试图插队，但后面的人抱怨了。

en: People think he has bats in his belfry because of his odd behavior.
cn: 人们认为他行为古怪，疯疯癫癫的。

en: She must have bats in her belfry to believe such stories.
cn: 她一定是疯疯癫癫的才会相信这样的故事。

en: The police held back the crowd from entering the building.
cn: 警察阻止人群进入大楼。

en: She held back her tears during the sad movie.
cn: 在看悲伤电影时，她抑制住了眼泪。

en: Let's square up the bill before we leave the restaurant.
cn: 我们离开餐厅前把账单结清吧。

en: He squared up his debts with the bank last month.
cn: 他上个月与银行结清了债务。

en: The new evidence bears directly on the outcome of the trial.
cn: 新证据直接关系到审判的结果。

en: Economic factors bear heavily on consumer spending.
cn: 经济因素严重影响消费者支出。

en: Can you translate this document into French?
cn: 你能把这份文件翻译成法语吗？

en: She translates novels from English into Chinese.
cn: 她把英文小说翻译成中文。

en: In healthcare, prevention is more important than the cure to avoid diseases.
cn: 在医疗保健中，预防胜于治疗以避免疾病。

en: For environmental issues, prevention is more important than the cure to reduce pollution.
cn: 对于环境问题，预防胜于治疗以减少污染。

en: Give him a break; he's new to the job.
cn: 给他一个机会吧；他对这份工作还不熟悉。

en: The teacher gave the student a break and didn't punish him.
cn: 老师放过了那个学生，没有惩罚他。

en: The book treats of various philosophical topics in depth.
cn: 这本书深入论述了各种哲学主题。

en: His lecture treated of the history of ancient civilizations.
cn: 他的讲座讨论了古代文明的历史。

en: Outside of work, she enjoys hiking and reading.
cn: 工作之外，她喜欢徒步和阅读。

en: We have no plans outside of the scheduled meetings.
cn: 除了预定的会议，我们没有其他计划。

en: Many consumers buy more than they need during sales, leading to waste.
cn: 许多消费者在促销期间购买超过所需，导致浪费。

en: To save money, avoid buying more than they need for daily essentials.
cn: 为了省钱，避免购买超过日常必需品所需的数量。

en: After the announcement, stock prices went through the roof.
cn: 公告发布后，股价急剧上升。

en: Demand for the new product went through the roof during the holiday season.
cn: 假日期间，新产品的需求急剧上升。

en: The kids get ants in their pants before a school trip.
cn: 孩子们在学校旅行前坐立不安。

en: He had ants in his pants waiting for the exam results.
cn: 他在等待考试结果时焦躁不安。

en: All the best in your new job!
cn: 祝你在新工作中一切顺利！

en: I wish you all the best for your future endeavors.
cn: 我祝你未来一切顺利。

en: Students are required to attend courses regularly to pass the semester.
cn: 学生需要定期参加课程才能通过学期。

en: She plans to attend courses online to improve her skills.
cn: 她计划在线参加课程以提高技能。

en: Please shut down the computer before leaving the office.
cn: 离开办公室前请关闭电脑。

en: The factory had to shut down temporarily for maintenance.
cn: 工厂不得不暂时关闭进行维护。

en: I'm on my way to the airport now.
cn: 我现在正在去机场的路上。

en: She called to say she's on her way home.
cn: 她打电话说她正在回家的路上。

en: She enrolled in a statistics course to better analyze data for her research.
cn: 她报名了统计学课程，以便更好地分析研究数据。

en: The statistics course covers topics like probability and regression analysis.
cn: 统计学课程涵盖概率和回归分析等主题。

en: He decided to take the bull by the horns and address the issue directly.
cn: 他决定勇敢面对，直接解决这个问题。

en: To succeed, you must take the bull by the horns and overcome obstacles.
cn: 要成功，你必须勇敢面对并克服障碍。

en: In future, please submit reports by the deadline.
cn: 将来，请按时提交报告。

en: We plan to expand our services in future.
cn: 我们计划未来扩展我们的服务。

en: Rapid technological change is transforming industries worldwide.
cn: 快速的技术变革正在改变全球产业。

en: Companies must adapt to technological change to stay competitive.
cn: 公司必须适应技术变革以保持竞争力。

en: The project will take two weeks at the most.
cn: 这个项目最多需要两周时间。

en: We expect at the most ten participants for the workshop.
cn: 我们预计最多有十名参与者参加研讨会。

en: We need to tie the marketing campaign in to the product launch date.
cn: 我们需要将营销活动与产品发布日期联系起来。

en: The report ties the findings in to broader industry trends.
cn: 报告将发现与更广泛的行业趋势整合起来。

en: After getting approval, we can go ahead with the project.
cn: 获得批准后，我们可以继续进行这个项目。

en: Despite the risks, they decided to go ahead with the plan.
cn: 尽管有风险，他们决定继续进行这个计划。

en: She is busy with her homework and can't join us tonight.
cn: 她忙于做作业，今晚不能加入我们。

en: The team is busy with preparations for the upcoming conference.
cn: 团队正忙于准备即将到来的会议。

en: Feel free to drop by my office if you have any questions.
cn: 如果你有任何问题，随时可以顺便来我办公室。

en: I'll drop by the store on my way home to pick up some groceries.
cn: 我回家路上会顺便去商店买些杂货。

en: Strong research skills are essential for writing a credible thesis.
cn: 强大的研究技能对于撰写可信的论文至关重要。

en: The job requires candidates to demonstrate excellent research skills.
cn: 这份工作要求候选人展示出色的研究技能。

en: He supported her all the way through the difficult process.
cn: 在整个困难过程中，他一直支持她。

en: We drove all the way from New York to California.
cn: 我们从纽约一直开车到加利福尼亚。

en: He studied hard to improve his grade in math.
cn: 他努力学习以提高数学成绩。

en: Extra tutoring helped her improve her grade from a B to an A.
cn: 额外的辅导帮助她将成绩从B提高到A。

en: The patient managed to sit up in bed after the surgery.
cn: 手术后，病人设法在床上坐了起来。

en: She sat up straight to pay attention during the meeting.
cn: 她在会议期间坐直了身子以集中注意力。

en: I usually get off work at 6 PM.
cn: 我通常下午6点下班。

en: He got off work early to attend his daughter's recital.
cn: 他提前下班去参加女儿的演奏会。

en: She volunteers at the shelter year in and year out.
cn: 她年复一年地在收容所做志愿者。

en: The company has been profitable year in and year out for decades.
cn: 几十年来，公司年复一年地盈利。

en: The law prohibits minors from purchasing alcohol.
cn: 法律禁止未成年人购买酒精饮料。

en: The company prohibits employees from using personal devices at work.
cn: 公司禁止员工在工作时使用个人设备。

en: You need to open a bank account to receive your salary.
cn: 你需要开设一个银行账户来接收工资。

en: She opened a bank account with a local branch yesterday.
cn: 她昨天在当地分行开了一个银行账户。

en: He was ignorant of the new regulations and got fined.
cn: 他对新规定一无所知，结果被罚款了。

en: She is ignorant of the cultural differences in that country.
cn: 她对那个国家的文化差异一无所知。

en: After the fall, his shoulder was out of joint and required medical attention.
cn: 摔倒后，他的肩膀脱臼了，需要医疗护理。

en: The doctor said the bone is out of joint and needs to be reset.
cn: 医生说骨头脱臼了，需要复位。

en: Taking the train is your best bet to avoid traffic.
cn: 乘坐火车是避免交通拥堵的最佳选择。

en: Her best bet for a job is to apply to local companies.
cn: 她找工作的最佳选择是申请本地公司。

en: I am only too happy to help you with your project.
cn: 我非常乐意帮助你完成项目。

en: She was only too aware of the risks involved.
cn: 她极其清楚所涉及的风险。

en: The government plans to enact laws to protect the environment.
cn: 政府计划颁布法律来保护环境。

en: Parliament enacted new laws to regulate online commerce.
cn: 议会颁布了新法律来规范在线商务。

en: Many people fall prey to online scams every year.
cn: 每年都有很多人成为网络诈骗的牺牲品。

en: The company fell prey to aggressive competition and went bankrupt.
cn: 这家公司成为激烈竞争的牺牲品，最终破产了。

en: The government is trying to root out corruption in the system.
cn: 政府正试图根除系统中的腐败。

en: We need to root out the source of the problem to fix it permanently.
cn: 我们需要根除问题的根源以永久解决它。

en: The project cost no less than $1 million.
cn: 这个项目的成本不少于100万美元。

en: She received no less than three job offers in one week.
cn: 她一周内收到了多达三个工作邀请。

en: I can't get that song out of my mind.
cn: 我无法把那首歌从脑海中赶走。

en: He needs to get the failure out of his mind and move on.
cn: 他需要忘记失败，继续前进。

en: It's important to connect with your audience during a presentation.
cn: 在演讲中与观众建立联系很重要。

en: He connected with old friends through social media.
cn: 他通过社交媒体与老朋友取得了联系。

en: The hotel room has a beautiful sea view.
cn: 酒店房间有美丽的海景。

en: They bought a house with a sea view for their retirement.
cn: 他们为退休买了一栋有海景的房子。

en: You shouldn't trifle with her feelings; she's very sensitive.
cn: 你不应该玩弄她的感情；她非常敏感。

en: He trifled with the rules and faced serious consequences.
cn: 他轻视规则，结果面临了严重后果。

en: The process of learning a new language can be challenging.
cn: 学习一门新语言的过程可能很有挑战性。

en: We are in the process of renovating our house.
cn: 我们正在翻新房子的过程中。

en: They plan to pull down the old building to make space for a park.
cn: 他们计划拆除旧建筑，为公园腾出空间。

en: The city pulled down the unsafe structure.
cn: 城市拆除了不安全的建筑。

en: They made love to each other under the stars.
cn: 他们在星空下做爱。

en: He wanted to make love to her to express his deep affection.
cn: 他想与她做爱以表达深深的爱意。

en: The new policy aims to mitigate problems related to traffic congestion.
cn: 新政策旨在缓解与交通拥堵相关的问题。

en: We need to take steps to mitigate problems caused by climate change.
cn: 我们需要采取措施缓解气候变化引起的问题。

en: After the rapid growth, the market began to level off.
cn: 快速增长后，市场开始趋于平稳。

en: The temperature is expected to level off by the weekend.
cn: 预计到周末温度将趋于平稳。

en: The company will go through the changes in management next month.
cn: 公司下个月将经历管理层的变化。

en: She had to go through the changes in her personal life after moving abroad.
cn: 移居国外后，她不得不经历个人生活的变化。

en: The journey through the mountains was fraught with danger.
cn: 穿越山脉的旅程充满了危险。

en: The project is fraught with challenges that need to be addressed.
cn: 这个项目充满了需要解决的挑战。

en: The suspect is on trial for theft.
cn: 嫌疑人因盗窃罪受审。

en: She was put on trial after being accused of fraud.
cn: 她被指控欺诈后受审。

en: The UN agreed to mediate in the peace talks between the two countries.
cn: 联合国同意在两国和平谈判中进行调解。

en: She was asked to mediate in the dispute between her colleagues.
cn: 她被要求在同事之间的争端中进行调解。

en: It's important to distinguish between facts and opinions in research.
cn: 在研究中区分事实和观点很重要。

en: Can you distinguish between the two species of birds?
cn: 你能区分这两种鸟类吗？

en: He had an accident while driving in the rain.
cn: 他在雨中驾驶时发生了事故。

en: If you're not careful, you might have an accident in the kitchen.
cn: 如果你不小心，可能在厨房发生事故。

en: We need to decide on a date for the meeting soon.
cn: 我们需要尽快决定会议的日期。

en: After much discussion, they decided on a new marketing strategy.
cn: 经过多次讨论，他们决定采用新的营销策略。

en: The stadium was packed with enthusiastic sports fans.
cn: 体育场挤满了热情的体育迷。

en: Sports fans often follow their favorite teams closely.
cn: 体育迷通常密切关注他们最喜欢的球队。

en: The sponge can soak up a lot of water quickly.
cn: 海绵能快速吸收大量水。

en: She loves to soak up the sun on the beach.
cn: 她喜欢在海滩上吸收阳光。

en: More and more people are using renewable energy sources.
cn: 越来越多的人在使用可再生能源。

en: The city is becoming more and more crowded every year.
cn: 这座城市每年都变得越来越拥挤。

en: The athlete broke the record for the fastest marathon time.
cn: 这位运动员打破了最快马拉松时间的纪录。

en: They hope to break the record for the largest charity fundraiser.
cn: 他们希望打破最大慈善筹款活动的纪录。

en: Can you work the new task in by the end of the week?
cn: 你能在本周末前将新任务安排进去吗？

en: She managed to work a short break in during her busy schedule.
cn: 她在繁忙的日程中设法安排了一个短暂的休息。

en: The old building was scheduled to blow up for demolition.
cn: 旧建筑计划爆炸拆除。

en: The gas leak caused the tank to blow up suddenly.
cn: 气体泄漏导致储罐突然爆炸。

en: Those in authority must make fair decisions for everyone.
cn: 掌权者必须为每个人做出公平的决定。

en: She is the person in authority who can resolve this issue.
cn: 她是掌权者，可以解决这个问题。

en: Only the manager is authorized to approve large expenses.
cn: 只有经理被授权批准大额开支。

en: She is authorized to sign contracts on behalf of the company.
cn: 她被授权代表公司签署合同。

en: It took hours to puzzle out the complex math problem.
cn: 花了几个小时才解出这道复杂的数学题。

en: She managed to puzzle out the mystery by analyzing the clues.
cn: 她通过分析线索成功解开了这个谜团。

en: His teachings had a profound influence on modern philosophy.
cn: 他的教义对现代哲学产生了深远影响。

en: The invention of the internet has had a profound influence on society.
cn: 互联网的发明对社会产生了深远影响。

en: The teacher stood in the front of the classroom.
cn: 老师站在教室的前部。

en: The engine is located in the front of the car.
cn: 发动机位于汽车的前部。

en: The movie critic gave the film a glowing review in the newspaper.
cn: 电影评论家在报纸上对这部电影给予了高度评价。

en: As a movie critic, he watches hundreds of films each year.
cn: 作为电影评论家，他每年观看数百部电影。

en: Can you give me a lift to the station?
cn: 你能让我搭便车去车站吗？

en: She gave her neighbor a lift to the grocery store.
cn: 她让邻居搭便车去杂货店。

en: This region is home to many endangered species.
cn: 这个地区是许多濒危物种的家园。

en: The city is home to several world-renowned universities.
cn: 这座城市是几所世界知名大学的所在地。

en: Do you want to come along with us to the party?
cn: 你想和我们一起去派对吗？

en: He came along with his friend to the meeting.
cn: 他和他的朋友一起来参加会议。

en: You should steer clear of that dangerous neighborhood.
cn: 你应该避开那个危险的街区。

en: He steers clear of gossip at work.
cn: 他在工作中远离八卦。

en: The firefighters managed to get the blaze under control quickly.
cn: 消防员设法迅速控制住了火势。

en: She needs to get her spending under control to save money.
cn: 她需要控制住开支以省钱。

en: As many as 100 people attended the event.
cn: 多达100人参加了这个活动。

en: He has as many books as his brother.
cn: 他的书和他哥哥的一样多。

en: The pandemic took a heavy toll on the economy.
cn: 疫情对经济造成了严重打击。

en: Stress can take a heavy toll on your health.
cn: 压力会对你的健康造成严重影响。

en: Despite his success, he always has his feet on the ground.
cn: 尽管他成功了，但他总是脚踏实地。

en: She has her feet on the ground and makes practical decisions.
cn: 她脚踏实地，做出务实的决定。

en: Do you have any milk left in the fridge?
cn: 冰箱里还有牛奶剩下吗？

en: After the sale, we have only a few items left.
cn: 促销后，我们只剩下几件商品了。

en: The small startup evolved into a large corporation.
cn: 这家小初创公司发展成了一家大公司。

en: Over time, the idea evolved into a full-fledged project.
cn: 随着时间的推移，这个想法演变成了一个成熟的项目。

en: I opened a checking account at the local bank.
cn: 我在当地银行开了一个支票账户。

en: She uses her checking account to pay bills online.
cn: 她用她的支票账户在线支付账单。

en: The company signed on a new employee last week.
cn: 公司上周签约雇用了一名新员工。

en: He signed on for a two-year contract with the team.
cn: 他与团队签约了一份为期两年的合同。

en: The suspect is in jail awaiting trial.
cn: 嫌疑人在监狱中等待审判。

en: She awaits trial for the charges against her.
cn: 她因对她的指控而等待审判。

en: The cast had a dress rehearsal before the opening night.
cn: 演员们在首演前进行了一次彩排。

en: The dress rehearsal went smoothly without any issues.
cn: 彩排进行得很顺利，没有任何问题。

en: She worked her new ideas into the presentation.
cn: 她将新想法逐渐融入了演示中。

en: He worked exercise into his daily routine.
cn: 他将锻炼逐渐融入了日常作息中。

en: If you think I'll agree, you have another think coming.
cn: 如果你认为我会同意，那你就大错特错了。

en: He has another think coming if he believes it's easy.
cn: 如果他认为这很容易，那他就需要重新考虑了。

en: The police will inquire into the cause of the accident.
cn: 警方将调查事故的原因。

en: She inquired into the details of the contract before signing.
cn: 她在签约前探究了合同的细节。

en: The new processor is an order of magnitude faster than the old one.
cn: 新处理器的速度比旧处理器快一个数量级。

en: The earthquake was an order of magnitude stronger than predicted.
cn: 这次地震比预测的强一个数量级。

en: He looks upon his mentor with great respect.
cn: 他以极大的尊重看待他的导师。

en: She looks upon this opportunity as a challenge.
cn: 她将这个机会视为一个挑战。

en: On second thoughts, I think I'll stay home instead of going to the party.
cn: 再三考虑后，我想我还是待在家里，不去参加派对了。

en: He agreed to the deal initially, but on second thoughts, he decided to negotiate further.
cn: 他最初同意了这笔交易，但再三考虑后，他决定进一步谈判。

en: Detectives pieced together the evidence to solve the mystery.
cn: 侦探们拼凑证据来解开谜团。

en: She pieced together the broken vase with glue.
cn: 她用胶水把破碎的花瓶拼凑起来。

en: She applied for a multiple entry visa to visit her family in Canada several times a year.
cn: 她申请了多次入境签证，以便一年内多次去加拿大探望家人。

en: Business travelers often prefer a multiple entry visa for flexibility during international trips.
cn: 商务旅行者通常更喜欢多次入境签证，以便在国际旅行中更灵活。

en: She was reluctant to accept the job offer because of the long commute.
cn: 由于通勤时间长，她不情愿接受这份工作邀请。

en: He is reluctant to share his personal details with strangers.
cn: 他不情愿与陌生人分享他的个人细节。

en: Journalists often travel to conflict zones to gather first-hand information.
cn: 记者经常前往冲突地区收集第一手信息。

en: Researchers gathered first-hand information by conducting interviews with local residents.
cn: 研究人员通过采访当地居民收集了第一手信息。

en: Let's get back to the original topic of our discussion.
cn: 让我们回到讨论的原始话题上。

en: The essay strayed from the original topic and became confusing.
cn: 这篇文章偏离了原始话题，变得令人困惑。

en: Traffic congestion in the city center is a major problem during rush hour.
cn: 市中心的交通拥堵在高峰时段是一个主要问题。

en: The new highway aims to reduce traffic congestion on existing roads.
cn: 新高速公路旨在减少现有道路上的交通拥堵。

en: She felt at her ease in the cozy café with her friends.
cn: 在舒适的咖啡馆里和朋友们在一起，她感到轻松自在。

en: He is at his ease when speaking in public, thanks to years of practice.
cn: 由于多年的练习，他在公开演讲时感到轻松自在。

en: The construction of the new stadium involved enormous expenditure.
cn: 新体育场的建设涉及巨大的开支。

en: The company's enormous expenditure on marketing did not yield expected returns.
cn: 公司在营销上的巨大开支没有带来预期的回报。

en: Many professionals sacrifice family life to advance their careers.
cn: 许多专业人士为了事业发展牺牲家庭生活。

en: He had to sacrifice family life during the busy project period.
cn: 在繁忙的项目期间，他不得不牺牲家庭生活。

en: The old jacket came apart at the seams after years of wear.
cn: 这件旧夹克穿了多年后，接缝处裂开了。

en: Their plan came apart at the seams when key members left the team.
cn: 当关键成员离开团队时，他们的计划崩溃了。

en: The new law will come into effect next month.
cn: 新法律将于下个月生效。

en: The policy came into effect immediately after approval.
cn: 该政策在批准后立即开始实施。

en: The Sanitation Department is responsible for waste collection in the city.
cn: 环卫部门负责城市的垃圾收集工作。

en: Residents can report sanitation issues to the Sanitation Department.
cn: 居民可以向卫生局报告卫生问题。

en: It's important to be honest with your friends about your feelings.
cn: 对朋友诚实表达你的感受很重要。

en: He was honest with his boss about the mistake he made.
cn: 他诚实地向老板承认了自己犯的错误。

en: One adverse aspect of the new policy is increased costs for small businesses.
cn: 新政策的一个不利方面是增加了小企业的成本。

en: The report highlights the adverse aspects of climate change on agriculture.
cn: 报告强调了气候变化对农业的负面影响。

en: The manager gave her a free hand to redesign the office layout.
cn: 经理给了她自由处理权来重新设计办公室布局。

en: He has a free hand in making decisions for the project.
cn: 他在为项目做决定时有自由处理权。

en: He struggles to complete tasks on time because he lacks self-discipline.
cn: 他因为缺乏自律而难以按时完成任务。

en: Lack of self-discipline can lead to poor health habits.
cn: 缺乏自律可能导致不良的健康习惯。

en: Make no mistake, this decision will have serious consequences.
cn: 毫无疑问，这个决定将带来严重后果。

en: Make no mistake about it, she is the best candidate for the job.
cn: 请务必明白，她是这份工作的最佳人选。

en: How many people attended the meeting yesterday?
cn: 昨天有多少人参加了会议？

en: She asked how many books are in the library.
cn: 她问图书馆里有多少本书。

en: During the exam, you need to keep your eye on the ball and avoid distractions.
cn: 考试时，你需要集中注意力，避免分心。

en: In business, it's important to keep your eye on the ball to stay competitive.
cn: 在商业中，保持专注以保持竞争力很重要。

en: He's always trying to make something out of nothing to start drama.
cn: 他总是无中生有，挑起事端。

en: Don't make something out of nothing; there's no evidence for your claim.
cn: 别凭空捏造了，你的说法毫无证据。

en: He vowed to get even after being insulted in public.
cn: 在公开场合被侮辱后，他发誓要报复。

en: She got even by returning the favor with a prank of her own.
cn: 她通过用自己的恶作剧回敬，扯平了。

en: In a word, the movie was fantastic.
cn: 简而言之，这部电影太棒了。

en: His performance? In a word, outstanding.
cn: 他的表现？一句话概括，出色。

en: As a salesperson, she's always on the go, traveling between cities.
cn: 作为销售人员，她总是忙碌中，在城市间旅行。

en: I eat breakfast on the go to save time in the morning.
cn: 我早上在移动中吃早餐以节省时间。

en: Advances in technology have greatly increased global food production.
cn: 技术进步极大地提高了全球食品生产。

en: Sustainable food production is essential for future generations.
cn: 可持续的粮食生产对后代至关重要。

en: She won a gold medal in the long jump at the Olympics.
cn: 她在奥运会的跳远项目中赢得了金牌。

en: The long jump requires both speed and precision.
cn: 跳远需要速度和精确度。

en: We need to look ahead and plan for next year's budget.
cn: 我们需要展望未来，规划明年的预算。

en: Instead of dwelling on past mistakes, it's better to look ahead.
cn: 与其纠结于过去的错误，不如向前看。

en: Excuse me, I need to go to the bathroom.
cn: 抱歉，我需要去洗手间。

en: The child asked to go to the bathroom during the car ride.
cn: 孩子在乘车途中要求上厕所。

en: The director plans to shoot a film in New York next month.
cn: 导演计划下个月在纽约拍摄一部电影。

en: They spent six months to shoot a film about ancient history.
cn: 他们花了六个月拍摄一部关于古代历史的电影。

en: The weather service warned us of the approaching storm.
cn: 气象部门警告我们关于即将到来的风暴。

en: I warned him of the potential risks before he invested.
cn: 在他投资前，我警告了他潜在的风险。

en: It takes years of practice to master another language fluently.
cn: 需要多年的练习才能流利地掌握另一门语言。

en: She aims to master another language to enhance her career opportunities.
cn: 她旨在掌握另一门语言以增强职业机会。

en: She received a letter of acceptance from Harvard University.
cn: 她收到了哈佛大学的录取通知书。

en: The letter of acceptance must be submitted to confirm enrollment.
cn: 必须提交录取通知书以确认入学。

en: I get a kick out of watching old comedy shows.
cn: 我从看老喜剧节目中获得乐趣。

en: He gets a kick out of solving difficult puzzles.
cn: 他享受解决难题的过程。

en: The assistant relieved the manager of some administrative tasks.
cn: 助理解除了经理的一些行政任务负担。

en: He was relieved of his duties after the investigation.
cn: 调查后，他被免除了职责。

en: You should think out your career path before making a hasty decision.
cn: 在做出草率决定前，你应该仔细考虑你的职业道路。

en: The team thought out every detail of the project to ensure success.
cn: 团队深思熟虑了项目的每个细节以确保成功。

en: During the hike, we encountered trouble when it started raining heavily.
cn: 徒步时，当开始下大雨时，我们遇到了麻烦。

en: The project encountered trouble due to budget cuts.
cn: 由于预算削减，这个项目遭遇了困难。

en: The old saying 'practice makes perfect' still holds true today.
cn: 古语“熟能生巧”今天仍然成立。

en: His theory holds true under various experimental conditions.
cn: 他的理论在各种实验条件下仍然有效。

en: She is anxious about her upcoming job interview.
cn: 她对即将到来的工作面试感到焦虑。

en: He was anxious about the safety of his family during the storm.
cn: 他在暴风雨期间为家人的安全感到担忧。

en: The candidate has an extensive accounting background with 10 years of experience.
cn: 这位候选人有10年经验的广泛会计背景。

en: An extensive accounting background is required for this senior position.
cn: 这个高级职位需要广泛的会计背景。

en: He dug into the delicious meal with enthusiasm.
cn: 他热情地开始享用这顿美餐。

en: The journalist dug into the corruption scandal for months.
cn: 记者深入调查这起腐败丑闻数月之久。

en: "Freedom or death!" became the rallying cry of the revolution.
cn: "不自由，毋宁死！"成为了革命的战斗口号。

en: The coach's speech served as a rallying cry for the team before the big game.
cn: 教练的演讲在大赛前成为了团队的激励口号。

en: I'd give my right arm to meet my favorite author.
cn: 我愿意付出巨大代价去见我最喜欢的作者。

en: He said he'd give his right arm for a chance to travel the world.
cn: 他说他愿意牺牲一切来获得环游世界的机会。

en: She has great faith in her doctor's abilities.
cn: 她对医生的能力有极大的信心。

en: We must maintain our faith in the justice system.
cn: 我们必须保持对司法体系的信任。

en: You need to make up your mind about which college to attend.
cn: 你需要决定上哪所大学。

en: After much thought, she made up her mind to quit her job.
cn: 经过深思熟虑，她决定辞职。

en: Applicants must have relevant working experience in marketing.
cn: 申请者必须具备市场营销的相关工作经验。

en: Her relevant working experience made her a strong candidate for the job.
cn: 她的相关工作经验使她成为这个职位的强有力候选人。

en: In the future, we hope to travel to Mars.
cn: 在未来，我们希望前往火星旅行。

en: She plans to start her own business in the future.
cn: 她计划在未来创办自己的企业。

en: The government decided to clamp down on illegal immigration.
cn: 政府决定严厉打击非法移民。

en: Police are clamping down on speeding in residential areas.
cn: 警方正在严厉打击住宅区的超速行为。

en: The activists are pushing for stricter environmental laws.
cn: 活动人士正在极力争取更严格的环境法律。

en: He pushed for a raise after his successful project.
cn: 在项目成功后，他极力争取加薪。

en: Hurry up, or we'll miss the bus!
cn: 快点，否则我们要错过公交车了！

en: Can you hurry up with that report? It's due soon.
cn: 你能快点完成那份报告吗？很快就到期了。

en: I need to inquire about the availability of hotel rooms.
cn: 我需要询问酒店房间的可用性。

en: She inquired about the application process for the scholarship.
cn: 她打听了奖学金的申请流程。

en: The project will cost in the region of $50,000.
cn: 这个项目的成本大约在5万美元左右。

en: The population is estimated to be in the region of 10 million.
cn: 人口估计在1000万左右。

en: The band played their hearts out at the concert.
cn: 乐队在音乐会上全力以赴地演奏。

en: He played his heart out in the championship game.
cn: 他在冠军赛中全力以赴地比赛。

en: He decided to make a clean breast of his mistake to his boss.
cn: 他决定向老板彻底坦白自己的错误。

en: After years of guilt, she made a clean breast of the secret.
cn: 在多年的内疚之后，她彻底坦白了那个秘密。

en: She gave birth to a healthy baby boy last week.
cn: 她上周生下了一个健康的男婴。

en: The idea gave birth to a new scientific theory.
cn: 这个想法催生了一个新的科学理论。

en: A 10% salary increase is not to be sneezed at in this economy.
cn: 在当前经济形势下，10%的加薪不容小觑。

en: His contribution to the project was not to be sneezed at.
cn: 他对项目的贡献值得重视。

en: There are many surprises in store for you on this trip.
cn: 这次旅行有很多惊喜在等着你。

en: We don't know what the future has in store for us.
cn: 我们不知道未来会有什么在等待着我们。

en: Do you by any chance know where the nearest post office is?
cn: 你或许知道最近的邮局在哪里吗？

en: Are you by any chance free this weekend?
cn: 你这个周末可能有空吗？

en: I like to add chocolate syrup to my milkshakes.
cn: 我喜欢在奶昔里加巧克力糖浆。

en: This dessert is topped with a drizzle of chocolate syrup.
cn: 这道甜点上面淋了一层巧克力糖浆。

en: If I had my druthers, I'd spend the whole day reading.
cn: 如果可以选择的话，我会花一整天时间阅读。

en: Given his druthers, he would travel the world instead of working.
cn: 如果可以选择，他宁愿环游世界而不是工作。

en: Can you put in a good word for me with the hiring manager?
cn: 你能在招聘经理面前为我说句好话吗？

en: She put in a good word for her friend during the promotion discussion.
cn: 她在晋升讨论中为她的朋友说了好话。

en: The new CEO plans to streamline the management layer to improve efficiency.
cn: 新CEO计划精简管理层以提高效率。

en: Decisions often get delayed due to too many management layers.
cn: 由于管理层次过多，决策常常被延误。

en: The editor went over the manuscript with a fine-tooth comb before publishing.
cn: 编辑在出版前仔细检查了手稿。

en: We need to go over the contract with a fine-tooth comb to avoid any mistakes.
cn: 我们需要彻底审查合同以避免任何错误。

en: His old-fashioned ideas about gender roles are no longer acceptable.
cn: 他关于性别角色的过时观念已不再被接受。

en: The company needs to update its old-fashioned ideas about marketing.
cn: 公司需要更新其关于营销的老式想法。

en: We have meetings every other Monday.
cn: 我们每隔一个星期一开会。

en: Every other student passed the exam except him.
cn: 除了他，所有其他学生都通过了考试。

en: She was admitted into Harvard University last year.
cn: 她去年被哈佛大学录取了。

en: Only members are admitted into the exclusive club.
cn: 只有会员才被允许进入这个高级俱乐部。

en: I can't put up with his constant complaining anymore.
cn: 我再也无法忍受他不断的抱怨了。

en: She has to put up with a long commute to work every day.
cn: 她不得不忍受每天长时间的通勤。

en: He prides himself on his punctuality.
cn: 他以守时为傲。

en: The company prides itself on excellent customer service.
cn: 这家公司以优质的客户服务为傲。

en: The teacher commented on the poor quality of his handwriting.
cn: 老师评论了他糟糕的书写质量。

en: Improving the quality of your handwriting can make your notes more legible.
cn: 提高你的书写质量可以使笔记更易读。

en: After the exam, I plan to take it easy for a few days.
cn: 考试后，我计划放松几天。

en: Take it easy, everything will be fine.
cn: 别紧张，一切都会好起来的。

en: Millions of people watched the live broadcast.
cn: 数百万人观看了直播。

en: The charity has helped millions of children worldwide.
cn: 该慈善机构帮助了全球数百万儿童。

en: Please fill in the application form with your details.
cn: 请用你的详细信息填写申请表。

en: Can you fill me in on what happened at the meeting?
cn: 你能告诉我会议上发生了什么吗？

en: Avoid driving during peak time to miss the traffic.
cn: 避开高峰时间驾驶以避开交通拥堵。

en: The electricity rates are higher during peak time.
cn: 高峰时间的电费更高。

en: The music played on throughout the night.
cn: 音乐整夜继续播放。

en: He played on her sympathy to get what he wanted.
cn: 他利用她的同情心得到了他想要的东西。

en: Please make yourself at home while I prepare some drinks.
cn: 请随意，我去准备一些饮料。

en: He quickly made himself at home in the new apartment.
cn: 他很快就在新公寓里像在自己家一样自在了。

en: The author finally put her novel into print after years of work.
cn: 经过多年的努力，作者终于将她的小说印刷出版了。

en: We need to put the report into print by tomorrow.
cn: 我们需要在明天之前将报告印刷出来。

en: He was going to quit his job, but he thought better of it.
cn: 他本来打算辞职，但重新考虑后改变了主意。

en: I thought better of buying that expensive car and saved the money instead.
cn: 我重新考虑后决定不买那辆昂贵的车，而是把钱存了起来。

en: The prosecutor is building a case against the suspect.
cn: 检察官正在收集证据指控嫌疑人。

en: They built a strong case against him with multiple witnesses.
cn: 他们通过多位证人建立了针对他的有力指控。

en: I had to work extra hours to meet the project deadline.
cn: 我不得不加班工作以赶上项目截止日期。

en: She often works extra hours without overtime pay.
cn: 她经常加班却没有加班费。

en: I got a dirty look when I cut in line.
cn: 我插队时遭到了厌恶的眼神。

en: She gave him a dirty look after his rude comment.
cn: 在他发表粗鲁评论后，她给了他一个不满的眼神。

en: Many families in that region live in poverty.
cn: 那个地区的许多家庭生活在贫困中。

en: He lived in poverty for years before finding a stable job.
cn: 在找到稳定工作前，他在贫困中生活了多年。

en: The picnic was washed out by heavy rain.
cn: 野餐因大雨被取消了。

en: The flood washed out the bridge.
cn: 洪水冲垮了桥梁。

en: I exercise every day to stay healthy.
cn: 我每天锻炼以保持健康。

en: She reads the newspaper every day.
cn: 她每天读报纸。

en: I reached out to an old friend last week.
cn: 我上周联系了一位老朋友。

en: The organization reaches out to homeless people.
cn: 该组织向无家可归者伸出援手。

en: We need to make plans for our summer vacation.
cn: 我们需要为暑假制定计划。

en: She is making plans for her retirement.
cn: 她正在为退休制定计划。

en: The economic crisis brought the company to its knees.
cn: 经济危机使这家公司濒临崩溃。

en: Her illness brought her to her knees, but she fought back.
cn: 疾病使她几乎崩溃，但她奋力抗争。

en: She uses software to edit images for her blog.
cn: 她使用软件为博客编辑图像。

en: He edits images to remove imperfections.
cn: 他编辑图像以去除瑕疵。

en: The event was organized in conjunction with local businesses.
cn: 这次活动是与当地企业联合组织的。

en: He works in conjunction with a team of experts.
cn: 他与专家团队一起工作。

en: She shares her lunch with her friend.
cn: 她与朋友分享午餐。

en: He shared the news with his family.
cn: 他与家人分享了这则消息。

en: I can't afford to buy a new car right now.
cn: 我现在负担不起买一辆新车。

en: We can't afford to make any mistakes in this project.
cn: 在这个项目中，我们承担不起任何错误。

en: The manager gave us the go-ahead to start the project.
cn: 经理批准我们开始这个项目。

en: She gave her son the go-ahead to go to the party.
cn: 她允许儿子去参加派对。

en: Our negotiations ran into a stone wall when they refused to compromise.
cn: 当他们拒绝妥协时，我们的谈判遇到了无法克服的障碍。

en: He ran into a stone wall trying to get funding for his idea.
cn: 他在为想法争取资金时遇到了无法克服的障碍。

en: The government is struggling to balance its budget.
cn: 政府正在努力平衡预算。

en: She balances her budget by cutting unnecessary expenses.
cn: 她通过削减不必要的开支来平衡预算。

en: Education helps people become productive members of society.
cn: 教育帮助人们成为社会的生产性成员。

en: They are productive members of society, contributing through their work.
cn: 他们是社会的生产性成员，通过工作做出贡献。

en: He didn't stay for long because he had another appointment.
cn: 他没有待很久，因为他还有另一个约会。

en: The rain won't last for long; it should clear up soon.
cn: 雨不会下很久，应该很快就会放晴。

en: He attended elite schools and later became a successful lawyer.
cn: 他上了精英学校，后来成为了一名成功的律师。

en: Elite schools often have high tuition fees.
cn: 精英学校通常学费高昂。

en: The suspect's alibi turned out to be a red herring to mislead the police.
cn: 嫌疑人的不在场证明原来是为了误导警方的转移注意力手段。

en: In the debate, he introduced a red herring to avoid discussing the main issue.
cn: 在辩论中，他引入了一个误导性话题来回避讨论主要问题。

en: Please insert the card into the ATM to begin your transaction.
cn: 请将卡片插入自动取款机以开始您的交易。

en: You need to insert the card correctly for the reader to scan it.
cn: 您需要正确插入卡片以便读卡器扫描。

en: The tradition of Halloween is believed to originate with ancient Celtic festivals.
cn: 万圣节的传统被认为起源于古代凯尔特人的节日。

en: This innovative idea originated with a young engineer in our team.
cn: 这个创新的想法起源于我们团队里的一位年轻工程师。

en: Recent technological breakthroughs in AI have revolutionized many industries.
cn: 最近人工智能领域的技术突破彻底改变了许多行业。

en: The company announced several technological breakthroughs in renewable energy.
cn: 该公司宣布了在可再生能源方面的几项技术突破。

en: All employees must comply with rules regarding workplace safety.
cn: 所有员工都必须遵守有关工作场所安全的规则。

en: The software is designed to help users comply with rules for data protection.
cn: 该软件旨在帮助用户遵守数据保护规则。

en: She was ever so grateful for the help you provided.
cn: 她对你提供的帮助感激不尽。

en: The cake is ever so delicious; you must try a piece.
cn: 这蛋糕非常美味，你一定要尝一块。

en: He thought the plan would fail, but on the contrary, it was a huge success.
cn: 他认为计划会失败，但相反地，它取得了巨大成功。

en: She isn't lazy; on the contrary, she works harder than anyone else.
cn: 她并不懒惰；相反地，她比任何人都更努力工作。

en: He decided to knock on the door to see if anyone was home.
cn: 他决定敲门看看是否有人在家。

en: Please knock on the window to get her attention.
cn: 请敲敲窗户以引起她的注意。

en: Many charitable organisations rely on donations to support their causes.
cn: 许多慈善组织依靠捐款来支持他们的事业。

en: She volunteers at several charitable organisations in her community.
cn: 她在社区的几家慈善组织做志愿者。

en: Can you see to the arrangements for the meeting?
cn: 你能负责处理会议安排吗？

en: I'll see to it that the problem is fixed.
cn: 我会负责确保问题得到解决。

en: She spends two hours each day traveling to and from work.
cn: 她每天花两个小时上下班通勤。

en: To save time, many people use public transport for travel to and from work.
cn: 为了节省时间，许多人使用公共交通上下班通勤。

en: Employers value candidates who demonstrate a good work ethic.
cn: 雇主看重表现出良好职业道德的候选人。

en: His success is largely due to his a good work ethic and dedication.
cn: 他的成功很大程度上归功于他良好的职业道德和奉献精神。

en: Greenhouse gases trap heat from the sun, contributing to global warming.
cn: 温室气体捕获太阳热量，导致全球变暖。

en: Solar panels are designed to trap heat from the sun for energy conversion.
cn: 太阳能电池板设计用于捕获太阳热量以进行能量转换。

en: A healthy diet can strengthen your body's immune defense against infections.
cn: 健康的饮食可以增强你身体对感染的免疫防御。

en: Vaccines help boost the immune defense by introducing harmless antigens.
cn: 疫苗通过引入无害抗原来帮助增强免疫防御。

en: He is currently working on a new novel.
cn: 他目前正在致力于写一本新小说。

en: The team needs to work on improving communication skills.
cn: 团队需要致力于提高沟通技巧。

en: That hairstyle has been out of style for years.
cn: 那种发型已经过时好几年了。

en: Some words become out of style as language evolves.
cn: 随着语言的发展，一些词汇变得不再流行。

en: By wearing bright colors, she made herself conspicuous at the party.
cn: 通过穿鲜艳的颜色，她在派对上使自己显眼。

en: He tried not to make himself conspicuous during the meeting to avoid attention.
cn: 他试图在会议期间不使自己显眼，以避免被注意。

en: In college, students are required to take subject courses related to their major.
cn: 在大学里，学生需要修读与其专业相关的专业课程。

en: She plans to take subject courses in biology to prepare for medical school.
cn: 她计划修读生物学专业课程，为医学院做准备。

en: Keep your pants on, the bus will be here in five minutes.
cn: 别着急，公交车五分钟后就到。

en: He told his friend to keep his pants on while waiting for the results.
cn: 他告诉朋友在等结果时要保持冷静。

en: You should give her credit for completing the project ahead of schedule.
cn: 你应该赞扬她提前完成了项目。

en: I give him credit for his honesty in admitting the mistake.
cn: 我认可他承认错误的诚实态度。

en: After the manager left, the company's performance went downhill.
cn: 经理离开后，公司的业绩开始走下坡路。

en: His health has been going downhill since the accident.
cn: 事故后，他的健康状况一直在恶化。

en: We all chipped in to buy a gift for our teacher.
cn: 我们都凑钱给老师买了一份礼物。

en: Can you chip in a few dollars for the pizza?
cn: 你能为披萨贡献几美元吗？

en: It's dangerous to get close to wild animals in the forest.
cn: 在森林里接近野生动物是危险的。

en: As they worked together, they began to get close to each other.
cn: 随着他们一起工作，他们开始彼此接近。

en: She sketched out the plan for the new project.
cn: 她草拟了新项目的计划。

en: Can you sketch out your ideas before the meeting?
cn: 你能在会议前概述一下你的想法吗？

en: The rain kept us from going to the park.
cn: 下雨阻止了我们去公园。

en: She kept her children from eating too much candy.
cn: 她阻止孩子们吃太多糖果。

en: Her grandfather passed away peacefully in his sleep.
cn: 她的祖父在睡梦中安详地去世了。

en: He passed away after a long illness.
cn: 他在长期患病后去世了。

en: The new evidence throws light on the mystery.
cn: 新证据阐明了这个谜团。

en: His explanation threw light on the complex issue.
cn: 他的解释使这个复杂问题更清楚了。

en: It's worthwhile to visit the museum while you're in town.
cn: 你在城里时，值得去参观博物馆。

en: It's worthwhile to learn a new language for career advancement.
cn: 为了职业发展，值得学习一门新语言。

en: He does odd jobs around the neighborhood to earn extra money.
cn: 他在附近做零工来赚外快。

en: I need someone to help with odd jobs like painting and cleaning.
cn: 我需要有人帮忙做像刷漆和清洁这样的杂活。

en: He was blamed for the mistake in the report.
cn: 他因报告中的错误而受责备。

en: She shouldn't be blamed for the accident.
cn: 她不应该因事故而受责备。

en: The old house has gone to rack and ruin over the years.
cn: 这座老房子多年来已经破败不堪。

en: Without maintenance, the garden will go to rack and ruin.
cn: 没有维护，花园将会荒废。

en: They had to resort to legal action to resolve the dispute.
cn: 他们不得不诉诸法律行动来解决争端。

en: In desperate situations, people may resort to extreme measures.
cn: 在绝望的情况下，人们可能会采取极端措施。

en: He took the rap for the team's failure, even though it wasn't entirely his fault.
cn: 他为团队的失败承担责任，尽管这不完全是他的错。

en: She refused to take the rap for her colleague's mistake.
cn: 她拒绝为同事的错误背黑锅。

en: She is optimistic about her chances of getting the job.
cn: 她对获得这份工作的机会持乐观态度。

en: We should be optimistic about the future despite the challenges.
cn: 尽管有挑战，我们应该对未来持乐观态度。

en: He lost control of the car on the icy road.
cn: 他在结冰的路上失去了对汽车的控制。

en: She lost control of her emotions during the argument.
cn: 她在争论中失去了对情绪的控制。

en: I need to have this secret off my chest; it's been bothering me for years.
cn: 我需要把这个秘密一吐为快，它困扰我多年了。

en: After having his feelings off his chest, he felt much better.
cn: 把感受说出来后，他感觉好多了。

en: The bad weather put the kibosh on our picnic plans.
cn: 恶劣的天气阻止了我们的野餐计划。

en: The new regulations put the kibosh on the proposed project.
cn: 新规定终止了拟议的项目。

en: The documentary portrays the cruelty of hunting in graphic detail.
cn: 这部纪录片以生动的细节描绘了狩猎的残酷性。

en: Her novel portrays the cruelty of hunting through the eyes of an animal.
cn: 她的小说通过动物的视角描绘了狩猎的残酷性。

en: The city is facing a severe housing shortage due to population growth.
cn: 由于人口增长，该市正面临严重的住房短缺。

en: The government is implementing policies to address the housing shortage.
cn: 政府正在实施政策来解决住房短缺问题。

en: It occurred to me that I had left my keys at home.
cn: 我突然想到我把钥匙忘在家里了。

en: Did it ever occur to you to ask for help?
cn: 你有没有想过要寻求帮助？

en: Do up your coat before you go outside; it's cold.
cn: 出门前把外套扣好，外面很冷。

en: She did up the buttons on her dress quickly.
cn: 她迅速扣好了裙子的纽扣。

en: I'll give you a buzz when I arrive at the station.
cn: 我到车站时会给你打个电话。

en: Give me a buzz if you need any help with the project.
cn: 如果你在项目上需要帮助，就给我打个电话。

en: She always gives a helping hand to her neighbors in need.
cn: 她总是对有需要的邻居伸出援手。

en: Can you give me a helping hand with moving this heavy furniture?
cn: 你能帮我搬一下这件沉重的家具吗？

en: There were ten people in all at the meeting.
cn: 总共有十个人参加了会议。

en: The trip cost $500 in all, including flights and hotels.
cn: 这次旅行总共花费了500美元，包括机票和酒店。

en: It's important to make a distinction between facts and opinions.
cn: 区分事实和观点很重要。

en: The law makes a distinction between intentional and accidental acts.
cn: 法律区分了故意行为和意外行为。

en: We need to dig down to find the roots of the problem.
cn: 我们需要深入挖掘以找到问题的根源。

en: The archaeologists dug down several meters to uncover the ancient artifacts.
cn: 考古学家挖掘了几米深以发现古代文物。

en: She impressed the judges with her excellent performance.
cn: 她用出色的表演给评委留下了深刻印象。

en: He impressed his boss with his innovative ideas.
cn: 他用创新的想法给老板留下了深刻印象。

en: The war deprived many children of their education.
cn: 战争剥夺了许多儿童的教育机会。

en: Poverty can deprive people of basic necessities like food and shelter.
cn: 贫困可能剥夺人们食物和住所等基本必需品。

en: Good communication skills are essential for effective teamwork.
cn: 良好的沟通技巧对于有效的团队合作至关重要。

en: She improved her communication skills by taking a public speaking course.
cn: 她通过参加公开演讲课程提高了沟通技巧。

en: I was late for the meeting because of traffic.
cn: 因为交通堵塞，我开会迟到了。

en: Don't be late for your flight; check-in closes an hour before departure.
cn: 别误了航班；登机手续在起飞前一小时关闭。

en: I accidentally knocked into the table and spilled my coffee.
cn: 我不小心撞到了桌子，把咖啡洒了。

en: He knocked into an old friend while shopping at the mall.
cn: 他在商场购物时偶然遇到了一位老朋友。

en: We can dispense with formalities and get straight to the point.
cn: 我们可以省去礼节，直接切入正题。

en: Modern technology allows us to dispense with paper documents.
cn: 现代技术使我们无需纸质文件。

en: For the record, I disagree with the decision made by the committee.
cn: 正式声明，我不同意委员会做出的决定。

en: Let me state for the record that all allegations are false.
cn: 我正式声明，所有指控都是虚假的。

en: The event went like clockwork, with no delays or issues.
cn: 活动进展顺利，没有任何延误或问题。

en: If we prepare well, the project should go like clockwork.
cn: 如果我们准备充分，项目应该会顺利进行。

en: The room was decorated with colorful balloons for the party.
cn: 房间用彩色气球装饰以举办派对。

en: The cake was decorated with intricate icing designs.
cn: 蛋糕用精致的糖霜设计装饰。

en: After the negotiations, our company came out ahead with a better deal.
cn: 谈判后，我们公司以更优的条件最终获利。

en: In the competition, she came out ahead by scoring the highest points.
cn: 在比赛中，她以最高分最终占优势。

en: The conflict between the two countries came to a head, leading to war.
cn: 两国之间的冲突达到顶点，导致了战争。

en: The issue came to a head when employees went on strike.
cn: 当员工罢工时，问题达到了危机点。

en: She loves to lose herself in a good book on weekends.
cn: 她喜欢在周末沉浸在一本好书中。

en: He lost himself in his work and forgot about the time.
cn: 他专注于工作，忘记了时间。

en: They bought the house at a low price during the recession.
cn: 他们在经济衰退期间以低价买下了这栋房子。

en: You can find quality products at a low price if you shop online.
cn: 如果你在网上购物，可以找到物美价廉的产品。

en: I congratulate you upon your recent promotion.
cn: 我祝贺你最近的晋升。

en: They congratulated her upon winning the award.
cn: 他们因她获奖而祝贺她。

en: With exams approaching, she has her nose to the grindstone every day.
cn: 随着考试临近，她每天都埋头苦干。

en: He had his nose to the grindstone to finish the project on time.
cn: 他努力工作以按时完成项目。

en: He decided to take a gamble and invest in the startup.
cn: 他决定冒险投资这家初创公司。

en: Taking a gamble on that stock paid off handsomely.
cn: 在那只股票上赌一把获得了丰厚回报。

en: The company's profits went into a nose dive after the scandal.
cn: 丑闻后，公司的利润急剧下降。

en: The plane went into a nose dive before the pilot regained control.
cn: 飞机在飞行员重新控制前急剧俯冲。

en: I'm sort of tired after the long journey.
cn: 长途旅行后我有点累。

en: The movie was sort of interesting, but not great.
cn: 这部电影有点意思，但不算很棒。

en: She is at the head of the marketing department.
cn: 她领导着市场部。

en: The CEO sits at the head of the table during meetings.
cn: 会议期间，CEO坐在桌子的前头。

en: You should avail yourself of the opportunity to learn from experts.
cn: 你应该利用这个机会向专家学习。

en: She availed herself of the library's resources for her research.
cn: 她利用图书馆的资源进行研究。

en: After his rival scored a goal, he went one better with two goals.
cn: 对手进了一球后，他进了两球，更胜一筹。

en: She always tries to go one better than her colleagues in presentations.
cn: 她总是试图在演示中比同事做得更好。

en: High transport costs can make imported goods more expensive.
cn: 高运输成本会使进口商品更贵。

en: We need to reduce transport costs to improve profitability.
cn: 我们需要降低运输成本以提高盈利能力。

en: He has been on medication for his high blood pressure for years.
cn: 他因高血压服药多年。

en: Patients should inform their doctor if they are on medication.
cn: 患者如果正在服药，应告知医生。

en: We'll have a party at the end of the month.
cn: 我们将在月底举办一个派对。

en: The answers are provided at the end of the book.
cn: 答案在书的末尾提供。

en: Before dealing, you need to shuffle the deck thoroughly.
cn: 发牌前，你需要彻底洗牌。

en: He shuffled the deck and then dealt the cards.
cn: 他洗了牌，然后发牌。

en: You must carry your driving license when operating a vehicle.
cn: 驾驶车辆时必须携带驾驶执照。

en: She applied for a driving license after passing the test.
cn: 通过考试后，她申请了驾驶执照。

en: This city is second only to the capital in population.
cn: 这个城市的人口仅次于首都。

en: Her dedication is second only to her talent in achieving success.
cn: 她的奉献精神在取得成功方面仅次于她的天赋。

en: We need to call a technician to fix the heater before winter.
cn: 我们需要在冬天前叫技术员来修理加热器。

en: He managed to fix the heater himself using online tutorials.
cn: 他利用在线教程自己修好了加热器。

en: No doubt, she will succeed with her hard work.
cn: 毫无疑问，凭借她的努力，她会成功。

en: There is no doubt that climate change is a serious issue.
cn: 毫无疑问，气候变化是一个严重的问题。

en: They developed a lasting friendship during their college years.
cn: 他们在大学期间建立了持久的友谊。

en: A lasting friendship is built on trust and mutual respect.
cn: 持久的友谊建立在信任和相互尊重的基础上。

en: His explanation doesn't make sense to me.
cn: 他的解释对我来说没有道理。

en: It makes sense to save money for emergencies.
cn: 为紧急情况存钱是合乎逻辑的。

en: The medication can make you drowsy, so avoid driving.
cn: 这种药会让你昏昏欲睡，所以避免驾驶。

en: Warm weather often makes people drowsy in the afternoon.
cn: 温暖的天气常常使人们在下午昏昏欲睡。

en: Industrial emissions can cause air pollution in urban areas.
cn: 工业排放会导致城市地区的空气污染。

en: Burning fossil fuels is known to cause air pollution.
cn: 已知燃烧化石燃料会导致空气污染。

en: I had words with my neighbor about the loud music last night.
cn: 昨晚我和邻居就吵闹的音乐争吵了一番。

en: She had words with her boss over the new policy.
cn: 她就新政策与老板争论了。

en: I need to look up the definition of this word in the dictionary.
cn: 我需要在字典里查找这个词的定义。

en: Can you look up the train schedule online?
cn: 你能在网上查阅火车时刻表吗？

en: Brisk walking and cycling are examples of moderate intensity activities.
cn: 快走和骑自行车是中等强度活动的例子。

en: Doctors recommend at least 150 minutes of moderate intensity activities per week.
cn: 医生建议每周至少进行150分钟的中等强度活动。

en: He got the heave-ho from his job after missing too many deadlines.
cn: 他错过了太多截止日期后，被解雇了。

en: If you don't improve your performance, you might get the heave-ho.
cn: 如果你不提高表现，可能会被开除。

en: The company is on the brink of bankruptcy due to poor management.
cn: 由于管理不善，这家公司濒临破产。

en: She was on the brink of tears after hearing the sad news.
cn: 听到这个悲伤的消息后，她即将哭出来。

en: The children played in safety under their parents' supervision.
cn: 孩子们在父母的监督下安全地玩耍。

en: Ensure all equipment is stored in safety to prevent accidents.
cn: 确保所有设备安全存放，以防止事故。

en: The manager gave us the green light to start the project.
cn: 经理给我们开了绿灯，可以开始这个项目了。

en: After reviewing the proposal, the committee gave it the green light.
cn: 审查提案后，委员会批准了它。

en: She has excellent taste in art and often visits galleries.
cn: 她对艺术有极佳的鉴赏力，经常参观画廊。

en: He doesn't have much taste in music, preferring simple tunes.
cn: 他对音乐没有太多品味，更喜欢简单的曲调。

en: The artist gave shape to her ideas through sculpture.
cn: 艺术家通过雕塑使她的想法成形。

en: We need to give shape to our plans before presenting them.
cn: 我们需要在展示之前使我们的计划具体化。

en: She came into the room quietly to avoid disturbing others.
cn: 她悄悄地进入房间，以免打扰他人。

en: The new policy will come into effect next month.
cn: 新政策将于下个月生效。

en: In negotiations, it's wise to have an out in case things go wrong.
cn: 在谈判中，明智的做法是有退路，以防事情出错。

en: She always has an out planned for risky situations.
cn: 她总是为风险情况计划好逃脱的方法。

en: The celebrity made an appearance at the charity event.
cn: 这位名人在慈善活动上露面了。

en: He promised to make an appearance at the party, but he never showed up.
cn: 他承诺会在派对上出现，但从未露面。

en: The police let him off with a warning instead of a fine.
cn: 警察放过了他，只给了警告而不是罚款。

en: She let off her friend for being late, understanding the traffic was bad.
cn: 她宽恕了朋友的迟到，理解交通状况糟糕。

en: Instead of working, he just idles around the office all day.
cn: 他不工作，整天在办公室里闲逛。

en: During the holiday, we idled around the park enjoying the sunshine.
cn: 假期期间，我们在公园里闲逛，享受阳光。

en: We need to pin down the exact date for the meeting.
cn: 我们需要确定会议的确切日期。

en: It's hard to pin down the cause of the problem without more data.
cn: 没有更多数据，很难明确问题的原因。

en: Maintaining eye contact during a conversation shows confidence.
cn: 在对话中保持眼神接触显示出自信。

en: He avoided eye contact when he was lying.
cn: 他撒谎时避免了目光交流。

en: She decided there and then to accept the job offer.
cn: 她当场决定接受这份工作邀请。

en: He paid for the car there and then without any hesitation.
cn: 他毫不犹豫地当场付了车款。

en: The store is open from 9 AM to 6 PM every day.
cn: 这家商店每天从上午9点营业到下午6点。

en: Prices range from $10 to $50 depending on the model.
cn: 价格从10美元到50美元不等，取决于型号。

en: I do exercises every morning to stay healthy.
cn: 我每天早上做运动以保持健康。

en: She does exercises at the gym three times a week.
cn: 她每周在健身房锻炼三次。

en: The criminals tried to shake down the shop owner for protection money.
cn: 罪犯试图勒索店主交保护费。

en: He was arrested for shaking down tourists in the city center.
cn: 他因在市中心敲诈游客而被捕。

en: He made a fortune by investing in technology stocks early on.
cn: 他通过早期投资科技股发了财。

en: She hopes to make a fortune with her new business idea.
cn: 她希望用她的新商业想法赚大钱。

en: He was smiling all the while during the meeting.
cn: 会议期间他一直面带微笑。

en: All the while, she knew the truth but didn't say anything.
cn: 她一直知道真相，但什么也没说。

en: I often look back on my childhood with fondness.
cn: 我常常深情地回顾我的童年。

en: He looks back on his career achievements with pride.
cn: 他自豪地回顾自己的职业成就。

en: In the accounting profession, accuracy is crucial.
cn: 在会计行业中，准确性至关重要。

en: She has worked in the accounting profession for over ten years.
cn: 她在会计行业工作了十多年。

en: After the divorce, he decided to put his house in order.
cn: 离婚后，他决定整理自己的生活。

en: The company needs to put its house in order before expanding.
cn: 公司在扩张之前需要整理好内部事务。

en: The lawyer will draw up the contract by tomorrow.
cn: 律师将在明天前起草合同。

en: We need to draw up a detailed plan before starting the project.
cn: 在开始项目之前，我们需要制定一个详细的计划。

en: The dry leaves caught fire quickly.
cn: 干叶子很快就着火了。

en: Be careful with the candles so they don't catch fire to the curtains.
cn: 小心蜡烛，以免窗帘着火。

en: She is conscious of her responsibilities as a leader.
cn: 她意识到自己作为领导的责任。

en: He is conscious of the time and doesn't want to be late.
cn: 他注意到时间，不想迟到。

en: This tool is designed to simplify the process.
cn: 这个工具旨在简化流程。

en: The course is designed to improve communication skills.
cn: 这门课程旨在提高沟通技巧。

en: He left the country for good.
cn: 他永久地离开了这个国家。

en: She decided to quit smoking for good.
cn: 她决定永远戒烟。

en: The office has central air conditioning.
cn: 办公室有中央空调系统。

en: We installed air conditioning to keep the house cool in summer.
cn: 我们安装了空调以在夏天保持房屋凉爽。

en: The witness will take the stand tomorrow.
cn: 证人明天将在法庭上作证。

en: She took the stand and testified about what she saw.
cn: 她出庭作证，讲述了她的所见。

en: At the time that I arrived, the meeting had already started.
cn: 在我到达的时候，会议已经开始了。

en: She was studying abroad at the time that the event occurred.
cn: 事件发生时，她正在国外留学。

en: The plane is scheduled to touch down at 3 PM.
cn: 飞机计划在下午3点着陆。

en: We touched down safely despite the bad weather.
cn: 尽管天气恶劣，我们安全着陆了。

en: His experience put him in an advantageous position for the promotion.
cn: 他的经验使他在晋升中处于有利地位。

en: The new technology puts our company in an advantageous position in the market.
cn: 这项新技术使我们公司在市场上处于有利地位。

en: The company's products are popular at home and abroad.
cn: 该公司的产品在国内外都很受欢迎。

en: The policy has significant implications both at home and abroad.
cn: 这项政策在国内外都有重大影响。

en: Please put the book down on the table.
cn: 请把书放在桌子上。

en: He put down his thoughts in a journal.
cn: 他把自己的想法写在了日记里。

en: The audience rose to their feet to applaud.
cn: 观众站起来鼓掌。

en: He rose to his feet when the judge entered the room.
cn: 法官进入房间时，他站了起来。

en: He served out his prison sentence and was released.
cn: 他服满了刑期并被释放。

en: The president will serve out his term until the next election.
cn: 总统将服满任期直到下次选举。

en: He decided to join up and serve his country.
cn: 他决定参军为国家服务。

en: Many young people joined up during the war.
cn: 战争期间许多年轻人入伍。

en: Let's get rolling on this project as soon as possible.
cn: 让我们尽快启动这个项目。

en: The meeting got rolling after a brief introduction.
cn: 简短介绍后，会议开始了。

en: He tends to brood on his mistakes for days.
cn: 他倾向于花几天时间反复思考自己的错误。

en: Don't brood on the past; focus on the future.
cn: 不要沉湎于过去，专注于未来。

en: The host said, 'Take it away!' and the band started playing.
cn: 主持人说：“开始吧！”乐队开始演奏。

en: After the introduction, the speaker was told, 'Take it away!'
cn: 介绍完后，演讲者被告知：“请开始吧！”

en: You should put that mistake out of your mind and move on.
cn: 你应该忘记那个错误，继续前进。

en: He tried to put the bad news out of his mind.
cn: 他试图不再想那个坏消息。

en: He behaves politely in company.
cn: 他在公共场合举止礼貌。

en: It's rude to argue in company.
cn: 在他人面前争吵是不礼貌的。

en: It's important to maintain the integrity of the data.
cn: 保持数据的完整性很重要。

en: The engineer worked to maintain the integrity of the structure.
cn: 工程师努力保持结构的完整性。

en: Get ready for the exam by reviewing your notes.
cn: 通过复习笔记为考试做好准备。

en: We need to get ready before the guests arrive.
cn: 我们需要在客人到达前准备好。

en: They struggle for freedom and equality.
cn: 他们为自由和平等而奋斗。

en: She has been struggling for recognition in her field.
cn: 她一直在为在自己领域获得认可而奋斗。

en: The strong wind pushed over the fence.
cn: 强风推倒了篱笆。

en: He accidentally pushed over the vase.
cn: 他不小心推倒了花瓶。

en: I am curious to know how the story ends.
cn: 我好奇想知道故事如何结束。

en: She was curious to see the new exhibit at the museum.
cn: 她好奇想看看博物馆的新展览。

en: He is used to waking up early for work.
cn: 他习惯于早起工作。

en: She is used to dealing with difficult customers.
cn: 她习惯于处理难缠的顾客。

en: She showed the new employee around the office.
cn: 她带领新员工参观了办公室。

en: Can you show me around the city?
cn: 你能带我参观一下这个城市吗？

en: Large numbers of people attended the concert.
cn: 大量的人参加了音乐会。

en: The company produces large numbers of products each year.
cn: 该公司每年生产大量的产品。

en: He searched in vain for his lost keys.
cn: 他徒劳地寻找丢失的钥匙。

en: Their efforts to save the business were in vain.
cn: 他们拯救企业的努力白费了。

en: Please bring back the book when you're done.
cn: 请看完后把书带回来。

en: He brought back souvenirs from his trip.
cn: 他从旅行中带回了纪念品。

en: During the heated debate, she decided to hold her peace to avoid conflict.
cn: 在激烈的辩论中，她决定保持沉默以避免冲突。

en: If you have nothing constructive to add, it's better to hold your peace.
cn: 如果你没有建设性的意见，最好保持沉默。

en: She is blessed with a beautiful singing voice.
cn: 她拥有优美的歌喉。

en: They are blessed with good health and a happy family.
cn: 他们拥有健康的身体和幸福的家庭。

en: We traveled to Paris by way of London.
cn: 我们经由伦敦前往巴黎。

en: The package was sent by way of express delivery.
cn: 包裹是通过快递发送的。

en: The road runs parallel to the river for several miles.
cn: 这条路与河流平行延伸数英里。

en: Her career development was parallel to his own in many ways.
cn: 她的职业发展与他的在许多方面是平行的。

en: The protest gave voice to the community's frustrations.
cn: 抗议活动表达了社区的挫败感。

en: She gave voice to her concerns during the meeting.
cn: 她在会议上表达了她的担忧。

en: The baby was crawling on all fours across the floor.
cn: 婴儿在地板上四肢着地爬行。

en: After the fall, he got up on all fours before standing.
cn: 摔倒后，他先四肢着地再站起来。

en: We plan to go rock climbing in the mountains this weekend.
cn: 我们计划这个周末去山里攀岩。

en: He loves to go rock climbing as a way to challenge himself.
cn: 他喜欢去攀岩作为挑战自己的方式。

en: I need to concentrate on work to meet the deadline.
cn: 我需要专注于工作以赶上截止日期。

en: She finds it hard to concentrate on work with all the noise.
cn: 在这么多噪音下，她发现很难专注于工作。

en: He was mad at his friend for forgetting his birthday.
cn: 他对朋友忘记他的生日感到生气。

en: Don't be mad at me; it was an honest mistake.
cn: 别生我的气，那是个无心之过。
