en: She received praise for her excellent performance in the play.
cn: 她因在戏剧中的出色表现而受到赞扬。

en: The company earned praise for its innovative products.
cn: 公司因其创新产品而获得赞扬。

en: The construction project is already underway.
cn: 建筑工程已经在进行中。

en: Preparations for the event are well underway.
cn: 活动的准备工作正在顺利进行。

en: They decided to convert the old factory into apartments.
cn: 他们决定将旧工厂改造成公寓。

en: You can convert the file to a PDF format.
cn: 你可以将文件转换为PDF格式。

en: He blamed the mistake on his assistant.
cn: 他把错误归咎于他的助手。

en: Don't blame the failure on others; take responsibility.
cn: 别把失败归咎于他人，要承担责任。

en: He had a stroke last year but is recovering well.
cn: 他去年中风了，但恢复得很好。

en: If you experience sudden numbness, you might be having a stroke.
cn: 如果你突然感到麻木，可能正在中风。

en: He rarely exercises, if at all.
cn: 他很少锻炼，即使有也极少。

en: The changes will be minor, if at all noticeable.
cn: 变化将很小，即使有也几乎注意不到。

en: Stop messing around and get to work!
cn: 别胡闹了，开始工作吧！

en: The kids were messing around in the backyard all afternoon.
cn: 孩子们整个下午都在后院胡闹。

en: The patient's condition took a turn for the worse overnight.
cn: 病人的情况在一夜之间恶化了。

en: The weather took a turn for the worse, so we canceled the picnic.
cn: 天气变糟了，所以我们取消了野餐。

en: My kids love watching animated cartoons on Saturday mornings.
cn: 我的孩子们喜欢在周六早上看动画片。

en: This animated cartoon won an award for its creativity.
cn: 这部动画片因其创意而获奖。

en: Her speech made a deep impression on the audience.
cn: 她的演讲给观众留下了深刻印象。

en: The beautiful scenery made a deep impression on me during my trip.
cn: 旅行中，美丽的风景给我留下了深刻印象。

en: You can count upon him to finish the project on time.
cn: 你可以指望他按时完成项目。

en: We're counting upon good weather for the outdoor event.
cn: 我们指望好天气来举办户外活动。

en: You can claim for damages if the product is defective.
cn: 如果产品有缺陷，你可以提出损害赔偿要求。

en: He filed a claim for compensation after the accident.
cn: 事故后，他提出了赔偿要求。

en: She's mad about classical music and attends every concert.
cn: 她对古典音乐非常着迷，每场音乐会都参加。

en: He's mad about football and never misses a game.
cn: 他对足球非常狂热，从不错过任何比赛。

en: Strong academic skills are essential for success in university.
cn: 强大的学术技能对于在大学取得成功至关重要。

en: The program focuses on developing students' academic skills like research and writing.
cn: 该计划侧重于培养学生的学术技能，如研究和写作。

en: Her positive attitude is a good influence on the team.
cn: 她积极的态度对团队有好的影响。

en: Reading books can be a good influence on children's development.
cn: 阅读书籍对儿童发展有好的影响。

en: Despite his age, he still gets about easily using public transport.
cn: 尽管年纪大了，他仍然能轻松地乘坐公共交通四处走动。

en: She gets about a lot for her job, visiting different cities.
cn: 她因工作四处旅行，访问不同的城市。

en: She bought a set of new dishes for the kitchen.
cn: 她为厨房买了一套新盘子。

en: The library has a set of encyclopedias available for reference.
cn: 图书馆有一套百科全书可供参考。

en: Children love to climb trees in the park.
cn: 孩子们喜欢在公园里爬树。

en: It's dangerous to climb trees without proper safety gear.
cn: 没有适当的安全装备爬树是危险的。

en: Over the years, the small town has grown into a bustling city.
cn: 多年来，这个小镇已经发展成一个繁华的城市。

en: He has collected many stamps over the years.
cn: 多年来，他收集了许多邮票。

en: The tourism boom has created many new jobs in the region.
cn: 旅游业的繁荣为该地区创造了许多新工作。

en: After the pandemic, we're expecting a tourism boom this summer.
cn: 疫情过后，我们预计今年夏天会出现旅游业的繁荣。

en: We prefer to travel by car so we can stop at scenic spots.
cn: 我们更喜欢乘汽车旅行，这样可以在景点停下来。

en: Traveling by car is convenient for short distances.
cn: 乘汽车旅行对于短距离很方便。

en: She is committed to improving education in her community.
cn: 她致力于改善她社区的教育。

en: The company is committed to reducing its environmental impact.
cn: 该公司致力于减少其环境影响。

en: I'd like to do some shopping this afternoon.
cn: 今天下午我想去购物。

en: I'd like to do more exercise to stay healthy.
cn: 我想做更多运动来保持健康。

en: He took an interest in photography after visiting an exhibition.
cn: 参观展览后，他对摄影产生了兴趣。

en: She encourages her students to take an interest in science.
cn: 她鼓励她的学生对科学产生兴趣。

en: The new bridge is under construction and will open next year.
cn: 新桥正在建设中，将于明年开放。

en: Please avoid the area as the building is under construction.
cn: 请避开该区域，因为大楼正在建设中。

en: It took her weeks to recover from the flu.
cn: 她花了数周时间才从流感中恢复。

en: The economy is slowly recovering from the recession.
cn: 经济正在慢慢从衰退中恢复。

en: She bought a new swimming costume for her holiday in Spain.
cn: 她为去西班牙度假买了一件新泳衣。

en: The swimming costume was drying on the line.
cn: 泳衣正在晾衣绳上晾干。

en: The café has a cozy atmosphere with soft lighting and comfortable chairs.
cn: 这家咖啡馆有舒适的氛围，灯光柔和，椅子舒适。

en: We enjoyed the cozy atmosphere of the cabin during our winter vacation.
cn: 我们在冬季假期享受了小木屋的舒适氛围。

en: At any rate, we should finish the project by Friday.
cn: 无论如何，我们应该在周五前完成这个项目。

en: I'm not sure if he'll come, but at any rate, I'll be there.
cn: 我不确定他是否会来，但不管怎样，我会去的。

en: New employees receive training during their first week.
cn: 新员工在第一周接受培训。

en: He received training in computer programming last year.
cn: 他去年接受了计算机编程培训。

en: She strives to achieve a work-life balance by leaving the office on time.
cn: 她努力通过准时下班来实现工作与生活的平衡。

en: Achieving a work-life balance can improve overall happiness.
cn: 实现工作与生活的平衡可以提高整体幸福感。

en: We organized a farewell party for our departing colleague.
cn: 我们为即将离职的同事组织了一场告别派对。

en: The farewell party was held at a local restaurant.
cn: 告别派对在当地的一家餐厅举行。

en: The academic schedule for the semester is posted online.
cn: 本学期的学术日程已在线公布。

en: Students must follow the academic schedule closely.
cn: 学生必须严格遵守学术日程。

en: The boss seems to have it in for me lately.
cn: 老板最近似乎对我有成见。

en: Why do you have it in for him? He hasn't done anything wrong.
cn: 你为什么对他有成见？他并没有做错什么。

en: You can come and go at will in this office.
cn: 在这个办公室，你可以随意进出。

en: The software allows users to customize settings at will.
cn: 该软件允许用户随意自定义设置。

en: His ideas are out of tune with modern trends.
cn: 他的想法与现代趋势不合拍。

en: The policy is out of tune with public opinion.
cn: 这项政策与公众意见不协调。

en: He had cold feet about proposing to her.
cn: 他对向她求婚感到临阵退缩。

en: Don't have cold feet now; we've planned this for months.
cn: 现在别临阵退缩；我们已经计划了好几个月了。

en: I need to pay back the loan by next month.
cn: 我需要在下个月前偿还贷款。

en: He promised to pay back the money he borrowed.
cn: 他承诺会偿还借的钱。

en: He threw himself on the ground to avoid the ball.
cn: 他扑倒在地以避开球。

en: She threw herself on the mercy of the court.
cn: 她投身于法庭的仁慈之下。

en: We stopped to take in the scenery along the mountain road.
cn: 我们停下来欣赏山路沿途的风景。

en: She loves to take in the scenery from her balcony.
cn: 她喜欢从阳台上欣赏风景。

en: Pollution is a serious threat to public health.
cn: 污染是对公共健康的严重威胁。

en: The outbreak was identified as a threat to public health.
cn: 这次爆发被认定为对公共健康的威胁。

en: Don't make a mountain out of a molehill; it's just a small mistake.
cn: 别小题大做；这只是个小错误。

en: She always makes a mountain out of a molehill when things go wrong.
cn: 当事情出错时，她总是小题大做。

en: He caught hell from his boss for being late.
cn: 他因为迟到被老板严厉批评。

en: You'll catch hell if you break that vase.
cn: 如果你打碎那个花瓶，你会挨骂的。

en: The reason for his absence was a family emergency.
cn: 他缺席的原因是家庭紧急情况。

en: What is the reason for the delay in the project?
cn: 项目延误的原因是什么？

en: The rain kept us from going to the park.
cn: 下雨阻止了我们去公园。

en: She kept her children from eating too much candy.
cn: 她阻止她的孩子们吃太多糖果。

en: I don't have a clue about how to fix this computer.
cn: 我对如何修理这台电脑一无所知。

en: She didn't have a clue about the surprise party we were planning.
cn: 她对我们正在计划的惊喜派对毫不知情。

en: Many species are in danger of extinction due to habitat loss.
cn: 许多物种因栖息地丧失而濒临灭绝。

en: The panda is in danger of extinction and needs protection.
cn: 熊猫濒临灭绝，需要保护。

en: Can you bring me up to date on the latest developments in the case?
cn: 你能让我了解这个案件的最新进展吗？

en: The manager brought the team up to date with the new company policies.
cn: 经理让团队了解了公司的新政策。

en: After their argument, they are barely on speaking terms.
cn: 争吵之后，他们几乎不说话。

en: We are on speaking terms with our neighbors, but not close friends.
cn: 我们和邻居关系尚可，但不是亲密朋友。

en: The government uses tax revenue to fund public services like schools and hospitals.
cn: 政府使用税收收入来资助学校和医院等公共服务。

en: An increase in tax revenue can help reduce the national debt.
cn: 税收收入的增加有助于减少国家债务。

en: The security system prevents unauthorized access from entering the building.
cn: 安全系统防止未经授权的进入大楼。

en: She prevented her child from eating too much candy.
cn: 她阻止她的孩子吃太多糖果。

en: The soil is depleted of nutrients after years of intensive farming.
cn: 经过多年的密集耕作，土壤的养分已耗尽。

en: The company's resources are depleted of funds due to the economic downturn.
cn: 由于经济下滑，公司的资金资源已耗尽。

en: The weather service warned about an approaching storm.
cn: 气象部门警告了一场即将来临的风暴。

en: Parents should warn their children about the dangers of talking to strangers.
cn: 父母应该警告孩子与陌生人交谈的危险。

en: They have something going with each other, but it's not serious yet.
cn: 他们之间有点什么，但还不算认真。

en: Do you have anything going with that new colleague at work?
cn: 你和那位新同事有什么进展吗？

en: After the long illness, she still feels unfit to return to work.
cn: 长期生病后，她仍然感觉不适合回去工作。

en: He feels unfit after skipping his exercise routine for a week.
cn: 跳过一个星期的锻炼后，他感觉身体不适。

en: It's not a problem but rather an opportunity for growth.
cn: 这不是一个问题，而是一个成长的机会。

en: He is not lazy but rather very focused on his priorities.
cn: 他不是懒惰，而是非常专注于他的优先事项。

en: Many students are under stress during exam periods.
cn: 许多学生在考试期间处于压力之下。

en: Employees under stress may experience burnout if not managed properly.
cn: 处于压力下的员工如果管理不当可能会经历倦怠。

en: The company aims to engage with customers through social media.
cn: 公司旨在通过社交媒体与客户互动。

en: Teachers should engage with students to make learning more effective.
cn: 教师应该与学生互动，使学习更有效。

en: She let out a scream when she saw the spider.
cn: 当她看到蜘蛛时，她发出了一声尖叫。

en: They decided to let out their spare room to a student.
cn: 他们决定把空余的房间租给一个学生。

en: The job offers decent pay and good benefits.
cn: 这份工作提供体面的薪水和良好的福利。

en: Workers are demanding decent pay for their hard labor.
cn: 工人们要求为他们的辛勤劳动获得体面的报酬。

en: They plan to get married next summer in a beach ceremony.
cn: 他们计划明年夏天在海滩上举行婚礼。

en: After dating for five years, they finally got married.
cn: 约会五年后，他们终于结婚了。

en: She took the sudden change in plans in stride and adapted quickly.
cn: 她从容应对计划的突然变化，并迅速适应。

en: He takes criticism in stride, using it to improve himself.
cn: 他从容应对批评，用它来改进自己。

en: As a CEO, she leads a hectic life with back-to-back meetings.
cn: 作为首席执行官，她过着忙碌的生活，会议一个接一个。

en: Parents of young children often lead a hectic life balancing work and family.
cn: 有年幼孩子的父母常常过着忙碌的生活，平衡工作和家庭。

en: The fierce rays of the sun made it difficult to see without sunglasses.
cn: 强烈的阳光使得不戴太阳镜很难看清。

en: During summer, the fierce rays of sunlight can cause sunburn quickly.
cn: 在夏天，强烈的阳光会迅速导致晒伤。

en: You are supposed to finish your homework before watching TV.
cn: 你应该在看电视前完成作业。

en: The train is supposed to arrive at 3 PM.
cn: 火车应该在下午3点到达。

en: He tricked his friend into believing he had won the lottery.
cn: 他欺骗他的朋友相信他中了彩票。

en: The scam artist tricked elderly people into giving away their savings.
cn: 诈骗犯欺骗老年人交出他们的储蓄。

en: It's wrong to tell a lie to your parents.
cn: 对父母说谎是错误的。

en: He told a lie about his age to get into the club.
cn: 他谎报年龄以进入俱乐部。

en: We are planning a trip to Japan next summer.
cn: 我们计划明年夏天去日本旅行。

en: She spent weeks planning a trip to Europe with her friends.
cn: 她花了数周时间和朋友们计划去欧洲旅行。

en: The government aims to improve living standards through economic growth.
cn: 政府旨在通过经济增长提高生活水平。

en: Technological advancements have helped improve living standards globally.
cn: 技术进步有助于全球提高生活水平。

en: The underdog team gave the champions a run for their money in the final match.
cn: 弱队在决赛中让冠军队付出了代价。

en: In the business deal, our competitors got a run for their money.
cn: 在这笔商业交易中，我们的竞争对手付出了代价。

en: Ragtime music was popular in the early 20th century in the United States.
cn: 拉格泰姆音乐在20世纪初在美国很流行。

en: Scott Joplin is famous for composing ragtime music like 'The Entertainer'.
cn: 斯科特·乔普林以创作如《艺人》等拉格泰姆音乐而闻名。

en: He tried to make a fool of me in front of everyone.
cn: 他试图在大家面前愚弄我。

en: Don't make a fool of yourself by telling that silly joke.
cn: 别讲那个愚蠢的笑话让自己出洋相。

en: Some music will liven up the party.
cn: 一些音乐会让派对活跃起来。

en: Adding colorful decorations can liven up a dull room.
cn: 添加彩色装饰可以让沉闷的房间有生气。

en: Just a moment, I'll be right back with your order.
cn: 稍等片刻，我马上把您的订单拿来。

en: Can you wait just a moment while I finish this call?
cn: 你能稍等片刻吗？我打完这个电话。

en: Drought led to widespread crop failures in the region.
cn: 干旱导致该地区大范围的农作物歉收。

en: Crop failures can cause food shortages and higher prices.
cn: 农作物歉收可能导致食物短缺和价格上涨。

en: We love spending time out of doors in the summer.
cn: 我们喜欢夏天在户外度过时间。

en: The children played out of doors until it got dark.
cn: 孩子们在户外玩耍直到天黑。

en: Tourists come to Paris to see the sights like the Eiffel Tower.
cn: 游客来巴黎观光，比如埃菲尔铁塔。

en: We spent the day seeing the sights of the old city.
cn: 我们花了一天时间游览古城的景点。

en: Keep your eyes open for any suspicious activity in the neighborhood.
cn: 留意社区里任何可疑的活动。

en: I'm keeping my eyes open for a good deal on a used car.
cn: 我正在留意二手车的优惠交易。

en: If you have a problem, you should complain to the manager.
cn: 如果你有问题，应该向经理投诉。

en: He complained to the customer service about the delayed delivery.
cn: 他向客服投诉了延迟的送货。

en: The judge will mete out a punishment based on the severity of the crime.
cn: 法官将根据犯罪的严重程度来施加惩罚。

en: The school principal meted out a punishment of detention for the student's misconduct.
cn: 校长因学生的不当行为给予了留校察看的处罚。

en: You should know better than to lie to your parents.
cn: 你应该更懂事，知道不该对父母撒谎。

en: At his age, he knows better than to touch a hot stove.
cn: 在他这个年纪，他知道不该碰热炉子。

en: She is angry with her brother for breaking her toy.
cn: 她对弟弟生气，因为他弄坏了她的玩具。

en: Don't be angry with me; it was an honest mistake.
cn: 别对我生气；那是个无心的错误。

en: She will enter university next fall to study engineering.
cn: 她明年秋天将进入大学学习工程学。

en: After high school, many students enter university to pursue higher education.
cn: 高中毕业后，许多学生进入大学追求高等教育。

en: We stayed at a youth hostel in Paris to save money on our trip.
cn: 我们在巴黎住了一家青年旅舍，以节省旅行开支。

en: Youth hostels often have shared dormitories and communal kitchens.
cn: 青年旅舍通常有共享宿舍和公共厨房。

en: They planned the surprise party in secret to keep it a surprise.
cn: 他们秘密策划了惊喜派对，以保持其神秘性。

en: The documents were stored in secret to prevent leaks.
cn: 文件被秘密存放以防止泄露。

en: I'll join you in cleaning the house this weekend.
cn: 这个周末我会加入你一起打扫房子。

en: He joined his friends in playing soccer after school.
cn: 放学后他加入朋友们一起踢足球。

en: Don't blame me for the mistake; I wasn't involved.
cn: 别因这个错误责备我，我没有参与。

en: She blamed her brother for breaking the vase.
cn: 她因花瓶碎了而责备她的兄弟。

en: He made up that story out of whole cloth to avoid getting in trouble.
cn: 他完全虚构了那个故事以避免惹上麻烦。

en: The rumor was made up out of whole cloth and had no basis in fact.
cn: 这个谣言是凭空捏造的，没有任何事实依据。

en: Before making a decision, it's important to weigh the pros and cons.
cn: 做决定前，权衡利弊很重要。

en: She weighed the pros and cons of moving to a new city.
cn: 她权衡了搬到一个新城市的利弊。

en: At the sight of the spider, she screamed and ran away.
cn: 一看到蜘蛛，她就尖叫着跑开了。

en: He smiled at the sight of his old friend after many years.
cn: 一看到多年未见的老朋友，他就笑了。

en: She impressed the audience with her powerful singing voice.
cn: 她用她强有力的歌声给观众留下了深刻印象。

en: He impressed his boss with his innovative ideas.
cn: 他用他创新的想法给老板留下了深刻印象。

en: She wore a scarf to ward off the cold wind.
cn: 她戴了围巾以抵挡寒风。

en: Vaccines help ward off diseases by boosting immunity.
cn: 疫苗通过增强免疫力来帮助预防疾病。

en: His arrogant attitude needs to be taken down a peg or two.
cn: 他傲慢的态度需要被挫挫锐气。

en: The criticism from his peers took him down a peg or two and made him more humble.
cn: 来自同行的批评挫了他的锐气，让他更谦虚了。

en: It's important to build good working relationships with colleagues to enhance teamwork.
cn: 与同事建立良好的工作关系对于增强团队合作很重要。

en: She focuses on building good working relationships with clients to ensure long-term partnerships.
cn: 她专注于与客户建立良好的工作关系，以确保长期合作。

en: Don't take your frustration out on me; I didn't cause the problem.
cn: 别把你的沮丧发泄在我身上，我没有造成这个问题。

en: After a bad day at work, he took it out on his family by being irritable.
cn: 在工作上度过了糟糕的一天后，他把情绪发泄在家人身上，变得易怒。

en: Gender equality is a fundamental human right that should be promoted worldwide.
cn: 性别平等是一项基本人权，应在全球范围内推广。

en: Many organizations work towards achieving gender equality in the workplace.
cn: 许多组织致力于在工作场所实现性别平等。

en: He said he was busy, but in fact, he was just avoiding the meeting.
cn: 他说他很忙，但事实上，他只是在回避会议。

en: In fact, the project was completed ahead of schedule due to efficient planning.
cn: 实际上，由于高效的规划，项目提前完成了。

en: I had goose pimples when I heard the scary story in the dark.
cn: 当我在黑暗中听到那个恐怖故事时，我起了鸡皮疙瘩。

en: The cold wind made her have goose pimples all over her arms.
cn: 寒风让她手臂上起了鸡皮疙瘩。

en: Get off it! You know that's not true.
cn: 别胡说了！你知道那不是真的。

en: When he started making excuses, she told him to get off it and take responsibility.
cn: 当他开始找借口时，她告诉他住口并承担责任。

en: His constant complaining really gets under my skin.
cn: 他不断的抱怨真的惹恼了我。

en: The noise from the construction site is starting to get under her skin.
cn: 建筑工地的噪音开始让她烦躁了。

en: Big-budget films often feature famous actors and advanced special effects.
cn: 大预算电影通常以著名演员和先进特效为特色。

en: Studios invest heavily in big-budget films to attract large audiences.
cn: 电影公司在大预算电影上投入巨资以吸引大量观众。

en: I prefer to read articles online because it's more convenient than buying magazines.
cn: 我更喜欢在线阅读文章，因为这比购买杂志更方便。

en: She spends hours each day reading articles online to stay informed.
cn: 她每天花几个小时在线阅读文章以保持信息灵通。

en: He has a remarkable facility for languages, speaking five fluently.
cn: 他有非凡的语言天赋，能流利地说五种语言。

en: Her facility for languages made her an excellent translator.
cn: 她的语言天赋使她成为一名优秀的翻译。

en: The company faced complicated troubles due to the merger and market changes.
cn: 由于合并和市场变化，公司面临着复杂的麻烦。

en: Her personal life was full of complicated troubles that she struggled to resolve.
cn: 她的个人生活充满了复杂的麻烦，她努力解决这些问题。

en: You have got to finish this report by tomorrow.
cn: 你必须明天之前完成这份报告。

en: I have got to see that movie; everyone says it's amazing.
cn: 我必须看那部电影；大家都说它很棒。

en: Genetic testing can reveal predispositions to certain hereditary conditions.
cn: 基因检测可以揭示对某些遗传性疾病的易感性。

en: Many people opt for genetic testing to learn about their ancestry.
cn: 许多人选择进行基因检测以了解他们的祖先来源。

en: The senior manager took the new intern under her wings to help him adjust.
cn: 高级经理庇护了这位新实习生，帮助他适应环境。

en: After the loss, her aunt took her under her wings and provided emotional support.
cn: 在失去亲人后，她的阿姨庇护了她并提供了情感支持。

en: Can you bring back some milk from the store?
cn: 你能从商店带些牛奶回来吗？

en: The trip brought back many fond memories of my childhood.
cn: 这次旅行带回了许多我童年的美好回忆。

en: He jumped off the deep end by investing all his savings in a risky venture.
cn: 他贸然行动，将所有积蓄投资于一个风险项目。

en: Without any training, she jumped off the deep end and started her own business.
cn: 没有任何培训，她贸然行动，开始了自己的生意。

en: He made the same mistake time after time, despite warnings.
cn: 尽管有警告，他还是一次又一次地犯同样的错误。

en: Time after time, she proved her reliability in critical situations.
cn: 一次又一次，她在关键时刻证明了她的可靠性。

en: Many fruits are rich in vitamins, for example, oranges and strawberries.
cn: 许多水果富含维生素，例如橙子和草莓。

en: You can use various tools for this task, for example, a hammer or a screwdriver.
cn: 你可以使用各种工具来完成这项任务，例如锤子或螺丝刀。

en: Hang in there; things will get better soon.
cn: 坚持住；情况很快就会好转的。

en: Despite the challenges, she decided to hang in and complete the project.
cn: 尽管面临挑战，她决定坚持并完成这个项目。

en: One day, I hope to travel around the world.
cn: 有一天，我希望能环游世界。

en: She dreams that one day she will become a famous scientist.
cn: 她梦想有一天能成为著名的科学家。

en: She only wears designer clothes from top fashion houses.
cn: 她只穿顶级时装屋的设计师服装。

en: Designer clothes are often seen as a status symbol.
cn: 设计师服装常被视为地位象征。

en: The detective didn't have anything on the suspect, so he had to release him.
cn: 侦探没有关于嫌疑人的任何不利信息，因此不得不释放他。

en: If you have anything on him, you should report it to the authorities.
cn: 如果你有关于他的任何不利信息，应该向当局报告。

en: Please enter the numbers one at a time to avoid errors.
cn: 请一次输入一个数字以避免错误。

en: He reads books chapter by chapter, focusing on one at a time.
cn: 他逐章阅读书籍，一次专注于一章。

en: He broke his neck to finish the assignment before the deadline.
cn: 他拼命努力在截止日期前完成作业。

en: Don't break your neck trying to please everyone; it's impossible.
cn: 不要拼命努力去取悦每个人；那是不可能的。

en: After learning the theory, it's important to put it into practice.
cn: 学习理论后，将其付诸实践很重要。

en: She put her new marketing strategies into practice and saw immediate results.
cn: 她将新的营销策略付诸实践，并立即看到了效果。

en: They met face to face for the first time after months of online communication.
cn: 经过数月的在线交流后，他们第一次面对面见面。

en: It's important to have face-to-face conversations to build trust in business.
cn: 在商业中，进行面对面的对话对于建立信任很重要。

en: The spicy food was not to my taste, so I ordered something milder.
cn: 辣的食物不合我的口味，所以我点了一些更温和的。

en: The decor in the new apartment is exactly to her taste, with lots of natural light.
cn: 新公寓的装饰完全符合她的品味，有很多自然光。

en: They partied all night long to celebrate the New Year.
cn: 他们整夜聚会庆祝新年。

en: The baby cried all night long, keeping everyone awake.
cn: 婴儿整夜哭闹，让大家都睡不着。

en: The caterpillar will change into a butterfly after a few weeks.
cn: 几周后，毛毛虫会变成蝴蝶。

en: She changed into her pajamas as soon as she got home.
cn: 她一回家就换上了睡衣。

en: She decided to study a subject like computer science to improve her job prospects.
cn: 她决定学习像计算机科学这样的学科来提高她的就业前景。

en: In university, he chose to study a subject that combined his interests in history and politics.
cn: 在大学里，他选择学习一门结合了他对历史和政治兴趣的学科。

en: She decided to run against the incumbent mayor in the upcoming election.
cn: 她决定在即将到来的选举中与现任市长竞争。

en: The new candidate will run against several experienced politicians.
cn: 新候选人将与几位经验丰富的政治家竞争。

en: The concept of working from home was alien to him before the pandemic.
cn: 在大流行之前，在家工作的概念对他来说很陌生。

en: Such dishonest behavior is alien to her character.
cn: 这种不诚实的行为与她的性格格格不入。

en: The snow began to fall on the rooftops, covering the city in white.
cn: 雪开始落在屋顶上，将城市覆盖成白色。

en: The responsibility for organizing the event fell on her shoulders.
cn: 组织活动的责任落在了她的肩上。

en: The archer took aim at the target and released the arrow.
cn: 弓箭手瞄准目标并射出了箭。

en: He took aim with his rifle, focusing on the distant figure.
cn: 他用步枪瞄准，专注于远处的身影。

en: She used simple language to get her point across during the presentation.
cn: 她在演示中使用简单的语言来传达她的观点。

en: It's important to get the safety instructions across to all employees.
cn: 向所有员工传达安全指示很重要。

en: By studying over the summer, she got a head start on the school year.
cn: 通过在夏天学习，她在学年开始前获得了领先优势。

en: The team got a head start by arriving early and setting up their equipment.
cn: 团队通过提前到达并设置设备获得了领先优势。

en: Joining a club is a great social activity to meet new people.
cn: 加入俱乐部是结识新朋友的绝佳社交活动。

en: The company organizes regular social activities to boost team morale.
cn: 公司组织定期的社交活动以提高团队士气。

en: The government plans to tighten regulations on environmental pollution.
cn: 政府计划加强对环境污染的监管。

en: After the scandal, they decided to tighten regulations on financial reporting.
cn: 丑闻之后，他们决定加强对财务报告的监管。

en: Let's have a break after working for two hours straight.
cn: 连续工作两小时后，让我们休息一下。

en: She decided to have a break from studying and go for a walk.
cn: 她决定从学习中休息一下，去散散步。

en: We had to dig out the old photos from the attic for the family reunion.
cn: 我们不得不从阁楼里挖出旧照片用于家庭团聚。

en: He dug out his winter coat from the back of the closet.
cn: 他从衣柜后面挖出了他的冬衣。

en: She glared at him for interrupting her speech.
cn: 她因他打断演讲而怒视着他。

en: The teacher glared at the noisy students to quiet them down.
cn: 老师瞪视吵闹的学生让他们安静下来。

en: He set out to learn Spanish in just three months.
cn: 他着手在三个月内学会西班牙语。

en: They set out to climb the mountain at dawn.
cn: 他们在黎明时分开始登山。

en: When the police arrived, the suspect took a powder and disappeared into the crowd.
cn: 警察到达时，嫌疑人溜走并消失在人群中。

en: He didn't want to deal with the argument, so he just took a powder.
cn: 他不想处理争论，所以就直接溜走了。

en: The gymnast had to balance herself on the narrow beam during the routine.
cn: 体操运动员在常规动作中必须在窄梁上保持平衡。

en: He struggled to balance himself on the icy sidewalk.
cn: 他在结冰的人行道上努力保持平衡。

en: All financial reports must adhere to standard accounting principles.
cn: 所有财务报告必须遵循标准会计原则。

en: She studied accounting principles in her university course.
cn: 她在大学课程中学习了会计原则。

en: The new policy made the dust fly in the office with everyone rushing to comply.
cn: 新政策在办公室引起骚动，每个人都忙着遵守。

en: When the deadline approached, the team made the dust fly to finish the project.
cn: 截止日期临近时，团队忙得不可开交以完成项目。

en: The dog backed away when it saw the stranger.
cn: 狗看到陌生人时后退了。

en: She backed away from the argument to avoid conflict.
cn: 她从争论中退缩以避免冲突。

en: Many species are at risk of going extinct due to habitat loss.
cn: 许多物种因栖息地丧失而面临灭绝风险。

en: The dodo bird went extinct in the 17th century.
cn: 渡渡鸟在17世纪灭绝了。

en: The success of the project rests on careful planning.
cn: 项目的成功依赖于周密的计划。

en: Her argument rests on solid evidence from research.
cn: 她的论点基于研究中的坚实证据。

en: He had to do the assignment over because of errors.
cn: 由于错误，他不得不重做作业。

en: The chef decided to do the dish over to perfect the flavor.
cn: 厨师决定重做这道菜以完善味道。

en: Make sure your device can connect to the Internet before the meeting.
cn: 确保会议前你的设备能连接到互联网。

en: The café offers free Wi-Fi for customers to connect to the Internet.
cn: 这家咖啡馆提供免费Wi-Fi供顾客连接互联网。

en: She immersed herself in her studies to prepare for the exam.
cn: 她沉浸于学习中以准备考试。

en: He likes to immerse in nature during his vacations.
cn: 他喜欢在假期中沉浸于大自然。

en: His actions are contrary to the company's policies.
cn: 他的行为与公司政策相违背。

en: The results were contrary to what we had expected.
cn: 结果与我们预期的相反。

en: The school provides extra support for disadvantaged students.
cn: 学校为弱势学生提供额外支持。

en: Programs aim to help disadvantaged students access higher education.
cn: 项目旨在帮助弱势学生接受高等教育。

en: Even now, I remember the day we first met.
cn: 即使现在，我还记得我们第一次见面的那天。

en: The problem persists even now, despite our efforts.
cn: 尽管我们努力了，问题至今仍然存在。

en: She had the nod from the manager to lead the new project.
cn: 她获得经理批准领导新项目。

en: After the interview, he had the nod for the job position.
cn: 面试后，他被选中担任这个职位。

en: Keep your weather eye open for any changes in the market trends.
cn: 对市场趋势的任何变化保持警惕。

en: During the hike, we kept our weather eye open for wildlife.
cn: 徒步期间，我们密切注意野生动物。

en: She succeeded by virtue of her hard work and dedication.
cn: 凭借她的努力和奉献，她成功了。

en: By virtue of his position, he has access to confidential information.
cn: 由于他的职位，他能接触到机密信息。

en: The protesters came in a body to the city hall.
cn: 抗议者成群结队地来到市政厅。

en: Fans came in a body to support their favorite band.
cn: 粉丝成群结队地来支持他们最喜欢的乐队。

en: With her experience, she has the edge over other candidates.
cn: 凭借她的经验，她比其他候选人更有优势。

en: Our team has the edge over theirs due to better preparation.
cn: 由于准备更充分，我们队比他们队更有优势。

en: The company serves a niche market by producing custom-made bicycles for professional cyclists.
cn: 这家公司通过为专业自行车手生产定制自行车来服务利基市场。

en: Many startups succeed by serving a niche market that larger corporations overlook.
cn: 许多初创企业通过服务大公司忽视的利基市场而取得成功。

en: We decided to go all the way to the summit despite the rain.
cn: 尽管下雨，我们决定一直走到山顶。

en: He went all the way to win the championship, training every day.
cn: 他全力以赴赢得冠军，每天训练。

en: The factory uses robots for mechanised tasks like assembly and packaging.
cn: 工厂使用机器人来完成组装和包装等机械化任务。

en: Automation has replaced many mechanised tasks in manufacturing.
cn: 自动化已经取代了制造业中的许多机械化任务。

en: She could not help laughing when she saw the funny video.
cn: 当她看到那个有趣的视频时，她忍不住笑了。

en: He could not help feeling nervous before the big presentation.
cn: 在重要演讲前，他忍不住感到紧张。

en: She took the responsibility of organizing the event upon herself.
cn: 她主动承担了组织活动的责任。

en: He took it upon himself to fix the broken equipment.
cn: 他主动承担了修理损坏设备的任务。

en: This brand is popular among young adults for its trendy designs.
cn: 这个品牌因其时尚的设计在年轻人中很受欢迎。

en: The new policy is popular among employees because it offers more flexibility.
cn: 新政策在员工中很受欢迎，因为它提供了更多的灵活性。

en: While waiting for the bus, I killed time by reading a book.
cn: 在等公交车时，我通过读书来消磨时间。

en: They played cards to kill time during the long flight.
cn: 在长途飞行中，他们打牌来打发时间。

en: After the meeting, we came away with a clear plan of action.
cn: 会议结束后，我们带着明确的行动计划离开了。

en: She came away from the concert feeling inspired.
cn: 她离开音乐会时感到深受启发。

en: Great numbers of tourists visit the city every summer.
cn: 每年夏天都有大量的游客访问这座城市。

en: The charity received great numbers of donations after the appeal.
cn: 在呼吁之后，慈善机构收到了大量的捐款。

en: My little brother always wants to tag along when I go out with friends.
cn: 当我和朋友们出去时，我的弟弟总是想跟着。

en: She tagged along on the business trip to learn more about the industry.
cn: 她跟着去出差，以了解更多关于行业的信息。

en: The trip was enjoyable for many reasons, not least the beautiful scenery.
cn: 这次旅行因许多原因而愉快，尤其是美丽的风景。

en: She contributed to the project in several ways, not least by securing funding.
cn: 她以多种方式为项目做出了贡献，特别是通过确保资金。

en: The children were playing at being pirates in the backyard.
cn: 孩子们在后院假装是海盗。

en: He's just playing at being a chef; he has no real training.
cn: 他只是假装是个厨师；他并没有真正的培训。

en: The artist's brushstrokes give life to the painting.
cn: 艺术家的笔触赋予了这幅画生命。

en: Her passionate speech gave life to the dull topic.
cn: 她充满激情的演讲使这个枯燥的话题变得生动。

en: Meeting her mentor altered the course of her life and inspired her career.
cn: 遇到她的导师改变了她的人生轨迹，并启发了她的职业生涯。

en: A single decision can alter the course of one's life forever.
cn: 一个决定可以永远改变某人的人生轨迹。

en: The company makes customer satisfaction a top priority.
cn: 公司将客户满意度作为首要任务。

en: She made finishing her degree a top priority this year.
cn: 她今年将完成学位作为首要任务。

en: He didn't want to impose on his friends by asking for a favor.
cn: 他不想通过请求帮忙来打扰他的朋友们。

en: The new regulations impose on businesses by increasing costs.
cn: 新规定通过增加成本强加于企业。

en: Choosing the right candidate is a matter of careful consideration.
cn: 选择合适的候选人是一个需要仔细考虑的问题。

en: It's just a matter of time before the project is completed.
cn: 项目完成只是时间问题。

en: I have dibs on the last slice of pizza!
cn: 我对最后一片披萨有优先权！

en: She called dibs on the window seat before we even boarded the plane.
cn: 在我们登机之前，她就声称要坐靠窗的座位。

en: She dedicates her time to volunteering at the local shelter.
cn: 她将时间奉献给在当地收容所做志愿者。

en: The book is dedicated to his parents for their unwavering support.
cn: 这本书献给他的父母，感谢他们坚定不移的支持。

en: The band integrates musical styles from jazz and rock to create a unique sound.
cn: 这支乐队融合了爵士和摇滚的音乐风格，创造出独特的声音。

en: Modern composers often integrate musical styles from different cultures.
cn: 现代作曲家经常融合来自不同文化的音乐风格。
